chao xian de yi xin tuan jie de dao jia qiang 
jin zheng en biao shi 
zai jin nian de jing ji jian she he ti gao ren min sheng huo de nu li zhong 
yao ba nong ye dang zuo zhu gong fang xiang hen zhua 
dui nong ye ji zhong yi qie li liang 
jin nian yao zai jian she bu men kai chuang xin de fan rong qi 
gao hao fa dian zhan jian she 
xu chan ji de jian she 
zhu fang jian she deng yi xi lie zhong yao jian she gong cheng 
chao xian jiang ji xu da li jia qiang guo fang li liang 
zai guo fang gong ye bu men geng duo sheng chan qing liang hua 
jing mi hua de chao xian shi xian dai hua wu qi zhuang bei 
jin yi bu gong gu zi wei guo fang li liang 
jin zheng en qiang diao 
yao che di jian li wei yi ling dao ti xi 
lao gu bao zhang dang dui wu de chun jie xing 
jia qiang dang zu zhi de zhan dou zhi neng he zuo yong 
dui shang hai dang he ge ming dui wu tong yi tuan jie de xi wei xian xiang he yin su yao bao chi jing ti bing che di jia yi ke fu 
ji xu kai zhan qing chu sun hai chao xian zhi du de yi se si xiang he tui fei feng chao de dou zheng 
jian jue fen sui di ren si xiang wen hua shen tou yin mou 
jin zheng en biao shi 
jin nian yao guan che jin ri cheng he jin zheng ri de yi xun 
zai zu guo tong yi yun dong zhong qu de xin jin zhan 
wo men min zu zi ji 
zun zhong bing cheng shi lv xing xuan yan 
bi xu ying zao qi fen gai shan bei nan guan xi 
chao xian min zu xiang hu fei bang fan mu zhi hui rang bu xi wang zu guo tong yi de shi li zuo shou yu li 
yao jie shu fei bang zhong shang 
bu neng zai zuo you ai he jie yu tuan jie de shi qing 
zhi yao shi zhong shi min zu 
xi wang tong yi de ren 
wo men bu guan ta shi shei 
ji wang bu jiu 
yi tong xie shou qian jin 
chao xian jin hou ye jiang wei gai shan bei nan guan xi zuo chu ji ji nu li 
jin zheng en biao shi 
he ping dui yu chao xian ren min lai shuo wu bi zhen gui 
dan he ping bu shi kao qi pan he qi qiu jiu neng de lai de 
zai chao xian ban dao shang zhen dui chao xian de he zhan zheng yin yun bu san di qing kuang xia 
chao xian jue bu hui xiu shou pang guan 
jiang yi qiang you li de zi wei li liang wei hu guo jia zhu quan yu he ping 
chao xian dang he zheng fu jin hou ye jiang lao gu jian chi zi zhu 
you yi de dui wai zheng ce li nian 
tong zun zhong chao xian zhu quan bing you hao xiang dai de suo you guo jia kuo da fa zhan you hao he zuo guan xi 
wei shi jie he ping 
an quan he ren lei gong tong fan rong er ji ji nu li 
ji zhe qu hai qi 
ju e xin she bao dao 
jin ri e luo si 
jin ri e luo si 
tong xun she zhu bian 
tong shi jian ren 
jin ri e luo si 
dian shi pin dao zhu bian 
bi ye yu ku ban guo li da xue xin wen xi 
ceng zai ke la si nuo da er dian shi tai gong zuo 
fu ze you guan zong tong de xin wen bao dao 
jin ri e luo si 
pin dao zhu bian 
e luo si zong tong pu jing xia ling zai san ge yue nei jiang 
e luo si zhi sheng 
dian tai he bing wei 
jin ri e luo si 
guo ji tong xun she 
ta zai fu er jia ge lei xing zheng qu zhu chi zhao kai le fan kong hui yi zhi hou 
ji ke qian wang gai shi yi suo yi yuan tan wang yin kong bu xi ji er shou shang de shang yuan 
pu jing ren wei 
zhen dui ping min de kong bu zhu yi xing wei mei you ren he dao li 
zai tu jing wu gui dian che bao zha di dian 
pu jing zong tong ting xia lai xian le yi shu mei gui hua 
zai bei ju fa sheng de di fang 
bai zhe xu duo xian hua 
ran zhe la zhu 
hai you cheng shi ju min song lai de yi xie er tong wan ju 
pu jing zai yi yuan li xiang yi sheng xun wen le shang zhe di qing kuang bing yu shang yuan jin xing le jiao tan 
zai shou shang ren yuan zhong 
ji you zhi fa ren yuan 
ye you gai cheng ju min 
yi ming nv shou shang zhe dui pu jing zong tong de wei wen biao shi gan xie bing xiang ta bao zheng shuo 
fu er jia ge lei ren ju you jian qiang de jing shen 
ta men bu hui zhe me rong yi bei cui hui de 
pu jing xi wang ta zao ri kang fu bing zhu ta xin nian kuai le 
zai e fu er jia ge lei shi huo che zhan he wu gui dian che shang lian xu fa sheng le liang ci kong bu bao zha shi jian 
ji zhe wu wen bin bao dao yuan guo ru sheng 
nan su dan wu zhuang chong tu bu duan sheng ji 
ju shi dong dang jia ju 
shu yi shi wan ji de nan min liu li shi suo 
wei sheng cun si chu ben bo 
jin nian yuan dan shi cheng liao wu ren wen jin de pu tong ri zi 
zhong guo zhu nan su dan wei he bu dui que yong pu tong er you te bie de fang shi 
du guo le zhe ge bu yi yang de xin nian di yi tian 
ge guan cha shao jia qiang guan cha jing jie 
ying ji fen dui zuo hao xing dong zhun bei 
yi chang shi zhuang shi dan fang wei yan lian zai zhong guo wei he bu dui ying qu da xiang 
ci ci fang wei yan lian yi ying qu feng suo jie yan 
zu zhi wu zhuang fen zi chong ji ying qu wei zhu 
jin mi jie he dang qian nan su dan guo nei xing shi ke neng yin fa de an quan wei xie 
zhu yi yan lian ying dui cuo shi 
wei he guan bing jie dao zhi ling 
xun su zhan kai xing dong 
ying ji fen dui di yi shi jian zhan ling she ji wei zhi 
qi yu ren yuan jin ji shu san 
jie ri bu wang zhan bei 
wei he bu dui zheng wei yu zi gang dui ji zhe zhe shuo 
you qi shi xian zai zhe zhong sui shi ke neng mian lin zhan huo bo ji de zhan chang huan jing 
wo men geng yao shi ke zuo hao ying dui ge zhong tu fa qing kuang de zhun bei 
xin nian di yi dun zao fan hou 
guan bing men bing mei you xiang yi wang guo jie na yang fang song yu le 
er shi na qi le gong ju 
kai shi jian xiu che liang 
dui ying qu ge ge wei zhi de fang yu gong shi jia gu xiu shan 
zhan kai zhan shu xun lian 
yi qie dou xian de mang er bu luan 
cong nan su dan bao fa wu zhuang chong tu kai shi 
zhe yang de gong zuo wo men mei tian dou yao jin xing 
sui ran hen mang lu que hen chong shi 
wei he bu dui da dui zhang li qing feng shuo 
wei de jiu shi que bao wo men suo you de ren yuan he she shi sui shi dou chu yu zui jia zhuang tai 
gang cong nan min ying shi gong dian chu lai 
yu zheng wei bian dai zhe ji ming jing jie ren yuan lai dao liu guang zhan 
song qu le yi xie wei he guan bing men zi ji zhong de shu cai he qin shou zuo de shi wu 
zhe shi rang ta men ji dong le yi ba 
jin tian shi yuan dan 
guo lai kan kan wo men zai nan su dan de qin ren 
xian zai ju shi zhe me jin zhang 
ni men dui wo men de guan xin reng ran ru ci xi zhi ru wei 
zhen shi tai xie xie ni men le 
qian ji tian gang bei wei he guan bing xun zhao dao de zhong guo gong ren nie ji hua yan jing you xie shi run 
you zhong guo wei he jun dui zai zhe li 
wo men gan jue hen an xin 
wa wu shi zhong guo hua yi yi yuan yuan zhang liu guang zhan shuo 
zhong guo wei he bu dui di yi shi jian jiu yu ta men qu de le lian xi 
wei he bu dui guan bing bu jin jing chang he wo men tong dian hua 
liao jie qing kuang 
ta men hai zhuan men an pai ren yuan lai yi yuan jiang jie nan min yong ru yi yuan 
zao shou wu zhuang xi ji deng tu fa qing kuang de ying dui fang fa 
bing zu zhi wo men jin xing le yan lian 
wo men hen ta shi 
wei he bu dui suo zai wa wu 
yu zi gang gao su ji zhe 
wo men ye zhu yuan zu guo tong bao men zai xin de yi nian li ping ping an an 
shun shun li li 
nan su dan de han ji zhong wu re de man heng 
lian nan su tuan wa wu ji de de zhong guo wei he guan bing gang chi guo wu fan 
jiu cong cong lai dao ji de dong bei bu de kong kuang qu yu 
ji xu ping zheng chang di 
gou zhu tie si wang 
da jian zhang peng 
kai she jian yi ce suo 
wei sui shi ying jie tao bi zhan huo de nan min kai pi ying de 
yu zi gang zheng wei jie shao shuo 
you yu zhan huo bu duan kuo da 
jiang ke neng you shu wan ming nan min cong zhou bian ge zhou ju ji wa wu shi 
gen ju lian nan su tuan zhi ling 
zhong guo wei he bu dui xu zai ji de xiu jian yi ge ke rong na wan ren yi shang de nan min ying 
ji zhe zai xian chang kan dao 
wei he guan bing ding zhe gao wen ku shu 
jian chi gao biao zhun 
chao jin du shi gong 
ling ren gan dong 
xian zai shi yi tian zhong wen du zui gao de shi hou 
ke da jia dou xiang jin kuai wan cheng ren wu 
yi dan nan min dao lai 
ke li ji an zhi 
fu ze shi gong de jun shi zu zhang ma xin dui ji zhe shuo 
xin nian de tai yang yi jing sheng qi 
zai zhe ge nian qing de guo du li 
zhan huo xiao yan yi ran mi man 
wo men yi xi kan dao nei xie wei he ping nu li de ren men 
hai zai wang wo de gong zuo 
xin qin de fu chu 
jiu rang wo men ba shou fang zai xin kou wei ta men qi fu 
yin wei you le ta men 
wo men de sheng huo cai neng zhen zheng ping an xing fu 
xin nian qian xi 
guo jia zhu xi xi jin ping tong guo zhong guo guo ji guang bo dian tai 
zhong yang ren min guang bo dian tai 
zhong yang dian shi tai 
zhe shi xi jin ping zhu xi fa biao de di yi fen xin nian he ci 
zai zhe fen liao liao shu bai zi de he ci zhong 
wo men du dao de bu zhi shi lai zi guo jia ling dao ren de xin nian wen hou yu zhu fu 
geng du dao yi ge zai shi jie wu tai shang bu lv jian yi 
bao rong zi xin de zhong guo 
yi ge zai gai ge da dao shang shi zhi bu yi 
yang fan qi hang de zhong guo 
yi ge zai fu xing zhi lu shang nu li rang she hui geng jia gong ping zheng yi 
rang ren min sheng huo geng jia mei hao de zhong guo 
ying gai shou wang xiang zhu 
tong zhou gong ji 
gong tong fa zhan 
zhe shi zhong guo zheng fu dui shi jie he ping fa zhan 
bao rong gong jin de qi dai 
tong chu yi ge di qiu cun 
zhong guo zhe ge 
guo ji gong min 
shi guo ji ze ren de jian xing zhe 
ye shi ge guo ren min zhui meng de zhi chi zhe 
jin nian shi zhi jia wu zhan zheng bao fa liang jia zi 
ceng bao shou bai nian qu ru de zhong guo ren min 
shen zhi he ping sheng huo de bao gui 
bu wei fu xing zhi lu de jian xin 
yi shi wei jian 
mian xiang wei lai 
zhong guo ren min zhui xun shi xian zhong hua min zu wei da fu xing de zhong guo meng 
ye zhu yuan ge guo ren min neng gou shi xian zi ji de meng xiang 
wo men jiang zai gai ge de dao lu shang mai chu xin de bu fa 
zhe shi zhong guo zheng fu dui xin yi nian quan mian shen hua gai ge de you li biao tai 
hen bu ping fan de yi nian 
wo men zhan sheng le ge zhong kun nan he tiao zhan 
ye qie shi gan shou dao le shen bian de ge zhong xi wei bian hua 
zhe yi nian zhu ding shi zai ru zhong guo gai ge shi ce de biao zhi xing yi nian 
quan mian gai ge hao jiao chui xiang 
wei lai fa zhan lan tu hui jiu 
you yi ge mei li de 
chun tian gu shi 
zheng zai zhong guo da di pu xie 
yi fen bu zhi 
jiu fen luo shi 
wu lun duo me mei hao de gai ge lu jing 
zhi you fu zhu shi jian cai neng de dao jian yan 
ping gu he shou huo 
guo qu yi nian 
zhong guo she hui fa zhan zhong nei xie shen ru ren xin de xin qi xiang 
rang wo men you li you xiang xin 
zhong guo de gai ge zhe men hui you geng da zuo wei 
gong zhong dui gai ge de can yu jiang geng jia ji ji 
rang lao bai xing guo shang geng jia xing fu de sheng huo 
hai you da liang gong zuo yao zuo 
zhe shi zhong guo zheng fu dui ren min de zhuang yan cheng nuo 
you ji de xin yi jie zhong yang zheng zhi ju chang wei tong zhong wai ji zhe jian mian shi 
ren min dui mei hao sheng huo de xiang wang 
jiu shi wo men de fen dou mu biao 
xi jin ping de shen qing chan shu ji qi le yi wan guo ren de qiang lie gong ming 
xiang wang mei hao sheng huo de gong zhong 
dui xian dai zheng fu jian she de qi dai yue lai yue gao 
she hui zhuan xing qi de zhen tong 
dui tou ming zheng fu 
ze ren zheng fu 
lian jie zheng fu de yao qiu ye yue lai yue gao 
rang gong ping zheng yi bi tai yang geng you guang hui 
rang mei hao sheng huo bu zai nan yi qi ji 
cheng ran yao cheng dan da liang de gong zuo 
fu chu jia bei de nu li 
ye zhi you zhe yang 
cai neng xiang li shi 
xiang ren min jiao chu yi fen he ge de da juan 
dui ren min de ze ren 
sheng huo zong shi chong man xi wang de 
cheng gong zong shi shu yu ji ji jin qu 
bu xie zhui qiu de ren men 
bu ju jian xian 
lu li qian xing 
zai zhui meng lu shang 
wo men bi jiang ying lai yi ge 
xin nian qian xi 
guo jia zhu xi xi jin ping tong guo zhong guo guo ji guang bo dian tai 
zhong yang ren min guang bo dian tai 
zhong yang dian shi tai 
quan wen ru xia 
yi yuan fu shi 
wan xiang geng xin 
wo xiang quan guo ge zu ren min 
xiang xiang gang te bie xing zheng qu tong bao he ao men te bie xing zheng qu tong bao 
xiang tai wan tong bao he hai wai qiao bao 
xiang shi jie ge guo he ge di qu de peng you men 
zhi yi xin nian de zhu fu 
zhu fu lao ren men jian kang 
zhu fu hai zi men kuai le 
zhu fu mei ge jia ting xing fu an kang 
zai zhe ci jiu ying xin zhi ji 
wu shu gong ren 
zhi shi fen zi 
gan bu reng ran jian shou zai gong zuo gang wei 
bu shao tong bao yi ran ben bo zai shi jie ge de wei zu guo xin qin gong zuo 
xu duo ren min jie fang jun he wu jing guan bing 
gong an gan jing zheng zai lv xing guang rong shi ming 
ta men you de yuan li zu guo 
yuan li qin ren 
you de bu neng tong jia ren tuan ju 
wo dai biao zu guo he ren min 
xiang ta men zhi yi cheng zhi de wen hou 
zhu ta men ping an shun li 
dui wo men guo jia he ren min lai shuo shi hen bu ping fan de yi nian 
wo men gong tong zhan sheng le ge zhong kun nan he tiao zhan 
qu de le xin de xian zhu cheng jiu 
cheng ji lai zhi bu yi 
ning ju le da jia de xin xue he han shui 
wo xiang da jia biao shi zhong xin de gan xie 
wo men dui quan mian shen hua gai ge zuo chu zong ti bu shu 
gong tong miao hui le wei lai fa zhan de hong wei lan tu 
wo men jiang zai gai ge de dao lu shang mai chu xin de bu fa 
wo men tui jin gai ge de gen ben mu di 
shi yao rang guo jia bian de geng jia fu qiang 
rang she hui bian de geng jia gong ping zheng yi 
gai ge shi xu yao wo men gong tong wei zhi fen dou de wei da shi ye 
xu yao fu chu jian xin de nu li 
yi fen geng yun 
yi fen shou huo 
zai gai ge kai fang de wei da shi jian zhong 
wo men yi jing chuang zao liao wu shu hui huang 
zhong guo ren min bi jiang chuang zao chu xin de hui huang 
yu zhou hao han 
xing han can lan 
ying gai shou wang xiang zhu 
tong zhou gong ji 
gong tong fa zhan 
zhong guo ren min zhui xun shi xian zhong hua min zu wei da fu xing de zhong guo meng 
ye zhu yuan ge guo ren min neng gou shi xian zi ji de meng xiang 
wo zhen cheng xi wang 
shi jie ge guo ren min zai shi xian ge zi meng xiang de guo cheng zhong xiang hu li jie 
xiang hu bang zhu 
nu li ba wo men lai yi sheng cun de di qiu jian she cheng wei gong tong de mei hao jia yuan 
sheng huo zong shi chong man xi wang de 
cheng gong zong shi shu yu ji ji jin qu 
bu xie zhui qiu de ren men 
wo men zai qian jin de dao lu shang 
hai hui yu dao ge zhong feng xian he tiao zhan 
rang lao bai xing guo shang geng jia xing fu de sheng huo 
hai you da liang gong zuo yao zuo 
wo men yao qian xu jin shen 
jian ku fen dou 
gong tong pu xie wei da zu guo fa zhan de shi dai xin pian zhang 
xie xie da jia 
fa yuan cai pan wen shu quan mian shang wang jie shou gong zhong jian du 
ge ren hai wai zi chan xu shen bao 
cheng zhen pai shui yu wu shui chu li tiao li 
tie lu an quan guan li tiao li 
zui gao ren min fa yuan guan yu ren min fa yuan zai hu lian wang gong bu cai pan wen shu de gui ding 
xin xiu ding de 
guo ji shou zhi tong ji shen bao ban fa 
deng yi pi fa lv fa gui zheng shi shi shi 
you guo wu yuan zhi ding de 
tie lu an quan guan li tiao li 
jiang zi jin ri qi shi xing 
zai dong che zu lie che shang xi yan huo zhe zai qi ta lie che de jin yan qu yu xi yan 
jin zhi zai tie lu xian lu an quan bao hu qu nei shao huang 
fang yang sheng chu 
zhong zhi ying xiang tie lu xian lu an quan he xing che liao wang de shu mu deng zhi wu 
zai tie lu xian lu liang ce jian zao 
she li sheng chan 
chu cun huo zhe xiao shou yi ran 
yi bao huo zhe fang she xing wu pin deng wei xian wu pin de chang suo 
ying dang fu he guo jia biao zhun 
hang ye biao zhun gui ding de an quan fang hu ju li 
tie lu yun shu qi ye ying dang an zhao guo wu yuan tie lu hang ye jian du guan li bu men de gui ding shi shi huo che piao shi ming gou mai 
cha yan zhi du 
shi shi huo che piao shi ming gou mai 
cha yan zhi du de 
lv ke ying dang ping you xiao shen fen zheng jian gou piao cheng che 
dui che piao suo ji zai shen fen xin xi yu suo chi shen fen zheng jian huo zhe zhen shi shen fen bu fu de chi piao ren 
tie lu yun shu qi ye you quan ju jue qi jin zhan cheng che 
qiang diao jin zhi shi shi xia lie wei hai tie lu an quan de xing wei 
cong lie che shang pao reng za wu 
zai dong che zu lie che shang xi yan huo zhe zai qi ta lie che de jin yan qu yu xi yan 
zhan yong jin chu zhan tong dao huo zhe hou che qu 
wei fan gui ding de 
tie lu ji che che liang she ji zhi zao wei xiu jin kou xu ke ban fa 
tie lu yun shu ji chu she bei sheng chan qi ye shen pi ban fa 
tie lu ji che che liang jia shi ren yuan zi ge xu ke ban fa 
si jian pei tao gui zhang 
jiang yu jin ri qi yu 
tie lu an quan guan li tiao li 
tong bu shi xing 
tie lu xing zheng xu ke he xing zheng chu fa gong zuo jiang geng jia gui fan hua 
you guo wu yuan zhi ding de 
cheng zhen pai shui yu wu shui chu li tiao li 
jin ri qi shi xing 
cong shi gong ye 
yi liao deng huo dong de qi ye shi ye dan wei he ge ti gong shang hu yao pai fang wu shui 
bi xu qu de xu ke zheng 
bing dui wu shui jin xing yu chu li 
dui yu wei qu de xu ke zheng de pai wu zhe 
dui bao yu lai xi shi zai cheng shi 
deng kun rao zhong guo duo de de gu ji 
zhe yi xin gui ye kai chu le 
yi fa sheng nei lao de cheng zhen yao gen ju cheng zhen ren kou yu gui mo 
bao yu nei lao feng xian deng yin su 
zhi ding nei lao fang zhi zhuan xiang gui hua 
yu ci tong shi 
hai ying bian zhi ying ji yu an 
jian li nei lao fang zhi yu jing 
lian dong ji zhi 
jia qiang yi lao dian zhi li 
dui xun jing shang ren wen ti 
ye ming que gui ding 
cheng zhen pai shui yu wu shui chu li she shi wei hu yun ying dan wei ying dang jia qiang ri chang xun cha 
wei xiu he yang hu 
jia qiang jing gai 
jian cha jing deng she shi de wei hu yu bao hu 
dui zai sheng shui de shi yong ye zuo chu le ming que gui ding 
ming que zhi chu 
guo jia gu li wu shui chu li zai sheng li yong 
gong ye sheng chan 
cheng shi lv hua 
dao lu qing sao 
che liang chong xi 
jian zhu shi gong yi ji sheng tai jing guan deng 
ying dang you xian shi yong zai sheng shui 
di fang zheng fu hai yao tong chou an pai zai sheng shui li yong deng she shi de jian she gai zao 
chu qin gui mo yang zhi wu ran fang zhi tiao li 
ye jiang zi jin ri qi shi xing 
jin zhi zai yin yong shui shui yuan bao hu qu 
feng jing ming sheng qu 
zi ran bao hu qu de he xin qu he huan chong qu 
cheng zhen ju min qu 
wen hua jiao yu ke xue yan jiu qu deng ren kou ji zhong qu yu ji fa lv 
fa gui gui ding de qi ta jin zhi yang zhi qu yu nei jian she chu qin yang zhi chang 
yang zhi xiao qu 
zai yin yong shui shui yuan bao hu qu jian she chu qin yang zhi chang 
yang zhi xiao qu de 
ran yi chu qin yi ji ran yi chu qin pai xie wu 
ran yi chu qin chan pin 
bing si huo zhe si yin bu ming de chu qin shi ti deng bing hai chu qin yang zhi fei qi wu 
ying dang jin xing shen mai 
fen shao deng wu hai hua chu li 
bu de sui yi chu zhi 
wei an zhao gui ding dui ran yi chu qin he bing hai chu qin yang zhi fei qi wu jin xing wu hai hua chu li de 
you dong wu wei sheng jian du ji gou ze ling wu hai hua chu li 
suo xu chu li fei yong you wei fa xing wei ren cheng dan 
fa yuan cai pan wen shu quan mian shang wang jie shou gong zhong jian du 
zai si fa ling yu 
zui gao ren min fa yuan guan yu ren min fa yuan zai hu lian wang gong bu cai pan wen shu de gui ding jiang yu jin ri qi shi shi 
fa yuan de sheng xiao cai pan wen shu ying dang zai hu lian wang gong bu 
dan you xia lie qing xing zhi yi de chu wai 
she ji guo jia mi mi 
ge ren yin si de 
she ji wei cheng nian ren wei fa fan zui de 
yi tiao jie fang shi jie an de 
qi ta bu yi zai hu lian wang gong bu de 
fa yuan zai hu lian wang gong bu cai pan wen shu shi 
ying dang bao liu dang shi ren de xing ming huo zhe ming cheng deng zhen shi xin xi 
ming que le jin xing ni ming chu li de san zhong qing kuang 
yi shi hun yin jia ting 
ji cheng jiu fen an jian zhong de dang shi ren ji qi fa ding dai li ren 
er shi xing shi an jian zhong bei hai ren ji qi fa ding dai li ren 
san shi bei pan chu san nian you qi tu xing yi xia xing fa yi ji mian yu xing shi chu fa 
qie bu shu yu lei fan huo zhe guan fan de bei gao ren 
dui zi ran ren de jia ting zhu zhi 
tong xun fang shi 
shen fen zheng hao ma 
yin hang zhang hao 
jian kang zhuang kuang deng ge ren xin xi 
wei cheng nian ren de xiang guan xin xi 
fa ren yi ji qi ta zu zhi de yin hang zhang hao 
shang ye mi mi yi ji qi ta bu yi gong kai de nei rong 
jin xing shan chu chu li 
chong fen bao hu xiang guan ge ren de he fa quan yi 
guo jia li yi he she hui gong gong li yi 
ge ren hai wai zi chan 
fu zhai zhuang kuang xu shen bao 
guo ji shou zhi tong ji shen bao ban fa 
jin xing xiu gai 
xiu gai hou de 
jin ri qi zheng shi shi shi 
xiu gai hou de 
guo ji shou zhi tong ji shen bao fan wei wei zhong guo ju min yu fei zhong guo ju min zhi jian fa sheng de yi qie jing ji jiao yi yi ji zhong guo ju min dui wai jin rong zi chan 
fu zhai zhuang kuang 
jiang zai zhong guo jing nei fa sheng jing ji jiao yi de fei zhong guo ju min ye na ru shen bao zhu ti fan wei 
ming que zhong guo ju min he zai zhong guo jing nei fa sheng jing ji jiao yi de fei zhong guo ju min jun you yi wu shen bao guo ji shou zhi xin xi 
guo jia wai hui guan li ju you guan fu ze ren hai biao shi 
wai hui ju jiang gen ju shi ji qing kuang 
ze ji zhi ding bing chu tai guan yu fei zhong guo ju min shen bao de ju ti yao qiu 
yong you dui wai jin rong zi chan 
fu zhai de zhong guo ju min ge ren 
ying dang an zhao guo jia wai hui guan li ju de gui ding shen bao qi dui wai jin rong zi chan 
fu zhai de you guan qing kuang 
xiang guan ji gou he ge ren ru wei an zhao gui ding jin xing guo ji shou zhi tong ji shen bao de 
you guo jia wai hui guan li ju huo qi fen zhi ju yi zhao 
zhong hua ren min gong he guo wai hui guan li tiao li 
di si shi ba tiao ji yu chu fa 
chu fa bao kuo 
you wai hui guan li ji guan ze ling gai zheng 
da xing you le she shi ling jian 
qu nian fa sheng de xi an qin ling huan le shi jie you le she shi shuai luo you ke shi jian 
bei jing xiang shan you ke cheng lan che zhui wang shi jian yin fa she hui guan zhu 
wei jia qiang da xing you le she shi an quan jian cha 
fang zhi he jian shao shi gu 
zhi jian zong ju ri qian chu tai le 
da xing you le she shi an quan jian cha gui ding 
jiang zi jin ri qi shi xing 
yun ying shi yong dan wei ying dang jia qiang ying jiu she bei 
ji jiu wu pin de cun fang he guan li 
dui jiu yuan ren yuan ding qi jin xing zhuan ye pei xun 
yun ying shi yong dan wei ying dang she zhi zhuan men de an quan guan li ji gou bing pei bei an quan guan li ren yuan 
huo zhe pei bei zhuan zhi de an quan guan li ren yuan 
bing bao zheng she bei yun ying qi jian 
da xing you le she shi fa sheng gu zhang 
yun ying shi yong dan wei ying dang li ji ting zhi shi yong 
bing an zhao you guan gui ding ji shi xiang xian ji yi shang di fang zhi liang ji shu jian du bu men bao gao 
dui yin she ji 
an zhuang yuan yin yin fa gu zhang 
cun zai zhi liang an quan wen ti yin huan de 
an zhuang dan wei ying dang dui tong lei xing she bei jin xing pai cha 
xiao chu yin huan 
da xing you le she shi yun ying shi yong dan wei she bei yun ying qi jian 
wu an quan guan li ren yuan zai gang de huo zhe wei ji shi geng huan chao guo she ji shi yong qi xian yao qiu de zhu yao shou li bu jian de 
yu yi jing gao 
an bei jin san can bai jing guo shen she 
shi shi qiang shua heng 
shi gong ran tiao xin 
guo ji she hui bi xu yu yi qiang ying hui ji 
an bei jin san kan lai yi shi tie le xin yao jiang ri ben de 
di guo jiu meng 
qiang jia yu ya zhou ren min 
can bai jing guo shen she shi qi shi xian suo wei jun shi qiang guo 
cheng ba ya zhou de bi ran yi bu 
an bei de kuang wang yu gu zhu yi zhi 
shi ri ben jun guo zhu yi li shi wan gu xing de biao xian 
ye yi cheng wei ya zhou he ping mian lin de xian shi wei xian 
jing guo shen she gong feng you er zhan jia ji zhan fan 
ri ben ling dao ren bu gu guo nei wai jiang lie fan dui 
yi yi gu xing can bai jing guo shen she de xing jing 
shi dui ya zhou ren min gan qing de yan zhong shang hai 
ye jiang shen ke ying xiang ya zhou nai zhi shi jie ren min dui dai ri ben de zheng zhi li chang 
guo ji yu lun pu bian ren wei 
ya zhou xu yao de shi guo yu guo zhi jian de xin ren 
er an bei yi zai po huai xin ren fen wei 
can bai jing guo shen she zhi ju geng shi gong ran tiao xin 
qia ru na cui da tu sha de xing cun zhe wei sai er suo shuo 
wo mei you huo zai guo qu zhong 
dan wang shi huo zai wo xin li 
an bei jin tian de ju dong bu neng bu rang ren men hui xiang qi er zhan qian de ri ben 
ri ben bao fa li shi shang kong qian shen ke de jing ji wei ji 
fa xi si yun dong cheng shi er qi 
guo jia gai zao 
yi bai tuo wei ji wei jie kou 
shi tu jian li tian huang zhi fa xi si zhu yi guo jia 
wang xiang gou zhu suo wei 
da dong ya gong rong quan 
yi tong ba ya zhou 
an bei gong kai fou ding dong jing shen pan 
bing bu shi ri ben ren zi ji zuo chu de 
ying gai shuo shi lian he guo de zhan sheng zhe yi fang zuo chu de cai jue 
an bei yang yan 
dui ben guo li shi bao you zi hao gan 
sheng cheng guan yu ri ben zhi min qin lve de ding yi shang wu ding lun 
an bei jiao xiao dui kang zhong guo shi ri ben wei shi jie 
ri ben jiang dai ling ya zhou guo jia zu zhi 
zhong guo wei xie 
zai ya tai an quan ling yu dan ren ling xiu 
li shi he qi xiang shi 
an bei de yong xin he qi yin xian 
yi ge wu fa he fa dong qin lve zhan zheng li shi jue lie de guo jia 
bi ran dui shi jie he ping wen ding gou cheng ji da wei xie 
zhui xun di guo meng de ri ben hui gei ya zhou dai lai shen me 
zhe shi er zhan qian yi xie ya zhou you shi zhi shi fan fu ti chu de wen ti 
ji shi nian hou de jin tian 
zhe ge wen ti reng ju you xian shi yi yi 
an bei can bai zhi ju zao dao guo ji she hui yi zhi peng ji 
shi yin wei ren men qing chu kan dao 
an bei zheng shi tu jiang ri ben tuo ru 
di guo jiu meng 
yin ling ri ben zou xiang chong man zui e he wei xian de kuo zhang zhi lu 
an bei can bai jing guo shen she 
shi shi qiang shua heng 
shi gong ran tiao xin 
shi jiang ta de 
di guo jiu meng 
gong zhi yu shi 
guo ji she hui bi xu yu yi qiang ying hui ji 
yan fang ri ben jun guo zhu yi si hui fu ran 
zhe shi dui ya zhou he shi jie he ping fu ze 
ye shi dui ri ben ren min fu ze 
gai ge chuang xin gong tong chuang zao geng jia mei hao de wei lai 
xi zang zi zhi qu dang wei shu ji chen quan guo zi zhi qu zhu xi luo sang jiang cun 
xin nian yi shi 
wan xiang geng xin 
zhi ci ci jiu ying xin zhi ji 
wo men jin dai biao zi zhi qu dang wei 
zheng fu xiang quan qu ge zu ren min zhi yi xin nian de zhu he 
xiang zhu zang ren min jie fang jun zhi zhan yuan 
wu jing guan bing 
zheng fa gan jing 
zhi yi chong gao de jing yi 
xiang wei xi zang de gai ge kai fang he xian dai hua jian she shi ye zuo chu gong xian de li tui xiu lao dang yuan 
xiang suo you guan xin 
zhi chi xi zang ge xiang shi ye fa zhan de ge zu ge jie ren shi 
zhi yi cheng zhi de zhu fu 
xiang quan guo ge zu ren min te bie shi zhong yang guo jia bu wei 
dui kou yuan cang sheng shi he guo you zhong yao gu gan qi ye 
biao shi zhong xin de gan xie 
xiang zai jie ri qi jian jian shou gang wei 
fen zhan zai gong zuo yi xian de tong zhi men 
biao shi qin qie de wei wen 
shi wo men dang he guo jia fa zhan shi shang ju you zhong yao yi yi de yi nian 
yi xi jin ping tong zhi wei zong shu ji de dang zhong yang tuan jie dai ling quan guo ge zu ren min 
jian chi wen zhong qiu jin de gong zuo zong ji diao 
zhuo li wen zeng zhang 
chen zhuo ying dui ge zhong feng xian tiao zhan 
quan mian tui jin she hui zhu yi jing ji jian she 
zheng zhi jian she 
wen hua jian she 
she hui jian she 
sheng tai wen ming jian she 
quan mian tui jin dang de jian she xin de wei da gong cheng 
zha shi tui jin dang de qun zhong lu xian jiao yu shi jian huo dong 
ge xiang gong zuo qu de xin jin zhan 
tui dong fa zhan cheng guo geng duo geng gong ping hui ji quan ti ren min 
shi xian le guan che luo shi dang de shi ba da jing shen di yi nian de liang hao kai ju 
dang de shi ba jie san zhong quan hui sheng li zhao kai 
yi xi jin ping tong zhi wei zong shu ji de dang zhong yang zhuo yan 
liang ge yi bai nian 
fen dou mu biao he shi xian zhong hua min zu wei da fu xing zhong guo meng de zhan lve quan ju 
zuo chu le quan mian shen hua gai ge de zhong da zhan lve bu shu 
wei quan mian shen hua gai ge miao hui le lan tu 
zhi ming liao fang xiang 
chui xiang le xin de li shi qi dian shang shen hua gai ge de hao jiao 
bi jiang dui tui jin zhong guo te se she hui zhu yi wei da shi ye chan sheng zhong da er shen yuan de ying xiang 
zai dang zhong yang 
guo wu yuan de qin qie guan huai xia 
zai quan guo ge zu ren min wu si zhi yuan xia 
zi zhi qu dang wei 
zheng fu tuan jie dai ling quan qu ge zu ren min 
shen ru guan che luo shi dang de shi ba da he shi ba jie er zhong 
san zhong quan hui jing shen 
guan che luo shi xi jin ping zong shu ji xi lie zhong yao jiang hua jing shen

de zhi shi yao qiu

xi zang te dian de fa zhan lu zi 
quan qu cheng xian chu jing ji you hao you kuai fa zhan 
min sheng xian zhu gai shan 
sheng tai huan jing liang hao 
min zu tuan jie jin bu 
zong jiao he mu he shun 
she hui he xie wen ding 
dang de jian she bu duan jia qiang de da hao ju mian 
shi shen ru guan che luo shi dang de shi ba jie san zhong quan hui jing shen

gui hua mu biao ren wu de guan jian zhi nian

an zhao qu dang wei ba jie wu ci quan wei hui de bu shu 
yi geng da de jue xin 
geng da de zhi hui 
geng da de yong qi 
quan mian tui jin wo qu ge xiang gai ge 
nu li pu xie kua yue shi fa zhan he chang zhi jiu an de xin pian zhang 
xi zang te dian de fa zhan lu zi 
jian chi wen zhong qiu jin gong zuo zong ji diao 
ba gai ge chuang xin guan chuan yu jing ji she hui fa zhan ge ge ling yu 
ge ge huan jie 
cu jin jing ji chi xu jian kang fa zhan 
nu li rang ge zu qun zhong guo shang geng jia xing fu mei hao de sheng huo 
quan li yi fu ba ge xiang wei wen gong zuo zuo shen zuo xi zuo shi 
jin yi bu wan shan wei hu wen ding de zhang xiao ji zhi 
nu li shi xian quan qu she hui da ju chi xu wen ding 
chang qi wen ding 
quan mian wen ding 
jian chi ba sheng tai huan jing bao hu zuo wei di xian 
jian li jian quan sheng tai wen ming zhi du 
qie shi bao hu hao xue yu gao yuan de yi cao yi mu 
shan shan shui shui 
shi jie shang zui hou yi fang jing tu 
wei xi zang de kua yue shi fa zhan he chang zhi jiu an zuo chu xin de geng da de gong xian 
rang wo men gong tong wei jian she yi ge geng jia fu yu 
mei li de she hui zhu yi xin xi zang er nu li fen dou 
zhu wei da zu guo fan rong chang sheng 
zhu quan qu ge zu ren min zai xin de yi nian li xing fu an kang 
zha xi de lei 
zi zhi qu dang wei 
zheng fu yi dian shi dian hua hui yi xing shi zhao kai quan qu jing ji gong zuo hui yi 
zi zhi qu dang wei shu ji chen quan guo jiang hua 
ji zhe yao hai quan she 
zi zhi qu dang wei 
zheng fu yi dian shi dian hua hui yi xing shi zhao kai quan qu jing ji gong zuo hui yi 
yi dang de shi ba da he shi ba jie er zhong 
san zhong quan hui jing shen wei zhi dao 
guan che luo shi xi jin ping zong shu ji xi lie zhong yao jiang hua jing shen 
guan che luo shi zhong yang jing ji gong zuo hui yi te bie shi xi jin ping zong shu ji 
li ke qiang zong li de zhong yao jiang hua jing shen 
guan che qu dang wei ba jie wu ci quan wei hui jing shen 
zi zhi qu dang wei shu ji chen quan guo chu xi hui yi bing jiang hua 
bu shu guan che zhong yang jing ji gong zuo hui yi jing shen 
quan guo zheng xie fu zhu xi 
zi zhi qu dang wei fu shu ji 
zi zhi qu ling dao wu ying jie 
gong bao zha xi 
luo bu dun zhu 
wang rui lian chu xi hui yi 
hui yi zhi chu 
zai yi xi jin ping tong zhi wei zong shu ji de dang zhong yang jian qiang ling dao xia 
zi zhi qu dang wei 
zheng fu tuan jie dai ling quan qu ge zu ren min 
gao ju zhong guo te se she hui zhu yi wei da qi zhi 
yi deng xiao ping li lun 
san ge dai biao 
zhong yao si xiang 
ke xue fa zhan guan wei zhi dao 
ren zhen guan che luo shi dang de shi ba da he shi ba jie er zhong

guan che luo shi xi jin ping zong shu ji

chang qi jian cang

jian chi zou you zhong guo te se 
xi zang te dian de fa zhan lu zi 
jian chi wen zhong qiu jin 
jing ji fa zhan su du kuai 
jing ji zeng zhang zhi liang gao 
jing ji jie gou bu duan you hua 
ji chu jian she li du jiao da 
gai ge kai fang dong li qiang 
she hui shi ye you xin jin bu 
qun zhong de dao geng duo shi hui 
sheng tai huan jing bao chi liang hao 
she hui chi xu he xie wen ding 
shi xian le you zhi liang you xiao yi 
you hao you kuai fa zhan 
hui yi zhi chu 
zhong yang jing ji gong zuo hui yi 
shi zai dang de shi ba jie san zhong quan hui zhi hou zhong yang zhao kai de di yi ge quan guo xing hui yi 
xi jin ping zong shu ji 
li ke qiang zong li fa biao le zhong yao jiang hua 
zhuo yan quan ju 
zhan wei gao yuan 
lun shu jing pi 
bu shu ke xue 
ju you hen qiang de si xiang xing 
zhen dui xing he zhi dao xing 
dui yu wo men jian ding xin xin 
ning ju li liang 
quan mian shen hua gai ge 
tui dong quan qu jing ji she hui you hao you kuai fa zhan 
ju you shi fen zhong yao de yi yi 
wo men yi ding yao ren zhen xue xi 
shen ke ling hui 
zhun que ba wo 
qie shi ba si xiang he xing dong tong yi dao zhong yang dui dang qian jing ji xing shi de zheng que pan duan shang lai 
tong yi dao zhong yang dui ming nian jing ji gong zuo de zong ti yao qiu shang lai 
tong yi dao zhong yang dui ming nian jing ji gong zuo de yu qi mu biao shang lai 
tong yi dao zhong yang dui ming nian jing ji gong zuo de an pai bu shu shang lai 
hui yi qiang diao 
quan mian shen hua gai ge de kai ju zhi nian 
gui hua mu biao ren wu de guan jian zhi nian 
zuo hao wo qu ming nian jing ji gong zuo de zong ti yao qiu shi 
quan mian guan che luo shi dang de shi ba da he shi ba jie er zhong 
san zhong quan hui jing shen 
guan che luo shi zhong yang jing ji gong zuo hui yi jing shen 
jian chi yi deng xiao ping li lun 
san ge dai biao 
zhong yao si xiang 
ke xue fa zhan guan wei zhi dao 
guan che luo shi xi jin ping zong shu ji xi lie zhong yao jiang hua jing shen 
guan yu xi zang gong zuo de zhong yao zhi shi jing shen 
zhi guo bi zhi bian 
zhi bian xian wen cang 
zhong yao zhan lve si xiang 
guan che luo shi yu zheng sheng zhu xi 
yi fa zhi cang 
chang qi jian cang 
de zhi shi yao qiu 
ren zhen zhi xing zhong yang de hong guan jing ji zheng ce 
jian chi wen zhong qiu jin gong zuo zong ji diao 
ba gai ge chuang xin guan chuan yu jing ji she hui fa zhan ge ge ling yu ge ge huan jie 
tong chou wen zeng zhang 
zhuo li ji fa shi chang huo li 
jia qiang ji ben gong gong fu wu 
qie shi bao zhang he gai shan min sheng 
cu jin jing ji chi xu jian kang fa zhan 
bao chi she hui da ju chi xu he xie wen ding 
que bao sheng tai huan jing chi xu liang hao 
hui yi qiang diao 
shi xian ming nian de jing ji fa zhan mu biao 
zhong dian yao zhua hao ba ge fang mian de gong zuo 
yi yao jian chi niu zhu 
yi ge zong kai guan 
zhuo li shen hua gai ge kai fang 
zai shen hua gai ge fang mian 
yao chi tou jing shen 
tong chou kao lv 
you xu tui jin 
zhong dian shen hua nong mu qu gai ge 
guo you qi ye gai ge 
xing zheng ti zhi gai ge 
tou zi ti zhi gai ge 
cai shui ti zhi gai ge 
yi yao wei sheng ti zhi gai ge 
jiao yu ling yu gai ge 
ren shi zhi du gai ge 
fu pin kai fa ti zhi gai ge 
wen hua ti zhi gai ge deng shi ge fang mian de gai ge 
zai kuo da kai fang fang mian 
yao shen hua qu yu he zuo 
wan shan yuan cang ji zhi 
ti sheng quan fang wei kai fang shui ping 
shi xian you shi hu bu 
hu li gong ying 
er yao jian chi zhua hao 
yi ge guan jian 
ji ji tui jin xiang mu jian she 
yao zhua zhu zhong da ji yu 
zhu dong dui jie 
ji ji zheng qu 
hua ji yu wei you shi 
yao zhua hao qian qi gong zuo 
zheng qu shang wei shen pi de 
gui hua xiang mu he zhong qi ping gu tiao zheng zeng jia xiang mu ming nian de dao quan bu shen pi 
yao zhua shi xiang mu dui jie 
yan ge xiang mu gong zuo ze ren zhi 
jia qiang xiang mu di gou tong yu xian jie 
yao jia kuai xiang mu jian she 
li zheng zao kai gong 
da zao you zhi gong cheng 
jing pin gong cheng 
yang guang gong cheng 
san yao jian chi po chu 
yi ge ping jing 
qie shi jia qiang ji chu she shi 
jian chi ji chu she shi xian xing 
qiang hua jiao tong yun shu jian she 
zong he neng yuan jian she 
shui li she shi jian she 
xian dai tong xun jian she 
te se cheng zhen jian she 
wei chang yuan fa zhan da xia jian shi ji chu 
si yao jian chi tu chu 
yi ge te dian 
zuo you zuo qiang te se chan ye 
yi chan shang shui ping 
er chan zhua zhong dian 
san chan da fa zhan 
de jing ji fa zhan zhan lve 
wei rao tiao zheng you hua jie gou 
zhuan bian fa zhan fang shi 
she li yong hao zheng fu chan ye yin dao zi jin 
pei yu zhuang da te se you shi chan ye 
da li fa zhan zhong zhi yang zhi ye 
jia kuai fa zhan te se gong ye 
fan rong fa zhan di san chan ye 
ti sheng chan ye fa zhan shui ping 
wu yao jian chi ji fa 
yi ge huo li 
bu duan zhuang da min ying jing ji 
ji xu jian chi fang xin fang kai fang kuan fang dan fang shou 
jin yi bu fang kuan men kan 
shi xing tong yi de shi chang zhun ru zhi du 
jian hua deng ji shou xu 
shi xing ling cheng ben zhu ce 
yi tiao long fu wu 
jin yi bu qiang hua zhi chi 
jian chi quan li ping deng 
ji hui ping deng 
gui ze ping deng 
jin yi bu ti zhi zeng xiao 
xiao bu tong gui mo de min ying qi ye gong tong fa zhan 
liu yao jian chi shou zhu 
yi tiao hong xian 
gou jian sheng tai an quan ping zhang 
jian chi ba bao hu sheng tai huan jing zuo wei di xian 
ning ke jing ji fa zhan man yi dian 
ye jue bu yi xi sheng sheng tai huan jing wei dai jia 
yao yan ge jian she xiang mu zhun ru 
cong yan kong zhi kuang chan zi yuan kai fa 
luo shi sheng tai huan jing bao hu jian she gui hua 
qiang hua sheng tai huan jing bao hu du cha 
qie shi bao hu hao xue yu gao yuan de yi cao yi mu 
shan shan shui shui 
shi jie shang zui hou yi fang jing tu 
qi yao jian chi ti xian 
yi ge luo jiao dian 
da li bao zhang gai shan min sheng 
jian chi ba bao zhang gai shan min sheng zuo wei yi qie gong zuo de chu fa dian he luo jiao dian 
zai jin nian ban cheng 
shi jian shi shi 
de ji chu shang 
ming nian ji xu wei rao ge zu qun zhong po qie xu yao jie jue de wen ti 
ban hao li min hui min 
shi jian shi shi 
gai shan cheng xiang ju min sheng chan sheng huo tiao jian 
qian fang bai ji kuo da jiu ye 
duo qu dao zeng jia ju min shou ru 
nu li kong zhi wu jia 
da li fa zhan jiao yu 
qiang hua she hui bao zhang 
ti gao yi liao bao zhang shui ping 
tui jin wen hua hui min 
jia qiang fu pin kai fa 
zhua hao fang zai jian zai he an quan sheng chan 
ba yao jian chi qiang hua 
yi ge bao zhang 
wei hu she hui he xie wen ding 
shen ru guan che luo shi xi jin ping zong shu ji 
zhi guo bi zhi bian 
zhi bian xian wen cang 
zhong yao zhan lve si xiang 
guan che luo shi yu zheng sheng zhu xi 
yi fa zhi cang 
chang qi jian cang 
de zhi shi yao qiu 
lao gu shu li wen ding ya dao yi qie he chang qi zuo zhan de si xiang 
gao du jing ti 
jing zhong chang ming 
shi ke beng jin wen ding zhe gen xian 
jian jue ke fu song xie 
ma bi qing xu 
zhua zao zhua xiao zhua kuai zhua hao 
zheng fu ge xiang wei wen cuo shi 
quan li yi fu zuo hao wen ding gong zuo 
wei jing ji she hui you hao you kuai fa zhan ti gong jian qiang bao zhang 
hui yi zhi chu 
ming nian jing ji gong zuo de da zheng fang zhen 
mu biao ren wu yi jing ming que 
guan jian zai yu zhuan bian zuo feng 
zhua hao luo shi 
yao yi kai zhan dang de qun zhong lu xian jiao yu shi jian huo dong wei qi ji 
jin jin wei rao wei min wu shi qing lian 
jin yi bu zhuan zuo feng 
zha zha shi shi tui jin ge xiang gong zuo 
que bao quan mian wan cheng ji ding mu biao ren wu 
yi yao qiang hua ai min wei min yi shi 
yao shu lao fu wu qun zhong de guan nian 
yong hao fu wu qun zhong de zai ti 
jian quan fu wu qun zhong de ji zhi 
jian jue fan dui ren he xing shi de zheng ji gong cheng 
xing xiang gong cheng 
mian zi gong cheng 
tui dong gai jin gong zuo zuo feng 
mi qie lian xi qun zhong zhi du hua 
er yao da xing qiu zhen wu shi zhi feng 
yao zeng qiang wu qiu shi xiao de yi shi 
da li chang dao qiu zhen wu shi 
zhen zhua shi gan de liang hao feng qi 
da li hong yang 
lao xi zang jing shen 
yao wan shan zhen zhua shi gan de cuo shi 
zhi zheng zhao xi 
lei li feng xing 
qie er bu she 
yi zhua dao di 
yao yan ge zhi xing jian shou gang wei zhi du 
ji yao guan xin guan ai gan bu 
ren zhen luo shi hao gan bu lun xiu ge xiang gui ding 
you yao yan ge yao qiu 
jia qiang dui gan bu de ri chang guan li he zai gang lv zhi qing kuang de jian du jian cha 
que bao zhong yao shi duan 
zhong yao jie dian de gan bu zai gang lv 
san yao bao chi qing zheng lian jie xing xiang 
yao yan ge zhi xing zhong yang 
ba xiang gui ding 
dang zheng ji guan li xing jie yue fan dui lang fei tiao li 
luo shi zi zhi qu 
yue fa shi zhang 
jiu xiang yao qiu 
li xing qin jian jie yue 
yan ge lian jie zi lv 
yan su cha chu wei fa wei ji xing wei 
jian chi xi zang zai fan fu bai wen ti shang mei you ren he te shu xing 
jian chi you fu bi fan 
you tan bi su 
wei gui bi jiu 
hui yi zhi chu 
guan che luo shi hao zhe ci hui yi jing shen 
bi xu jin yi bu tong yi si xiang 
yao shen ru guan che luo shi dang de shi ba jie san zhong quan hui 
zhong yang jing ji gong zuo hui yi jing shen 
shen ru guan che luo shi xi jin ping zong shu ji xi lie zhong yao jiang hua jing shen 
zhi guo bi zhi bian 
zhi bian xian wen cang 
de zhong yao zhan lve si xiang 
shen ru guan che luo shi qu dang wei ba jie wu ci quan wei hui 
quan qu jing ji gong zuo hui yi jing shen 
guan jian shi yao zhen zheng chi tou hui yi ti chu de yi xi lie xin si xiang 
nei hua yu xin 
wai hua yu xing 
zhuan hua wei gan shi chuang ye de si xiang gong shi he zi jue xing dong 
bi xu jin yi bu qiang hua cuo shi 
yao min sheng xian dong 
chong fen ti xian bao zhang gai shan min sheng zhe yi 
rang fa zhan de cheng guo 
gai ge de hong li hui ji quan qu ge zu qun zhong 
shi chang tui dong 
niu zhu shen hua gai ge kai fang zhe yi 
zhuo li tui jin shi chang hua gai ge 
tui dong xi zang jing ji bei shang 
dong jin tuo zhan 
jin yi bu jia da zhao shang yin zi li du 
xiang mu dai dong 
po jie ji chu she shi zhe yi 
gui hua nei shang wei kai gong xiang mu quan bu luo de 
jin rong qiao dong 
fa hui zi jin gang gan zuo yong 
yong hao zhong yang fu yu wo qu de te shu you hui jin rong zheng ce 
fa zhan duo ceng ci zi ben shi chang 
jia kuai dan bao ti xi jian she 
chuang xin qu dong 
ti sheng chi xu fa zhan nei sheng dong li 
jin yi bu jie fang si xiang 
po chu guan xing si wei 
jia kuai nong mu ye jing ying fang shi zhuan bian 
bu duan fa zhan zhuang da te se you shi chan ye 
huan jing cu dong 
zhuo li gai shan jing ji fa zhan tiao jian 
jian jue wei hu he xie wen ding de she hui huan jing 
bao hu he jian she liang hao de sheng tai huan jing 
jian she gao xiao kuan song de zheng wu huan jing 
bi xu zuo hao jin dong ming chun gong zuo 
ge de ge bu men yao tong chou an pai hao dang qian ge xiang gong zuo 
xun su chuan da xue xi hui yi jing shen 
nu li xing cheng zhua luo shi de he li 
zhua hao jin dong ming chun nong mu ye sheng chan 
zhua hao an quan sheng chan 
zuo hao min gan jie dian wei wen gong zuo 
zuo hao jie ri qi jian fu wu bao zhang 
wei ming nian gong zuo qi hao bu 
da hao ji chu 
hui yi hao zhao 
gao ju zhong guo te se she hui zhu yi wei da qi zhi 
yi deng xiao ping li lun 
san ge dai biao 
zhong yao si xiang 
ke xue fa zhan guan wei zhi dao 
ren zhen guan che luo shi shi ba jie san zhong quan hui he zhong yang jing ji gong zuo hui yi jing shen 
guan che luo shi xi jin ping zong shu ji xi lie zhong yao jiang hua jing shen 
an zhao zi zhi qu dang wei 
zheng fu de bu shu yao qiu 
tong yi si xiang 
zhen fen jing shen 
kai tuo chuang xin 
zha shi gong zuo 
quan mian wan cheng ming nian ge xiang mu biao ren wu 
fen li tui jin kua yue shi fa zhan he chang zhi jiu an 
wei jian she fu yu he xie xing fu fa zhi wen ming mei li xi zang er nu li fen dou 
zi zhi qu ren da 
zheng xie sheng ji ling dao tong zhi 
zi zhi qu gao ji ren min fa yuan yuan zhang 
zi zhi qu ren min jian cha yuan jian cha zhang 
xi zang jun qu 
wu jing xi zang zong dui 
xi zang gong an bian fang zong dui 
xi zang gong an xiao fang zong dui zhu guan chu xi hui yi 
shi lei xiao tao 
ji zhe qin ya zhou wang jun 
zai zhong yang de guan xin he quan guo ren min de da li zhi yuan xia 
xi zang jing ji she hui shi xian kua yue shi fa zhan 
jing ji zong liang chi xu mai shang xin tai jie 
lian xu di wu nian shi xian bai yi ji zeng zhang 
xi zang zi zhi qu dang wei shu ji chen quan guo shuo 
quan qu jing ji shi xian le you zhi liang you xiao yi 
you hao you kuai fa zhan 
yu ji jin nian xi zang di yi 
di san chan ye gui mo chao guo yi 
zhan ban bi jiang shan 
yu ci tong shi 
shi xian le su du 
xiao yi tong bu ti sheng 
cheng ji lai zhi bu yi 
ying dang chong fen ken ding 
chen quan guo zai ken ding cheng ji de tong shi ye zhi chu 
xi zang de gong zuo zuo feng xu yao jin yi bu gai jin 
fa zhan huan jing xu yao jin yi bu you hua 
ji chu she shi xu yao jin yi bu jia qiang 
chan ye fa zhan shui ping xu yao jin yi bu ti sheng 
ci ci hui yi suo ti chu jing ji zhi biao 
xiang mu shu yu wang nian you suo bu tong 
chu le di qu sheng chan zong zhi 
di fang cai zheng shou ru 
gu ding zi chan tou zi 
she hui xiao fei pin ling shou zong e 
cheng zhen ju min ren jun ke zhi pei shou ru he nong mu min ren jun chun shou ru deng chuan tong zhi biao wai 
hai ti chu yao zuo hao shen hua gai ge kai fang 
kuo da kai fang ju mian 
jia qiang ji chu she shi 
zhong gong xi zang zi zhi qu wei yuan hui shu ji chen quan guo zai ci jian hui yi shang biao shi 
zhu yao ji yu xi zang jing ji zong liang xiao 
fa zhan ji shu di 
jin guan yu nei di xiang bi fa zhan qi bu wan 
dan qian li hai hen da deng duo zhong kao liang 
bu yi xi sheng huan jing wei dai jia 
chen quan guo qiang diao 
yao zai zhe yi qian ti xia 
shi xian you xiao yi de fa zhan 
lv se de fa zhan 
ke chi xu de fa zhan 
chen quan guo jie shao cheng 
ben nian du xi zang shi xian le you zhi liang you xiao yi 
you hao you kuai fa zhan 
zi dang tou de tong shi 
xi zang hai zhu zhong ti gao jing ji zeng zhang zhi liang 
you hua jing ji jie gou 
guan fang shu zi xian shi 
jun bao chi liang wei shu zeng zhang 
di san chan ye gui mo chao guo yi 
zhan ban bi jiang shan 
ju chen quan guo jie shao 
kai gong lv chao guo ba cheng 
ta tong shi ren wei 
xi zang gai ge kai fang de dong li zeng qiang 
dui wai mao yi wen bu fa zhan 
fei gong jing ji fa zhan xun meng 
she hui shi ye you xin jin bu 
qun zhong de dao geng duo shi hui 
sheng tai huan jing bao chi liang hao 
she hui chi xu he xie wen ding 
guan fang gong bu de xi lie shu ju he fa zhan jie guo xian shi 
xi zang jiao yu 
sheng tai bao hu deng jun you chang zu fa zhan 
jiang xi sheng jiu jiang shi jiu jiang xiao xue de xue sheng shou chi ji xiang wu 
hong xian zhi she 
xin hua she fa 
li na zai bi sai zhong qing zhu de fen 
zai di er jie shen zhen wang qiu gong kai sai nv zi dan da di yi lun bi sai zhong 
jin ji xia yi lun 
xin hua she ji zhe mao si qian she 
xin de yi nian yi zheng shi kai qi 
yu ji xin nian di yi tian 
quan guo da bu di qu tian qi qing hao 
qi wen nuan nuan 
shi yi wai chu 
dan dong bei da bu di qu shou leng kong qi ying xiang qi wen you suo xia jiang 
bu fen di qu hai jiang ban you jiang xue 
tong shi xi nan di qu 
shou leng kong qi ying xiang 
jin ming liang tian 
nei meng gu dong bei bu 
yu ji jin ri zao chen dao shang wu 
xi nan di qu dong bu he nan bu 
hua nan zhong xi bu 
si chuan pen di da bu 
chong qing xi bu 
yun nan zhong nan bu 
guang xi xi bu 
ji zhe li jing 
ji zhe cong zui gao ren min fa yuan huo xi 
zui gao ren min fa yuan xia fa le 
guan yu shi shi liang xing gui fan hua gong zuo de tong zhi 
guan yu chang jian fan zui de liang xing zhi dao yi jian 
yao qiu ge gao ji ren min fa yuan gen ju 
zhi ding shi shi xi ze 
bing zheng shi shi shi liang xing gui fan hua gong zuo 
ji ceng fa yuan jin xing shi dian 
zai qu de jing yan de ji chu shang 
ji ceng fa yuan quan mian shi xing 
zong ti xiao guo liang hao 
liang xing geng jia gong zheng jun heng 
kuan yan xiang ji de xing shi zheng ce de dao jin yi bu luo shi 
liang xing geng jia gong kai tou ming 
gong zheng lian jie si fa de dao jin yi bu bao zheng 
ren min qun zhong geng jia li jie zhi chi 
qun zhong man yi du he si fa gong xin li jin yi bu ti sheng 
she hui ge jie he ren min qun zhong dui zhe xiang gai ge ji yu chong fen ken ding he ji ji ping jia 
gong wu bu fen 
di yi bu fen 
liang xing de zhi dao yuan ze 
gui ding le yi shi shi wei gen ju 
yi fa lv wei zhun sheng 
zui ze xing xiang shi ying 
kuan yan xiang ji yi ji liang xing jun heng yuan ze 
di er bu fen 
liang xing de ji ben fang fa 
gui ding le liang xing bu zhou 
tiao jie ji zhun xing de fang fa he que ding xuan gao xing de fang fa 
di san bu fen 
chang jian liang xing qing jie de shi yong 
chang jian fan zui de liang xing 
jiu jing guo duo nian shi xing de jiao tong zhao shi zui 
gu yi shang hai zui 
fei fa ju jin zui 
zhi wu qin zhan zui 
qiao zha le suo zui 
fang hai gong wu zui 
ju zhong dou ou zui 
xun xin zi shi zui 
yin man fan zui suo de 
fan zui suo de shou yi zui yi ji zou si 
ju yi de an jian fan wei 
dui liang xing de ji ben fang fa 
chang jian liang xing qing jie de shi yong 
chang jian fan zui de liang xing qi dian fu du 
zeng jia xing fa liang de gen ju deng nei rong zuo le yuan ze xing gui ding 
dan ju ti shi shi hai bi xu you gao ji ren min fa yuan jie he ben di qu an jian shen pan gong zuo de shi ji zhi ding shi shi xi ze 
ge gao ji ren min fa yuan yao gao du zhong shi 
jia qiang ling dao 
ren zhen yan jiu 
zhi ding fu he fa lv 
si fa jie shi he ben di shi ji 
ju you ke cao zuo xing de shi shi xi ze 
yao tu chu zhong dian 
zhua hao xue xi pei xun 
shi shi liang xing gui fan hua gong zuo de zhong dian zai ji ceng ren min fa yuan he zhong ji ren min fa yuan 
yao jia qiang dui yi xian fa guan de pei xun 
zui gao ren min fa yuan jiang cai qu duo zhong xing shi dui zhong ji 
ji ceng ren min fa yuan xing shi shen pan gu gan jin xing pei xun 
ge gao ji ren min fa yuan yao an zhao fen ji pei xun de yao qiu 
qie shi zu zhi hao xia qu zhong ji 
ji ceng ren min fa yuan xing shi fa guan quan yuan pei xun 
zhong dian pei xun zhong ji 
ji ceng ren min fa yuan yi xian fa guan 
rang suo you xing shi fa guan dou liao jie 
zhang wo gui fan hua liang xing de fang fa 
qie shi ti gao gui fan hua liang xing de neng li 
yao jia qiang zhi dao 
bu duan zong jie wan shan 
shang ji fa yuan yao qie shi jia qiang zhi dao 
dui shi shi guo cheng zhong chu xian de xin qing kuang 
ji shi jia yi yan jiu 
bu duan zong jie ti gao 
tui dong gai ge shi jian shen ru fa zhan 
liang xing gui fan hua gai ge de mu di shi gui fan xing fa cai liang quan 
luo shi kuan yan xiang ji xing shi zheng ce 
zeng qiang liang xing de gong kai xing 
shi xian liang xing gong zheng 
yao zhun que zhi xing xing fa he xing shi su song fa 
luo shi kuan yan xiang ji xing shi zheng ce 
dui yan zhong bao li fan zui 
du pin fan zui deng yan zhong wei hai she hui zhi an fan zui 
zai que ding cong kuan de fu du shi 
ying dang cong yan zhang wo 
dui fan zui qing jie jiao qing de fan zui 
ying dang chong fen ti xian cong kuan 
liang xing gui fan hua gai bian le dan chun ding xing fen xi de chuan tong liang xing fang fa 
jiang ding liang fen xi yin ru liang xing ji zhi 
liang xing shi dui fan zui shi shi he liang xing qing jie jin xing ding xing fen xi he ding liang fen xi 
cong er zhun que que ding bei gao ren ying fu de xing shi ze ren 
zai liang xing guo cheng zhong 
ding xing fen xi shi zhong shi zhu yao de 
yao zai ding xing fen xi de ji chu shang 
jie he ding liang fen xi 
yi ci que ding liang xing qi dian 
ji zhun xing he xuan gao xing 
que bao zui ze xing xiang shi ying 
dan zhe ye ling bu shao ren qu xiao le lv you 
hui jia deng chu xing ji hua 
zhuan jia jian yi 
yi bian yu min zhong an pai jia ri sheng huo 
jin nian yuan dan hou bu zai xian chao chang gong zuo zhou 
jia qi hou bu zai chu xian chao chang gong zuo zhou 
nan mian hui da luan zheng chang de gong zuo yu sheng huo jie zou 
shi ji shi de bu chang shi de 
zhong guo she ke yuan lv you yan jiu zhong xin te yue yan jiu yuan liu si min zai jie shou zhong xin wang ji zhe cai fang shi biao shi 
xin de fang jia fang an bi mian le chao chang gong zuo zhou de chu xian 
zhi de ken ding 
bu shao ren chu you huo hui jia ji hua pao tang 
yuan dan zhi fang jia yi tian 
zhun bei ji hua hui jia kan ba ba ma ma 
suo yi jiu bu neng hui jia le 
zhi hao deng dao guo nian zai hui qu 
lao jia zai he bei bao ding 
dan zai shan dong gong zuo de nv bai ling xiao wang dui zhong xin wang ji zhe shuo 
zai shang hai cong shi kang fu zhi liao shi gong zuo de xiao zhang ben lai ji hua yuan dan qu huang shan xin shang xue jing 
zhe ge ji hua ye yin wei yuan dan zhi you yi tian jia er pao tang 
zai bei jing gong zuo de xiao he 
sui ran li lao jia shi jia zhuang bu yuan 
dan ye bu zhun bei yuan dan hui jia le 
wo fu mu ye jian yi bie hui le 
lai hui zhe teng 
hai bu ru zhou mo hui qu xia 
xiao he hai gao su ji zhe 
chu le shi jian bu gou chong yu wai 
hui yi tang jia de cheng ben ye tai gao 
you yu xian zai hui jia da duo zhi neng zuo gao tie 
hua ji bai yuan hui yi tang jia 
zai jia que zhi dai bu dao yi tian 
wang you zhi zhao 
zai ji zhe cai fang de ren yuan zhong 
duo shu xuan ze zhai zai jia li 
peng you ju hui deng fang shi lai du guo yuan dan 
ji ke yu xiang lin zhou mo xiang lian 
qu dong bei xue xiang wan yi tang 
zai an hui he fei gong zuo de xiao yan wei le hui an qing lao jia kan kan 
xiao yan gao su ji zhe 
yuan dan fang yi tian jia 
yao bei kou ji bai yuan 
ming xian tai chi 
bu li yu min zhong an pai zi ji de jia ri sheng huo 
jin nian you qi ru ci 
gei min zhong zao cheng le kun rao 
liu si min biao shi 
liu si min jian yi 
yi fang bian min zhong ti qian an pai jia qi 
xu yao zhu yi de shi 
an zhao jin nian gong kai zheng qiu min yi de fang jia an pai fang an 
jie jia ri feng zhou san shi bu diao xiu 
jin zai dang tian fang jia 
diao jie xiang lin zhou liu 
ao da li ya xi ni 
hai gang da qiao he ge ju yuan shang fang yan hua sheng fang 
qing zhu xin nian dao lai 
de guo chi li yu da can 
yi ge ren de wan can 
de guo duo jia dian shi tai dou hui zai xin nian qian ye bo fang zhe bu duan pian 
chi li yu ye bei yi xie de guo ren shi wei xin nian da can 
ju hui shang ren men hai hui zuo xie you qu de you xi 
jiu shi jiang qian kuai jia re rong hua hou xun su dao ru leng shui zhong 
dai ning gu hou zai lao chu 
ran hou gen ju qian kuai de xing zhuang lai yu ce xin nian yun shi 
e luo si mai cong shu xu yuan 
wei huan du yuan dan 
e luo si ren hui ba cong shu mai hui jia 
yong ge zhong xiao shi pin jin xing zhuang shi 
bing ba jiang yao song gei qin you de li wu fang zai cong shu xia 
xin nian qian ye 
e luo si ren hai hui quan jia wei zuo zai dian shi ji qian 
ting zong tong xin nian he ci 
deng hou ke li mu lin gong si ba si ke ta lou qiao xiang xin nian zhong sheng 
you ren hai hui zai xin nian ling shi da kai jia men bing xu yuan 
huo dian ran xie xia xin yuan de zhi tiao 
ran hou jiang hui jin fang jin jiu li he jin du li 
ri ben pai dui qiang 
ri ben ren ba xin nian qian ye cheng wei 
ri ben chun wan 
hong bai ge hui 
ze shi ri ben bai xing shou sui shi de bi kan jie mu 
yu zhong guo de chun wan bu tong 
hong bai ge hui 
shi yi chang ge chang 
xin nian hai you 
fu dai bu duo 
wei le neng tao ge tou cai 
ri ben ren chang chang xin nian yi da zao jiu qu pai dui 
zai shang dian kai men shi 
wei nei rui la mai 
zhao cai nei yi 
mei feng sui mo 
wei nei rui la bai xing dou re zhong gou mai huang se nei yi 
ren wei zhi yao tie shen chuan zhe huang se yi fu 
lai nian jiu neng 
zhao cai jin bao 
hen duo wei nei rui la ren hai xi huan jiang da mian e zhi bi fang zai qian bao huo you jiao chuan de xie zi li 
biao shi zi ji zhang wo le cai fu 
yi xie da ling nv qing nian wei qi qiu zai wei lai yi nian neng shou huo tian mi ai qing he xing fu hun yin 
hai hui zai xin nian dao lai shi zhan zai yi zi shang wang xia tiao 
huo cong zhuo zi di xia zuan guo qu 
yi da li tiao he ying xin nian 
yi da li luo ma te you de ci jiu ying xin feng su shi tiao he ying xin nian 
jie jin ling she shi du de shi wai wen du jia shang zhen zhen han feng 
rang ren men dui guang zhe bang zi tiao jin bing leng he shui zhong de zhuang ju shen gan pei fu 
neng lian xu duo nian can jia xin nian tiao he huo dong de ren hai hui bei shou yu 
zong he xin hua she dian 
ji zhe pang ge ping 
gou cheng nan ning shi xian wang de shi zi gu jia 
jiang ji da mi qie nan ning xi xiang tang pian qu 
shi zhong xin cheng qu yu jiang nan pian qu zhi jian de jiao tong lian xi 
cheng wei nan ning nan bei xiang de zhu yao jiao tong xian 
nan ning jiang jian cheng yun ying liang tiao 
zi xing jie gou de di tie xian 
dui yu jin yi bu wan shan nan ning jiao tong yun shu wang luo 
huan jie nan ning jiao tong ya li 
ti sheng shi min de chu xing zhi liang he xiao lv ju you zhong yao yi yi 
ji zhe cong guang xi nan ning gui dao jiao tong you xian gong si liao jie dao 
nan zhi yu dong hou zhe xiang zheng dong fang xiang 
yan xian jing guo an ji ke yun zhan 
zhao yang guang chang 
jiang nan ke yun zhan deng da xing ke liu ji san dian 
han yan chang xian 
qi zhong yi qi gong cheng wei xi jin zhi yu dong duan 
liu liang bian zu 
she ji dan xiang gao feng zui da duan mian chu 
mai shen fan wei nei guang fan fen bu you di san xi ban cheng yan ji song san yuan li 
fu shui xing gao 
shen tou xing qiang 
ju bu di duan ji yan chu lu 
xian lu nan duan jie lu you rong dong 
rong shi lie xi dai fen bu 
quan xian che zhan cai yong ming wa fa shi gong 
cai yong di xia zhuang qiang jin xing wei hu 
bing zai kai wa guo cheng zhong fu yi jiang shui cuo shi yi jie jue gong cheng an quan wen ti 
qu jian sui dao jun cai yong dun gou fa jue jin 
yi kong zhi kai wa di ceng he shi gong rao dong 
xin nian yi shi 
nan ning jing kai qu jin nian quan mian wan cheng zhao shang yin zi ren wu 
de yi yu zi zhi qu dang wei chang wei 
nan ning shi wei shu ji yu yuan hui 
nan ning shi zhang zhou hong bo qin zi dai dui wei jing kai qu zhao shang he fu wu zhong da xiang mu 
feng ye   bai hui 
ke chuang deng yi pi zhong da xiang mu de yi cheng gong yin jin 
nan ning jing kai qu li yong zi shen you shi 
bu duan chuang xin zhao shang yin zi fang shi 
wei zhao shang xiang mu luo hu chuang zao liang hao tiao jian 
nan ning jing kai qu an zhao chan ye ding wei zhao shang 
jin jin wei rao sheng wu zhi yao 
qing gong shi pin 
ji dian zhi zao deng chan ye kai zhan zhao shang yin zi huo dong 
zhong guo bai qiang qi ye wei zhu yao mu biao 
zhuo li yin jin hang ye long tou 
nan ning jing kai qu an zhao chan ye lian zhao shang 
xin yin jin de zhong heng 
feng ye   bai hui 
ke chuang deng yi pi zhong da yi yao xiang mu 
yu yuan qu nei yi yin jin de guo yao wu liu 
liu zhou yi yao deng yi yao liu tong qi ye 
yan shen yi yao chan ye pei tao qi ye de zhao shang 
xing cheng bao kuo yan fa 
pei song zai nei de wan zheng de sheng wu yi yao quan chan ye lian 
shi jing kai qu xing cheng yi ge zhong dian ling yu he hang ye te se xian ming 
ji shu ling xian 
ju bei qiang jing zheng li de guo nei zhi ming sheng wu yi yao chan ye yuan qu 
zai xiang mu zhun ru fang mian 
jing kai qu jian li qi ping gu ji zhi 
zhao shang bu men zai qia tan xiang mu di guo cheng zhong 
zu zhi guo shui 
gui hua deng xiang guan bu men jin xing ping gu 
yan ge shai xuan ru qu xiang mu 
bing jian chi zhao da yin qiang zhan lve 
you mu de de qia tan gao xin ji shu qi ye 
long tou qi ye he zhi ming qi ye 
you qi shi yin jin gui mo da 
ying xiang li da 
nian chuang shui jiao gao de you zhi qi ye 
tai gao ru qu xiang mu di men kan 
wei le rang xiang mu kuai su luo di 
nan ning jing kai qu zai fu wu shang zuo zu gong fu 
da zao you zhi huan jing 
zhu chao yin feng 
jing kai qu tong guo bu duan you hua cheng shi shou xin 
kai fang bao rong 
lian jie gao xiao de zheng wu huan jing 
wei zhao shang xiang mu kai pi 
lv se tong dao 
ti sheng fu wu zhi liang he xiao lv 
da li tui jin yuan qu ji chu she shi jian she 
bu duan wan shan dao lu 
dian li tong xun deng yuan qu pei tao wang luo 
ti sheng zhao shang xiang mu cheng zai neng li 
tui jin zhao shang xiang mu kuai su luo di jian she 
lun dun shi zheng fu ni tou ru ju zi xiu jian zi xing che kong zhong zhuan yong gao su gong lu wang luo 
fang bian ren men qi zi xing che shang xia ban he chu you 
jian zhu shi yi ti chu jian she fang an 
zhe xiang ming wei 
kong zhong zi xing che dao 
de zi xing che gao su gong lu wang 
di yi jie duan jian she jiang cong lun dun dong qu kai shi tong wang li wu pu jie huo che zhan 
hao zi jiang chao guo liang yi ying bang 
ru guo ji hua huo de pi zhun 
zhe xiang ji hua jiang song wang tou zi ge fang jin xing zi xun 
ran hou ti chu shen qing 
fu si te shuo 
qi zi xing che shi ta zui xi huan shi hao zhi yi 
te bie shi he peng you jie ban qi che lv xing 
neng gou bu xing he qi zi xing che de cheng shi yao bi zhi neng kai che de cheng shi geng jia yi ju 
fu si te shuo 
wei le gai shan lun dun ju min de sheng huo zhi liang 
gu li xin yi dai ren yi zi xing che dai bu 
wo men bi xu que bao an quan 
lun dun de jie dao shi ge li qi che he qi che ren de zui da zhang ai 
fa zhan kong jian shi zai tai xiao 
fang an shi cai qu fei chang gui de she ji fang fa zai yong ji de cheng shi zhong zhao dao kong jian 
tong guo zai cheng shi tie lu shang kong jian she tong dao 
ke chuang zao chu shi jie ji an quan 
bu shou che liang gan rao de zi xing che dao 
er qie lu xian dui yu tong qin zhe lai shuo fei chang li xiang 
fu si te zui chu kai zhan de yan jiu xian shi 
zhe ge xi tong rong liang da 
cheng ben yao bi jian she xin de dao lu he sui dao di xu duo 
gen ju fu si te de fang an 
zai tie dao shang fang xiu jian de gao jia dao lu yue san ceng lou gao 
kai fa tuan dui gu ji 
chen jin wen tui bu shou dao zhong chuang 
shen zhen long gang qu heng gang jie dao liu yue she qu cheng guan dui zhang chen jin wen zai gui yuan ji qu qian shi 
jian kong lu xiang xian shi 
chen jin wen jiang shu 
ci shi yu zi ji shang zhou xiang she qu tao yao shuo fa you guan 
an jian hai zai jin yi bu diao cha zhong 
zuo tian shang wu 
wei bo shang de yi tiao xiao xi rang wu han wang you zha le guo 
you zhui xia che qu ti le ji jiao 
wang you men ren wei 
gai si ji you qi fu ruo shi qun ti zhi xian 
bao guang de wang you shi 
@ qi shi wo zhi shi yi ming yan yuan 
ta zai wei bo zhong shuo 
gong jiao nan hu shan zhuang zhan 
bu rang qi shang che 
min gong zheng zhi le ji ju 
si ji xia che hou gei le ta ji jiao 
ta huan gei wei bo pei le tu 
tu pian xian shi 
yi ming nong min gong mu yang de nan zi zheng zai wan yao jian bian dan 
bian dan liang tou ge gua zhe yi ge ma dai 
wei bo fa chu hou 
xu duo wang you fen fen zhi ze si ji 
@ wei ni hao ba 
wu lun qing kuang shi zen me yang de 
zhi yao zhe wei min gong xiong di mei you dong shou 
er si ji dong shou da ren le 
na jiu bu yong duo shuo 
si ji bi xu dao qian 
dang shi si ji wei xue mou 
shi fa shi zheng zhi zao gao feng qi 
na wei nan cheng ke yong bian dan tiao zhe liang da dai xing li shang che 
xue mou yin dan xin zhe xie wu pin zhan yong kong jian guo da ying xiang qi ta cheng ke 
jiu yao qiu ta xia che 
liang ren zai zheng zhi zhong 
cheng ke xian kai kou ma ren 
xue mou sui hou xia che yu zhi li lun 
gong jiao ji tuan wu gong si hai biao shi 
xue mou yi ren shi dao zi ji de cuo wu 
xiang tong guo bao she xiang tiao dan zi de cheng ke dao qian 
bing bao zheng yi hou bu zai fa sheng lei si de shi qing 
ji zhe dai wei 
ji zhe zhong qiao hua 
cong fu jian sheng jiao tong yun shu ting yun guan ju chuan lai xiao xi 
dan yin jin lian zhou mo 
xu duo lv ke jiang hui xuan ze xiu jia liang tian xing cheng yi ge xiao chang jia 
jia shang sha shen 
xiang pu deng gao tie dai dong de lv you fa zhan 
fu jian yun shu an quan bao zhang gong zuo yi ran fan zhong 
sheng jiao tong yun shu ting yun guan ju zhi dao ge ji yun guan ji gou 
ge ke yun qi ye fa hui zhong duan tu jie bo dian duo mian guang 
zhi jie tong da xian cheng xiang zhen de you shi 
fa zhan yu gao tie xian lu chui zhi de zhi xian yun shu 
duan tu ke yun 
nong cun ke yun 
kai pi cheng shi gong jiao zhuan xian 
bing dui gao tie huo che zhan chu zu che yun xing jia qiang jian guan 
que bao min zhong chu xing fang bian 
fang bian lv ke jin chu dao 
lv you zhuan xian fang mian 
dui jie huo che zhan

wei fang bian fu wu lv ke gou piao 
chu she li xue sheng 
nong min gong shou piao zhuan chuang 
shi xing wang shang shou piao 
shou ji shou piao 
zi zhu shou piao deng fang bian qun zhong gou piao de cuo shi wai 
fu zhou min yun qi che bei zhan 
zui da xian du di fang bian lv ke gou piao 
sheng nei ge da ke yun zhan hai jiang shi yu shou qing kuang dui xiang guan xian lu ban ci jin xing jia mi 
rang lv ke zhen zheng zou de le 
xi jin ping zai cha hua hui shang tong yu hui ren shi qin qie jiao tan 
xin hua she ji zhe ju peng she 
dang he guo jia ling dao ren xi jin ping 
zhang gao li deng tong ge min zhu dang pai zhong yang 
quan guo gong shang lian fu ze ren he wu dang pai ren shi dai biao 
zhong yang he guo jia ji guan you guan fang mian fu ze ren yi ji shou du ge zu ge jie dai biao huan ju yi tang 
zhong gong zhong yang zong shu ji 
guo jia zhu xi

zhong gong zhong yang tuan jie dai ling quan guo ge zu ren min zai gai ge kai fang he she hui zhu yi xian dai hua jian she zhong qu de de xin cheng jiu 
dui zuo hao ming nian dang he guo jia ge xiang gong zuo ti chu le ming que yao qiu 
bing fa chu le hong yang gai ge chuang xin jing shen de zhong yao hao zhao

ren min zheng xie gong zuo ti chu le yin qie xi wang he ming que yao qiu 
wo men yi ding yao ren zhen xue xi guan che xi jin ping zong shu ji de zhong yao jiang hua jing shen 
ba si xiang he ren shi tong yi dao zhong gong zhong yang jue ce bu shu shang lai 
ba zhi hui he li liang ning ju dao li jie 
zhi chi he can yu gai ge shang lai

bu fen zai jing quan guo ren da

ying er an quan dao 
cong jin tian kai shi 
zhe ge ying er an quan dao zheng shi qi yong 
wei nei xie qi ying dai lai chong xin chu fa de xin xi wang 
dao bao ji zhe cong xia men shi min zheng ju liao jie dao 
gen ju min zheng bu he sheng min zheng ting guan yu kai zhan 
ying er an quan dao 
shi dian gong zuo de an pai 
quan sheng mu qian you fu zhou he xia men kai zhan shi dian gong zuo 
ying er an quan dao 
shi dian zan shi she ding zai she hui fu li zhong xin men kou

ying er an quan dao

zuo tian xia wu

ying er an quan dao 
ying er an quan dao 
you mu ban fang zhi zuo er cheng 
an quan dao nei bu 
shang mian fang zhe dian zi yi ji yi chuang ying er bei 
you shou bian ze shi ying er bao wen xiang 
bao wen xiang yi ce you yi ge bao jing an niu 
ying er fu mu jiang ying er song guo lai zhi hou ke yi xuan ze an xia an niu 
tong zhi jiu zhu ren yuan qian lai jiu zhu ying er 
ying er an quan dao 
nei wei an zhuang she xiang lu ying she bei 
fang zhi ying er hou 
ping jun xia lai 
mei zhou jiu you yi ge qi ying song dao er tong fu li yuan 
qi zhong da bu fen xiao hai dou huan you ji bing huo shi can ji 
zhe xie qi ying bing bu shi quan bu dou bei ren song dao er tong fu li yuan 
bu shao qi ying shi gong an ji guan jie dao qun zhong de bao jing zhi hou 
zai jiang qi ying zhuan song dao she hui fu li zhong xin de 
zhe xie bei yi qi de xiao sheng ming 
bu fen shen ti jian kang 
mei you ji bing de jiang hui bei jia ting shou yang 
er nei xie you ji bing huo zhe shen ti can ji de ying er jiang hui liu zai she hui fu li zhong xin 
ta men huo zhe shi bei yi xie ci shan ji gou shou yang 
huo zhe jiu zai er tong fu li yuan cheng zhang 
sheng wei sheng ji sheng wei jin ri fa bu wo sheng ji bing ying ji jiu zhu ji jin shi shi guan li ban fa 
yi xia jian cheng 
zai quan sheng xing zheng qu yu nei fa sheng ji zhong wei shang bing 
xu yao ji jiu dan shen fen bu ming que huo ji ben sheng huo nan yi wei chi 
wu li zhi fu xiang ying fei yong de huan zhe 
bei lie wei ji jin jiu zhu dui xiang 
deng qian jiu ming 
liang lei ren qun ke huo jiu zhu 
ban fa yao qiu ge ji cai zheng bu men zai xian you she hui bao zhang ji jin cai zheng zhuan hu zhong jian li 
ji bing ying ji jiu zhu ji jin zhuan zhang 
fen zhang he suan 
zhuan xiang guan li 
zhuan kuan zhuan yong 
ge she qu shi he ping tan zong he shi yan qu yi bao zhong xin wei ji jin jing ban ji gou 
shi shi ji bing ying ji jiu zhu de yi liao ji gou bao kuo suo you na ru 
ji jiu wang luo de yi liao ji gou 
yi liao ji gou zai men zhen 
an zhao shou zhen fu ze zhi yuan ze kai tong lv se tong dao dui huan zhe jin xing qiang jiu 
jiu zhi cheng xu an zhao guo jia wei sheng ji sheng wei zhi ding de ge ji bing zhen liao chang gui jin xing 
jiu zhu dui xiang zhu yao you liang lei 
di yi lei shi cheng xiang di bao dui xiang 
gong yang dui xiang 
zhong du can ji ren 
di shou ru jia ting huan zhe 
bing ren zhi wu shen fen zheng ming 
xing ming he ju zhu di 
wu ze ren cheng dan ji gou 
wu qiang jiu zhi liao jing fei de bing ren ; di shou ru jia ting zhi cheng yuan ren jun shou ru zai dang di zui di sheng huo bao zhang biao zhun liang bei yi nei 
di er lei shi yin tu fa shi jian he yi wai shi gu zao cheng ren shen shang hai ji cai chan sun shi 
cong er dao zhi ji ben sheng huo nan yi wei chi de cheng xiang ju min 
she ji huo zai 
jiao tong shi gu deng tu fa shi jian huo tu fa zhong du ji bing 
ban fa gui ding 
ji jin yong yu zhi fu wu fa cha ming shen fen qie wu li jiao fei huan zhe suo fa sheng de ji jiu fei yong 
yi ji shen fen ming que dan wu li jiao fei de huan zhe suo tuo qian de ji jiu fei yong 
dui shen fen ming que dan wu li jiao fei de huan zhe 
xian you ze ren ren 
sheng yu bao xian 
gong shang bao xian 
ji ben yi liao bao xian he shang ye yi liao bao xian deng ge lei bao xian 
gong gong wei sheng jing fei 
yi ji dao lu jiao tong shi gu ying ji yi liao jiu zhu ji jin 
cheng shi liu lang qi tao ren yuan jiu zhu zhuan xiang zi jin 
yi liao jiu zhu ji jin he hong shi zi zhong te da ji bing yi liao jiu zhu ji jin deng qu dao an gui ding zhi fu 
wu shang shu qu dao huo shang shu qu dao fei yong zhi fu you que kou de 
you ji jin ji yu bu zhu 
ji jin bu de yong yu zhi fu jing cha shi shen fen 
you fu dan neng li dan ju jue fu fei deng bu fu he jiu zhu fan wei dui xiang de ji jiu yi liao fei yong 
jiang tou she qu wei sheng fu wu zhong xin yi wu ren yuan wei hai zi zhu she yi lei yi gan yi miao 
ji zhe chen li jie she 
zheng hao dui ban kai 
chen ke zhang shuo 
zai kang tai yi miao shi jian fa sheng qian 
jue da duo shu jia zhang dou gei hai zi jie zhong yi lei yi miao 
zuo tian kai shi 
xia men duo ge she qu wei sheng fu wu zhong xin hui fu yi lei yi gan yi miao jie zhong 
bu guo ji zhe liao jie dao 
xu duo jia zhang yi ran xuan ze gei hai zi jie zhong er lei yi miao 
zuo ri duo jia she qu wei sheng fu wu zhong xin jie zhong de yi lei 
er lei yi miao shu liang ji hu 
zuo ri shang wu 
zai kai yuan jie dao she qu wei sheng fu wu zhong xin 
bu shao jia zhang dai zhe hai zi lai da yi miao 
ji zhe liu yi dao 
zhen shi men kou tie zhe 
wen xin ti shi 
jian yi zai hai zi jie zhong yi miao hou 
guan cha hai zi de fan ying 
ru fa xian hai zi shen ti bu shi 
ying ji shi jiu zhen 
kai yuan jie dao she qu wei sheng fu wu zhong xin yu fang jie zhong ke chen ke zhang gao su ji zhe 
kang tai yi miao shi jian hou 
she qu dui yi miao jie zhong geng jia jin shen 
mei yi ge hai zi jie zhong qian 
gong zuo ren yuan yao xiang xi xun wen he dui er tong de xing ming 
jian cha jie zhong zheng 
xun wen er tong de jian kang zhuang kuang 
bing gao zhi jia zhang yi miao de pin zhong 
jie zhong hou de liu guan shi jian deng 
kang tai yi miao shi jian gei jia zhang xin zhong liu xia le yin ying 
ji zhe fa xian 
sui ran xin de yi lei yi gan yi miao yi dao huo 
dan yi ran you bu shao jia zhang ning yuan duo tao qian gei hai zi jie zhong er lei yi miao 
zhi qiu mai ge an xin 
zheng hao dui ban kai 
chen ke zhang shuo 
zai kang tai yi miao shi jian fa sheng qian 
jue da duo shu jia zhang dou gei hai zi jie zhong yi lei yi miao 
ji zhe sui hou cong jiang tou jie dao she qu wei sheng fu wu zhong xin liao jie dao 
ji zhe hai liao jie dao 
er lei yi gan yi miao you guo chan de he jin kou de liang zhong 
jia zhang men ming xian qing xiang yu xuan ze jin kou yi miao 
dou hua qian le 
bu cha na ji shi yuan 
hai zi de an quan bi shen me dou zhong yao 
ni ji wo bu ji 
ni ji ye bai ji ! 
zai bu jiu qian de xia men shi wei shi yi jie liu ci quan hui shang 
sheng wei chang wei 
xia men shi wei shu ji wang meng hui shuo 
zhuan bian guan yuan zuo feng 
chu le zhi tan 
ye yao zhi yong 
yin wei yong guan ye hai min 
hai cang zhen dui ci zhao kai le yi ci xing dong hui 
ming que le jin nian yao gong ke de shi ge 
bing pai chu yi fen zhi yong shi jian biao 
yao qiu guan yuan qiao zhuang an fang 
bing jin xing wen ze 
bu men guan li 
shi hai cang yao zhi de di yi ge 
? guan yuan ai zhuang lao hao ren 
bu gan jian chi yuan ze 
mian lin bu liang xian xiang shi bu gan jiao zhen 
di er yong wei gong zuo tui dong 
xi huan zuo biao mian gong zuo 
kai ge hui yi jiu dang luo shi gong zuo 
dui bai xing fan ying de wen ti yi tuo zai tuo 
di san yong wei jing shen zhuang tai 
fu yan se ze 
de guo qie guo 
ji qing que shi hun ri zi 
di si yong wei chuang xin neng li 
mo shou cheng gui 
lao tao lu lao zuo feng 
hai you di wu yong 
tui wei che pi 
re zhong yu xiao tuan ti he xiao li yi 
ge zi wei zheng 
di liu yong wei lu lu wu wei 
gong zuo xiao lv qi di 
di qi yong wei huan de huan shi 
xin fu qi zao 
zhi xiang zuo guan bu xiang zuo shi 
shen zhi la bang jie pai gao xiao quan zi 
wo xing wo su 
wu bi zi lian

ying fu liao shi 
dui gong zuo zhi qiu guo de qu 
bu xiang zuo dao geng hao 
zui hou yi yong 
bu jiang yuan ze 
gong cheng zhao biao 
cai gou luan lai 
ai na hao chu yu min zheng li 
qing qing chu chu 
hai cang pai chu le zhi yong shi jian biao 
he ge ceng ji de zhi ze ji shi zhi de zhui jiu ban fa 
ju bao dian hua 
zhao chu yi xie zheng fan mian de dian xing ren wu 
dao jin nian di 
bu fen dang dai biao 
ren da dai biao 
zheng xie wei yuan deng qiao zhuang wei pu tong shi min 
wei rao bu men cheng nuo de tu chu wen ti he chuang kou dan wei deng fu wu hang ye 
dao ge dan wei an fang 
shou ji he ji lu di yi shou zi liao 
bing jin xing bao guang 
zhi yong wen ze 
kao he zhi biao 
jie shou shi min ju bao 
ran hou wen ze 
chun yun hui jia piao nan qiu bu fen wai lai gong ti qian hui jia 
dan zai fu zhou huo che zhan 
bu shao gan zai chun yun qian hui jia de wai lai gong yi jing ta shang le hui jia de lv cheng 
ji zhe zai fu zhou huo che zhan kan dao 
bu shao wai lai wu gong zhe ti zhe da bao xiao bao pai dui 
zhun bei jian piao jin zhan 
zuo tian gong di li de huo yi jie shu 
zuo zai hang li dui li de lao liu xiao zhe shuo 
dan ta he lao xiang yi da zao jiu lai deng che le 
ti qian hui jia bu jin piao hao mai 
lu shang ye bu ji 
xin qing te bie hao 
he lao liu yi yang bi kai chun yun gao feng de hai you bu shao wai lai gong 
qian ji nian dou mei fa ti qian zou 
dao chun yun lian piao dou mai bu dao 
xiao xian sheng gao su ji zhe 
jin nian tong guo dian hua ding piao hen kuai jiu mai dao le hui jia de dong che piao 
jin wan hai neng quan jia yi qi kua nian 
xiao xian sheng huan gei ji zhe zhan shi qi gei lao fu qin mai de kao huo qi 
ju fu zhou huo che zhan gong zuo ren yuan jie shao 
ke liu zhu yao ji zhong zai chong qing 
te bie shi wang chong qing fang xiang de che piao shi fen jin zhang 
dao yu shou qi zui hou yi tian dou zhi sheng shao liang wu zuo che piao 
gong zuo ren yuan ti xing 
nian qian yi zhou de huo che piao bi jiao jin zhang 
bi kai chun yun gao feng qi 
fu zhou ri bao ji zhe xie xing xing wen ye yi bin she 
wang feng ge kong gan xie zhang zi yi 
xie xie nei xie zhen zheng dong wo de ren 
zhang zi yi yu wang feng lian ai 
yu nv xing zhang zi yi re lian de wang feng 
zai kua nian ye ye bu wang huai mian guo qu 
gan xie guo qu yi nian pei ban zi ji zuo you de ren 
nan wang de yi nian 
dui suo you shu xi de mo sheng de zhen zheng dong wo 
pei wo zou guo feng feng yu yu de ren 
wo yao shuo sheng xie xie 
bu guan you duo shao bu kai xin bu ru yi 
sheng huo dou hui ji xu 
bu ru wei xiao mian dui mei yi tian ba 
dan yuan wo de ge ke yi yi zhi pei ban ni men xun zhao yu huan xiao ba 
ci ju bei zhi shi xiang nv you zhang zi yi shi ai 
guo ban ri qian yin fa 
guan yu ling dao gan bu dai tou zai gong gong chang suo jin yan you guan shi xiang de tong zhi 
ti chu ge ji ling dao gan bu bu de zai jin zhi xi yan de gong gong chang suo xi yan 
ge ji dang zheng ji guan gong wu huo dong zhong yan jin xi yan 
yao ba ge ji dang zheng ji guan jian cheng wu yan ji guan deng wu xiang yao qiu 
ji zhe ri qian zai hu nan 
zai xi yan cheng wei yi zhong 
pu bian li yi 
zheng fu ji guan jin yan shi xiao reng you dai guan cha 
chou bu chou yan zhu yao kan 
zui da de ling dao 
hu nan sheng wei jing ji gong zuo hui yi xian chang 
hu nan sheng wei shu ji xu shou sheng zhuan men ti dao le zhong yang xia fa de ling dao gan bu dai tou zai gong gong chang suo jin yan de gui ding 
yao qiu can hui de quan ti ren yuan yan ge zun shou 
zai hui yi jian xi 
ji zhe hai shi kan dao yi xie yu hui dai biao zai zou lang guo dao deng gong gong chang suo 
hai you dai biao si xia yi lun shuo 
wei shen me bu rang chou yan le 
yi wei jing chang can jia hu nan sheng zhong yao hui yi de guan yuan shuo 
guo qu zai hu nan you ge tong xing de 
ji hui chang chou bu chou yan zhu yao kan 
zui da de ling dao 
yi ba shou bu chou yan 
jiu dou qiang xing bie zhe 
yi ba shou chou yan 
xia mian de gan bu jiu gen zhe tun yun tu wu qi lai 
ji zhe zou jin hu nan mou sheng zhi ji guan de ban gong lou 
kan dao zhi you yi lou tie you 
qing wu xi yan 
zai si lou wen yin shi men kou 
di shang yi ge lan se yan di fei chang xian yan 
lou ti guai jiao chu de la ji tong shang 
yi wei gong zuo ren yuan jie shi shuo 
zhe xie yan tou ke neng shi guo lai ban shi de ren reng xia de 
ji guan gan bu guo qu hui zai zou lang 
wei sheng jian xi yan 
dan xian zai zhe zhong xian xiang bi jiao shao le 
guo jia zhu xi xi jin ping zai ban gong shi fa biao er ling yi si nian xin nian he ci 
xin hua she ji zhe lan hong guang she 
xi jin ping he qi zi peng li yuan zai fu jian dong shan dao 
xi jin ping zai fu zhou dai nv er wan shua 
xi jin ping he mu qin qi xin san bu 
xi jin ping yu fu qin xi zhong xun 
qi zi peng li yuan 
nv er de jia ting zhao 
xi jin ping zai dou bo lin zou shang qiu chang 
yi shi qiu ji 
xin nian qian xi 
guo jia zhu xi xi jin ping tong guo zhong guo guo ji guang bo dian tai 
zhong yang ren min guang bo dian tai 
zhong yang dian shi tai 
fa biao le er ling yi si nian xin nian he ci 
quan wen ru xia 
yi yuan fu shi 
wan xiang geng xin 
wo xiang quan guo ge zu ren min 
xiang xiang gang te bie xing zheng qu tong bao he ao men te bie xing zheng qu tong bao 
xiang tai wan tong bao he hai wai qiao bao 
xiang shi jie ge guo he ge di qu de peng you men 
zhi yi xin nian de zhu fu 
zhu fu lao ren men jian kang 
zhu fu hai zi men kuai le 
zhu fu mei ge jia ting xing fu an kang 
zai zhe ci jiu ying xin zhi ji 
wu shu gong ren 
zhi shi fen zi 
gan bu reng ran jian shou zai gong zuo gang wei 
bu shao tong bao yi ran ben bo zai shi jie ge de wei zu guo xin qin gong zuo 
xu duo ren min jie fang jun he wu jing guan bing 
gong an gan jing zheng zai lv xing guang rong shi ming 
ta men you de yuan li zu guo 
yuan li qin ren 
you de bu neng tong jia ren tuan ju 
wo dai biao zu guo he ren min 
xiang ta men zhi yi cheng zhi de wen hou 
zhu ta men ping an shun li 
dui wo men guo jia he ren min lai shuo shi hen bu ping fan de yi nian 
wo men gong tong zhan sheng le ge zhong kun nan he tiao zhan 
qu de le xin de xian zhu cheng jiu 
cheng ji lai zhi bu yi 
ning ju le da jia de xin xue he han shui 
wo xiang da jia biao shi zhong xin de gan xie 
wo men dui quan mian shen hua gai ge zuo chu zong ti bu shu 
gong tong miao hui le wei lai fa zhan de hong wei lan tu 
wo men jiang zai gai ge de dao lu shang mai chu xin de bu fa 
wo men tui jin gai ge de gen ben mu di 
shi yao rang guo jia bian de geng jia fu qiang 
rang she hui bian de geng jia gong ping zheng yi 
gai ge shi xu yao wo men gong tong wei zhi fen dou de wei da shi ye 
xu yao fu chu jian xin de nu li 
yi fen geng yun 
yi fen shou huo 
zai gai ge kai fang de wei da shi jian zhong 
wo men yi jing chuang zao liao wu shu hui huang 
zhong guo ren min bi jiang chuang zao chu xin de hui huang 
yu zhou hao han 
xing han can lan 
ying gai shou wang xiang zhu 
tong zhou gong ji 
gong tong fa zhan 
zhong guo ren min zhui xun shi xian zhong hua min zu wei da fu xing de zhong guo meng
