ye zhu yuan ge guo ren min neng gou shi xian zi ji de meng xiang 
wo zhen cheng xi wang 
shi jie ge guo ren min zai shi xian ge zi meng xiang de guo cheng zhong xiang hu li jie 
xiang hu bang zhu 
nu li ba wo men lai yi sheng cun de di qiu jian she cheng wei gong tong de mei hao jia yuan 
sheng huo zong shi chong man xi wang de 
cheng gong zong shi shu yu ji ji jin qu 
bu xie zhui qiu de ren men 
wo men zai qian jin de dao lu shang 
hai hui yu dao ge zhong feng xian he tiao zhan 
rang lao bai xing guo shang geng jia xing fu de sheng huo 
hai you da liang gong zuo yao zuo 
wo men yao qian xu jin shen 
jian ku fen dou 
gong tong pu xie wei da zu guo fa zhan de shi dai xin pian zhang 
xie xie da jia 
ban gong shi shou du bao guang shu jia shang bai fang liu zhang zhao pian 
guo jia zhu xi xi jin ping fa biao xin nian he ci 
qi ban gong shi ye shou du bao guang 
tou guo yang shi jing tou ke yi kan dao 
xi jin ping ban gong shi bei jing shi yi fu chang cheng hua zuo 
ban gong zhuo shang you san bu dian hua 
er hong yi bai 
shen hou shu jia shang bai fang le si fu zhao pian 
ta yu jia ren tui zhe lun yi shang de fu qin 
ta qian mu qin de shou san bu 
ta yu fu ren he ying 
ta qi zhe zi xing che zai zhe nv er 
you ce shu jia shang you liang zhang tu pian 
ke yi pan ming yi zhang ta ti zu qiu de zhao pian 
ju yang guang wang 
huang zi hua dai xin nv you guang jie kan fang 
bei wu xian shi wei shou shi jiu xing de huang zi hua 
sui ran hui gui pai she ju ji 
de shou shi bu ji yi wang zuo pin yao yan 
dan reng ran na dao le wu xian shi di 
sui ran huang zi hua shou shi shen hua po mie 
dan ai qing fang mian que ji wei qie yi 
yang mao cheng mi de huang zi hua xin huan 
ri qian zhong yu bao guang 
yuan ben ta mao si tai wan nv ge shou fan xiao xuan 
dang tian huang zi hua dai gang ban fan xiao xuan kan wan fang hou 
mai le wai mai hui jia kai can 
you zhi er ren jiu qing fu ran 
dan huang zi hua fou ren fu he 
he bu shi shi shi 
huang zi hua ru ci jian jue fou ren 
jie yin ta de xin yi ling you suo shu 
nv fang bing yi jin zhu huang zi hua he wen tian yu suo gong fu tong ju 
dan huang zi hua dui xin lian qing ji du bao hu 
ju jue tou lu xin huan qing kuang 
you yu huang zi hua dui xin lian qing ji du di diao 
xin huan de lu shan zhen mian mu yi zhi mei bei pai dao 
huang zi hua xin huan zhong xian zhen shen 
yuan lai huang zi hua xin huan yang mao ji shi tai wan nv ge shou fan xiao xuan 
dai zhe kou zhao ji mao zi de huang zi hua 
dai xin huan gang ban fan xiao xuan dao shang huan dong jie kan fang ji kan pu 
yan jiu le hao yi hui hou 
huang zi hua tuo xia kou zhao huan shang hei chao 
ran hou kai che jie zai nv you li kai 
bing dao pao ma de de huang fu mai zhou fen mian wai mai 
huang zi hua rang nv you xian xing xia che mai wai mai 
zi ji ze zai fu jin pai huai 
you ji zhe shang qian yu wen huang zi hua xin lian qing 
sui ji dai shang kou zhao kai che li kai 
zhi yu zai can ting deng wai mai de gang ban fan xiao xuan 
yuan ben zuo zai men kou wei zhi de ta su shan ru an jiao wei 
you jiang wai tao mao zi la shang zhe yan mian rong 
ran hou da dian hua xiang huang zi hua qiu zhu 
huang zi hua zhe fan can ting jie nv you 
huang zi hua di da hou 
gang ban fan xiao xuan ji su shan shen shang che 
ji er zi hua ji ji qu che fan hui qi he wen tian yu suo 
wei mian xin nv you bao guang 
huang zi hua geng te bie jiang zuo jia shi dao da sha men kou 
rang nv you yi zui duan lu cheng fan hui da sha 
zi ji ze jiang che po zai ting che chang hou ji bu shang lou 
dui xin lian qing xiang dang bao hu 
ba ba qu na er 
sui ran luo mu le 
cheng yuan que jie xia le bu cuo de you yi 
wang yue lun zhi dao de shou bu wang luo ju 
ren sheng xu yao jie chuan 
qian wan kai bo 
ta jiu la lai le zhang liang 
guo tao you qing ke chuan 
ju zhong zhang liang ling pian chou chu yan le yi wei wai qi xing zheng gao guan 
xi zhuang hei chao jin xian zhong guo shou xi nan mo de xing ku fan er 
ren sheng xu yao jie chuan 
gai bian zi tong ming chang xiao xiao shuo 
she ji dao xian dai du shi nan nv sheng huo 
yi ji jia zhi guan peng zhuang de fang fang mian mian 
da bai di san zhe 
fen shou zhi fen yi ci 
zao yu ji pin de gai lv 
deng wei zhu ti de gu shi 
da zao lian ai shi yong pai ji shu zhi nan 
mei yi duan jie chuan gu shi dou you yuan zhu qu cai zi zhen ren zhen shi 
yong zui xi li 
zui xin la de hui xie feng ci yu yan yi shu 
chu le zhang liang he guo tao ke chuan zhi wai 
gai ju hai zhao lai yin yue ren bao xiao bai 
mei nv zhu chi xie nan 
wang luo hong ren sui 
hou she nan sheng deng ren zhu zhen 
ji zhe he shan 
yu qian wan zai bei jing ju xing shou ying li 
fu mu te di dao chang zhu zhen 
rang nan zhu jue jin rong yi shi hong le yan kuang 
ying pian gai bian zi shi nian qian de tong ming re bo han ju 
dan mei ci kan bi luo lei 
ta hai zhi yan bu xi huan bei da jia cheng zan xing gan 
xi huan bei kua shuai qi 
zhi de yi ti de shi 
wei le gei hai zi men da qi 
ji wei zhu yan de fu mu ye lai dao xian chang da qi 
you gong zuo zai shen de zhao ya zhi 
pai chu zhang fu huang jin shen wei er zi huang kai jie zhu zhen 
jin rong de fu mu ye te di cong xin xi lan gan lai 
zhe ci ba ma lai peng chang wo zhu yan de dian ying 
rang wo hen gan dong 
ji zhe chen hui 
chu jiu ying xin 
yu shi jue ding tu bu cong an hui lai an zou dao nan jing de liu he 
ta mei le li qi 
ji han jiao po zai lu bian se se fa dou 
xun luo min jing kan dao le zhe yi mu 
zui zhong jiang ta an quan song dao le fu mu shen bian 
liu he fen ju cheng qiao pai chu suo min jing xun luo zhi cheng qiao jie dao gui hua cun lu kou shi 
fa xian yi ming xiao huo zuo zai lu bian se se fa dou 
xiao huo zi xing xu 
liu he xiong zhou jie dao ling yan ren 
wo zhe ye shi xiang liu ge te bie de ji nian 
mei xiang dao gao gu le zi ji 
xiao xu xiang min jing jie shao shuo 
zi ji zai an hui lai an shang ban 
yin wei yuan dan ti qian fang jia 
shi jian bi jiao chong yu 
ta jiu bu xiang zuo che hui jia le 
er shi jue ding tu bu 
suan shi yi zhong tiao zhan ba 
lai ying jie xin nian 
dan wei xia ban hou 
ta jian dan chi le dian dong xi jiu kai shi chu fa 
yin wei tian hei mi le lu 
jia zhi shou ji mei you dian le 
xiao xu zai han feng zhong se se fa dou 
yu shi dun zai lu bian yi la ji xiang pang bi han 
min jing jiang xiao xu dai hui pai chu suo 
ti gong le shui he shi wu 
he shi qing kuang hou 
you lian ye jiang ta an quan song zhi fu mu shen bian 
ji zhe guo yi peng tong xun yuan liu gong xuan 
jie qing man hua 
dan dao le xia wu gao shui ping 
zhe bi zhang hai mei dao zhang ! 
ji zhe liao jie dao 
wei le qiang cun kuan 
nian di yin hang ge chu qi zhao 
you de bu rang zhuan zhang 
you de xian zhi zhuan zhang jin e 
shang wu jiu zhuan zhang bang wan que wei dao zhang 
zhu xian sheng shuo 
ta shi yi jia qi ye de gong zuo ren yuan 
ta men tong guo wang yin 
hai mei dao zhang 
wo zhi dao yin hang nian di you cun kuan ren wu 
dan zhe shi wo de qian 
wo xiang zhuan nei ge zhang hu jiu zhuan nei ge zhang hu 
yin hang bu neng zu zhi 
zuo ri xia wu 
ji zhe kan dao 
zhu xian sheng ti gong de zhuan zhang dian zi ping zheng 
cong zhe jia gu fen zhi yin hang de qi ye zhang hu kua xing zhuan zhang dao gai qi ye zai yi jia guo you yin hang de zhang hu 
zhu xian sheng shuo 
dan mu qian yi bi dou mei dao zhang 
zuo ri xia wu gai gu fen zhi yin hang fu zhou fen hang you guan ren shi xiang ji zhe zheng shi 
que you ci shi 
chao xian di san ci di xia he shi yan han dong ban dao 
wei shi jie kai qi le zhu ding bu ping jing de yi nian 
an bei jun guo da qi gao diao hui jin le er zhan zui ren 
fan zhuan ba ge guo qing bao jiao cheng le yi guo fei zhou 
hua wu yi yun bi ya xu cheng chi 
fan zheng fu shi wei dian ran tai jie tou 
ji su you zhuan de 
jiang dai zhe ri ben shi xiang he fang 
zi you dou shi 
si nuo deng he qu he cong 
chao xian hui fou zai he shi 
liu fang hui tan neng fou chong qi 
ai ji ju shi you hui xian he zhong bian shu 
shi jie zhu duo xuan nian yin ren zhu mu 
xing shi ji ti zi wei quan he zi wei dui geng ming dou ke neng cheng wei an bei xia yi bu qi 
an bei xiu xian ye xin neng fou de cheng 
jun guo jiu meng 
er du shang ma de ri ben shou xiang an bei jin san lv you jing ren zhi ju 
ta yi bian gu chui pi zhe hua pi de 
ji ji he ping zhu yi 
yi bian jia qiang ri mei jun shi tong meng 
xuan ran zhong guo 
you zou dong nan ya la long ta guo wei du zhong guo 
mian dui jing guo shen she 
cong niu nie zuo tai 
dao zhe zhe yan yan 
zai dao gong ran 
an bei ye xin yi mu liao ran 
an bei yi yi gu xing tiao zhan guo ji rong ren di xian 
ri ben yu lin guo guan xi ji zhuan zhi xia 
zai han guo zong tong pu jin hui kan lai 
yi nian lai ji su 
de ri ben wu zi ge cheng wei 
yi liu guo jia 
zhong fang ye ming que biao tai 
tong zhong guo dui hua de da men yi bei dao xing ni shi de an bei qin shou guan bi 
an bei jun guo da qi yi ying feng yang qi 
jin xia yi ju jie shu 
niu qu guo hui 
ying de san nian zhi zheng wen ding qi 
gei le ta geng chong fen de shi jian shi zhan quan jiao 
ta jiang jiu xiu xian zuo chu jue duan 
an bei sui ge ren re qing gao 
yao tu po zhan hou ti zhi shi fei yi shi 
chu le qi zhi zheng huo ban gong ming dang bu tong yi xiu xian 
ta hai mian lin zhe zheng zhi dui shou 
guo nei min yi 
guo ji fan dui deng duo dao guan qia 
jia zhi ri ben jing ji fu su reng mian lin zhu duo bu que ding yin su 
she hui guan zhu zhong xin reng zai jing ji 
kong nan cheng zhen 
fu jian jing ji jiang ying lai wu nian yi ci de quan shen 
ji zhe cong sheng tong ji ju huo xi 
di san ci quan guo jing ji pu cha jin ru ru hu deng ji jie duan 
sheng jing ji pu cha ling dao xiao zu ban gong shi zhu ren lin wen fang jie shao 
jing ji pu cha shi yi ci zhong da guo qing guo li diao cha 
ye shi yi ci jing ji de 
mu di shi quan mian mo qing 
shi wei ke xue zhi ding zhong chang qi fa zhan gui hua ti gong yi ju 
ru guo ti jian shu ju bu zhen shi 
yi sheng kai de yao dang ran bu neng zhi hao bing 
shen zhi hui qi fan zuo yong 
qi ye yi ding bu yao xu bao 
lin wen fang qiang diao 
zhen shi shu ju dui yu qi ye he gong zhong ye da you bi yi 
qi ye ke yi gen ju ge lei shi chang zhu ti zheng que pan duan hang ye fa zhan he shi chang zou xiang 
tou zi deng xuan ze 
he qian liang ci jing ji pu cha xiang bi 
zhe ci pu cha zui ming xian de bian hua shi 
dui pu cha dui xiang jin xing kong jian ding wei ji 
ying ye zhi zhao 
shui wu deng ji zheng 
zu zhi ji gou dai ma zheng 
bing xian chang pai zhao deng 
quan cheng dian zi hua cao zuo 
xin xi zhi bao guo jia shu ju ping tai 
que bao pu cha dan wei zhen shi cun zai 
pu cha yuan shi di shang men 
wan cheng yi ci deng ji wang wang yao hao shi jin yi ge xiao shi 
sheng jing pu ban gong zuo ren yuan jie shao 
jiang lai pu cha shu ju xing cheng yi hou 
quan sheng you duo shao qi ye 
fen bu zai na li 
bing bei guan yu 
zhong guo wu xing ji da xue 
zui hao de shi 
gen ju zhong guo xiao you hui wang zuo ri fa bu de 
pai hang bang di yi ming shi bei da 
yu qing hua da xue 
zhong guo ren min da xue rong ying 
zhong guo liu xing ji da xue 
ru xuan zhong guo ding jian da xue 
shang hai jiao tong da xue 
fu dan da xue 
wu han da xue 
zhe jiang da xue he nan jing da xue 
wu xing ji da xue 
chu le sha da 
jun huo ping san xing ji 
zhong guo zhi ming da xue 
ren cai pei yang he zong he sheng yu lai ping xuan 
chu le ping xuan ding jian da xue 
yi liu da xue zhi wai 
hai you zhi ming da xue 
gao shui ping da xue 
ci ci pai hang bang 
fu jian mei you qi ta da xue ru xuan 
zhong guo xiao you hui wang luo de da xue ping gu de shou xi zhuan jia lai zi zhong nan da xue 
da xue pai hang bang ceng chu bu qiong 
dui yu da xue lai shuo 
nei ge pai hang bang shang zi ji da xue zui kao qian 
nei ge ke xin du zui gao 
dui yu xue sheng jia zhang lai shuo 
bu ke mi xin zhe xie pai hang bang 
ji zhe she zheng 
liu de hua qi jiu zai chu nao can zhao 
ju ying guo mei ti bao dao 
ying chao ka di fu cheng ju le bu de ma lai xi ya ji lao ban chen zhi yuan yao qiu qiu dui zai gou mai qiu yuan shi xuan ze nei xie sheng ri zhong shu zi dai you 
zhe ge shu zi zai ma lai xi ya shi yi ge shou ren zun jing de shu zi 
chen lao ban ben ren ye xi wang ting dao zhe ge shu zi 
chen zhi yuan shi yi wei ma lai xi ya shang ren 
zu ji zhong guo fu jian 
jin nian xia tian 
yin wei si zi geng gai qiu dui dui hui he qiu yi yan se 
chen zhi yuan yu ka di fu cheng qiu mi de guan xi yi du bian de shi fen jin zhang 
ta ba qiu dui yi zhi yan yong de 
dui hui gai wei 
you jiang qiu dui de chuan tong lan se qiu yi gai cheng le hong se 
chen zhi yuan yi du xiang geng gai qiu dui de dui ming wei ka di fu ju long dui 
chen zhi yuan de ling wai yi ge shen fen shi xiang gang tian wang ju xing liu de hua qi zi zhu li qian de jiu jiu 
dan zhe ye ling bu shao ren qu xiao le lv you 
hui jia deng chu xing ji hua 
zhuan jia jian yi 
yi bian yu min zhong an pai jia ri sheng huo 
jin nian yuan dan hou bu zai xian chao chang gong zuo zhou 
jia qi hou bu zai chu xian chao chang gong zuo zhou 
nan mian hui da luan zheng chang de gong zuo yu sheng huo jie zou 
shi ji shi de bu chang shi de 
zhong guo she ke yuan lv you yan jiu zhong xin te yue yan jiu yuan liu si min zai jie shou zhong xin wang ji zhe cai fang shi biao shi 
xin de fang jia fang an bi mian le chao chang gong zuo zhou de chu xian 
zhi de ken ding 
bu shao ren chu you huo hui jia ji hua pao tang 
yuan dan zhi fang jia yi tian 
zhun bei ji hua hui jia kan ba ba ma ma 
suo yi jiu bu neng hui jia le 
zhi hao deng dao guo nian zai hui qu 
lao jia zai he bei bao ding 
dan zai shan dong gong zuo de nv bai ling xiao wang dui zhong xin wang ji zhe shuo 
zai shang hai cong shi kang fu zhi liao shi gong zuo de xiao zhang ben lai ji hua yuan dan qu huang shan xin shang xue jing 
zhe ge ji hua ye yin wei yuan dan zhi you yi tian jia er pao tang 
zai bei jing gong zuo de xiao he 
sui ran li lao jia shi jia zhuang bu yuan 
dan ye bu zhun bei yuan dan hui jia le 
wo fu mu ye jian yi bie hui le 
lai hui zhe teng 
hai bu ru zhou mo hui qu xia 
xiao he hai gao su ji zhe 
chu le shi jian bu gou chong yu wai 
hui yi tang jia de cheng ben ye tai gao 
you yu xian zai hui jia da duo zhi neng zuo gao tie 
hua ji bai yuan hui yi tang jia 
zai jia que zhi dai bu dao yi tian 
wang you zhi zhao 
zai ji zhe cai fang de ren yuan zhong 
duo shu xuan ze zhai zai jia li 
peng you ju hui deng fang shi lai du guo yuan dan 
ji ke yu xiang lin zhou mo xiang lian 
qu dong bei xue xiang wan yi tang 
zai an hui he fei gong zuo de xiao yan wei le hui an qing lao jia kan kan 
xiao yan gao su ji zhe 
yuan dan fang yi tian jia 
yao bei kou ji bai yuan 
ming xian tai chi 
bu li yu min zhong an pai zi ji de jia ri sheng huo 
jin nian you qi ru ci 
gei min zhong zao cheng le kun rao 
liu si min biao shi 
liu si min jian yi 
yi fang bian min zhong ti qian an pai jia qi 
xu yao zhu yi de shi 
an zhao jin nian gong kai zheng qiu min yi de fang jia an pai fang an 
jie jia ri feng zhou san shi bu diao xiu 
jin zai dang tian fang jia 
diao jie xiang lin zhou liu 
ji zhe li jin lei 
min jin dang tai zhong shi zhang chu xuan min diao jie guo chu lu 
lin jia long chu xian 
bu guan shi lin jia long huo cai qi chang 
jie ying guo lan ying jia xiang dui shou hu zhi qiang 
ci jie guo sui wei lv ying zhu ru yi ji qiang xin zhen 
ke wang li pin xuan zhan 
dan chu xuan guo cheng zhong 
lin jia long yu cai qi chang liang ren nao jiang 
wei lai dang nei shi fou neng tuan jie zheng he 
cai shi sheng xuan guan jian 
lin jia long bei hou you you xi zhi chi 
cai qi chang ze dai biao xin chao liu shi li 
lin jia long chu xian hou 
xin chao liu wei bi hui jin li fu xuan 
ruo min jin dang yao na xia tai zhong shi 
wei lai ru he tuan jie zheng he 
zai zai kao yan dang zhu xi su zhen chang de tong he neng li 
cai qi chang xuan bu can xuan hou 
duo wei dang nei 
te di qian wang tai zhong wei ta zhan tai 
ke kan chu cai qi chang de hao ren yuan 
xiang jiao zhi xia 
lin jia long zai dang nei ren yuan jiao cha 
xian zai ji yi shi qu xin chao liu xi zhi chi 
wei lai ru he zheng qu pai xi ao yuan 
ye kao yan lin jia long de zhi hui 
ji hu que ding 
bei lan nan lv 
zheng zhi ban tu yi jiu nan yi han dong 
mu qian qing shi dui min jin dang 
da you ke wei 
you ji hui jiang ban tu ting jin dao zhuo shui xi yi bei 
ruo lv ying na xia zhong tai wan 
jiang shi yi da you shi 
sui ran zai min jin dang chu xuan min diao zhong 
lin jia long da sheng hu zhi qiang 
dan bu dai biao min jin dang yi na dao sheng xuan men piao 
ru he wen zha wen da 
zheng he pai xi shi li 
cai you ke neng ba tai zhong you 
tai jun jing jian hou 
bei wen dao wei lai tai jun zong yuan e shu zi 
fang wu bu men biao shi 
shang wei que ding 
yin fa xue zu shi lv de pi ping 
tai wan jun fang biao shi 
jing guo gai shan ying she ju zhu huan jing 
ti gong wei lai zhi ya gui hua deng ke cheng hou 
gu li yi wu yi huo jun shi xun lian yi nan zhuan fu zhi yuan yi 
tai fang wu bu men 
zhan gui si zhang 
cheng yun peng shuo 
jing jin an dao jing cui an 
zhi yu jing cui an hou de jin yi bu bing li tiao zheng 
quan mian jun heng jian jun 
zhong dian shi jian jun 
yi chou huo yuan ju jing zhun da ji xian jin wu qi wei zhu 
bing jian hua gao si zu zhi 
jia kuai jue ce su du 
ti sheng lian he zuo zhan xiao neng 
dan shi hou xu gui hua reng zai yan xi 
wei lai zong bing li yao xia xiu dao shen me cheng du 
mu qian wu fa gei da an 
ci hua yi chu li ke bei mei ti zhi yi 
ren wei zhi you xian she ding le zong yuan e mu biao 
cai neng tui gu xu yao mu duo shao bing 
ru jin tai jun que shi xian jue ding yao mu duo shao bing 
lian zong yuan e shu liang dou hai bu zhi 
wan quan shi wei bi mian mu bing zheng ce tiao piao 
suo yi xue zu shi lv 
yi yue yi ri ling shi 
liang an lian jiang xian xiang qin gong fang yan huo ying xin nian 
zai re lie huan kuai de dao ji shi sheng zhong 
fu jian lian jiang xian huang qi zhen zhong xin yu gang ma tou he tai zhi lian jiang xian 
nan gan xiang ma zu shi xiang guang chang shang kong 
mei li de yan huo tong shi zhan fang 
min tai liang ge 
de wan yu ming xiang qin ge hai xiang wang 
gong ying xin nian 
zhe shi liang an 
gong tong ju ban de di san ge kua nian yan huo wan hui 
huang qi de yan huo wan hui you 
shen ma chi shen zhou liang an he xin nian 
he xie zhong hua pu tian tong qing 
yi shui zhi ge qing xi liang an 
fan hua si jin hua tuan jin cu 
ci jiu ying xin qi fu liang an 
xue mai chuan cheng gong chuang wei lai 
liu ge zhang jie zu cheng 
qu nian dui huang qi he ma zu xiang qin lai shuo you zhe te bie de yi yi 
xian zhi zui da chuan bo dun wei he zui da jiao yi jin e 
liang di xiang qin zai jing li duo nian de jing mao jiao liu 
ren yuan wang lai zhi hou 
qi pan yi jiu de ke yun hang xian you wang kai tong 
hai xia du shi bao ji zhe zhi guang lin dan wen tu tong xun yuan lin bing yu wen ying 
fu zhou bao long guang chang yuan ben yao gao ren gong jiang xue 
que yin ren tai duo qu xiao 
bao long cheng shi guang chang che zhan qian 
ren liu yu che liu jiao zhi 
du bao gong ye lu 
kua nian piao xue lin shi qu xiao 
xu duo yuan dao gan lai de nian qing ren zhi neng wu liao de zuo zai guang chang qian wan shou ji 
yi sheng yi shi 
wang you gei zhe ge kua nian ye 
fu shang le lang man se cai 
le fu zhou nian qing ren de re qing 
fu zhou wu si bei tai he guang chang tui chu jia mian pai dui 
wang fu jing bai huo tui chu zhen tou da zhan 
dong jie dong bai tui chu dao shu kua nian 
bao long cheng shi guang chang yuan ben tui ren gong jiang xue de huo dong 
yin lai de ren tai duo er lin shi qu xiao le 
fu zhou xin wen wang xun sui zhe wang zhuang wei jiu fang gai zao an zhi fang lu xu jian cheng 
wang zhuang cheng shi shang ye zong he ti jian zhu qun ba di er qi 
fu zhou dong bu cheng qu chu wang zhuang cheng shi shang ye zong he ti wai 
hai you yi dong er huan tai he cheng shi guang chang wei zhong xin de heng yu zu tuan 
yi tai jiang wan da guang chang wei zhong xin de jin rong jie 
zhu jian cheng xian san zu ding li de cheng shi xin jing ji quan ge ju 
fu zhou ri bao ji zhe liao yun lan she 
jie fang da qiao zhi san xian zhou da qiao yan xian 
ji zhe zai min jiang bei gang bo an zheng zhi yi qi gong cheng jie fang da qiao zhi san xian zhou da qiao yan xian shi gong xian chang kan dao 
gong ren men zheng zai zhua jin shi gong 
you de pu she di zhuan 
you de dui hu lan jin xing you qi 
you de zhong zhi lv se zhi wu 
ji zhe zhu yi dao 
zhe duan yan xian hu lan he zhu ti jie gou yi wan gong 
gui hua zhong de jian shen guang chang 
qin shui ping tai 
xian chang shi gong ren yuan jie shao 
min jiang bei gang bo an zheng zhi yi qi gong cheng xian xing xian shi duan wei yu tai jiang qu bei jiang bin 
dong qi ao feng da qiao 
xi zhi san xian zhou da qiao 
mu qian min jiang da qiao zhi ao feng da qiao duan ji ben wan gong 
quan bu gong cheng jiang zai chun jie qian jun gong 
fu zhou wan bao ji zhe yu song she ying bao dao 
ju zhong guo zhi sheng 
yang guang xin wen 
cong jin tian kai shi 
bei jing shi ji dong che ting che guan li ban fa 
zheng shi shi xing 
bei jing shi ji dong che gong gong ting che chang guan li ban fa 
tong shi fei zhi 
zhe ge zhen dui bei jing ting che nan wen ti chu tai de xin zheng ti chu le zhu duo hao cheng 
shi shang zui yan 
gong an ji guan jiao tong guan li bu men gen ju dao lu de shi ji qing kuang yi ji gen ju wei hu jiao tong zhi xu de xu yao 
ke yi zai dao lu shang jia zhuang ge li zhuang deng deng she shi 
er qi ta dan wei de ren he dan wei he ge ren bu de sun hai 
nuo yi huo zhe chai chu 
you gong an ji guan jiao tong guan li bu men ze ling ting zhi wei fa xing wei 
xun su hui fu jiao tong 
ting che chang xiang she hui kai fang de ting che chang guan li dan wei 
ying dang zai ting che chang de xian zhu wei zhi ming shi ting che chang de ming cheng 
fu wu xiang mu 
shou fei biao zhun 
che wei shu liang ji jian du dian hua 
an zhao he ding de jia ge lai shou fei 
bing chu ju zhuan yong fa piao 
bu de zai ting che qu yu cong shi ying xiang che liang an quan qing kuang de qi ta jing ying huo dong 
er qie yao jian li tou su chu li zhi du deng deng 
chu ci zhi wai 
kuo jian gong gong jian zhu ju zhu qu deng deng 
ying dang an zhao guo jia he bei jing shi de you guan gui ding he gui hua de zhi biao 
pei jian ji dong che ting che chang 
pei tao jian she de ting che chang ying dang yu zhu ti gong cheng tong bu she ji 
tong bu shi gong 
tong shi yan shou 
tong shi jiao fu shi yong 
chu le yin wei shi xian yuan gui hua yong tu jiang lin shi ting che chang ting zhi shi yong de yi wai 
ren he dan wei he ge ren bu de shan zi ting zhi shi yong ting che chang 
bu de jiang ting che chang gai zuo ta yong 
ji zhe feng hui ling 
zong he xin hua she zhu wai ji zhe bao dao 
zai ci jiu ying xin zhi ji 
ge guo zheng yao yi ji guo ji zu zhi ling dao ren fen fen fa biao xin nian he ci 
biao da zai xin de yi nian li ti zhen jing ji 
wen ding zheng ju 
gai shan min sheng de yuan wang he xin xin 
de guo zong li mo ke er 
de guo he ou zhou xi xi xiang guan 
zai dang tian fa biao de he ci zhong 
mo ke er qiang diao 
de guo qu de de cheng jiu tong zheng ge ou zhou de jin bu xi xi xiang guan 
zhi you ou zhou zheng ti shang jin bu 
zhu quan zhai wu wei ji de dao yong jiu xing jie jue 
de guo cai neng qu de jin bu 
jiu de guo zheng fu er yan 
mo ke er shuo 
wei lai reng you hen duo gong zuo yao zuo 
yi bao chi guo jia qiang sheng 
qi zhong zui zhong yao de bao kuo bao chi cai zheng wen ding 
cheng gong wan cheng neng yuan zhuan xing 
zai she hui ri yi lao ling hua he duo yang hua di qing kuang xia bao zheng jiu ye he he zuo deng 
ta hai hu yu de guo min zhong wei lai bao chi yong qi 
bing cheng dan geng duo de she hui ze ren 
han guo zong tong pu jin hui 
ning ju guo jia li liang wen bu qian xing 
pu jin hui zai dang tian fa biao de he ci zhong cheng nuo 
zai xin de yi nian li 
zheng fu jiang bao hu hao jing ji fu su shi tou 
huo yue jing ji 
wen ding min sheng 
ning ju guo jia li liang wen bu qian xing 
ye xi wang quan ti guo min qi xin xie li 
wei shi xian jing ji teng fei gong xian li liang 
wei hu guo jia an quan shi zhen xing guo jia jing ji de shou yao tiao jian 
yin er zheng fu jiang jia qiang wei ji guan li ti zhi 
ji ji wei hu chao xian ban dao he ping 
han guo she hui xu duo fang mian dou cun zai bu zheng chang de guan li 
jin hou zheng fu jiang chi xu tui jin gai ge 
chuang jian zheng chang she hui 
xi wang xin de yi nian li ke yi shou huo bian hua de guo shi 
rang guo min de sheng huo bian de yue lai yue fu zu 
yue lai yue xing fu 
ying yao dui wai lai 
zhe shou fei bao hu ti xi bu bei lan yong 
wei xian zhi yi lv you wei ming zai ying guo xiang shou mian fei yi liao de wai guo 
dui zai ying guo kan bing de yi min he you ke zheng shou yi ding de yi liao fei yong 
cong ming nian kai shi 
suo you hai wai you ke yi ji bu fen yi min qun ti zai ying guo jie shou ji jiu zhi liao shi bi xu jiao na yi yao fei 
ren he ren zai kan bing shi 
dou bi xu chu ju zi ji chu yu guo min yi liao bao jian xi tong nei di zheng ming 
cai ke xiang shou kan bing fu wu 
shou fei de yi liao fu wu xiang mu bao kuo bu fen ji zhen xiang mu 
yan ke men zhen he ya ke men zhen deng 
chu fang yao de jia ge ye hui you suo ti sheng 
yi ban xing de yi liao fu wu 
ru quan ke men zhen yi ji hu li zi xun deng xiang mu reng ran mian fei 
ying guo guang bo gong si cheng 
zheng fu ci ju shi wei le bao hu ti xi bu bei lan yong 
tong shi ye shi wei le wan hui gong gong yi liao hang ye meng shou de jing ji sun shi 
ying guo wei sheng da chen huo wei biao shi 
yong you yi tao quan mian de mian fei yi liao ti xi shi yi jian rang quan shi jie xian mu de shi qing 
chu yu gong ping 
wo men xu yao bao zhang gai ti xi wei qin mian de ying guo na shui ren suo yong 
shi ta men gou jian le ta 
ci qian zai ying guo 
suo you de ji zhen dou shi mian fei de 
bu yong jiao gua hao fei 
ye bu yong jiao na ren he zhi liao 
shou shu deng fei yong 
ying guo fa lv gui ding 
zhi yao bing ren da le ji jiu dian hua 
yi yuan jiu bi xu mian fei jin ji jiu zhi 
zhe yi mian fei de wu can xi yin da liang fei ying guo gong min lai ying jiu yi 
ying guo wei sheng bu men zui xin gong bu de tong ji shu ju cheng 
da pi luo ma ni ya he bao jia li ya yi min yong ru gai guo 
zeng jia le de fu dan 
chu le dong ou de yi min 
yi xie jia ru mei guo 
jia na da deng guo ji de ying guo ren 
zai guo wai zheng gao shou ru de tong shi 
reng bu wang ying guo you hui de yi liao fu wu 
ta men wang wang zai xia tian ying guo tian qi hao de shi jie 
cong bu tong de di fang hui dao ying guo tan qin he lv you 
yi ci zuo wei jie shou mian fei yi liao fu wu de jie kou 
zai xiao fei diao da liang yi liao zi yuan hou pai pi gu zou ren 
ying guo zheng fu de ji hua ye zao dao le yi ding zhi yi 
ying guo yi xue xie hui ren wei 
dui yu yi liao ji gou er yan 
jin ru he qu fen jiu zhen zhe shi fou ju bei mian fei jiu zhen zi ge yi xiang gong zuo jiu yi chang ma fan 
yi liao ji gou yao hua fei da liang de shi jian he jin qian zai wen shu gong zuo shang 
gai xi tong yun zuo qi lai you ke neng bi 
quan min mian fei 
shi qi geng ang gui 
shou fei yi liao ye ke neng rang yi xie huan you ji zheng huo chuan ran xing ji bing de yi min huo you ke bu zai qian lai jiu zhen 
zeng jia le gong zhong de jian kang yin huan 
xin fang an gui ding ju bei mian fei yi liao zi ge de min zhong ye yao jie shou shen he 
gei yi xie nian lao ti ruo zhe jiu yi zao cheng kun nan 
zhen dui mei nian you da liang wai guo ren lai ying guo mian fei sheng hai zi de xian xiang 
ying guo ye zhun bei chu tai cuo shi jin xing zheng zhi 
mei nian you cheng bai shang qian de wai guo ren lai ying guo xiang shou mian fei sheng yu huo zuo ren gong liu chan 
bu shao wai guo yun fu qia zhun shi jian 
ti qian yi zhou zuo you de shi jian fei di lun dun 
zai dang di yi yuan sheng chan 
ying guo wei sheng bu men zhi chu 
jin ci yi xiang 
ying guo zhun bei dui lai sheng hai zi de wai guo yun fu shou qu fei yong 
zhe zao dao ying guo min zhong de fan dui 
ren wei gai zheng ce 
que fa ren dao jing shen 
zhong guo ren ru he kan shi jie 
diao yu dao zheng duan 
gei ren yin xiang zui shen 
wen zhong qiu jin 
de zong ji diao zou guo le ju you kai chuang shi dai yi yi de guan jian yi nian 
ke ji deng duo ling yu de fa zhan he jin bu yin fa shi jie guan zhu 
zhong guo wai jiao shang de ri yi zhu dong he qiang ying gei zhong guo de da guo guan xi dai lai geng duo ji yu 
tong shi ye dai lai le geng duo tiao zhan he kao yan 
zhong guo min zhong ru he kan dai wai bu huan jing 
dui wei lai yi nian de fa zhan qu shi chi he tai du 
huan qiu shi bao 
te wei tuo qi xia de huan qiu yu qing diao cha zhong xin dui 
zhong guo ren kan shi jie 
dui xiang wei bei jing 
mei guo de zhong yao xing zai xia jiang 
diao cha xian shi 
zai zhong guo min zhong xin mu zhong 
shi jie fan wei nei dui zhong guo ying xiang zui da de shuang bian guan xi yi ci wei 
zhong mei guan xi 
zhong ri guan xi 
zhong e guan xi 
zhong ou guan xi 
zhong guo yu chao xian ban dao de guan xi 
zhong guo yu dong nan ya guo jia de guan xi 
zhong fei guan xi 
zhong yin guan xi 
zhong guo yu la mei guo jia de guan xi 
huan qiu shi bao 
zhong mei guan xi he zhong ri guan xi yi zhi shi min zhong xin mu zhong dui zhong guo ying xiang zui da de shuang bian guan xi 
mei guo de ying xiang li bo dong fu du bu da 
zhi de zhu yi de shi 
zai zhong guo yu zhou bian guo jia de guan xi zhong 
zhong ri guan xi bei ren wei shi zui zhong yao de shuang bian guan xi 
wei ju di san wei 
dang bei wen ji 
nin shi fou kan hao zhong mei guan xi wei lai de fa zhan qu shi 
le guan yu qi shang sheng 
diao cha hai fa xian 
mei guo zai zhan lve shang e zhi zhong guo 
yi ran shi shou fang zhe xin mu zhong chu 
diao yu dao wen ti 
wai ying xiang zhong mei guan xi de zui da wen ti 
zhong guo ren min da xue guo ji guan xi xue yuan fu yuan zhang jin can rong dui 
huan qiu shi bao 
zhong mei guan xi zai zhong guo ren xin mu zhong de zhong yao xing lian xu ji nian xiao jiang 
zhe biao ming zhong guo ren de zi xin xin zai shang sheng 
zhong mei guan xi bi qian ji nian wen ding 
mei guo dui zhong guo hua she dong hai fang kong shi bie qu de fan ying 
yi ji dui zhong mei liang jian nan hai xiang zhuang feng xian de chu li 
ji bao chi le yi guan xing you bi jiao ling huo 
shuang fang zong ti shang bi jiao di diao 
zhe qia qia xian shi zhong guo ren dui zhong mei guan xi zao yu yi wai de cheng shou li zai zeng jia 
gui gen dao di hai shi yin wei zhong guo ben shen de fa zhan hao 
da jia kan mei guo jiu dan ding le 
ye niu qi dian deng lu ting tu 
e luo si zhi sheng 
bei mei ye niu 
qi dian deng lu ting 
gen ju zhong wu suo qian he tong 
bei mei ye niu 
ou zhou ye niu 
deng lu ting de jing que fang zhi pin 
zhong guo yi dan wan quan zhang wo 
ou zhou ye niu 
de shi yong ji shu 
na me jiang dui hai shang ling tu zheng duan wen ti chan sheng zhong yao de ying xiang 
xi zhu xi shi cha hai jun bu dui 
ju zhong guo hai jun wang xiao xi 
shi ren min hai jun bo lan zhuang kuo 
gao ge fen jin de yi nian 
hai jun guan bing huai chuai zhe 
ding feng ta lang 
bo ji da yang 
liu xia yi dao dao liang li de hang ji 
wo men cong zhe yi nian zhong 
yi xiang du zhe 
guan zhu zhi shu 
 
guan zhu li you 
qing kuang jian jie 
xi zhu xi shi cha le hang mu bu dui 
gei hai jun guan bing ji da de gu wu 
bian ji dian ping 
xi zhu xi dui hai jun de qin qie guan huai 
wei hai jun jian she fa zhan zhi yin le xin de hang cheng 
guan zhu zhi shu 
 
guan zhu li you 
liao ning jian shou ci shi jian nan hai 
qing kuang jian jie 
wo guo di yi sou hang kong mu jian liao ning jian cong qing dao mou jun gang lan qi hang 
zai bei hai jian dui dao dan qu zhu jian shen yang jian 
shi jia zhuang jian he dao dan hu wei jian yan tai jian 
wei fang jian ban sui xia fu nan hai 
bing zai nan hai fu jin hai yu kai zhan ke yan shi yan he xun lian 
zhe shi liao ning jian ru lie hou shou ci zu zhi kua hai qu de zhang shi jian hang xing xun lian 
bian ji dian ping 
liao ning jian de fa zhan wei hai jun guan bing zhui qiu 
zhu ru qiang jing dong li 
zhong ji wei wang zhan 
gai ban sheng ji 
zai xian zhu wei zhi she zhi 
huan ying ju bao 
wei qiang hua jing shi zhen she he jiao yu zuo yong 
zhong yang ji wei jia da dui wei fan zhong yang ba xiang gui ding jing shen dian xing wen ti de tong bao bao guang li du 
zai zhong yang ji wei jian cha bu wang zhan zhuan men kai she 
jie zhi mu qian 
shi ming tong bao yi cheng qu shi 
zhong yang ji wei jian cha bu wang zhan you dui 
lan mu jin xing le ye mian gai ban 
jiang zhong yang ji wei 
yi ji xin jiang sheng chan jian she bing tuan 
zhong yang he guo jia ji guan ge bu wei ji jian zu 
bao kuo guo you qi shi ye dan wei 
guo you jin rong ji gou 
de tong bao fen lei xian shi 
wang min zhi yao dian ji xiang guan fen lei mu lu 
jiu ke yi cha kan gai fen lei tiao mu xia de tong bao qing kuang 
shi fen bian jie 
lan mu hai zai xian zhu wei zhi she zhi le 
huan ying ju bao 
huan ying guang da wang min ji xu ju bao ge lei wei fan zhong yang ba xiang gui ding jing shen yi ji 
fang mian de wen ti 
tai wan jing ji yao xiang geng shang ceng lou 
bi xu da po liang an guan xi de jiang ju 
wo shen qie liao jie 
tai wan jing ji yao xiang geng shang ceng lou 
bi xu da po liang an guan xi de jiang ju 
ma ying jiu shuo 
wei you da po jiang ju 
jia qiang liang an jing mao he zuo 
tong shi ye yao shi shi yin ying da lu jing ji zhuan xing 
tiao zheng chan ye jie gou 
tui dong liang an chan ye he zuo 
cai neng you zhu yu tai wan tuo zhan da lu shi chang 
ye bi jiao rong yi can yu qu yu jing ji zheng he 
ma ying jiu biao shi 
tai wan hai xia bu zai shi jin zhang de huo yao ku 
er bian cheng he ping de da dao 
ma ying jiu jin tian ye shuo 
liang an fu mao xie yi de tuo yan 
yi yin qi mao yi huo ban yu chang shang de yi lv 
tai wan bi xu jia kuai zi you hua yu shi chang kai fang de jiao bu 
hai zai kai gong ting hui 
wo men xi wang zhe ge xie yi neng jin kuai shen cha 
zao ri wan cheng fa ding cheng xu 
wo zai ci zheng zhong hu yu chao ye zheng dang yi tong xie shou 
jin su tong guo you li yu tai wan jing ji fa zhan de yi an 
yan tai shan zheng shou hu chou qu xuan fang shun xu hao 
gang dang shang nai nai de cang shan qu ju min ye yi mu 
yi zhi you ge meng xiang 
zao ri ban jin xin fang 
shu yu yan tai shan li shi feng mao qu 
yi jia san dai wu kou ren ji zai wu liu shi ping fang mi tu mu jie gou de gong fang li 
wu ding feng yu bi lou 
ju zhu huan jing bu hao 
yan tai shan li shi feng mao qu di kuai fang wu zheng shou gong zuo qi dong 
ye yi mu de meng xiang zheng zhu jian bian wei xian shi 
you ting shuo guo chi ba wang can 
zuo ba wang che de 
ke hai zhen mei ting shuo guo 
yue xiao jie chu tai chi ye xiao chang ge 
ye you gao ba wang kai liu de 
geng qi pa de shi 
gai nan wei le hai qian xia xiao jie de qian yuan zhai 
jing qiao kai fu zhuang dian da men 
jiang tou de de yi fu 
bao bao he shou ji 
song gei xiao jie 
yi di zi ji qian xia de qian 
xian yi ren chen mou zai shi qu jin huai jie yu tu men jie jiao cha lu kou bei zhua huo 
yin she xian dao qie 
chen mou yi bei xing ju 
shi qu jin huai jie shang liu jia fu zhuang dian pin pin bei qiao 
qi zhong wu jia dian bei dao 
qian ri shang wu fa xian dian men de suo bei qiao 
dan dian li mei diu dong xi 
dang ji jiu huan le suo 
zuo ri shang wu suo you bei qiao kai 
hao zai dian li dong xi mei bei dao 
he jing bai ran you xiao yuan she 
nan jing gu niang ni ni ji 
wo xiang he ni hao hao de 
zuo xie xin zuo 
jia ru he sui dang da jun 
shi dao yan teng hua tao 
bian ju bao jing jing ji 
hou zai du lian shou da zao de xiao qing xin dian ying 
nan jing shi ni ni de fu di 
ye shi dian ying di mian xuan chuan de zhong zhong zhi zhong 
zuo ri xia wu 
ni ni he dao yan teng hua tao 
bian ju bao jing jing 
jing bai ran lai ning yu guan zhong jian mian 
ni ni tan dao kua nian 
cheng ru jin zhi you zuo dian ying xuan chuan cai neng hui jia 
xiang dao bu neng pei fu mu kua nian 
yan kuang dun shi you xie chao shi 
ri qian fan bing bing ba qi ru zhu wei shi xuan bu 
zuo tian you chen re da tie cong 
ju zu chuan lai le zi ji da shi gao zuo tou bu ding xing de wei shi 
fan ye chong jian tian ri zhi hou da hu zhong sheng 
ri qian fan ye xian shen wei shi zhe shi rang da jia jing yan le yi ba 
ren qi zhi gao ke jian yi ban 
ta zai shou tiao wei shi zhong liu yan shuo 
zuo tian wo shi yang gui fei 
jin tian wo shi wu ze tian 
zhong yu kai ji la 
sui hou fan bing bing geng shi ji yan mai meng ke ai shi zu 
fei fei yang yang de zhang yi mou chao sheng shi jian jin ri sui zhang yi mou ji qi qi zi chen ting gong kai zhi qian er bo yun jian ri 
wu xi shi ren kou ji sheng wei zhu ren xu wei ying jie shou ji zhe cai fang shi biao shi 
zai zhang yi mou ben ren zhu dong pei he xia 
chao sheng diao cha 
jin zhan shun li 
dan chu ben ren shen bao wai 
reng xu yao gong zhong dui zhang yi mou shou ru qing kuang jin xing he shi 
zhu ming dao yan zhang yi mou she xian 
yi shi bei mei ti re chao 
dang shi ceng zuo chu zheng mian hui ying de wu xi shi ji sheng wei ye yin shu du 
zheng zai diao cha zhong 
bao shou gong zhong zhi yi 
chen ting de zhe ge an jian 
guan zhu du gao 
qing kuang fu za 
qie liang ren chang qi bu zai wu xi sheng huo 
suo yi cong fa lv shang ming que diao cha zhu ti ye jiao nan 
bing yi fa yi gui zai chu li 
wo men ye zuo le da liang de diao cha qu zheng gong zuo 
xu wei ying jie shao 
xu wei ying cheng 
jin yi ge yue yi lai 
zai zhang yi mou ben ren de zhu dong pei he xia 
an jian you le jiao kuai jin zhan 
mu qian min gan wen ti reng zai yu zhang yi mou de shou ru he shi 
chu qi ben ren gong kai de yi wai 
hai xu zheng xun ge fang mian de yi jian 
bing fei ji sheng bu men yi jia zhi yan 
yu ji dao yuan dan zhi hou 
hui gei gong zhong yi ge man yi de chu li jie guo 
ling ju wu xi bin hu qu ji sheng ju gong zuo ren yuan biao shi 
you yu mu qian an jian reng zai zhi xing guo cheng zhong 
cheng xu hai mei zou wan 
zan bu fang bian xiang gong zhong gong kai she an xi jie 
zhang yi mou he qi zi chen ting jie shou mei ti cai fang shi 
cheng ren le zi ji chao sheng 
bing xiang she hui gong kai zhi qian 
dan dui zhi qian mei ti bao guang de hao zhai he hao che 
zhang yi mou gei chu de hui ying shi 
hao zhai shi zu de 
hao che shi mian fei shi yong de 
zhang yi mou shuo dao 
ta men suo shuo de hao zhai 
shi zu de fang zi 
wo men you zu lin he tong 
ta men suo shuo de hao che you duo shao liang 
tong chang zhe ge che dou shi mian fei shi yong yi nian 
zhi hou yao hai hui qu 
wo de sheng huo bi pu tong ren yao hao 
dan zhen de bu shi hen she chi de sheng huo 
zhang liang he wang yue lun da dang pai wang ju 
you wang yue lun dao yan zhi dao 
gai bian zi zhi ming zuo jia ding ding zhang tong ming zuo pin de du shi zhi yu wang luo ju 
ren sheng xu yao jie chuan 
zheng zai bei jing pai she zhong 
ping jie can jia 
ba ba qu na er 
er ren qi bao zhang de ming mo zhang liang liang xiang 
pai she xian chang 
ju zhong shi yan yi ge wai qi xing zheng gao guan 
xing ku shi zu 
ci ci can yan 
zhong guo hao ba ba 
ba ba qu na er 
zhi hou di yi ci yu wang yue lun dao yan he zuo 
geng shi shou du can yan wang luo ju 
qi biao xian ling ren shi fen qi dai 
fa lan ke fu jiao yi suo huan shang 
qi yong ou yuan 
ou yuan zai ou meng ge cheng yuan guo fan wei nei zheng shi fa xing 
ta shi yi zhong ju you du li xing he fa ding huo bi di wei de chao guo jia xing zhi di huo bi 
ou meng gen ju 
ma si te li he tiao yue 
piao mian you chuang hu 
da men he qiao liang san ge ji ben jian zhu yao su gou cheng 
fen bie dai biao ou meng zhi jian de kai fang 
he zuo yu gou tong jing shen 
fa guo qun zhong zai fa guo ba li zheng quan jiao yi suo men qian ji hui 
huan qing ou yuan dang tian de jiao yi suo zheng shi kai shi jiao yi 
zai bu lu sai er de yi ge liu bing chang shang 
yi ming liu bing zhe shou zhi biao you ou yuan dui bi li shi fa lang hui lv de yuan huan 
qing he ou yuan shun li qi dong 
ren min wang zi liao 
mei guo zong tong ni ke song zai wei shi yi zhou de fang hua qi jian 
yu mao ze dong zhu xi jin xing le 
yan su er tan shuai 
jing guo mao ze dong 
zhou en lai deng lao yi bei zheng zhi jia de nu li 
zhong mei liang guo 
lian he gong bao 
mei guo cheng ren zhong hua ren min gong he guo shi zhong guo wei yi he fa zheng fu 
zai ci fan wei nei bao liu yu tai wan de wen hua 
shang wu deng fang mian fei guan fang guan xi 
mei guo gao su tai wan dang ju 
mei guo zhong zhi mei tai 
wai jiao guan xi 
yu ci tong shi 
ye jiang zhong zhi mei tai 
gong tong fang yu tiao yue 
che chu zhu tai mei jun ji jun shi ji gou 
zhong mei zheng shi jian jiao 
zhou en lai zong li jiao ta ru he yong kuai zi 
ren min wang zi liao 
jiu ren zhong hua min guo lin shi da zong tong shi de sun zhong shan 
xin hai ge ming bao fa 
sun zhong shan zai guo wai 
ta zai mei guo de bao zhi shang de zhi wu chang qi yi sheng li de xiao xi 
ji rao dao ying 
zheng qu wai jiao zhi chi 
sun zhong shan hui guo di shang hai 
hou ge sheng dai biao zai nan jing tui ju sun zhong shan wei zhong hua min guo lin shi da zong tong 
sun zhong shan zai nan jing xuan shi jiu ren lin shi da zong tong 
xuan gao zhong hua min guo lin shi zheng fu cheng li 
yi zhong hua min guo wei ji yuan 
gai hang yang li 
sun zhong shan zai lin shi da zong tong jiu zhi xuan yan zhong biao shi 
neng jin sao zhuan zhi zhi liu du 
que ding gong he 
pu li min sheng 
yi da ge ming zhi zong zhi 
wan guo min zhi zhi yuan 
lin shi zheng fu cheng li yi hou 
dang jin wen ming guo ying jin zhi yi wu 
yi qi xiang wen ming guo ying xiang zhi quan li 
lin shi zheng fu dui wai yao xi xue qing chao fan dong zheng fu de 
ru guo zhi ju cuo 
zai sun zhong shan zu ge de zhong hua min guo lin shi zheng fu zhong 
ge ming pai zhan jue dui you shi 
dan ye xi shou le yi xie jiu guan liao 
ta men shi lu jun zong can mou zhang huang xing 
wai jiao bu zhang wang chong hui 
jiao yu zong zhang cai yuan pei 
sun zhong shan zai lin shi da zong tong ren nei tui xing le yi xi lie de she hui he zheng zhi gai ge 
zhong hua min guo lin shi yue fa 
zhong hua min guo zhi zhu quan 
shu yu guo min quan ti 
gong min you ren shen 
tong xin he zong jiao xin yang de zi you he quan li 
bing fa bu le yi xi lie you guan zheng ling 
zai wai jiao shang 
gong fa suo ren guo jia tuan ti zhi nei 
zai jing ji shang 
fei chu qing dai de ke juan za shui 
bao hu min zu gong shang ye 
jiang li hua qiao zai guo nei tou zi 
zai wen hua jiao yu fang mian 
wei zong zhi de 
gong min dao de 
fei zhi xiao xue du jing 
sun zhong shan yi da zong tong ming yi zhu chi zhong hua min guo lin shi zheng fu di yi ci nei ge hui yi 
shang hai nan jing lu shang wu se qi ying feng zhao zhan 
huan qing min guo cheng li 
xiang gang tong bao qing zhu nan jing lin shi zheng fu cheng li 
nan jing lin shi zheng fu xiang zu zhi cheng yuan jian biao 
ren min wang zi liao 
wang feng zai wei bo fa yan yi si hui ji ge zhong liu yan fei yu 
qi nv you zhang zi yi geng xin le wei bo 
wei shen me you zhe me duo wu duan de man ma 
ru tong sheng yu e yi zhi xiang 
wei shen me you zhe me duo xu mou de shang hai 
jiu xiang tang zai wan jian zhi rang 
mei yi miao dou hui mao chu yi qun dao de pan guan 
hao si meng ran jian ju guo sheng xian 
ting ting na xin suan de dao qian 
kan kan na shi wang kong ju de yan shen 
zhe zhen de neng rang mou xie ling hun an ning ma 
wo men hai you zun zhong ma 
wo men hai hui gan ji ma 
wo men hai you jing wei zhi xin ma 
wo men chou hen de shi bie ren hai shi zi ji 
zhe shi ge zen yang de kong jian a 
shan zhe ru gou 
xiao ren kuang wu 
dang wo men zhi neng yong shi ran lai kai jie 
yong kuan rong lai xiao dui zhe suo you de ang zang shi 
zhe shi dai shi he deng de bei ai 
bu shi suo you de yu dou sheng huo zai tong yi pian hai li 
rang ren bu an de xian shi 
zhi de yi ti de shi 
wang feng de zhe pian bo wen xing shi fei chang xiang ge ci 
bu pai chu shi wang feng you gan er fa 
wei xin ge zuo de ci 
dui yu wang feng de gan yan 
wang you men fan ying bu yi 
you wei wang feng jia you zhu zhen de 
ye you bu xie tiao kan de 
er wang feng he sa bei ning de fen si ye wei ci zai ci xian qi ma zhan 
ge zi wei ou xiang zheng bian 
na me dang ni jian dao ta yi ding jue de hen shu xi 
ping tai da zao 
tong yang ye you zhe zi ji du te de guang mang 
zhe yi ci hui lai zai jing shen shang de cao lao he jin qian shang de hua fei ke zhen de pin hen da ! yin wei wei le yao gan hui lai can jia kua nian wan hui 
zui hou you li ke gan dao xian chang cai pai 
li mian chuan de chen shan quan bu yong shou gong bo li feng zhi 
ling wai ye hua shu wan yuan zhao lai diao gang si shi fu 
bang he run dong diao dao yue san ceng lou gao de kong zhong yan chang 
er zai mei shou ge qu zhong ye hua le shu wan yuan de yan huo te xiao 
rang he run dong de ya zhou yan chang hao bu xun se 
zhi shi he run dong zai jin tian de wan hui zhong bao lou le yi ge da jia wei bu ren zhi de shi 
qi shi da jia dou zhi dao he run dong pai de bu shao gu zhuang xi 
ye diao guo shu bai ci de gang si 
suo yi jin tian kua nian wan hui de diao gang si gao kong yan chang ying gai dui ta er yan mei shen me hao pa de 
ke shi he run dong que shuo : 
qi shi wo ye you ju gao zheng 
wo mei yi ci bei diao shang qu 
dou shi ren zhe kong ju 
ying zhe tou pi zhuang zhen ding 
hai yao yan chu bu tong de biao qing ! lao shi shuo wo hai zhen de man hai pa de ! 
qian yi wan jiu dao xian chang pai dui zu zu deng le er shi ji ge xiao shi 
jiu shi xiang qiang dao zui qian pai 
wei he run dong jia you da qi ! rang he run dong kan dao hou 
zhen de hen gan dong 
shi di er ren ye bu xun se ! wei le yun nuo zai zhe yi ci kua nian wan hui yao rang da jia 
zhen de bao bing jing ye de 
le ! zhan lu le er ren zhe yi nian ku lian de shen cai 
rang xian chang de fen si ke feng kuang le ! qi shi qian yi wan cai pai wan hou 
chen yi jiu li ke dao yi yuan bao dao 
yin wei zai nei de pai xi shou dao le feng han hou 
yi zhi hai bu ting 
dao zhi zuo wan zai chang ge shi hou long yi zhi hen tong 
yi cai pai wan jing ji ren jiu li ke dai ta dao yi yuan 
da le ji zhen ! sui ran jin tian ren you hao yi dian 
dan yi sheng ye te bie zhu fu bu neng zai shou feng han 
jie guo wei le yi ge 
ta men hai shi 
zuo tian yi zao 
he sheng yuan fa bu gong gao cheng 
tong guo qi quan zi kong gu de liang jia guo nei zi gong si 
chang sha ying ke gong si zhu ying ye wu wei sheng chan ying you er pei fang nai fen 
yuan chang sha ying ke gong si de gu quan you hu nan ya hua 
hu nan chang sha ya hua chi you 
jiao yi wan cheng hou 
chang sha ying ke gong si cheng wei he sheng yuan guo ji kong gu you xian gong si jian jie quan zi zi gong si 
ying ke de zi chan bao kuo bei hui pin pai 
ling wai hai you nan shan ru ye zai hu nan chang sha wang cheng de gong chang 
sheng chan she bei deng 
he sheng yuan you guan fu ze ren zhu hui biao shi 
gen ju gong gao 
yi he shi de jia ge lai man zu si wu xian cheng shi geng duo xiang dui gao duan ma ma men de xu qiu 
he sheng yuan yi zhi zou de shi gao duan lu xian 
ru jin yao qiang zhan si wu xian cheng shi shi chang 
ru guo an zhi qian yuan zhuang jin kou de fang shi 
cheng ben tai gao 
ru ye zhuan jia wang ding mian biao shi 
dan tong guo shou gou guo nei qi ye gong chang zai guo nei yong jin kou nai yuan jia gong 
jiang da da jiang di cheng ben 
shou gou jia ge bu suan gui 
mai fang ya hua ru ye shi you zhong xin zi ben quan zi kong gu 
ya hua ru ye bei ze ling ting ye zheng dun 
chu le zhe yi an quan shi jian 
yi zhi wei hui fu yuan qi 
ye ji di mi 
zhi ai shi jian hou 
nan shan nai fen pin pai shou sun 
shi de he sheng yuan neng yi he shi de jia ge jin xing shou gou 
ru ye fen xi shi song liang biao shi 
zhe ci shou gou de gong chang zheng ge sheng chan xian hai shi bi jiao xian jin de 
shou gou jia bing bu suan gui 
ji zhe hu xiao hong 
hui yi qiang diao 
ji xu shi shi wen jian de huo bi zheng ce 
bao chi shi du liu dong xing 
shi xian huo bi xin dai ji she hui rong zi gui mo he li zeng zhang 
xia yi jie duan zhu yao zheng ce si lu 
de bu fen ze bing mei you 
bao chi shi du liu dong xing 
gai bao gao dui yu xia yi jie duan de liu dong xing de guan li gong zuo biao shu wei 
jia qiang liu dong xing zong zha men de tiao jie zuo yong 
yin dao huo bi xin dai ji she hui rong zi gui mo ping wen shi du zeng zhang 
hua qi ji tuan da zhong hua qu shou xi jing ji xue jia shen ming gao ren wei 
bao chi shi du liu dong xing 
de ti fa bing bu neng li jie wei pian xiang kuan song 
yuan lai shi shuo 
bu song bu jin 
bao chi shi du liu dong xing 
ke neng shi dui mu qian zi jin cheng ben bi jiao gao you suo jing ti 
ru guo zhe ge zi jin cheng ben bao chi xia qu 
guo kai zheng quan hong guan fen xi shi du zheng zheng biao shi 
li lv chi xu bao chi gao wei 
ru guo shi jian guo chang 
dui wei lai zhong guo jing ji zeng zhang hui you fu mian ying xiang 
jue ce ceng dui ci you suo jing ti 
wei lai huo bi zheng ce ke neng you dang qian de zhong xing lve jin wei diao zhi zhong xing 
zai ci ci di si ji du li hui shang 
yang hang huo bi zheng ce wei yuan hui qiang diao 
yao gai shan he you hua rong zi jie gou he xin dai jie gou 
tong shi yu gai ge yu tiao kong zhi zhong 
zeng qiang jin rong yun xing xiao lv he fu wu shi ti jing ji neng li 
jin yi bu tui jin li lv shi chang hua he ren min bi hui lv xing cheng ji zhi gai ge 
bao chi ren min bi hui lv zai he li jun heng shui ping shang de ji ben wen ding 
ji zhe gao chen 
tu di zeng zhi shui 
de hua ti zai du xi lai 
yang shi jin ri bao dao cheng 
wan ke zuo ri fa bu gong gao cheng 
bu cun zai ying jiao wei jiao tu di zeng zhi shui di qing kuang 
ye nei dui tu di zeng zhi shui de wen ti zheng lun ji lie 
wan ke xian ru 
qian shui feng bo 
mei zhou zhi liang bao gao 
she ji zhong guo 
zhao shang di chan 
he sheng chuang zhan 
bao dao yi chu 
li ke yin fa re yi 
duo jia she shi fang qi fen fen yu yi fou ren 
bao dao bu zhuan ye 
dong fang shi kong 
zai du bao dao cheng 
dian ming zhi chu ji lin wan ke cheng xiang mu 
guang zhou wan ke jin yu lan wan deng duo ge fang di chan xiang mu da dao qing suan tiao jian 
dan wei ji shi shen bao na shui 
er zhu guan di shui bu men ye wei ji shi yao qiu qing suan 
ju e shui kuan yi ying fu wei fu de mian mu chang qi gua zai qi ye zhang shang 
wan ke zuo ri fa bu gong gao cheng 
guan yu fang di chan kai fa qi ye tu zeng zhi shui qing suan guan li ban fa de tong zhi 
tu di zeng zhi shui qing suan guan li gui cheng 
ying jin xing tu di zeng zhi shui qing suan de tiao jian wei 
fang di chan kai fa xiang mu quan bu jun gong 
wan cheng xiao shou de 
zheng ti zhuan rang wei jun gong jue suan fang di chan kai fa xiang mu di 
zhi jie zhuan rang tu di shi yong quan de 
bao dao she ji de si ge xiang mu 
jun bu man zu yi shang tiao jian 
ying jin xing tu di zeng zhi shui qing suan 
wan ke zai gong gao li jie shi cheng 
guang zhou jin yu hua ting xiang mu 
yuan wei da dao tu di zeng zhi shui qing suan tiao jian 
ji lin wan ke cheng xiang mu 
yu ji qing suan hou shi ji ying jiao na de tu di zeng zhi shui shao yu jin e 
shu yu ying tui shui xiang mu 
guang zhou jin yu lan wan xiang mu 
bai yue wan xiang mu 
jun wei quan bu wan cheng xiao shou 
tu di zeng zhi shui yin fa re yi 
sui ran wan ke xian ru 
qian shui feng bo 
zhi ming di chan shang ren zhi qiang zai qi wei bo shang cheng 
yang shi jiang wan ke dang cheng qian shui de lao hu tong da 
wo bu zhi dao wan ke shi fou qian shui 
dan wo cong yang shi bao dao zhong kan bu chu wan ke shi fou qian shui 
yang shi mei zheng ming yi ju bei na shui tiao jian de lou pan wei jie suan zeng zhi shui 
ye wei zheng ming wei jiao zeng zhi shui de yu e yu zhe xie ying jie suan xiang mu di guan xi 
shang hai yi ju fang di chan yan jiu yuan fu yuan zhang yang hong xu ye zai qi wei bo shang biao shi 
tu di zeng zhi shui zhi qiu shi 
shou yao ze ren zai shui wu ju 
er zhe ci ta zai ci cuo wu de jiang zhu yao mao tou zhi xiang fang qi 
you san zhong qing kuang bi xu qing suan 
you si zhong qing kuang shui wu ju ke yao qiu na shui ren jin xing qing suan 
man san nian reng wei xiao shou wan bi 
suo pu wan ke xiang mu 
shui ju mei yao qiu qing suan 
dan zhu ming cai jing ping lun yuan ma guang yuan ze zhi chu 
wan ke de hui ying yi jing lu chu po zhan 
ji lin wan ke cheng 
shu yu tui shui xiang mu 
shuo ming yi jing da dao qing suan tiao jian 
wu lun bu hai shi tui 
dou ying qing suan 
dan wan ke mei you qing suan 
zhe shi shi shi 
kuang qie shi tui shi bu ye bu shi wan ke shuo le suan 
zui ben de mao 
zhi yao jiao zhen 
ye neng zhua zhu zui cong ming de lao shu 
sui mo nian zhong 
tu di zeng zhi shui zhe bi hu tu zhang gai gao qing chu le 
quan guo lv xie cai shui fa zhuan ye wei yuan hui wei yuan 
shang hai xin min lv shi shi wu suo he huo ren liu fu yuan lv shi ceng xiang mei ti biao shi 
yang shi tu di zeng zhi shui zheng yi zui da de jia zhi shi 
jiang tu di zeng zhi shui de li fa li bi yu xiao guo zai yi ci gong zhi yu zhong 
yin qi tao lun 
zai ta kan lai 
jiu fa lv zhi ding de chu zhong he shi ji xiao guo zhi jian de cha yi 
tu di zeng zhi shui shi yi ge hen hao de li zheng 
zhong xin wang fang chan pin dao 
shen zhen shi gui hua he guo tu zi yuan wei yuan hui zuo tian tou lu 
shen zhen shi zheng fu qian tian chu tai 
shen zhen shi ren min dai biao da hui chang wu wei yuan hui guan yu nong cun cheng shi hua li shi yi liu wei fa jian zhu de chu li jue ding shi dian shi shi ban fa 
dui nong cun cheng shi hua li shi yi liu wei fa jian zhu cai qu fen lei chu li 
dui fei yuan cun min suo jian zhu zhai lei wei jian 
yi fang di chan kai fa wei mu di suo jian zhu zhai lei wei jian bu yu chu li que ren 
dui yuan cun min 
yuan nong cun ji ti jing ji zu zhi 
zheng ti cong kuan 
jian mian fa kuan huo zhe di jia 
shen zhen shi gui hua he guo tu zi yuan wei yuan hui xiang guan fu ze ren biao shi 
dui li shi yi liu wei jian de chu li que ren shu yu you xian que ren 
reng xian zhi liu zhuan huo li 
xian zhi zheng de ban qian bu chang biao zhun 
yi shi wei fa zhe nan yi cong wei fa xing wei huo qu li yi 
zhong guo zhi shu yan jiu yuan fa bu 
bai cheng jia ge zhi shu 
shu ju xian shi 
zhang fu yu shang yue ji ben chi ping 
biao ming fang jia zou shi geng qu ping wen 
yu shang yue xiang bi 
tong bi lai kan 
an zhong wei shu ji suan 
zhang fu yu shang yue ji ben chi ping 
biao ming fang jia zou shi geng qu ping wen 
bu tong cheng shi zhang die fen hua ri yi ming xian 
ju ti lai kan 
zai yi xian cheng shi he bu fen re dian er xian cheng shi mi ji shou jin fang chan tiao kong zheng ce hou 
ben yue nan chang 
xia men xiang ji chu tai zheng ce 
tong guo shi xing cha bie hua zhu fang xin dai zheng ce 
gui fan shang pin fang yu shou guan li deng fang shi jia ma tiao kong 
bing ti chu zhu bu qu xiao 
gou fang ru hu 
shi chang yu qi jian qu ping wen 
gong qiu fang mian 
shi zhi nian mo 
da bu fen kai fa qi ye zai chao e wan cheng quan nian xiao shou mu biao hou 
tui pan liang jin ru ji jie xing di gu 
xiao fei zhe duo xuan ze ji xu guan wang 
deng dai ming nian ru shi de xin pan 
gai shu ju hai zhi chu 
yao geng jia zhu zhong fen lei zhi dao 
fang jia shang zhang ya li da de cheng shi yao cong yan luo shi ge xiang fang di chan shi chang tiao kong zheng ce he cuo shi 
zeng jia zhu fang yong de he zhu fang you xiao gong ying 
ku cun jiao duo de cheng shi yao zhu zhong xiao hua cun liang 
kong zhi xin kai fa zong liang 
zheng fu bao zhang he shi chang pei zhi jie he 
cheng shi fen lei zhi dao 
de zong ji diao xia 
sui zhe gong ying liang de jia da 
gong xu mao dun you wang huan jie 
hang ye fa zhan ri qu li xing 
dan bu tong cheng shi fen hua huo jiang jin yi bu jia ju 
shao shu re dian cheng shi gong bu ying qiu mao dun yi ran ming xian 
fang jia shang zhang ya li ji xu cun zai 
chong qing deng duo shu er san xian cheng shi gong xu ji ben jun heng 
fang jia zong ti ping wen 
shao shu san si xian gong ying chi xu gao yu xu qiu 
ruo huo bi zheng ce jin yi bu qu jin 
xu qiu bu zu he fang jia xia die feng xian ke neng xian xian 
zhong xin wang fang chan pin dao 
zhang liang fu zi zai xian chang 
mo te zhang liang yu er zi tian tian liang xiang 
yin fa quan chang shu ci jian jiao sheng 
zhang liang zai wu tai shou ci gong kai liang sang 
tian tian ze zhu 
yong yuan jian kang 
yong yuan xing fu 
tong zhen hua yu gan dong zhong ren 
zi cong shang le da re de qin zi zhen ren xiu jie mu 
ba ba qu na er 
zhang liang he er zi tian tian shun jian cheng wei zhong ren zhui peng dui xiang 
bing yong you yi piao fen si 
fu zi lia de liang xiang yin fa bu xiao zhang sheng 
yin can jia kua nian yan chu 
tian tian shou xian wei da jia song shang xin nian zhu fu 
zhu da jia xin nian kuai le 
shen ti jian kang 
ba ba qu na er 
tian tian hai ren shi le qi ta ji ge meng wa 
zhu chi qun wen dui ta men you shen me zhu fu 
tian tian xiang le xiang 
gao sheng shuo dao 
zhu ta men yong yuan jian kang 
yong yuan xing fu 
gan qing zhen zhi 
zhang liang sui shi mo te chu shen dan ta zuo wan que shou du liang sang 
dai lai yi shou 
wo bu shi nan shen 
da gai shi yin wei jin zhang 
chang ge qian ta bu wang jie chao dao 
zhe shi wo di yi ci chang zhe shou ge 
ke neng hui zou diao 
ye ke neng wang ci 
dan shi wo jue dui bu hui niao ku zi 
zhang liang yu tian tian hai he chang le 
ba ba qu na er 
yin fa quan chang da he chang 
ke neng you yu wu tai xiao guo yuan yin 
ge qu jie shu hou zhang liang yi fu shang jing sa man le yi ceng 
jian zhuang ta wei xiao biao shi 
kan wo xian chang huan le zhuang 
gao xiao yi yu dou le quan chang 
yun er yang mi zheng shuang liu shi shi su yan ye hen qing chun de nv xing 
zhe ge mei zi ting xiao qing xin de 
su yan zhao hen ke ai 
zi ran qing chun de bu duo le 
shou dao xin feng nei zhan xin de yi yuan qian he yi feng gan xie xin 
lao ren de zhen cheng tai rang ren gan dong le 
de lao ren xie xin 
ta shi yan liang qu zhong hang xi fei de li xiu lao ren 
shang che hou zai shen shang zhi zhao dao yi yuan ling qian 
zheng dang ta bu zhi gai zen me ban shi 
nin ba yi yuan qian tou jin qu jiu xing le 
zai nan men zhan xia che shi 
yi nian ban guo qu le 
lao ren jia xin li yi zhi dian ji zhe suo qian de yi yuan qian 
sui ran qian bu duo 
dan zhe shi gong jia de qian 
gong si yao fen ming 
di yi shi jian shou dao kuai di de fu wu ke ke zhang liu jie shuo 
lao ren de zhen cheng da dong le wo men 
wo men yi ding bang ta wan cheng zhe ge xin yuan 
ju fu wu ke gong zuo ren yuan jie shao 
you wei lao ren bo tong le gong jiao liu gong si fu wu re xian 
xun wen le gong si de di zhi 
zuo ri xia wu 
fu wu ke gong zuo ren yuan shou peng zhe 
de yi yuan qian 
jiang ta song wang gong jiao liu gong si shou yin zhong xin 
bang da he lao ren wan cheng le zhe ge 
ji zhe song jie 
ta yong can jue de fang shi 
jie shu le ben gai mei man de jia ting 
fu zhou gu lou qu chang chun hua yuan xiao qu 
shuang shuang yun ming 
wen xun gan lai de qi zi bei tong yu jue 
xiao qu ju min shuo 
ci qian ceng ting dao fu qi lia chao jia 
shi gu ju ti yuan yin 
jing fang yi jie ru diao cha 
ming tian jiu shi xin nian 
zen me bian cheng zhe yang 
zuo tian zhong wu 
ji zhe lai dao shi fa xian chang 
yang qiao lu chang chun hua yuan xiao qu men kou wei le xu duo ren 
huang mou he you zi de yi ti yi jing bei peng bu zhe qi lai le 
yin yue neng kan jian huang mou chuan zhe mian ku zi 
yi sheng zai xian chang ji jiu hou 
xuan bu liang ren yi dou mei you sheng ming ti zheng 
dang chang si wang 
huang mou de qi zi shi nv shi zuo zai di shang yi bian tong ku 
yi bian bao zhe er zi de shi ti 
ming tian jiu shi xin de yi nian le 
ben lai yao kai kai xin xin de 
zen me bian cheng zhe yang 
jia shu zai yi pang yi bian an wei ta 
yi bian ku zhe shuo 
hai zi hui liu chu geng duo xue 
shi jian wang hui dao tui ban ge xiao shi 
xiao qu ju min wang xian sheng mu du le zhe yi bei ju 
tu ran ting jian 
de yi sheng men xiang 
hui tou yi kan 
shi liang ge ren 
wang xian sheng gan jin hu jiu 
sui hou xiao qu ju min bao le jing 
huang mou de qi zi bing bu zai jia 
jie dao lin ju dian hua hou gan hui lai 
kan dao de que shi zhang fu he er zi bing liang de yi ti 
shei lai zhao gu hai zi 
fu qi ceng jing zheng chao 
ping shi bi jiao shao zai xiao qu li kan jian ta 
dao shi jing chang kan dao ta zai yang tai shang xi yi fu 
xiao qu ju min shuo 
huang mou zhi qian cong shi de zhi ye shi da yu wan 
xian zai zai wu liu gong si shang ban 
ping shi jie chu bu duo 
dan shi kan qi lai ting zheng chang de 
mei xiang dao hui zuo chu zhe me ji duan de shi 
ju zai chang zhi qing ren shi cheng 
zhi qian dou shi huang mou de yue fu yue mu dai 
fu qi lia gang dai bu jiu 
zhe ji tian hai zi sheng bing zai jia 
huang mou xiang rang yue fu yue mu lai zhao gu 
er ta de qi zi bu yuan yi 
xiang rang huang mou zi ji zhao gu hai zi 
liang ren yin ci fa sheng zheng chao 
fu qi liang ren chao jia shi you fa sheng 
qu nian shen zhi chao dao nao li hun 
lin ju ye shuo 
ceng jing ting dao zhe dui fu qi chao jia 
dan mei xiang dao 
huang mou jing ran dai zhe hai zi tiao lou 
dang tian xia wu 
huang mou he you zi de yi ti bei yun zou 
shi nv shi gui zai di shang 
jing shen huang hu 
nan nan zi yu 
ta de qin shu zai yi pang bao zhe ta 
hai xia du shi bao ji zhe chen kun lin dan shi xi sheng wu ling jing wen tu 
wei bo @ ling dian zhi biao shu ju 
yi ban ren wei 
xiao jin ku shi nan xing zhuan shu 
dan diao cha que xian shi le ling yi fan jing xiang 
xiao jin ku bu fen nan nv 
shang hai nan ren you xiao jin ku de bi li zui gao 
da ban shu yi shang 
wu han nv ren yong you si fang qian de ben ling ye bu zai hua xia 
ling dian diao cha wei bo fa bu le yi fen 
zhong nian wei ji diao cha 
qi zhong guan yu 
de diao cha xian shi 
zai zhe liu ge cheng shi zhong 
da bu fen fu qi dou ge zi yong you zi ji de si fang qian 
wu han nv ren zan si fang qian de bi li wei lie di yi 
er nan xing yong you si fang qian de bi li zhong 
ze shi shang hai nan ren zui gao 
chao guo yi ban 
wu han wang you bu dan ding le 
gan jin hui qu cha xia lao po de 
na you na me kua zhang 
zhe shu ju yi ding bu ke xue 
you si fang qian 
xiang zan zan bu xia lai 
dan shi bu gao su dui fang shu mu 
er wu han nan ren dui yu pei ou cun si fang qian ye xiang dang kuan rong 
shou ru yue gao de nv ren 
yue rong yi zan si fang qian 
shi yi ming qi hua 
ta jie hun liang nian 
ji ben mei zan shen me si fang qian 
mei ge yue gong zi jiu si wu qian yuan 
ai lv you ai guang jie ai kan dian ying 
dou yue guang le 
na you qian zan si fang qian 
ta xian zai mei shen me ya li 
ta lao gong zai yin hang gong zuo 
liang ren shou ru dou bu cuo 
lin na gei zi ji ling wai ban le zhang ka zhuan men zan si fang qian 
zhe xie lao gong zhi dao 
ye bu guo wen 
zuo wei nv ren 
yao xue hui zi wo bao hu 
zui hao de fang fa jiu shi zan dian si fang qian 
si fang qian yong chu ke da le 
yi ze kan dao xi huan de gui zhong dong xi bu bi xiang lao gong kai kou 
er ze ke zhi fu niang jia qin qing 
xiao shun fu mu 
san ze jia ting ying ji 
lao gong di di chuang ye qian le yi pi gu zhai 
er ta men jia gong tong cai chan zan shi dong bu le 
lao gong ji de tiao jiao 
shi wu han nan ren 
nv ren zan si fang qian ye bu cuo 
zhong gui huan shi wei le zhe ge jia 
zhi xu zhou guan fang huo 
bu xu bai xing dian deng 
fu qi ying gai hu xiang xin ren 
dou zan si na hai xiang ge jia 
xin nian qian xi 
guo jia zhu xi xi jin ping tong guo zhong guo guo ji guang bo dian tai 
zhong yang ren min guang bo dian tai 
ye cheng wei zhan hou de guo yu dong ou zhu guo gai shan guan xi de zhong yao li cheng bei 
bo lan te huo de nuo bei er he ping jiang 
an bei yu zhan fan zhi sun gao diao da gao er fu 
min diao xian shi 
ri min zhong fan dui can bai zhe chao guo zhi chi zhe 
zai guo ji she hui mi ji pi ping an bei can bai jing guo shen she de tong shi 
an bei ben ren si hu 
bu yi wei ran 
ta he ta de di di 
jia ji zhan fan an xin jie de sun zi an xin fu yi qi da gao er fu 
an xin fu shi an bei jin san de di di 
an bei shi an xin jie de wai sun 
ri ben mei ti bao dao 
ta dang tian yu shen wei wai wu sheng fu da chen de an xin fu yi qi wai chu da gao er fu 
ci hou hai yu ta gong jin wan can 
han guo mei ti cheng 
zai can bai jing guo shen she yi hou 
guo ji she hui dui 
chong bai jia ji zhan fan 
de zheng yi gao zhang 
dan an bei que gao diao yu qi zi sun an xin fu da gao er fu qiu 
an bei mian dui wai bu pi ping de di qi ye xu lai zi min yi 
ri ben mei ti jin ri min yi diao cha xian shi 
jin guan fan dui can bai de ri ben min zhong jiao duo 
dan zhi chi an bei zheng quan de min zhong tong yang zhan da duo shu 
min diao xian shi 
shi fou zhi chi an bei nei ge 
da da chao guo hui da 
min diao xian shi 
min zhong zhi chi an bei zheng fu de zhu yao yuan yin shi 
jing ji zhuang kuang hao 
han mei ti cheng 
an bei de you xian he zi xin gan jiu shi chu yu zhe yi dian 
zai min diao zhong 
ge guo fan dui can bai 
xu kao lv wai jiao guan xi 
mei guo zheng fu 
chong shen dui an bei can bai 
mei guo dui ri ben shou xiang an bei jin san can bai gong feng di er ci shi jie da zhan jia ji zhan fan de jing guo shen she gan dao shi wang 
mei guo zhu ri ben da shi guan sui ji fa biao sheng ming 
dui an bei can bai biao shi 
fu fa yan ren ha fu chong shen zhe yi li chang 
ri ben ling dao ceng cai qu de xing dong jiang jin yi bu jia ju ri ben yu lin guo de jin zhang guan xi 
wo men yin er gan dao shi wang 
mei fang yi zhi xi wang ri fang yu lin guo zhao dao jian she xing fang shi 
chu li min gan shi wu bing gai shan guan xi he tui dong he zuo 
han guo guo hui 
yi zhi tong guo jue yi qian ze an bei 
ren wei an bei can bai jing guo shen she shi gei ri han guan xi ji dong bei ya he ping yu wen ding 
dai lai yan zhong fu mian ying xiang de wai jiao tiao xin xing wei 
gai jue yi zhu zhang 
can bai jing guo shen she yu an bei zheng fu li zheng jie jin ji ti zi wei quan de xing dong shi 
qi tu mei hua qin lve zhan zheng 
fu huo jun guo zhu yi 
yao qiu ri ben zheng fu li ji ting zhi 
fou ding ren lei pu bian jia zhi de bu he shi yi xing wei 
zhen cheng fan xing he fu ze ren de zi tai 
mian dui li shi 
jue yi dun cu han guo zheng fu yan su ying dui an bei can bai xing wei 
yao qiu tong guo wai jiao nu li rang ri zheng fu bu zai fou ding qin lve li shi 
ru guo fan fu zuo chu bu fu he guo ji she hui pu bian jia zhi ji ren lei she hui liang xin de xing wei 
bu guan shi jing ji shi li duo me qiang da de guo jia 
ye wu fa bei ping jia wei yi liu guo jia 
zheng zhou shi wei shu ji wu tian jun zai zi zhu shou mai ji qian mai piao 
wu tian jun da cheng di tie jie shou cai fang 
zheng zhou dian shi tai 
zheng zhou xin wen 
yi ze xin wen cheng 
dang tian zao shang 
zheng zhou shi wei shu ji wu tian jun zai zheng dong xin qu kai wan hui hou 
lin shi jue ding cheng zuo di tie fan hui shi wei 
yu mi shu zai hui zhan zhong xin zhan zi zhu shou mai ji qian mai piao shi 
bei zheng zai cai fang de zheng zhou dian shi tai ji zhe ren chu 
wu tian jun zai di tie nei yu shi min jiao tan 
ting qu jian yi 
ta zai lv cheng guang chang zhan xia che 
ji zhe ou yu shi wei shu ji 
zai ci ri zao dao le wang luo yu lun zhi yi 
zhen de shi ou yu ma 
que ding bu shi an pai de 
ji zhe jiu ci shi cai fang she shi zheng zhou dian shi tai shi zheng pin dao ji zhe xu jin 
ta zai jie shou ji zhe ji zhe cai fang shi cheng 
yu shi wei shu ji que shi shi ou yu 
dui yu wang you de zhi yi 
zhe ze xin wen jian li zai xin wen zhen shi xing ji chu zhi shang 
wan quan jing de qi jian yan de 
mei gei wo men da zhao hu 
zheng zhou gui dao jiao tong you xian gong si zong he bu yi ming han xing bu zhang cheng 
zhi qian bing bu zhi dao shi wei shu ji yao lai cheng zuo di tie 
zhi dao shi wei shu ji zai ti yan wan hou gei gai dan wei ling dao da dian hua 
cai zhi dao ci shi 
gen wo men ling dao da le dian hua 
shuo ta ti yan le yi xia di tie 
zheng zhou tu jiang bao yu 
shi ren zheng zhou shi dai shi zhang de wu tian jun chi jiao zhan zai yu shui zhong yong shou tao du zhu pai shui guan dao de shu ye 
dang shi zhe yi mu bei yi ming wang you pai dao 
shang chuan dao wang luo hou 
wu tian jun bei cheng zhi wei 
zui mei shen ying 
shu ji xi huan dao chu zou zou 
zheng zhou shi wei xuan chuan bu xin wen chu yi gong zuo ren yuan dui ji zhe biao shi 
shi wei shu ji xi huan dao chu zou zou 
ping shi ye hui qi zi xing che zai shi li guang guang 
dui yu wang you zhi yi de 
ta cheng ke neng you yu da jia bu liao jie 
zao cheng guo fen jie du 
ju zheng zhou shi wei gong zuo ren yuan jie shao 
xin nian cha hua hui zai wei yu zheng dong xin qu de zheng zhou guo ji hui zhan zhong xin ju xing 
ruo yao cheng che gan wang zheng zhou shi wei dang wai ren shi zuo tan hui hui chang 
wu tian jun dan xin lu shang dan wu shi jian tai jiu 
jue ding cheng zuo gang gang kai tong de zheng zhou shou tiao di tie 
shun bian ti yan yi xia yun xing qing kuang 
ting shi min yi jian 
gen fang hai bei shu ji xie jue 
ni dang tian de gong zuo an pai shi 
ti qian yi tian wo men xin wen bu jiu dui zhou yi dang tian de bao dao jin xing le ce hua 
dang tian wo men fen san lu ji zhe 
fen bie qu di tie 
san huan lu he shi qu zhu gan dao cai fang 
lai kan shou ri jiao tong he ke liu qing kuang 
wo bei fen qu di tie cai fang 
wo he she xiang ji zhe cong lv cheng guang chang zhan yan lu cai fang dao hui zhan zhong xin zhan 
zai hui zhan zhong xin zhan cai fang shi 
hu ran fa xian zai zi zhu shou mai ji qian mai piao de ren hen yan shu 
zi xi yi kan 
ju ran shi shi wei shu ji wu tian jun 
ou yu shu ji hou 
ni de fan ying shi shen me 
chu yu xin wen ren de zhi ye min gan 
wo ma shang gen zhe qu le 
dang shi hai wen le shu ji neng bu neng gen zhe cai fang 
dan shu ji xie jue le 
shuo ni men mang ba 
fan zheng wo men ye hai mei cai fang wan 
wo ye bu xiang cuo guo zhe ge xin wen 
jiu gen shang le che gen pai 
yi zhi dao ta xia che 
ran hou wo men ba gong zuo ji xu zuo wan hou 
hui qu xiang bu men zhu ren he zhi ban bian ji hui bao le 
ta men dou jue de hen bu cuo 
jiu fang dao le dang tian di tie de xi lie bao dao dang zhong 
wei shen me xuan ze le 
hen que qie de shi shi 
er qie wo shi cai jing ji zhe 
shi yi ge yue qian wei ying jie di tie bao dao er bei chou diao qu de 
ye bu shi zhuan men gen ling dao pao de shi zheng ji zhe 
dang tian shi wei shu ji jiu zai hui zhan zhong xin di tie zhan fu jin kai hui 
shi wei jiu zai lv cheng guang chang zhan 
gang hao di tie zhi da 
ta ye shi lin shi jue ding 
nan zi chang mou jia cheng jia zhong you ji shi 
lan zhu yi si jia che che zhu yao qiu 
zhong tu ba dao xiang 
yao dian qian hua 
tong zhou jing fang tong bao 
xian yi ren chang mou yin she xian qiang jie bei xing ju 
qiang qian zhe ai qiu si ji 
zhao xian sheng zheng zhun bei jia che li kai shi 
cheng you ji shi zhao ji gan hui jia 
xiang zu che rang zhao xian sheng song yi xia 
zhao xian sheng da ying hou 
jiang gai nan zi song dao le mu di di 
dan gai nan zi que mei you xia che 
bing yi mei lian xi shang jia ren wei you 
rang zhao xian sheng zai jiang qi song hui chu fa de 
zai fan hui tu zhong 
zhao xian sheng tu ran jue de bo zi shang yi liang 
you da tui bei dao ci shang 
zuo zai fu jia shi wei zhi shang de na ming nan zi zheng shuang shou jin wo yi ba zhe die dao ding zhe ta 
ni zhe shi yao zuo shen me 
zhao xian sheng bian shuo bian ba che ting dao lu bian 
chen nan zi da hua de yi shun jian 
meng zhua dui fang de shuang shou 
jiang zhe die dao duo xia 
wo mei qian le 
ni gei wo dian qian hua 
gai nan zi bei duo xia dao hou 
bu duan xiang zhao xian sheng ai qiu fang guo ta 
zhao xian sheng rang dui fang zai che shang deng zhe 
yi tui bei zha shang xu mai yao bao za 
jin le lu bian de yi jia yao dian 
bing li ji bao jing 
xun luo che gan dao kong zhi xian yi ren 
jian you jing che shi lai 
che nei de qing nian nan zi shi tu tao pao 
jiu bei min jing en dao zai di shang 
bei kong zhi de nan zi wei chang mou 
yin jin qi shou tou jie ju chan sheng qiang jie nian tou 
jian zhao xian sheng du zi yi ren jia che 
jue ding ba zhao xian sheng zuo wei zuo an mu biao 
ke shi you yu xin xu 
qi shang che zhuan le yi ge duo xiao shi hou cai na chu dao zhun bei xia shou 
mei xiang dao dui fang li qi hen da 
bu dan mei you xia zhu che zhu 
zhe die dao hai bei dui fang duo qu 
xin jing bao xun 
guan yu jin yi bu jia qiang lao nian ren you dai gong zuo de yi jian 
yao qiu zheng fu he she hui zai zuo hao gong min she hui bao zhang he ji ben gong gong fu wu de ji chu shang 
yu deng fang mian 
ji ji wei lao nian ren ti gong ge zhong xing shi de jing ji bu tie 
you xian you hui he bian li fu wu 
bu duan ti sheng lao nian ren sheng huo zhi liang 
ti chu lao nian ren you dai gong zuo de zhu yao mu biao shi 
shi xian xian ji yi shang ren min zheng fu quan mian jian li jian quan lao nian ren you dai zheng ce 
she hui jing lao fen wei geng jia nong hou 
shi xian you dai gong zuo guan li jin yi bu gui fan 
you dai xiang mu jin yi bu tuo zhan 
you dai shui ping jin yi bu ti sheng 
lao nian ren guo shang geng jia xing fu de xiao kang sheng huo 
cong zheng wu fu wu 
wei sheng bao jian 
jiao tong chu xing 
shang ye fu wu 
wen ti xiu xian 
wei quan fu wu deng fang mian dui lao nian ren you dai gong zuo ti chu yao qiu 
ru zai wei sheng bao jian you dai fang mian 
lao you bing can yun 
zai wen ti xiu xian you dai fang mian 
yao qiu ge ji ge lei bo wu guan 
gong gong tu shu guan 
wen hua guan deng gong gong wen hua fu wu she shi 
xiang lao nian ren mian fei kai fang deng 
you dian min zheng bu jin ri fa chu 
guan yu kai zhan gong ban yang lao ji gou gai ge shi dian gong zuo de tong zhi 
ti chang da zhong cheng shi shi ji min zheng bu men ju ban de gong ban yang lao ji gou you xian kai zhan gai ge shi dian 
bing yao qiu gong ban yang lao ji gou ming que zhi neng ding wei 
you xian bao zhang gu lao you fu dui xiang 
jing ji kun nan de gu gua 
gao ling deng lao nian ren de fu wu xu qiu 
chong fen fa hui tuo di zuo yong 
shi dian gong zuo yao yi lao nian ren jing ji zhuang kuang he shen ti zhuang kuang ping gu wei zhong dian 
jian li jian quan yang lao fu wu ping gu zhi du 
yi zeng jia ru zhu yang lao ji gou de gong kai tou ming xing wei zhong dian 
jian li jian quan she hui ping yi he gong shi zhi du 
que bao gong ban yang lao ji gou zhi neng luo shi dao wei 
gong ban yang lao ji gou ying dang jia da ji chu she shi gai zao 
tuo zhan fu wu gong neng 
tuo kuan fu wu fan wei 
ti gao hu li xing chuang wei de shu liang he bi zhong 
fa hui mian xiang she hui shi fan pei xun 
tiao kong yang lao fu wu shi chang 
hua jie min ban yang lao ji gou yin zan ting huo zhong zhi fu wu dao zhi de lao nian ren an zhi feng xian deng zuo yong 
gong ban yang lao ji gou te bie shi xin jian ji gou ying dang zhu bu tong guo gong jian min ying deng fang shi 
gu li she hui li liang yun ying 
tong guo yun ying bu tie 
gou mai fu wu deng fang shi 
zhi chi gong jian min ying ji gou fa zhan 
pan jue shu hai xian shi zheng li wei xing shi zai tao ren yuan 
zheng li wei yan gai zhen shi shen fen 
shi yong fei fa qu de de xu jia hu ji shen fen 
huo tong bei gao ren luo bo te cai yong dui wai bian zao luo bo te wei guo wai da xing ji jin guan li ren 
de guo da jia zu ji cheng ren deng shen fen 
yi zhang kong ju e ji jin zai zhong guo kai zhan rong zi 
tou zi deng jin rong ye wu wei ming 
pian qu ta ren xin ren 
yi zai shen zhen shi kai she de liang jia tou zi gong si zuo wei zha pian zai ti 
xu gou xiang mu dui wai kai zhan he zuo tou zi 
dai wei li cai 
gou mai tu di deng ye wu 
xian hou pian qu bei hai ren zhang yong qian 
liu hai long deng ren de zi jin hou 
you tong guo chai dong qiang bu xi qiang de shou fa 
xiao bu fen yong yu zhi fu li xi 
da bu fen ze tong guo 
di xia qian zhuang 
ji qi zai jing nei wai kai she de gong si 
ge ren zhang hu jin xing duo ci zhuan yi 
jiang ta ren ju e zi jin fei fa zhan wei ji you 
fa yuan ren ding de shu e yu ci qian gong su ji guan qi su jin e you xie xu cha yi 
gai an shou hai ren duo shi shang jie ming ren 
mu qian chu xi kai mu shi de zheng yao ming dan hai mei you zui hou que ding 
xian zai yi jing ming que de shi 
zheng fu shou nao huo zhe guo wang jiang chu xi kai mu shi 
yi xie ou zhou guo jia ling dao ren ju jue chu xi suo qi dong ao hui 
bao kuo fa guo zong tong ao lang de he de guo zong tong gao ke 
che chen kong bu tou mu ceng yang yan 
shi yong zui da li liang 
po huai suo qi dong ao hui 
jin guan bao zha an gei suo qi dong ao hui meng shang le yin ying 
ao wei hui dui e luo si zheng fu neng gou wei suo qi dong ao hui ti gong an quan bao zhang bao you xin xin 
jie zhi mu qian 
ru jin yue lai yue duo de ren zai sheng huo zhong 
ji bu li shou 
shen zhi xi deng lin shui qian hai yao mo hei er wan shou ji 
ran er jin ri you wang you fa wei bo cheng 
you yu chang qi shui qian guan deng kan shou ji 
jing zao yu duan zan 
yan ke zhuan jia biao shi 
hei an zhong wan shou ji zhi mang yi shuo yan guo qi shi 
dan zhe di que shi bu jian kang de sheng huo xi guan 
yi dao zhi shi pi lao 
ti xing da jia ye jian shi yong shou ji ke zai chuang bian kai zhan deng 
bing shi dang diao di shou ji ping mu liang du 
shui qian wan shou ji yan jing xian shi ming 
hei an zhong wan shou ji yi shi ming 
de xiao xi zai wang shang yi ji wei xin peng you quan shang yi chu 
yin fa guang fan guan zhu 
bu jin wei shi li dan you 
lin shui qian tang zai bei wo li shua wei bo 
kan dian ying yi jing cheng le ta men de ri chang xi guan zhi yi 
bao nv shi jiu ceng yin wei chang chang ban ye guan deng da you xi 
dao zhi shi li chu xian wen ti 
ta gao su bei jing chen bao ji zhe 
na wan wo xiang wang chang yi yang hei zhe deng 
tang chuang shang wan you xi 
na shi yi kuan kao cha yan li de zhi li you xi 
xu yao te bie zi xi ding zhe ping mu cai neng da tong guan 
ke wan zhe wan zhe 
wo tu ran gan jue you yan kan dong xi mo hu qi lai 
dang shi hai yi wei shi zi ji wang le zhai yin xing 
ke hou lai fa xian yi jing zhai le 
wo zhe cai yi shi dao you yan shi 
ke ba wo xia huai le 
gan jin guan ji shui jiao 
di er tian yi jiao xing lai 
shi li jiu hui fu zheng chang le 
jing li guo zhe ci jiao xun hou 
bao nv shi zai bu gan zai wan shang zhang shi jian wan shou ji le 
da bu fen wang you zai cai fang zhong biao shi 
wan shang zai hei an zhong wan shou ji shi jian yi jiu 
chang gan dao yan jing fa suan fa zhang 
ge bie wang you de shi li hai ji ju xia jiang 
jin shi jia shen 
shou ji ping mu xiang dui jiao xiao 
zhu yi li you yao zhang shi jian gao du ji zhong zai yi ge fa guang ping shang 
yan jing ken ding hui bu shu fu 
wang you fan xian sheng gao su ji zhe 
wo he shen bian peng you dou you guo wan shou ji shi jian shao zhang yan jing jiu hui chu xian chong ying di qing kuang 
yao guo hen jiu cai neng hui fu 
zhi mang wu yi ju yong yan xu shi du 
guan deng hou zai hei an zhong wan shou ji 
zhen de hui chan sheng zhe me da de wei hai ma 
ji zhe jiu ci zi xun le zhong guo zhong yi ke xue yuan yan ke yi yuan shi wang mo ke chao guo jun zhu ren 
hei an zhong wan shou ji zhi mang 
zhe zhong shuo fa mu qian que fa xiang guan ke xue yi ju 
yan jing tu ran kan bu jian le 
duo ban shi shi wang mo dong mai jing luan fa sheng gong xue bu zu suo zao cheng 
bu guo zan shi xing 
di qing kuang zai ai wan shou ji de ren zhong hai shi bi jiao pu bian de 
zhi yao ri hou jia qiang zhu yi 
bu yao guo du yong yan 
ying gai jiu bu hui zai chu xian le 
chao zhu ren biao shi 
chang qi ru shui qian guan deng wan shou ji shi yi zhong bu liang xi guan 
dui shi li hui you yi ding ying xiang 
yan jing rong yi gan se suan zhang 
yi yin qi yan bu de pi lao 
bei jing de sheng men zhong yi yuan yan ke zhuan jia ti xing guang da wang you 
ping shi jin liang bu yao guo du shi yong dian zi she bei 
shi yong ban xiao shi xu yao xiu xi yi xia 
ruo yao zai ye jian shi yong shou ji 
ke yi xuan ze zai pang bian kai zhan di liang du de bei jing deng 
yi jian shao liang guang dui yan jing de ci ji 
huo zhe tiao zheng shou ji ping mu de dui bi du 
shi liang du he se ze jin liang rou he xie 
zhe yang ke yi shi dang jiang di yan jing de fu he 
chu jiu ying xin 
yu shi jue ding tu bu cong an hui lai an zou dao nan jing de liu he 
ta mei le li qi 
ji han jiao po zai lu bian se se fa dou 
xun luo min jing kan dao le zhe yi mu 
zui zhong jiang ta an quan song dao le fu mu shen bian 
liu he fen ju cheng qiao pai chu suo min jing xun luo zhi cheng qiao jie dao gui hua cun lu kou shi 
fa xian yi ming xiao huo zuo zai lu bian se se fa dou 
xiao huo zi xing xu 
liu he xiong zhou jie dao ling yan ren 
wo zhe ye shi xiang liu ge te bie de ji nian 
mei xiang dao gao gu le zi ji 
xiao xu xiang min jing jie shao shuo 
zi ji zai an hui lai an shang ban 
yin wei yuan dan ti qian fang jia 
shi jian bi jiao chong yu 
ta jiu bu xiang zuo che hui jia le 
er shi jue ding tu bu 
suan shi yi zhong tiao zhan ba 
lai ying jie xin nian
