dan wei xia ban hou 
ta jian dan chi le dian dong xi jiu kai shi chu fa 
yin wei tian hei mi le lu 
jia zhi shou ji mei you dian le 
xiao xu zai han feng zhong se se fa dou 
yu shi dun zai lu bian yi la ji xiang pang bi han 
min jing jiang xiao xu dai hui pai chu suo 
ti gong le shui he shi wu 
he shi qing kuang hou 
you lian ye jiang ta an quan song zhi fu mu shen bian 
yi zhong yang xin jiang gong zuo zuo tan hui wei biao zhi 
xin jiang jin ru xin shi qi 
jing guo san nian duo nu li 
xin jiang jing ji she hui fa zhan zhan zai xin de li shi qi dian shang 
chong fen li yong hou fa you shi 
zeng qiang zheng ti zong he jing zheng li 
cheng shi er shang kai chuang xin ju mian 
zhan zai xin qi dian yong hao xin ji yu 
jiu yao lao lao ba wo quan mian shen hua gai ge de mu biao ren wu 
shi ba jie san zhong quan hui kai qi le wo guo xin de gai ge chuang kou 
ju you zhong da xian shi yi yi he shen yuan li shi ying xiang 
zhe wei xin jiang fa hui du te you shi 
po jie fa zhan wen ding nan ti 
kai tuo gong zuo xin ju mian ti gong le nan de ji yu 
mian dui wei lai 
xin jiang zhi you quan mian shen hua gai ge 
cai neng shi fang chu xin jiang ke xue kua yue 
hou fa gan chao de ju da dong li huo li 
cai neng zhao dao po jie ge zhong mao dun nan ti de ban fa 
ye cai neng kai chuang xin jiang gong zuo de xin ju mian 
yong hao zhe yi xin ji yu 
wo men bi xu cong quan ju he zhan lve gao du 
yi shen hua gai ge chong fen ji huo ge lei yao su 
ba xin jiang de qian zai you shi zhuan hua wei xian shi dong li 
yao qie shi zeng qiang ji yu yi shi 
ze ren yi shi 
jian ding xin xin 
yong yu ying jie tiao zhan 
jian jue po chu ge fang mian ti zhi ji zhi bi duan 
yi quan mian shen hua gai ge de xin cheng xiao 
tui dong xin jiang kua yue shi fa zhan he chang zhi jiu an qu de xin sheng li 
ji yu ling ren zhen fen 
geng cui ren xing dong 
xin jiang nei wai ji yu ju he 
you shi tu xian 
wo men you li you xiang xin 
zhi yao quan qu shang xia ji xu kai tuo jin qu 
qiang zhua ji yu 
yong hao ji yu 
wo men jiu yi ding neng shi xian xin tu po 
zai dang de qun zhong lu xian jiao yu shi jian huo dong zhong 
xin jiang wei wu er zi zhi qu min zheng ting ba jia kuai jie jue she ji ren min qun zhong qie shen li yi de wen ti 
nu li wei ren min qun zhong ti gong bian jie gao xiao de fu wu ping tai 
zuo wei zheng gai luo shi de gen ben chu fa dian he luo jiao dian 
ba qun zhong man yi du zuo wei jian yan zheng gai xiao guo de biao zhun 
que bao jiao yu shi jian huo dong qu de shi xiao 
min zheng ting zha shi tui jin zhong dian min sheng gong cheng zhong she ji she hui jiu zhu gong zuo de cheng xiang di bao ti sheng gong cheng 
jian quan cheng xiang yi liao jiu zhu zhi du 
jin qiu gong cheng 
kun nan qun ti ji kun gong cheng deng zhong dian min sheng gong cheng 
jiu zhu xiao yi he she hui xiao yi xian zhu ti sheng 
di bao bu zhu shui ping ti gao fu du wei li nian zui da 
bao zhang fan wei de quan fu gai 
wei cheng xiang kun nan qun zhong gou jian qi le zui hou yi dao an quan bao zhang wang 
zi zhi qu min zheng ting jian chi 
yi min wei ben 
wei min jie kun 
de gong zuo li nian 
zai luo shi ge xiang di bao zhi du de tong shi 
an zhao zi zhi qu de an pai bu shu 
jian li jian quan le she hui jiu zhu bao zhang biao zhun he wu jia shang zhang gua gou lian dong ji zhi 
wei cheng xiang di bao dui xiang fa fang jia ge bu tie 
you xiao huan jie le wu jia shang zhang dui kun nan qun zhong sheng huo de ying xiang 
yu ci tong shi 
jian quan cheng xiang yi liao jiu zhu zhi du 
ji ji kai zhan er ci da bing yi liao jiu zhu 
mi ri gu li   wu 
xin nian lai lin zhi ji 
tuan jie jin qu gai ge chuang xin fen li tui jin xin jiang kua yue shi fa zhan he chang zhi jiu an 
de xin nian he ci 
quan wen ru xia 
zai xin nian lai lin zhi ji 
wo jin dai biao zi zhi qu dang wei 
zi zhi qu ren min zheng fu 
xiang quan qu ge zu ren min 
xiang ren min jie fang jun zhi zhan yuan 
wu jing guan bing 
gong an min jing 
xiang dui kou yuan jiang gan bu 
zhong yang zhu jiang dan wei guang da gan bu zhi gong yi ji suo you guan xin zhi chi xin jiang ge xiang shi ye fa zhan de ge jie peng you zhi yi xin nian de wen hou he liang hao de zhu yuan 
xiang jie ri qi jian bu ci xin ku 
jian shou gong zuo gang wei de tong zhi men biao shi qin qie de wei wen 
zai dang zhong yang 
guo wu yuan de qin qie guan huai he dui kou yuan jiang sheng shi 
guo jia you guan bu wei de zhi chi bang zhu xia 
zi zhi qu dang wei 
zi zhi qu ren min zheng fu tuan jie dai ling quan qu ge zu gan bu qun zhong 
shen ru guan che ke xue fa zhan guan 
wen zhong qiu jin 
jin zhong qiu bian 
de gong zuo zong ji diao 
tong chou tui jin 
ge xiang gong zuo 
jing ji wen bu chi xu zeng zhang 
she hui shi ye bu duan jin bu 
fa zhan cheng guo jin yi bu hui ji min sheng 
xiang zhe ke xue kua yue 
hou fa gan chao mu biao you mai chu le yi da bu 
cheng nuo de zhong dian min sheng gong cheng quan bu dui xian 
ge zu qun zhong sheng huo xian zhu gai shan 
shen ru kai zhan dang de qun zhong lu xian jiao yu shi jian huo dong 
jin yi bu qiang hua zong zhi yi shi 
xin xi qun zhong 
tie jin ji ceng 
zhuan bian gong zuo zuo feng 
jian jue luo shi zhong yang bu shu 
zhu dong chu ji 
xian fa zhi di 
yan li da ji yi xi lie bao kong fan zui huo dong 
xia hao xian shou qi 
da hao zhu dong zhang 
lao lao zhang wo yi shi xing tai ling yu fan fen lie dou zheng zhu dong quan 
yi qu ji duan hua wei mu biao 
yi fa zhi li fei fa zong jiao huo dong 
e zhi zong jiao ji duan si xiang shen tou 
que bao le xin jiang she hui zheng zhi da ju he xie wen ding 
xin jiang jing ji fa zhan 
min sheng gai shan 
min zu tuan jie 
ge xiang shi ye zheng zheng ri shang 
shi ba jie san zhong quan hui jing shen 
quan mian shen hua gai ge de guan jian yi nian 
ye shi wo men ba wo ji yu 
cheng shi er shang 
tui jin xin jiang kua yue shi fa zhan he chang zhi jiu an de zhong yao yi nian 
wo men jiang jin yi bu ning xin ju li 
quan mian guan che luo shi dang de shi ba da 
shi ba jie san zhong quan hui 
zhong yang jing ji gong zuo hui yi he zhong yang xin jiang gong zuo zuo tan hui jing shen 
an zhao zi zhi qu dang wei ba jie liu ci quan wei 
hui yi he zi zhi qu dang wei jing ji gong zuo hui yi an pai bu shu 
jian chi wen zhong qiu jin 
gai ge chuang xin 
jin jin zhua zhu he yong hao li shi ji yu 
jian ding bu yi tui jin 
jia kuai zhuan fang shi diao jie gou 
wei rao shen hua gai ge cu jin jing ji chi xu jian kang fa zhan 
lao lao ba wo xiang xi kai fang li shi ji yu 
zheng dang gong jian 
si chou zhi lu jing ji dai 
de pai tou bing 
nu li ba xin jiang jian cheng 
si chou zhi lu jing ji dai 
de he xin qu 
nu li xing cheng quan fang wei dui wai kai fang xin ge ju 
jian chi zi yuan kai fa ke chi xu 
sheng tai huan jing ke chi xu 
jia qiang sheng tai wen ming jian she 
rang mei li xin jiang geng tian mei li 
zhuo li bao zhang he gai shan min sheng 
zha shi tui jin min sheng jian she 
rang ge zu qun zhong gong ping gong zheng xiang shou gai ge fa zhan de cheng guo 
yi xian dai wen hua wei yin ling 
tui dong wen hua fa zhan fan rong 
wei shi xian kua yue shi fa zhan he chang zhi jiu an ti gong qiang da de wen hua zhi cheng he jing shen dong li 
she hui wen ding 
chang zhi jiu an shi wo men yi qie gong zuo de zhuo yan dian he zhuo li dian 
wo men yao gao ju ge min zu da tuan jie de qi zhi 
gao ju han wei guo jia zui gao li yi he ge zu ren min gen ben li yi 
han wei fa lv zun yan de qi zhi 
quan li que bao xin jiang she hui da ju wen ding 
rang ge zu ren min sheng huo geng jia he xie mei hao 
xing fu an ning 
cheng ji lai zhi bu yi 
bi xu bai bei zhen xi 
ren wu jian ju fan zhong 
geng yao mai tou ku gan 
mian dui xin ji yu xin xing shi xin ren wu 
rang wo men jin mi tuan jie zai yi xi jin ping tong zhi wei zong shu ji de dang zhong yang zhou wei 
jian chi zhi you nu li cai neng gai bian 
zhi yao nu li jiu neng gai bian 
jie fang si xiang 
qiang zhua ji yu 
bian hua bian ge 
gan yu dan dang 
wei quan mian jian cheng xiao kang she hui 
shi xian xin jiang kua yue shi fa zhan he chang zhi jiu an er nu li fen dou 
zhu wei da zu guo xin xin xiang rong 
zhu xin jiang de ming tian geng jia mei hao 
zhu quan qu ge zu ren min xin nian kuai le 
he jia xing fu 
ji zhe cong xin jiang wei wu er zi zhi qu di san ci quan guo jing ji pu cha ling dao xiao zu ban gong shi huo xi 
wu nian yi ci de di san ci quan guo jing ji pu cha zheng shi deng ji gong zuo zai xin jiang quan mian zhan kai 
zi zhi qu di san ci quan guo jing ji pu cha ling dao xiao zu ban gong shi zhu ren 
zi zhi qu tong ji ju zong tong ji shi wang yu cang shuo 
pu cha deng ji shi zheng ge jing ji pu cha gong zuo de zhong zhong zhi zhong 
ge bei diao cha dui xiang shen bao de shu ju shi fou quan mian 
shi jue ding zheng ge jing ji pu cha gong zuo cheng bai de guan jian suo zai 
xi wang diao cha dui xiang neng gou yi zhao 
ru shi tian bao tong ji xin xi 
zhe shi mei yi ge qi ye 
mei yi ge dan wei de fa ding yi wu 
gui ding de fa ding quan li 
dui yu yi xie pu cha dui xiang dan xin de qi ye ji mi shu ju hui fou bei xie lou wen ti 
wang yu cang shuo 
quan guo jing ji pu cha tiao li 
dou ming que gui ding 
suo you de pu cha ji gou 
suo you de pu cha yuan dou fu you dui bei diao cha dui xiang de xin xi bao mi de yi wu 
ru guo xie lou bei diao cha dui xiang de xin xi jiu yao cheng dan fa lv ze ren 
tong guo pu cha suo huo de de zhe xie xin xi 
zhi neng yong yu tong ji de mu di 
ye jiu shi shuo xiang guan bu men zhi neng fa bu zong he he zong ti de shu ju 
er bu de fa bu ge ti de ju ti xin xi 
pu cha suo huo de de xin xi 
bu neng zuo wei ren he qi ta bu men shi shi chu fa de yi ju 
xin jiang ge de de pu cha yuan jin ru qi ye 
dan wei deng jin xing deng ji shi 
dou jiang pei bei fa ding zheng jian ji tong yi de pu cha yuan zheng huo pu cha zhi dao yuan zheng jian 
zheng jian shang zhu ming you pu cha yuan de xing ming he guo jia pu cha ji gou ming cheng de gai zhang 
you xin jiang sou suo 
xin jiang tou tiao he xin jiang mei shi zhu ban 
xin jiang fa bu 
wu lu mu qi fa bu 
xin jiang gong qing tuan deng xie ban de 
xin jiang   chuan yue   shi shang 
guo le ge yu zhong bu tong de xin nian 
ben ci kua nian pai dui shi quan guo shou ci you zheng wu wei bo yu cao gen wei bo 
min jian li liang lian shou ju ban de wang luo huo dong 
jie zhu wang luo ping tai he pai dui mo shi 
zhu da shi shang xin jiang 
chuan bo zheng neng liang 
rang geng duo de ren kan dao xin jiang de fa zhan bian hua 
ben ci pai dui gong fen wei 
wo de wu tai wo zuo zhu 
yin wei ai   wo wei xin jiang dai yan 
yong ai quan shi xin jiang 
ci jiu ying xin   kuang huan ye 
si ge zhang jie 
pai dui shang hai lai le bu shao qing chun zheng neng liang de dai biao 
bi ru wu lu mu qi shi di wu xiao xue de zu qiu dui 
hai zi men lian shang de xiao rong dian liang le xian chang guan zhong de xi wang 
de xin jiang tui wu nv bing 
ta men bao xiao zu guo 
fang yan shi jie di qing huai bu jin liu zai le 
hai yin zai le zai chang mei yi ge ren de xin zhong 
xin jiang hu lian wang xin xi ban gong shi wang luo xie tiao chu fu chu zhang li wan hui shuo 
ye shi yi ci jiang xu ni wang luo he xian shi rong he de pai dui 
jin hou jiang tui chu geng duo shi shang de huo dong 
su zao shi shang 
you ju da fa zhan qian li de xin jiang 
shi xin jiang neng gou yin ling shi shang 
zi ran zhi feng 
dong shao hua zhang xiang di wen jie 
wei ju quan guo di yi 
quan qu an ju fu min gong cheng bao zhi bao liang chao e wan cheng le nian du mu biao ren wu 
yu ci tong shi 
ji zhong zheng he nong cun huan jing zong he zheng zhi 
gai shui gai ce 
xiang cun dao lu 
dian wang sheng ji gai zao deng xiang mu zi jin 
ji ji zheng qu yuan jiang sheng shi geng da zhi chi 
wan shan an ju fu min gong cheng pei tao ji chu she shi jian she 
man zu ge zu qun zhong sheng chan sheng huo shi ji xu qiu 
shi shi an ju fu min gong cheng 
bi xu chong fen zun zhong qun zhong yi yuan 
ren he di fang bu de gao qiang xing ji zhong 
ge de ying zai qu fen nong mu qu bu tong qing kuang 
zhu zhong bao liu cun zhuang yuan shi feng mao 
jia da chuan tong cun luo he min ju bao hu li du 
jin ke neng zai yuan you cun zhuang xing tai shang gai shan ju min zhu fang tiao jian 
shi xian di yu te se 
min zu feng mao he shi dai te zheng de you ji jie he 
yi cu jin xin xing cheng zhen hua he xin nong cun jian she de xie tiao tui jin 
shi ju ti ren wu ke kan chu 
zhu hong chang guan hong jiang 
xin jiang wei wu er zi zhi qu jian yi yong wei ji jin hui ju xing zuo tan hui 
huan ying xin jiang rong huo di shi jie 
quan guo jian yi yong wei ying xiong si ji cheng hao de liang wei si ji 
yi ji rong huo gai ping xuan huo dong you xiu cheng shi jiang de a ke su di qu de dai biao zai yu gui lai 
quan guo jian yi yong wei ying xiong si ji ping xuan biao zhang da hui zai bei jing ju xing 
rong yu cheng hao 
zi zhi qu di san jie jian yi yong wei dao de mo fan 
zai liang nian duo de ying yun zhong 
mian dui dai tu duo ci ting shen er chu 
zi zhi qu jian yi yong wei gong zuo xian jin dan wei 
zhe ci yi quan guo di er ming de cheng ji rong huo quan guo jian yi yong wei ying xiong si ji ping xuan huo dong you xiu cheng shi jiang 
jin liang nian lai 
a ke su di qu ge xian 
xian hou biao zhang jiang li 
quan guo jian yi yong wei ying xiong si ji ping xuan huo dong 
you zhong hua jian yi yong wei ji jin hui he zhong guo shi you tian ran qi ji tuan gong si gong tong zhu ban 
chu di san jie wai 
xin jiang mei jie dou you rong huo zhe yi jiang xiang de si ji 
zi zhi qu chu tai le 
zi zhi qu jian yi yong wei ren yuan jiang li he bao hu ban fa 
kuo da le jian yi yong wei ren yuan que ren biao zhang fan wei 
ti gao le jian yi yong wei ren yuan jiang li fu xu biao zhun 
jian li le jian yi yong wei ren yuan gen zong fu wu zhi du 
zi zhi qu jian yi yong wei ji jin hui jiang bian ji chu ban 
xin jiang jian yi yong wei ying mo pu 
mei yue yi yuan qian 
jian yi yong wei ai xin juan zeng huo dong 
jian li jian quan 
jian yi yong wei zhi yuan zhe 
you yu shou dao di wen 
duo yu deng yin su ying xiang 
shi xin jiang mian hua shou gou deng ji de dao ti sheng 
zai ti gao le xin jiang mian hua shou gou qi ye li run kong jian de tong shi 
ye cu jin le xin jiang mian nong shou ru zeng jia 
suo chu shou de mian hua deng ji dou da dao le bai mian yi ji 
er ji biao zhun 
yin ci shou ru zeng jia bu shao 
zi zhi qu xian wei jian yan ju fu ju zhang ning ji rong jie shao 
cai yong zi dong hua jian ce ji shu 
yu guo ji guan li jie gui 
cong er ti xian mian hua jian yan de gong zheng xing 
ke guan xing he zhun que xing 
xin biao zhun jian yan xiang mu fen wei mian hua yan se 
ma ke long zhi deng qi ge zhi biao 
xin jiang qi hou gan zao 
shi he mian hua sheng zhang 
mian hua deng ji dou jiao gao 
yin ci shi shi de mian hua xin biao zhun 
dui xin jiang mian nong lai shuo shi you hao chu de 
ning ji rong shuo 
bo le shi da lei te zhen yi ken hao xi cun cun min wang yu hua shi bo le shi de zhong mian da hu 
wang yu hua shuo 
qi ta dou shi ji xie hua cai shou 
rang ta mei you xiang dao de shi 
qu nian de ji cai mian deng ji jing ran ye da dao le bai mian er ji 
san ji biao zhun 
wang yu hua shuo 
yin wei dou shi ren gong cai shou 
ding ji ji ben shi yi ji 
er ji biao zhun 
ning ji rong jie shao 
wang nian mian hua zhi you qi ge deng ji biao zhun 
shi an zhao mian hua za zhi di duo shao lai ding de 
yong cai mian ji cai shou de mian hua you yu za zhi duo 
deng ji zhi neng da dao si ji huo wu ji de biao zhun 
xin jiang chan de mian hua yin qi hou deng yin su 
yan se bi jiao bai 
suo yi dou neng da dao bai mian de biao zhun 
xin jiang sheng chan jian she bing tuan di ba shi shi xin jiang de zhong mian da qu 
mian hua dou shi cai yong ji xie hua cai shou 
wang nian ta men de mian hua deng ji dou shi si ji 
ning ji rong shuo 
bo le shi yin bo mian ye you xian ze ren gong si zong jing li wu xin guo gao su ji zhe 
zui cha de dou shi san ji 
mian nong dou you hao chu 
sui ran mian hua xin biao zhun de shi shi wei mian nong 
mian qi dai lai yi ding shou yi 
dan qi tui guang hai you dai jin yi bu shen ru 
bo le shi da lei te zhen fu zhen zhang ding bao jun shuo 
sui zhe mian hua xin biao zhun de quan mian tui guang 
mian nong dui mian hua de ding pin lun ji yi ding hui you geng jia shen ru de liao jie 
zai zhong zhi guan li shang xia gong fu 
cong er jin yi bu ti gao shou yi 
he ling wu zhong mei 
la che de ze shi zhe ge ji du ye ji dian di de liang wei yuan gong 
yi ci ji li gong si yuan gong xin de yi nian geng shang yi ceng lou 
dui yu zhe zhong fang shi shi fou shang ji zi zun de wen ti 
la che de yi wei yuan gong ma long gao su ji zhe 
yuan du fu shu 
yin wei zhe ge cheng fa ban fa shi gong si tuan dui gong tong shang liang zhi hou jue ding de 
zuo wei xiao shou ren yuan lai shuo zhi neng yong ye ji shuo hua 
shei ye bu ke neng yi zhi qu la che 
zhi yao zi ji ye ji zuo hao le 
yi yang you ji hui xiang shou 
tu wei ye ji guan jun wang jia chuan zhe long pao zuo zhe huang bao che xiang shou rong yu zhi lv 
zhao yu fei she 
you shi xin de yi nian 
you shi xin de yi tian 
dui yu peng bo xiang shang 
kuai su fa zhan de zhong guo lai shuo 
dan zai fei shi de guang yin zhong 
que liu xia le fen dou zhe shen shen de yin ji 
li shi jiang ji zhu shen me 
shi tai xing shen chu fang pin wen ku de xin xin xiang yin 
hai shi chang e ben yue yu tu ling kong de huan hu que yue 
shi diao jie gou zhuan fang shi de zha shi tui jin 
hai shi wen zeng zhang hui min sheng de wu shi zhi ju 
shi wei hu guo jia zhu quan he an quan de chen zhuo jian yi 
hai shi lv xing guo ji yi wu 
cu jin he ping fa zhan de you yi xin pian 
lao hu cang ying yi qi da 
de guo gan xing dong 
hai shi ba xiang gui ding zhua tie you hen de jian chi bu xie 
shi ken ying gu tou she xian tan 
zhong dian ling yu gai ge de zong shen tui jin 
hai shi qun zhong lu xian jiao yu shi jian huo dong suo huan fa chu de qiang da zheng neng liang 
po lang qian xing de zhong guo 
wan cheng le cheng shang qi xia de li shi jiao jie 
kai shi le ji wang kai lai de mou pian bu ju 
man huai dui min zu de ze ren 
dui ren min de ze ren 
dui dang de ze ren 
xin yi jie zhong yang ling dao ji ti 
jiang shi xian min zu fu xing de zhong guo meng hua wei yi wan ren min de zhi hui he li liang 
ji li zhe zhong hua er nv mai xiang xin de zheng cheng 
mian dui ji qi fu za de guo ji guo nei xing shi 
wo men zong lan quan ju 
shi zhong jian chi yi jing ji jian she wei zhong xin 
shi xian le jing ji she hui fa zhan wen zhong you jin 
wen zhong xiang hao de liang hao kai ju 
wo men rui yi chuang xin 
yong yi xi lie gai ge ju cuo bao chi fa zhan huo li 
ji chu nei sheng dong li 
wo men yi zhuan zuo feng tui dong dang de jian she mai chu xin bu fa 
ying de le ren min de xin ren he zhi chi 
dang de ning ju li he zhan dou li jin yi bu zeng qiang 
wo men jiang gong ping zheng yi de li nian guan chuan yu zhi guo li zheng de fang fang mian mian 
shi xian hao wei hu hao fa zhan hao ren min qun zhong de qie shen li yi 
wei geng duo ren chuang zao zhe ren sheng chu cai de ji hui 
qian qian wan wan pu tong zhong guo ren yong zi ji de han shui 
jiao zhu qi tong wang zhong guo meng de lu ji 
wo men de tian yu ku 
ning ju cheng zhe ge guo jia mai xiang ming tian de qiang jing dong li 
zai ru ci duan de shi jian hui ju ru ci duo de kai shi 
rang ru ci duo de bian ge zhan xian ru ci da de jue xin 
ji bian shi dui zhong guo guan wang he zhi yi de ren men 
mian dui zhe yang de cheng jiu 
zhe yang de fen dou 
ye bu neng bu bao yi qin pei he jing yi 
dui zhong guo de wei lai bao you re qie de qi dai 
li shi shi yi ge bu duan yan xu de guo cheng 
zai gong jian ke nan de zhong guo dao lu shang 
xun zhe shi ba jie san zhong quan hui de hao jiao 
zhong guo ren min zai xin de yi nian li 
kai shi le quan mian shen hua gai ge de wei da jin jun 
zhe shi yi ci jian yan jin qu yi shi de jin jun 
shi jie da shi 
hao hao dang dang 
bian ge shi da shi suo qu 
ren xin suo xiang 
mian dui bi ren de xing shi 
suo you de guo jia dou zai qiu xin qiu bian 
qiu bian qiu xin 
qian fan jing fa 
ji ji zhong liu 
zhong guo de xian dai hua jian she 
guan jian zai ba zhi du you shi zhuan hua wei shi shi zai zai de jing zheng you shi 
xin de yi nian 
jin yi bu jie fang si xiang 
jie fang he fa zhan she hui sheng chan li 
jie fang he zeng qiang she hui huo li 
wo men cai neng geng shang ceng lou 
zhe shi yi ci kao yan ji yu yi shi de jin jun 
wo men ceng cuo shi gan shang shi dai de da hao shi ji 
ji ruo ji pin 
bei shou qi ling 
jing guo ji dai ren yu xue fen zhan he jian ku da pin 
jin tian de zhong guo cai chong xin hui dao yi ge jiao wei you li de qi dian 
ying de le xiang dui you li de fa zhan huan jing 
wo men reng chu zai bing qie chang qi chu yu she hui zhu yi chu ji jie duan 
guo ji di wei hai bu suan gong gu 
fa zhan huan jing ye bing bu ping he 
jing zhu fen miao bi zheng 
ji yu shao zong ji shi 
di guo jiu meng 
yin ling ri ben zou xiang chong man zui e he wei xian de kuo zhang zhi lu 
an bei can bai jing guo shen she 
shi shi qiang shua heng 
shi gong ran tiao xin 
shi jiang ta de 
di guo jiu meng 
gong zhi yu shi 
guo ji she hui bi xu yu yi qiang ying hui ji 
yan fang ri ben jun guo zhu yi si hui fu ran 
zhe shi dui ya zhou he shi jie he ping fu ze 
ye shi dui ri ben ren min fu ze 
yi shen zuo ze 
zhong yang jin ling xiang 
quan li yan yin 
shi shang zui yan 
ling dao gan bu jin yan xin gui 
gan su lan zhou shi zhong xiao xue 
jiu dian si da lei qu yu xian zhi xi yan 
ji lin chang chun shi gong wu yuan bu de zai gong gong chang suo he gong zhong mian qian xi yan 
yi sheng bu zai huan zhe mian qian xi yan 
jiao shi bu zai xue sheng mian qian xi yan 
sui zhe zhong yang ri qian chu tai 
ling dao gan bu dai tou zai gong gong chang suo jin yan 
ge de jin yan kong yan 
zhuan jia ren wei 
ci ci zhong yang xin gui zhua zhu le 
ling dao dai tou 
zhe ge guan jian 
fu yu qun zhong he yu lun jian du quan cheng le you li bao zhang 
jiang zai jing hua gong gong huan jing 
gong kuan mai yan 
jiu zheng gan bu bu liang xi qi deng fang mian chan sheng shen yuan ying xiang 
kong yan xin gui bu liu si jiao 
yan qiang gan bu 
zao yu gan ga 
zhe ji tian wo de dian hua dou bei da bao le 
dou shi guo nei wai tong hang 
mei ti da lai de 
ren wei zhong guo kong yan shi ye ying lai le shi nian lai zui da de zheng ce zhi chi 
zhong guo kong zhi xi yan xie hui chang wu fu hui zhang xu gui hua gao su ji zhe 
guan yu ling dao gan bu dai tou zai gong gong chang suo jin yan you guan shi xiang de tong zhi 
lian ri lai yin qi guang fan guan zhu 
lan zhou shi gong gong chang suo kong zhi xi yan tiao li 
ti yu chang deng ba da lei chang suo quan mian jin yan 
yu le chang suo si da lei qu yu xian zhi xi yan 
lan zhou jin ru 
quan mian kong yan 
chang chun shi fang zhi yan cao yan wu wei hai ban fa 
gui ding geng xi 
li du geng da 
gong wu yuan bu zai gong gong chang suo he gong zhong mian qian xi yan 
yi sheng bu zai huan zhe mian qian xi yan 
jiao shi bu zai xue sheng mian qian xi yan 
jia zhang bu zai hai zi mian qian xi yan 
ren he ren bu de zai fu nv 
er tong he lao nian ren ji zhong huo dong de qu yu xi yan 
bei jing shi yi ji hua 
bu shao sheng shi ye jiang lu xu chu tai guan yu jin yan kong yan de tiao li 
jin yan kong yan jiang ying lai 
gen jin zhong yang jin yan xin gui chu tai de zhe xie di fang gui ding 
wu yi li wai jiang 
gong wu yuan zuo biao shuai 
ling dao fu ze zhi 
zuo wei zhong yao nei rong 
geng xian zhu de shi 
ge ren zai gong gong chang suo sui yi xi yan 
gong gong chang suo kong yan bu li deng xing wei jiang shou dao fa lv ceng mian yue shu 
zhong yang jin ling chu tai hou 
yan yin hen da 
de ling dao gan bu cheng wei guan zhu jiao dian 
an hui yi wei 
yi tian liang bao yan 
de xian wei shu ji gao su ji zhe 
zhe ji tian ta de dian hua ye bei 
shang ji rang ta li ji jie yan 
tong ji gan bu you de quan ta zhu yi 
you de kai wan xiao tiao kan 
yi hou hai xi bu xi yan 
zan shi hai jie bu diao 
shang ban bie zhe 
shan dong sheng mou ting ban gong shi yi ming gan bu gan dao 
wo jing chang zai ban gong shi ao ye xie cai liao 
quan kao yan ti shen 
zhe bu yao le ming le 
jin yan xin zheng 
mei you si jiao 
ce suo dou bu zhun chou 
jiu suan pao dao lou xia chou ye bu xing 
yin wei shi gong wu shi jian 
wan yi bei ban shi qun zhong pai xia lai chuan dao wang shang 
yao chu yang xiang 
wei le yi gen yan wo fan bu shang 
zuo si you xiang 
ta zhun bei jie yan 
duo ming gan bu biao shi 
zhi yao jin yan xin zheng jian chi xia qu 
gan bu jie yan jiang cheng wei qu shi 
jiu suan zan shi nan shou yi dian 
chang yuan lai kan 
dui shen ti jian kang ye shi hao shi 
dan ye you yi xie gan bu kai shi 
zhuan yi zhen di 
zai hu bei wu han yi jia xing zheng dan wei 
gong zuo ren yuan jie shao 
zhe liang tian duo dao ce suo chou yan de ren te bie duo 
hai you ren zai xun zhao zheng ce 
ta men xiang ling dao jian yi 
neng bu neng she li zhuan men de xi yan shi 
tian jin shi zheng shi shi shi wai lai ren kou ju zhu zheng shen ling he fa fang gong zuo 
shi xing duo nian de zan zhu zheng tong shi bu zai ban li 
ji zhe zai tian jin shi bin hai xin qu ren kou fu wu guan li zhong xin kan dao 
ju zhu zheng de chi cun 
cai zhi yu ju min shen fen zheng jin si 
zheng mian you ju zhu zheng chi you ren de xing ming 
hu ji de deng xin xi 
fan mian you xian ju zhu di bian geng he qian zhu ji guan 
qian zhu qi xian deng xin xi 
ju zhu zheng zheng mian yin zhi de er wei ma suo han xin xi 
yu gai ju zhu zheng suo xian shi de xin xi yi zhi 
ke you xiao fang zhi wei zao 
bian zao ju zhu zheng deng wei fa xing wei 
tian jin shi ju zhu zheng guan li zan xing ban fa 
shi xing fei tian jin hu ji chang zhu ren kou ju zhu zheng guan li ban fa 
qu xiao xian xing de zan zhu zheng 
ji fen ru hu 
de zhi du qiao dong le chang qi yi lai dui nong min gong deng liu dong ren kou jin te da cheng shi luo hu de xian zhi 
tian jin shi ju zhu zheng guan li zan xing ban fa 
tian jin shi ju zhu zheng ji fen zhi biao ji fen zhi biao 
zai tian jin shi yi ju zhu ban nian yi shang qie ni ji xu ju zhu de jing nei lai jin ren yuan dou ying dang shen ling ju zhu zheng 
fan fu he tiao jian de ju zhu zheng chi you ren 
tong guo ji fen fang shi ke yi shen ban tian jin shi chang zhu hu kou 
tong ji xian shi 
zai tian jin shi ju zhu ban nian yi shang 
bin hai xin qu ren kou fu wu guan li zhong xin gong zuo ren yuan jie shao shuo 
lai jin ren yuan ke chi ben ren you xiao zheng jian ji xiang guan cai liao 
dao ju zhu zheng ye wu shou li dian 
qu xian ren kou fu wu guan li zhong xin 
xiang zhen liu dong ren kou fu wu guan li zhan 
cun liu dong ren kou fu wu guan li fen zhan 
shen ling ju zhu zheng 
zai xin hua she deng mei ti bao guang 
zhan jiang ji ji jie shou mei ti jian du 
ge de fa yuan zai quan guo fan wei nei kai zhan dui dang zheng ji guan zhi xing ren min fa yuan sheng xiao pan jue de zhuan xiang ji an qing li gong zuo 
yan zhong qin fan zhai quan ren qi ye he gong min de he fa quan yi 
jiu shi nian dai xing cheng de zhai wu 
wen hua she shi yi ji qi ta gong yi lei jian she 
zhan jiang zhao kai zhuan xiang qing li dang zheng ji guan zhi xing fa yuan sheng xiao cai pan ji an gong zuo hui yi 
zhan jiang shi wei 
shi zheng fu yao qiu quan shi ge ji dang zheng ji guan shu li 
xin guan yao li jiu zhang 
fa zhan shi zheng ji 
qing hai li shi zhai wu ye shi zheng ji 
shei qian zhai shei huan qian 
yuan ze fen qing zhai wu chang huan ze ren 
bing zu cheng si ge du cha zu dui quan shi she an dang zheng ji guan zhi xing ge an jin xing shi shi du cha gen zong 
zuo wei zhu ban dan wei 
que ding zhuan ren ban li zhuan an zhi du 
tong guo cha feng 
dong jie cai chan deng qiang zhi cuo shi cu shi qian zhai ji guan lv xing huan zhai yi wu 
dui ge bie ju bu lv xing de qian zhai ji guan ze cai qu pai mai 
hua bo deng cuo shi qiang zhi zhi xing 
zhan jiang shi wei 
shi zheng fu yao qiu she an dan wei jia qiang yu fa yuan gou tong 
shan shi shan zhong zuo hao ji an qing li gong zuo 
bing cong qing dao gang zhuang chuan 
yun wang a gen ting 
zhe pi cheng ji dong che zu jiang fu wu yu a gen ting shou du bu yi nuo si ai li si de sa mian tuo xian he mai te xian 
cheng wei qi jin wei zhi wo guo cheng ji dong che zu chu kou liang zui da de ding dan 
nan che si fang jie shao 
zhong guo nan che si fang gu fen gong si zhu ren she ji shi jiang xin jie shao 
che liang she ji jian jie 
chong fen kao lv le a gen ting de ren wen te se 
nan che si fang jie shao 
zhe pi cheng ji dong che zu de she ji yi an quan ke kao wei he xin 
che liang fu he zui yan ge peng zhuang biao zhun 
ji yu cheng ke zui da cheng du bao hu 
zhuan xiang jia she ji chong fen kao lv liao dang de de xian lu tiao jian 
an quan yu liang da 
che chuang bo li cai yong nai chong ji de ju tan suan zhi ban bo li 
bi mian cheng ke zao shou yi wai shang hai 
che nei she you can ji ren zhuan yong qu yu he zi xing che cun fang qu yu 
zuo yi zao xing fu he ren ji gong cheng xue 
yan se xian yan 
cheng zuo shu shi 
wo guo gao tie ji shu yi zou dao shi jie qian lie 
wo guo bu jin zhang wo le gao su dong che zu de he xin ji shu 
pei yu le zi zhu hua neng li 
xin nian de di yi tian 
ming mei de yang guang sa man min dong shan qu de chong shan jun ling 
lai dao fu jian ning de de 
fu zhou te gao ya gong cheng 
tan fang jie ri jian shou zai shi gong yi xian de jian she zhe men 
dong se jian nong 
cao mu bian de ku huang 
xia le gao su gong lu 
guai guo hu bei xiang mei he cun de yi zuo xiao qiao 
che xing zai sha shi lu shang 
yan lu de shan bi ru dao pi fu kan 
che chuang wai jiu shi ji shi mi shen de xuan ya 
lu shi kao zha yao yi duan duan 
fu zhou te gao ya gong cheng 
ye shi wo guo te gao ya dian wang jin ru jia kuai fa zhan jie duan de biao zhi xing gong cheng 
ji shi shi yuan dan 
shi gong ye mei you ting zhi 
zhe li mei you ren 
dan you wo men 
wei le jiang zhong xing she bei yun jin shan li 
gong cheng xiang mu bu fa hui zi zhu chuang xin neng li 
zi xing yan zhi le lv dai shi yun shu che 
yao kong ye ya shi shuang yao bi bao gan deng she bei 
li zheng jin nian jiu yue quan bu wan gong 
fu jian song bian dian gong cheng gong si gong cheng zong jian li xing guo shuo 
lu dao jin tou 
qi che pa guo yi duan yang chang xiao dao 
mei ge liang tian lun liu pai ren xia shan bei chi de 
chong ji zuan yi tian da bu le er san shi li mi 
lai zi an hui dong zhi xian de gong ren xu xiao jiang shuo 
liang ge ren lun liu gan 
yi ci ding bu liao ban ge zhong tou ge bo jiu ma le 
li gong di bu yuan jiu shi gong ren men de su she 
liang ceng su liao bu da qi de gong peng 
xian qi gong ren wang bing de bei ru 
pu wei xia dian le liu ceng 
da jia shui tong pu 
ji zai yi qi dong tian ye bu leng

shui de ye man xiang 
xu xiao jiang shuo 
zhong wu shi fen

yi wan cai ban fan 
hai you bao zi 
man tou he luo bo tang 
dian wang zhi gong li lai neng chi ku jiang feng xian 
wei le bao zheng guo jia jing ji jian kang fa zhan 
zhe xie yuan gong fang qi le zi ji de jia qi 
qi pan ba dian jin kuai shu song dao gong chang che jian he qian jia wan hu 
xia shan lu shang 
ji zhe yu dao le bei cai hui lai de yi zu xiao huo ni ke 
wen ta lei bu lei 
da jia dou xin ku ma 
han guo ren jiang jun hao cheng zuo de hang ban zai shen yang tao xian ji chang luo di 
xia yi zhan yao qu xiang gang 
zai shen yang xiang qu zhuan zhuan gu gong 
zhe shi ji bei jing 
cheng du zhi hou 
dong bei di qu shou pi shi xing zhe yi zheng ce de liang ge cheng shi 
shen yang tao xian ji chang 
yi wei zhe shen yang 
xiang shou zhe yi zheng ce de wai guo ren zhi yao chi you di san guo qian zheng he ji piao 
bu xu yao zhong guo qian zheng bian ke ru jing 
bing ke zai shen yang 
shen yang shi yi ge li shi ming cheng 
yi qian xiang ban qian zheng lai

shou er geng gui 
zai zhe bian lv you du jia shi bu cuo de xuan ze 
jiang jun hao yi jing you le xia yi ci guo lai de da suan 
liao ning sheng lv you ju fu ju zhang ying zhong yuan shuo 
mu qian ri ben 
han guo shi liao ning zui da de jing wai ke yuan shi chang 
zhen dui zhe liang ge guo jia de you ke tui chu le te se chan pin 
bao kuo hai yang hai dao you 
gao er fu lv you 
wen quan lv you 
wen hua lv you deng deng 
dou shi jin nian lai ru jing zhong guo lv you ren ci pai ming kao qian de guo jia 
bao kuo mei guo 
ao da li ya 
da lian cheng wei duo ge kua guo gong si xi wang jin zhu de cheng shi 
luo jie zhao yong 
yi lv yang guang tou guo bao bao wu ai gang hao zhao she dao tian shan tian chi jing qu men kou 
wu ai san qu 
tian shan tian chi xiang lu tai ji bai dian qing kong wan li 
yuan chu xue shan de xue feng fei chang qing xi 
xin jiang tian shan tian chi jing qu ju ban le 
qi fu ying xin zhu fu xin jiang shi er yong shi dong ji bo ge da feng 
ci ci qi fu huo dong zai xian jiang tian shan tian chi chi bian de fu shou guan ju xing 
dang ri shou yao jia bin he qian lai shang tian shan tian chi dong jing de you ke gong tong qi dao shen shan bo ge da feng 
feng tiao yu shun 
xin jiang ge zu ren min xing fu wu jiang 
wei da zu guo guo fu min qiang 
dang di tong guo gong kai xuan ba de shi er yong shi hai zu cheng bo ge da feng dong ji dai biao dui 
zai tian shan tian chi xiang lu tai jing qu ju xing le dong ji ji bai yi shi 
wei shi qi fu ying xin huo dong geng ju you xi yin li 
tian shan tian chi jing qu hai zu zhi le da xue zhang 
xue de sha bao da zhan 
hu mian xue de zu qiu deng huo dong 
hao wan de you xi rang can yu zhe chong wen tong nian shi guang 
zhong shi er shi huan le 
zhe ci tian shan tian chi ying xin qi fu huo dong shi tian shan tian chi di shi er jie bing xue feng qing jie huo dong de zu cheng bu fen 
sui zhe chun jie deng jie ri de lai lin 
tian shan tian chi yi jing zuo hao le ying jie bing xue lv you wang ji dao lai de zhun bei 
cheng yong liu ying 
jiang da fu ti sheng chuan bo tong guo neng li 
jin yi bu cu jin gang kou wu liu xiao lv 
dui cu jin tian jin gang kou jing ji ti su fa zhan 
jia kuai bin hai xin qu kai fa kai fang yi yi zhong da 
tian jin da gu kou wei zhong guo ming qing hai fang yao sai 
li shi gang qu 
shang chuan hui fu tong hang yi lai 
hang dao shu jun wan cheng hou 
da gu kou gang qu gong cheng yan shou 
hang dao an quan he cha 
tong hang biao zhun zhi ding deng ge xiang shi tong hang qian qi gong zuo 
ma yan ling liu jia yu 
ai xin jiang   you jia xiang 
wu jia qu di shi yi jie bing xue ti yu lv you jie kai mu 
qi ya ping she 
you ke ti yan bing xue xiang mu 
qi ya ping she 
you ke ti yan bing xue xiang mu 
qi ya ping she 
ai xin jiang   you jia xiang 
zhong duo you ke huan ju kai mu shi xian chang 
gong ying xin nian 
zhu ban fang biao shi 
jin nian shi xin jiang lv you ju 
ai xin jiang   you jia xiang 
dong ji lv you huo dong ju ban de di er nian 
xin jiang sheng chan jian she bing tuan di liu shi wu jia qu shi yi ci wei qi ji ju ban bing xue ti yu lv you jie 
zhi zai jiang liu shi wu jia qu de leng zi yuan bian cheng re chan ye 
jiang liu shi wu jia qu lv you chan ye fa zhan ji ji rong ru xin jiang lv you jing ji fa zhan zhong qu 
yi ci ti sheng he dai dong liu shi wu jia qu jing ji she hui kuai su fa zhan 
wu jia qu di shi yi jie bing xue ti yu lv you jie yi 
si lu bing xue   xiang yue wu jia qu 
qi jian jiang kai zhan bing shang hua ti 
bing shang da niu 
bing shang er tong le yuan 
bing diao zhan shi yuan 
bing shang yun dong hui deng hua bing hua xue xiang mu 
rang you ke zai han leng de dong ji ti yan dong xue feng qing 
xiang shou bie yang de dong ji lv you ji qing 
ci wai hai jiang ju ban 
guan shang han xue bao ma 
yi ji wu jia qu di shi yi jie bing xue ti yu lv you jie she huo huo dong deng 
zong he ti yan xiang mu 
ji zhe zai huo dong xian chang kan dao 
nan nv lao you men you de hua bing 
you de hua xue 
you de pao wen quan 
chun zhong han xue bao ma he jing cai de ma shu biao yan xi yin you ke zhu zu guan kan 
liu lian wang fan 
shi xin jiang sheng chan jian she bing tuan di liu shi shi bu suo zai di 
bei cheng wei shou fu de sheng tai hou hua yuan he nong fu chan pin jia gong ji de 
shi yi zuo nian qing de jun ken cheng shi 
yu xin jiang bing tuan di liu shi an zhao 
shi shi he yi 
ti zhi guan li 
hua bing deng dong ji you le huo dong ti gong liao de tian du hou de tiao jian 
wu jia qu shi yi you yu jin xiang jie 
bing xue feng qing jie 
tian gua jie deng zhi ming lv you jie qing pin pai 
shi shang zui yan jiao tong fa gui 
zheng zheng yi zhou nian 
ji zhe cong zhe jiang gao su jiao jing bu men huo xi 
xin jiao gui shi shi yi nian lai 
shu ju xian shi 
zhe jiang gao su jiao jing tai zhou zhi dui si da dui da dui zhang zheng guang jie shao shuo 
cong ju ti wei fa xing wei fang mian 
xia jiang fu du zui da de san xiang wei fa xing wei shi chao yuan 
chao su he she pai wei fa 
bu an gui ding an zhuang huo wei an zhuang ji dong che hao pai wei fa xing wei 
zui yan jiao gui 
dai lai de ling yi fang mian ying xiang shi 
gao su jiao jing tai zhou zhi dui si da dui min jing xu ji shuo 
xin jiao gui chu tai hou 
jia shi ren geng wei jin shen 
zhe dang hao pai 
ke che chao yuan deng wei fa xing wei da da jian shao 
xiao che wei fa chao che 
chao su xing shi 
huo che chao zai 
ji jian bu fu 
wei gui zhan dao deng yi ran shi duo fa de wei fa xian xiang 
yin du ni xi ya kua nian ye bu ping jing 
yin du ni xi ya jing fang fan kong te zhong bu dui 
zuo wan xian shi zai tang ge lang 
nan bu xi pu ta 
bao wei yi chu kong bu fen zi xian fan cang shen de zhu suo 
yi ming jiao zuo xi da ya te 
de xian fan shou chi gang bi qiang ju bu 
zao te zhong ren yuan ji bi 
ji bi xi da ya te hou 
ji xu bao wei kong xian cang shen de wu she 
yin du ni xi ya jing fang zhi chu 
jing fang zai fan zui xian chang zhao dao le dai tu yong lai xing xiong de ji che 
bu zhi ru ci 
fen hang zao qiang an 
dang shi jing fang zai yin hang fu jin de xiao chi tan fa xian yi ge zhuang you shou liu dan de bei bao 
jing fang cha huo 
bao dao zhi chu 
jin nian lai zai fan kong xing dong shang 
lv jian qi gong 
zhe zhi jing bing shi mei guo guo wu yuan wai jiao an quan ju zi zhu jian li de 
wu qi zhuang bei quan bu lai zi mei guo 
jiao guan dou shi qian mei jun ge te zhong bu dui cheng yuan ji lian bang diao cha ju 
te qin ju de fan kong zhuan jia 
can yu ya tai jing ji he zuo hui yi 
feng hui de wei an gong zuo 
shang hai chun zuo 
yan cao wei hai shi dang jin shi jie yan zhong de gong gong wei sheng wen ti zhi yi 
yan cao kong zhi kuang jia gong yue 
zhong gong zhong yang ban gong ting 
guo wu yuan ban gong ting zhuan men yin fa tong zhi yao qiu ling dao gan bu dai tou zai gong gong chang suo jin yan 
yi feng yi su 
qian yi mo hua 
kong yan zai she hui guan zhu zhong bu duan po zu qian xing 
wo guo qian shu shi jie wei sheng zu zhi 
yan cao kong zhi kuang jia gong yue 
zhe shi shi jie wei sheng zu zhi zhu chi zhi ding de di yi bu guo ji gong yue 
wo guo biao shi yuan zai gong yue de kuang jia xia jia qiang tong ge guo de he zuo 
ying dui gong gong wei sheng ling yu de tiao zhan 
jin yi bu wan shan kong yan gong zuo 
fan dui yan cao guang gao yu zan zhu 
hu huan wu yan / sai shi 
de gong kai xin hou 
you zhong guo shi you hua gong you xian gong si qu dai yan cao gong si cheng wei zhu yao zan zhu shang 
wu yan ao yun 
quan guo ren da chang wei hui zheng shi pi zhun 
yan cao kong zhi kuang jia gong yue 
shi nei gong zuo chang suo jin yan 
bing jin zhi suo you yan cao guang gao 
cu xiao he zan zhu 
wei sheng bu cheng li lv xing gong yue ling dao xiao zu 
bing fa bu shou fen kong yan bao gao 
xiang gong zhong xiang xi chan shi xi yan yu bei dong xi yan de wei hai ji ying dui cuo shi 
zhong guo ji bing yu fang kong zhi zhong xin zai bei jing qi dong 
mai xiang wu yan zhong guo 
de kong yan xiang mu 
zhong guo kong zhi xi yan xie hui zai quan guo kai zhan chuang jian wu yan yi yuan xiang mu 
bei jing shi qi dong yi 
wu yan che xiang 
ren ren jian kang 
wei zhu ti de kong yan huo dong 
bei jing shi zheng shi shi shi 
bei jing shi gong gong chang suo jin zhi xi yan fan wei ruo gan gui ding 
zeng jia le jian shen chang 
ti yu chang de bi sai qu he zuo xi qu wei jin zhi xi yan de gong gong chang suo 
wei quan mian lv xing gong yue 
wu yan ao yun 
na ru ban lv se ao yun de zhong yao nei rong 
wu yan ao yun 
shou dao shi jie guang fan hao ping 
wei sheng bu deng si bu men yin fa 
shang hai shi gong gong chang suo kong zhi xi yan tiao li 
zheng shi shi shi 
zhong xiao xue xiao 
ti yu chang guan 
gong gong jiao tong gong ju 
shang hai shi liang hui cheng wei 
wu yan liang hui 
tong nian ju ban 
wu yan shi bo 
zhong guo kong yan fa lv zhuan jia gong zuo zu 
zai bei jing cheng li 
biao zhi zhao fa lv zhuan jia zheng ti jie ru zhong guo yan cao kong zhi li fa gong zuo 
jiao yu bu lian he wei sheng bu xia fa 
guan yu jin yi bu jia qiang xue xiao kong yan gong zuo de yi jian 
nei rong bao kuo zhong xiao xue ji tuo you ji gou shi nei ji xiao yuan quan mian jin yan 
gao deng xue xiao jiao xue qu 
tu shu guan deng chang suo shi nei quan mian jin yan deng 
guo jia guang dian zong ju xia fa tong zhi 
jiang yan ge kong zhi dian ying 
dian shi ju zhong xi yan jing tou 
ping mu jin yan 
shou dao kong yan ren shi zhi chi 
shou ci xie ru zhong guo wu nian gui hua 
shi yi jie quan guo ren da si ci hui yi shen cha de 
guo min jing ji he she hui fa zhan di shi er ge wu nian gui hua gang yao 
quan mian tui xing gong gong chang suo jin yan 
gong gong chang suo wei sheng guan li tiao li shi shi xi ze 
dui shi nei gong gong chang suo jin zhi xi yan zuo chu le ming que gui ding 
shi jie wei sheng zu zhi dui wo guo wei sheng bu fa bu 
zhong guo xi yan wei hai jian kang bao gao 
biao shi zan yang 
cheng dang nian de shi jie wu yan ri yin wei zhong guo you guan yan cao wei hai de shou bu guan fang chu ban wu er ju you 
li cheng bei yi yi 
tian jin deng wan cheng gong gong chang suo kong yan li fa hou 
shen zhen deng ye xiang ji zhi ding huo chu tai fa gui 
zhong gong zhong yang ban gong ting 
guo wu yuan ban gong ting yin fa 
guan yu ling dao gan bu dai tou zai gong gong chang suo jin yan you guan shi xiang de tong zhi 
yao qiu ling dao gan bu dai tou zai gong gong chang suo jin yan 
cheng wei wo guo kong yan lv yue jin cheng zhong de zhong yao tui dong li 
shen ru xue xi guan che dang de shi ba jie san zhong quan hui jing shen 
yi quan mian shen hua gai ge wei dong li 
da zao zhong guo jing ji sheng ji ban 
shi yi xiang zhong yao de xi tong gong cheng 
da zao zhong guo jing ji sheng ji ban 
yun xing feng xian shen ru fen xi 
you yao yi ju dang he guo jia de fa zhan zhan lve 
yi chuang xin qu dong po jie fa zhan nan ti yu kun jing 
xing cheng zhang xiao dong li ji zhi 
wo guo jing ji 
yi nan yi wei ji 
chang qi yi lai 
wo guo jing ji zeng zhang cheng xian dian xing de 
si gao si di 
di ke ji han liang 
fa zhan ji lei de mao dun jiao duo 
yun xing feng xian jia da 
jing ji yun xing xiao lv jiao di 
shou xian shi zi yuan li yong xiao lv jiao di 
tu di li yong lv bu duan xia jiang 
nong ye sheng chan ji yue hua 
gui mo hua shui ping bu gao 
bu jin hua fei 
shui zi yuan lang fei yan zhong 
hai zao cheng tu rang wu ran 
qi ci shi jing ji xiao yi jiao di 
you yu duo shu hang ye chu yu guo ji fen gong di duan 
chan pin fu jia zhi zheng ti pian di 
wo guo tou zi xiao lv di xia 
zhe zhong kao tou zi zhi cheng de zeng zhang yi nan yi wei ji 
zai ci shi zi yuan pei zhi xiao lv jiao di 
da liang zi yuan wu xiao huo cuo pei dao zhi chan neng guo sheng yan zhong 
ping ban bo li 
zao chuan deng hang ye chan neng yan zhong guo sheng de tong shi 
xin xing chan ye ye chu xian le sheng chan neng li de xian zhi 
zai chan neng guo sheng di qing kuang xia 
jing ji yi ran zai zeng zhang 
zhu yao kao de shi pang da de chu xu he gao tou zi lv zai mian qiang zhi cheng 
chan ye jie gou ji dai tiao zheng sheng ji 
wo men yi ban yong yi er san ci chan ye de bi li 
xin xing chan ye zhan bi lai heng liang chan ye jie gou he li xing 
zhe shi yi ge wu qu 
chan ye jing zheng li de he xin qu jue yu chan pin fu jia zhi de gao di 
nong ye ke yi dai lai gao fu jia zhi 
xin xing gong ye ye ke neng shi di fu jia zhi 
sui ran wo guo jing ji ti liang yi ju shi jie di er 
dan chan ye jie gou cheng ai hua tai shi 
chu yu guo ji chan ye lian de di duan 
dan ji ben shi di duan chan pin 
di ke ji han liang 
di fu jia zhi 
zhe kuai gua zai wo guo zhi zao ye shang de biao qian 
zhi jin wei neng zhai chu 
chan ye mei you zhao yang chan ye he xi yang chan ye zhi fen 
fu jia zhi gao di shi jue ding chan ye fa zhan de guan jian xing yin su 
wo guo jin chu kou chan pin jie gou bu jin he li 
zai chu kou chan pin zhong 
zhong di ke ji han liang chan pin bi zhong jiao da 
zhe xie chan pin bi zhong guo da 
guo jia bu jin yao cheng dan chu kou tui shui 
hai yin xing cheng dan le she bao 
huan jing deng ju e cheng ben 
wo guo jing ji jin kou yi cun du ye zai ti gao 
te bie shi ke ji 
zi yuan de jin kou yi cun du ri jian pan sheng 
yuan gao yu ri ben 
xin neng yuan qi che de he xin cai liao 
gao dang shu kong ji chuang de shu kong xi tong 
ji cheng dian lu xin pian 
qi che zhi zao guan jian she bei 
chang qi yi lai jin kou 
zi yuan de jin kou yi cun du ye zai ti sheng 
liang tou zai wai 
de jie gou jia da le wo guo jing ji de cui ruo xing 
zai li lun yu zheng ce shang 
kai fang xing jing ji 
wai xiang xing jing ji 
ye shi yi ge wu qu 
shi dao zhi wo guo wai mao zhi liang jiao di de zhong yao yuan yin 
qu yu chan ye tong zhi hua yan zhong 
zhe bu jin biao xian zai chuan tong chan ye shang 
yi xie xin xing chan ye ye shi ru ci 
zhu yao wen ti jiu zai yu ge di chan ye fa zhan cheng pai lang shi te zheng 
qu yu jian que shao fen gong he zuo 
zhi shi chan ye jie gou xiao lv di xia 
shi chang que fa chuang xin dong li 
chuang xin shi jing ji sheng ji de dong li 
er chuang xin bi xu yi lai shi chang zhu ti 
jun wei quan qiu di yi 
dan qi ye yan fa ren yuan guo shao 
qie que fa ke yan tou ru ji ji xing 
qi zhong bu shao hai shi bu men 
er gua pai de 
te bie shi wo guo shang ye mo shi chuang xin geng shi feng mao lin jiao 
yu tang zhong yi tiao yu si le 
zhe shi ou ran shi jian 
tang ruo duo shu yu si le 
shuo ming shi shui de wen ti 
qi ye pu bian que fa chuang xin yi yuan 
shuo ming wo guo jing ji huan jing 
jing ji ti zhi he chan ye zheng ce hai cun zai jiao da de tiao zheng kong jian 
chuang xin dong li ruo 
lu jing yi lai yan zhong 
wo guo jing ji 
mian lin bu ke chi xu de feng xian 
shi yin wei xing cheng le wai yan kuo zhang fa zhan lu jing yi lai 
er fa zhan lu jing de yi lai 
shi ji shang shi ti zhi guan xing de jie guo 
chang qi de su du zhui gan 
shi jing ji tiao shi ji zhi que fa 
zuo wei yi ge fa zhan zhong guo jia 
jia kuai fa zhan shi bi ran xuan ze 
dan zai cheng wei shi jie di er da jing ji ti hou 
yao ba zhan lve zhong dian zhuan yi dao jing ji zeng zhang de zhi liang yu xiao yi shang lai 
zhe shi yi ge jian nan de guo cheng 
duo nian xing cheng de ren shi he guan nian yi jing shen tou dao wo guo she hui sheng huo de fang fang mian mian 
bao jiao gao zeng zhang lv yi cheng wei ge ji zheng fu jue ce yu she hui yu lun de yi ge xin li guan kou 
da gan kuai shang de qiang lie chong dong ying xiang zhe quan guo yi pan qi de zhan lve shi shi 
jing ji xie tiao fa zhan de tiao shi ji zhi hai you yi xie kong bai 
ying xiang le fa zhan fang shi de zhuan bian he jie gou sheng ji 
shi shi chang zai zi yuan pei zhi zhong qi jue ding xing zuo yong yu geng hao fa hui zheng fu zuo yong hai xu jin yi bu xie tiao 
shi chang zhu yao shi tong guo jia ge de fa xian xing cheng 
tui dong sheng chan yao su de liu dong 
chong zu yu pei zhi 
jia ge ruo shou dao gan rao er niu qu 
jiu hui dao zhi zi yuan cuo pei 
ru gong ye yong de xian pai mai 
shi ji shang shi ling di jia 
zai ru zi yuan kai cai guo cheng zhong de da liang cheng ben wai hua 
shi zi yuan sheng chan jia ge bu wan quan 
zi yuan lian jia shi yong 
shi chang zhu ti ye jiu mei you zu gou de dong li qu gai bian yuan you de fa zhan mo shi 
zhe xie dou yao qiu ge ji zheng fu de gong zuo zhong dian yao fa sheng zhuan bian 
yao you guo qu chong zai yi xian zhao shang yin zi 
kuo da tou zi 
zhuan xiang wei hu gong ping jing zheng shi chang huan jing 
zhi ding biao zhun 
bao hu huan jing 
zhi chi chuang xin deng 
jing guo duo nian she hui zhu yi shi chang jing ji ti zhi gai ge 
wo guo yi ji ben xing cheng le shi chang fa hui zuo yong de ti zhi ji zhi 
dang de shi ba jie san zhong quan hui ming que ti chu shi shi chang zai zi yuan pei zhi zhong qi jue ding xing zuo yong 
qi ye yao gen ju shi chang gong qiu bian hua 
xuan ze zhuan xing sheng ji de lu jing 
ke jiao ti zhi gai ge zhi hou 
jiao yu yu wo guo jing ji she hui fa zhan de xu yao 
xian xing ke jiao ti zhi xing zheng hua te zheng ming xian 
ke ji ji gou wei he yan jiu 
yan jiu shen me 
zen me yan jiu 
hen nan gen ju shi chang xu qiu zuo chu zi zhu de tiao zheng yu jue ce 
jiao yu ji gou ye shi ru ci 
zhao duo shao xue sheng 
she zhi shen me yang de zhuan ye 
kai she shen me ke cheng deng 
jun you jiao yu zhu guan bu men shen pi 
yi fang mian shi ke ji shi chang fa yu bu quan 
ke ji cheng guo de zhuan hua que fa you xiao zai ti 
qiao liang he niu dai 
ling yi fang mian shi jiao yu ji xiao di xia 
hua fei da liang zi yuan pei yu chu lai de ren cai pian li xu qiu 
er qi ye que zhao bu dao fu he zhuan ye ji neng yao qiu de ren cai 
shi jian zheng ming 
ti zhi gai ge de zhi hou bu jin zao cheng le jiao yu ke ji zi yuan de cuo pei yu lang fei 
er qie shi de chuang xin qu dong fa zhan zhan lve que fa ren cai de zhi cheng 
chan quan gai ge shang xu shen hua 
ji ben jing ji zhi du xu yao cheng shu ding xing 
liang ge hao bu dong yao 
shi wan shan she hui zhu yi ji ben jing ji zhi du de guan jian 
gong you zhi shi xian xing shi duo yang hua 
guo you jing ji bu ju jin xing le zhan lve xing tiao zheng 
qi fa zhan huo li 
ying xiang li ri yi ti sheng 
fei guo you cheng fen cong wu dao you 
cheng zhang zhuang da 
wu yong hui yan 
gou jian guo you qi ye zhi li jie gou de ren wu yuan wei wan cheng 
xiao lv hai you dai ti gao 
guo qi shi zi yuan 
zi jin yu ren cai de gao di 
ru guo jing ying kun nan you zhi chi 
qi chuang xin neng li jiu hen nan xing cheng 
shen zhi hui tang zai guo jia shen shang xun qiu bao hu yu zhi chi 
shen hua guo you qi ye he guo you zi chan guan li ti zhi gai ge shi yi xiang bi xu wan cheng de jin po ren wu 
da zao zhong guo jing ji sheng ji ban de zhang xiao ji zhi 
da zao zhong guo jing ji sheng ji ban de guan jian 
shi da zao zhong guo gai ge de sheng ji ban 
yi zhi du chuang xin wei tu po kou 
tui dong ke ji chuang xin 
shi xian chuang xin you xian de kua yue shi fa zhan 
jian li zhan lve mo shi tiao shi ji zhi 
yi shi yao bian gan chao zhan lve wei yao su you shi fa zhan zhan lve 
zheng que ren shi wo guo zi yuan neng yuan bu zu de ke guan xian shi 
qie shi jiang di jing ji zeng zhang dui huan jing zi yuan deng sheng chan yao su tou ru de guo du yi lai 
zhu zhong jie jian gong ye hua guo jia de cheng gong jing yan 
zou bi jiao you shi 
jie yue ji yue 
ke chi xu fa zhan de xin xing gong ye hua dao lu 
er shi yao bian bu ping heng fa zhan zhan lve wei he xie fa zhan zhan lve 
yao tiao zheng fei jun heng de qu yu fa zhan zhan lve 
jia kuai jian li ji ben gong gong fu wu jun deng hua bao zhang ji zhi 
bao chi ge de ju you can yu jing zheng yu chi xu fa zhan de ji ben neng li 
you hua qu yu jie gou 
san shi bian chu kou dao xiang 
tou zi dao xiang xing wei tou zi 
chu kou yu xiao fei xie tiao la dong fa zhan zhan lve 
yao zhuan bian si xiang guan nian 
gai jin zheng ce ti xi 
wan shan ji li ji zhi 
si shi tiao zheng gan bu ji xiao ping jia zhi biao ti xi 
da po yi lun ying xiong 
geng duo kao lv sheng tai huan jing 
jing ji xiao yi 
ke ji chuang xin yu min sheng gai shan deng yin su 
zhuan bian zi yuan pei zhi fang shi 
shi shi chang zai zi yuan pei zhi zhong qi jue ding xing zuo yong he geng hao fa hui zheng fu zuo yong 
bu jin shi jie gou you hua 
xiao lv ti sheng de gen ben bao zheng 
ye shi chuang xin de gen ben dong li 
li kai shi chang 
li kai qi ye 
rang chuang xin cheng wei sheng chan li zhi neng shi 
kong zhong lou ge 
dang qian shou yao de shi ming que zheng fu yu shi chang de bian jie 
yan ge yue shu zheng fu tou zi zhi jie jie ru shi chang wei guan ling yu 
que li qi ye tou zi zhu ti di wei 
chu guan xi guo jia an quan he gong gong zhong da li yi xiang mu wai 
yi lv you qi ye zi you jue ce 
zhen zheng luo shi 
shei cheng dan feng xian 
de ji ben yao qiu 
zheng fu zhu yao shen he 
deng fu wai bu xing wen ti 
yao da po chan ye fan li 
fang kai shi chang zhun ru 
ti sheng gong ye hua 
cheng zhen hua zhi liang 
chuang zao ge zhong shi chang zhu ti gong ping shi yong yao su zi yuan 
gong ping jing zheng de gui fan zhi du huan jing 
tui dong chan ye fa yu yu sheng ji 
yu ci tong shi 
zheng fu yao ba guan zhu dian cong shen pi huan jie zhuan yi dao jian guan huan jie 
rang suo you de shi chang zhu ti 
she hui zhu ti you can yu jing ji she hui huo dong he chuang xin de ji hui 
ling yi fang mian 
gai shan he jia qiang jian guan 
dui yu zhi xu po huai zhe shi yi zhong fa 
jia kuai yao su jia ge ti xi gai ge 
yao su jia ge jue ding shi chang zhu ti de cheng ben 
shou yi ji qi wang zhi de gao di 
chuang xin ju you zhong da ying xiang 
wo guo chan pin shi chang ji ben xing cheng 
er yao su shi chang que bei gan yu guo duo 
ji zhong ti xian zai zi yuan xing chan pin jia ge ji li lv 
gong zi deng yao su jia ge fang mian 
zi yuan xing chan pin jia ge guan zhi dao zhi jia ge bu wan quan 
shi chang fa xian bing xing cheng jia ge de ji zhi shi ling 
dian xin deng ling yu de jia ge gai ge shi zhong dian 
jie neng jian pai 
fa zhan xin neng yuan 
guang dian de fa zhan 
ding jia ji zhi shi guan jian 
ying tong guo zi yuan shui gai ge 
guo you zi yuan chan quan shou yi zhi du gai ge 
shi xian zi yuan xing chan pin jia ge xing cheng de shi chang hua 
ba wai bu cheng ben he suo you zhe quan yi ti xian yu jia ge zhi zhong 
yi zhen shi fan ying yao su xi que xing 
li lv shi jin rong zi yuan jia ge 
shi guan jin rong zi yuan pei zhi de xin hao he pei zhi xiao lv 
dang qian yao jin kuai jie jue zi jin jia ge xing zheng hua qing xiang 
xiao chu yin hang zhu yao kao chi li cha de bi duan 
tui dong yin hang rong ru shi ti jing ji 
ti sheng yin hang jing zheng li he fu wu chuang xin de neng li 
yao jia kuai tui jin li lv shi chang hua 
jian li cun kuan bao xian zhi du 
wan shan jin rong ji gou shi chang hua tui chu ji zhi 
shi jian zheng ming 
jin rong zi yuan pei zhi xiao lv de ti sheng 
guan jian zai yu yin hang ti zhi 
zi ben shi chang deng jin rong ling yu gai ge de shen hua 
gong zi shi lao dong de bao chou 
ye shi shou ru fen pei de zhong yao nei rong 
lao dong zhe zuo wei sheng chan yao su 
ying jie shou lao dong shi chang de ji ben gui ze 
dan zheng fu ying jia qiang dui lao dong shi chang de jian guan 
wan shan qi ye gong zi ji ti xie yi zhi 
sun hai lao dong zhe quan yi 
zhe ye shi bao rong xing zeng zhang de ying you zhi yi 
you qi shi zai cheng zhen hua ti su bei jing xia 
gong gong fu wu yao zhu bu fu gai suo you chang zhu ren kou 
yi gai shan lao dong li shi chang yun xing tiao jian 
zhong su chuang xin dao xiang de ke jiao ti zhi 
chong fen diao dong ke jiao ren yuan de ji ji xing 
shi ke jiao ti zhi gai ge de ji ben qu xiang 
ke yan ji gou 
jiao yu ji gou qu xing zheng hua 
shi dang qian shi shi ke jiao gai ge de zhong yao zhua shou 
yao jian li mian xiang guo ji 
mian xiang shi chang 
mian xiang xian dai hua de ke ji jiao yu zhu ti 
li shun zheng fu yu ke yan ji gou 
jiao yu ji gou zhi jian de guan xi 
fu yu qi geng duo de ke yan yu jiao xue zi zhu quan 
xiang guan zheng fu bu men de zhi ze ying shi fang xiang yin dao 
biao zhun zhi ding 
shi shi jian guan 
ke ji zi yuan pei zhi ying ti xian qi ye wei zhu ti de shi chang dao xiang 
tong guo ding ceng she ji 
ge zi wei zheng 
jiu long zhi shui 
jie jian guo ji jing yan 
chu bao ji chu xing gong yi xing ke yan ji gou wai 
qi ta de ying geng duo di mian xiang shi chang 
chuang xin qu dong zhong de ji zhi an pai 
wei qi ye ji shu chuang xin da zao gong gong ping tai 
you zheng fu tou zi de da xing ke yan she shi ying xiang quan she hui kai fang 
jin ke neng jiang di qi ye ji shu chuang xin zhong de cheng ben yu feng xian 
jiao yu zi yuan pei zhi ying yi jiao yu gong ping wei dao xiang 
chong fen fa hui she hui li liang ban xue zuo yong 
ji huo min ban jiao yu 
wei guo jia chuang xin qu dong fa zhan zhan lve da hao ji chu 
jiao yu guan hu ren de neng li fa zhan 
ye shi qi ye neng li 
guo jia zong he jing zheng li ti sheng de qian ti tiao jian 
jiao yu gai ge ying luo dao ti gao ren de su zhi yu neng li shang lai 
yao tong guo zhao kao zhi du chuang xin 
chong fen fa hui jiao yu zai zhi shi chuang xin 
ji shu chuang xin zhong de zhi cheng zuo yong 
shen hua chan quan zhi du gai ge 
shen hua guo qi gai ge he guo you zi chan guan li ti zhi gai ge 
yao tu chu xi tong she ji 
mian dui quan qiu hua shi chang yu jing zheng xing shi 
yao zhen zheng qu xing zheng hua 
shen hua ren shi yu shou ru fen pei zhi du gai ge 
yao tui dong you 
zu jian ruo gan da xing guo you zi ben tou zi ji tuan 
an shi chang ji zhi you hua guo you zi chan pei zhi 
yi hun he suo you zhi fang shi yin ling chuang xin fa zhan 
dui yu bu tong xing zhi di guo you zi chan 
ke yi fen lei guan li 
dan ying dang bi mian zhi du gai ge de sui pian hua 
jin yi bu ming xi guo qi he guo you zi chan de shi ming 
wei guo you jing ji de zhan lve tiao zheng ti gong fang xiang 
jia kuai gong gong zi yuan de chan quan gai ge 
dui guo jia suo you de ge zhong gong gong zi yuan jin xing chan quan jie ding 
zhua jin jian li bao kuo zi ran zi yuan 
jing ying xing zi chan 
fei jing ying xing zi chan 
jin rong zi chan he wu xing zi chan de gong gong chan quan zhi du 
guo jia suo you 
fen ji guan li 
an zhao chan quan xing shi ming que ge ji zheng fu de quan li bing jin ru shi chang 
zhe shi jian shao jing ji xun zu 
cu jin shi chang zhu ti xing wei zheng chang hua de tiao jian 
ru guo qi ye you e wai de fei jing ying xing li run lai yuan 
jiu hui dao zhi jing ji ji hui zhu yi sheng xing 
zai zhe zhong tiao jian xia 
qi ye ji bu yuan zhuan bian fa zhan mo shi 
ye bu hui zhi li chuang xin bing xun qiu xin de ying li dian 
yao tong guo chan quan zhi du gai ge yu wan shan 
wei zhong guo jing ji sheng ji ban da zao he ge de shi chang zhu ti yu nei zai de dong li ji zhi 
zhong guo cai zheng bu fu bu zhang 
hang zhou xiao fang bu men jie dao shi min bao jing 
cheng bin jiang qu chang jiang zhong lu tie lu han dong kou fu jin yi xi che dian nei yi you zha dan 
xiao fang he gong an bu men yi jing gan dao xian chang chu zhi 
ju xiao fang ren yuan cheng 
yi si zha dan de wu pin wei yu xi che dian yi liang jiao che di bu 
you pu tong shou ji da xiao 
ji zhe liao jie dao 
gai xi che dian wei yu yi ge nong mao shi chang nei 
ren liu bi jiao ji zhong 
xiao fang guan bing yi jiang fu jin ju min shu san 
chai dan zhuan jia gan dao xian chang 
dui yi si zha dan de wu pin jin xing le jian ce 
pan duan wei zhui zong qi de ke neng xing hen da 
jing fang zheng zai pai bao zhong 
liu yong ta liu li hu 
qing ming jie deng wu ge fa ding jie jia ri bu zai diao xiu 
shou ci ying xiang 
ge de qun zhong shi ru he an pai zhe yi tian jia qi de 
ji zhe jin xing le zou fang 
yuan dan ying jian shen re 
gen ju ji nan shi qi xiang zi liao ji zai 
zhe shi jin ru 
hou ji nan zui nuan de yi ge yuan dan 
qu nian zui leng 
tian qi ye zai wan 
shi min wang jin hu lin zhe qiu bao chu xian zai shan dong da xue de cao chang shang 
qu nian de zhe ge shi hou 
wo zhai zai jia li shui da jue 
tai leng bu yuan yi chu men 
zi liao ye zheng shi le zhe yi dian 
yun dong ying xin nian 
ying gai mei you bi zhe geng hao de fang shi le ba 
wang jin hu shuo 
zi ji te bie ai ti zu qiu 
dan ji nan de dong tian tai leng 
zhi hao zuo ba 
yuan dan zhe me nuan huo 
bi xu yao chu lai shai shai tai yang le 
shun bian lai yi chang 
qing zhu xin nian 
wang jin hu jin tian yue le ji ge ping shi de qiu you 
yi qi huo dong 
jin tian de ji nan chu le qi wen gao 
kong qi zhi liang ye hai bu cuo 
xiang bi qian ji tian 
dong tian li bei 
fen fen zou chu jia men 
yi duan lian shen ti de fang shi ying jie xin de yi nian 
zai bo tu quan 
zai da ming hu 
zai ying xiong shan 
ren men san wu cheng qun 
xiang shou zhe nan de de 
ying xiong shan zai ji nan shi zhong xin di dai 
shi fu jin shi min pa shan jian shen de shou xuan 
zai shan jiao xia 
zhe tian qi nuan huo 
pa shan de ren duo 
sheng yi hai bu cuo 
ji zhe fa xian 
yi xie shi min shen zhi tuo xia le hou zhong de dong zhuang 
qing zhuang jian shen 
jiu yi tiao ku zi 
shao yi yun dong jiu chu han 
yi wei da ye xiang ji zhe zhan shi ta de yu han 
zhe guo yuan dan 
qi hou yi ren 
kong qi qing xin 
ren men fen fen xuan ze zai xin nian de di yi tian li lai dao hu wai 
hai kou shi ren da hui tang gong jiao zhan dian 
yi ge da bu kua shang zhan tai hou 
xiang ge yi tiao ma lu 
zhan tai de dui mian shi hai kou shi zui da de cheng shi zhong xin lv de gong yuan wan lv yuan 
wan lv yuan nei zao yi shi ren tou cuan dong 
huai bao zhe hai zi de fu qi 
tian mi di qing lv 
lai lai wang wang 
you ren ru zhi 
mei xiang dao jing cheng le fu lei 
you yu ren tai duo 
che deng zhe hai bu ru zou zhe kuai 
bu jin ru ci 
dan xin che hui zhuang dao xing ren 
xiang qian mian de xing ren jie dao 
bao zhe yi zhi xin zu qiu zhan zai gong yuan li fan chou 
yong you da kuai da kuai lv de de wan lv yuan yi zhi shi ta lian qiu de hao di fang 
ke jin tian ren shan ren hai 
ta gen ben wu fa shi zhan 
hai kou shi guo mao shang ye qu de xu duo dian pu li ye shi yi fan re nao huo bao de chang mian 
zai ming zhu lu shang de yi jia da xing chao shi nei 
ji tian qian hai shi sheng dan qi xi de bu zhi 
ru jin yi huan cheng yi pian hong se de 
tui zhe gou wu che 
na zhe gou wu lan de shi min men 
zai chao shi li ji hu zhi neng nuo zhe bu zi 
chu ci zhi wai 
zhe li hai neng ting dao tian nan hai bei de fang yan 
zuo wei guo ji lv you dao hai nan sheng de sheng hui 
xin nian di yi tian 
jiu yi ge zi 
zai jia li guo yuan dan 
qu nian bei jing zao yu 
dan san tian de 
yi jiu mei you jiao xi ren men chu xing de re qing 
yu wang nian bu tong de shi 
jin nian yuan dan jia qi 
jia shang gao su gong lu tong xing ye bu mian fei 
xiang bi qi chu men yuan you 
bei jing shi min geng yuan yi xuan ze 
ji zhe zai ku xun wang shang cha xun dao 
jin ri cong bei jing chu fa de hang ban piao jia fen fen da zhe 
bei jing zhan de ke liu liang ye bi wang ri shao le hen duo 
shi zhi nian guan 
bei jing de qi wen que chu hu yi liao 
xu duo shi min fen fen xuan ze chu men guang jie 
ji zhe lai dao xi dan shang ye jie 
zhe li zao yi ren tou cuan dong 
shi min li xian sheng gao su ji zhe 
wo gen hen duo tong shi dou xuan ze qu zhou bian di qu wan 
ke jin nian zhi you yi tian jia ye zou bu yuan 
bei jing you nan de yu shang ge hao tian qi 
suo yi wo gen peng you men xiang yao chu men guang jie 
jin guan ru ci 
yi jiu you hen da yi bu fen ren xuan ze 
zai jia zhong guo yuan dan 
ta gao su ji zhe 
jin nian yuan dan jiu yi tian jia qi 
xiang zhe qu nian mang lu le yi zheng nian 
jin nian kai nian jiu xiang shui ge lan jue 
zai jia hao hao xiu xi yi xia 
yi wei zai bei jing gong zuo de wai di wang you zai wei bo shang shuo de yi duan hua 
dai biao le zhong duo zai jing gong zuo de wai di ren de xin sheng 
yuan dan yi tian jia 
jia ban tai zhang 
lv xing tai duan 
hui jia tai yuan 
bu ru jiu hao hao 
zai jia xiu xi 
wei xin yi nian de mang lu yang jing xu rui ba 
chen shang ying gao jie zhang yu jie tu chao hua 
shi jie fan wei nei pin fa de yan zhong 
sheng wu shi jian 
shi de guo fang yi jing tu po lu 
dian de jiang jie 
sheng wu jiang yu 
sheng wu jiang yu 
shi yi ge guo jia wei le bao hu sheng ming zi yuan yi ji yu zhi xiang guan de quan yi kong jian 
ying gai ju bei de sheng wu an quan bao hu he sheng wu wei xie fang yu shi li de fan wei 
sheng wu jiang yu 
an quan yu guo jia he xin li yi mi qie xiang guan 
shi guo jia an quan de zhong yao zu cheng bu fen 
yue lai yue shou dao ge guo zheng fu de gao du zhong shi 
xu duo guo jia ba sheng wu an quan na ru guo jia zhan lve 
zuo wei guo fang he jun shi bo yi de zhi gao dian 
wo guo zheng zhi jing ji fa zhan zhuan xing qi he she hui mao dun tu xian qi 
geng xu cong guo jia an quan de zhan lve gao du shen ke ren shi quan qiu sheng wu an quan xing shi 
chong fen jie jian xian jin sheng wu an quan guan li jing yan 
gou jian xin xing sheng wu wei xie fang yu ti xi 
wei shi xian fu guo qiang jun mu biao bao jia hu hang 
quan qiu sheng wu an quan xing shi yan jun 
wo guo mian lin yan zhong sheng wu wei xie 
sui zhe guo ji xing shi ri qu fu za 
you de yuan huan jing 
li yi zheng duan deng yin fa de sheng wu an quan wen ti yu jia tu chu 
wei hu guo jia an quan he she hui wen ding 
xu yao lao gu shu li 
sheng wu jiang yu 
qie shi ren qing mian lin de sheng wu wei xie 
quan qiu sheng wu an quan xing shi fei chang yan jun 
quan qiu sheng wu an quan xing shi cheng xian ying xiang guo ji hua 
wei hai ji duan hua 
fa zhan fu za hua de te dian 
jin zhi sheng wu wu qi gong yue 
you ling nan xing 
sheng wu wu qi yan fa lv jin bu zhi 
sheng wu zhan de wei xie reng ran cun zai 
bing yuan ti kua wu zhong gan ran 
kua di yu chuan bo 
zao cheng xin fa tu fa chuan ran bing bu duan chu xian 
you zi ran zai hai 
ren wei yin su zao cheng de tu fa gong gong wei sheng shi jian ceng chu bu qiong 
huan jing wu ran 
wai lai wu zhong ru qin deng zao cheng yan zhong sheng tai huan jing po huai 
ji yin zi yuan liu shi xian xiang shi you fa sheng 
zhe xie jun cheng wei shi jie ge guo gong tong mian dui de zhong da sheng wu an quan wen ti 
xin xing sheng wu wei xie te dian ming xian bian hua 
shou guo ji zheng zhi dou zheng chi xu jin xing 
wu qi zhuang bei gao xin ji shu hua 
ren wei gu yi xing dong deng yin su de ying xiang 
xin xing sheng wu wei xie de te dian fa sheng ming xian bian hua 
wei lai sheng wu wei xie zhu yao biao xian xing shi ke neng shi tu fa de ren huo dong 
zhi wu yi qing 
yu zi ran fa sheng de chuan ran bing yi qing huo tu fa gong gong wei sheng shi jian hen nan fen qing 
bing yuan ti ke neng qu yu di zhi si 
nan zhui su de te xing 
shi shi shou duan ke neng shi he cheng he shi fang xin bing yuan ti zhi zao ke yi yi qing deng 
wei hai fan wei bu jin zhi xiang sheng ming jian kang 
er qie zhong zai wei xie she hui he zheng fu 
yi da cheng zheng zhi 
jun shi mu di 
wo guo sheng wu an quan wei xie zhong lei zeng duo 
wo guo zuo wei dang jin shi jie kuai su fa zhan de xin xing jing ji ti 
chu yu shi jie fu za ge ju de zhong xin 
da guo bo yi de xuan wo 
mian lin duo zhong sheng wu wei xie 
yi xie guo jia huo zu zhi li yong bing yuan ti shi shi sheng wu wei xie de feng xian bu duan zeng jia 
cheng wei guo jia an quan mian lin de zhong da tiao zhan 
zhong da xin fa tu fa chuan ran bing yi qing 
shi yuan xing ji bing 
dong wu yi bing zeng jia deng wen ti 
yan zhong wei hai ren min jian kang 
ji yin zu xue 
he cheng sheng wu ji shu ying yong 
yi ji sheng wu shi yan shi xie lou shi gu 
cun zai zhe qian zai feng xian 
wai lai wu zhong ru qin zao cheng wu zhong mie jue su du jia kuai 
yi chuan duo yang xing sang shi 
sheng tai huan jing po huai qu shi bu duan jia ju 
ren min ri bao 
wo guo ji hu suo you sheng tai xi tong jun zao ru qin 
qi zhong da mian ji fa sheng 
sheng wu an quan di wei zhong yao 
wo guo sheng wu wei xie fang yu neng li ji xu jia qiang 
wo guo xu yao qiang hua 
sheng wu guo fang 
jie jian guo ji xian jin de sheng wu an quan guan li jing yan 
jin kuai mi bu sheng wu wei xie fang yu neng li de bu zu 
sheng wu an quan shi guo jia he xin li yi de zhong yao bao zheng 
yi ge guo jia ru guo chu xian sheng wu an quan wen ti 
jiang hui yan zhong ying xiang dao min zhong jian kang 
jing ji yun xing 
she hui zhi xu 
guo jia an quan he zheng ju wen ding 
dui jing ji zao cheng de sun shi wu fa gu ji 
di yi ci shi jie da zhan ceng yin chuan ran bing bao fa liu xing 
dui jiao zhan shuang fang de zhan zheng sheng fu chan sheng le zhong yao ying xiang 
zuo hao sheng wu wei xie fang yu gong zuo 
she ji guo jia an quan deng he xin li yi 
bi xu jia qiang 
sheng wu an quan shi guo jia zhan lve mu biao di zhong yao zhi zhu 
xu duo guo jia ba sheng wu an quan na ru guo jia an quan zhan lve 
jian li yi jun dui xiang guan ji gou wei zhu de sheng wu fang yu ti xi 
bing cong guo fang he jun shi jiao du ji ji qiang zhan zhan lve zhi gao dian 
mei guo xian hou zhi ding ban bu le sheng wu dun pai ji hua 
sheng wu jian ce ji hua he sheng wu chuan gan ji hua 
bing wei rao zhe san ge ji hua bu shu le yi xi lie ming xian ju you guo fang he jun shi yi tu de xiang mu ren wu 
zai sheng wu fan kong he yi qing chu zhi zhong fa hui zhong yao zuo yong 
de guo jiang chuan ran bing ding xing wei guo jia an quan wei xie 
ao da li ya deng guo ye fen bie ba an quan 
guo fang deng bu men na ru gong gong wei sheng ti xi 
zhe xie zu yi zheng ming sheng wu an quan zai guo jia zhan lve bu shu zhong de zhong yao di wei 
wo guo sheng wu wei xie fang yu neng li jian she ji xu jia qiang 
wo men dang he zheng fu mi qie guan zhu sheng wu an quan wen ti 
ti chu yao jia kuai fa zhan sheng wu an quan ji shu 
gou jian xian jin guo jia an quan he gong gong an quan ti xi 
you xiao fang fan dui ren min sheng huo he sheng tai huan jing de sheng wu wei xie 
wo guo zhu bu jian li le bing yuan wei sheng wu sheng wu an quan guo jia zhong dian shi yan shi 
guo jia sheng wu fang hu zhuang bei gong cheng ji shu yan jiu zhong xin deng ke ji zhi cheng ping tai 
bing ba jun dui ji bing yu fang kong zhi ji gou na ru guo jia gong gong wei sheng ti xi jian she 
yi jing gou jian le chu bu de sheng wu wei xie fang yu ti xi 
zai fei dian xing fei yan 
yu fa da guo jia xian jin de sheng wu an quan guan li jing yan xiang bi 
wo guo zai sheng wu wei xie jian ce yu jing 
ying ji chu zhi he ke ji zhi cheng deng fang mian reng ran cun zai bu shao bo ruo huan jie 
ji xu cong zhan lve gui hua yan jiu 
zu zhi guan li ti zhi 
ke xue ji shu yan jiu 
xuan chuan jiao yu pei xun deng fang mian jia qiang jian she 
sheng wu an quan she ji mian guang 
ji xu gou jian xin xing sheng wu wei xie fang yu ti xi 
wo guo sheng wu an quan she ji bu men jiao duo 
ji xu yi shen hua gai ge wei qi ji 
qiang hua guo jia yi zhi 
zhi ding zhan lve gui hua 
gou jian tong yi zhi hui 
bu men xie tong 
quan min can yu de xin xing sheng wu wei xie fang yu ti xi 
jian li quan wei gao xiao de sheng wu wei xie fang yu zu zhi guan li ti xi 
da tong tiao kuai fen ge de sheng wu an quan guan li ge ju 
zai ge ji zheng fu jian li quan wei de sheng wu an quan guan li ji gou 
shi shi tong yi ling dao 
xie tiao he zhi hui 
qiang hua jun dui zai guo jia sheng wu wei xie fang yu zhong de te shu di wei he zhong yao zuo yong 
fa hui jun dui gao du ji zhong tong yi 
ke ji shi li jiao qiang 
ying ji fan ying jiao kuai de ming xian you shi 
yi jun dui xiang guan zhuan ye li liang wei zhu ti 
gou jian ping zhan yi ti xian jie 
yi ji duo bu men lian he chu zhi de fen gong xie tiao ji zhi 
tong shi jia qiang xiang ying de fa gui zhi du jian she 
you shi hu bu 
gou jian sheng wu wei xie fang yu ke ji zhi cheng ti xi 
zai mo qing wo guo sheng wu wei xie fang yu neng li ti xi jian she xian zhuang de ji chu shang jin xing bu que pei tao 
ti gao zheng ti shui ping 
zhen dui quan qiu sheng wu an quan xing shi yi ji wo guo wei lai ke neng mian lin de sheng wu wei xie 
xi tong lun zheng sheng wu wei xie fang yu de ke ji xu qiu 
qian zhan bu shu guo jia he jun dui sheng wu wei xie fang yu zhong da ke ji zhuan xiang 
zhong dian zai jian ce yu jing 
ying ji chu zhi 
ji chu yan jiu deng fang mian jia da ke ji zhi cheng li du 
zai sheng wu liang yong pin an quan guan kong fang mian jia qiang dui ce yan jiu 
jian li duo yuan fen ceng de sheng wu wei xie fang yu jiao yu pei xun ti xi 
ba sheng wu an quan zhi shi na ru guo fang jiao yu ti xi 
jian li yi jun shi yi xue ke yan he jun dui ji bing yu fang kong zhi ji gou wei gu gan 
yi guo jia xiang ying ji gou wei yi tuo de jiao yu pei xun ti xi 
tong guo duo zhong xing shi 
kai zhan sheng wu an quan xuan chuan jiao yu 
shi ge ji zheng fu 
she hui ge jie chong fen ren shi sheng wu an quan de zhong yao xing 
jun dui yao shi zhong fa hui hao 
shi ke zhui zong quan qiu de sheng wu an quan dong tai 
zhong dian cong fan sheng wu zhan 
fan sheng wu kong bu de jiao du 
shen ru yan pan wo guo mian lin de 
bu duan bian hua de sheng wu wei xie 
jian jue han wei guo jia de 
sheng wu jiang yu 
jun shi yi xue ke xue yuan yuan zhang 
zhong guo ke xue yuan yuan shi 
jun shi yi xue ke xue yuan zheng wei 
e luo si zong tong pu jing di da fu er jia ge lei kan wang zai liang ci bao zha an zhong shou shang de ren yuan 
bing zai bao zha an xian chang xiang shi zhe xian hua ai dao 
e luo si zong tong pu jing di da fu er jia ge lei kan wang zai liang ci bao zha an zhong shou shang de ren yuan 
bing zai bao zha an xian chang xiang shi zhe xian hua ai dao 
ju ying guo guang bo gong si bao dao 
e luo si fu er jia ge lei shi zhong yang huo che zhan he yi liang wu gui dian che shang fa sheng liang qi zha dan gong ji 
e zong tong pu jing zai gai shi tan wang zha dan gong ji de shang zhe shi shuo 
wu lun zhe xie zui fan ru he wei zi ji de xing wei bian jie 
fan xia zhen dui ping min de zui xing shi jue bu ke yuan liang de 
fu er jia ge lei you yi bai wan ren kou 
zai er zhan qi jian 
zhe li ceng ming wei si da lin ge lei 
gai shi cai qu le geng jia yan ge de an bao cuo shi 
dang ju bu shu le shu qian ming jing cha 
xian zai hai mei you yi ge zu zhi sheng cheng zhi zao le zhe liang qi gong ji 
dan fen xi ren shi shuo 
zhe xie zha dan gong ji shi wei le po huai xia ge yue zai suo qi ju xing de dong ji ao yun hui 
bao dao ren wei 
zhe xie gong ji yu bei gao jia suo di qu de yi si lan ji jin fen zi yi wang fa dong de lan sha wu gu de gong ji shi fen xiang si 
diao cha ren yuan xiang xin 
yi ming nan xing zi sha shi zha dan gong zhe xi ji le na liang wu gui dian che 
ta men zheng zai jian yan ta de shi ti 
yi bian que ren ta de shen fen 
jing fang xiao xi lai yuan shuo 
dui huo che zhan fa dong de gong ji ke neng ye shi yi ming nan xing 
liang ci zha dan gong ji zhong de dan pian dou shi yi yang de 
fen xi ren shi shuo 
ta yi qian ceng duo ci zhi hui zhen dui e ping min mu biao di zha dan gong ji 
ta ceng fa shi ta de zhan shi jiang jin yi qie ke neng 
zu zhi suo qi dong ji ao yun hui de ju ban 
hang zhou yi xi che dian nei fa xian yi si zha dan chai dan zhuan jia yi dao chang chu zhi 
hang zhou bin jiang qu chang jiang zhong lu yi xi che dian de che liang di bu fa xian yi si zha dan 
jie dao bao jing hou 
dang di xiao fang he gong an bu men li ji gan dao xian chang chu zhi 
zhe jiang zai xian ji zhe gang gang cong bin jiang jing fang chu liao jie dao 
yi pai chu bao zha wu de ke neng xing 
chu bu pan duan wei yi ge zhui zong qi 
gai shi jian de xiang xi qing kuang 
jing fang hai zai diao cha dang zhong 
liu yong ta liu li hu 
dui yu feng zhang yu he cheng fan zhe dui 
xiao fu qi lai shuo xi you can ban 
jiu zai qian wan 
huan bing de cheng fan gang chuang guo yi dao sheng si guan 
cheng fan liang ci huan shang e xing lin ba liu 
feng zhang yu bu li bu qi reng qu ta wei qi 
jin liang nian lai 
zhi bing shi ta men sheng huo de wei yi zhu ti 
wo de xin nian yuan wang zhi you yi ge 
qi zi huo xia qu 
wo men xie shou ji xu chuang nan guan 
ta yuan fen yi ban shou ming gei ta 
zhan zhuan qian li 
feng zhang yu si chu wei cheng fan xun yi wen yao 
cheng fan yan xia zai he bei yi jia yi yuan zhi liao 
ta yi jing zuo wan gu sui yi zhi shou shu 
shu hou yi zhi shou pang guang yan kun rao 
zhu zhi yi sheng shuo 
ta de mian yi li shang wei chong jian wan cheng 
kang fu guo cheng yuan bi yi ban ren fu za 
bu shang ban shi 
feng zhang yu jiu shou zai qi zi shen bian 
pang guang yan mei shi ji fen zhong jiu yao xiao bian 
xu yao ren zhao gu 
feng zhang yu mei tian zhi neng shui yi xiao hui 
cheng fan bing fa de zhe liang nian 
feng zhang yu shou le shi duo jin 
cheng fan tu ran gao shao 
shen zhi shi qu yi shi 
zhi yao ta qing xing guo lai 
zheng kai yan kan zhe wo jiu xiao 
ta ji qi wo le 
dan shuo bu chu hua 
wo ceng jing shuo guo 
wo yuan yi na yi ban chu lai huan gei ta 
xian zai wo reng ran zhe me xiang 
wei chou qian ta fa 
cheng fan zhong yu tui shao le 
ren ye hui fu le yi shi 
feng zhang yu lve lve fang xia xin lai 
tai bu rong yi le 
yi sheng dou shuo shi qi ji 
qi zi wen ding zhu 
feng zhang yu you kai shi chou qian 
cong cheng fan bing fa dao xian zai 
feng zhang yu da gong zhuan de mei yi fen qian 
ji ben dou yong zai gei qi zi zhi liao shang 
sui zhe bing cheng de yan chang 
zhao qin peng hao you jie qian yue lai yue kun nan 
feng zhang yu zai wang shang fa le 
xi wang neng you qi ye yuan yi yu zhi xin shui gei qi zi zuo yi liao fei 
ta ze yi da gong bu chang 
ta zi shu mu qian zuo sheng chan gong yi gong cheng shi 
zhe dian qian zhuo jin jian zhou 
wo jiang xin ye yuan yi qu 
sui ran hai mei you shou dao hui yin 
dan shi feng zhang yu mei you hui xin 
ta biao shi hui jin yi qie nu li jie jue cheng fan zhi bing de wen ti 
xin nian xi wang guo shang ping dan sheng huo 
zai feng zhang yu de wei bo shang 
ji zhe kan dao 
ta mei tian dou bo bao cheng fan de bing qing bian hua 
tie chu bu tong qu dao de ai xin kuan 
fa le wan yu tiao wei bo 
wo xiang xiang ge fang ai xin ren shi biao da zun zhong 
tong shi xi wang de dao zhu fu 
feng zhang yu shuo 
cheng fan yi zhi hou zong ti zhi biao hai bi jiao hao 
zhe ci pang guang yan kang fu hou 
ta ke yi chu yuan zai jia xiu yang 
xin nian dao le 
feng zhang yu ke zeng xiang guo zi ji de wei lai 
wo xi wang deng ta hao qi lai 
wo men kai ge xiao dian 
neng guo ping dan de sheng huo jiu hen hao 
ta cong bu ji jiao zi ji de fu chu 
cong shang hai jiao tong zhu guan bu men huo xi 
shang hai shi gui dao jiao tong cheng ke shou ze 
yi xiu ding wan bi 
bing zuo wei xin xiu ding de 
shang hai shi gui dao jiao tong guan li tiao li 
pei tao gui fan xing wen jian 
bei shou she hui guan zhu de 
di tie che xiang jin shi 
gui ding bei xie ru shou ze 
di tie shou ze zai gong shi qi jian shou dao da liang shi min tao lun yi jian 
qi zhong dui di tie che xiang nei de jin shi wen ti de tao lun zui wei ji zhong 
qi zhong zhi chi jin shi de zhan le da bu fen 
xiu ding ban de shou ze ming que gui ding cheng ke 
bu de zai lie che che xiang nei yin shi 
da sheng xuan hua 
yu ci tong shi 
shang hai xin ban di tie shou ze hai gui ding cheng ke ying dang chi you xiao che piao cheng che 
xiang shou cheng che you hui de cheng ke ying dang chi ben ren you xiao zheng jian cheng che 
cheng ke bu de mao yong ta ren zheng jian 
shi yong wei zao zheng jian cheng che 
zai bao zhang cheng ke quan yi shang 
xin ban shou ze ming shi le xiang shou mian fei cheng che ren qun de xiang guan gui ding 
ming que can ji jun ren 
li xiu gan bu 
ge ming lie shi jia shu 
shang can jing cha he shang hai ben shi qi shi zhou sui yi shang lao ren ke mian fei cheng zuo gui dao jiao tong 
shang hai di tie shou ze hai xiu gai le dui cheng ke xie dai xing li de chi cun gui ding 
shi zhi yu gong jiao ke yun gui ze he hang kong de xing li chi cun yao qiu bao chi yi zhi 
tu wei ji shu yuan hu wei zheng zai xi yang chu xi yang 
yin hai ba gao 
yang qi han liang di 
gong ren gong zuo yi duan shi jian hou 
you que yang gan shi 
ke yi dao xi yang shi xi yang 
hu gui long she 
tu wei feng qiang shou zhang xi cheng zai ping xing dao dong nei shen shui qu shi gong zuo ye 
lian shang zhan man le ni shui 
hu gui long she 
hu gui long she 
xin nian yi shi 
shi jie gao tie di yi gao sui 
jian she zhe fang qi dong xiu he yuan dan xiu jia 
jian shou zai lan xin gao tie shi gong di yi xian 
heng guan zhong guo xi bei gan su 
xin jiang san sheng qu 
shi zhong guo shou tiao zai gao hai ba di qu xiu jian de gao su tie lu 
qi lian shan sui dao shi lan xin gao tie gan qing duan de zhong nan dian kong zhi xing gong cheng 
shi shi jie hai ba zui gao de gao yuan gao su tie lu dong tu sui dao 
shi jie gao tie di yi gao sui 
gai sui dao you zhong tie er shi ju ji tuan cheng jian 
gan su yu qing hai jiao jie de qi lian shan 
you yu di zhi tiao jian fu za 
gao di ying li 
sui xie liu deng duo ge shi jie xing sui dao ji shu nan ti ji zhong chu xian 
gei shi gong dai lai hen da kun nan 
sui dao jian she zhe men ke fu gao han que yang 
dong nei kong qi zhi liang cha 
ruan ruo wei yan 
yong shui da deng bu li yu shi gong yin su 
bu ci xin lao ri ye fen zhan 
mian dui ji zhe de jing tou 
ta men yong wei xiao biao da zhe dui sui dao zao ri guan tong de qi pan 
xin nian de di yi tian 
ta men reng zai sui dao li xin ku gong zuo 
jin che ku qian 
kou dai shi bian de 
chu che ku hou 
kou dai gu gu de
