jia jing yin shi 
fu qin shi da xue jiao shou 
mu qin shi dian zi gong si lao zong 
pan ni de wang mou wei zhui qiu ci ji xi guan ai ge la kai ting che chang che zi de che men 
peng dao mei shang suo de 
ta jiu zuan jin che li jiang che zhu de cai wu 
shun shou qian yang 
wang mou you ge qi guai pi hao 
xi huan la kai bie ren de che men 
yi kan dao che zi 
ta jiu ren bu zhu xiang la che men 
che men la kai hou 
ta jiu tou zou che li de dong xi 
shei dou xiang bu dao 
wang mou jing shi ge yong you duo tao fang chan de fu er dai 
dan ta jiu shi guan bu zhu zi ji de shou 
ban nian duo lai 
duo liang wei shang suo de che zi bu xing 
hao che ju kuan bu yi er fei 
chen xian sheng shi yi jia gong si de cai wu 
ting fang zai kai xuan guang chang di xia yi ceng de ting che chang li 
yue yi xiao shi hou ta jia che li kai 
dao da ji chang hou 
zhe ke ba ta gei ji huai le 
zhe xie qian ke shi zhun bei gei gong si yuan gong fa gong zi de 
ru guo zhao bu hui lai 
tong guo jian kong lu xiang 
wu cun pai chu suo min jing fa xian wang mou ceng zai zhe duan shi jian nei 
pin fan jin chu shi qie zhe chen xian sheng ting che de di xia che ku 
wang mou de hei se xi ku kou dai bian bian de 
chu lai hou kou dai que gu le qi lai 
min jing ren ding wang mou jiu shi xian yi ren 
wang mou xiang jing fang jiao dai 
ta gong si de cang ku jiu zai kai yue guang chang de di xia che ku li mian 
ta xia lou zhun bei dao cang ku na dong xi 
qi zhong yi liang bao ma che de che men bei la kai le 
wang mou zuan jin che li 
qu chu xian jin kuai su li kai 
dan mei duo jiu 
wang mou you huang mang pao hui bao ma che pang 
ba bao guo xian jin de bao zhi zheng li hao hou li kai 
bu chu ji fen zhong 
wang mou zai ci hui dao che ku 
yuan lai ta fa xian zi ji wang ji dao cang ku na dong xi le 
cheng wei le min jing po an de you li xian suo 
qian wan fu weng you 
la che men pi 
dang min jing na zhe wang mou zhao pian gei ta suo zhu xiao qu de wu ye zhu ren bian ren shi 
ta na me you qian 
zen me hui tou qian ne 
wang mou shi ge fu er dai 
zai xia men yong you duo tao fang chan 
fu qin shi da xue jiao shou 
mu qin shi dian zi gong si lao zong 
qian wan fu weng wang mou hen pan ni 
wei zhui qiu ci ji huo de kuai gan 
ta xi huan la bie ren che de che men 
er qie zhe zhong 
la che men pi 
yi chi xu ban nian duo le 
mei dao yi ge di fang 
wang mou dou hui ba ting fang zai na de che zi ai ge la yi bian 
peng dao mei shang suo de che men 
ta jiu jin qu luan fan yi tong 
fan dao hao dong xi jiu 
shun shou qian yang 
wang mou la kai yi liang xiao che de men 
tou zou che nei de yi tai bi ji ben dian nao 
wang mou hai cong yi liang che nei tou zou le ni kang xiang ji he jing tou 
che nei de yi ping yang jiu bu ru ta de yan 
sui shou bei diu diao le 
mu qian wei zhi 
dang wang mou bei song jin kan shou suo shi 
ta de qi zi ting zhe da du zi 
lei yan wang wang 
min jing ti xing 
wei fang zhi che liang bei tou 
che nei jin liang bu yao fang gui zhong wu pin 
ren li kai che zi hou 
wu bi yao suo hao che men 
ceng yin lai shou cang jie zhu mu 
shang hai bo wu guan shu hua yan jiu bu zhuan jia guan yu 
su shi shu fa 
de xiao xi yi jing bao dao 
rang song dai wen hao su dong po gei hao you guo gong fu qin bi xie de jiu zi bian tiao cheng wei ye jie re yi hua ti 
liu yi qian di yi shi jian hui ying cheng 
zai jing pai gai zuo pin zhi qian ceng qing zhuan jia zuo guo jian ding 
bing wu zhen wei zhi yi 
cheng su fu bi jiang cheng li te bie xiao zu 
yao qing quan qiu bo wu guan de zhuan jia dui 
de zhen wei jin xing yan jiu tao lun 
ta zhi yi zhong yin lan 
ling li zhong de yan jiu fang shi 
hu yu san wei zhuan jia de yan jiu wen zhang jin kuai mian shi 
yi jie kun huo 
mai fang su fu bi fang mian ye fa biao sheng ming 
wei song dai shi ren su shi de zuo pin 
wo fang zhi jin mei you jie dao jin ri mei ti shang suo ti dao sheng cheng ci jian zuo pin wei wei zuo de suo wei bao gao 
bei shou guan zhu de dan guo lin 
zhong guo wen wu bao   shou cang jian shang zhou kan 
ling li zhong zai wen zhong chan ming 
ta men dui li yong 
shuang gou kuo tian 
zhi fa zhi zao yan pin de hua shi xian xiang jin xing le shen ru de kao zheng he yan jiu 
shu hua jian ying 
zhong zhu lu de 
su mi han zha he ce 
zhong de su shi 
liang jian wei ben zuo wei zhong dian an li dian xing 
shuang gou kuo tian 
shuang gou tian mo 
zai tang song shi zhu yao yong lai bao hu yuan ji 
lin mo xue xi 
ci fa yi yu chuan bo liu xing 
dao le ke tie cheng feng de wan qing 
cheng le fang jian zuo wei 
zhi zao shu fa yan pin 
qi shi mou li de zhu yao shou duan zhi yi 
dan guo lin zai 
su shi gong fu tie bian xi 
cong zi de xing ti shang kan 
yu su shi de shu ti xiang fu 
you qi jie jin yu 
da bu fen bi fa jiao wei feng run liu chang 
ran er you xie di fang que xian de bie niu 
ta ren wei ke neng shi mo xie suo zao cheng de shi wu 
dui weng fang gang ti ba 
dan guo lin cong yin jian he shu fa liang fang mian ru shou 
pan duan yi wei wei zao 
zhen dui guo jia wen wu zhuan jia 
jian ding min jian shou cang jia cang pin de zhi yi 
shang bo zhuan jia hui ying shi cong chun xue shu jiao du jin xing yan jiu yu tan tao 
er fei xin xue lai chao huo lian shou chao zuo 
ta men tong guo dui shang bo zi jia guan cang 
de yan jiu er shun dai she ji 
yin wei liang zhe ke yi hu xiang zuo zheng 
dan guo lin zao xian zai jie shou ji zhe cai fang shi biao shi 
zai pai mai gong si zhu chi de shu hua pai mai zhong 
shu hua pai mai mei you zhen shi de jian ding ji gou 
yi ban dou shi pai mai xing zi ji huo zhe pin qing zhuan jia jin xing 
qi mu di jin shi wei le que ding pai pin neng fou da dao pai mai yao qiu 
you xie pai mai xing qing lai de jian ding zhe shen zhi bu shi zhuan jia 
zhe xie ren de jian ding neng li you gao you di 
bu neng zheng que ba wo 
yi zhi chu xian zhen wei nan bian 
yu long hun za de xian xiang 
zhen zheng de zhuan jia jian ding jie guo ye bu yi ding wan quan zheng que 
you cuo wu ye zheng chang 
dan yao qu fen shi you yi wei zhi hai shi wu xin zhi shi 
ru guo shi you li yi guan xi de luan shuo yi qi 
jiang jia de shuo cheng zhen de 
shi bi hui zao cheng shi chang hun luan 
ci jian wen wu jie zhuan jia pu bian ren wei 
zhen wei zhi bian shi bi hui huo re yi zhen 
jie lun ye hen nan xia 
yin wei wen wu jian ding zhu guan xing guo qiang 
er liu yi qian ci qian jie shou mei ti cai fang shi ceng biao shi 
ru guo zhen shi wei zuo 
jiang yu su fu bi jiao she shen zhi tui huo 
zai ya ding wan xi bu mou hai yu 
zhong guo hai jun di shi liu pi hu hang bian dui luo yang jian 
li yong hu hang jian xi zu zhi te zhan dui yuan jin xing hai shang shi dan she ji 
zhe ye shi di shi liu pi hu hang bian dui shou ci jin xing de qing wu qi shi dan she ji xun lian 
wang jian jia she 
xin jiang ka na si di qi jie bing xue feng qing lv you jie zai gai jing qu he mu cun guan jing ping tai ju xing 
zhong duo you ke cheng zuo ma la pa li qian wang huo dong ju ban de 
guan kan gu lao mao pi hua xue 
xue de sai ma 
xue de shi yin 
xue de she jian 
bao shi tou deng dang di chun pu de min su biao yan 
dong ji de ka na si yin zhuang suo guo 
bing qing yu jie 
ka na si jing qu shi meng gu zu tu wa ren zai zhong guo wei yi de ju ji de 
bei yu wei ren lei you mu wen hua de bo wu guan 
zhi jin yi ran bao liu zhe chuan tong de sheng chan sheng huo fang shi 
yun jian bu luo 
lin zhong bai xing 
tu wei xue de diao yang 
er dang tian zai xia men jie shou ji zhe cai fang shi 
guo jia ti yu zong ju tian jing yun dong guan li zhong xin jing sai bu bu zhang zhang yong liang que gan kai 
zhong guo tian jing xuan shou xuan ba yu dao ping jing 
you ji zhe wen ji zai liu xiang zhi hou 
zhong guo ru he fa jue chu xin de tian jing ren cai shi 
la ming chu le 
qi yi shi cong qing shao nian zhua qi 
xun zhao you tian fu de xuan shou 
qi er shi zai zhao dao you tian fu de ren cai hou 
pin qing zhuan ye jiao lian lai pei xun ta men 
guo ji tian lian ke yi bang zhu zhong guo wu se you jing yan de jiao lian 
yin wei zhong zhong ke guan yuan yin 
zhong xiao xue ti yu ke jian shao 
zhong guo tian jing zai yun dong yuan xuan ba shang ye yu dao ping jing 
po wei kun nan 
pei yang yi ge you xiu xuan shou de zhou qi yao wu liu nian 
qiao he de shi 
la ming zai jie shou ji zhe cai fang shi ye tan ji 
zhong xiao xue ti yu yun dong de fen wei po wei zhong yao 
ta hui yi shuo 
zi ji du shu de shi hou shi lian xi tiao yuan de 
zai xue xiao li 
tiao yuan deng xue sheng guan jun dou bei da jia suo shu xi 
da jia dou you ai hao ti yu de chuan tong 
yi ding yao cong hai zi kai shi gu li ta men duo pao 
zhe yang cai neng cong zhong wa jue ren cai 
cheng wei zhong guo zui da gui mo de ma la song sai shi zhi yi 
zhang yong liang yi biao shi 
sui zhe zhong guo ge de xian qi ma la song re chao 
xiang xin neng gu li geng duo ren shen jia dao ti yu duan lian zhong lai 
jiao tong yin hang jin rong yan jiu zhong xin yan jiu yuan chen gu fei ren wei 
dang yue huan bi lve jiang shu yu zheng chang de ji jie xing bo dong 
wei lai zhong guo zhi zao ye fu su jin cheng reng jiang chi xu 
hua qi zhong guo qu shou xi jing ji xue jia shen ming gao 
yi ji mo gen da tong zhong guo shou xi jing ji xue jia zhu hai bin 
ze dui wei lai zhong guo jing ji qu shi pan duan cheng 
zhong guo you neng li di yu mei guo tui chu 
liang hua kuan song 
sui ran zhong guo jing ji de bo dong zai suo nan mian 
dan qi you qian li shuai xian zou chu yi tiao yi gai ge dai dong jing ji ke chi xu zeng zhang de lu zi 
chen gu fei fen xi cheng 
yi ju li nian tong qi huan bi jing yan zou shi kan 
cong jin nian lai zhong mei zhi zao ye lian dong 
qu tong de zou shi kan 
cong tong qi de jue dui shu zhi lai kan 
ji ben yan xu le wen zhong qu sheng de tai shi 
zhi zao ye zheng ti qi wen hui nuan biao ming 
wei lai zhong guo zhi zao ye fu su jin cheng reng jiang chi xu 
hua qi zhong guo qu shou xi jing ji xue jia shen ming gao biao shi 
zhong gong shi ba jie san zhong quan hui ti chu le yi ge she ji guo you qi ye gai ge 
zhe shi zhong guo jing ji zai zao de guo cheng 
yu shi jie qi ta guo jia huan man shen zhi ting zhi de jie gou xing gai ge jin cheng xiang bi 
zhong guo you qian li shuai xian zou chu yi tiao yi gai ge dai dong jing ji ke chi xu zeng zhang de lu zi 
shen ming gao cheng 
zhong gong zhong yang jing ji gong zuo hui yi shou ci ti chu 
wo men ren wei 
he li de zeng zhang yi wei zhe qu gang gan hua 
zeng jia you xiao xu qiu he ti gao sheng chan lv 
he li de gai ge shun xu ke yi jian qing gai ge dui jing ji de fu mian ying xiang 
dan gai ge suo dai lai de jing ji bo dong ye shi zai suo nan mian de 
zhu hai bin dui ci fen xi shuo 
mei guo tui chu zhu yao tong guo mao yi qu dao he zi ben liu dong qu dao ying xiang zhong guo 
jian yu liang hua kuan song tui chu de qian ti shi mei guo jing ji qian jing hao zhuan 
zhe dui zhong guo chu kou hang ye de ying xiang ying gai bu da 
er zui cui ruo de jing ji ti shi nei xie jing chang zhang hu chi xu chi zi he yan zhong yi lai jing wai zi ben liu ru zhi chi guo nei jing ji zeng zhang de jing ji ti 
cong zhe ge jiao du lai kan 
zhong guo dui zi ben qu dao de chong ji ye you hen qiang de di yu neng li 
ju guo jia shi pin yao pin jian du guan li zong ju wang zhan xiao xi 
guo jia shi pin yao pin jian du guan li zong ju ri qian jiu wu jun yao pin shi shi 
you guan shi yi fa bu gong gao 
gong gao zhi chu 
wei tong guo xin xiu ding yao pin ren zheng de xue ye zhi pin 
zhu she ji deng wu jun yao pin sheng chan qi ye huo sheng chan che jian yi lv ting zhi sheng chan 
yi xia jian cheng xin xiu ding yao pin 
shi shi gui hua 
xue ye zhi pin 
gong gao zhi chu 
wei tong guo xin xiu ding yao pin ren zheng de xue ye zhi pin 
zhu she ji deng wu jun yao pin sheng chan qi ye huo sheng chan che jian yi lv ting zhi sheng chan 
dan shang wei wan cheng jian yan de chan pin 
ke ji xu jin xing jian yan 
he ge hou fang ke xiao shou 
reng ke ji xu sheng chan 
qi chan pin ying zai qu de xin de 
yao pin zheng shu 
hou fang ke xiao shou 
shang wei tong guo xin xiu ding yao pin ren zheng de wu jun yao pin sheng chan qi ye huo sheng chan che jian 
reng ke an zhao you guan gui ding shen qing ren zheng 
tong guo ren zheng hou 
fang ke hui fu sheng chan 
ji xu jian chi gao biao zhun 
que bao xin xiu ding yao pin shi shi biao zhun de yi zhi xing 
zhe xie qi ye sheng chan de pin zhong fu gai 
guo jia ji ben yao wu mu lu 
neng gou man zu shi chang gong ying 
tong guo xin xiu ding yao pin shi shi 
wo guo yao pin sheng chan qi ye de zhi liang bao zhang neng li he feng xian kong zhi shui ping ming xian zeng qiang 
chan ye ji zhong du jin yi bu ti gao 
chan ye jie gou you hua qu shi ming xian 
gong gao yao qiu 
ge ji shi pin yao pin jian guan bu men yao an zhao shang shu yao qiu 
jia qiang dui wu jun yao pin sheng chan de jian du jian cha 
dui yi tong guo xin xiu ding yao pin ren zheng de 
yao jia da gen zong jian cha li du 
dui shang wei tong guo ren zheng xu ting zhi sheng chan de 
yao yan fang chu xian wei fa wei gui sheng chan xing wei 
yi dan fa xian wen ti 
yao jian jue yi fa yu yi cha chu 
jie du yu wen da 
guo jia shi pin yao pin jian du guan li zong ju fa bu le 
gong gao de fa bu biao zhi zhe xin xiu ding yao pin de shi shi qu de le jie duan xing cheng guo 
wei le shi ge jie quan mian liao jie 
zhun que ba wo xin xiu ding yao pin shi shi de you guan qing kuang 
xian jiu xiang guan wen ti jie du ru xia 
yao pin guan li fa 
bao qing guo wu yuan tong yi 
yuan guo jia shi pin yao pin jian du guan li ju xia fa le 
gen ju shi shi gui hua guo du qi de you guan yao qiu 
wu jun yao pin sheng chan qi ye tong guo xin xiu ding yao pin ren zheng di qing kuang ru he 
tong guo xin xiu ding yao pin ren zheng de qi ye yao pin chan neng he pin zhong neng fou man zu wo guo yao pin shi chang gong ying 
wan quan neng gou man zu shi chang xu qiu 
cong pin zhong fen xi 
guo jia ji ben yao wu mu lu 
quan bu dou you yi tong guo ren zheng de qi ye sheng chan 
guo jia yi bao yao pin mu lu 
mu qian shang wei fu gai de ge bie pin zhong 
ye yi wan cheng le chan pin chu bei 
zong ti lai kan 
neng gou you xiao bao zheng yao pin shi chang gong ying 
ju jin ji nian tong ji 
zheng chang qing kuang xia mei nian dou hui you yi xie pin zhong 
bao kuo ge zhong ji xing 
chu xian gong ying duan que xian xiang 
ru jia qiu mi zuo 
ren ning xue yin zi  
she du kang xue qing deng dou shi you yuan liao 
shi chang deng yuan yin zao cheng de 
yu xin xiu ding yao pin de tui xing bing wu nei zai lian xi 
ru he jie ding ting chan 
ting chan hou qi ye neng fou ji xu shen qing ren zheng 
ci qian sheng chan de chan pin hou neng fou ji xu xiao shou 
wei le zhun que jie ding ting chan xing wei 
kao lv dao bu fen qi ye sheng chan de lian xu xing 
yi wan cheng zui zhong bao zhuang wei biao zhi lai que ding ting chan xing wei 
shang wei wan cheng jian yan de 
ke ji xu jin xing jian yan gong zuo 
he ge hou yu yi fang xing 
yun xu qi ji xu shang shi xiao shou 
yi miao lei chan pin an yao qiu xu yao jin xing pi qian fa 
zai pi qian fa he ge hou reng ke shang shi xiao shou 
wei tong guo ren zheng de qi ye 
yi tong guo ren zheng xian chang jian cha bing jin xing gong shi de qi ye 
dai qu de xin 
yao pin zheng shu 
hou chan pin fang ke xiao shou 
qi ye ting chan yi hou 
ru wan cheng gai zao 
ke yi ji xu shen qing ren zheng 
dui yu fang qi ren zheng de qi ye ye ke yi 
zi zhu xuan ze pin zhong ji shu zhuan rang 
qi ye jian bing chong zu deng fang shi you xu tui chu 
xin xiu ding yao pin de shi shi dui yu wo guo yi yao chan ye chan sheng le zen yang de ying xiang 
xin xiu ding yao pin chong fen can zhao shi jie wei sheng zu zhi 
ou meng deng guo ji xian jin biao zhun 
dui wu jun yao pin sheng chan de yao qiu you le jiao da de ti sheng 
geng zhong yao de shi qiang diao quan guo cheng zhi liang guan li ti xi de you xiao yun xing 
qiang diao yao pin sheng chan quan guo cheng de feng xian kong zhi 
geng jia you xiao di bao zhang yao pin zhi liang an quan 
xin xiu ding yao pin de wen bu shi shi 
wei yi yao chan ye de you sheng lie tai 
jian bing chong zu ti gong le li shi xing de ji yu 
bu fen gui mo xiao 
chan pin wu shi chang 
zhi liang guan li shui ping luo hou de qi ye 
jiang zhu bu bei tao tai chu ju 
sheng chan shang gui mo 
guan li shang shui ping 
shi chang zhan zhu dao de you shi qi ye ye li yong ben ci ji hui 
tiao zheng le pin zhong bu ju 
ti sheng le chan ye ji zhong du 
yi da rong liang zhu she ji wei li 
xin xiu ding yao pin you xiao cu jin le wo guo zhi yao gong ye yu guo ji jie gui 
jia kuai le wo guo yi yao chan pin jin ru guo ji shi chang de bu fa 
cheng du sheng wu zhi pin yan jiu suo de yi xing nao yan jian du huo yi miao tong guo shi jie wei sheng zu zhi yi miao yu ren zheng 
shou ci jin ru guo ji cai gou mu lu 
ju you li cheng bei yi yi 
wei tong guo ren zheng qi ye de ting chan shi fou hui dui hang ye zao cheng chong ji 
gen ju tong ji 
xin xiu ding yao pin shi ji shu yao qiu de ti sheng 
geng shi chan ye fa zhan dao xin jie duan shi chang zuo chu de xuan ze 
wo men dui yu shang zai gai zao zan shi ting chan de qi ye bing mei you guan bi ren zheng de da men 
zhi yao qi ye ti chu ren zheng shen qing 
zai jian chi gao biao zhun 
yan yao qiu de ji chu shang 
jiang ji xu zu zhi ren zheng jian cha 
tong guo ren zheng hou ke yi hui fu sheng chan 
zai xin xiu ding yao pin de shi shi guo cheng zhong shi ru he bao zheng ren zheng jian cha gong zuo zhi liang de 
zai xin xiu ding yao pin zheng ge shi shi guo cheng zhong 
shi pin yao pin jian guan bu men shi zhong jian chi gao biao zhun 
ji shi ban bu xiang guan fu jian he ren zheng jian cha zhi nan 
cong zhi du fang mian jin yi bu wan shan le yao pin ren zheng jian cha 
jia qiang jian cha ren yuan de ye wu he ji lv pei xun 
xin xiu ding yao pin shi shi yi lai 
bao kuo wu jun li lun xue xi yu xian chang cao zuo jie he 
shi jie wei sheng zu zhi pai zhuan jia dui wo guo jian cha yuan de jian cha jin xing guan cha jian cha he jiao xue jian cha deng fang shi 
que bao le yao pin ren zheng jian cha yuan de jian cha neng li 
yao pin jian cha zhi liang ti xi bu duan wan shan 
yuan guo jia shi pin yao pin jian guan ju guo jia yi miao jian guan ti xi tong guo le shi jie wei sheng zu zhi dui wo guo guo jia yi miao jian guan de ping gu 
yao pin jian cha zhi liang guan li ti xi huo de zhuan jia de hao ping 
ming que jian cha ren zheng de ji shu biao zhun he ji lv yao qiu 
dui ren zheng jian cha de jie guo shi xing gong shi zhi du 
dui ren zheng jian cha qing kuang jin xing gen zong jian cha 
ji shi fa xian shi shi guo cheng zhi xing biao zhun he ji lv di qing kuang 
fa xian wen ti ji shi jiu zheng 
xia yi bu zong ju jiang cai qu shen me cuo shi jian du wei tong guo ren zheng qi ye que bao ting chan cuo shi dao wei 
xia yi bu zong ju yao qiu 
ge de yao ren zhen luo shi 
fan shi wei tong guo ren zheng de xue ye zhi pin 
zhu she ji deng wu jun yao pin sheng chan qi ye huo sheng chan che jian 
qing ge de li ji tong zhi wei tong guo yao pin ren zheng de qi ye 
yao qiu ting zhi yao pin sheng chan huo dong 
ge de ying jia qiang dui xing zheng qu yu nei ying ting chan qi ye huo sheng chan che jian de jian du jian cha 
shi pin yao pin jian guan ju yao dui ying ting chan qi ye jin xing quan mian shu li bing zhu yi jin xing xian chang jian cha 
que ren ting chan zhuang tai 
shi pin yao pin jian guan ju dui ting chan qing kuang he jian cha qing kuang jin xing hui zong 
tong shi yao mi qie guan zhu ting chan qi ye zhuang kuang 
fan fa xian wei an gui ding ting chan de 
yao pin guan li fa 
ji xiang guan gui ding yi fa cha chu 
ge de yao dui ying ting chan qi ye de yuan fu liao 
bao zhuang cai liao deng jin xing yan mi jian kong 
cai qu qie shi you xiao de guan kong cuo shi 
te bie yao jia qiang dui ting chan de ma zui yao pin 
jing shen yao pin 
yi liao yong du xing yao pin he fang she xing yao pin deng te shu yao pin sheng chan qi ye de yuan 
fu cai liao de jian du guan li 
cai qu yan kong cuo shi 
jia tie feng tiao 
fang zhi liu ru fei fa qu dao 
gei she hui dai lai wei hai 
ge de yao tong yi si xiang 
ti gao ren shi 
yao qiu luo dao shi chu 
zai zhi xing guo cheng zhong ru fa xian xin de wen ti 
ji shi bao zong ju yao pin hua zhuang pin jian guan si 
wei shen me yao shi shi xin xiu ding yao pin 
yao pin sheng chan zhi liang guan li gui fan 
shi guo ji tong xing de yao pin sheng chan zhi liang guan li ji ben zhun ze 
shi yao pin sheng chan bi xu zun xun de zhong yao ji shu biao zhun 
yi cheng wei guo ji shang ping jia yao pin zhi liang bao zheng ti xi he can yu yao pin guo ji mao yi de yi xiang ji ben nei rong he biao zhun 
yao pin dui yao pin sheng chan zhong yuan fu liao cai gou he jian yan 
sheng chan tou liao 
zhi ji jia gong 
zhi liang jian yan 
cang chu bao cun ji chan pin chu chang fang xing deng sheng chan quan guo cheng de tiao jian he fang fa jin xing ke xue 
gui fan de gui ding he yao qiu 
tong guo shi shi yao pin 
wo guo yao pin gong ying bao zhang shui ping da fu ti sheng 
chan pin zhi liang bu duan ti gao 
qu de le liang hao de she hui xiao yi he jing ji xiao yi 
shou dang shi jing ji fa zhan he ji shu tiao jian suo xian 
qi zhong you xie gui ding guo yu kuan fan 
you xie zhi du cun zai que shi 
yi jing bu neng shi ying xin xing shi xia yao pin sheng chan guan li he zhi liang ke kong de mu biao yao qiu 
zhi du he biao zhun shang yi jing luo hou yu guo ji shang jiao wei xian jin de yao pin biao zhun 
wei le quan mian ti sheng wo guo yao pin sheng chan qi ye zhi liang guan li shui ping 
yao pin sheng chan geng jia gui fan 
zhi liang geng jia ke kong 
jie jian guo ji xian jin jing yan 
bi xu dui wo guo yao pin jin xing xiu ding bing tui dong shi shi 
xin xiu ding yao pin de te dian shi shen me 
ben zhe gong kai tou ming 
cong guo qing chu fa 
you xian ti gao zhi liang guan li he ren yuan su zhi di yuan ze 
zai can kao shi jie wei sheng zu zhi yao pin biao zhun ji chu shang 
jie he wo guo yi yao chan ye shi ji 
bing zhen dui wo guo yao pin zhi liang xian zhuang he yi wang yao pin zhi liang shi jian bao lu de wen ti jin xing xiu ding 
xin xiu ding de yao pin you zheng wen he fu lu zu cheng 
geng jia zhu zhong zhi liang guan li de xi jie 
xin xiu ding yao pin xiang bi yuan you yao pin 
biao zhun yao qiu geng gao 
nei rong geng jia quan mian 
zhi du he cuo shi geng jia ju ti ke cao zuo 
ji ben da dao le shi jie wei sheng zu zhi yao pin biao zhun 
xin xiu ding yao pin de zhu yao te dian shi 
yi shi ming que yao qiu qi ye jian li he wan shan zhi liang guan li ti xi 
zai zu zhi ji gou 
huo dong he zi yuan deng fang mian ti chu le geng gao de yao qiu 
ke yi bao zheng yao pin de you xiao zhi xing 
er shi ti gao le qi ye cong ye ren yuan zi zhi yao qiu 
ming que jiang qi ye fu ze ren 
sheng chan guan li fu ze ren 
zhi liang guan li fu ze ren 
zhi liang shou quan ren lie wei yao pin sheng chan qi ye de guan jian ren yuan 
san shi xi hua cao zuo gui cheng 
sheng chan ji lu deng wen jian guan li gui ding 
zeng jia zhi dao xing he ke cao zuo xing 
si shi ti gao liao wu jun yao pin sheng chan huan jing biao zhun 
cai yong le shi jie wei sheng zu zhi zui xin yao pin de kong qi jing hua 
fen ji biao zhun 
bing zeng jia le sheng chan huan jing zai xian jian ce yao qiu 
an sheng chan qu 
zhi liang kong zhi qu he fu zhu qu fen bie dui chang fang she shi de she ji ti chu yao qiu 
dui she bei de she ji 
wei hu ji shi yong deng fang mian ye zuo chu ju ti gui ding 
wu shi wei rao zhi liang feng xian guan li zeng she yi xi lie xin zhi du 
yin ru zhi liang feng xian guan li de gai nian 
fen bie cong yuan fu liao cai gou 
sheng chan gong yi bian geng 
cao zuo zhong de pian cha chu li 
fa xian wen ti de diao cha he jiu zheng 
shang shi hou yao pin zhi liang de jian kong fang mian 
zeng jia le ru gong ying shang shen ji 
bian geng kong zhi 
jiu zheng he yu fang cuo shi 
chan pin zhi liang hui gu fen xi deng xin zhi du he cuo shi 
dui ge ge huan jie ke neng chu xian de feng xian jin xing guan li he kong zhi 
zhu dong fang fan zhi liang shi gu de fa sheng 
shi shi xin xiu ding yao pin de mu biao shi shen me 
shi shi xin xiu ding yao pin 
yi fang mian ke yi quan mian ti sheng yao pin sheng chan zhi liang guan li shui ping 
cong yuan tou shang qiang hua yao pin zhi liang guan li 
que bao yao pin zhi liang an quan 
ling yi fang mian 
ke yi ti gao yi yao hang ye de zhun ru tiao jian 
tao tai luo hou sheng chan li 
you li yu yi yao chan ye zuo da zuo qiang 
cong er tui dong yi yao chan ye chan ye sheng ji jie gou tiao zheng 
tong shi you li yu 
tui dong wo guo yao pin sheng chan qi ye zhuan xing he yu guo ji jie gui 
jia kuai yi yao chan pin jin ru guo ji zhu liu shi chang 
xin xiu ding yao pin de shi shi gui hua shi shen me 
xin xiu ding yao pin fa bu shi shi hou 
jiu zhi ding le xiang xi de shi shi gui hua 
gui hua chong fen kao lv le qi ye sheng ji gai zao de guo du shi jian he pin zhong feng xian yin su 
que ding le fen liang ge jie duan shi shi de ji hua 
yi shi zhu she ji deng wu jun yao pin de sheng chan 
wei zai gui ding shi xian da dao yao qiu de qi ye 
bu de zai ji xu sheng chan yao pin 
shi shi xin xiu ding yao pin de cu jin cuo shi you nei xie 
zhen dui shi shi chu qi chu xian de bu fen di qu tui jin man 
qi ye deng dai guan wang deng zhuang kuang 
shi shi jin zhan bu ping heng de wen ti jiao wei tu chu 
ren wu you wei jin po 
shi pin yao pin jian guan bu men yu fa zhan gai ge wei 
gong ye he xin xi hua bu 
yuan wei sheng bu cong yao pin ji shu zhuan rang 
zhao biao cai gou 
yao pin jia ge yi ji gu li jian bing chong zu deng fang mian jia da zhi chi li du 
gu li qi ye jia kuai xin xiu ding yao pin ren zheng 
gu li yao pin sheng chan xiang you shi qi ye ji zhong 
shi pin yao pin jian guan bu men wei zuo hao xin xiu ding yao pin shi shi guo du qi jian qi ye wen hao zhuan yi deng gong zuo 
lian xu xia fa xiang guan tong zhi 
gu li qi ye yao pin ji shu you xu liu dong 
tui dong xin xiu ding yao pin shun li shi shi 
cu jin qi ye zi yuan you hua pei zhi 
shi pin yao pin jian guan bu men you fa bu le xin xiu ding yao pin jian cha you guan shi yi de tong zhi 
zai xin jiu che jian xian jie 
zhu ce xian chang he cha yu yao pin jian cha xian jie deng fang mian chu tai duo xiang zhi du he cuo shi 
bao zheng le xin xiu ding yao pin ren zheng gong zuo de shun li kai zhan 
ju jiao yu bu wang zhan xiao xi 
jiao yu bu dang zu ri qian yao qiu jia kuai fa zhan nong cun jiao yu 
jia qiang nong cun zhi ye jiao yu he ji neng pei xun 
shi shi nong min gong zhi ye ji neng ti sheng ji hua 
wei tui jin nong ye xian dai hua ti gong jian shi ren li ji chu he bao zhang 
jiao yu bu dang zu zhao kai hui yi 
chuan da xue xi zhong yang nong cun gong zuo hui yi jing shen 
yan jiu guan che luo shi gong zuo 
jiao yu bu dang zu shu ji 
bu zhang yuan gui ren qiang diao 
yao ba si xiang he xing dong tong yi dao zhong yang de jue ce bu shu shang lai 
jia kuai fa zhan nong cun jiao yu 
wei nong ye xian dai hua jian she he nong ye chi xu jian kang fa zhan ti gong jian shi ren li ji chu he bao zhang 
wei nong ye ji chu wen gu 
nong cun he xie wen ding 
nong min an ju le ye zuo chu ji ji gong xian 
hui yi zhi chu 
zhe ci zhong yang nong cun gong zuo hui yi 
shen ke chan shu liao shi guan 
fa zhan de zhan lve xing 
fang xiang xing zhong da wen ti 
quan mian bu shu le shen hua nong cun gai ge 
jia kuai tui jin nong ye xian dai hua de zhong dian ren wu 
ti chu liao dang qian he jin hou yi ge shi qi nong ye nong cun gong zuo de zong yao qiu 
zhe dui yu tong yi si xiang 
ning ju gong shi 
jia kuai shi xian zhong guo te se nong ye xian dai hua ju you zhong da er shen yuan de yi yi 
te bie shi hui yi dui tong chou cheng xiang yi wu jiao yu zi yuan jun heng pei zhi 
jia kuai fa zhan nong cun jiao yu ti chu le ming que yao qiu 
jiao yu xi tong yao ren zhen xue xi ling hui 
jian jue guan che luo shi 
hui yi qiang diao 
yi xiang xiang tui jin 
yi jian jian luo shi 
yi shi tui dong nong ke jiao jie he 
chan xue yan xie zuo 
jia kuai gou jian nong ye ke ji chuang xin yu tui guang ge ju 
gu li yin dao guang da shi sheng ba 
lun wen xie zai da di shang 
cheng guo liu zai nong min jia 
er shi jin mi jie he shi chang xu qiu 
jia qiang nong cun zhi ye jiao yu he ji neng pei xun 
shi shi nong min gong zhi ye ji neng ti sheng ji hua 
san shi jia da dui da zhong zhuan yuan xiao nong lin lei zhuan ye xue sheng de zhu xue li du 
yin dao da zhong zhuan yuan xiao te bie shi nong ye yuan xiao bi ye sheng dao nong cun jing ying nong ye 
si shi jia kuai gai shan nong cun he pin kun di qu yi wu jiao yu bo ruo xue xiao ji ben ban xue tiao jian 
hui tong you guan bu men an pai zhuan men zi jin shi dang ti gao nong cun yi wu jiao yu sheng jun gong yong jing fei biao zhun 
wu shi ji xu ti gao zhong dian gao xiao zhao shou nong cun he pin kun di qu xue sheng bi li 
shi geng duo you zhi gao deng jiao yu zi yuan hui ji nong cun 
min zu di qu de nong jia zi di 
liu shi jian quan nong cun liu shou er tong guan ai fu wu ti xi 
bao zhang nong min gong sui qian zi nv jie shou yi wu jiao yu 
qi shi ke xue zhi ding nong cun yi wu jiao yu xue xiao bu ju gui hua 
jian chi ban hao que you xu yao de cun xiao xue he jiao xue dian 
ba shi da li zhi chi he fa zhan nong cun xue qian jiao yu 
zhi chi he gui fan nong cun min ban jiao yu 
han zhong shi wei sheng ju gan bu zhang mou zai jia zhong zi sha shen wang 
ji jiang kai ting shen li 
han zhong shi zheng fu ti gong di qing kuang tong bao cheng 
sheng qian ceng ren han zhong shi hong shi zi hui ban gong shi fu zhu ren 
shi wei sheng ju yi zheng ke fu ze ren 
han zhong shi ji wei diao cha fa xian han zhong shi hong shi zi hui ban gong shi yuan fu zhu ren zhang mou cun zai li yong zhi wu zhi bian 
shi ji wei zheng shi dui zhang mou wei ji wen ti li an diao cha 
zhang mou tian xie le shi hong shi zi hui zhuan zhang zhi piao bing jia gai yin zhang 
hou gai zi jin zhuan hui shi hong shi zi hui zhang hu 
jian yu zhang mou wei ji wen ti yi jing she xian fan zui 
han zhong shi ji wei yan jiu jiang you guan zi liao he an jian xian suo yi song han zhong shi ren min jian cha yuan 
fa yuan ji jiang jin xing kai ting shen li 
zhang mou zai jia zhong zi sha shen wang 
jing han zhong shi han tai gong an fen ju shi jian 
zhang mou xi ben ren yong rui qi ci shang liang ce fu gu gou 
zao cheng fu gu gou dong mai xue guan po lie zhi ji xing shi xue xing xiu ke si wang 
shan hou chu li gong zuo zheng zai jin xing zhong 
lie wei ji hao fan 
zhong gong nan jing shi wei da yuan shou ci dui wai kai fang 
zai ji guan gong zuo ren yuan 
xia can guan shi wei shi zheng fu shi ren da shi zheng xie 
nan jing shi zheng fu xuan bu 
zhong gong nan jing shi wei 
nan jing shi ren da chang wei hui 
nan jing shi ren min zheng fu 
nan jing shi zheng xie ban gong da yuan jiang mian xiang gong zhong kai fang 
bu jie dai san ke 
xiang yao can guan xu yu yue deng ji 
tu wei shi min zai can guan 
ji jin rong xin xi cai ji 
shu ju wa jue 
zhi shu yan fa 
jia ge yan jiu deng duo zhong gong neng yu yi shen de zhong guo jin rong xin xi zhong xin zai shang hai zheng shi qi yong 
zhong guo jin rong xin xi zhong xin shi xin hua she yu shang hai shi zheng fu qian ding de quan mian zhan lve he zuo bei wang lu de zhong yao nei rong zhi yi 
jin rong xin xi fu wu ye 
de zheng shi ru chang 
wei ti sheng shang hai guo ji jin rong zhong xin ruan shi li 
zeng qiang wo guo zai guo ji jin rong shi chang ying xiang li he hua yu quan dai lai zhu duo qi pan 
wei da zong shang pin ding jia fa chu 
zhong guo sheng yin 
wei jin rong xin xi hang ye da zao 
zhong guo ban tu 
wei guo ji jin rong zhong xin jian she 
hua long dian jing 
zhong guo jin rong xin xi zhong xin shi zhong guo jing ji he jin rong xin xi cai ji yu fa bu de zhong yao zhen di 
jiang cheng wei quan qiu jin rong zi xun zhong xin gang 
shang hai shi wei chang wei 
chang wu fu shi zhang tu guang shao ceng biao shi 
xuan ze zai lu jia zui jin rong cheng zui he xin di qu jian she zhong guo jin rong xin xi zhong xin 
jiu shi yao tu chu zhe zuo da sha du te de gong neng 
wei da zong shang pin ding jia fa chu 
zhong guo sheng yin 
zhong guo da ma qiu jie huang jin tao lao 
dao shi ti qi ye wu nai qi tong qi mian bao zhang bao die 
da zong shang pin ding jia quan yi jing ying xiang dao guo nei jing ji she hui sheng huo de fang fang mian mian 
fa da guo jia wang wang jie zhu guo ji jin rong shi chang de hua yu quan 
dui chong gong ju deng neng zhang kong da zong shang pin deng shi chang 
er zuo wei shang pin xu qiu da guo de zhong guo 
que wang wang zhi neng 
ren qi tun sheng 
zhua zhu guo ji shang pin ding jia quan 
zao yi shi ye nei ren shi duo nian de gong tong hu yu 
zhong guo jin rong xin xi zhong xin qi yong de tong shi 
guo jia jia ge yan jiu yuan zheng shi jie pai 
xin hua shang hai gui jin shu jiao yi zhong xin deng shou pi gong neng xing xiang mu zheng shi jie pai ru zhu 
bu jin wei guo nei shang pin jiao yi ping tai xin tian sheng li jun 
ye wei zhong guo neng zheng qu geng duo geng gong ping de guo ji huan jing dai lai duo zhong li hao 
zhong guo jin rong xin xi zhong xin yu pu dong xin qu lu jia zui jin rong mao yi qu guan wei hui he zuo de 
lu jia zui jin rong wang 
ye zai dang ri zheng shi shang xian 
wang zhan jiang cheng jie zheng fu gong gong fu wu zhi neng 
wang shang zi jin liu he xiang mu liu zhi jian de cuo he jiao yi ping tai 
xin hua she fu zong bian ji 
zhong guo jin rong xin xi zhong xin fa ren dai biao shen hai xiong shuo 
zhong guo jin rong xin xi zhong xin shi xin hua she an zhao zhong yang yao qiu shi shi zhan lve zhuan xing de zhong yao biao zhi 
zhong xin yao shi xian cong gong cheng jian she de 
wu li fan ying 
dao zuo qiang gong neng de 
hua xue fan ying 
chong fen fa hui shang hai zuo wei jin rong yao su ju ji de de te shu you shi 
fang da fu she dai dong xiao ying 
zeng qiang wo guo zai guo ji jing ji 
jin rong ling yu de hua yu quan 
zuo wei guo jia tong xun she he xian dai quan mei ti ji tuan 
xin hua she yong you bian ji quan qiu de xin wen xin xi cai bian wang luo 
neng ji shi cai ji 
fan ying guo ji shi chang neng yuan zi yuan deng chan pin de jia ge xin xi 
guo jia jia ge yan jiu yuan jiang jia qiang dui guo nei wai shi chang jia ge de qian zhan xing yan pan 
wei guo jia zhi ding wan shan jia ge tiao kong jian guan zheng ce ti gong zhong yao yi ju 
zai mei guo zhou ji jiao yi suo da zhong hua qu zong jian chen yu kan lai 
zhe dui zhong guo zheng qu guo ji da zong shang pin ding jia quan nai zhi guo ji jin rong hua yu quan you zhe geng shen ceng ci de ying xiang 
zhong guo zheng qu guo ji shang pin ding jia quan de qian ti 
shou xian jiu shi guo nei jia ge ti xi de jian li yu wan shan 
shang pin jiao yi pin zhong de feng fu yi ji da zong shang pin jiao yi ping tai de fan rong 
hen duo zhong guo qi ye ye yi shi dao le zhe yi dian 
bing tong guo fa bu jia ge zhi shu 
ding jia bao gao 
tui chu shang pin jiao yi ping tai deng lai zhan ling shang pin shi chang 
dan xiang dui guo ji ju tou reng xian dan bo 
shang pin jiao yi ping tai ye ceng yi du chu yu jiao hun luan de zhuang tai 
shang hai jiao tong da xue zhong guo jin rong yan jiu yuan fu yuan zhang yan hong ye ren wei 
ru chang dui shi chang zheng ti jia ge you quan ju ba wo 
zai ding jia shang you zhe nan yi ti dai de quan wei 
quan mian he zhun que 
geng shi gui fan de jin rong jiao yi gui ze de jian xing zhe 
jiang tui dong shang pin jiao yi ping tai de gui fan xing 
shang pin ding jia de quan wei xing 
wei jin rong xin xi hang ye da zao 
zhong guo ban tu 
quan qiu jin rong xin xi fu wu shi chang de guo ji jing zheng geng qu ji lie 
ge da jin rong xin xi fu wu ti gong shang fen fen jia kuai chan pin de geng xin huan dai he xin chan pin de yan fa 
la mei deng di qu xin xing jing ji ti 
te bie shi zhong guo shi chang geng cheng wei guo ji jin rong xin xi fu wu ti gong shang kai zhan jing zheng de jiao dian 
ci qian jin you guo ji ju tou yi ji guo nei hou qi min zi bo yi de shi chang 
xian de you xie 
jin guan guo nei jin rong ji gou fen fen biao shi 
dui jing wai jin rong shu ju gong ying shang 
nan yi ge she 
dan qi dui guo nei jin rong xin xi de ti gong bing bu dao wei 
geng wei guo nei jin rong ji gou beng jin le yi gen xian 
fan guan guo nei 
ye nei ren shi duo bao yuan 
shou zhi yu zi jin 
zi xun deng ya li 
bu shao guo nei shu ju gong ying shang zhong duan ti gong de guo ji shu ju bu zhun que 
nan yi man zu qi ye jing ying xu qiu 
shang hai cai jing da xue xian dai jin rong yan jiu zhong xin zhu ren ding jian ping biao shi 
jin rong xin xi ping tai ju you liang zhong shu xing 
qi shi chang shu xing jue ding le jian li jin rong shu ju ku xu yao da liang zi jin 
zai yi xie ji chu shu ju fang mian huo zhe geng xu yao 
gong yi zi jin 
ling yi fang mian 
sui zhe jin rong ye yu xin xi ji shu de rong he 
jin rong xin xi you ying xiang zhe guo jia jin rong an quan he jin rong hua yu quan 
zhe yi wei zhe hang ye nei geng wei quan wei de 
bu neng que wei 
shang hai jiao tong da xue shang hai gao ji jin rong xue yuan fu yuan zhang zhu ning ren wei 
yi zhong guo jin rong xin xi zhong xin qi yong wei dai biao de 
shi de zhong guo jin rong xin xi hang ye ban tu geng jia wan zheng 
wai zi jun zhan yi xi zhi di 
hu xiang jing he 
zhe jiang jin yi bu cu jin guo nei jin rong xin xi hang ye jian kang cheng zhang 
wei guo ji jin rong zhong xin jian she 
hua long dian jing 
guo ji pai ming wei ju shi jie qian lie 
bing cheng wei quan qiu jin rong yao su shi chang zui qi quan de cheng shi zhi yi 
zheng chao zhe jian she shi jie yi liu de guo ji jin rong zhong xin jia su qian xing 
zai jin rong fu wu shui ping he huan jing deng fang mian 
chuan tong lao pai jin rong zhong xin cheng shi reng you zhe feng fu de li shi ji dian he xian fa you shi 
lun dun liang da chuan tong lao pai jin rong zhong xin lian nian bao chi ling xian di wei 
er shang hai zai zhe liang xiang pai ming shang cun cha ju 
xian dai jin rong 
jing zheng de bu jin shi zi jin 
geng shi xin xi 
shang hai jian she shi jie yi liu de guo ji jin rong zhong xin 
bi xu jin yi bu wa jue jin rong shi chang shen du 
tuo kuan jin rong ling yu guang du 
shang hai cai jing da xue shang hai guo ji jin rong zhong xin yan jiu yuan zhi xing yuan zhang zhao xiao ju biao shi 
guo ji jin rong xin xi ju tou 
jin rong fen xi ju tou yi jing kan dao le shang hai geng shen de shi chang 
jia qiang yu shang hai qi ye 
gao xiao de he zuo 
de ru chang yu zhuang da zheng dang shi 
xin hua she jing ji xin xi bian ji bu zhu ren 
zhong jing she kong gu ji tuan zong jing li jiao ran biao shi 
jin rong xin xi ping tai shang xian shi yun xing yi lai 
shi zhong ba shang hai zuo wei xiang quan qiu jin rong shi chang fa chu 
zhong guo sheng yin 
he can yu guo ji jin rong xin xi fu wu shi chang jing zheng de zhu yao zhen di 
wei lai zhong guo jin rong xin xi zhong xin jiang hui ju xin hua she ge lei jin rong yao su zi yuan 
wei shang hai guo ji jin rong zhong xin jian she zeng tian 
zuo wei shang hai guo ji jin rong zhong xin zhong yao 
zhong guo jin rong xin xi zhong xin jiang jia kuai shang hai jian li wo guo jin rong zi xun xin xi fu wu ping tai he quan qiu jin rong xin xi fu wu shi chang 
ye jiang jin yi bu ti sheng wo guo zai quan qiu jing ji jin rong ling yu de hua yu quan he ying xiang li 
zhong guo cheng ji dong che zu zui da yi bi chu kou ding dan shou lie che liang zai zhong guo nan che si fang gu fen gong si xia xian 
bing cong qing dao gang zhuang chuan qi yun 
qian wang a gen ting 
che nei hai she you can ji ren zhuan yong qu yu 
zi xing che cun fang qu yu 
gai pi cheng ji dong che zu jiang fu wu yu a gen ting shou du bu yi nuo si ai li si de sa mian tuo xian he mai te xian 
cheng wei qi jin wei zhi wo guo cheng ji dong che zu chu kou liang zui da de ding dan 
xu chong de she 
zi chen guang biao tou lu you yi shou gou mei guo 
niu yue shi bao 
chen guang biao di yan lun pin fan zao dao zhi yi 
chen guang biao biao shi 
chen guang biao zai shen zhen 
jie chu hua ren 
fa biao huo jiang gan yan shi cheng yao shou gou 
niu yue shi bao 
dui yu shou gou yi xiang 
chen guang biao shuo 
niu yue shi bao 
shi jin liang nian lai yi zhi dou you de xiang fa 
zai zhong guo ye zhao le yi xie da qi ye 
xi wang neng gen wo yi qi qu shou gou 
jie guo hen duo ren dou bu yuan yi 
hou lai wo zhao le xiang gang de yi ge fu shang 
gen wo he zuo 
niu yue shi bao 
de xin wen fa yan ren hui ying shuo 
gong si bu dui chuan yan fa biao hui ying 
niu yue shi bao 
de ban ye guang gao 
gai dao shi zhong guo gu you ling tu 
ci shi zhi hou 
chen guang biao bei ta de ying xiang li suo 
niu yue shi bao 
zai bao zhi fang mian de ying xiang li shi bi jiao da 
suo yi xiang tong guo 
niu yue shi bao 
chuan bo yi xie zheng neng liang 
ba zhong guo zhen zheng de sheng yin chuan chu qu 
chen guang biao hai tan yan 
yin wei mei ti de jie ru 
zeng jia le shou gou de nan du 
wo wei tuo de zai niu yue de na ge ji gou you dian ze guai wo 
bu gai ba zhe ge shi qing tou lu chu qu 
xian zai jiu dai lai le nan du le 
wo ming tian fei niu yue 
chen guang biao yu shou gou 
niu yue shi bao 
de xiao xi xun su yin fa le re yi 
you kai shi biao yan le 
you zhe me duo qian zi ji ban ge geng niu de bao zhi bu jiu xing le 
huan gei zhong guo chuang zao jiu ye 
wei sha fei mai guo wai de 
mian dui zhi yi sheng 
chen guang biao shuo 
xi wang da jia xiang xin biao ge de jian ding xin xin 
wo ye bu shi shuo da hua 
wo ming tian jiu hui qu mei guo 
niu yue shi bao 
de shi qing zhi wai 
hai hui kao cha yi xia zhong mei wen hua ci shan ji jin hui yun zuo deng shi yi 
gai shi jing fang zhen po yi qi li yong ji zha pian an 
ju jing fang jie shao 
zai liu zhou shi jing ying jian cai sheng yi de he xian sheng 
yin ping ri jiao yi jin e bi jiao da 
xiang zai dian li an zhuang yi tai ji 
yin yin hang shen pi shou xu bi jiao fu za yi zhi mei you ban li 
you ren dao he xian sheng dian pu tui xiao ji 
cheng shou xu jian dan 
zhi xu shen fen zheng he yi zhang yin hang ka jiu ke yi ban li 
bing qie shou xu fei hen di 
kao lv dao zi ji yi zhi you kai ji de xu yao 
he xian sheng jiu ban li le yi tai 
he xian sheng shou dao le ban li hao de ji 
chu yu an quan kao lv 
xian yong ji shua le ji bi yi liang bai yuan de xiao e kuan xiang 
qi yin hang ka jiu shou dao le zhe xie kuan xiang 
he xian sheng yu shi da xiao yi lv 
kai shi fang xin shi yong 
yu zhi qian ji ci ci ri jiu neng shou dao kuan xiang bu tong 
he xian sheng zhao ji de da dian hua gei ye wu yuan 
ye wu yuan yi yin lian xi tong chu xian gu zhang wei you rang qi deng dai 
zai ku deng shu tian hou 
he xian sheng zai ci bo da ye wu yuan dian hua 
dan dui fang yi jing guan ji 
he xian sheng yi shi dao ke neng bei pian 
li ji xiang jing fang bao an 
liu zhou shi gong an ju xun jing zhi dui li ke cheng li zhuan an zu quan li zhen ban ci an 
zai zhen cha de guo cheng zhong 
min jing tong guo chuan bing an jian fa xian 
zhuan an zu tong guo mo pai zou fang 
bing dao yin hang diao cha xian yi ren de zi jin liu shui zhang 
que ren le xian yi ren de xing dong gui ji 
fan zui xian yi ren huang mou mou zai nan ning luo wang 
min jing sui ji yi huang mou mou wei tu po kou 
zhu bu mo qing qi ta fan zui xian yi ren de gui ji 
ban an min jing zai liu zhou shi ba yi lu mou bin guan 
jiang xian yi ren huang mou he hu mou yi qi zhua huo 
shou hou dun dian nan ning de da dui min jing 
zai bai hui hua ting ting che chang jiang wei mou zhua huo 
huang mou mou cheng ceng jing zai shen zhen gou mai ji shou pian 
nan ning de sheng yi chu xian zi jin que kou 
yu shi xiang dao le li yong lei si de fang fa zha pian 
jia jie bang ding hao zi ji yin hang ka de ji di jia fan mai yin you shou hai ren 
dai shou hai ren yong ji shua ka hou 
xian zhun shi dao zhang 
qu de xin ren 
dai shu e dao yi ding cheng du hou 
bian tong yi jie kuan 
bu zai da qian gei ke hu 
da dao zha pian mu di 
bei yi fa xing shi ju liu 
wang yong jun qin fu lin 
zai bei jing shi jiao de yi jia hua xue chang 
xu duo hua xue ai hao zhe zai xue xi hua xue 
xu duo shi min dai zhe hai zi lai dao bei jing shi jiao de hua xue chang 
huan du yuan dan 
he jun chang she 
gong li xin nian 
zhi xiu yi tian jia 
fu yi gong bu bian yin lai wang you bu shao tu cao 
er dang zhe chang 
mi ni jia qi 
ru yue er zhi shi 
bu shao ren fan er yin 
an pai bu liao huo dong 
er rang zi ji mang li tou xian 
che di da fang song 
zhong hui gui le xiu jia de yuan chu yi yi 
jin guan bu shao ren dui 
qian bu zhe cun hou bu zhe dian 
de yuan dan zhi fang yi tian jia shen gan 
dan geng duo zhong guo ren zai 
jiang jiu zhe guo 
mi ni jia qi 
zhong shou huo le nan de de xiu qi he fang song 
fan er jue de hui fu le neng liang 
sui ran xiu xi san tian 
que yao fu chu lian xu shang ba tian ban de dai jia 
zhe jiang da xue ya tai xiu xian jiao yu yan jiu zhong xin jiao shou pan li yong ren wei 
fa ding de jie qing ben shi fa ding jia ri zhi wai de 
ju min ying gai cong zhong huo de e wai de song chi gan 
ke wei le zhe yi tian de 
que bu de bu lian xu gong zuo qi ba tian 
yi tian de e wai jia qi fan er hui bian cheng e wai fu dan 
zhi you yi tian jia qi 
yuan you bu xian shi 
bu shao zhong guo ren jiang bu yong chang tu ba she de shi nei jing dian zuo wei le yuan dan jia qi xiu xian de shou xuan 
bai ling xiao yao yuan ben shi yuan dan xiu jia 
ben da suan li yong yuan dan 
qu gu lang yu you wan de ta shen zhi zao yi ding hao ji piao 
sui ran jia qi 
duo duo yi shan 
dan ji ran yuan dan bu gou shi jian chu qu 
hai bu ru shui ge lan jue 
zhe yang ye bu hui zai jing qu bei ji cheng 
san tai shan zhe xie pin cha you shan 
kan jing hui you de hao qu chu ying lai le jie ri yu ding de gao feng 
long jing cun yi jia jing ying hu gao su ji zhe 
jin nian de yu ding dian hua shu bi qu nian qi ma yao duo yi bei 
zao zai yi zhou qian 
yuan dan sui zai zhong guo yi you bai nian li shi 
lao bai xing ye zhu jian xing cheng le yi xie xin de guo jie xi guan 
dan zai zhong guo de min su xue jia kan lai 
yuan dan jin jin shi ge fa ding gong gong jia ri 
ji mei you chuan tong min su 
ye bing fei chuan tong yi yi shang ju you wen hua xing zhi di jie ri 
zhi xiu yi tian 
zhe yang de an pai hen fu he shi ji qing kuang 
zong de lai shuo 
yuan dan zai she jiao fang mian de gong neng duo yi xie 
er chuan tong de zhong guo chun jie ze geng pian zhong jia ting 
bao han da liang wen hua xing huo dong 
bi ru he jia tuan ju 
zou qin fang you deng 
min su xue jia chen lian shan ren wei 
yuan dan he chun jie ying cheng wei zhong guo ren xian dai he chuan tong hu xiang bu chong 
pei he de guo jie fang shi 
ben da suan yuan dan qi jian hui lao jia jin hua tan qin de lou lao shi yi jia 
jiu gai bian xing cheng zhuan er qian wang xi hu bian de zhe jiang mei shu guan can guan xin ju ban de dun huang yi shu zhan 
fan zheng chun jie jia qi ye hui hui jia 
er li yong zhe kong chu de yi tian pei jia ren kan kan zhan 
guang guang xi hu 
zai wen hua he zi ran de fen wei zhong kai qi xin de yi nian ye hen you yi yi 
wang nian xiao chang jia li lv xian jing qu bao peng 
jiao tong du se 
you ke man yi du di deng qing kuang 
mi ni jia qi 
zhong you suo huan jie 
zhuan jia ren wei 
jin nian yuan dan zhe zhong 
de mo shi neng gou ti xian zai xiu jia zhong fang song shen xin de ben lai yi yi 
bing bu yi wei zhe xiu jia zhi liang xia jiang 
xiang fan qi shi ren bu zai zha dui chu xing 
bu mang mu an pai huo dong 
xin jia ri sheng huo 
bu hui zao cheng yue xiu yue lei he 
jie hou zong he zheng 
xiu xian de xiao guo ye geng hao 
pan li yong biao shi 
ren men gan jue 
guan jian hai shi jia qi zhi liang bu gao 
zi you an pai xiu jia de zhi pei du bu gou 
zen me li yong hao 
yao ti sheng xiu xian pin zhi 
bu neng dan chun kao jia qi shu liang de die jia 
gen ben shang hai xu yao pei yang jian kang 
li xing de xiu jia guan nian 
duan jing jing lv ang 
ji zhe zai ci gan dao chong qing yi ke da xue fu shu er tong yi yuan kan wang chong qing 
dian ti shuai ying 
du guo kai lu shou shu wei xian qi de yuan yuan mu qian yi zhuan ru pu tong bing fang 
dan zuo ce zhi ti shang wu zhi jue 
jing fang diao cha biao shi 
zai ke ting sha fa shang zai ci shi shi ou da 
you jiang yuan yuan bao zhi yang tai lan gan shang dou wan 
yuan yuan zai chong qing jie shou le kai lu shou shu 
ji zhe dao da bing fang shi 
tou shang chan zhe sha bu de yuan yuan yi jing qing xing 
ta bu ting zhuan dong yan jing kan zhe bing fang si zhou 
jing shen zhuang tai jiao hao 
mu qian yuan yuan yi cong zhong zheng jian hu shi zhuan ru pu tong bing fang 
dan zuo ce zhi ti reng mei you zhi jue 
yuan yuan fu qin li sheng zhong gao su ji zhe 
ji zhe kan dao 
jin guan zuo ce zhi ti shang wu zhi jue 
dan yuan yuan reng hui yong you shou zhua tou shang de sha bu 
you jiao ou er ye hui ti shen shang de bei zi 
zai fu qin kao jin bing chuang shi 
hai hui fa chu 
yi yi ya ya 
sui ran bing qing yu qing xu qu yu wen ding 
dan zhi yao you hu shi kao jin 
yuan yuan jiu hui ku qi 
jing li le yi ge yue de zhi liao 
hai zi shen shang yi jing hen nan zhao dao shi he zha zhen de di fang 
duo ci zha zhen rang yuan yuan dui zhi liao you le ben neng de hui bi fan ying 
li sheng zhong shuo 
yi sheng shuo yuan yuan zhe ci shou shu bi jiao cheng gong 
shou shu hou ta de you nao ji shui mei you zeng jia 
deng shen ti qing kuang wen ding hou 
jiang jin xing kang fu xun lian 
yuan yuan mu qin ceng yan gao su ji zhe 
you yu shou dao shu zhi he cao ping de huan chong zuo yong 
jian qing le shou shang cheng du 
yi sheng shuo sui ran zuo ce shen ti bu pai chu tan huan de ke neng 
zhi li hui fu ye zai guan cha zhong 
dan sheng ming yi jing mei you wei xian le 
ceng yan biao shi 
jing guo yi ge yue de zhi liao 
sui ran hui liu xia yi xie hou yi zheng 
dan hai zi neng huo xia lai yi shi wan xing 
bu guan kang fu qi you duo jian nan 
wo men dou hui pei zhe hai zi zou xia qu 
yuan yuan chu shi zhi jin 
she hui ai xin ren shi ji yu le ta men yi jia ji da de guan xin he bang zhu 
shi zhe xie bang zhu zhi chi wo men zou dao xian zai 
wo xi wang yuan yuan kuai dian hao qi lai 
jiang lai wo hui dai yuan yuan qu kan nei xie ai xin ren shi 
da bu fen dou you ai xin ren shi juan zeng 
yuan yuan fu mu cheng 
deng hai zi qing kuang wen ding hou 
jiang tong guo fa yuan xiang shuai ying nv hai jia shu tao yao pei chang fei yong 
zhong ying han lu 
fu jian gu tian shu hua yuan jie pai 
lai mei lian she 
fu jian sheng wei xuan chuan bu fu bu zhang lu cheng sheng 
zai gu tian shu hua yuan can guan fu jian shu hua jing pin gu tian zhan 
gu tian shu hua yuan jie pai ji fu jian shu hua jing pin gu tian zhan kai mu yi shi zai fu jian long yan shi shang hang xian gu tian zhen ju xing 
wo xi huan zhe fu hua de yan se 
lao dang yuan lai ru hui de sun nv cai shang xiao xue san nian ji 
li zhi dang mei shu lao shi de ta zai ye ye de dai ling xia can guan le jin tian de shu hua jing pin zhan 
xiao xiao nian ji de ta zai kan dao xi huan de zuo pin shi yi hui fa chu zi ji de jian jie 
gu tian shu hua yuan shi mu qian fu jian sheng shou jia zai ge ming lao ou hong se lv you jing dian chuang jian de cun ji shu hua yuan 
zuo luo yu zhu ming de 
gu tian hui yi hui zhi 
ye shi dang nian mao ze dong zhu xi xie xia 
xing xing zhi huo 
ke yi liao yuan 
fu jian sheng wei xuan chuan bu fu bu zhang lu cheng sheng zai zhi ci zhong biao shi 
gu tian shu hua yuan ji wen yi jiao yu he ge ming chuan tong jiao yu yu yi ti 
bi jiang cheng wei zhi gen yu min xi zhe pian re tu shang du ju xiang cun te se de shu hua chuang zuo yuan di 
hong yang hong se wen hua he ke jia wen hua 
chuan bo jing shen wen ming he sheng tai wen ming de jian qiang zhen di 
lai ru hui zuo wei dang di cun min dui hua yuan de jian li ye fei chang zhi chi 
shu hua zhan rang wo men cun min da kai yan jie 
hua yuan de she li ye neng rang xiao peng you cong xiao jin ran zai da shi de zuo pin zhong 
gan shou dao bu tong de yi shu feng ge 
ju zhu ban fang jie shao 
ci ci shu hua zhan shi fu jian sheng he long yan shi tui dong wen hua 
de zhong yao ju cuo 
dui cu jin hong yang hong se wen hua he ke jia wen hua 
da li fa zhan wen hua lv you chan ye 
ti sheng gu tian jing qu de wen hua pin wei ju you zhong yao yi yi 
zhan guan gong zuo ren yuan gao su ji zhe 
ci ci zhan chu de zuo pin feng ge ge yi 
bu jin you xing yun liu shui ban de shu fa zuo pin 
ye you bi feng xi ni de gong bi hua 
hai you qi yun chuan shen de guo hua zuo pin 
qie can zhan zuo pin jun chu zi fu jian ben tu yi shu jia bi xia 
xin nian yi shi 
zi ran sheng tai huan jing ju zhong guo qian lie de fu jian sheng fu zhou shi he chang le 
ying jie xin de yi nian dao lai 
fu zhou min jiang wang long yuan cai qi piao piao 
luo gu xuan tian 
ren tou cuan dong 
yi pai xi qi yang yang 
sheng shi jia jie de jing xiang 
jian duan de kai mu shi hou 
yi qian duo ming dong yong jian er huan kuai 
tou ru da zi ran 
cai yong ge zhong yong zi you xiang jiang xin 
jing guo yi fan pi bo zhan lang zai fan hui bei an 
fu zhou han liu lian lian 
min jiang li feng da lang ji shui wen di 
dan reng dang bu zhu dong yong jian er de huo li he re qing 
dong yong jian er zhu yao lai zi fu zhou dong yong xie hui 
yuan dan chang you min jiang zhuang ju ying de le ge fang ren shi de hao ping 
fu zhou yuan dan chang you min jiang shi zhong guo dong yong ri gui mo zui da 
can yu ren shu zui duo de huo dong zhi yi 
shi rong cheng ying jie xin nian de yi dao liang li feng jing xian 
yi cheng wei fu jian quan min jian shen 
chang dao dong yong 
bao hu mu qin he 
bao hu shui huan jing de pin pai huo dong 
fu zhou dong yong dui wu zai tai ping sheng shi bu duan fa zhan zhuang da 
dui yuan men re ai zu guo 
re ai jia xiang 
re ai min jiang 
re ai dong yong 
ta xi wang she hui ge fang geng jia zhu zhong sheng tai huan jing bao hu 
shi jia xiang de tian geng lan 
wei chong fen tian bu jiu ye gang wei kong que 
cu jin jiu ye 
ji ri qi jie chu dui bao jia li ya he luo ma ni ya lao dong zhe zai ou meng fan wei nei zi you liu dong de xian zhi 
ou meng wei yuan hui fu ze jiu ye 
shang shu liang cheng yuan guo de lao dong zhe wu xu lao dong xu ke zheng ji ke zai cheng yuan guo fan wei nei zi you liu dong 
ci ci xian zhi jie chu 
yi wei zhe bao kuo ying guo 
weng duo er zhi chu 
lao dong zhe zi you liu dong shi ou meng yi ti hua he dan yi shi chang jian she de zhong yao ji shi 
weng duo er shuo 
wei ci ou meng he ge cheng yuan guo ji gou jiang cai qu cuo shi jie jue jiu ye nan 
cu jin lao dong zhe zi you liu dong jiu shi cuo shi zhi yi 
ci ci jie chu shang shu liang guo lao dong zhe liu dong xian zhi 
zheng feng ou zhou di qu pu bian mian lin gao shi ye he ge guo yu suan jin suo 
you yu bei zhi zhan ju jiu ye gang wei huo gua fen she hui fu li 
lai zi jiao pin qiong guo jia de ju min rong yi cheng wei chu zai jing ji kun nan shi qi de jiao fa da guo jia yu lun de gong ji dui xiang 
dan weng duo er shuo 
shi ji shang wai lai lao gong ke yi tian bu suo zai guo de lao dong li shi chang bu zu he ji neng kong que 
duo shu wai lai lao gong jiao wei nian qing 
dui suo zai guo de she hui fu li ti xi shi jing gong xian zhe 
sheng ming zhi chu 
ken ni ya yi ji su dan 
lian he guo nan min shu hu yu zeng qiang an quan bao hu cuo shi 
yi que bao nan min he ren dao zhu yi gong zuo zhe ren shen an quan 
nan su dan po qie xu yao yuan zhu 
chi xu de wu zhuang chong tu dao zhi yuan zhu ren yuan hen nan shen zhi wu fa jie jin shou kun min zhong 
lian he guo nan min shu he lian he guo zhu nan su dan te pai tuan 
lian he guo ren dao zhu yi shi wu xie tiao ban gong shi he zuo 
yi zai nan su dan shou du zhu ba yi ji bo er 
ma la ka lei 
ci hou zhi zheng de su dan ren min jie fang yun dong nei bu liang ge zhu yao pai bie zhi jian fen qi ri yi yan zhong 
nan su dan zong tong wei dui zhong lai zi ding ka zu he nu wei er zu di shi bing zai shou du zhu ba fa sheng qiang zhan 
suo fa sheng de wu zhuang chong tu shi yi qi zheng bian 
ma sha er shi mu hou ce hua zhe 
ji er he ma sha er shuang fang dou sheng cheng yuan yi jie shou he tan 
xin jiang ni lei ke xian jiao yu ju xiang ji zhe pi lu 
ni lei ke xian er zhong liang jiao shi zhang qi tuo gang chi kong xiang 
de chu bu diao cha jie guo 
zai jin yi bu diao cha hou 
jiang gen ju cheng xu dui she shi ren yuan zuo chu chu li 
you mei ti bao dao cheng 
er ren fen bie wei ni lei ke xian yuan fu xian zhang xia de ke he ni lei ke ma chang fu chang chang sha bu er jiang de qi zi 
ze cheng xian ji wei he jiao yu ju cheng li diao cha xiao zu dui mei ti fan ying di qing kuang zhan kai diao cha

zai jin yi bu diao cha he shi hou 
jiang gen ju gong zuo cheng xu dui she shi ren yuan zuo chu chu li

an xiang guan zheng ce chu li 
wo yu dang shi ren bing wu si jiao 
zhu jing chao wang xiao jun 
cheng wei quan qiu di er da huo bi ti xi zhong de yi yuan 
gei la tuo wei ya wei lai de jing ji fa zhan dai lai le geng da de ji hui 
ou zhou yang hang xing zhang de la ji dai biao ou zhou yang hang guan li wei yuan hui xiang la tuo wei ya cheng wei ou yuan qu cheng yuan guo biao shi huan ying 
la tuo wei ya ping jie qi jing ji shang de cheng jiu 
huo de le ou yuan qu cheng yuan guo de di wei

ao di li deng guo ling dao ren ye tong guo shi pin xiang la tuo wei ya biao shi zhu he

la tuo wei ya huo bi la te zhong yu tui chu li shi wu tai

dui yu la tuo wei ya lai shuo

jiang cheng wei feng hui zhong xin yi ti

guo jia ti yu zong ju ju zhang liu peng 
fu ju zhang feng jian zhong 
ju zhang zhu li xiao min fen bie chu xi le shen zhen 
fu zhou hui chang de chu fa yi shi 
zai chuan tong de zhu hui chang bei jing ba da ling chang cheng 
dai zhe hong se bang qiu mao he hong wei jin de deng cheng min zhong cong cheng guan guang chang yi bu bu xiang bei si feng huo lou pan deng 
zai lv shu hong hua yan ying xia de fu zhou hui chang deng gao lu xian shi gu shan shang yi you qian nian li shi de deng shan gu dao 
jin tian geng you hai xia liang an de tong bao gong tong xiang shan ding de liao wang tai pan deng 
jin guan shi shou ci cheng wei quan guo xin nian deng gao huo dong de zhu hui chang 
dan shen zhen shi you shang bai wan jing chang can yu deng shan hu wai yun dong de qun zhong 
jin tian de huo dong chang di lian hua shan zheng shi shen zhen shi min ping ri chang qu de deng shan jian shen chang suo 
zai shen zhen hui chang 
yi xuan chuan deng shan chang shi 
hu wai an quan wei zhu ti de jian shen da jiang tang zai huo dong xian chang tong shi ju xing 
chong fen ti xian chu jin nian deng gao huo dong 
deng gao jian shen xi ying xin nian ke xue jian shen jian kang sheng huo

bu men xie tong

fu wu min zhong

fa hui she hui dan wei 
she hui zu zhi 
qun zhong she tuan de zhong yao zuo yong 
tui dong quan min jian shen yun dong de da fa zhan 
jin nian de yuan dan deng gao huo dong ji xu kuo da le quan guo de can yu fu gai mian 
wei quan nian de qun ti gong zuo kai le ge hao tou 
jiang yin ling shi fan guang da ji ceng jin yi bu kai zhan ge lei qun zhong ti yu jian shen huo dong 
ju wai jiao bu zhong guo ling shi fu wu wang yuan yin zhu ya mai jia shi guan xiao xi 
duo ming zhong guo you ke zai ya mai jia ji chang yin wei chi you xiao qian zheng bei ju jue ru jing

yang guang xin wen 
bei jing shi ji dong che ting che guan li ban fa 
zheng shi shi xing

tong shi fei zhi 
zhe ge zhen dui bei jing ting che nan wen ti chu tai de xin zheng ti chu le zhu duo hao cheng 
shi shang zui yan 
gong an ji guan jiao tong guan li bu men gen ju dao lu de shi ji qing kuang yi ji gen ju wei hu jiao tong zhi xu de xu yao

er qi ta dan wei de ren he dan wei he ge ren bu de sun hai 
nuo yi huo zhe chai chu 
you gong an ji guan jiao tong guan li bu men ze ling ting zhi wei fa xing wei 
xun su hui fu jiao tong 
ting che chang xiang she hui kai fang de ting che chang guan li dan wei 
ying dang zai ting che chang de xian zhu wei zhi ming shi ting che chang de ming cheng 
fu wu xiang mu 
shou fei biao zhun 
che wei shu liang ji jian du dian hua 
an zhao he ding de jia ge lai shou fei 
bing chu ju zhuan yong fa piao 
bu de zai ting che qu yu cong shi ying xiang che liang an quan qing kuang de qi ta jing ying huo dong 
er qie yao jian li tou su chu li zhi du deng deng 
chu ci zhi wai 
kuo jian gong gong jian zhu ju zhu qu deng deng

pei jian ji dong che ting che chang 
pei tao jian she de ting che chang ying dang yu zhu ti gong cheng tong bu she ji 
tong bu shi gong 
tong shi yan shou 
tong shi jiao fu shi yong 
chu le yin wei shi xian yuan gui hua yong tu jiang lin shi ting che chang ting zhi shi yong de yi wai 
ren he dan wei he ge ren bu de shan zi ting zhi shi yong ting che chang 
bu de jiang ting che chang gai zuo ta yong 
wei yu gai shi de he nan da yu gou mei ye ji tuan tan mei kuang dong yi cai mei dui fa sheng tou shui shi gu 
bei kun ren yuan zai dang ri jing qiang xian jiu yuan sheng jing bei song wang yi yuan qiang jiu 
shi gu fa sheng hou

yi si yi yang hua tan zhong du

yi qi tu chi

jing yuan dao chang diao cha shi you ren fa e 
yi hui quan ou shang tong pao bei bu 
xian chang wei jian sha zui he nei dao yi jian mian dian 
ju mian dian nv dong zhu cheng 
yi ming man shen jiu qi nan zi dao da guang gu 
yi you ren qi tu bu fu kuan zhuan shen li kai 
fu ze shou yin de shao dong fa xian jiang qi jie ting 
bing cheng shen shang xian jin bu zu

yao qiu ta fang xia wu pin zuo di ya 
wei nan zi kai shi fa e 
yi cu yan he 
shuang fang fa sheng zheng zhi

tong zhi zhi yuan bao an

you ren qing xu ji dong 
tu ran fa e hui quan xi jing 
yi ming jing yuan cu bu ji fang bei ji zhong xiong kou 
tong pao jian zhuang li ke zhi zhi 
zhong he li jiang yi ren zhi fu

jing fang jing diao cha hou 
dai shu zuo jin yi bu diao cha 
jie fa ta wei xiu ban shui jing 
jiao you you jian jing qu zhong an zu gen jin 
jing fang zheng shi 
nan zi wei yi ming xiu ban jing wu ren yuan 
bing qiang diao ren he ren gan fan wei fa xing wei 
jing dui jue bu rong ren he gu xi 
ding bi yan zheng chu li 
jin xing xing shi diao cha ji ji lv fu jian . 
liu nv shi yi jia ren du ding 
cai niang cheng le zhe chang bei ju 
yi xiang qi lai 
liu nv shi jiu kong zhi bu zhu shi sheng tong ku 
ta bu zhi dao nei ge huan jie chu le guo cuo 
er xian zai zhi neng deng dai hai zi shi jian de jie guo 
gan jue hai zi chi nai shao le 
zhe ge ji jiang man liang ge yue de nan ying sheng qian shi he ze juan cheng lin pu zhen li lou cun ren 
wo men zen me ye mei xiang dao 
hai zi jiu zhe me mei le 
gang gang jing shou sang zi zhi tong de liu nv shi man lian qiao cui 
guo du de bei shang kuai ji kua le ta de shen ti 
liang nian qian you le di yi ge nv er 
zai de dao yi ge er zi 
zhe rang yi jia ren xing fen bu yi 
dan shei dou mei xiang dao 
bu xing hen kuai jiang lin dao le zhe ge xiao sheng ming shen shang 
wen ji dang shi di qing jing 
liu nv shi tong ku bu zhi 
hai zi de nai nai ma nv shi shuo : 
er er zi fu qi lia ye dai zhe hai zi 
liang jia ren yi kuai er qu zhen shang fang bao zhan da yu fang zhen 
hai zi da wan zhen hou 
gan jue ye mei shen me 
jiu shi jue de chi nai shao le 
liu nv shi shao wei ping fu hou shuo 
dang shi jue de hai zi hai xiao 
ye jiu mei you tai zai yi 
zhi qian da di di yi zhen 
ye dou mei shi 
zhu she le di yi zhen yi gan yi miao 
di yi zhen yi miao shi shen zhen kang tai de 
di er zhen shi bei jing tian tan sheng wu de 
liu nv shi na chu de jie zhong zheng shang xian shi 
sheng chan chang jia shi bei jing tian tan sheng wu 
jie zhong dan wei wei dang di de lin pu zhen fang bao zhan 
wai po ceng ti xing zhu yi yi miao jie zhong yi wai 
chu le chi nai shao le 
liu nv shi yi jia ren bing mei you zhu yi dao hai zi you qi ta de bu shi biao xian 
na tian er er zi jia de hai zi bai man yue jiu 
da er xi qu bang mang 
wo zhao kan sun zi 
hai zi de nai nai shuo 
dang shi jiu fa xian hai zi man tou da han 
man tou dou shi da han 
wo ye mei zai yi 
zhi shi xiang hai zi shi bu shi e le 
e le cai ku de man tou da han 
liu nv shi shuo 
ta yi xian kai bei zi 
cai fa xian hai zi de lian shang dou shi nai 
zui chun hei zi 
yi dian er qi ye mei you le 
de zhi er zi zai jia zhong yi wai qu shi 
zai wai da gong de hai zi fu qin li xian sheng ji ji mang mang gan hui jia li 
wo jiu shi xiang bu ming bai 
hai zi zen me jiu tu ran mei le ne ? 
liu nv shi shuo 
ta zhe cai xiang qi shi bu shi yin wei yi miao jie zhong de yuan yin 
jiu zai chu shi qian de liang san tian 
wo kan le dian shi shang you guan jie zhong yi gan yi miao chu shi de xiao xi 
hai zhuan men gei nv er da dian hua 
rang ta men bie qu jie zhong le 
hai zi de wai po zhao nv shi shuo 
xiang ge jin yi tian 
ling yi ge jia ting ye zao yu le bu xing 
ying er shi ti zheng zai ji nan jin xing shi jian 
tan cheng na ge yong de jiu shi bei jing tian tan de 
pi hao hai he wo men zhe ge ai zhe 
zhe rang liu nv shi yi jia geng jia jue de hai zi de si wang jiu shi yin wei jie zhong yi gan yi miao dao zhi 
hai zi qu shi hou 
liu nv shi yi jia xiang cun li 
zhen fang bao zhan fan ying le qing kuang 
zhuan jia dao wo men zhe li diao cha guo 
ran hou jian yi wo men gei hai zi zuo shi jian 
liu nv shi shuo 
hai zi shi ti bei song dao sheng li xiang guan bu men jin xing shi jian 
hai zi de ba ba xian zai hai zai ji nan pei zhe ne 
liu nv shi shuo 
wo men zhi xiang jin kuai tao ge shuo fa 
ju ti yuan yin hai yao deng xiang guan jian ce jie guo chu lai 
juan cheng xian ji kong zhong xin you guan fu ze ren jie shao 
shi fa dang tian 
xian li yi jing tong zhi suo you jie zhong dan wei zan ting shi yong tong yi pi ci de yi gan yi miao 
bing jin xing feng cun 
tong shi zu zhi zhuan jia jin xing le diao cha 
juan cheng xian ji kong zhong xin ji hua mian yi ke jia ke zhang jie shao 
gai xian ge jie zhong dan wei shi yong de yi gan yi miao dou shi zhu ji pei fa 
fang bao zhan yi gan yi miao bu zu shi 
bian hui dai leng cang xiang dao xian ji kong zhong xin qu qu 
qu lai hou bian zhi yu zhuan men de bing xiang nei 
jia ke zhang jie shao 
yi ban hai zi de di yi zhen yi gan yi miao dou shi zai chu sheng yi yuan jie zhong 
zhi hou di er zhen zai dang di fang bao zhan jie zhong ji ke 
jie zhong de ke neng bu shi yi ge chang jia de 
dan yi zhi dou mei chu guo wen ti 
hai shi di yi ci yu jian zhe yang de shi qing 
li gang li de ling 
hai zi bu dong le 
men shang de da hong xi zi hai zai 
dan yuan zi li yi jing mei you le xiao sheng 
lin yi shi tan cheng xian yang ji zhen lu zhuang cun 
mei you xin tiao 
mei you hu xi 
kou bi li liu chu bai mo 
er jiu zai ci qian yi tian 
xiao yu ze gang gang zai yi yuan da le yi zhen yi gan yi miao 
an zhao lao jia de feng su 
nai nai zai kuai man yue de sun zi mao zi shang bie le yi gen xiu hua zhen 
ju shuo zhe yang ke yi bi xie 
ke shi rang ren mei xiang dao de shi 
xiu hua zhen bu jin mei pi cheng xie 
fan er cha jin le ying er de nao dai li 
xian xie yao le ren ming 
xing hao yi sheng shou shu qu le chu lai 
cha ru ying er nao nei 
ji jiang man yue 
sui zai xia men dao wai da gong de fu mu sheng huo 
an zhao lao jia de xi su 
nai nai zai zhuang zhuang dai de mao zi shang bie le yi gen xiu hua zhen 
shuo shi ke yi bi xie 
ma ma zai zhao gu zhuang zhuang shi 
fa xian ta you ce hou nao shao chu you tiao xian cong tou pi xia lu chu lai 
dan shi mei you zhao dao zhen 
nan dao zhen zha jin le nao dai li 
yan kan zhuang zhuang bu ting ku nao 
ma ma gan jin dai ta qu yi yuan 
jing guo que zhen 
xiu hua zhen zhen de yi jing zha jin nao dai li 
zhuang zhuang bei zhuan dao le xia men da xue fu shu di yi yi yuan 
zhi ban de shen jing wai ke chen si fang yi sheng kan le pian hou fa xian 
zhen jian jin ai zhe yi gen da jing mai 
ji qi wei xian 
shou shu qu chu xiu hua zhen 
sui ran lian zhe zhen de xian lu zai wai mian 
dan shi kao lv dao zhen de zou xiang bu ming que 
ba de guo cheng zhong zhen hui bu hui duan 
hui bu hui jia zhong nao zu zhi de sun shang 
yi sheng mei you mao ran ba zhen ba chu lai 
wei le bao xian qi jian 
yi sheng you wei zhuang zhuang zuo le yi xie jian cha 
tong shi zuo hao kai lu de shou shu zhun bei 
zai shou shu zhong 
bing kan qing chu le zhen de zou xiang 
fa xian zhen cou qiao shi yan zhe lu gu de gu feng cha jin qu de 
chen yi sheng shuo 
you yu gu feng bi jiao shu song rong yi tong guo 
ta men jiu chang shi ni zhe zhen de zou xiang ba zhen ba chu lai 
jie guo hai ting shun li 
zhen jian rui li 
chen yi sheng shuo 
zhen sui ran shi ba chu lai le 
dan shi shu hou reng ma shang gei zhuang zhuang fu cha le 
que ding mei you lu nei chu xue 
you yu zhen shi fei wu jun de wai lai wu 
jie xia lai yi sheng zhong dian yao gei zhuang zhuang kang gan ran zhi liao 
bi mian hou xu chu xian nao mo yan huo nao nong zhong deng wen ti 
ju tai wan wang zhan xiao xi 
xin nian di yi tian tai wan tian qi hen bu cuo 
dong bu yi zao ye you tai yang lou lian 
chang mian sheng da 
chang sheng ri kuai le ge 
chuan zhe bi ji ni de la mei chong chu qi pao dian 
chang mian hao xi jing 
bu rang bi ji ni la mei zhuan mei yu qian 
hai you xu duo bian zhuang pao zhe 
bu guan shi chuan zhe xue shi fu de da xue bi ye sheng 
huo zhe shi chuan zhe chu shi fu 
bao zha tou zao xing 
tai dong tai ma li xiang gong suo te bie ju ban le zhe ge bi ji ni sha tan lu pao huo dong 
zai yuan dan dang tian xi yin le xu duo min zhong lai gong xiang sheng ju 
lu pao min zhong 
chen xian zai hai nian qing 
ke yi zuo yi dian bu yi yang de shi qing 
lao le jiu bu xing le 
lu pao min zhong 
zhi you bi ji ni shi wo de 
qi ta dong xi dou shi da jia lai bang zhu wo 
ta men shuo wei le ni qu can jia 
lai gei wo gu li 
ying jie shu guang de fang shi mei ge di fang ge you bu tong 
shou xing ma ma 
zhe shi bu yi yang de ti yan 
xiang shuo rang ta guo yi ge sheng ri bu yi yang de ti yan 
quan tai xu duo di fang dou kan de dao shu guang 
ren min bi dui mei yuan zong ti cheng xian jia su sheng zhi tai shi 
di yi ji du 
you yu hai wai jing ji de zhu jian wen ding 
mei guo jing ji qiang jing fu su 
wai xu zheng cheng xian shang sheng shi tou deng yuan yin 
ren min bi dui mei yuan zhong jian jia sui zhang die hu xian 
dan zheng ti cheng zou gao qu shi 
wei jin nian shou ji de dan yue zui da zhang fu 
jie shu le lian xu san ri de xiao fu xia die 
ren min bi hui lv kai shi ming xian sheng zhi 
you yu zheng fu tui chu yi xi lie zheng ce da ji re qian tao li xing wei 
jia da le dui duan qi zi ben liu ru de jian guan he xian zhi 
mei lian chu tui chu yu qi de bu duan zeng qiang 
dao zhi guo ji zi ben kai shi cong bu fen xin xing jing ji ti guo jia che chu 
hui liu mei guo 
ye gei ren min bi dai lai bian zhi ya li 
zai duo zhong yin su zuo yong xia 
duan qi nei shi chang dui ren min bi sheng zhi yu qi zhu jian xiao tui 
di san ji du 
guo ji shi chang shang 
mei zhai wei ji zan huan hou shi chang jiao dian zhong hui mei lian chu zheng ce 
zhong guo di san ji du deng jing ji shu ju xian shi jing ji xiang hao 
zhe xie yin su cu shi ren min bi dui mei yuan hui lv zhong jian jia zou gao 
shua xin hui gai ji lu 
mei yuan bian zhi yi ji jiao hao de shi chang tou zi xing shi deng yuan yin 
yi lu gao ge meng jin 
lian xu ji ge jiao yi ri chuang xin gao 
guo wu yuan fa zhan yan jiu zhong xin jin rong yan jiu suo zhu ming fang bo shi dui ji zhe biao shi 
jiang dui guo nei di fu jia zhi de hang ye chu kou chan sheng bu li ying xiang 
dan cong zhong chang qi kan dui you li yu zhong guo jing ji jie gou de tiao zheng 
ta jian yi ba ren min bi sheng zhi kong jian na ru ke kong fan wei zhi nei 
zhu yao yuan yin zai yu 
mei yuan zhu bu de tui chu liang hua kuan song 
fu du xiang dui lai shuo bi jiao huan he 
chang qi li lv bao chi bi jiao di de shui ping 
guo nei jing ji sui ran you yi ding xia xing ya li 
dan zai zhu bu diao zheng guo cheng zhong 
ji ben shang neng bao zheng ping wen yun xing 
zhong mei li cha yi ran bao chi zhe yi ge gao shui ping 
suo yi ren min bi hai hui you yi ding de sheng zhi kong jian 
ren min bi ji xu sheng zhi duan qi kan dui guo nei di fu jia zhi de hang ye chu kou you ying xiang 
dan cong zhong chang qi kan dui you li yu zhong guo jing ji jie gou de tiao zheng 
dui di fu jia zhi hang ye de chan ye huo hang ye 
zai ren min bi sheng zhi de ya li xia hui tiao zheng sheng chan jie guo he xiao lv 
ta fen xi cheng 
dan ye yao kan dao ren min bi sheng zhi bu ke neng wu xian qi yan xu xia qu 
sui zhe mei yuan zhu jian zou qiang 
ren min bi sheng zhi de fu du he ke neng xing hui ri yi jian xiao 
huo shi wei chi wen ding shui ping 
huo shi fan fu 
mei yuan zai sheng zhi de guo cheng dui qi ta huo bi er yan ye shi sheng zhi de guo cheng 
ru guo ren min bi ji xu bao chi jiao da sheng zhi fu du 
dui zheng ge jing ji ya li shi xian er yi jian de 
ta jian yi ba ren min bi sheng zhi kong jian na ru ke kong fan wei zhi nei 
ju xin hua she quan guo nong fu chan pin he nong zi jia ge hang qing xi tong jian ce 
su dai zhuang chun niu nai jia ge shang zhang 
shu cai jia ge yi zhang wei zhu 
shi yong you jia ge yi jiang wei zhu 
shui guo jia ge wen zhong you jiang 
qin dan jia ge lve you bo dong 
cheng pin liang jia ge ji ben wen ding 
fu shi ping guo 
jian ce shu ju xian shi 
quan guo niu rou jia ge chi xu shang zhang 
fen di qu lai kan 
ge sheng qu shi niu rou jia ge jun shang zhang 
qi zhong chong qing 
gan su de niu jian rou 
chong qing de niu nan rou jia ge zhang fu ju qian 
lai zi guang tie ji tuan xiao xi 
tie lu bu men yu ji 
jiang ying lai chun yun gou piao gao feng 
guang tie ji tuan tong guo hu lian wang shou piao 
dian hua ding piao 
wai lai gong tuan ti ding piao 
xue sheng piao you xian fa shou 
ji zhong shou piao dian shou piao 
dai shou dian shou piao 
zhan nei chuang kou shou piao he gao tie zhan nei zi dong shou huan piao ji zi dong shou piao deng shou piao fang shi 
guang zhou wang xi nan 
dong bei fang xiang che piao jin zhang 
chun yun qi jian you guang zhou fa wang cheng du 
chang chun deng fang xiang de che piao jin zhang 
jin you shao liang che piao sheng yu 
tie lu bu men ti xing xu zhua jin ti qian yu ding 
ju guang tie xiang guan bu men jie shao 
zhen dui zhu san jiao di qu wai lai wu gong ren yuan jiao ji zhong di qing kuang 
guang tie ji tuan wen xin ti shi 
wei le cuo kai mai piao gao feng 
chun yun qi jian 
guang tie ji tuan guan nei zai hu lian wang huo ding piao dian hua reng shi shi ge che zhan yu shou che piao fen shi duan cuo feng de cuo shi 
chen xiang jun liu xiao mei fu wei 
cao mei miao shen me yang 
nan gua teng you duo zhang 
la jiao shi gua zai shu shang de ma 
ru guo mei you gan guo nong huo 
hen nan xiang xiang ta men de yang zi 
na me nong chang zou jin da shang chang you hui shi shen me yang ne 
liang jie lin jin 
ge da shang chang chu le chuan tong de jie ri cu xiao wai 
hai zai ji ji tiao zheng ye tai yin ru xin de yuan su 
yi ti sheng xiao fei zhe de gou wu ti yan 
ji zhe kan dao 
ben shi shou ge gou wu zhong xin nei de shi nei sheng tai hu dong ti yan zhong zhi qu ye zai liang jie qian xi kai ye 
ji zhe kan dao 
shi mu cai liao da jian de 
li zhong zhi le qie zi 
fan qie deng er shi duo ge pin lei 
qi shi duo pen guo shu 
zhan shi le zhi wu de bu tong sheng zhang jie duan 
de zhong jian hai you yi zuo wei xing mu chang 
san zhi xiao xiang zhu 
duo zhi song shi tu he cang shu 
yu gu ke ding qi jian mian 
ji zhe kan dao 
bu shao gu ke quan jia lao shao dou bei zhe te bie de 
xi yin zhu zu 
zhe shi hai zi di yi ci kan jian xiao zhu 
wo ye shi di yi ci zhe me jin ju li guan cha 
yuan lai yi wei zhu mao ye shi ruan de 
yuan lai zhe me ying 
hai zi kan le cao mei 
fei yao hui jia ye zhong 
ji zhe kan dao 
bu shao ren deng zhe bao xiao zhu he ying 
yong shou ji sao miao nong chang nei sui chu ke jian de er wei ma 
xiao fei zhe ke yi kuai su liao jie guan yu zhi wu de xiang xi xin xi 
xiao shou ren yuan hai neng wei xiao fei zhe jie shao bu tong guo shu zhi wu de sheng zhang zhong zhi yao dian yi ji xiang guan nong ye zhi shi 
nong chang li zhong zhi de shi you zhuan ye nong ye gong si pei yu de you ji shu cai 
xiao dong wu ye shi jian yan jian yi he ge de jing xuan pin zhong 
xian zai da jia shi fen guan zhu shi pin an quan wen ti 
wo men ben shen ye you nong ye sheng chan bei jing 
suo yi xiang tong guo nong chang zhe ge xiang mu 
xiang xiao fei zhe chuan da le huo de li nian yi ji lv se huan bao 
ke chi xu fa zhan de guan nian 
wo men bing mei you jiang nong chang zuo cheng yi ge dan chun de jing guan xiang mu 
er shi xi wang yu gu ke hu dong 
tong guo zhe ge ping tai 
wei lai wo men hai jiang yin ru lv se nong fu ji shi 
chuang yi nong chang deng duo zhong yuan su 
zhong liang da yue cheng nong chang de xiang mu fu ze ren gao su ji zhe 
ye nei ren shi zhi chu 
shang chang pin pai 
fu wu tong zhi hua jing zheng yan zhong 
ti yan shi fu wu cheng wei shi ti shang chang jing ying de tu po dian 
ben shi ti yan shi ye tai shang bu feng fu 
dan sui zhe gou wu zhong xin 
chuan tong shang chang deng dui yu ti yan shi ye tai de duo yuan hua chang shi 
tong guo chan sheng qing gan niu dai de ti yan huo dong 
la jin xiao fei zhe yu shang jia de ju li 
nong chang + shang chang 
de lv se huan bao 
hui gui tian yuan zi ran de gai nian ling jiu ju cheng shi de ren men zhao dao le jiu wei de xin xian gan 
dan ru he jiang hao chuang yi jin xing dao di 
rang hao fu wu 
hao pin pai ji jiao hao you jiao zuo 
er bu shi tan hua yi xian 
ye shi jing ying zhe ying gai kao lv de 
kai fa shang qian shui men shi jian jing guo yi duan shi jian chen ji hou zui jin you hui nuan 
dong fang shi kong 
er wan ke ye bu gan shi ruo 
sui ji fan ji 
fa biao gong gao cheng zi ji bu cun zai qian shui 
yang shi he kai fa shang de fen zheng zai du yin lai wei guan 
yang shi dian ming wan ke da lao hu 
dong fang shi kong 
ji lin wan ke cheng xiang mu 
guang zhou wan ke jin yu lan wan deng duo ge xiang mu yi jing da dao qing jiao tu di zeng zhi shui de tiao jian 
dan qi ye bing wei zhu dong shen bao 
er dang di shui wu zhu guan bu men bing wei yao qiu qi ye qing jiao 
zhe shi ji yang shi 
mei zhou zhi liang bao gao 
yang shi zai ci xiang kai fa shang kai pao 
gen ju ci qian bao dao 
zhe yi bao dao sui hou yin fa kai fa shang qiang lie fan dan 
duo jia shang shi gong si fa gong gao 
cheng zi ji wei qian shui 
wan ke zhu yi hui ji xiang mu qian shui 
dui yu yang shi de tu ran dian ming 
wan ke ye you bei er lai 
wan ke yi da zao bian fa bu you zhen dui xing de gong gao 
dui yang shi ti ji de xiang mu zhu yi jin xing le hui fu 
gen ju guo shui zong ju de xiang guan gui ding 
ying jin xing tu di zeng zhi shui qing suan de 
wei yi xia san zhong qing kuang 
fang di chan kai fa xiang mu quan bu jun gong 
wan cheng xiao shou de 
zheng ti zhuan rang wei jun gong jue suan fang di chan kai fa xiang mu di 
zhi jie zhuan rang tu di shi yong quan de 
jing guo wan ke nei bu he shi 
suo bao dao de si ge xiang mu dou bu fu he zhe san zhong qing suan tiao jian 
guang zhou jin yu hua ting xiang mu 
yuan wei da dao tu di zeng zhi shui qing suan tiao jian 
ji lin wan ke cheng xiang mu 
gen ju jing shen ji de shi ji cheng ben ji shou ru ce suan 
yu ji qing suan hou shi ji ying jiao na de tu di zeng zhi shui shao yu yu jiao jin e 
shu yu ying tui shui xiang mu 
guang zhou jin yu lan wan xiang mu 
bai yue wan xiang mu 
jun wei quan bu wan cheng xiao shou 
sui ran jun wei da dao ying qing suan tiao jian 
dan xiang mu gong si yi jing zai zheng li xiang guan cai liao 
wei qing suan gong zuo zuo zhun bei 
wan ke zi cheng yi fa na shui 
chu le zhu yi hui ying 
wan ke hai cheng zi ji shi yi fa na shui 
ci wei gong si an zhao hui ji zhun ze yao qiu 
dui wei lai ke neng chan sheng de tu di zeng zhi shui jin xing de ji ti 
gong si bu cun zai ying jiao wei jiao de tu di zeng zhi shui 
ji zhe zhui fang 
shuang fang fen qi yuan yu tong ji kou jing bu yi 
wu lun shi yang shi hai shi kai fa shang 
hao xiang dou hen you li 
wei shen me shuang fang wu cha zhe me da 
qi zhong zui guan jian de shi tong ji kou jing shuang fang you cha ju 
yang shi de tong ji kou jing shi yu shou 
zhe yi dian wan ke jin xing le hui ji 
ming que biao shi le fang di chan gong si shi yi quan bu jun gong 
wan cheng xiao shou wei jiao shui shi dian 
wan ke ban chu le guo shui zong ju de gui ding 
geng you shuo fu li 
zhi yu wan ke suo shuo de xiao shou bu jia 
ge bie xiang mu bu jin bu yong zai jiao shui 
fan er hai yao tui shui 
zai bei jing dan ren kai fa shang cai wu fu ze ren de zhang wei gao su ji zhe 
zhe zhu yao shi yin wei tu di zeng zhi shui da duo dou shi yu jiao 
ge de dou bu tong 
zai mai lou shi 
yin wei shi dian bu tong 
mai de jia ge bu tong 
zhe jiu you ke neng ti duo le 
jiu xu yao zai zui hou jie suan de shi hou tui 
zhe li mian hai qian che dao suo de shui zhi lei de 
ji wei fu za 
bu shi jian dan de yi kou jia jiao shui 
ye jie fan ying 
ren zhi qiang pang guan li ting wan ke 
sui ran zhe yi ci yang shi pao kou dui zhun le wan ke 
dan shi zuo wei fang di chan hang ye de zhi ming 
hua yuan dong shi zhang ren zhi qiang yi ran ren bu zhu fa biao ping lun
