cheng yang shi dian ming wan ke shu yu da lao hu 
dan yang shi bao dao que you kan bu chu wan ke qian shui 
yang shi jiang wan ke dang cheng qian shui de lao hu tong da 
wo bu zhi dao wan ke shi fou qian shui 
dan wo cong yang shi bao dao zhong kan bu chu wan ke shi fou qian shui 
yang shi mei zheng ming yi ju bei na shui tiao jian de lou pan wei jie suan zeng zhi shui 
ye wei zheng ming wei jiao zeng zhi shui de yu e yu zhe xie ying jie suan xiang mu di guan xi 
wei sha bu cai fang kuai ji shi 
wei sha bu cai fang zheng jian hui he jiao yi suo 
xiang dui yu ci qian 
mei zhou zhi liang bao gao 
dian ming hua yuan di chan shi de fen nu 
zhe ci ren zhi qiang geng duo de shi zhi yi 
cong di chan hang ye de jiao du dui wan ke jin xing le zhi chi 
er zai bu jiu qian zu zhi de hang ye xie hui yan tao zhong 
ren zhi qiang zhi yan fang di chan xie hui hui zhang zhu zhong yi de pi ping tai guo 
huo zhe gen wan ke shuo wo wu du le 
ren zhi qiang zai fa yan zhong biao shi 
xin nian yi shi 
yi pi yu da jia yi shi zhu xing xiang guan de xin gui jiang kai shi zheng shi shi shi 
yan min men cheng zuo huo che xu yao zhu yi le 
tie lu an quan guan li tiao li 
zhong shou ci ming que gui ding 
jin zhi cheng ke zai dong che zu lie che shang xi yan huo zhe zai qi ta lie che de jin yan qu yu xi yan 
shi shi huo che piao shi ming gou mai 
cha yan zhi du de 
lv ke ying dang ping you xiao shen fen zheng jian gou piao cheng che 
dui che piao suo ji zai shen fen xin xi yu suo chi shen fen zheng jian huo zhe zhen shi shen fen bu fu de chi piao ren 
tie lu yun shu qi ye you quan ju jue qi jin zhan cheng che 
jin zhi shi shi 
cong lie che shang pao reng za wu 
tiao che deng wei hai tie lu an quan de xing wei 
dian shi gou wu guang gao xian shi xian ci 
zong zai jie mu zhong cha bo de dian shi gou wu guang gao jiang da fu jian shao 
ju guo jia xin wen chu ban guang dian zong ju xia fa de 
jin yi bu jia qiang wei shi pin dao bo chu dian shi gou wu duan pian guang gao guan li gong zuo de tong zhi 
bu de bo chu dian shi gou wu duan pian guang gao 
gen ju cai zheng bu 
gong ying you er shi yong de ling shou bao zhuang pei fang nai fen 
ru dan bai bu fen shui jie pei fang 
ru dan bai shen du shui jie pei fang 
an ji suan pei fang 
wu ru tang pei fang te shu ying you er nai fen 
da xing you le she shi jia qiang jian cha 
guo jia zhi jian jian yan jian yi zong ju 
da xing you le she shi an quan jian cha gui ding 
jia zhang men dai hai zi qu you le yuan wan ye jiang geng jia fang xin 
zai guo jia fa ding jie jia ri huo ju xing da xing qun zhong xing huo dong qian 
yun ying shi yong dan wei ying dang dui da xing you le she shi jin xing quan mian jian cha wei hu 
bing jia qiang ri chang jian cha he an quan zhi ban 
yun ying shi yong dan wei ying dang jia qiang ying jiu she bei 
ji jiu wu pin de cun fang he guan li 
dui jiu yuan ren yuan ding qi jin xing zhuan ye pei xun 
mei nian zhi shao dui mei tai 
zhong guo you xi shi chang jin nian lai xun meng zeng zhang 
ju bao gao tong ji 
quan guo you xi shi chang xiao shou shou ru yu qu nian xiang bi 
qi zhong ke hu duan you xi reng shi shi chang zhu li 
yi dong you xi 
sui zhe jin ji nian zhi neng shou ji he ping ban dian nao chi xu re xiao 
zhong guo de da duo shu you xi qi ye dou yi jing shi xian yi dong hu lian wang hua 
shi de yi dong you xi chu xian 
bao gao yu ce 
hu lian wang ji shu ge ming hui shi dian shi 
ke chuan dai she bei deng cheng wei xin xing yu le de zai ti 
jiang shi you xi qi ye wei lai zheng duo de re dian 
bao gao you zhong guo yin xiang yu shu zi chu ban xie hui zai quan guo you xi chan ye diao cha gong zuo de ji chu shang zhi zuo xing cheng 
you yu qi diao cha fan wei guang 
tong ji fen xi fang fa quan wei 
cheng wei you xi ye jie ren shi de di yi shou yan jiu zi liao 
zhong guo you xi chan ye lan pi shu 
ju zhong guo zhi sheng 
xin wen zong heng 
chao ji wang yin 
ceng jing shen shou wang yin yong hu qing lai 
dan gen ju yang hang gui ding 
chao ji wang yin 
you ke neng jiang gao bie mian fei shi dai 
shi bu shi hai you bie de fang fa 
da dao mian fei zhuan zhang de mu di ne 
chao ji wang yin 
you cheng wang shang zhi fu kua xing qing suan xi tong 
shi yang hang yi tuo di er dai zhi fu qing suan xi tong jiang ge shang ye yin hang wang shang yin hang lian jie qi lai de xi tong 
ke yi shi xian kua xing zhuan zhang 
kua xing zhang hu cha xun 
zi jin gui ji deng gong neng 
dui shi min lai shuo 
er qie shi shi dao zhang 
zhi fu jie suan si wang shang zhi fu kua xing qing suan xi tong ye wu shou fei fang an 
zheng qiu yi jian gao 
dan ju ti de fei yong jiang zhi xing zen yang de biao zhun 
mu qian reng mei you ming que xi ze 
you you yin hang ye nei ren shi jie shi ren wei 
chao ji wang yin 
yao shou fei de xiao xi qi shi bu tai zhun que 
yin wei xian zai bu fen yin hang ti gong 
chao ji wang yin 
fu wu shi shou qu shou xu fei de 
er yang hang de zheng qiu yi jian gao 
shi yao tong yi shou fei biao zhun 
yi mu qian di qing kuang lai kan 
chao ji wang yin shou fei hou ru he xiang shou fei lv jian mian you hui 
ji zhe liao jie dao 
mu qian bu fen yin hang de shou ji yin hang jin xing kua xing zhuan zhang ke shi xian mian fei 
hua xia yin hang shou ji yin hang kua xing zhuan zhang mian fei 
bu fen yin hang de wei xin yin hang tong yang ke yi xiang shou kua xing zhuan zhang mian fei fu wu 
yi xie yin hang de gui bin ka huo shao shu te shu ka ye ke yi shi xian zhe ge fu wu 
er dui yu pu tong xiao fei zhe lai shuo 
zhi fu bao shou ji ke hu duan mu qian zhuan zhang ye shi mian fei de 
cong zhong hua gu sui ku chuan lai hao xiao xi 
xin jiang yue pu hu xian shou li juan xian zao xue gan xi bao yu guo wai huan zhe pei xing cheng gong 
yi que ding yu yi ming shou juan zhe guo wai huan zhe pei xing cheng gong 
bu jin shi zai ka shi di qu 
xin jiang wei wu er zu zhong pei xing cheng gong de shou li 
hai shi xin jiang shou li yu guo wai huan zhe pei xing cheng gong de zao xue gan xi bao 
shi yue pu hu xian dian xin ju nong cun zhi ju zhang 
wei hu gong zuo 
ka shi di qu hong shi zi hui de cai xue che lai dao yue pu hu xian 
ta di yi ci can jia xian xue huo dong 
jing guo gai xian hong shi zi hui gong zuo ren yuan de xuan chuan 
ta can jia le hong shi zi hui zhao mu cai ji zao xue gan xi bao de zhi yuan zhe 
mei xiang dao di yi ci can jia xian xue huo dong 
can jia zhi yuan huo dong de ta 
jiu yu yi ming guo wai bai xue bing huan zhe pei xing cheng gong 
dang ta jie dao zhong hua gu sui ku xin jiang fen ku de dian hua shi 
shuo ta de zao xue gan xi bao yu yi ming guo wai bai xue bing huan zhe pei xing cheng gong 
tu ru qi lai de xiao xi 
dang que ding shi shi shi shi 
ta dang ji zuo chu jue ding 
yuan yi wu chang wei guo wai huan zhe juan xian zao xue gan xi bao 
zuo wei yi ming zhong guo ren 
neng wan jiu yi ming sheng ming 
shi wo de zi hao he rong xing 
tong shi wo yao tong guo ci ci juan xian zao xue gan xi bao de huo dong 
rang shi jie ren min xiao chu dui xin jiang ren min de wu jie 
zuo wei yi ming zhi yuan zhe 
ta bu hui shou qu huan zhe de ren he bu chang 
yao jian qing huan zhe de fu dan 
na li de dian xin wang luo chu xian le wen ti 
na li jiu you ta de shen ying 
cong lai bu tui wei he tuo yan 
ta nian ling sui ran bi wo xiao 
dan gan de dou shi da shi he shi shi 
wo men de zhi yu shan jiang yao juan xian zao xue gan xi bao de xiao xi 
dou hen gan dong 
ye hen pei fu ta de yong qi 
you ta zhe yang de tong shi wo men hen jiao ao 
qi zi ji qin you dou hen dan xin 
ta men xiang di qu hong shi zi hui de zhuan jia jin xing le zi xun 
kao lv dao zhe you shi yi jian hao shi 
jiu fang xin rang ta qu shi xian ta de yuan wang 
zuo wei ta de qin ren 
wo men gan dao hen rong xing he zi hao 
wo men jing guo zai wang shang cha zhao zi liao 
xiang zhuan jia zi xun 
de zhi zao xue gan xi bao jiu yu ping chang xian xue yi yang 
bu ying xiang zheng chang gong zuo he sheng huo 
er qie ta hai nian qing 
wo men yi jia ren dou zhi chi ta de ju dong 
jiu si fu shang shi wo men mei ge gong min de yi wu he ze ren 
zai xian lao bao ju gong zuo 
ju xian hong shi zi hui gong zuo ren yuan zhou gui mei jie shao 
ge xiang sheng li zhi biao jun fu he juan xian yao qiu 
bing qian ding le zao xue gan xi bao wu chang zhi yuan juan xian xie yi 
ta shi yue pu hu xian di yi wei pei xing cheng gong juan xian de zhi yuan zhe 
gai xian xian xue 
can jia zhi yuan zhe de ai xin ren shi zhu nian zeng duo 
tong xun yuan chang juan 
yi ge ren fu bu shi fu 
wo yao dai ling da jia yi qi fu qi lai 
xin jiang wu su shi jiu jian lou xiang huang qu cun cun min wang hai de shuo 
wang hai de zao zai duo nian qian 
jiu kai shi gao yang zhi 
mei nian zheng liang san wan yuan 
chu qu hai zi shang xue 
jia ting kai zhi jiu suo sheng wu ji 
jiu jian lou xiang li yao kuo da yang zhi gui mo 
pi le yi da kuai kong di 
ba fen san de yang zhi hu lian he qi lai 
jian li le ji zhong de yang zhi xiao qu 
wang hai de di yi ge jiu bao ming le 
wang hai de ban jin le cun li de yang zhi xiao qu 
you cheng gong de zhu ce le de min chu qin yang zhi zhuan ye he zuo she 
dang chu dao yang zhi xiao qu lai 
yi fen qian ye mei you 
quan shi cong qin qi 
peng you na jie de qian 
zi yi zai dai yi bu fen kuan 
cai mian qiang jian qi le fang zi 
you le gai fang wu de qian 
dan mei you le mai sheng chu de qian 
zheng gan shang na nian niu yang rou de shi chang jia ge hao 
tong guo yu fei niu yang 
wang hai de bu dan huan qing le yin hang dai kuan 
wang hai de shuo 
yi wo duo nian lai de yang zhi jing yan 
cong dai kuan fa fang dao xian zai liang ge yue de shi jian 
zou jin wang hai de de jia 
jia shi nei zhuang xiu kao jiu 
jia yong dian qi yi ying ju quan 
lian niu yang quan dou pei you shi pin jian kong 
tang zai jia li jiu zhi dao niu yang zai quan zhong de huo dong qing kuang 
xian zai wo de sheng huo fu zu le 
zi ji jian shang de ze ren geng zhong le 
wo you ze ren 
you yi wu dai ling qi ta he zuo she cheng yuan geng hao de fa zhan xu mu ye 
wang hai de shuo 
wang hai de ba gou jin lai de liang zhong duo tai rou yang mu chu fen gei qi ta yang zhi hu 
bang zhu ta men fa zhan yang zhi ye 
zai wang hai de de cheng gong dai dong xia 
qie dou you yi ding de gui mo 
jin yi bu tuo kuan le ta men de zeng shou qu dao 
wang hai de shuo 
zai shi wei shi zheng fu qiang nong 
hui nong zheng ce de da li zhi chi xia 
xiang li de xu mu ye hui yue lai yue hong huo 
hui dai ling geng duo qun zhong zao ri ben xiao kang 
tong xun yuan chen chen 
xiao kang bu xiao kang 
guan jian kan lao xiang 
xin jiang ga shi xian ba zhun 
zheng qu rang nong min zao ri yu quan guo tong bu bu ru xiao kang 
you yu tu rang yan jian du han liang gao 
ga shi xian niu yang rou rou zhi you liang 
zai jia shang chuan tong chan ye xu mu ye bei shou qun zhong ren ke 
gai xian cong you zhe hou shi ji chu de xu mu ye shang song zheng ce 
gai xian zheng he cai zheng zi jin 
jia gong yi ji chan ye hua deng fang mian de jian she 
die jia chan sheng de neng liang 
shi fu chi xu mu ye fa zhan de zi jin da dao le jin yi yuan 
zhe xie fu chi zheng ce 
tai yang neng lu deng fu yu xin nong cun xian dai hua de qi xi 
pei tao jian she shui dian lu deng ji chu she shi 
qun zhong da xin yan li xi huan 
ke pei tao jian she gong gong wen hua huo dong chang suo 
rang qun zhong de xi huan yi chu lai 
xie zai lian shang 
yin wei zhu zai nong cun ye neng xiang shou dao cheng li ren de sheng huo 
fen lei de bian min chao shi rang cun min bu chu cun jiu ke mai dao ri yong pin 
niu yang rou yi ji nong zi 
xiu xian guang chang 
jian shen qi cai he lan qiu chang yi ying ju quan 
duo gong neng huo dong ting ji ke yue lan 
you ke jin xing ping pang qiu 
qi pai deng shi nei huo dong 
wen ti huo dong bu shou tian qi 
ji jie de xian zhi 
xin nong cun mian mao jin zai qi zhong 
yuan zi li de hua chi 
peng juan shi nong jia sheng huo de xie zhao 
pu zhe di ban zhuan de ke ting bai fang zhe xing sha fa yu cha ji 
ce suo pei tao 
dong tian ye ke xi shang re shui zao 
nong min guo shang le xian dai 
wen ming de sheng huo 
ke pi nai ke cun jin shi xin nong cun de yi ge suo ying 
xian wei shu ji wang zhi jun shuo 
wo men bu jin yao ding zhe liang 
zhi dao nong min zhong tian 
hai yao da li ti gao nong cun lao dong li su zhi 
dai ye qing nian 
zou jin xian zhong deng zhi ye ji shu xue xiao 
jie shou wei qi san ge yue de mian fei ji neng pei xun 
jin dong ming chun 
ga shi xian jiang fen san pi 
li yong yi xing cheng de 
de cheng shu jing yan 
fa zhan de guan jian shi xuan hao pei qiang cun gan bu 
gai xian qi dong le cun ji hou bei gan bu pei xun gong zuo 
you cun dang zhi bu tui jian 
qi zhong li lun pei xun ban nian 
gang wei duan lian ban nian 
jie jue cun gan bu hou ji ren cai que fa wen ti 
yi tuo xian wei dang xiao 
zhe zai ga shi li shi shang shi di yi ci 
ye shi gai xian xian wei zhua cun ji dang zu zhi jian she de yi ge zhong da ju cuo 
zhu yao yong yu xue yuan ji guan li ren yuan sheng huo bao zhang 
pei xun jing fei 
jun shi xun lian jing fei 
xue yuan wu gong bu tie ji jiao tong bu zhu deng fang mian 
ta shuo yao zhen xi pei xun ji hui 
shan yu si kao 
xue you suo cheng 
zai sheng yang ta de nong cun shi xian zi ji de ren sheng jia zhi 
tong xun yuan li ming sheng 
dai zhe wu pin shang men kan wang lao ren 
song shang min qing lian xi ka 
bang lao ren zuo jia wu 
yu min xian ha la bu la zhen kai zhan de jing lao gong cheng 
kan zhe ji wei qin kuai de nian qing ren 
ren tong ju lao ren bie ti you duo le le 
tong ren tong ju lao ren yi yang 
zhe xie ri zi 
shuo ta men jiu xiang zi jia de hai zi yi yang xiao shun dong shi 
ha la bu la zhen dang wei shu ji peng jin mei shuo 
qi zhong bu fen lao ren zi nv you bu zai shen bian 
du zi sheng huo 
yu zhen ling dao cheng yuan shang yi hou 
jue ding zai zhen ji guan gan bu 
she qu gan bu zhong cheng li jing lao fu wu dui 
wei lao ren men kai zhan jie dui bang fu huo dong 
wei bian yu yu lao ren de lian xi 
ha la bu la zhen jing lao fu wu dui cheng yuan mei ren zhi zuo le min qing lian xi ka 
yin shang dian hua hao ma 
fu wu shi xiang 
yi bian lao ren you xu yao jie jue de kun nan shi neng ji shi tong zhi 
fu wu dui cheng yuan hao shang men bang zhu 
peng jin mei shuo 
zai bang zhu lao ren jie jue yi xie kun nan de tong shi 
yao qing lao ren qian lai can yu 
feng fu lao ren de wen hua sheng huo 
tong xun yuan zhou lin hu chang yong 
bi zhe cong ke zi lei su ke er ke zi zi zhi zhou wu qia xian zhao shang ju huo xi 
jiang su zong yi ji tuan tai yang neng guang fu fa dian xiang mu shi wu qia xian zhao shang yin zi zhong dian xiang mu 
mu qian jun gong bing wang fa dian de wei yi qi xiang mu 
jian she di dian zai hei zi wei xiang jiang ji er cun 
wu qia xian yi tuo jing nei chong zu de guang neng 
shui neng zi yuan 
da li shi shi zhao shang yin zi 
xian hou yin jin le jiang su zong yi 
zhong guo shui dian deng da qi ye 
da ji ti luo hu wu qia 
tai yang neng guang fu fa dian xiang mu jiang quan mian qi dong 
xiang mu qi dong jian cheng hou 
jiang jin yi bu ti sheng wu qia xian neng yuan zi yuan kai fa pin zhi 
you li zhu tui xian yu jing ji fa zhan 
yi ming lao shi zheng zai tiao zhi jiao zi xian zhun bei bao jiao zi 
zhou jian ling she 
xin jiang ke la ma yi shi bai jian tan qu di shi ba xiao xue de lao shi bao jiao zi 
xi ying ma nian 
xin jiang ke la ma yi shi bai jian tan qu di shi ba xiao xue ju xing 
huan huan xi xi bao jiao zi 
kuai kuai le le ying xin nian 
chu yi da sai 
lai zi quan xiao de jin bai ming lao shi 
huan ju yi tang 
zhan shi chu yi 
shang tu a re lei xiang qia tu ke cun tu di ping zheng qian 
xia tu a re lei xiang qia tu ke cun tu di ping zheng hou 
fu wu nong min 
gai zao di chan tian zuo wei nong cun gong zuo de zhong zhong zhi zhong 
wei le ti gao geng di xiao yi 
tui dong nong min zeng shou zhi fu 
sha che xian a re lei xiang yi xian cai zheng bo fu de di chan tian gai zao zi jin zuo qiao dong 
zheng qu nong min yi shi yi yi chou yi dian de fang shi 
bu jin jiao hao de wan cheng di chan tian gai zao gong zuo 
er qie ye rang quan xiang de chan ye jie gou he nong min zeng shou zhao dao le xin si lu 
jiu di fu ken zhu jian 
mei li xiang cun 
a re lei xiang qia tu ke cun di mao jie jin yu bo zhuang ping yuan 
yuan di kuai ling sui 
di kuai luo cha da 
duo wei san jiao de 
tian geng bu ju san luan 
shui tu liu shi yan zhong 
bu shi yi nong ji geng zuo 
nong zuo wu yu qiao mu hu xiang can za 
guan pai she shi bu wan shan 
lao deng zi ran zai hai neng li jiao ruo 
da duo shu geng di wei di chan tian 
kai zhan di chan tian gai zao gong zuo yi lai 
dui cun nei tian 
lu jin xing zong he zhi li 
da dao le tian cheng fang 
pai de chu de zong ti yao qiu 
you xiao ti gao geng di zhi liang 
zeng jia geng di mian ji 
jie jue sheng chan jian she yong de mao dun 
bi mian le bu fen qun zhong yin lai yi sheng cun de tu di zi yuan bu zu de wen ti 
gai zao hou de tu di li yu jie shui 
fang bian ji xie geng zuo 
ti gao le sheng chan xiao lv 
he li le quan shu 
jian shao le jin hou tu di li yong guo cheng zhong de ge zhong jiu fen 
tong shi wei zhu jian 
mei li xiang cun 
dian ding ji chu 
a re lei xiang di chan tian gai zao hou ba dan mu chan ye fa zhan 
di chan tian gai zao zhu li te se chan ye fa zhan 
a re lei xiang li yong gai zao hao de tu di tong yi gui hua 
fa zhan te se lin guo ye 
qi zhong a re lei xiang yu zi zhi qu nong ke yuan yuan yi suo he zuo 
tong guo ji nian de ke xue guan li he zha shi tou ru 
you xiao ti sheng le gai xiang ba dan mu chan ye de fa zhan qian li 
nong min zai shai ba dan mu 
tu di kai fa li yong zhu tui nong min zeng shou 
a re lei xiang yi nong ye zeng chan 
nong min zeng shou wei chu fa dian 
tong guo di chan tian gai zao wei zuo da 
zuo qiang ba dan mu chan ye ti gong le you li bao zhang 
shi chang qian jing ji hao 
lao lao zhua zhu zhe yi chan ye bu fang song 
jia da zhong zhi li du 
yi cheng wei quan xiang ren min de gong shi 
shi zhi cheng wei a re lei xiang nong min zeng shou de zhi zhu chan ye 
sui zhe ba dan mu zhong zhi mian ji de bu duan kuo da he chan liang de bu duan zeng jia 
a re lei xiang jiang jin yi bu jia da zhao shang yin zi gong zuo li du 
mou qiu ba dan mu shen jia gong ji chu kou 
a re lei xiang quan ti gan bu qun zhong you xin xin 
you jue xin zai xian wei 
xian ren min zheng fu de zheng que ling dao xia ji xu hen zhua gui mo 
hen zhua guan li 
ba a re lei xiang jian cheng ming fu qi shi de ba dan mu zhi xiang 
tong guo ji nian de di chan tian gai zao 
cu jin quan xiang ba dan mu chan ye de fa zhan 
ju xin jia po 
lian he zao bao 
you xie ren de lian ai ru yan hua ban xuan lan dan duan zan 
ze zhong shi ai qing de jing ying 
geng ren wei hun yin shi yi sheng yi shi de meng yue 
ruo yao chang jiu xiang yi 
jiu yi ding yao jian shou dui bi ci de cheng nuo 
liang ren ai qing zhang pao liu nian hou 
gong jie lian li 
chen wei li shuo 
dang tian shi jie hun de ji ri 
yi sheng yi shi 
yi yi fei fan 
wo xiang xin ai qing neng gou yi sheng yi shi 
wo men dou lai zi fei chang chuan tong de jia ting 
dui hun yin de jia zhi guan ye shi yi zhi de 
yi ding yao yu bi ci gong du yi sheng 
xu duo dui xin ren wei le tao ge hao zhao tou 
dou hui te bie xuan ze ji ri huo you ji nian yi yi de ri zi jie hun 
gen ju hun yin zhu ce ju wang zhan shu ju 
ming xian shi ge 
chen wei li zui qi dai de jiu shi wei yu bang e de xin jia neng jian hao 
ta ye xi wang gang kai shi chuang ye de wei hun fu 
shi ye neng zai qi bu hou yi fei chong tian 
dai yi qie wen ding hou 
liang ren bian ke yi sheng ge bao bao 
zu zhi xiao jia ting 
xin de yi nian 
bian hua zong hui you de 
ying guo jian qiao gong jue wei lian wang zi jiang cong xia zhou kai shi zai jian qiao da xue jiu du nong ye guan li ke cheng 
gai ke cheng shu yu jian qiao da xue ke chi xu fa zhan ling dao li xiang mu 
yan tao hui deng xing shi shou ke 
zhu yao mu di shi rang wei lian liao jie dang dai nong ye jing ying he nong cun she qu 
wei lian jiang zi xing cheng dan da liang yan jiu 
zhuan xie lun wen 
ke neng hai hui qu nong cun shi di kao cha 
jie ye hou bu hui shou yu zheng shu 
hao wu yi wen 
ci ci xue xi hui zai wei lian cong fu qin shou zhong ji cheng kang wo er gong jue ling de shi pai shang yong chang 
yi wei zhu shou shuo 
he ta de fu qin yi yang 
gong jue zai hen da cheng du shang shi ge xiang xia ren 
ta xi huan nong cun he nong min 
dui ta men chong man re qing 
ken xin dun gong fa yan ren ri qian biao shi 
xue fei he zhu su fei hai zai si xia shang tao zhong 
jiang you wang shi zi fu 
zhu shou men qiang diao 
gai ke cheng shi wei wei lian zhuan men she zhi de 
bu hui ying xiang qi ta xue sheng 
ling ju bao dao 
wei lian reng ran he kai te wang fei 
qiao zhi xiao wang zi yi qi zhu zai ken xin dun gong 
dan shi gong zuo ren yuan ye wei ta zai jian qiao an pai le si ren zhu su 
yi zhou zhong ta ke neng you liang san wan bu neng zhu zai jia zhong 
ta jiang zai wei lai ji ge yue li cheng dan da liang de wang shi gong zuo 
ti nv wang he ai ding bao gong jue fen you 
bu guo ken xin dun gong ci qian ceng xuan bu 
wei lian bing bu da suan ma shang cheng dan quan zhi de huang jia gong zuo 
ta geng qing xiang yu you yi ge 
zai zhe ge qi jian li ta xiang cong shi cong zheng fu bu men dao ci shan ji gou de yi xie gong gong fu wu 
wei lian jiu huo de le sheng an de lu si da xue er deng yi ji di li xue xue wei 
bing zai zhe li yu dao le xian zai de qi zi kai te 
zai jin qi tui yi qian dan ren huang jia kong jun sou jiu zhi sheng ji de jia shi yuan 
ao da li ya xi ni 
hai gang da qiao he ge ju yuan shang fang yan hua sheng fang 
qing zhu xin nian dao lai 
de guo chi li yu da can 
yi ge ren de wan can 
de guo duo jia dian shi tai dou hui zai xin nian qian ye bo fang zhe bu duan pian 
chi li yu ye bei yi xie de guo ren shi wei xin nian da can 
ju hui shang ren men hai hui zuo xie you qu de you xi 
jiu shi jiang qian kuai jia re rong hua hou xun su dao ru leng shui zhong 
dai ning gu hou zai lao chu 
ran hou gen ju qian kuai de xing zhuang lai yu ce xin nian yun shi 
e luo si mai cong shu xu yuan 
wei huan du yuan dan 
e luo si ren hui ba cong shu mai hui jia 
yong ge zhong xiao shi pin jin xing zhuang shi 
bing ba jiang yao song gei qin you de li wu fang zai cong shu xia 
xin nian qian ye 
e luo si ren hai hui quan jia wei zuo zai dian shi ji qian 
ting zong tong xin nian he ci 
deng hou ke li mu lin gong si ba si ke ta lou qiao xiang xin nian zhong sheng 
you ren hai hui zai xin nian ling shi da kai jia men bing xu yuan 
huo dian ran xie xia xin yuan de zhi tiao 
ran hou jiang hui jin fang jin jiu li he jin du li 
ri ben pai dui qiang 
ri ben ren ba xin nian qian ye cheng wei 
ri ben chun wan 
hong bai ge hui 
ze shi ri ben bai xing shou sui shi de bi kan jie mu 
yu zhong guo de chun wan bu tong 
hong bai ge hui 
shi yi chang ge chang 
xin nian hai you 
fu dai bu duo 
wei le neng tao ge tou cai 
ri ben ren chang chang xin nian yi da zao jiu qu pai dui 
zai shang dian kai men shi 
wei nei rui la mai 
zhao cai nei yi 
mei feng sui mo 
wei nei rui la bai xing dou re zhong gou mai huang se nei yi 
ren wei zhi yao tie shen chuan zhe huang se yi fu 
lai nian jiu neng 
zhao cai jin bao 
hen duo wei nei rui la ren hai xi huan jiang da mian e zhi bi fang zai qian bao huo you jiao chuan de xie zi li 
biao shi zi ji zhang wo le cai fu 
yi xie da ling nv qing nian wei qi qiu zai wei lai yi nian neng shou huo tian mi ai qing he xing fu hun yin 
hai hui zai xin nian dao lai shi zhan zai yi zi shang wang xia tiao 
huo cong zhuo zi di xia zuan guo qu 
yi da li tiao he ying xin nian 
yi da li luo ma te you de ci jiu ying xin feng su shi tiao he ying xin nian 
jie jin ling she shi du de shi wai wen du jia shang zhen zhen han feng 
rang ren men dui guang zhe bang zi tiao jin bing leng he shui zhong de zhuang ju shen gan pei fu 
neng lian xu duo nian can jia xin nian tiao he huo dong de ren hai hui bei shou yu 
shi ren lian bang de guo zong li de bo lan te zai fang wen bo lan you tai ren ji nian bei shi 
tu ran jing shi yi gui 
de guo zong li mo ke er zai mu ni hei fu jin de na cui ji zhong ying ji nian guan mo ai 
dui na cui da tu sha yu nan zhe de ji nian huo dong yao yi dai yi dai chuan xia qu 
de guo zheng fu dui ri ben shou xiang an bei jin san can bai jing guo shen she biao tai cheng 
suo you guo jia dou ying gai yi cheng shi tai du ding wei zi ji zai di er ci shi jie da zhan zhong de jue se 
de zheng fu bu dian ming pi ping an bei zheng quan 
de guo zong li fa yan ren sai bo te zai hui da mei ti ji zhe ti wen shi tan ji an bei can bai jing guo shen she wen ti 
sui ran ta bu xi wang dui you guan ri ben nei zheng de wen ti jia yi ping lun 
dan zong ti er yan 
suo you guo jia dou bi xu cheng shi ding wei zi ji zai na chang ke pa de zhan zheng zhong de jue se 
sai bo te shuo 
zhi you zai zheng shi li shi de ji chu zhi shang 
cai you ke neng yu xi ri de di ren chong jian xin de wei lai 
zhe shi de guo shi zhong ming ke yu xin de xin nian 
er qie zai wo men kan lai 
ta ye shi yong yu qi ta suo you guo jia 
sai bo te shuo 
de guo wai jiao bu fa yan ren xie fei er ye dui jing guo shen she wen ti biao tai 
de guo zheng yi guan qie de xin qing 
jin mi guan zhu dong ya di qu de jin zhang ju shi 
zai wo men kan lai 
shuang fang zui hao bao chi ke zhi 
bing tong guo wai jiao fang shi lai jie jue zheng duan 
bu yao cai qu dan bian xing dong 
yi fang jia ju jin zhang ju shi 
han yi yuan yi 
hua sha zhi gui 
de guo yu ri ben yi yang 
zai er zhan qi jian fa dong qin lve zhan zheng 
dan er zhan hou zhi zhi jin ri 
de guo dui li shi de qing suan he fan xing yi zhi de dao duo shu guo jia 
you qi shi lin guo de ken ding 
zai de guo zheng fu fan xing li shi de jin cheng zhong 
hua sha zhi gui 
ju you biao zhi xing yi yi 
shi ren lian bang de guo zong li de bo lan te fang wen de guo na cui ceng jing qin lve de bo lan 
zai hua sha you tai ren xun nan ji nian bei qian 
zhe wei zong li zai jing xian hua quan hou 
tu ran xia gui 
zhe cheng wei de guo yu lin guo li shi shang zui wei zhen han ren xin de yi mu 
an bei can bai jing guo shen she hou 
han guo guo hui yi yuan pu zhu xian zai ci yin yong bo lan te de 
jing shi yi gui 
pi ping ri ben 
zhe ming yi yuan shuo 
dan jue qi de shi zheng ge de guo 
an bei jin san yi shou xiang shen fen han ran can bai jing guo shen she 
li shi hui ji zai 
jue qi de shi yi ge ren 
dan xia gui de shi zheng ge ri ben 
wo dang shi tu ran gan dao 
jin jin xian shang yi ge hua quan shi jue dui bu gou de 
de zong li xia gui xie zui huo nuo bei er jiang 
shi ren lian bang de guo zong li de bo lan te zai hua sha you tai ren xun nan ji nian bei qian peng ran yi gui 
ling shi jie dong rong 
zheng zai bo lan fang wen de bo lan te lai dao hua sha you tai ren ji nian bei qian xian hua quan 
zai bo zheng le hua quan shang de si jie hou 
bo lan te hou tui ji bu 
tu ran shuang xi xia gui 
er zhe yi ju dong shi xian bing wu ji hua 
bo lan te hou lai shuo 
ta dang shi zhe yang zuo 
shi yin wei yu yan yi shi qu le biao xian li 
wo dang shi tu ran gan dao 
jin jin xian shang yi ge hua quan shi jue dui bu gou de 
shi ren lian bang de guo nei zheng bu zhang de gen she ceng hui yi shuo 
wo bei zhe yi ju dong shen shen de gan dong 
bo lan te yi ta quan bu de ren ge 
xiang mei ge ren zuo chu le ming que de biao shu 
de guo qian zong tong wu er fu shuo 
bo lan te de yi gui 
dai biao de guo ren xiang shu bai wan da tu sha shou hai zhe biao da liao wu yu lun bi de zun zhong 
hua sha zhi gui ji da ti gao le de guo guo ji xing xiang 
hua sha zhi gui 
ye cheng wei zhan hou de guo yu dong ou zhu guo gai shan guan xi de zhong yao li cheng bei 
bo lan te huo de nuo bei er he ping jiang 
an bei yu zhan fan zhi sun gao diao da gao er fu 
min diao xian shi 
ri min zhong fan dui can bai zhe chao guo zhi chi zhe 
zai guo ji she hui mi ji pi ping an bei can bai jing guo shen she de tong shi 
an bei ben ren si hu 
bu yi wei ran 
ta he ta de di di 
jia ji zhan fan an xin jie de sun zi an xin fu yi qi da gao er fu 
an xin fu shi an bei jin san de di di 
zai hu ji shang shi jia ji zhan fan an xin jie 
an bei shi an xin jie de wai sun 
ri ben mei ti bao dao 
ta dang tian yu shen wei wai wu sheng fu da chen de an xin fu yi qi wai chu da gao er fu 
ci hou hai yu ta gong jin wan can 
han guo mei ti cheng 
zai can bai jing guo shen she yi hou 
guo ji she hui dui 
chong bai jia ji zhan fan 
de zheng yi gao zhang 
dan an bei que gao diao yu qi zi sun an xin fu da gao er fu qiu 
an bei mian dui wai bu pi ping de di qi ye xu lai zi min yi 
ri ben mei ti jin ri min yi diao cha xian shi 
jin guan fan dui can bai de ri ben min zhong jiao duo 
dan zhi chi an bei zheng quan de min zhong tong yang zhan da duo shu 
min diao xian shi 
shi fou zhi chi an bei nei ge 
da da chao guo hui da 
min diao xian shi 
min zhong zhi chi an bei zheng fu de zhu yao yuan yin shi 
jing ji zhuang kuang hao 
han mei ti cheng 
an bei de you xian he zi xin gan jiu shi chu yu zhe yi dian 
zai min diao zhong 
ge guo fan dui can bai 
xu kao lv wai jiao guan xi 
mei guo zheng fu 
chong shen dui an bei can bai 
mei guo dui ri ben shou xiang an bei jin san can bai gong feng di er ci shi jie da zhan jia ji zhan fan de jing guo shen she gan dao shi wang 
mei guo zhu ri ben da shi guan sui ji fa biao sheng ming 
dui an bei can bai biao shi 
fu fa yan ren ha fu chong shen zhe yi li chang 
ri ben ling dao ceng cai qu de xing dong jiang jin yi bu jia ju ri ben yu lin guo de jin zhang guan xi 
wo men yin er gan dao shi wang 
mei fang yi zhi xi wang ri fang yu lin guo zhao dao jian she xing fang shi 
chu li min gan shi wu bing gai shan guan xi he tui dong he zuo 
lun dun shi zheng fu ni tou ru ju zi xiu jian zi xing che kong zhong zhuan yong gao su gong lu wang luo 
fang bian ren men qi zi xing che shang xia ban he chu you 
jian zhu shi yi ti chu jian she fang an 
zhe xiang ming wei 
kong zhong zi xing che dao 
de zi xing che gao su gong lu wang 
di yi jie duan jian she jiang cong lun dun dong qu kai shi tong wang li wu pu jie huo che zhan 
hao zi jiang chao guo liang yi ying bang 
ru guo ji hua huo de pi zhun 
zhe xiang ji hua jiang song wang tou zi ge fang jin xing zi xun 
ran hou ti chu shen qing 
fu si te shuo 
qi zi xing che shi ta zui xi huan shi hao zhi yi 
te bie shi he peng you jie ban qi che lv xing 
neng gou bu xing he qi zi xing che de cheng shi yao bi zhi neng kai che de cheng shi geng jia yi ju 
fu si te shuo 
wei le gai shan lun dun ju min de sheng huo zhi liang 
gu li xin yi dai ren yi zi xing che dai bu 
wo men bi xu que bao an quan 
lun dun de jie dao shi ge li qi che he qi che ren de zui da zhang ai 
fa zhan kong jian shi zai tai xiao 
fang an shi cai qu fei chang gui de she ji fang fa zai yong ji de cheng shi zhong zhao dao kong jian 
tong guo zai cheng shi tie lu shang kong jian she tong dao 
ke chuang zao chu shi jie ji an quan 
bu shou che liang gan rao de zi xing che dao 
er qie lu xian dui yu tong qin zhe lai shuo fei chang li xiang 
fu si te zui chu kai zhan de yan jiu xian shi 
zhe ge xi tong rong liang da 
cheng ben yao bi jian she xin de dao lu he sui dao di xu duo 
gen ju fu si te de fang an 
zai tie dao shang fang xiu jian de gao jia dao lu yue san ceng lou gao 
kai fa tuan dui gu ji 
zhu ming de mei guo nv hai wan ou 
ju mei guo qiao bao wang bian yi bao dao 
ju zhu zai mei guo bin xi fa ni ya zhou bao li shi 
ta tong shi huan you ji rou wei suo zheng 
ta zai qing yuan wang shang qing qiu mei guo zhu ming wan ou shang 
mei guo nv hai 
zhi zuo yi kuan he zi ji zao yu yi yang de wan ou jue se 
niu yue mei ri xin wen 
zai qing yuan wang zhan 
zhi zao yi kuan he zi ji zao yu yi yang de can zhang wan ou 
wo xiang rang bie de nv hai zhi dao 
zhe kuan wan ou jiu xiang wo yi yang 
zhe ge xiao nv hai shuo 
mei li sha zai qing yuan shi pin li shuo dao 
can zhang nv hai ye shi mei guo gu niang 
zhe xie nv hai mei tian dou zai zao yu kun nan 
ke fu kun nan 
mei li sha shen huan fei gu ji rou wei suo zheng 
zhe zhong shen jing xi tong wen luan ji bing yin qi si zhi ji rou wu li he ma mu 
mei li sha ping ri jie zhu lun yi huo zhe bu xing fu zhu qi xing dong 
zhe ming hua yi can zhang nv tong jiu shi wan ou de tie gan fen si 
zui xi huan mei guo nv hai wan ou shang chu pin de nian du xi lie wan ou 
ju mei guo nv hai wan ou de guan wang jie shao 
zhe xie nian du xi lie wan ou dou shi xian liang xiao shou 
mei yi ge wan ou dou hui shuo hua 
qie bei fu yu bu tong ge xing he bu tong de sheng huo jing li 
mu qian wei zhi mei you yi kuan wan ou jue se huan you can zhang ji bing 
de bang zhu xia 
mei li sha tong guo wang shang qing yuan de xing shi 
wo bu xiang bian cheng yin xing ren huo sheng huo zai bian yuan de ren 
wo xi wang tong guo yi ge mei guo can zhang nv hai de gu shi 
rang da jia zhi dao zhe ge wan ou he wo yi yang 
mei li sha shuo 
ju ri ben xin wen wang bao dao 
gai ji gou cheng 
jin hou jiang tong guo yi xue jian cha he xun lian deng kao he 
suo you yi zhu zhe dou shi 
dan cheng ji piao 
wu fa fan hui di qiu 
huo xing ji hua de shou ci ren wu zhi zai wei zai ren xiang mu ce shi ji shu wen ti 
ru guo jin xing shun li 
xiang guan gong si yi jing yu ling wai liang jia gong si da cheng he zuo xie yi 
qi zhong yi jia jiang fu ze zhi zao huo xing deng lu qi 
er ling wai yi jia jiang zhi zao yi ke tong xun wei xing 
ao da li ya xi ni gang zai xin nian zhong sheng qiao xiang de shun jian ran fang yan hua ying jie xin de yi nian dao lai 
qi ta guo jia ye jiang lu xu bu ru xin nian 
quan qiu ge zhong ci jiu ying xin huo dong ye bu duan kai qi 
zai zhe xie chong man qi qu de xi su huo dong zhong 
ren men ci jiu qu hui qi 
ying xin nian qiu hao yun 
xi wang kai qi xin yi nian de mei hao zheng cheng 
ci jiu qu hui qi 
zai quan qiu ge de 
ren men dou hui yi bu tong fang shi lai hui qu jiu chen 
dan ge guo xing xing se se de xi su huo dong dou you yi ge gong tong zong zhi 
xiang guo qu yi nian gao bie 
qi dai xin yi nian geng jia mei hao 
ru guo you cang jiu cun dao xia yi nian hui bei ren wei bu ji li 
yin ci zai yi nian de zui hou yi ye 
mei ge jia ting dou yao he diao suo you de cang jiu 
yi bi mian lai nian you e yun 
zai yi da li 
pu tong jia ting dou hui shou shi jiu wu 
jiang wu zi li yi xie ke da sui de dong xi 
shuai ge fen sui 
hai yao ba jiu pen zi 
po pen lan guan tong tong reng dao men wai 
qu chu guo qu de e yun he fan nao 
nan fei yue han nei si bao de ren men sheng xing xiang chuang wai reng dong xi 
zai ying jie xin nian de wu ye 
dang di ju min hui cong chuang hu xiang wai reng ge zhong dong xi 
cong wei bo lu dao zheng zhang de chuang wu qi bu you 
you de shen zhi cong gao lou shang reng xia lai 
zai nan mei guo jia e gua duo er 
dang di min zhong tong chang hui fen shao ren xing bu ou lai qu chu guo qu yi nian de hui qi 
zhe xie dai biao mei yun de ren ou 
bing ba ta men cai zai jiao xia 
sui hou zai jiang qi fu zhi yi ju 
ying xin nian qiu hao yun 
wei yu tai ping yang nan bu de dao guo sa mo ya 
sa mo tong chang hui ju xing 
dang di nan nv lao shao hui ju ji qi lai zai ge zai wu 
niu yue shi bao guang chang kua nian shui jing qiu qi dong yi shi li lai dou shi quan qiu zhu mu di jiao dian 
ju ci qian bao dao 
er zai luo shan ji 
mei nian de mei gui hua che da you xing ye shi dang di ying jie xin nian de yi dao liang li feng jing xian 
ju zhu ban fang tou lu 
ta men hai jiang wei yi dui tong xing lian ju ban hun li 
mei guo pa sa di na xin nian mei gui hua che you xing yin zeng tian zhong guo yuan su 
guang fan shou dao zhu mu 
zai ying guo de su ge lan 
dang di ju xing huo ba jie huo dong qing zhu xin nian de xi su ju shi wen ming 
shou na dun pai yu huo ba 
yan zhe su ge lan shou fu ai ding bao de da jie jin xing you xing 
ying jie xin nian dao lai 
yi da li luo ma te you de ci jiu ying xin feng su shi tiao he ying xin nian 
zai han leng de dong tian 
luo ma ren guang zhe shen zi zai bing leng de shui zhong ying jie xin nian dao lai 
dang ran zui ling ren fei yi suo si de shi 
zhi li zhong bu ta er ka xiao zhen de min zhong hui yong xiang dang di mu di 
zai gu dian yin yue he zhu guang li tong shi qu de qin shu yi qi ying jie xin nian 
xu yuan song zhu fu 
xin yi nian de dao lai 
ye shi ge guo min zhong xu yuan song zhu fu de shi hou 
ri ben ge da bai huo gong si hui tui chu ge zhong fu dai 
dai nei wu pin de jia zhi wang wang shi dai wai biao jia qian de shu bei 
fu dai bu duo 
wei le neng tao ge tou cai 
ri ben ren chang chang xin nian yi da zao jiu qu pai dui 
zai shang dian kai men shi 
ren men dou ren wei zai xin nian zhong sheng qiao xiang hou di yi ge da dao jing shui de ren hui jiao hao yun 
da lai de shui shi ji xiang zhi shui 
zai xi ban ya 
shi kua nian chong tou xi 
dang guo nian ye de zhong sheng qiao xiang 
na me jiu dai biao ming nian shi xing yun de yi nian 
zai e luo si 
you ren hai hui zai xin nian ling shi da kai jia men bing xu yuan 
huo dian ran xie xia xin yuan de zhi tiao 
ran hou jiang hui jin fang jin jiu li he jin du li 
fan ye mao zhe yan han lai cheng du 
chen yu xiao she 
jiu shi pei ni zou guo 
chong zhe zhe ge qi hao 
ming xing mang ge bu ting 
ren da hua yi ji shi shang jiao fu qi qi liang xiang cheng du mou shang cheng 
yu ying mi men yi qi dao shu kua nian 
xian chang ren tou cuan dong ji de shui xie bu tong 
yi ye jing xi 
cheng wei ming fu qi shi de 
xi jin nv wang 
bei shang jia ping wei zui ju shang ye jia zhi de ming xing yi ren 
shi shang jiao fu ze biao shi 
fan bing bing chuan yi da pei de yan guang yu pin wei shi gong ren de 
fan ye zou de qin min lu xian 
kai wan xiao shuo zi ji yi zhi zai tang chao wan chuan yue 
gang pai wan le 
you kai shi pai 
gong zuo yi zhi hen mang 
fan ye xiao da 
dao le chun jie zai gong bu ba 
fan bing bing zhi yan sui ran zai gong zuo zhong mei you shi wang 
dan ye you yi han 
fan ye xu yuan shuo 
xi wang ba ba ma ma shen ti jian kang 
wo jue de he jia ren zai yi qi zui kai xin 
zhi yu gan qing wen ti 
chang chang you ren shuo fan bing bing 
dan ta que shuo zi ji ya gen mei shi jian qu xiang zhe shi 
zhang liang he wang yue lun da dang pai wang ju 
you wang yue lun dao yan zhi dao 
gai bian zi zhi ming zuo jia ding ding zhang tong ming zuo pin de du shi zhi yu wang luo ju 
ren sheng xu yao jie chuan 
zheng zai bei jing pai she zhong 
ping jie can jia 
ba ba qu na er 
er ren qi bao zhang de ming mo zhang liang liang xiang 
pai she xian chang 
ju zhong shi yan yi ge wai qi xing zheng gao guan 
xing ku shi zu 
ci ci can yan 
zhong guo hao ba ba 
ba ba qu na er 
zhi hou di yi ci yu wang yue lun dao yan he zuo 
geng shi shou du can yan wang luo ju 
qi biao xian ling ren shi fen qi dai 
shou xi nan mo shuai qi liang xiang 
kua jie biao yan you kan dian 
yi dang da xing qin zi zhen ren xiu jie mu 
ba ba qu na er 
huo re xiao ying ping 
er xie zi can yu jie mu de zhong guo shou xi nan mo zhang liang ye cheng wei jin qi yu le quan zui huo de ming xing zhi yi 
ba ba qu na er 
jian jin wei sheng 
zhang liang ri chang gong zuo ye zhu jian gui wei 
gao ren qi shi de ta shou dao le zhong duo ying shi ju yan chu de yao yue 
er zhang liang zhi suo yi xuan ze 
ren sheng xu yao jie chuan 
zuo wei zi ji de ying shi chu nv zuo 
yi fang mian shi wei le zhi chi wang yue lun dao yan xin ju 
ling yi fang mian ye shi yin wei gai ju ti cai du te 
zi ji dui zhe yi xi lie de gu shi hen you gan jue 
ren sheng xu yao jie chuan 
zhong ke chuan shi yan yi ge wai qi xing zheng gao guan de jue se 
ren wu xing xiang shi shang gao duan 
leng jun shuai qi 
ba ba qu na er 
you mo de da zhong yin xiang fan cha fei chang da 
sui ran zhe shi zhang liang di yi ci chu yan ying shi ju 
dan shi pian chang biao xian ying de le dao yan he ju zu gong zuo ren yuan de yi zhi ren ke 
zu jian zhang liang bu jin shang de le xiu tai 
xia de le chu fang 
geng neng yan de le hao xi 
nai ba er ren zu qiang qiang lian he 
zhang liang ling pian chou xiong di qing shen 
ren sheng xu yao jie chuan 
bu jin jin shi zhang liang ying shi shou xiu 
tong yang ye shi zhang liang he wang yue lun 
ba ba qu na er 
hou de shou du he zuo 
ba ba qu na er 
wang yue lun yu zhang liang er ren de guan xi yin wei de yuan gu bei wang you ren wei geng mi qie 
yi wei shi xian jin ren qi zui wang de dao yan 
yi wei shi dang xia zui zhi shou ke re de ming xing 
ba ba qu na er 
zhong de zhao xi xiang chu ye rang liang wei nai ba xing xing xiang xi 
fei chang mo qi 
yin ci liang wei nai ba de qiang qiang lian he hui su zao yi ge zen yang de jue se 
cheng wei gai ju de yi da kan dian 
pai she xian chang bei wen ji chu yan 
ren sheng xu yao jie chuan 
zhang liang tan yan 
yue lun ge de xi 
bing qie zhe ge jue se fei chang shi he wo 
dao yan wang yue lun ye dui hao xiong di de zhi chi biao shi gan xie 
zhang liang fei chang gou yi qi 
da jia ye dou zhi dao xian zai ta fei chang mang 
dan shi hai shi fei chang zhi chi 
ren sheng xu yao jie chuan 
bing qie shi ling pian chou chu yan 
zhe ge jue se shi zhuan men wei zhang liang liang shen da zao de 
jia shang ta xing gan shuai qi de wai xing 
yi ding hui shi zhe bu ju shou shi lv de sha shou jian 
fei fei yang yang de zhang yi mou chao sheng shi jian jin ri sui zhang yi mou ji qi qi zi chen ting gong kai zhi qian er bo yun jian ri 
wu xi shi ren kou ji sheng wei zhu ren xu wei ying jie shou ji zhe cai fang shi biao shi 
zai zhang yi mou ben ren zhu dong pei he xia 
chao sheng diao cha 
jin zhan shun li 
dan chu ben ren shen bao wai 
reng xu yao gong zhong dui zhang yi mou shou ru qing kuang jin xing he shi 
zhu ming dao yan zhang yi mou she xian 
yi shi bei mei ti re chao 
dang shi ceng zuo chu zheng mian hui ying de wu xi shi ji sheng wei ye yin shu du 
zheng zai diao cha zhong 
bao shou gong zhong zhi yi 
chen ting de zhe ge an jian 
guan zhu du gao 
qing kuang fu za 
qie liang ren chang qi bu zai wu xi sheng huo 
suo yi cong fa lv shang ming que diao cha zhu ti ye jiao nan 
bing yi fa yi gui zai chu li 
wo men ye zuo le da liang de diao cha qu zheng gong zuo 
xu wei ying jie shao 
xu wei ying cheng 
jin yi ge yue yi lai 
zai zhang yi mou ben ren de zhu dong pei he xia 
an jian you le jiao kuai jin zhan 
mu qian min gan wen ti reng zai yu zhang yi mou de shou ru he shi 
chu qi ben ren gong kai de yi wai 
hai xu zheng xun ge fang mian de yi jian 
bing fei ji sheng bu men yi jia zhi yan 
yu ji dao yuan dan zhi hou 
hui gei gong zhong yi ge man yi de chu li jie guo 
ling ju wu xi bin hu qu ji sheng ju gong zuo ren yuan biao shi 
you yu mu qian an jian reng zai zhi xing guo cheng zhong 
cheng xu hai mei zou wan 
zan bu fang bian xiang gong zhong gong kai she an xi jie 
zhang yi mou he qi zi chen ting jie shou mei ti cai fang shi 
cheng ren le zi ji chao sheng 
bing xiang she hui gong kai zhi qian 
dan dui zhi qian mei ti bao guang de hao zhai he hao che 
zhang yi mou gei chu de hui ying shi 
hao zhai shi zu de 
hao che shi mian fei shi yong de 
zhang yi mou shuo dao 
ta men suo shuo de hao zhai 
shi zu de fang zi 
wo men you zu lin he tong 
ta men suo shuo de hao che you duo shao liang 
tong chang zhe ge che dou shi mian fei shi yong yi nian 
zhi hou yao hai hui qu 
wo de sheng huo bi pu tong ren yao hao 
dan zhen de bu shi hen she chi de sheng huo 
wang jing jie mu zhong bei mei nv 
yu le quan de dao yan yu nv yan yuan de ge zhong qian gui ze chuan wen yi zhi bu jian duan 
er hen duo nv yan yuan wei le xi fen er jing chang zao dao yan he tou zi ren qian gui ze de shi 
ye dou zhong suo zhou zhi 
bu guo zuo wei xiang gang 
zi shen dao yan 
wang jing ri qian que zai an hui wei shi 
chao ji xiao xing 
bei yang yi bi wen shi fou you li yong dao yan zhi quan zhi bian qian gui ze shi 
wang jing que fan ji zi pu 
ni men wu hui le 
wo shi jing chang bei mei nv qian gui ze 
shi ta men qian le wo 
wang jing zhe yi ju 
zai wei bo shang bao guang 
li ji zao dao shu bai wang you liu yan pao hong 
ni hai yao lian ma 
ju zhi qing ren guan zhong zai wei bo ju tou 
chao ji xiao xing 
jie mu xian chang 
wang jing he yang yi shou ci zu he shou ci da dang shuo xiang sheng 
wang jing geng shi xian chu le quan yu zhou 
xiang sheng shou xiu 
yu yang yi xie shou xian chang zi bian zi dao zi yan xiang sheng 
xi dian jin ju po duo dou le quan chang guan zhong bu fu 
xi ju jiao fu 
yang yi geng shi fa hui xi ju te chang 
yi chang yi he pei he de shi fen mo qi 
xiang sheng yi yang yi yu wang jing wen da de fang shi kai chang 
yang yi dang chang zhi wen wang jing shi fou yin ci jiao ao 
wang jing ze qian xu kai wan xiao shuo dao 
bu ceng jiao ao 
zhi shi hun kou fan chi 
bu liao yang yi sui hou pao xia zha dan 
ni zhe me you cheng jiu de nan ren zen me zhang cheng zhe yang 
wang jing ji zhi qiao miao yi 
ke shi wo nv peng you cong lai mei bi bie ren shao a 
jiao ao zhi qing yi yu yan biao 
wang jing shen bian cong lai bu que mei nv 
yu jiang qi zai xin xi zhong an pai jue se 
yang yi sui hou wen ji wang jing shi fou li yong zhi quan zhi bian chen ji qian gui ze nv yan yuan 
wang jing xian chang zhi hu wei qu 
ni men wu hui le 
wo shi jing chang bei mei nv qian gui ze 
shi ta men qian le wo 
dan shi ling da jia mei you xiang dao shi 
wang jing zhe yi ju 
dang chang li ji zao lai yang yi de tu cao 
ni yao lian ma 
sui hou wei bo ye yin lai shu bai wang you gen feng liu yan tu cao 
ni hai yao lian ma 
gong fu ju xing zhao wen zhuo yu qi zi zhang dan lu dai zhe er zi zhao zi long deng shang za zhi 
ma ma bao bao 
yi jia san kou de wen xin he ying shou du bao guang 
zhao zi long xiao xiao nian ji yi yi lian ying qi 
xiang zu le ban de zhao wen zhuo 
ci feng mian yi chu 
shun jian dian ran le wang you men de re qing 
fen fen da hu 
qiang lie xiang kan zhao wen zhuo dai zhe er zi qu shang 
ba ba qu na er 
zhong guo kang fu yan jiu zhong xin bei jing bo ai yi yuan xin li kang fu ke zhu ren liu song huai jie shou fang tan 
you mei ti pu chu li lian jie yin gong zuo ya li guo da huan shang le jia kang 
nian guan jiang zhi 
ban sui zhe gong zuo jing zheng ya li yue lai yue da 
shen jing shuai ruo 
gao xue ya zhe xie ji bing ye zhu jian qin shi zhe bai ling de shen ti he xin li 
bai ling men gai ru he huan jie gao ya dai lai de shang hai 
zhong guo kang fu yan jiu zhong xin bei jing bo ai yi yuan xin li kang fu ke zhu ren liu song huai jie shou cai fang shi biao shi 
shang ban zu yao fang fan zhi ye bing de xing cheng huo jia zhong 
nian guan xin li kong huang 
ze xu yao tiao zheng xin tai 
mei zhong zhi ye dou you zhi ye bing yao fang fan bing qing xing cheng huo jia zhong 
zhong hua ren min gong he guo zhi ye bing fang zhi fa 
zhong dui zhi ye bing you zhe ming que de gui ding 
shi zhi qi ye 
shi ye dan wei he ge ti jing ji zu zhi deng yong ren dan wei de lao dong zhe zai zhi ye huo dong zhong 
yin jie chu fen chen 
fang she xing wu zhi he qi ta you du 
you hai yin su er yin qi de ji bing 
yi ban er yan 
bi xu shi guo jia gong bu de zhi ye bing fen lei he mu lu suo lie de zhi ye bing si ge tiao jian que yi bu ke cai gou cheng zhi ye bing 
qi zhong yi chen fei 
zhong du deng zheng zhuang wei duo 
liu song huai biao shi 
sui ran guo jia dui zhi ye bing you zhuan men de jie ding 
li ru jie chu you du huo zhe fang she xing wu zhi yin qi de ji bing 
dan qi shi ge ge gang wei shang de gong zuo ren yuan you yu xin li ya li da 
shen ti qi guan ru bo zi 
yao deng chan sheng yi xie bing zheng 
zhe xie ye ying gai shu yu zhi ye bing de fan chou 
liu song huai ren wei 
xiang bai ling men chang mian lin de shui bu zhe jue 
bo zi bu shu fu 
yao suan bei tong deng zhu duo zheng zhuang 
qi shi dou shi yu suo cong shi de zhi ye you yi ding de guan xi 
zuo ban gong shi de ren da duo di zhe tou huo zhe dui zhe dian nao ping mu 
shen jing xi tong 
gu guan jie xi tong 
you xie zheng zhuang wu yi yu gong zuo shi de guan yong zi shi xiang guan 
dan you de zheng zhuang yu gong zuo shi de zhuang tai xiang guan 
dang gong zuo ya li da 
jie zou kuai shi 
ren bu jin shi bo zi huo zhe ji zhui chu yu jin zhang zhuang tai 
shi zheng ge ren dou chu yu jin zhang jiao lv zhong 
dang zhe zhong zi shi chi xu le yi duan shi jian zhi hou 
ren jiu hui jue de nao zi lei 
shen ti ye pi fa 
chang qi cong shi ban gong shi gong zuo de ge ren 
yao zhu yi bao hu jing chui 
bi ru jin ru gong zuo zhuang tai zhi qian ke gen ju tiao jian shi dang zuo re shen yun dong 
huo zhe zai jin zhang zhuang tai jie shu zhi hou dui ji rou zuo yi ding de huan jie ya li de dong zuo 
ru an mo deng 
mei yi ge zhi ye dou ke neng hui you ta de zhi ye bing 
zhe ge zhi ye ben shen ke neng dui shen ti mou yi ge bu wei dai lai yi xie ying xiang 
yin ci yao ti zao zai xin li shang you suo zhun bei 
ti zao zuo yi xie yu fang 
zhe dui wo men shen xin jian kang shi you hen da de hao chu 
qi ye xu guan zhu yuan gong xin li jian kang ke yi jian li xuan xie shi 
dang jin she hui bai ling ya li da 
hen duo shang jia zai zhe ge shi hou ye tui chu le bu tong de jie ya shou duan 
you shi fang ya li de mi shi tao tuo 
hai you tao bao shang de 
ma ren fu wu 
zhen dui zhe xie shou duan 
liu song huai biao shi 
cong xin li xue jiao du shang lai jiang you yi ding dao li 
wo men mei ge ren dou you fu mian qing xu 
dang ni chang qi wei yi jian shi qing bu kai xin de shi hou 
ru guo bu qu zhao yi ge qing su de dui xiang 
bu ba ta shuo chu lai 
shi hen nan shou de 
suo yi wo men you shi hou ke yi jie yong mou zhong mei jie 
ba fu neng liang de dong xi xuan xie chu qu 
liu song huai jian yi 
qi ye dan wei yao guan zhu yuan gong de xin li jian kang 
yao gei ta men yi ge jiao liu de ji hui 
huo zhe ju ban yi xie bi sai 
wai chu huo dong 
you tiao jian de hua ye ke yi jian li xuan xie shi 
dou shi you yi chu de 
xu yao zhu yi de shi 
xuan xie qing xu de shi hou bu yao dui bie ren zao cheng bu liang ying xiang 
liu song huai cheng 
yin yue fang zong zhi liao ye bu shi wei yi ge hao de jian ya fang shi 
ting mo zha te deng gu dian yin yue you fang song zuo yong 
yin yue zhi liao shi hui wei bu tong ren qun da pei bu yi yang de qu zi 
zong de lai shuo 
yi xie ming jia de qu zi hui qi dao zheng mian de xiao guo 
dan bu shi yong yu suo you ren 
bai ling guo nian yu bi hun nian guan xin li kong huang zheng xu tiao zheng xin tai 
jie jin nian guan 
bu shao bai ling huan shang nian guan xin li kong huang zheng 
bu fen dui yu jia xin wu wang 
sheng zhi wu wang deng wen ti xiu yu qi chi 
bu fen bai ling mian lin zhe yi nian yi du de xiang qin da guan 
liu song huai biao shi 
you bu fen bai ling mei dao nian mo xin li shang hui chan sheng kong huang gan 
zhe bu fen ren xu yao tong guo bie ren ping jia ta shi fou shi cheng gong ren shi lai huo qu zi wo cun zai gan 
dan yi nian xin xin ku ku ye mei you zheng dao da qian 
jia shang guo chun jie le kai xiao bi jiao da 
yin ci yue dao nian guan yue shi kong huang bu yi huo zhe zi sheng chu cuo bai gan 
zhe lei ren xu yao tiao zheng xin li zhuang tai 
mei ge ge ti dou yao zhi dao 
ren de mei yi ci jing li dou shi zhuan shu yu ge ren de bao gui cai fu 
ji shi yi nian xia lai mei you ji zan dao jin qian 
dan yao kan dao shi fou zai qi ta fang mian you suo ji zan 
shi fou zheng dao ren mai 
shi fou shou huo le jing yan 
shi fou da dao le yi ding de qi wang he mu biao 
kan qing zi ji yi nian de zong ti shou huo 
fan er bi jin jin shou huo jin qian geng jia zhong yao 
liu song huai biao shi 
bai ling ru guo dui zi wo huai ji gao de qi wang 
you zai yi wai jie de ping jia 
na me jiang hui mian lin zhe bi bie ren geng da de ya li 
zhe yi lei bai ling xu yao chong xin tiao zheng zi wo jia zhi ding wei 
bu shao ming ren zai chuang ye huo gong zuo chu qi dou shi mian lin zhe zhu duo kun nan 
zhe dou shi yi ge guo cheng 
yao zheng que kan dai zhe ge guo cheng 
ba zhe ge guo cheng dang cheng shi cu cheng ren sheng cheng gong de yi ge guo cheng 
er bu shi wan quan fou ding ta 
chun jie hai shi yao guo de 
gai hui jia hai shi yao hui jia 
shi zai bu neng hui jia 
wo men ye yao gei fu mu qin yi ge jiao dai 
dui yu bai ling bei bi hun 
guo nian xiang qin de wen ti 
hen duo bai ling bei cheng wei sheng nv 
dan bai ling zai xin tai shang bu neng ba zi ji dang cheng shi sheng xia de 
yao zai xin li shang jiu zheng yi xie xiang fa 
ru ci cai neng zheng que dui dai xiang qin de wen ti 
sheng nv bing bu shi yi ge biao qian 
er shi yong lai miao shu 
mei you fu he tiao jian de dui xiang chu xian dao zhi zan shi dan shen 
bai ling men ji shi shi bei fu mu ming ling qu xiang qin 
zui zhong jue ding quan ye zhang wo zai zi ji shou zhong 
zhi yao zi ji ba wo hao 
bi hun shi tan bu shang de 
dui yu xiang qin bai ling men ying gai you yi zhong ji ji yu kai fang de xin tai 
chong man zi xin qu mian dui 
ru ci cai neng shou huo ke neng de yuan fen 
zai ren men shen xin xiu xi de shui meng zhong 
you xie ji bing ci shi ye hui qiao qiao biao xian chu lai 
shui mian tou lu de ji bing mi mi 
shang qi dao zu li zong he zheng 
ru guo yang wo shi gan jue nan shou huo zhe mei ci yang wo dou rong yi jing xing 
ce wo cai gan jue geng shu shi xie 
na me ying gai dang xin shi fou huan you shang qi dao zu li zong he zheng 
yang wo shi hui chan sheng ying xiang hu xi de yi xi lie sheng li bian hua 
fa guo yan jiu ren yuan dui huan you shi mian he shui mian kun nan de nv xing huan zhe yan jiu fa xian 
shang xia e jiao zhai de ren geng rong yi li huan ci bing 
zhou qi xing zhi ti chou dong zhang ai 
zhou qi xing zhi ti chou dong zhang ai huan zhe zai zheng ye shui mian guo cheng zhong jing chang luan ti 
shuai dong shou bi deng 
ye jian shui mian zhi liang cha dao zhi huan zhe bai tian pi juan he fan zao 
yu bu ning tui zong he zheng xiang si 
er huan zhe zai shui mian guo cheng zhong fa sheng luan dong luan ti dong zuo 
zi ji quan ran bu zhi 
ye ke neng shi kang zu an 
kang yi yu he kang jing shen bing deng yao wu de fu zuo yong 
nian ling yue da 
wei xian yue gao 
xin nao xue guan ji bing 
yan jiu fa xian 
you qi shi han sheng ru lei 
yu nao zu zhong he xin xue guan ji bing cun zai zhi jie guan lian 
mei guo di te lv heng li fu te yi yuan chao sheng bo yan jiu fa xian 
da han zhe dong mai xue guan bi bi pu tong ren qun geng hou 
dong mai ying hua wei xian geng da 
xue yang liang jiang di 
xin nao xue guan ji bing wei xian jia da 
shui mian hu xi zan ting ye shi xin zang bing de yi da wei xian xin hao 
ru guo shui jiao han sheng da 
xing lai kou gan she zao 
yao jing ti xin nao xue guan ji bing 
che ye nan mian de zui chang jian yuan yin shi ye niao zheng 
nv xing yi dan shang le nian ji 
you qi shi sheng guo hai zi hou 
qi pang guang wang wang hui bian de geng jia min gan 
you yi dian niao ye jiu xiang xiao bian 
wei le huan jie zhe yi wen ti 
shui jiao zhi qian zui hao bu yao he tai duo shui 
jia zhuang xian ji bing huo lei nuo zong he zheng 
nv xing shui mian guo cheng zhong ti wen bian hua fu du da ke neng shi jin ru wei jue jing qi de xin hao 
duo xiang yan jiu fa xian 
ti wen bian hua guo da hai ke neng yu jia zhuang xian wen ti you guan 
jia jian huan zhe zong gan jue leng 
jia kang huan zhe zong gan jue re 
shou jiao bing leng hai ke neng shi lei nuo zong he zheng de yi da zheng zhuang 
jiao he bi zi you yu xue guan shou suo er wu fa huo de zu gou xue liu 
ye jian mo ya zheng 
zao chen xing lai gan jue de tou tong da duo wei jin zhang xing tou tong 
zui jian dan de jie shi shi shui zi bu liang 
zhen tou guo gao dao zhi jing bo ji rou la shen suo zhi 
geng nan fa xian de qian zai bing yin shi ye jian mo ya zheng 
shui mian guo cheng zhong ya guan jin yao shu xiao shi 
dao zhi ji rou jin zhang hui xiang shang xiang wai fu she 
zui zhong dao zhi jin zhang xing tou tong 
zhe zhong tou tong wang wang ji zhong yu tou ding huo tou bu liang ce 
you ji ya gan 
zhong guo kang fu yan jiu zhong xin bei jing bo ai yi yuan xin li kang fu ke zhu ren liu song huai jie shou cai fang 
nian guan jiang zhi 
ban sui zhe gong zuo jing zheng ya li yue lai yue da 
shen jing shuai ruo 
gao xue ya zhe xie ji bing zhu jian qin shi zhe bai ling de shen ti he xin li 
dao di ru he cai neng huan jie gao ya dai lai de shang hai 
xiang shou xing fu de sheng huo 
qi ye dan wei yao guan zhu yuan gong de xin li jian kang 
you tiao jian de hua ke yi jian li xuan xie shi 
dang jin she hui bai ling ya li da 
hen duo shang jia zai zhe ge shi hou ye tui chu le bu tong de jie ya shou duan 
you shi fang ya li de mi shi tao tuo 
hai you tao bao shang de 
ma ren fu wu 
zhen dui zhe xie shou duan 
liu song huai biao shi 
cong xin li xue jiao du shang lai jiang you yi ding dao li 
wo men mei ge ren dou you fu mian qing xu 
dang ni chang qi wei yi jian shi qing bu kai xin de shi hou 
ru guo bu qu zhao yi ge qing su de dui xiang 
bu ba ta shuo chu lai 
shi hen nan shou de 
suo yi wo men you shi hou ke yi jie yong mou zhong mei jie 
ba fu neng liang de dong xi xuan xie chu qu 
liu song huai jian yi 
qi ye dan wei yao guan zhu yuan gong de xin li jian kang 
yao gei ta men yi ge jiao liu de ji hui 
huo zhe ju ban yi xie bi sai 
wai chu huo dong 
you tiao jian de hua ye ke yi jian li xuan xie shi 
dou shi you yi chu de 
xu yao zhu yi de shi 
xuan xie qing xu de shi hou bu yao dui bie ren zao cheng bu liang ying xiang 
liu song huai cheng 
yin yue fang zong zhi liao ye bu shi wei yi ge hao de jian ya fang shi 
ting mo zha te deng gu dian yin yue you fang song zuo yong 
yin yue zhi liao shi hui wei bu tong ren qun da pei bu yi yang de qu zi 
zong de lai shuo 
yi xie ming jia de qu zi hui qi dao zheng mian de xiao guo 
dan bu shi yong yu suo you ren 
zhong guo kang fu yan jiu zhong xin bei jing bo ai yi yuan xin li kang fu ke zhu ren liu song huai jie shou cai fang 
you mei ti pu chu li lian jie yin gong zuo ya li guo da huan shang jia kang 
nian mo hen duo bai ling ye yin wei yi nian de gong zuo ya li da huan shang shen jing shuai ruo 
jin shi yan deng bing zheng 
bai ling gai ru he huan jie ya li 
ji hu mei zhong zhi ye dou hui dai lai mou zhong zhi ye bing 
yao ti qian liao jie bing cai qu yu fang cuo shi 
yi fang bing qing xing cheng huo zhe jia zhong 
liu song huai biao shi 
sui ran guo jia dui zhi ye bing you zhuan men de jie ding 
li ru jie chu you du huo zhe fang she xing wu zhi yin qi de ji bing 
dan qi shi ge ge gang wei shang de gong zuo ren yuan you yu xin li ya li da 
shen ti qi guan ru bo zi 
yao deng chan sheng yi xie bing zheng 
zhe xie ye ying gai shu yu zhi ye bing de fan chou 
zhong hua ren min gong he guo zhi ye bing fang zhi fa 
zhong dui zhi ye bing you zhe ming que de gui ding 
shi zhi qi ye 
shi ye dan wei he ge ti jing ji zu zhi deng yong ren dan wei de lao dong zhe zai zhi ye huo dong zhong 
yin jie chu fen chen 
fang she xing wu zhi he qi ta you du 
you hai yin su er yin qi de ji bing 
yi ban er yan 
bi xu shi guo jia gong bu de zhi ye bing fen lei he mu lu suo lie de zhi ye bing si ge tiao jian que yi bu ke cai gou cheng zhi ye bing 
qi zhong yi chen fei 
zhong du deng zheng zhuang wei duo 
liu song huai ren wei 
xiang bai ling men chang mian lin de shui bu zhe jue 
bo zi bu shu fu 
yao suan bei tong deng zhu duo zheng zhuang 
qi shi dou shi yu suo cong shi de zhi ye you yi ding de guan xi 
zuo ban gong shi de ren da duo di zhe tou huo zhe dui zhe dian nao ping mu 
shen jing xi tong 
gu guan jie xi tong 
you xie zheng zhuang wu yi yu gong zuo shi de guan yong zi shi xiang guan 
dan you de zheng zhuang yu gong zuo shi de zhuang tai xiang guan 
dang gong zuo ya li da 
jie zou kuai shi 
ren bu jin shi bo zi huo zhe ji zhui chu yu jin zhang zhuang tai 
shi zheng ge ren dou chu yu jin zhang jiao lv zhong 
dang zhe zhong zi shi chi xu le yi duan shi jian zhi hou 
ren jiu hui jue de nao zi lei 
shen ti ye pi fa 
chang qi cong shi ban gong shi gong zuo de ge ren 
yao zhu yi bao hu jing chui 
bi ru jin ru gong zuo zhuang tai zhi qian ke gen ju tiao jian shi dang zuo re shen yun dong 
huo zhe zai jin zhang zhuang tai jie shu zhi hou dui ji rou zuo yi ding de huan jie ya li de dong zuo 
ru an mo deng 
mei yi ge zhi ye dou ke neng hui you ta de zhi ye bing 
zhe ge zhi ye ben shen ke neng dui shen ti mou yi ge bu wei dai lai yi xie ying xiang 
yin ci yao ti zao zai xin li shang you suo zhun bei 
ti zao zuo yi xie yu fang 
zhe dui wo men shen xin jian kang shi you hen da de hao chu 
ju e luo si 
gong qing tuan zhen li bao 
nv xing bi nan xing xu yao geng duo de shui mian 
lai zi bei ka luo lai na da xue de mei guo ke xue jia men jing guo yan jiu 
de chu le zhe ge jie lun 
yi qian fu qi men chang chang hui zheng lun 
shui mian dao di dui shei geng zhong yao 
ke xue jia yi jing zhao dao le da an 
mei li de nv shi men da nao rong yi fa sheng neng liang de sun hao 
ta men de da nao neng tong shi wan cheng ji ge ren wu 
dan zhi hou jiu shen me ye ji bu de le 
er qie dui yu nv xing er yan 
da nao de hui fu xu yao geng zhang de shi jian 
lai zi bei ka luo lai na da xue de mei guo ke xue jia men zheng ming 
shui mian bu chong zu de nv xing 
hui jing chang gan dao yi yu 
rong yi fa pi qi 
er dui yu nan xing lai shuo shui mian bu zu hou guo ze mei you na me yan zhong 
hen duo nv xing you yu shui mian bu zu er sheng bing 
shen zhi zao shang xing lai de shi hou quan shen suan tong 
bo shi jian yi shuo 
nv xing shui mian bu zu de shi hou ke yi bai tian xiao qi yi hui er 
bang zhu hui fu shen ti 
shao shao shui yi duan shi jian 
shui mian de zhu yao zuo yong jiu shi fang song da nao he hui fu da nao 
chu yu shen du shui mian zhuang tai de shi hou 
da nao pi ceng fu ze si kao 
ji yi he yu yan de bu fen hui jin ru hui fu mo shi 
er qie bai tian wo men da nao gong zuo de shi jian yue zhang 
hui fu xu yao de shi jian jiu yue zhang 
ye jiu shi shuo 
xu yao geng duo de shui mian 
yin wei ta men de da nao neng tong yi shi jian zhi xing duo ge ren wu 
bu guo ke xue jia ye cheng ren 
nei xie chu yu zhong yao gang wei shang de xu yao zuo hen duo jue ding de nan xing 
ye xu yao geng duo de shui mian 
zhong guo kang fu yan jiu zhong xin bei jing bo ai yi yuan xin li kang fu ke zhu ren liu song huai jie shou cai fang 
nian mo hen duo bai ling yin wei yi nian de gong zuo ya li da huan shang shen jing shuai ruo 
jin shi yan deng bing zheng 
ye yu shi jian fa zhan ge ren ai hao bu shi wei yi zhong hen hao de jian ya fang shi 
liu song huai biao shi 
chang qi gong zuo ya li guo da yin fa de jiao lv ke neng hui shi ren huan shang jia kang deng bing zheng 
yin ci bai ling zai ye yu xu yao tong guo yun dong huo qi ta fang shi lai pai jie ya li 
you qi shi ke yi tong guo fa zhan ge ren de xing qu ai hao da dao jie ya de mu di 
liu song huai fen xi cheng 
dang ge ti chu yu yi zhong gao ya zhi xia shi 
zhe zhong ya li hui zhuan hua wei qing xu 
zhe zhong qing xu hui rang ren fan fan fu fu de dian ji zhe gong zuo 
da nao shi zhong de bu dao xiu xi 
ru ci hen rong yi zao cheng ye yu shi jian ye chu yu jiao lv bu an de zhuang tai 
zai shi shi ye yu ai hao de shi hou 
ge ti de zhu yi li zhuan yi dao bie de shi qing shang 
deng yu rang na yi gen jin beng de shen jing de dao le xiu xi 
liu song huai ren wei 
zhu ru zuo zi ji xi huan de yun dong 
ke yi de dao hen hao de fang song 
ta ren wei yun dong ye shi tong guo zhuan yi zhu yi li rang da nao de dao fang song de fang shi 
wo men ping shi zuo zuo yun dong 
chu qu pao bu 
zhe xie dou shi yi zhang yi chi de yun dong 
ta neng shi wo men xin shen huo jia zhuang xian gong neng de dao tiao zheng 
yun dong de shi hou jin zhang 
bu guan dui ni de xin fei gong neng 
ni de qu ti gong neng 
shen zhi ni de xiao hua 
dou chu yu zui hao de yi zhong dai xie de zhuang tai 
zhe yang de hua 
dui ni hui fu ti li ye shi fei chang fei chang you bang zhu de 
zhong xin wang jian kang pin dao 
han zhong shi wei sheng ju yi gan bu zai jia li zi sha shen wang 
han zhong shi ji wei biao shi 
ceng diao cha guo ci ren 
zhe ming zi sha de gan bu xing zhang 
ci qian you xiao xi cheng 
zhang mou shi han zhong shi hong shi zi hui ban gong shi fu zhu ren 
zuo ri xia wu 
han zhong shi hong shi zi hui ban gong shi yi gong zuo ren yuan cheng 
yi zhi zhang mou zai jia li zi sha de shi qing 
dan zhang mou bing bu zai hong shi zi hui shang ban 
zhi shi ren shi guan xi 
bian zhi deng zai hong shi zi hui 
bing qie zui jin zheng zai gei qi ban li zhuan yi shou xu 
ji zhe cong han zhong shi wei sheng ju liao jie dao 
zhang mou sheng qian ren wei sheng ju yi zheng ke ke zhang 
yu jia zhong zi sha 
dui yu zi sha yuan yin 
gong zuo ren yuan biao shi bu qing chu 
ju han zhong shi gong an ju han tai fen ju han zhong lu pai chu suo jie shao 
dang tian jing fang jie jing hou 
di yi shi jian gan dao zhang mou jia zhong 
xian chang zhang mou tui bu you shang 
shi xue hen duo 
yi jing mei you sheng ming ti zheng 
chu bu pan ding xi zi sha 
qi jia shu dui ci pan ding wu yi yi 
han zhong shi ji wei fu shu ji li xiao yuan jie shao 
ji wei bu men ci qian dui zhang mou jin xing guo diao cha 
ji zhe ceng chun 
zhe ming shang hai nv zi bi ye yu hua dong zheng fa da xue guo ji jing ji fa zhuan ye 
hui shuo yi kou liu li de ying yu 
yin she xian he tong zha pian zui 
bei shang hai jing fang tong ji 
xian hou fei fa qu de si ge hu ji shen fen zheng ming 
bing zai shen zhen fu hao quan hun de feng sheng shui qi 
shen zhen zhong yuan dui bei gao ren zheng li fan he tong zha pian zui 
wei zao ju min shen fen zheng zui 
bei gao ren luo bo te fan he tong zha pian zui yi an jin xing le gong kai xuan pan 
yi he tong zha pian zui pan chu bei gao ren zheng li wu qi tu xing 
bo duo zheng zhi quan li zhong shen 
bing chu mo shou ge ren quan bu cai chan 
yi wei zao ju min shen fen zheng zui 
pan chu zheng li you qi tu xing san nian 
shu zui bing fa jue ding zhi xing wu qi tu xing 
bo duo zheng zhi quan li zhong shen 
bing chu mo shou ge ren quan bu cai chan 
bing chu fa jin ren min bi yi bai er shi wan yuan 
fu jia qu zhu chu jing 
ci qian you mei ti bao dao dui zheng li he luo bo te de bei jing zuo le diao cha 
shang hai nv ren 
zhu zai shen zhen hua qiao cheng chun shui an qian wan hao zhai li 
chu ru hao che jie song 
chang zai ao men du chang yi zhi qian jin 
yin yi qi zhu bao an fa 
shen zhen jing fang fa xian 
ta you wu ge he fa de hu ji shen fen 
hai shi shang hai jing fang wang shang tong ji de tao fan 
shen zhen jian cha ji guan zhi kong ta she xian zha pian 
bei pian de bao kuo guo qi gao guan 
min jian tou zi da hu 
ji zhe zhang ling 
chen jin wen tui bu shou dao zhong chuang 
shen zhen long gang qu heng gang jie dao liu yue she qu cheng guan dui zhang chen jin wen zai gui yuan ji qu qian shi 
jian kong lu xiang xian shi 
chen jin wen jiang shu 
ci shi yu zi ji shang zhou xiang she qu tao yao shuo fa you guan 
an jian hai zai jin yi bu diao cha zhong 
ji zhe gan dao bao xing yi yuan 
yi yuan wai ke fu zhu ren yi shi wu he ping jie shao shuo 
chen jin wen bei kan cheng zhong shang 
you tui gen jian wan quan duan lie 
bi zi ye shou dao kai fang shi guan chuan shang 
jing guo shou shu zhi liao 
zan shi tuo li sheng ming wei xian 
hou qi shi fou can ji 
hai you dai shu hou hui fu zai guan cha 
ju tang zai bing chuang shang de chen jin wen jie shao 
ta dao fu jin de ji qu qian 
jiang ta yi dun luan kan 
zai xian chang pai zhao 
ke neng shi hui qu xiang 
ji zhe zhao dao shi fa shi de yi ming mu ji zhe hu xian sheng 
ju qi jie shao 
dang shi ta di tou zou zai pu sha lu shang 
hu ran ting dao you ren da han jiu ming 
ta hui tou fa xian 
ji zhe jian dao hu xian sheng shi 
ta gang gang lu wan kou gong 
shen ti hai zai fa dou 
tai ke pa le 
zhi you zai dian ying li cai neng kan dao zhe yang de xi jie 
hu xian sheng yi kai shi ren wei ke neng shi qiang qian 
dan hou lai jue de bu shi 
shang zhe chen jin wen de jie jie chen nv shi gao su ji zhe 
chen jin wen de shou ji 
jin xiang lian deng dou mei you diu shi 
ji zhe lai dao shi fa xian chang 
jian dang shi lu mian shang reng you da tan xue ji 
ji zhe cong pu sha cun de jian kong shi pin zhong kan dao 
zheng ge zuo an guo cheng yu hu xian sheng miao shu de yi zhi 
jing fang zheng diao cha 
yao qiu jing fang wu bi zhui cha xiong shou xia luo 
wei he chen jin wen neng de dao zhe me duo cun min sheng yuan 
you cun min gao su ji zhe 
chen jin wen shi liu yue she qu de cheng guan dui zhang 
ping shi wei ren zheng yi qian he 
zhu yao shou ru kao chu zu fang wu 
bing mei you sheng yi shang de jiu fen 
ju cun min li xian sheng 
shang zhou san chen jin wen he ta yi qi qu she qu 
liu yue xin cun you er yuan chan quan zhuan rang he shang pu zu jin pian di 
de wen ti tao yao shuo fa 
jie guo mo guo ji tian chen jin wen jiu zao fei lai heng huo 
dui yu chen jin wen bei kan yi shi 
liu yue she qu xian ren shu ji zou wei xing gao su ji zhe 
fa sheng zhe yang de e xing shi jian shei ye bu yuan kan dao 
zhi yu yuan yin xu yao deng jing fang po an hou cai zhi xiao 
qian ri xia wu 
ji zhe cong long gang gong an fen ju huo xi 
mu qian jing fang yi cheng li zhuan an zu 
gai an reng zai diao cha zhong 
qing yuan shi qing cheng qu huan bao ju ju zhang chen bai he 
shi pin jie tu 
ri qian bei shi ming ju bao she xian le suo qi ye 
fen fen zhong ke yi gao kua yi jian chang 
de qing cheng qu huan bao ju ju zhang chen bai he yi bei mian qu qing cheng qu qu wei wei yuan 
qu huan bao ju dang zu shu ji 
ju zhang deng zhi wu bing li an diao cha 
ju bao chen bai he de lu yin 
nei rong shu shi 
you qing yuan shi min xiang gai shi qing cheng qu ji wei shi ming ju bao chen bai he wei ji 
bing ti gong yi duan dian hua lu yin 
cheng chen bai he xiang qi ta ren jiang shou ru he li yong shou zhong zhi quan lai qiao zha le suo xia qu qi ye 
ci shi jing mei ti bao dao hou shou dao wang luo he she hui guan zhu 
you qi shi lu yin zhong 
fen fen zhong ke yi gao kua yi jian chang 
de shuo fa yin fa re yi 
chen bai he jie shou guang dong bu fen mei ti cai fang shi cheng 
dui ci shi li an diao cha 
bing yao qing xiang guan bu men tong guo ji shu shou duan dui lu yin de zhen shi xing jin xing jian ding 
qing cheng qu zheng fu men hu wang zhan zuo tian fa bu 
guan yu qing cheng qu huan bao ju ju zhang chen bai he you guan wen ti de tong bao 
cheng jing guang dong sheng gong an si fa jian ding zhong xin zhuan jia jian ding he qing cheng qu ji wei deng xiang guan bu men de diao cha qu zheng 
guan yu qun zhong shi ming ju bao chen bai he de dian hua lu yin nei rong shu shi 
chen bai he que you tan lun le yu qi shen fen bu xiang fu de yan lun 
tong shi fa xian chen bai he hai she xian qi ta wei ji wen ti 
zhe fen tong bao hai shuo 
jing qing cheng qu wei jue ding 
mian qu chen bai he de qing cheng qu qu wei wei yuan 
qu huan bao ju dang zu shu ji 
ju zhang zhi wu 
bing dui qi jin xing li an diao cha 
zhi yao ding si nei xie chang zhang ta men jiu hui guai guai song qian 
ju ju bao ren jie shao 
ta yin gong zuo guan xi chang yu chen bai he lian xi 
ju bao qian xie tian chen bai he que bu jie ta de dian hua 
ta yong ling yi bu shou ji da tong le chen bai he de dian hua 
dan chen bai he yi zhi mei gen ta shuo hua 
ye mei gua duan dian hua 
ju bao ren shuo 
ta cong dian hua zhong ting dao 
chen bai he shuo 
yi ta jin tian de zhi wei 
fen fen zhong ke yi gao kua yi jian chang 
chen bai he shuo 
zuo liang ci jiu ke yi shou shou 
ni kan ta gan bu gan jie fa 
ni yao ming bai yi ge dao li 
jiu suan mei you wo chen bai he zuo 
yi yang hui you chen er 
qi shi wo shen me dou bu yong zuo 
zhi yao zhao yi liang jian chang 
dao le na li da ma jiang 
jiu ke yi ding si nei xie chang zhang 
ta men jiu hui guai guai song qian gei wo le 
nan zi chang mou jia cheng jia zhong you ji shi 
lan zhu yi si jia che che zhu yao qiu 
zhong tu ba dao xiang 
yao dian qian hua 
tong zhou jing fang tong bao 
xian yi ren chang mou yin she xian qiang jie bei xing ju 
qiang qian zhe ai qiu si ji 
zhao xian sheng zheng zhun bei jia che li kai shi 
cheng you ji shi zhao ji gan hui jia 
xiang zu che rang zhao xian sheng song yi xia 
zhao xian sheng da ying hou 
jiang gai nan zi song dao le mu di di 
dan gai nan zi que mei you xia che 
bing yi mei lian xi shang jia ren wei you 
rang zhao xian sheng zai jiang qi song hui chu fa de 
zai fan hui tu zhong 
zhao xian sheng tu ran jue de bo zi shang yi liang 
you da tui bei dao ci shang 
zuo zai fu jia shi wei zhi shang de na ming nan zi zheng shuang shou jin wo yi ba zhe die dao ding zhe ta 
ni zhe shi yao zuo shen me 
zhao xian sheng bian shuo bian ba che ting dao lu bian 
chen nan zi da hua de yi shun jian 
meng zhua dui fang de shuang shou 
jiang zhe die dao duo xia 
wo mei qian le 
ni gei wo dian qian hua 
gai nan zi bei duo xia dao hou 
bu duan xiang zhao xian sheng ai qiu fang guo ta 
zhao xian sheng rang dui fang zai che shang deng zhe 
yi tui bei zha shang xu mai yao bao za 
jin le lu bian de yi jia yao dian 
bing li ji bao jing 
xun luo che gan dao kong zhi xian yi ren 
zai shi fa de de tong zhou gong an fen ju xun luo che zu kuai su xiang xian chang he wei 
jian you jing che shi lai 
che nei de qing nian nan zi shi tu tao pao 
jiu bei min jing en dao zai di shang 
bei kong zhi de nan zi wei chang mou 
yin jin qi shou tou jie ju chan sheng qiang jie nian tou 
jian zhao xian sheng du zi yi ren jia che 
jue ding ba zhao xian sheng zuo wei zuo an mu biao 
ke shi you yu xin xu 
qi shang che zhuan le yi ge duo xiao shi hou cai na chu dao zhun bei xia shou 
mei xiang dao dui fang li qi hen da 
bu dan mei you xia zhu che zhu 
zhe die dao hai bei dui fang duo qu 
xin jing bao xun 
ji zhe liu zhen ni 
you ren zai mai mai shui guo de shi hou fa sheng le ji lie de da dou 
rang yi ge cao mei peng zao dao po huai 
ji zhe gan dao le wei yu xi an shi zhang an qu de xian chang 
zai fu jin wei le da liang fu jin de xiang qin 
na dao di fa sheng le shen me ne 
guo nong zhang shi fu 
si ge ren la de la da di da 
wo yi ge ren mei you ban fa 
xian zai shang dao na li le 
guo nong zhang shi fu 
tou shang da le ji ge bao 
shen shang bu shu fu 
zhang shi fu shuo 
zai fa sheng chong tu hou ta men bao le jing 
nan zi sui hou bei gan lai de min jing dai hui le pai chu suo 
er zai ji zhe quan shuo zhi xia 
zhang shi fu ye bei cun min fu le qi lai 
xiang ji zhe jiang shu le fa sheng chong tu de yuan yin 
kan jia bu cheng zhi hou 
da peng yi ji lin shi ju zhu de peng zi dou bei si che de luan qi ba zao 
da peng shang you hen duo bei shi tou za 
bei gun zi chuo chu lai de da dong 
zhang shi fu ben ren ye bei ta men jin xing le ou da 
zai ou da jie shu hou 
zhe ji ming nan zi liang ming liao shen fen 
shuo zi ji jiu shi xia qu tu di suo de gong zuo ren yuan 
xia qu pai chu suo mu qian shou li le gai qi an jian 
mu qian an jian zheng zai jin xing diao cha zhong 
ji zhe ye ye zheng shi le na si ming nan zi que shi shi xia qu tu di zi yuan suo de gong zuo ren yuan 
zhi yu fa sheng chong tu de yuan yin 
shi bu shi mai shui guo yin qi de 
ji zhe lian xi le wang qu guo tu zi yuan suo de fu ze ren 
fu ze ren shuo 
wo men de yi ge fu suo zhang 
dai zhe ji ming zhi fa dui yuan 
xia qu xun cha de shi hou jie dao qun zhong ju bao 
shuo you yi ge zhong zhi cao mei de da peng 
mei you ban zhong zhi shou xu 
wo men gong zuo ren yuan jiu dao xian chang qu diao cha 
dang shi ke neng yin wei yan yu de chong tu 
fa sheng le mao dun 
shi qing fa sheng le 
wo men zuo wei zhi fa ren yuan ken ding you cuo wu 
fu ze ren biao shi jiang ji ji pei he pai chu suo de diao cha chu li 
jue bu gu xi qian jiu 
bing zuo hao qun zhong de an fu ji shan hou chu li gong zuo 
du jue ci lei shi jian de zai ci fa sheng 
shan xi guang bo dian shi tai 
du shi kuai bao 
nian zhong jiang sui shou hua diao bu ru li cai bian 
shang ban de xiao huo ban men yi nian zhong zui qi pan de ri zi dao le 
ji jiang lai xi 
bu shao wang you dou zai wang shang shai chu zi ji de nian zhong jiang 
gong si fa jin tiao 
gong si fa chi dao quan 
ge zhong qi pa nian zhong jiang ceng chu bu qiong 
yu qi sui shou hua diao nian zhong jiang 
bu ru dong dong nao jin 
cong xin nian kai shi rang zi ji de qian bao gu qi lai 
ru he rang ni de nian zhong jiang 
bu bu sheng qian 
wu lun ni de nian zhong jiang shi duo shao 
wu ji hua de jiang ni de nian zhong jiang fang zai gong zi ka nei na jiu sun shi da le 
zhe yang deng zhe qian bian zhi de xing wei xian ran shi bu zhi de de 
er nian guan yi zhi 
wei le zuo ren qing yao gou zhi yi xie li pin 
dan guang zhe guang zhe jiu hen rong yi jiang nian zhong jiang hua dao le yi xie ji hua wai de xiao hao pin shang 
chong dong xing de xiao fei ye bu shi ming zhi zhi ju 
bu fang jiang nian zhong jiang zuo wei xin yi nian de di yi bi li cai zi jin 
shi xian shou yi zui da hua 
huo bi ji jin shi shou xuan 
ru guo nian zhong jiang jin e jiao shao 
ke yi zhi jie gou mai huo bi ji jin 
yin lv wang fen xi shi jiu jian yi 
shou xian huo bi ji jin tou zi men kan di 
you yu nian mo huo bi shi chang gong qiu pian jin 
suo yi huo bi ji jin de shou yi ye bi qi ta shi jian geng gao 
zui hou huo bi ji jin de liu dong xing shi fen you liang 
tou zi zhe ke yi sui shi shu hui ji jin fen e 
zai pin zhong de xuan ze shang 
gai li cai shi jian yi 
bao shou de tou zi zhe ke xuan ze li shi ye ji ju qian qie wen ding xing jiao hao 
zi chan gui mo jiao da 
zu he jiu qi tiao zheng ling huo de ji jin pin zhong 
ru nan fang zeng li 
hua xia xian jin 
guang fa huo bi 
bo shi xian jin 
fang da huo bi deng chan pin 
yu ci tong shi 
ji shi ni de nian zhong jiang zhi you ji qian kuai 
yi yu e bao wei li 
nian mo he xin nian shi bu shao dian shang de cu xiao shi jian 
zai dian shang yi bo yi bo de gong shi zhi xia 
tou zi zhe de xiao fei yu wang wang wang rong yi gao zhang 
er cong yu e bao zhang hu zhong qu chu li cai jin jin xing xiao fei 
li cai shi jian yi tou zi zhe 
zai li cai guo cheng zhong yao bi mian chong dong xiao fei 
ke zai tou zi yu e bao de tong shi 
bao zheng zhi fu bao li you yi ding de xiao fei zi jin yong yu xiao fei zhou zhuan 
zhua zhu yin hang li cai chan pin de gao shou yi lv 
ru guo ni de nian zhong jiang po feng 
na me ke yi yong yu gou mai li cai chan pin 
yin hang li cai chan pin xiang dui yu hu lian wang li cai chan pin er yan 
jin guan men kan jiao gao 
you qi xian xian zhi 
bu guo shou yi xiang dui wen ding 
geng shi he yi xie feng xian cheng shou neng li jiao di de tou zi zhe 
ge da yin hang de yu qi shou yi lv ye jie jie pan sheng 
ju yin lv wang shu ju ku tong ji 
chuang jin liang nian lai de xin gao 
shang zhou xin fa xing de li cai chan pin zhong 
gu fen zhi yin hang he cheng shang hang de li cai chan pin ping jun shou yi lv jiao gao 
nian guan yi guo 
li cai chan pin de shou yi lv ke neng hui chu xian yi xie hui luo 
xuan ze yu xin ren de jia ren 
peng you he mai gao shou yi de li cai chan pin ye shi yi ge bu cuo de xuan ze 
guo zhai ni hui gou 
li cai shou yi gao 
yi wei jian zhu hang ye de jian zhu she ji shi jiu dui ben bao ji zhe biao shi 
gai hang ye zui da de yi bi shou ru jiu shi nian mo fa de nian zhong jiang 
dui yu zhe lei qi ye de yuan gong 
ke yi kao lv jiang nian zhong jiang fen san tou zi 
you zhuan jia jian yi 
ke yi jiang gao e nian zhong jiang yi bu fen tou ru dao yin hang li cai chan pin zhong zuo xiang dui wen jian de tou zi 
ling wai de bu fen 
jin guan feng xian jiao gao 
dan shou yi ye shi fen ke guan 
tou zi zhe ke yi gen ju zi ji de feng xian cheng shou neng li 
an zhao shi he zi ji de bi li jin xing tou zi 
er dui yu xu yao gou zhi nian huo 
ren qing ying chou huo jia zhuang da jian de 
zi jin de liu dong xing yao qiu jiao gao de tou zi zhe er yan 
liu dong xing jiao di de yin hang li cai chan pin jiu bu shi he zhe lei ren qun 
dui yu you yi ding zhuan ye zhi shi de tou zi zhe lai shuo 
guo zhai ni hui gou shi yi ge bu cuo de xuan ze 
zhe ye jiu yi wei zhe 
yi tian jiu ke yi huo de shang qian yuan de li xi shou ru 
rang hao cheng gao shou yi de zhong duo huo bi ji jin wang chen mo ji 
guo zhai ni hui gou de li lv bian dong jiao da 
tou zi zhe xu yao ba wo shi dian jiu shi fen zhong yao 
guo ji zhu ce cai wu ce hua shi xu zheng guo ti xing tou zi zhe 
guo zhai ni hui gou de cao zuo xiang jiao yu yin hang li cai chan pin he huo bi ji jin er yan yao xiang dui fu za yi xie 
te bie dui yu mai ru shi dian xu yao yi xie zhuan ye de pan duan 
nian mo he chang jia qian xi shi guo zhai ni hui gou li lv gao zhang de shi hou 
tong chang er yan 
hu yu han chao ying ting zhi hu xiang fei bang he di hui 
ji ji ying zao you li yu gai shan han chao guan xi de huan jing 
ju han lian she bao dao 
hu yu han chao ying ting zhi hu xiang fei bang he di hui 
ji ji ying zao you li yu gai shan han chao guan xi de huan jing 
dui yu zhang cheng ze bei chu jue yi shi 
jin zheng en biao shi 
chao xian lao dong dang 
chu jue le fan dang zong pai fen zi 
zhe jin yi bu qiang hua le lao dong dang ge ming dui wu de yi xin tuan jie 
jin zheng en hai qiang diao 
chao xian jiang ji xu wei gai shan han chao guan xi er nu li 
bing dun cu han guo ye ying ji ji tui dong gai shan han chao guan xi 
jin zheng en jiu chao xian ban dao ju shi biao shi 
mei guo he han guo ju xing de
