dui chao qin lve zhan zheng yan xi 
dui ban dao ju shi gou cheng zhong da wei xie 
ru guo zai chao xian ban dao di qu zai ci bao fa zhan zheng 
zhe ke neng hui dai lai yi chang ke pa de he zai nan 
ling ju fa xin she bao dao 
jin zheng en zai jiang hua zhong shi yan yi qiang you li ju cuo di yu 
qin hai chao xian 
xin de yi nian li 
bei cheng wei shan xi guan chang 
de nian du mu biao ze ren kao he zhi you zhong yao tiao zheng 
guo nei sheng chan zong zhi 
de fen zhi jiang xia diao 
ge shi da dao quan sheng ping jun zhi shi wei wan cheng ren wu 
chao e wan cheng ren wu de bu zai jia fen 
er sheng tai huan bao zhi biao fen zhi zeng jia 
chao e wan cheng zhi mai ren wu de hai neng jia fen 
sheng wei chang wei 
sheng wei zu zhi bu bu zhang mao wan chun jie shi ci ci kao he zhi du tiao zheng yuan yin 
tong guo she zhi ke xue de zhi biao ti xi 
yin dao ge ji ge bu men ling dao gan bu geng xin fa zhan li nian 
qie shi xiao chu wei de wen ti 
te se zhi biao 
tu chu qu yu cuo wei fa zhan 
tiao zheng hou de zhi biao ti xi jiang fu yu shan xi 
he xie shan xi 
mei li shan xi ding wei yi ji zhi biao 
han gai jing ji fa zhan 
jie gou tiao zheng 
min sheng gai shan 
zi yuan huan jing deng ge ge fang mian 
wei tu chu qu yu cuo wei fa zhan 
te se zhi biao 
gong xing zhi biao 
fu yu shan xi 
tu chu kao he jing ji zeng zhang zhi liang xiao yi 
chan ye jie gou 
ke ji cheng guo zhuan hua 
ju min shou ru deng zhi biao 
he xie shan xi 
tu chu kao he shou ru cha ju 
gong gong fu wu pu ji lv 
ju min wen hua xiao fei shui ping 
she hui zhi an man yi du deng zhi biao 
mei li shan xi 
tu chu kao he lv hua lv 
huan jing zhi liang zhi shu 
tu di li yong 
jie neng jian pai deng zhi biao 
kao he zhi biao zhong reng bao liu yi ding jing ji zong liang he zeng zhang su du de zhi biao 
sheng chan zong zhi zeng zhang lv 
zeng she di san chan ye zeng jia zhi zeng zhang lv 
zhan lve xing xin xing chan ye zeng jia zhi zeng zhang lv 
cheng xiang ju min zong shou ru zhan bi zhong 
cheng zhen hua lv deng fan ying chan ye he cheng xiang jie gou you hua de zhi biao 
mei li shan xi 
bing dui xi an 
yan an shi he yang ling shi fan qu zeng she 
kao he zhi biao 
zeng jia zhi li wu mai chao e wan cheng ren wu jia fen xiang mu 
qu xiao sheng chan zong zhi chao e wan cheng ren wu jia fen xiang mu 
tu xian zhi li wu mai zai dang qian huan jing zong he zhi li zhong de zhong yao di wei 
ling dao gan bu ge ren bu zai da hui shu zhi 
kao he shi jian ya suo 
ge dan wei kao he ce ping da hui shang 
kao he dan wei zhu yao fu ze ren yao zhen dui nian chu sheng wei sheng zheng fu dui ge shi qu xia da de zhi biao di wan cheng qing kuang zhu xiang jin xing dui biao bao gao 
er qie ling dao gan bu ge ren bu zai jin xing da hui shu zhi 
jin hou ying jie kao he 
ge dan wei bu zai zhuan men ji zhong zheng li zi liao 
kao he zu cha yan mu biao ren wu wan cheng qing kuang 
yi shan xi sheng kao he xin xi guan li xi tong zhong mei ji du xin xi tai zhang wei zhun 
fan tu ji zheng li zhi zhi kao he zi liao de 
yu yi kou fen chu li 
kao he bu shou li pin te chan bu gua xuan chuan biao yu 
kao he qi jian de ji lv ye geng jia ming que 
kao he xiao zu tong yi shi su 
bu gao yan qing 
bu shang jiu shui 
bu gao jie yuan song 
bu kui zeng he shou shou li pin 
bu gua huan ying xuan chuan tiao fu biao yu 
tong shi cheng li jian du jian cha zu 
she li ju bao xiang 
hai jiang gong bu ju bao dian hua 
jie shou jian du 
mei ge kao he zu zhong dou you yi ming ji wei de gong zuo ren yuan zuo wei gai zu de ji lv jian du yuan 
kao he zu zai ji lv fang mian chu wen ti 
zu zhang fu ze 
quan wei jie du 
kao he zhi biao wei he yao tiao zheng 
xian you kao he ti xi pian zhong jing ji 
xi jin ping jiu ti chu 
zai ye bu neng jian dan yi guo nei sheng chan zong zhi zeng zhang lv lai lun ying xiong le 
zhong zu bu xia fa 
guan yu gai jin di fang dang zheng ling dao ban zi he ling dao gan bu zheng ji kao he gong zuo de tong zhi 
dui ci zuo le jin yi bu gui ding 
wo sheng xian you de kao he zhi biao ti xi sui ran han gai le jing ji 
zi yuan huan jing he an quan wen ding deng wu da fang mian gong zuo 
te bie shi zai jing ji fa zhan lei zhi biao shang 
cong zui chu de tu chu zong liang he zeng su kao he 
tiao zheng dao zong liang 
zeng su he ren jun zhi biao di kao he 
dan cong zong ti kan 
hai shi pian zhong yu jing ji fa zhan su du he gui mo 
sheng wei chang wei 
sheng wei zu zhi bu bu zhang mao wan chun shuo 
jin nian de kao he zhi biao jiang yao dui zhi biao quan zhong shi dang ruo hua 
jia da jie gou 
xiao yi deng zhi biao di quan zhong 
tong shi geng jia tu chu hui mai zhi li wei zhong dian de sheng tai wen ming jian she 
dang de jian she he zheng fu zhai wu zhuang kuang 
zi ran wen hua zi yuan bao hu 
fu pin kai fa deng kao he zhi biao di quan zhong 
tan suo gan bu nian du lv zhi gong shi zhi 
mu qian wo sheng dui sheng guan ling dao ban zi he gan bu de nian du kao he 
zhu yao shi jiang ge ren min zhu ce ping jie guo he dan wei mu biao ze ren kao he de fen jie he heng liang 
dan shi ban zi ge cheng yuan fen gong bu tong 
gong zuo nan yi cheng du you cha bie 
zhe yang de kao he fang shi ke guan shang you shi gong yun 
mao wan chun zhi yan 
jin hou dui gan bu de nian du kao he 
yao tu chu ge ren gang wei zhi ze lv xing qing kuang de kao he 
tan suo shi xing ge ren nian du lv zhi qing kuang gong shi zhi du 
tong guo ling dao gan bu zai nian zhong kao he ce ping qian 
ji zhong gong shi ben nian du lv zhi qing kuang bao gao 
rang can ping ren yuan chong fen liao jie 
ji zhe chen lin 
ri yue kai xin yuan 
tian di you yi chun 
zhi ci ci jiu ying xin zhi ji 
wo men xiang quan sheng ge zu ren min 
xiang jie fang jun zhu shan bu dui 
wu jing guan bing he gong an min jing 
xiang zai shan gong zuo xue xi de gang ao tai tong bao he wai guo peng you 
xiang guan xin zhi chi shan xi fa zhan de ge jie ren shi 
zhi yi cheng zhi de jie ri wen hou he mei hao de xin nian zhu fu 
ke xue fa zhan de yi nian 
zai dang zhong yang 
guo wu yuan de jian qiang ling dao xia 
sheng zheng fu tuan jie dai ling quan sheng ren min 
shen ru xue xi guan che dang de shi ba da jing shen 
lao lao ba wo wen zhong qiu jin de gong zuo zong ji diao 
jian chi di diao wu shi bu zhang yang 
mai tou ku gan 
kai chuang le xin ju mian 
ying zao le xin feng qi 
qu de le xin cheng ji 
zai zhe yi nian li 
wo men tong chou tui jin diao jie gou yu wen zeng zhang 
nong ye zhan sheng te da han zai shi xian 
gong ye zeng zhang wei ju quan guo qian lie 
dian zi xin xi deng zhuo li da zao de xin zhi zhu chan ye jia su cheng zhang 
wu jia bao chi ji ben wen ding 
quan sheng jing ji wen zhong you jin 
wen zhong xiang hao 
zai zhe yi nian li 
zai pu hui xing zheng ce kuo mian ti biao di tong shi 
chu tai le yi pi xin de zheng ce 
zhong dian zhen jian she 
bao zhang xing an ju gong cheng 
bi zai fu pin yi min ban qian shun li shi shi 
zai zhe yi nian li 
wo men yi gai shan tou zi huan jing cu jin dui wai kai fang 
cong guan jian huan jie ru shou tui jin gai ge 
zhuo li da zao si chou zhi lu jing ji dai xin qi dian 
bei shou guan zhu de san xing xiang mu yi zai shi chan 
ge xiang gai ge cheng xiao ming xian 
zai zhe yi nian li 
wo men hen zhua zhong dian qu yu zhi li 
jie neng jian pai 
nong cun huan jing gai shan 
zhi shu zao lin deng gong zuo 
dan jiang shui zhi bao chi you liang 
xing dong ji hua quan mian shi shi 
ge xiang cuo shi zheng zai zhua jin luo shi 
zai zhe yi nian li 
wo men you xiao ying dui ge zhong zi ran zai hai 
zhu yao he liu zai xun qi hong shui chao chang di qing kuang xia bao chi an lan 
you qi shi mian dui yan an te da hong lao zai hai 
ti qian yu jing bing ji shi zhuan yi an zhi qun zhong 
xun su kai zhan chong jian gong zuo 
que bao le fang wu dao ta he sun hui de qun zhong dou neng an quan wen nuan guo dong 
zai zhe yi nian li 
wo men chi zhi yi heng luo shi zhong yang ba xiang gui ding 
zha shi kai zhan di yi pi qun zhong lu xian jiao yu shi jian huo dong 
da li hong yang yan an jing shen 
li xing qin jian jie yue 
fan dui pu zhang lang fei 
zai quan sheng xing cheng le 
si feng sao chu 
yi xin wei min 
di diao wu shi 
qing zheng lian jie 
de xin feng zheng qi 
quan mian shen hua gai ge de kai ju zhi nian 
ye shi jia kuai jie gou tiao zheng 
da zao shan xi jing ji sheng ji ban de guan jian zhi nian 
wo men yao jian chi yi xi jin ping zong shu ji xi lie zhong yao jiang hua jing shen wu zhuang tou nao 
zhi dao shi jian 
tui dong gong zuo 
jian chi quan mian shen hua gai ge 
kuo da kai fang 
jian chi shi shi wen zhong you wei 
ti zhi zeng xiao zhan lve 
jian chi jia kuai tui jin xin xing cheng zhen hua 
jian chi guan jian zai dang 
dang yao guan dang 
cong yan zhi dang 
quan mian tui jin jing ji 
sheng tai wen ming jian she he dang de jian she 
gao ju zhong guo te se she hui zhu yi wei da qi zhi 
yi deng xiao ping li lun 
san ge dai biao 
zhong yao si xiang 
ke xue fa zhan guan wei zhi dao 
gai ge chuang xin 
gong jian ke nan 
qi xin xie li 
zhen zhua shi gan 
jia kuai jian she fu yu shan xi 
he xie shan xi 
mei li shan xi 
zhu wei da zu guo fan rong chang sheng 
zhu quan sheng ren min xing fu an kang 
zhong gong shan xi sheng wei shan xi sheng ren min zheng fu 
guo jia zhu xi xi jin ping zai ban gong shi fa biao er ling yi si nian xin nian he ci 
xin hua she ji zhe lan hong guang she 
xi jin ping he qi zi peng li yuan zai fu jian dong shan dao 
xi jin ping zai fu zhou dai nv er wan shua 
xi jin ping he mu qin qi xin san bu 
xi jin ping yu fu qin xi zhong xun 
qi zi peng li yuan 
nv er de jia ting zhao 
xi jin ping zai dou bo lin zou shang qiu chang 
yi shi qiu ji 
xin nian qian xi 
guo jia zhu xi xi jin ping tong guo zhong guo guo ji guang bo dian tai 
zhong yang ren min guang bo dian tai 
zhong yang dian shi tai 
fa biao le er ling yi si nian xin nian he ci 
quan wen ru xia 
yi yuan fu shi 
wan xiang geng xin 
wo xiang quan guo ge zu ren min 
xiang xiang gang te bie xing zheng qu tong bao he ao men te bie xing zheng qu tong bao 
xiang tai wan tong bao he hai wai qiao bao 
xiang shi jie ge guo he ge di qu de peng you men 
zhi yi xin nian de zhu fu 
zhu fu lao ren men jian kang 
zhu fu hai zi men kuai le 
zhu fu mei ge jia ting xing fu an kang 
zai zhe ci jiu ying xin zhi ji 
wu shu gong ren 
zhi shi fen zi 
gan bu reng ran jian shou zai gong zuo gang wei 
bu shao tong bao yi ran ben bo zai shi jie ge de wei zu guo xin qin gong zuo 
xu duo ren min jie fang jun he wu jing guan bing 
gong an gan jing zheng zai lv xing guang rong shi ming 
ta men you de yuan li zu guo 
yuan li qin ren 
you de bu neng tong jia ren tuan ju 
wo dai biao zu guo he ren min 
xiang ta men zhi yi cheng zhi de wen hou 
zhu ta men ping an shun li 
dui wo men guo jia he ren min lai shuo shi hen bu ping fan de yi nian 
wo men gong tong zhan sheng le ge zhong kun nan he tiao zhan 
qu de le xin de xian zhu cheng jiu 
cheng ji lai zhi bu yi 
ning ju le da jia de xin xue he han shui 
wo xiang da jia biao shi zhong xin de gan xie 
wo men dui quan mian shen hua gai ge zuo chu zong ti bu shu 
gong tong miao hui le wei lai fa zhan de hong wei lan tu 
wo men jiang zai gai ge de dao lu shang mai chu xin de bu fa 
wo men tui jin gai ge de gen ben mu di 
shi yao rang guo jia bian de geng jia fu qiang 
rang she hui bian de geng jia gong ping zheng yi 
gai ge shi xu yao wo men gong tong wei zhi fen dou de wei da shi ye 
xu yao fu chu jian xin de nu li 
yi fen geng yun 
yi fen shou huo 
zai gai ge kai fang de wei da shi jian zhong 
wo men yi jing chuang zao liao wu shu hui huang 
zhong guo ren min bi jiang chuang zao chu xin de hui huang 
yu zhou hao han 
xing han can lan 
ying gai shou wang xiang zhu 
tong zhou gong ji 
gong tong fa zhan 
zhong guo ren min zhui xun shi xian zhong hua min zu wei da fu xing de zhong guo meng 
ye zhu yuan ge guo ren min neng gou shi xian zi ji de meng xiang 
wo zhen cheng xi wang 
shi jie ge guo ren min zai shi xian ge zi meng xiang de guo cheng zhong xiang hu li jie 
xiang hu bang zhu 
nu li ba wo men lai yi sheng cun de di qiu jian she cheng wei gong tong de mei hao jia yuan 
sheng huo zong shi chong man xi wang de 
cheng gong zong shi shu yu ji ji jin qu 
bu xie zhui qiu de ren men 
wo men zai qian jin de dao lu shang 
hai hui yu dao ge zhong feng xian he tiao zhan 
rang lao bai xing guo shang geng jia xing fu de sheng huo 
hai you da liang gong zuo yao zuo 
wo men yao qian xu jin shen 
jian ku fen dou 
gong tong pu xie wei da zu guo fa zhan de shi dai xin pian zhang 
xie xie da jia 
ban gong shi shou du bao guang shu jia shang bai fang liu zhang zhao pian 
guo jia zhu xi xi jin ping fa biao xin nian he ci 
qi ban gong shi ye shou du bao guang 
tou guo yang shi jing tou ke yi kan dao 
xi jin ping ban gong shi bei jing shi yi fu chang cheng hua zuo 
ban gong zhuo shang you san bu dian hua 
er hong yi bai 
shen hou shu jia shang bai fang le si fu zhao pian 
ta yu jia ren tui zhe lun yi shang de fu qin 
ta qian mu qin de shou san bu 
ta yu fu ren he ying 
ta qi zhe zi xing che zai zhe nv er 
you ce shu jia shang you liang zhang tu pian 
ke yi pan ming yi zhang ta ti zu qiu de zhao pian 
ju yang guang wang 
jin bai wei shi min tou ding hong se fu yun mao 
yi ci pai lie 
yong shen ti zu cheng le yi ge ju da de fu zi yang shi 
shuo dao fu zi 
mei ge ren dou hui xiang dao yu ta xiang guan de you xie ci yu huo zhe cheng yu 
hong fu qi tian 
fu ru dong hai 
zhe shuo ming zhe ge 
zi zong neng gou dai gei wo men da jia hao de yun qi 
zhe bu zai zhe xin nian de di yi tian 
jiu you ren ba 
zi gei wo men ting zhong peng you men song lai le 
nin ke neng jian guo jia men shang dao tie de 
ye ke neng ting guo hen duo dai you 
zi de ge qu 
ren xing fu zi 
zhe ge ci yu wo xiang hen duo ren dou shi tou hui ting shuo 
jin tian wo men jiu rang xiao huo ban men er kai kai yan 
lai dao xi an qu jiang lou guan dao wen hua zhan shi qu 
ren qi hen wang 
bu guo zhe xie ren jin tian dou shi chong zhe zhe 
ren xing fu zi 
yin wei ta men mei ge ren dou shi 
zi de yi bu fen 
shuo dao zhe er ting zhong peng you men ke neng ting de you dian mei mu le 
zhi jian jin bai wei shi min tou ding hong se fu yun mao 
yi ci pai lie 
yong shen ti zu cheng le yi ge ju da de fu zi yang shi 
zi dang zhong mei ge ren dou shi fu zhong zhi yi 
zhong ren qi fu yi shi zu cheng de 
er fu xiang ju 
zhe zhen shi na shi xiang dang de zhuang guan 
dou bu xing ya 
qi zhong yi wei can jia bai 
de nv shi kai xin de shuo dao 
jin tian can jia zhe ge huo dong 
shou xian gan dao fei chang de gao xing 
yin wei zai zhe xin chun jiu yao dao lai zhi ji 
dai gei zi ji 
dai gei peng you 
dai gei da jia 
qi pan wo men shi guo fu min an 
qi wang wo men xing fu xiang ban mei ge ren 
hai you yi wei can jia bai 
de xian sheng ye shu fa le zi ji dui zhe ci huo dong de gan shou 
zhe ge huo dong ye que shi hen you yi yi 
shi zi ji de 
ye shi tian xia ren de 
ye jiu shi shuo 
gei zi ji zhan yi dian fu qi 
ye gei quan sheng ren min 
quan guo ren min dou dai lai yi xie fu qi 
dai lai yi xie xin nian de fu qi 
zhe ci you shan xi guang bo dian shi tai yu xi an qu jiang lou guan dao wen hua zhan shi qu gong tong ju ban de zhe ge lou guan zhong ren bai 
yun fu di ying xin xiang jin zhong de huo dong jiu shi xi wang rang you ke qin shen can yu qi fu na xin huo dong 
gan shou zhong guo chuan tong wen hua de bo da jing shen 
xi an qu jiang lou guan dao wen hua jing qu guan li you xian gong si shi chang ying xiao bu zong jian wang tong shuo 
jin tian wo men zu zhi zhe ge 
zhong ren bai fu 
bai chu de shi ge 
zhong nan shan gu lou guan zhe ge di fang 
wo men tong guo bai chu zhe ge 
di yi ge shi xiang tu chu zhong nan shan gu lou guan 
di er ceng yi si jiu shi tong guo zhe ge 
yi zhong zhu yuan 
zhu yuan guo tai min an 
ren min xing fu 
suo you can yu zhe ye gong tong song chu le ta men de xin sheng 
xin nian kuai le 
fu chuan wan jia 
shan xi guang bo dian shi tai 
xin nian di yi bai huo dong 
yi jing you si ge nian tou le 
zai li nian de 
qi che bai fu 
de ji chu shang 
da dan chuang xin 
jing xin ce hua 
shou ci qi yong ren ti zao xing 
shi yong hang pai qi jin xing pai she 
chang mian shi fen zhuang guan 
wei quan qiu hua ren qi fu 
zhong guo tui chu de zhong da jin rong gai ge cuo shi 
yi ji you guan ren min bi cheng wei quan qiu di er da mao yi rong zi huo bi de bao dao 
rang ren min bi guo ji hua zai ci cheng wei quan qiu da xin wen 
fen xi ren shi ren wei 
zhe xie zhong da jin rong gai ge cuo shi 
you qi shi zhong guo ren min yin hang zhi chi shang hai zi mao qu jian she de ju cuo 
you wang zai xin de yi nian li wei ren min bi guo ji hua ti su 
zhi yu hai wai mei ti yi 
deng ci hui xing rong ren min bi chao yue ou yuan jin sheng di er da mao yi rong zi huo bi de xin wen 
xuan ran zhi wei shen nong 
yin wei geng ju shi ji yi yi de shi zhen zheng yi ren min bi jie suan de mao yi bi zhong 
quan qiu jin rong tong ye he zuo zu zhi zui xin shu ju xian shi 
shen zhi di yu tai zhu he rui dian ke lang 
zhong guo shi shi jie di er da jing ji ti 
ye shi quan qiu zui da chu kou guo he di er da jin kou guo 
guo ji jian shi yong ren min bi de pu ji cheng du yu zhong guo jing ji de zhong yao xing ji bu pi pei 
gen ju hui feng yin hang zhong guo qu shou xi jing ji xue jia qu hong bin de ding yi 
ren min bi guo ji hua jiu shi cu jin ren min bi zai zhong guo nei di yi wai de quan qiu ge ge di qu shi yong de jin cheng 
yi ge yi jing guo ji hua de huo bi 
yi wei zhe ta zai quan qiu ge ge jing ji ti zhi zhong bei guang fan jie shou wei tou zi he chu bei huo bi 
zhong guo yi quan xin de fang shi chang shi kai qi ren min bi guo ji hua jin cheng 
ji zai ren min bi zi ben xiang mu bu neng zi you dui huan de xian zhi xia 
rang ren min bi tong guo kua jing mao yi zou xiang hai wai 
zhong guo ji xu yi zi ji de fang shi he jie zou tui jin ren min bi guo ji hua 
zai cu jin kua jing mao yi he tou zi ren min bi jie suan 
gu li li an shi chang fa zhan geng duo ren min bi jin rong chan pin 
yi ji zhi chi qi ta jing ji ti de yang hang chi you geng duo ren min bi deng san ge fang mian qu de ji ji jin zhan 
yang hang shu ju xian shi 
ren min bi yi tong guo kua jing mao yi jie suan 
ling yi fang mian 
ren min bi li an shi chang de fa zhan chu xian jing zheng tai shi 
da jia ge xian shen tong 
bi ru xiao fang xiang gang de 
xin jia po you le 
tai wan tui chu le 
you yu zai guo ji mao yi he tou zi huo dong zhong shi yong ren min bi di qing kuang ri qu pu bian 
hai wai ge ren he qi ye dui ren min bi jin rong fu wu de xu qiu zhu jian zeng jia 
qu shi hai wai jin rong zhong xin ji ji kuo zhan qi ren min bi ye wu 
quan qiu yi chu xian duo ge li an zhong xin 
bao kuo xiang gang 
xin jia po he tai wan 
xiang gang yi cheng wei quan qiu zui da de li an ren min bi zhong xin 
xin jia po he tai wan jun shi 
jiao lun dun wan liang nian 
xiang gang ren min bi cun kuan yu e chuang xia xin gao 
xiang gang he tai wan ren min bi cun kuan meng zeng 
zha da yin hang ren min bi huan qiu zhi shu 
zha da cheng zhe shi shi chang shang shou ge cong duo fang wei zhui zong li an ren min bi fa zhan de zhi biao 
zhong guo gong bu le yi xi lie zhong da jin rong gai ge cuo shi 
qu hong bin shuo 
shi ba jie san zhong quan hui gong bu de gai ge lan tu hui ying le ci qian shi chang qi dai yi jiu de suo you zhong da jin rong gai ge 
yang hang you gong bu 
guan yu jin rong zhi chi zhong guo 
zi you mao yi shi yan qu jian she de yi jian 
qu hong bin ren wei 
bao han shu ge jing qi zhi chu 
biao ming xiang mu kai fang ke neng jia su 
bao kuo yun xu zi mao qu ju min kai li yi ben bi he wai bi wei dan wei de 
zi you mao yi zhang hu 
yun xu zai zi mao qu gong zuo de ge ren tou zi hai wai deng 
wo men xiang xin ren min bi zi ben xiang mu zi you dui huan de jin zhan su du ke neng chao yu qi 
xia yi bu jiang shi kuo da kua jing tou zi liu dong 
wei lai ji ge ji du li 
da jia yao zhun bei hao ying jie yi xi lie ju ti cuo shi de shi shi 
mei yin mei lin ce lve shi cui wei ren wei 
gen ju yang hang 
zhe yi wei zhe zhong guo de zi ben xiang mu kai fang ke neng jiao yu qi geng kuai 
dui zi jin zhuan zhang e du bing wu ming que xian zhi 
zhe shi zhong yao de yi bu 
ji zhe lin jian yang chen ji 
yang hang biao tai ji xu shi shi wen jian huo bi zheng ce bao chi shi du liu dong xing 
hui yi qiang diao 
ji xu shi shi wen jian de huo bi zheng ce 
bao chi shi du liu dong xing 
shi xian huo bi xin dai ji she hui rong zi gui mo he li zeng zhang 
xia yi jie duan zhu yao zheng ce si lu 
de bu fen ze bing mei you 
bao chi shi du liu dong xing 
gai bao gao dui yu xia yi jie duan de liu dong xing de guan li gong zuo biao shu wei 
jia qiang liu dong xing zong zha men de tiao jie zuo yong 
yin dao huo bi xin dai ji she hui rong zi gui mo ping wen shi du zeng zhang 
hua qi ji tuan da zhong hua qu shou xi jing ji xue jia shen ming gao ren wei 
bao chi shi du liu dong xing 
de ti fa bing bu neng li jie wei pian xiang kuan song 
yuan lai shi shuo 
bu song bu jin 
bao chi shi du liu dong xing 
ke neng shi dui mu qian zi jin cheng ben bi jiao gao you suo jing ti 
ru guo zhe ge zi jin cheng ben bao chi xia qu 
guo kai zheng quan hong guan fen xi shi du zheng zheng biao shi 
li lv chi xu bao chi gao wei 
ru guo shi jian guo chang 
dui wei lai zhong guo jing ji zeng zhang hui you fu mian ying xiang 
jue ce ceng dui ci you suo jing ti 
wei lai huo bi zheng ce ke neng you dang qian de zhong xing lve jin wei diao zhi zhong xing 
zai ci ci di si ji du li hui shang 
yang hang huo bi zheng ce wei yuan hui qiang diao 
yao gai shan he you hua rong zi jie gou he xin dai jie gou 
tong shi yu gai ge yu tiao kong zhi zhong 
zeng qiang jin rong yun xing xiao lv he fu wu shi ti jing ji neng li 
jin yi bu tui jin li lv shi chang hua he ren min bi hui lv xing cheng ji zhi gai ge 
bao chi ren min bi hui lv zai he li jun heng shui ping shang de ji ben wen ding 
zhong guo yin lian ri qian fa bu yuan dan 
chun jie an quan yong ka ti shi 
ti xing yin lian ka chi ka ren zeng qiang zhi fu an quan yi shi 
ti gao feng xian fang fan neng li 
zhong guo yin lian ti shi 
zai wang luo gou wu shi ying yan ge bao mi ge ren xin xi 
zhu yi shi bie diao yu wang zhan 
shen fen zheng hao 
yin hang ka hao 
jiao yi duan xin yan zheng ma 
yi ji xin yong ka you xiao qi 
bei mian qian ming tiao shang shu zi de hou san wei 
deng ge ren xin xi wu bi tuo shan bao guan 
ren he suo yao duan xin yan zheng ma de xing wei dou shi zha pian 
zai deng lu wang zhi shi 
bu yao qing xin 
gou wu wang zhan 
bing jing ti tong guo you jian 
liao tian gong ju fa lai de suo wei 
an quan zhong xin 
ren zheng zhong xin 
dan bao ping tai 
deng diao yu wang zhan lian jie 
zhi fu shi liu yi 
wan cheng wang gou ding dan jin ru zhi fu ye mian shi 
wang zhi qian zhui hui bian cheng 
biao shi shu ju chuan shu jia mi 
ruo zhi fu ye mian wang zhi qian zhui reng shi 
qing ti gao jing ti 
ji zhe lin xiao li 
yang hang guan yuan 
shuo ren min bi dui bu qi ren min tai pian mian 
xian zai you ren ti chu ren min bi dui bu qi ren min de kou hao 
zhe shi yi zhong pian mian de 
wei fan jing ji gui lv he jing ji xue chang shi de wu dao 
ren min bi hui lv chi xu xiao fu sheng zhi 
zhu bu xiang jun heng hui gui 
zhe shi dui yi wang ren min bi dui wai jia zhi chang qi di gu de shi chang jiao zheng 
er cong li shi shu ju he guo ji bi jiao kan 
zui jin shi duo nian lai wo guo tong zhang dou chu yu jiao di shui ping 
yang hang diao tong si si zhang sheng song cheng ri qian yi qi ge ren ming yi zhuan wen biao shi 
ying gai zheng que ren shi he dui dai ren min bi 
wai sheng nei bian 
qi shi wo guo jing ji fa zhan de jie duan xing xian xiang 
yao ji ji kuo da nei xu 
cu jin jing ji wai bu jun heng 
cong gen ben shang huan jie ren min bi sheng zhi ya li 
er zai ren min bi sheng zhi de zhe duan shi jian li 
ren min bi cheng xian dui wai sheng zhi 
dui nei bian zhi de xian xiang 
dui yu you ren wei 
ren min bi dui bu qi ren min 
sheng song cheng zhi chu 
zhe shi yi zhong pian mian de 
wei fan jing ji gui lv he jing ji xue chang shi de wu dao 
nan dao tong huo jin suo 
wu jia xia jiang 
shi ye zeng zhang 
jing ji xia hua 
ren min bi jiu dui de qi ren min le ma 
nan dao ren min bi bu sheng zhi 
ji xu bao chi cu fang shi wai xiang xing jing ji fa zhan mo shi 
da liang wai hui liu ru 
guo nei liu dong xing fan lan 
tong zhang gao qi 
ren min bi jiu dui de qi ren min le ma 
zai sheng song cheng kan lai 
wai sheng nei bian 
shi wo guo jing ji fa zhan de jie duan xing xian xiang 
wo guo mao yi shun cha gui mo reng ran jiao da 
shi wo guo wai hui chu bei ji xu jiao kuai zeng zhang 
ren min bi gong bu ying qiu 
zhe shi mu qian ren min bi chi xu sheng zhi de zhu yao yuan yin 
sheng song cheng zhi chu 
ying gai zheng que ren shi he dui dai ren min bi 
wai sheng nei bian 
yi shi yao ji ji kuo da nei xu 
cu jin jing ji wai bu jun heng 
cong gen ben shang huan jie ren min bi sheng zhi ya li 
er shi jia kuai tui jin ren min bi zi ben xiang mu ke dui huan 
jia kuai qi ye 
xing cheng zi ben shuang xiang dui chen liu dong qu dao 
san shi shen hua jing ji ti zhi gai ge 
jia kuai zhuan bian jing ji zeng zhang fang shi 
you hua chan ye jie gou 
zhu bu xing cheng yi ke ji jin bu he chuang xin wei he xin de xin de zeng zhang dong li 
si shi he li kong zhi huo bi gong ying liang zeng zhang 
bao chi wu jia ji ben wen ding 
bing qi kao huo bi xin dai kuo zhang he da gui mo zi jin tou ru de fa zhan fang shi 
bao chi he li de she hui rong zi gui mo 
sheng song cheng xi yang hang diao cha tong ji si si zhang 
zuo tian yi zao 
he sheng yuan fa bu gong gao cheng 
tong guo qi quan zi kong gu de liang jia guo nei zi gong si 
chang sha ying ke gong si zhu ying ye wu wei sheng chan ying you er pei fang nai fen 
chu le zhe yi an quan shi jian 
yi zhi wei hui fu yuan qi 
ye ji di mi 
zhi ai shi jian hou 
nan shan nai fen pin pai shou sun 
shi de he sheng yuan neng yi he shi de jia ge jin xing shou gou 
ru ye fen xi shi song liang biao shi 
zhe ci shou gou de gong chang zheng ge sheng chan xian hai shi bi jiao xian jin de 
shou gou jia bing bu suan gui 
ji zhe hu xiao hong 
bing du huo da ma deng du pin hui shi ren chan sheng huan jue 
you ru zhi shen piao miao de ji le shi jie 
yin er wu shu ren shen xian qi zhong 
ning yuan qing jin jia cai 
zhi qiu guo yi kou yin 
cong ming de hai tun fa xian qi shi yong de hai tun yu zai jin zhang zhuang tai xia hui shi fang yi zhong 
hai tun men tong guo wei he xiao yu 
kai shi zhang wo le ru he rang zi ji chi fan 
ju ying guo hai tun ji lu pian shi pin xian shi 
hai tun zai xuan ding mu biao hai tun yu hou 
hui xian xiao yao ji kou 
ran hou zai yu er zhou wei rao zhe quan you 
jiu xiang zai xi shua wan ju yi ban 
zhe yang yi lai 
hai tun yu kai shi jin zhang 
ti nei bian hui shi fang yi zhong qiang da de du su 
gai du su ruo ji liang guo da 
bian you zhi ming de sha shang li ; dan ruo ji liang hen xiao 
ze hui rang hai tun xian ru ma zui zhuang tai 
cong ming de hai tun jiu zhe yang lve shi xiao ji 
yi bian xiang yong zhe du pin 
dong wu xue jia luo bo pi li zhi chu 
zai shi yong hai tun yu zhi hou 
hai tun de xing wei hui fei chang guai yi 
ta men jiang bi zi shen chu shui mian 
si hu zai xiang shou 
du pin yin qi de 
zhe yu zhi qian ren men tian shi chan chu hou yun xuan de wu yi shi zhuang tai hen lei si 
zhe zhong qing jing tai bu ke si yi le 
song xia fa bu xin xing gao su sao miao yi 
ci ci fa bu de liang kuan xin xing gao su sao miao yi 
rong he zui xin de song xia du chuang ji shu he 
gao xiao wen dang jie jue fang an 
zai song xia yi jing ling xian de jiao yu hang ye shi chang zhong 
xin chan pin geng jia shi ying jiao yu hang ye yong hu ri chang ye wu xu qiu 
gao su sao miao yi xin chan pin zai tui chu zhi qian 
song xia ye zuo chu le da liang de zhuan ye ce shi gong zuo he yong hu xu qiu de diao cha 
yi qiu wei guang da xiao fei zhe ti gong geng jia wan shan de chan pin 
song xia dian qi 
you xian gong si xi tong tong xin ying xiao gong si xi shan hao zong jing li biao shi 
jin nian lai zhong guo zheng fu dui yu jiao yu chan ye de tou ru jia da 
tong shi ban sui wen bu zeng zhang de jin rong hang ye xu qiu 
song xia fa bu le zhe liang kuan zhong gao duan sao miao yi chan pin 
qi wang song xia gao su sao miao yi zai zhong guo shi chang neng gou geng jia fu he yong hu de xu qiu 
wei zhong guo geng duo de hang ye yong hu ti gong gao xiao de chan pin he bian jie de fu wu 
wu shui di nuan xin ji shu tong guo jian ding 
you he nan rui bang huan jing ke ji you xian gong si 
zheng zhou da xue he zheng zhou rui bang shu ma de nuan ke ji you xian gong si lian he yan fa de 
kong qi yuan re beng wu shui di nuan xi tong ji shu ji chan pin 
zai bei jing tong guo guo jia ji jian ding 
shu ju biao ming 
he chuan tong de kong qi re beng he di ban cai nuan xiang bi 
tu wei ji shu ren yuan zai xian chang yan shi qi yuan li 
ji zhe zhao shu yan 
luo yue cheng gong ji nian you piao jin fa xing 
zhong guo shou ci luo yue cheng gong ji nian 
gai you piao nei rong fen bie wei chang e san hao zhuo lu qi he yu tu hao yue qiu che 
gai tao you piao cai yong lian piao de xing shi she ji 
hua mian geng jia hong da 
cong yu tu hao zai yue mian liu xia de di yi xing zhong guo jiao yin 
dao zai yue qiu shang zhan xian wu xing hong qi 
biao zhi zhe zhong guo cheng wei shi jie shang di san ge you neng li du li zi zhu shi shi yue qiu ruan zhuo lu de guo jia 
zhong guo shou ci luo yue cheng gong ji nian 
zhong guo jiao yu he ke yan ji suan ji wang zhu gan wang he zhong dian xue ke xin xi fu wu ti xi sheng ji kuo rong gong cheng 
jiao yu bu zu zhi de yan shou zhuan jia zu zhi chu 
wei xia yi dai hu lian wang ji wei lai wang luo ji shu chuang xin ti gong le bi yao de chuan shu ji chu 
sui zhe hu lian wang de fa zhan 
da shu ju shi dai dao lai 
wu lun shi jiao yu ke yan 
hai shi jing ji sheng huo 
dui hu lian wang de dai kuan yao qiu yue lai yue gao 
dui gao su wang luo de xu qiu yue lai yue jin po 
jiao yu ke yan xue shu wang luo cheng wei ling tou yang 
zhong guo jiao yu he ke yan ji suan ji wang zhu gan wang he zhong dian xue ke xin xi fu wu ti xi sheng ji kuo rong gong cheng 
huo de fa gai wei 
jiao yu bu deng bu men pi fu qi dong 
kuo zhan kuo rong de zhong guo jiao yu he ke yan ji suan ji wang gao su guang chuan shu wang quan bu cai yong guo chan she bei 
zhi de yi ti de shi 
wei wo guo gao deng jiao yu he ke ji chuang xin ti gong le zhong yao de xin xi zi yuan 
zhong guo jiao yu he ke yan ji suan ji wang zhuan jia wei yuan hui zhu ren 
qing hua da xue ji suan ji xi zhu ren wu jian ping jiao shou shuo 
bu jin cong wang luo rong liang he dai kuan 
ye cong wang luo an quan he guan li shang shang le yi ge da tai jie 
wei wo guo gao xiao jiao xue 
ke yan fa zhan ti gong le zhong yao zhi cheng 
shi wo guo jiao yu xin xi hua zhong yao ji chu she shi shuai xian da dao shi jie xian jin shui ping 
ji zhe li bin 
ju ou zhou mei ti jin ri bao dao 
xin kuan xi lie shi ji yu shi shang zui chang xiao pi ka de chong xin she ji 
xiao xi ren shi cheng 
mei guo lv ye ji tuan zhuan wei zhan dou che ti gong lv zhi fang dan bo li 
tong yong qi che yi jing xiang gai ji tuan shen qing 
yao qiu ti gong jun yong ji jin shu 
la dong fu te qi che xiao liang 
gong si fei chang zhong shi 
dong li qiang han 
chu xian ren he wen ti dou hui ying xiang xiao liang 
fu te yi jing yu ji dao ming nian xiao liang jiang hui xia hua 
zhe ye shi bai zai ji jiang shang ren de shou xi zhi xing guan mian qian de ju da tiao zhan 
qu nian di te lv che zhan shang 
zhe ci xin kuan fa bu mian lin ju da ya li 
qi che zhi zao zhuan jia he gang tie hang ye zhuan ye ren shi cheng cai yong lv zhi che shen shi yi xiang gen ben xing de zhuan bian 
fu te yin wei zhao hui shi jian sun shi yan zhong 
yin ci xin zeng ji qian ming yuan gong 
bao kuo ji shu gong cheng shi zhi chi xin kuan che xing fa bu bing chu li gong si zheng mian lin de wen ti 
fu te da yue xu yao liu zhou de shi jian dui mei liang pi ka jin xing chong zu 
yu qi shuo gai che shi ben chi xin ji de ban ben 
an zhao guan li 
de guo yi jia ming wei - de ben chi wang zhan gong bu le xi lie de wai guan tao jian 
zai bu gai bian yuan che dong li zong cheng de ji chu shang 
shi che xing wai guan dai you ji jin de che xing de te zheng 
gai che you ming 
da pei si su shou dong bian su xiang 
cai yong san chong wei bo hua you qi 
mu qian yi jing jing guo le wan quan xiu fu 
de guo dai mu lei qi che ji tuan dang ri biao shi 
da po le li shi zui gao ji lu 
zhe ge shu zi ye da po le gong si qu nian de ji lu 
guo qu yi nian 
dai mu lei yi fen guan shi chang ying xiao de gao guan zhi chu 
tui chu le hen duo xin che xing 
bing shi zhong guan che 
zui hao de ke hu ti yan 
de ying xiao mo shi 
you qi shi ben chi ji che zai zhong guo shi chang shen shou huan ying 
bao kuo xin jian yi zuo yin qing gong chang 
ba xi xian zai ye cheng wei le dai mu lei gong si yi ge zhong yao de ji de 
yi hou zhe li hui cheng wei ben chi ji he ji xin de sheng chan ji de 
zai fa guo a er bei si shan du jia sheng di 
tou bu yan zhong shou shang 
ge jie fen fen dui ci biao shi guan qie 
shu ma he yi wai shi gu wai jie duo fang biao shi guan qie 
wo men xi wang shu ma he ke fu shang bing 
zao ri kang fu 
de zhi ci xiao xi wo hen zhen jing 
tong shi xi wang shu ma he hui jin kuai hao zhuan 
xi wang ta de jia ren neng gou jian qiang mian dui 
shu ma he de qian fa la li tuan dui 
ting dao dui you de shi gu 
fa la li de mei ge ren dou yi zhi chu yu jiao lv zhuang tai 
mei sai de si - ben chi sai che he / de tuan dui xuan bu 
de zhi ta de bing qing wei zhong 
wo men hen zhen jing 
xian zai wo men zheng mi qie guan zhu lai zi ge lei nuo bu er fang mian de zui xin yi liao gong gao 
wo men dou zhi dao mai ke er yi zhi jian qiang 
yu shang tong de 
ta you wo men suo you de li liang he zhi chi 
shu ma he de tong bao nuo wei ci ji zai shang shuo 
wo yu shu ma ke tong zai 
dang wo de zhi mai ke er de da nao you ce shou shang shi 
wo bu jin xiang dao ai er dun 
dang ran wo zhong xin xi wang 
zhe yi shi jian neng you yi ge geng hao de jie ju 
wo xiang xin ta de yi zhi li he jin qu xin 
yi ji shen ti ji chu hui dai gei ta zui hao de zhuan ji 
qian fa la li dui you ma sa zai tui te shang xie dao 
wo qi qiu shang di lai bao hu ni 
qian / che shou da wei - ku ta gao su 
wo zhi dao mai ke er chu shen sai che dao 
hao wu yi wen 
wo xiang xin ta de ti neng ke yi ying dui zhe yi tiao zhan 
ta yi sheng zhong zui da de tiao zhan 
/ shuang shi jie guan jun 
fei er nan duo - a long suo 
zhu mai ke er zao ri kang fu ! xi wang hen kuai ting dao yi xie ji ji de xiao xi ! qiang ren 
ru guo you shen me ren neng gou zhan sheng zhe ge 
na yi ding shi ta 
wo hen zhen jing 
ta de jiao ke neng peng dao le yi kuai shi tou 
bu ying gai su du tai kuai 
fou ze hui shang dao zi ji 
zai zhe ge jian nan de shi ke 
wo yu mai ke er tong zai 
mai ke er bi ren he ren dou geng you li liang du guo nan guan 
wang ji ban qiu ba 
he mai ke er zhan zai yi qi 
ji lan bo ji ni de guan fang tu pian fa bu zhi hou 
ri qian wo men you zai wang luo shang huo de le zhe kuan che chang peng ban che xing de jia xiang tu 
ju zui xin xiao xi 
cong jia xiang tu lai kan 
ci ci bao guang de lan bo ji ni chang peng ban zai wai guan fang mian yu qi ying ding ban che xing bao chi gao du yi zhi 
xin che qian da deng 
qian jin qi kou 
wei deng dou jing guo quan xin she ji 
ju hai wai mei ti bao dao 
dong li fang mian 
ben tian zhen dui yin du he dong nan ya shi chang tui chu le quan xin feng fan te bie ban che xing 
ben tian quan xin feng fan te bie ban 
che shen yan se bu fen 
wai guan fang mian 
xin che xiang bi pu tong ban che xing geng you yun dong qi xi 
qi qian lian cai yong le du te de hei se jin qi ge zha she ji 
che shen di bu hai zhuang pei you bao wei 
wei bu fang mian 
quan xin feng fan te bie ban hai you yi ge chi cun jiao da de rao liu ban 
ben tian quan xin feng fan te bie ban 
dong li xi tong fang mian 
bao ma yan fa zong jian xiang de guo 
fa lan ke fu hui bao 
bao ma he feng tian yi jing da cheng xie yi 
xie shou da zao pao che ping tai 
bao ma yu feng tian he zuo xie shou da zao pao che ping tai 
wo men shuang fang yi jing da cheng gong shi 
ji yu lian he jia gou da zao quan xin pao che 
zhong yao de shi xin kuan pao che you liang zhong bu tong de che xing 
ge zi chuan cheng liang ge pin pai de you shi 
bao liu pin pai de te dian 
kai zhan yan fa li kong qi dian chi 
qing liang hua ji shu deng duo ling yu he zuo 
ta dang shi hai biao shi 
you guan ju ti he zuo shi yi 
biao shi bu yuan tou lu guo duo xi jie 
wo men huo de le zhe kuan che zui xin shi che die zhao 
qi wai guan she ji jie jian le yi xie zai shou che xing de de she ji li nian 
qi qian lian de da zui shi she ji he qian jin qi ge zha she ji yu lu hu chan pin fei chang xiang si 
xin che hai pei bei you quan chi cun bei tai 
shou xian zhu da jia yuan dan kuai le 
zai xin de yi nian li wan shi ru yi 
cai yuan guang jin 
dan shi hui gu zhe yi nian 
zhi neng shou ji shi chang hai shi yong xian ge zhong zhi zui zhi neng shou ji 
you wai xing qi pa de 
you xing neng qiang han de 
ta men de chu xian 
er xian zai ye yi jing jin ru le zhun bei hui jia guo nian de jie zou 
ru guo shuo ni da suan zai zhe ge shi jian jie dian huan gou shou ji 
ni ke yi guo nian gen jia li ren xuan yao 
an zhe ke shi mu qian zui da ping mu gao xiang su de zhi neng shou ji 
xiang xin hui shi yi jian hen you mian zi er de shi qing 
jin tian bi zhe jiu lai wei da jia pan dian yi xia 
wang nian de zhe ge shi hou 
xin pin shang wei zai guo nei shang shi 
neng mai dao de da duo shi shui huo 
tu hao jin de re du yi jing guo le 
zai zhe kuan shou ji fa bu zhi hou 
hen duo mei ti he ye nei ren shi huo duo huo shao dou jue de chuang xin bu zu 
mei shen me xin yi 
qi shi chuang xin hai shi you de 
chu le bian ping hua de she ji 
sui ran hai shi shuang he 
xiang xin ye mei you ji ge ren shuo zhe kuan shou ji bu liu chang 
pei zhi bu xing 
zhen dui shou ji jia su du ji 
zhi chi zhi wen shi bie ji shu 
pai zhao fang mian 
shi de jin guang liang da fu gai shan 
yi ji - man su she ying gong neng 
ling wai zai ji shen bei bu shou ci she you shuang shan guang deng 
yi ke wei bai se 
yi ke wei nuan se 
yi huo de zheng que de se cai tiao jie ping heng 
xin de yi nian de di yi pian zhang jiu yao kai shi le 
you hui gu ye you zhan wang 
xin de yi nian bi ran you hen duo xin ji fa bu 
bu guo zai guo nian zhi qian kan lai shi mei you tai duo xi wang ke yi mai dao xin de chan pin le 
ji ran xin de yi nian dao le 
you zhe me ba kuan shou ji shi da jia guan zhu zui duo de 
zhe xie shou ji jue dui shi zai nian qian ke yi ru shou de ji xing 
bing qie mai le zhe xie shou ji 
si hao dou bu yong dan xin 
mei you zhi yi 
jin nian ping guo gong si cai yong le zhu da yan se de lu xian 
yi ran huo de le cheng gong 
ke jian da jia gou mai ping guo shou ji bing bu shi yin wei ping guo cai yong le xin de yan se 
pin zhi he pin pai ying xiang yi ran zuo you zhe shi chang 
hai jia ru le zhi wen shi bie jie suo gong neng 
zhen dui shou ji jia su du ji 
zhi chi zhi wen shi bie ji shu 
pai zhao fang mian 
shi de jin guang liang da fu gai shan 
yi ji - man su she ying gong neng 
ling wai zai ji shen bei bu shou ci she you shuang shan guang deng 
yi ke wei bai se 
yi ke wei nuan se 
yi huo de zheng que de se cai tiao jie ping heng 
cong xi an shi cai zheng ju chuan lai xi bao 
shi xian san nian fan yi fan 
ti qian liang nian wan cheng 
gui hua mu biao 
quan shi cai shui xi tong wei rao shi wei 
shi zheng fu gong zuo zhong dian 
ning ju li liang 
duo cuo bing ju 
jian chi wen zeng zhang 
yuan man wan cheng le quan nian cai zheng shou zhi ren wu 
gen ju kuai bao tong ji 
shi xian san nian fan yi fan 
you li bao zhang le jing ji she hui fa zhan zhong dian zhi chu xu qiu 
jin nian yi lai 
shi zheng fu yi tui jin 
wu xiang zhong dian gong zuo 
ji ji shi shi jia su gan chao zhan lve 
quan shi jing ji yun xing zong ti cheng xian wen zhong you sheng 
fa zhan xiang hao de tai shi 
wei cai zheng shou ru shi xian jiao kuai zeng zhang dian ding le jian shi ji chu 
quan shi cai shui xi tong shi zhong ba 
fang zai tu chu wei zhi 
quan li tui jin zong he zhi shui 
yan fa zong he zhi shui wang luo jian kong ping tai 
wan shan gong jian yuan qu shui kuan dian zi hua zhuan xi tong 
xiu ding qi ye kua qu xian qian yi cai shui li yi tiao zheng ban fa 
diao dong le ge fang mian zu zhi shou ru ji ji xing 
cai zheng bao zhang neng li jia da 
cai zheng de bao zhang neng li jin yi bu jia da 
san chan ye fa zhan 
yong yu gong ye zhi zao ye na shui xian jin qi ye jiang li 
zhuang bei zhi zao ye zhong dian qi ye shui lie zhi shou fan huan he wei bei gong ye yuan qu jian she 
zeng qiang quan shi gong ye jing ji ke chi xu fa zhan hou jin 
zhi chi qi ye chuang xin neng li jian she 
tui jin tong chou ke ji zi yuan gai ge he gao xin ji shu chan ye fa zhan 
hai tong guo tou zi yin dao 
zhu bao jin dai kuan deng 
tui jin chan ye tou rong zi ti xi jian she 
fa hui le cai zheng zi jin 
si liang bo qian jin 
wei tui jin qu xian jing ji tu po fa zhan 
you li zhi chi le qu xian gong ye yuan qu he cheng zhen ji chu she shi jian she 
nong cun sheng tai huan jing gai shan 
fu pin kai fa deng 
zeng qiang le qu xian zi wo fa zhan neng li 
bao zhang he gai shan min sheng cheng xiao ming xian 
zhuo li jie jue qun zhong guan xin de kun nan wen ti 
zhu yao yong yu shi shi 
xue qian jiao yu san nian xing dong ji hua 
qi dong da bing yi bao shi dian 
tui jin yang lao fu wu ti xi jian she 
gong ji jin zeng zhi shou yi 
di fang zhai quan deng duo qu dao chou ji zi jin zhi chi tui jin bao zhang xing zhu fang jian she 
wei ti gao cai zheng zi jin shi yong xiao yi 
ba qian hua zai dao ren shang 
shi cai zheng shen ru tui jin zhuan xiang zi jin guan li gai ge 
zai jia da zhuan xiang zi jin qing li zheng he de ji chu shang 
she ji wen hua 
huan bao deng ling yu 
shi dian xiang mu mian xiang she hui gong kai zheng ji 
shi fu he tiao jian de xiang mu dan wei dou you ji hui can yu jing zheng 
shi xian le cai zheng zhuan xiang zi jin fen pei cong 
da dao le duo zhong xuan hao 
hao zhong xuan you de mu di 
jia qiang jian du jian cha he ji xiao ping jia 
chu bu jian li le 
shi qian que ding ji xiao mu biao 
shi zhong jia qiang jian du guan li 
shi hou shi shi ji xiao ping jia 
de quan cheng ji xiao guan li ti xi 
qie shi ti gao le cai zheng zi jin shi yong xiao yi 
ji zhe cheng hui 
xin xi lan de chun jing mei jing 
rang ren xiang wang 
na li feng fu de zi ran sheng tai yu min su feng qing 
ye yin ren ru sheng 
dai shang hai zi yi qi qu xin xi lan ba 
yi tong gan shou da zi ran de ye qu wu xian 
shou huo yi fen nan yi wang huai de mei hao hui yi 
gan shou yuan wei nan ji 
dai zhe xiao peng you qu xin xi lan lv you 
gan shou sheng tai yu dong wu bu ke cuo guo 
ji du cheng de yuan wei nan ji ti yan jiu fei chang zhi de yi kan 
xin xi lan shi li nan ji zui jin de guo jia zhi yi 
ji du cheng shi jin ru nan ji de men hu 
zai zhe li gan shou nan ji ke wei shi yuan zhi yuan wei 
ti yan guan li bing tian xue di 
nan ji feng bao 
mei ban xiao shi kai qi yi ci 
pei yi bi zhen de sheng guang xiao guo he nan ji shi di ying xiang 
fang fu qin li nan ji de e lie tian qi 
zui ci ji de shi gong you ren cheng zuo de 
nan ji xue de che 
di bu du te de lv dai she ji shi ta neng zai ren he fu za de di xing shang ru lv ping di 
dai zhe you ren zai mo ni de nan ji di xing shang pa po 
qie shen gan shou nan ji kao cha de jian xin 
zai nan ji shui zu guan he qi e bao hu zhong xin 
you ren ke jin ju li guan kan nan ji hai yang sheng wu he xin xi lan du te de wang qi e 
zhe shi ling ren lian ai 
bu shi jian dao ta men qiang shi di qing jing geng shi ke ai zhi ji 
fan zhou ying huo chong dong 
wei duo mo ying huo chong dong wei yu xin xi lan bei dao dong an 
yin qi di xia rong dong xian xiang er wen ming 
shi xin xi lan zui you ming de tian ran qi jing 
zhe li shi yi chu shi fen nan de de huo xing yan shi dong xue 
yue xing cheng yu yi wan wu qian nian qian 
dong xue shang xia dou you tong kou 
xi yin xu duo kun chong ru nei fan zhi 
qi zhong ying huo chong shi zhe dong xue zhong zhen zheng zhu ren 
ying huo chong tu zhe yi li li ru zhu zi ban de zhan si 
yi ji wei bu fa chu de lan se ying guang 
xing luo qi bu pan fu zai yan dong shen chu de shang fang 
xiang ji le man tian xing dou 
yan zhe dong zhong shi jie er xia 
deng shang he bian de xiao chuan 
ni jian jian jiu hui jin ru shen shou bu jian wu zhi de hei an zhong 
dao you hui yong shou la zhe sheng suo tui dong xiao chuan qian jin 
zhi you qing qing de shui sheng 
bu zhi bu jue yi chu zai yi pian 
tou ding si hu you tiao qian lv de guang he zai liu dong 
lv se de guang dian ru man tian fan xing 
shan shan shuo shuo 
mi ji chu ceng ceng die die 
xi shu chu wei guang dian dian 
yuan yuan wang qu 
fang fu wan jia deng huo 
dao ying zai shui mian shang 
ru wan zhu ying jing 
mei bu sheng shou 
huo bi tun gan shou 
zhong tu shi jie 
huo bi te ren 
ru guo cong ao ke lan qu che qian wang xiao zhen 
yan tu jin shi xin xi lan di qu mian yan qi fu de shan luan he wu shu qing cui de mu chang 
zhong tu shi jie 
de zhuang li feng jing yi lu xiang ban 
dang chuan guo yi ge ju da de mu yang nong chang hou 
jiu neng kan dao yin ni yu mei li qun luan zhi jian de huo bi te cun 
zheng ru ying pian zhong yi yang 
huo bi te cun shi yi pian tian jing mei li de shi wai tao yuan 
xiao xi yi wei zhe cun zi jing jing de liu tang 
chu chu jin shi chun jing mi ren de tian yuan feng qing 
zai lian mian qing cui de shan po shang 
ban yuan xing de huo bi te ren dong xue xiao wu xiang qian zai ban shan yao li 
cuo luo you zhi 
li ba he hua yuan dou ling ren jue de fang fu jin ru le dian ying zhong 
chu le can guan zhi wai 
ye zheng chang ying ye 
bu fang zai zhe chong man mo huan feng qing de jiu guan nei 
dian shang yi bei huo bi te ren de pi jiu 
gan shou qi miao le qu 
da ren jiao ni wan 
lv you da ren 
mu qian ren shen zhen guo lv xin jing jie ao niu bu xin xi lan zhuan xian jing li 
ceng wei ao niu bu zhuan xian ling dui bing duo ci qian wang xin xi lan 
bei dao dao yu wan 
nan dao dong xi hai an 
shen zhi si tu er te dao 
dou ta zu guo 
dui xin xi lan dang di ge ge cheng shi he jing dian fei chang shu xi 
ta yi zhi ren wei 
lv xing shi yi zhong xin qing 
lv xing ye shi rang zi ji chong xin ren shi zi ji 
chong xin zheng zhuang chu fa de mei hao ji hui 
ying jie xin xian shi wu de tong shi 
xi wang ye neng zhao dao zui shi he zi ji de sheng huo fang shi 
da ren zhi zhao 
nan ji zhong xin de zhan guan li hai chen lie zhe nan ji gong zuo zhan de ge zhong jiao tong gong ju 
yi ji ge guo zai nan ji de gong zuo zhan zhao pian 
wen xian zi liao 
yu jiao yu le 
zhi de yi kan 
xin xi lan de ying huo chong you bie yu qi ta di fang de ying huo chong 
dui sheng cun huan jing de yao qiu jin hu ke ke 
yu dao guang xian he sheng yin bian wu fa sheng cun 
yin ci ren men wu fa zai ying shi zuo pin zhong xin shang dao 
lian lv you xuan chuan zhao pian dou qu zhi ke shu 
zhi de yi qu 
jian yi yong yi liang wan de shi jian zhu su dang di nong zhuang 
zhu zai shu shi di dang de ren de jia ting li gan shou xin xi lan ren de re qing hao ke 
tou piao jie shu 
zhong guo shou bu 
zheng shi shi shi 
xiang guan xin wen pai ming di yi 
you tou piao jie guo kan chu 
zhong guo shou bu 
zheng shi shi shi de xiang guan nei rong de dao guang da wang you de gao du guan zhu 
shi er jie quan guo ren da chang wei hui di er ci hui yi dui lv you fa cao an jin xing le di san ci shen yi 
zeng jia le dui lv you zhe quan yi bao hu de li du 
bing dui kong zhi jing qu men piao jia ge shang zhang 
ling fu tuan fei 
wen ti deng fang mian dou ti chu le geng wei yan ge de gui ding he yao qiu 
zheng shi shi shi 
guo jia lv you ju fu ju zhang du yi li biao shi 
chuang zao le zui hao de wai bu huan jing 
jiang shi lv you hang ye zou chu guai quan 
you you ke zai can jia wan 
lv xing tuan hou shuo dao 
cong tou dao wei de xing cheng 
dao you dou mei an pai gou wu 
chun wan de gan jue 
lv jin bu zhi 
wen ming chu jing you cong ni wo zuo qi deng nei rong ye shu you ke guan zhu re dian 
pai zai de piao bang qian shi wei zhi nei 
gong bu ru xia 
zhong guo shou bu 
zheng shi shi shi 
zhong hua ren min gong he guo lv you fa 
mian dui dang qian lv you shi chang de zhong zhong luan xiang 
guo jia li fa ji guan xi wang tong guo zhe ge zhong guo shou bu yong yu gui fan lv you shi chang zhi xu de zong he xing fa lv 
ta shang lv tu 
de zhong guo lao bai xing ti gong geng hao de fa lv bao zhang 
lv jin bu zhi 
yi jing bei bao guang hen duo nian le 
dan yi zhi mei you de dao gen zhi 
xiang guan bu men zu zhi guo duo ci da ji xing dong 
bing lian he duo jia lv xing she tui chu zheng gui 
dan ji zhe zai duo chu an fang hei yi ri you 
reng jiu fa xian hei dao you chuan gong jiao zhi fu lan ke 
qiang po gou wu deng wen ti 
wen ming chu jing you cong ni wo zuo qi 
zai wen wu shang tu ya 
zai gong gong chang he da sheng xuan hua 
zai mian shui dian li sui yi cha dui 
xiang guan an quan ji jiu fen shi jian shi you fa sheng 
yi xie zhong guo you ke zai guo wai de bu wen ming xing wei 
bu duan ci ji zhe ren men de 
wen ming chi gan 
zhong guo you ke man yi du 
zong ti bao chi jiao kuai zeng zhang 
chu jing he ru jing san da shi chang chi xu 
liang sheng yi jiang 
guo nei you ke dui kong qi zhi liang de man yi du you suo ti sheng 
lv xing she he zhu su deng gong gong fu wu hang ye zhi liang ye you suo gai shan 
guo min lv you xiu xian gang yao 
wei man zu ren min qun zhong ri yi zeng zhang de lv you xiu xian xu qiu 
cu jin lv you xiu xian chan ye jian kang fa zhan 
tui jin ju you zhong guo te se guo min lv you xiu xian ti xi jian she 
guo wu yuan ban gong ting fa bu 
guo min lv you xiu xian gang yao 
zhi gong dai xin nian xiu jia zhi du ji ben de dao luo shi 
quan guo jia ri ban liang ci zheng ji fang jia an pai yi jian 
wei fan ying gong zhong yi yuan 
shi fang jia an pai geng jia ke xue he li 
quan guo jia ri ban liang ci mian xiang she hui zheng ji jia ri fang jia an pai yi jian 
xi yin le hen duo wang you de ji ji can yu 
zhi hui lv you 
da li fa zhan 
zhi hui lv you nian 
yao qiu ge de jie he lv you ye fa zhan fang xiang 
yi zhi hui lv you wei zhu ti 
yin dao zhi hui lv you cheng shi 
jing qu deng lv you mu di di jian she 
sui zhe lv you zhe zi zhu yi shi zeng qiang 
dui lv you xin xi de huo qu fang shi yao qiu geng zhi neng 
da lu you ke fu tai you wu zhou nian 
chao guo liu bai wan da lu tong bao fu tai 
bu jin yuan le da lu tong bao de bao dao meng 
gei tai wan dai lai le ju da de jing ji xiao yi 
geng cu jin le liang an de gan qing jiao rong 
zhi ming jing qu zhang jia leng men jing qu jiang jia 
jin nian qia feng jing qu men piao 
san nian xian zhang ling 
de di er ge 
nian chu yi lai 
zhong guo bu shao jing qu xian qi le yi bo 
xu duo zhi ming jing qu jia ge dou you suo shang diao 
yi xie jing qu shen zhi cong mian fei bian wei le shou fei 
men piao jing ji 
zao dao gou bing 
guang zhou he cheng du lu xu dui mei guo 
wai ji ren shi ke cong rong an pai shang wu 
lv you deng ge lei huo dong 
ji zhe cong bei jing shi gui hua wei yuan hui liao jie dao 
sui zhe yi pi shu shui gong cheng 
diao xu yi ji shui chang gong cheng de lu xu wan gong 
bei jing shi nei de di xia shu shui guan dao jiang lian jie 
ye jiu shi shuo 
bei jing ren jiang he shang han jiang shui 
ji zhe cong bei jing shi gui hua wei yuan hui liao jie dao 
bei jing nan shui bei diao gong cheng bao kuo nan shui bei diao zhong xian gan xian bei jing duan gong cheng he bei jing shi nan shui bei diao pei tao gong cheng liang lei 
qian zhe shu yu guo jia gong cheng 
qi yu wei bei jing shi gong cheng 
mu qian zheng zai shi shi de wei di er jie duan gong cheng 
wei shi nan shui shun li jin ru pu tong ju min jia zhong 
shou xian yao shi bei jing shi nei guan dao xing cheng 
yin guan xian zhi zhou bian shui chang 
yi jing tong shui de yan xi si huan fu she de zhong xian gan xian 
jia shang zheng zai jian she de yan dong 
bei wu huan fu she de dong gan qu gong cheng 
yi ji yan nan wu huan fu she de nan gan qu gong cheng 
jiang zheng shi xing cheng bei jing di xia guan dao 
tong guo shu shui gong cheng ba shui yin dao shui chang jin xing xiao na 
da dao yong hu yong shui biao zhun zhi hou 
cai ke shu song dao qian jia wan hu 
mu qian xin jian kuo jian yu gai zao de gong cheng zhu yao bao kuo guo gong zhuang shui chang 
di shi shui chang 
cheng zi shui chang 
di san shui chang deng 
ji zhe sun xue mei 
ji zhe cong shi jiao tong wei huo xi 
jing jin ji lu jin wu sheng shi yi jing shi xian lian wang 
yi ka tong yong 
si ji zai gai qu yu nei gao su gong lu ke shi xian bu ting che tong xing jiao fei 
you xi tong hou tai wan cheng tong xing fei de kua sheng shi jie suan 
quan guo gao su lu you wang quan bu wan cheng tong shua 
jing ban shu hao duan xu sheng ji zai yong 
ju shou fa ji tuan su tong ke ji you xian gong si jie shao 
you yu ben shi dian zi shou fei ying yong jiao zao 
yi xie lao hao duan su tong ka xu sheng ji hou cai neng xiang shou wu sheng shi chang xing 
ru guo mei you sheng ji 
jin zhi chi zai jing jin ji fan wei nei shi yong 
shan xi lian wang qu yu wu fa yi huo ren gong shua ka de fang shi jiao na tong xing fei 
xu yi xian jin quan e zhi fu tong xing fei 
zhe xie hao duan de yong hu zhan dao yi ban yi shang 
wei fang bian shi min chu xing 
su tong ka fa xing dan wei jiang wei shang shu su tong ka yong hu ti gong mian fei sheng ji fu wu 
yong hu ye ke tong guo tong bu tui chu de yi jiu huan xin you hui huo dong 
geng huan quan xin dian zi biao qian he su tong ka 
wan cheng sheng ji 
wei bi mian yong hu pai dui deng hou shi jian guo chang 
gong si jiang yi duan xin fang shi tong zhi yong hu sheng ji 
che ka bang ding bu yi zhi ji bao jing 
jiang an zhao qu yu lian wang gui ding yao qiu 
yong hu che liang pai hao 
che liang suo you ren yu yong hu ka xu yao bang ding 
shi xian zhuan che zhuan yong 
che liang xing shi zai che dao shi 
xi tong hui zi dong jiang biao qian nei de che pai hao yu su tong ka nei de che pai hao jin xing bi dui 
ru guo yi zhi ze zheng chang tong guo 
ru guo bu yi zhi 
che dao hui bao jing 
si ji xu yi xian jin xing shi quan e jiao na tong xing fei 
ben ci lian wang shi shi shi quan guo lian wang de di yi bu 
jin ming liang nian 
jiang ji zhong shi shi xiang guan ji shu gai zao 
fen pi kuo da fan wei 
dong bei di qu you wang jin nian shi xian 
mo huo shi xian quan guo lian wang 
ji zhe cong shi jiao tong wei ke ji chu liao jie dao 
yu ren gong shou fei che dao xiang bi 
zai gao feng shi duan 
bei jing gao su tong xing che liang yi ban wei yong hu 
ji zhe huang hai lei 
yin hang ban yan wu 
shou du ji chang gong an fen ju tong bao 
shi jian zhong shan dong qi ta cheng ke de liu mou yi jing bei jing fang xing zheng chu fa 
nan zi bu ting quan gao bei dai li 
shou du ji chang jing fang jie shao 
kun ming fei zhi shou du ji chang de hang ban jiang luo hou 
min jing zai xian chang liao jie dao 
dan you yu kun ming lian xu ji tian da wu 
fei ji di da bei jing hou 
zhe xie cheng ke you yu zai kun ming ji chang zhang shi jian yan wu dao zhi qing xu ji dong 
yao qiu hang kong gong si ji yu he li de jie jue fang an 
min jing yi mian an fu 
yi mian gao zhi cheng ke 
yi jing she xian wei fa 
bi xu li ji xia ji dao hang zhan lou yu hang kong gong si xie shang 
he fa wei quan 
cheng ke liu mou bu ting min jing quan gao 
zu nao min jing gong zuo bing ji xu shan dong qi ta cheng ke ju jue xia ji 
zai gao zhi wu xiao hou 
min jing yi fa qiang xing jiang liu mou dai li fei ji 
zai jing fang quan shuo xia 
qi ta cheng ke lu xu xia ji 
liu mou ze bei min jing yi fa jin xing le xing zheng chu fa 
ying tong guo tou su deng wei quan 
hui shi fei ji wu fa ru qi zhi xing xia yi fei xing ren wu 
jin er dao zhi hang ban yan chi huo qu xiao 
ying xiang ji chang diao du 
yan zhong de hui ying xiang ge ri hang ban diao du 
hai hui yan dang hang ji jian xiu shi jian 
dui fei xing an quan gou cheng fu mian ying xiang 
ji chang jing fang biao shi 
zai jin ji nian de hang ban yan wu zhong 
you ge bie cheng ke yin qing xu ji dong 
chong chuang an jian xian chang huo sun huai gong gong she shi deng wei fa xing wei shou dao chu fa 
jing fang ti xing 
yu hang ban yan wu deng qing kuang 
ying tong guo tou su 
gu ding zheng ju deng fang shi 
bian cheng wei fa zhe 
ji zhe liu zhen ni 
lun dun ye kong bei yan huo zhao liang 
di bai xin nian yan huo 
xi ni ge ju yuan de yan huo biao yan 
mei nian de xin nian chu xi ye 
lun dun dou hui zai tai wu shi he bian shi fang yan huo 
ci jiu ying xin 
jin nian de yan huo yu wang nian bu tong de shi se xiang wei ju quan 
zai tai wu shi he bian guan kan shi jie shang zui ling ren xing fen de yan huo biao yan 
shi zui hao de qing zhu xin nian de fang shi 
shu yi qian ji de guan zhong zai xian chang guan kan can lan yan huo de tong shi 
hai neng gou pin chang dao yan huo de zi wei 
wen dao yan huo san fa chu lai de ge zhong xiang wei 
hong se yan huo hui dai lai cao mei de wei dao 
bai se ze hui shi tao zi wei dao 
hai you xiang jiao he ju zi de wei dao 
zhe shi shi jie shang shou ci jin xing duo gan guan yan huo biao yan 
zu zhi fang hai yu zan zhu shang he zuo 
tui chu le shou ji ying yong cheng xu 
rang geng duo ren zai shou ji shang jiu neng gou tong shi xin shang dao zhe ci yan huo biao yan 
yue han xun biao shi 
dui yu lun dun he ying guo lai shuo 
zhi de huai nian de nian fen 
ying guo ying lai le qiao zhi xiao wang zi de dan sheng 
ying de le huan fa zi xing che sai de guan jun 
mu lei huo de le wen bu er deng gong kai sai de guan jun 
jing ji ye kai shi chi xu fu su 
xin de zhu zhai zai xing jian 
xin de jiu ye ji hui bu duan yong xian 
quan shi jie dou dui lun dun chong man xin xin 
da jia yao zhua zhu ji hui 
zai wei lai qu de geng da de cheng gong 
lun dun xin nian shi fang yan huo se xiang wei ju quan 
lai zi quan guo di qing lv men zai hai nan hou dao hai shi shan meng 
jian zheng ai qing 
wu tian jun she 
lai zi quan guo di qing lv men wan de bu yi le hu 
wu tian jun she 
ge de qing lv hai nan hou dao kua nian ye jian zheng ai qing 
ai ni yi sheng yi shi 
tian ya hai nan dao 
zhe ge kua nian ye wu mian 
dian ran gou huo 
tiao da chai wu 
chi shao kao ...... jing guo yi ye de kuang huan 
lai zi quan guo ge de di qing lv men zai hai nan ling shui nan wan hou dao gong tong ying jie xin nian di yi lv yang guang 
nan wan hou dao shi zhong guo ye shi shi jie shang wei yi de dao yu xing mi hou zi ran bao hu qu 
ji zhe zai hai nan ling shui nan wan hou dao kan dao 
chu shuang ru dui de fu qi 
qing lv yi ran cheng wei zhe li zui liang li de yi dao feng jing 
lai zi hu bei wu han 
dai zhe shang hai de nv you wu heng lai hou dao du jia 
liang ren san nian qian zai yi lie cong wu han dao shang hai de huo che shang xiang shi 
dang shi kan ta shui zhao hen leng 
wo ba wo de yi fu gei ta gai shang le 
mei xiang dao yi jian yi fu cheng jiu le wo men zhe fen yuan fen 
lai hai nan kua nian shi ta men yi zhi suo xiang wang de 
er ci ci kua nian dui ta men lai shuo yi yi zhong da 
ju qi jie zhi xiang nv you qiu hun 
xin nian da li 
er gan dong luo lei 
ban tian shuo bu chu hua lai 
zui zhong yi yong bao de fang shi jie shou le qiu hun 
san te suo dao ji tuan fa qi 
lang man kua nian zhi lv gong yi huo dong 
gui zhou fan jing shan 
chong yang lang kou wen quan 
zhan kai yi duan lang man zhi lv 
jin tian shi ta men lai hai nan de di er tian 
liang ren yi qi you bian le hou dao de shan tou he hai wan 
er cheng you ting chu hai rang ta men ge wai xing fen 
liang ren jiu shi zai chuan shang xiang yu 
zai na ge zi you lian ai hai shu qian wei de nian dai 
liang ren yi ran zou zai le chao liu qian xian 
zhen shi zhao dao le dang chu de gan jue 
chen feng di gen nian qing ren fen xiang zi ji de ai qing jing yan 
sheng huo nan mian you xie ke ke peng peng 
dan shi ai qing xu yao xiang hu bao rong 
liang ren cai neng zou de geng zhang yuan 
ta de yuan wang shi shen ti jian kang 
ba geng duo de shi jian liu gei zi ji he ai ren 
xie shou zou guo yi sheng yi shi 
shi ren lei bu bian de zhu ti 
qing nian ren zhui qiu lang man 
lao nian ren ye zai xun zhao dang nian de mei hao 
lai zi shen yang de zhang guo zhi yi jia lai hai nan zi zhu you 
hua jia zhi nian de ta yu lao ban zai er zi he er xi de pei tong xia 
he qin jia mu qing jia gong gong tong cheng chuan you lan nan wan hou dao de hai shang feng guang 
lai hai nan yi ge xing qi 
zhe hou dao de hou qu zui rang ren yin xiang shen ke 
ta bian shuo bian xiao 
sui yue de hen ji pa man le yan jiao 
zai tan dao xin nian de yuan wang shi 
zhang guo zhi biao shi 
he jia ren gong tong du guo 
lai zi quan guo di qing lv men zai hou dao pin chang dan jia yu pai 
cheng zuo you ting chu hai 
pai she hai jing hun qing mei zhao 
ti yan hai diao 
tou fang piao liu ping 
gan shou ai qing 
qin qing de sheng wen 
hai nan san te suo dao you xian gong si chang wu fu zong su cheng gong biao shi 
hou dao de dong wu 
ye feng hai yun dou shi he yu ai qing lei de zhu ti huo dong 
pang da de shi chang rang yong you de tian du hou hun qing zi yuan de hai nan lv you ye jie kan dao le shang ji 
hai nan sheng zhang zhu li 
mei ge yue hai nan dou you hun qing zhu ti you huo dong 
hai nan te se hun qing you zai dang di ge shi xian wei ran cheng feng 
cui sheng chu er shi duo tiao mi yue hun qing you 
hun qing you hai yan sheng chu xing fu jia yuan you 
zuo zhe ye lin jia wu tian jun 
yao shuo jin nian kua nian yan chang hui shang zui bei qi dai de biao yan jia bin 
fei zhang liang he lin zhi ying zhe liang wei bao hong de hao ba ba mo shu 
zhang liang fu zi bu jin he guan zhong de qin mi hu dong 
mo te chu shen de zhang liang shou du zai hu nan wei shi kua nian yan chang hui de wu tai shang liang sang 
dai lai yi shou 
tong shi tian tian ye xian chang wei ba ba ban wu he chang 
ba ba qu na er 
hao ba ba lin zhi ying zhe ci sui ran mei you dai yi qi kua nian 
dan shi zai de zhi dao xia wan cheng de wu dao 
lin zhi ying biao shi hui 
wei le pei he 
ge qu chao ku de wu dao 
lin zhi ying hai jiang zi ji che dui de sai che kai dao le chang sha kua nian de wu tai shang 
wan cheng yi duan chao nan de sai che piao yi hou 
lin zhi ying dai lai le 
shi qi sui de yu ji 
deng si shou guan zhong shu xi de jing dian qu mu 
wei ji nian yi dai tian hou mei yan fang li shi shi zhou nian er ju xing de 
qian wan zai hui zhan shun li wan cheng 
yuan lai chu xi jia bin shi zhang xue you qin zi zhi dian yao qing 
er wei wei lao tai qian mu hou de ge shou he gong zuo ren yuan 
zhang xue you he ceng zhi wei zai yan chu jie shu yi hou 
zai shang huan she wei lao yan 
ceng zhi wei dai le si xiang jiu dao chang 
you shuo bu hui cuo guo luo lei he he zui 
wei ji nian mei yan fang shi shi shi zhou nian 
ceng zhi wei he zhang xue you qian tou yu qian wan ju xing yin yue hui 
bao kuo liang han wen 
he yun shi ji cao meng deng 
yan chu jie shu yi hou ceng zhi wei he zhang xue you gao le ge wei lao yan 
zhi wei dao chang shi shuo zai yin yue hui ren bu zhu luo lei 
you liang yang shi qing wo yong bu hui cuo guo 
yi ge shi ku 
yi ge shi zui 
wen wei lao yan shang hui fou yan xu he zui feng ge 
qi hou gong zuo ren yuan cong ceng zhi wei de zuo jia nei ban chu si xiang jiu dao wei lao yan xian chang 
xiang xin zhong ren ying bu zui wu gui 
zhang xue you shou fang shi 
bei wen tai tai luo mei wei you fou pei ta chu xi yin yue hui 
ta zai jia li kan 
he shi zuo gan xie 
he yun shi li kai shi tan dao wei lao yan di qing kuang 
wo men mei you ke yi jiang qi mei jie 
dan xiang qi yi qian ta zai de shi hou 
yan chu jie shu yi hou yi qun ren ju zai yi qi 
wo men hao zhen xi 
dou shi yin wei ta de yuan gu 
jin ri you hao duo hao jiu mei you jian de ge shou 
qian bei zai chang 
zhang xue you yue yu ling chen yi dian li kai 
ta xian he shi gan xie chuan mei 
wen ke you zai yan hui zhong yi qi mei yan fang 
you ta zai dang ran zui hao la 
dan you yi xie shi qing wo men shi zuo bu dao de 
zhi ke yi zuo hui zi ji zuo dao de shi qing 
wen ceng zhi wei zui le mei 
zhang xue you xiao shuo 
yi hui ni men hui jian dao ta ru chang de tai chu lai de 
cai pai yi luo lei 
er zai zuo ri bo chu de dian tai fang wen zhong 
ceng zhi wei cheng qian wan yan chu de mei wei jia bin dou shi zhang xue you qin zi zhi dian yao qing 
you tan yan cai pai shi yi ren bu zhu luo lei 
a shi ze zai wei bo shang zai he ceng zhi wei yu zhang xue you de he zhao yi gan xie liang ren 
xin xiu tong xue hui 
shi ni de yi ge xin yuan 
jin ye wo men ye yin ni er chong ju 
mei yue liang wan sheng huo fei mei ma gan tan mei qian 
mei yan fang mu qin tan mei jin qian wan zai mei yan fang de ji nian yin yue hui shang 
xiang gai yan chang hui fa qi ren ceng zhi wei song shang gan xie xin 
mei ma zuo jie shou dian hua fang wen shi shuo 
na feng xin shi gan xie ceng zhi wei he zhang xue you de xin yi 
zhe ge yin yue hui hao cheng gong 
mei ma biao shi yin yue hui mei bu fen dou hao jing cai 
wen ta kan yan chang hui de shi hou ke te bie shang gan 
mei you shuo shi fou gan dong de 
mei ma zhi zheng chan shi nian 
zhi de mei yue liang wan yuan sheng huo fei 
wen sheng huo shi fou cheng wen ti 
ta dan ran shuo 
wo zhen shi mei you shuo huang 
dou mei you ban fa 
nan dao qu qiang ma 
wei ji nian yi dai tian hou mei yan fang li shi shi zhou nian er ju xing de 
qian wan zai hui zhan shun li wan cheng 
yuan lai chu xi jia bin shi zhang xue you qin zi zhi dian yao qing 
er wei wei lao tai qian mu hou de ge shou he gong zuo ren yuan 
zhang xue you he ceng zhi wei zai yan chu jie shu yi hou 
zai shang huan she wei lao yan 
ceng zhi wei dai le si xiang jiu dao chang 
you shuo bu hui cuo guo luo lei he he zui 
wei ji nian mei yan fang shi shi shi zhou nian 
ceng zhi wei he zhang xue you qian tou yu qian wan ju xing yin yue hui 
bao kuo liang han wen 
he yun shi ji cao meng deng 
yan chu jie shu yi hou ceng zhi wei he zhang xue you gao le ge wei lao yan 
zhi wei dao chang shi shuo zai yin yue hui ren bu zhu luo lei 
you liang yang shi qing wo yong bu hui cuo guo 
yi ge shi ku 
yi ge shi zui 
wen wei lao yan shang hui fou yan xu he zui feng ge 
qi hou gong zuo ren yuan cong ceng zhi wei de zuo jia nei ban chu si xiang jiu dao wei lao yan xian chang 
xiang xin zhong ren ying bu zui wu gui 
zhang xue you shou fang shi 
bei wen tai tai luo mei wei you fou pei ta chu xi yin yue hui 
ta zai jia li kan 
han guo mou mei ti bao liao 
han guo yi ren li sheng ji yu han guo ou xiang zu he shao nv shi dai cheng yuan yun er yi mi mi jiao wang le si ge yue 
sui hou bu jiu li sheng ji de jing ji gong si que ren le gai xiao xi 
ju bao liao de mei ti cheng 
zhi jin yi you si ge yue de shi jian 
zai zhe si ge yue li 
gai mei ti duo ci pai dao li sheng ji yu yun er yue hui 
mei ci dou shi li sheng ji kai che dao yun er jia fu jin jie yun er 
yi qi jia che dou feng hou zai ba yun er song hui jia zhong 
li sheng ji yu yun er dou shi yu jia ren zhu zai yi qi 
yin ci liang ren de yue hui chang suo jin xian yu yun er de jia fu jin he che nei 
zhe rang liang ren de yue hui duo le bu shao bian li 
cheng liang ren hai shi gang gang kai shi jiao wang de jie duan 
xi wang mei ti bu yao guo duo guan zhu 
yi mian gei ta men zao cheng ya li 
li sheng ji duo nian lai ceng duo ci gong kai biao shi yun er shi zi ji xi huan de lei xing 
zhe ci ta yu yun er de lian qing bao guang hou 
ta de fen si fen fen zhu he li sheng ji zhong yu shi xian meng xiang 
liang ren zhi qian tui sai 
yang shi da xing gong yi yin yue lei jie mu 
meng xiang xing da dang 
ran er di qi qi jie mu zhong 
huo yao can sai di dang hong ge shou yang zong wei 
ji ke juan yi que yin shou zhan shi li tu ran tui sai 
ci shi bu jin rang jie mu zu ji qi fen nu 
geng yin lai yu lun qian ze 
meng xiang xing da dang 
zong jue sai zhi ji 
liang wei tui sai ge shou ye jiang chong fan xian chang 
wei ci qian de tui sai xing wei qin zi xiang guan zhong dao qian 
yang zong wei he ji ke juan yi ceng zuo wei kong jiang xuan shou yu qi yu 
li quan deng duo wei da pai ge shou gong tong can yu 
meng xiang xing da dang 
jie mu lu zhi 
dan you yu ya li guo da 
yang zong wei he ji ke juan yi zai di ba qi lu zhi qian yi tian tu ran jue ding tui chu bi sai 
ling jie mu zu dun shi shou mang jiao luan 
jie mu lu zhi xian xie 
bu de bu jin ji qing hui yi jing tao tai de pan yue yun he a lan zu cheng lin shi da dang jiu chang cai hua jie wei ji 
ci hou zhu jian dan chu ren men de shi ye 
dan ju ji zhe cai fang de zhi 
shi ge yi ge yue hou 
ben zhou ji jiang bo chu de 
meng xiang xing da dang 
zui hou yi qi zong jue sai zhong 
yang zong wei he ji ke juan yi jing guo yu jie mu zu de xie shang 
jiang hui chong fan wu tai wei liang ren ci qian de xing wei qin zi mian dui jing tou zuo chu jie shi he dao qian 
wei biao cheng yi 
liang ren hai jiang wei guan zhong gong tong xian chang ge qu 
meng xiang xing da dang 
zuo wei yi dang gong yi jie mu 
yang zong wei he ji ke juan yi ye biao shi tui sai de zui da yi han jiu shi bu neng wei gong yi 
wei xu yao bang zhu de er tong xian shang zi ji de yi fen li liang 
yong yu guan zhu er tong gong yi xiang mu 
liang ren zai tui sai shi jian hou zai du xian shen 
meng xiang xing da dang 
ye shi de ci qian 
ji ke juan yi zao yang shi feng sha 
de chuan yan bu gong zi po 
guo de gang zi shai jiu zhao 
guo de gang wei bo jie tu 
guo de gang zai wei bo shang chuan yi zhang nian qing ying jun de jiu zhao 
yi zheng jiu zhao ci jiu sui 
san lv xin feng pan xin nian 
biao da le dui xin yi nian de xiang wang 
pu tong de yi ju ci jiu ying xin que yin lai wang you kuang zhuan 
dou yin wei zhe zhang zhao pian zhong de guo de gang tou fa nong mi 
mian tian han xiao 
shi zu yi zhu bai jing xiao nen cao 
wang you fen fen na jiu zhao zhong de guo de gang he xian zai de ta dui bi 
bu gan zhi shi de shuai 
hai you nv fen si tiao kan 
ou ba hao shuai 
tong shi ye tan xi 
sui yue shi ge tu zai chang 
guo de gang zhe zhang zhao pian ye yin fa wang you de ming xing lian da bian ren 
zhao zhong xiang deng lao yi dai nan xing bu lun gang tai nei di 
fen fen zhong qiang 
qi zhong hu sheng zui gao de shi wan zi liang 
ye you wang you bu chong 
geng xiang shen chun yang 
xiao shen yang qi zi 
hai @ xiao shen yang tiao kan dao 
ni lao po zhe me shuai 
ni zhi dao ma 
tian long ba bu 
li de qiao a zhu liu jin ling gei guan zhong liu xia le shen ke de yin xiang 
dan ta que zao yu guo mi jian he le suo 
ru jin jing kuang bi lan jie ying hai qi can 
you bu shao yan chu ji hui 
dan shi da duo wei pei jue 
xiang gang yu le quan tu ran chuan chu yi liu xing nv yi ren bei ren mi jian 
dang shi suo you mao tou dou zhi xiang liu jia ling 
liu jin ling que cheng ren zi ji cai shi bei mi jian de shou hai zhe 
liu jin ling dang shi zheng dang hong 
dan ta zhi ren zi ji bei mi jian le suo 
li ji bei ya shi xue cang 
wei le niu zhuan kun jing 
liu jin ling jue ding tiao cao wu xian 
wu xian chu shi dao ye wei yi zhong yong 
ta yan chu nian du da xi 
tian long ba bu 
zhong zui tao qiao de 
ke xi sui hou bian cong yi xian hua dan xun su die dao san si xian pei jue 
liu jin ling mei sha xi pai 
bao guang lv jie jin yu ling 
bu de yi kai shi zuo bao xian ye wu yuan 
liu jin ling xiao cheng zi cong zuo le bao xian hou 
shao le yi ban peng you 
bu guo ta ye bu jie yi 
ye bu xiang wei le kai dan er luan tui xiao 
qu de sai ji kai men hong 
mai chu le wei mian zheng cheng de di yi bu 
dui yu xin sai ji shou xiu li na xin qing da hao 
you yi ci shuai chu na jin ju 
ru guo shi zhen ai 
tian tian dou gai shi yi sheng yi shi 
zi ping shou xiu jian nan + man yi 
li na qu nian huo de shou jie shen zhen sai de guan jun 
zai nian zhong zong jue sai sha jin jue sai huo de ya jun zhi hou 
ben zhan bi sai ta yi tou hao zhong zi de shen fen chu sai 
hou zhe zui jin yi nian ban yi zhi shou dao shang bing de kun rao 
chang qi yuan li sai chang 
mu qian zan shi yi jing mei you le shi jie pai ming 
bi sai zhong li na kai ju lve xian man re 
shou pan bi sai shuang fang zhan kai ku zhan 
di er pan li na zhu jian kong zhi liao ju mian 
ping jie zhe chang sheng li 
cheng gong mai chu le wei mian de di yi bu 
di yi chang bi sai dou shi bi jiao jian nan de 
shuo lao shi hua 
bu zhi dao zi ji zai chang shang fa sheng shen me zhuang kuang 
lai zhe bian de shi hou yi zhi zhao bu dao gan jue 
yin wei zai bei jing dong xun shi yi zhi shi shi nei lian xi 
zong ti lai shuo hen man yi 
dui yu xin sai ji shou xiu 
li na zhe yang ping jia 
ju li na jie shao 
xin sai ji zi ji de xuan sai he qu nian yi yang 
si ren ding zhi wei mian yu 
zuo wei shen zhen gong kai sai de wei mian guan jun 
li na zai shen zhen de sheng huo fei chang yu kuai 
si ren ding zhi 
ci ci shen zhen gong kai sai de guan fang zan zhu shang zhi yi 
ju sai shi fang jie shao 
li na huo zeng de cai piao cai zhong shi ti yu cai piao 
mei yi ge shu zi dui li na lai jiang 
dou you te shu han yi 
sui de li na chu ci jie chu wang qiu 
sui bian cheng wei zhi ye xuan shou 
sui cheng wei di yi wei huo de da man guan sai shi guan jun de ya zhou ren 
ru jin shi jie pai ming di 
yao zai zi ji 
sui de shi hou quan li wei mian shen wang gong kai sai di 
bing zheng qu nian zhong shi jie pai ming di 
yong cai piao de yu yan 
lai nong suo li na de bu fen zhi ye sheng ya bing he pei shang mei hao de zhu fu 
du ju jiang xin de she ji 
rang li na po gan jing qi 
jie lian xun wen he shi kai jiang 
zui gao jiang jin shi duo shao 
li na kai wan xiao dao 
na tai hao le 
zhong le wo jiu bu da qiu le 
chang gui sai ji xu jin xing 
huo jian zhu chang ying zhan guo wang 
ben chang bi sai 
dan que zai guan jian shi ke lian xu chu xian liang ci shi wu 
si jie ju ti bi fen wei 
guo wang zai qian 
shu ju fang mian 
guan jian shi ke lian xu liang ge jin qiu wai jia zhu gong dui you de fen bang zhu qiu dui zai zui hou shi ke shi xian fan chao 
shuang fang shou fa zhen rong 
mai ke lei mo 
zhuan jia hui ying bei wo li wan shou ji zhi mang 
wu yi ju quan shi fei hua 
ru jin yue lai yue duo de ren zai sheng huo zhong 
ji bu li shou 
shen zhi xi deng lin shui qian hai yao mo hei er wan shou ji 
ran er jin ri you wang you fa wei bo cheng 
you yu chang qi shui qian guan deng kan shou ji 
jing zao yu duan zan 
yan ke zhuan jia biao shi 
hei an zhong wan shou ji zhi mang yi shuo yan guo qi shi 
dan zhe di que shi bu jian kang de sheng huo xi guan 
yi dao zhi shi pi lao 
ti xing da jia ye jian shi yong shou ji ke zai chuang bian kai zhan deng 
bing shi dang diao di shou ji ping mu liang du 
wang you tu cao 
shui qian wan shou ji yan jing xian shi ming 
hei an zhong wan shou ji yi shi ming 
de xiao xi zai wang shang yi ji wei xin peng you quan shang yi chu 
yin fa guang fan guan zhu 
bu jin wei shi li dan you 
lin shui qian tang zai bei wo li shua wei bo 
kan dian ying yi jing cheng le ta men de ri chang xi guan zhi yi 
bao nv shi jiu ceng yin wei chang chang ban ye guan deng da you xi 
dao zhi shi li chu xian wen ti 
ta gao su bei jing chen bao ji zhe 
na wan wo xiang wang chang yi yang hei zhe deng 
tang chuang shang wan you xi 
na shi yi kuan kao cha yan li de zhi li you xi 
xu yao te bie zi xi ding zhe ping mu cai neng da tong guan 
ke wan zhe wan zhe 
wo tu ran gan jue you yan kan dong xi mo hu qi lai 
dang shi hai yi wei shi zi ji wang le zhai yin xing 
ke hou lai fa xian yi jing zhai le 
wo zhe cai yi shi dao you yan shi 
ke ba wo xia huai le 
gan jin guan ji shui jiao 
di er tian yi jiao xing lai 
shi li jiu hui fu zheng chang le 
jing li guo zhe ci jiao xun hou 
bao nv shi zai bu gan zai wan shang zhang shi jian wan shou ji le 
da bu fen wang you zai cai fang zhong biao shi 
wan shang zai hei an zhong wan shou ji shi jian yi jiu 
chang gan dao yan jing fa suan fa zhang 
ge bie wang you de shi li hai ji ju xia jiang 
jin shi jia shen 
shou ji ping mu xiang dui jiao xiao 
zhu yi li you yao zhang shi jian gao du ji zhong zai yi ge fa guang ping shang 
yan jing ken ding hui bu shu fu 
wang you fan xian sheng gao su ji zhe 
wo he shen bian peng you dou you guo wan shou ji shi jian shao zhang yan jing jiu hui chu xian chong ying di qing kuang 
yao guo hen jiu cai neng hui fu 
zhuan jia shuo fa 
zhi mang wu yi ju yong yan xu shi du 
guan deng hou zai hei an zhong wan shou ji 
zhen de hui chan sheng zhe me da de wei hai ma 
ji zhe jiu ci zi xun le zhong guo zhong yi ke xue yuan yan ke yi yuan shi wang mo ke chao guo jun zhu ren 
hei an zhong wan shou ji zhi mang 
zhe zhong shuo fa mu qian que fa xiang guan ke xue yi ju 
yan jing tu ran kan bu jian le 
duo ban shi shi wang mo dong mai jing luan fa sheng gong xue bu zu suo zao cheng 
bu guo zan shi xing 
di qing kuang zai ai wan shou ji de ren zhong hai shi bi jiao pu bian de 
zhi yao ri hou jia qiang zhu yi 
bu yao guo du yong yan 
ying gai jiu bu hui zai chu xian le 
chao zhu ren biao shi 
chang qi ru shui qian guan deng wan shou ji shi yi zhong bu liang xi guan 
dui shi li hui you yi ding ying xiang 
yan jing rong yi gan se suan zhang 
yi yin qi yan bu de pi lao 
bei jing de sheng men zhong yi yuan yan ke zhuan jia ti xing guang da wang you 
ping shi jin liang bu yao guo du shi yong dian zi she bei 
shi yong ban xiao shi xu yao xiu xi yi xia 
ruo yao zai ye jian shi yong shou ji 
ke yi xuan ze zai pang bian kai zhan di liang du de bei jing deng 
yi jian shao liang guang dui yan jing de ci ji 
huo zhe tiao zheng shou ji ping mu de dui bi du 
shi liang du he se ze jin liang rou he xie 
zhe yang ke yi shi dang jiang di yan jing de fu he 
ji zhe fan yi jing 
yin shi zhu zhong ying yang da pei ben shi jian kang sheng huo de hao xi guan 
ke jin lai wang shang liu chuan de yi xie suo wei 
shi wu da pei jin ji 
que gao de ren yi tou wu shui 
bo cai yu dou fu bu neng tong chi 
niu nai bu neng he ji dan yi qi zhu 
pang xie he shi zi yi qi chi hui zhong du fu xie 
huang hu jian ren men dou bu gan chi le 
ji zhe jin ri zai feng tai yang qiao cai fang shi min ding nv shi 
ta shuo jia li chu fang qiang bi shang tie zhe yi zhang 
shi yong xiang ke 
shi ke ti xing zi ji bu yao 
ji zhe gen ju shi min liu chuan de ban ben 
zheng li chu yi fen 
shi wu xiang ke 
qing jiao shi pin ying yang xue jie de zhuan jia 
fa xian bu shao 
dou shi miu wu 
you ren ren wei 
bo cai zhong han you cao suan 
ta he gai jie he xing cheng chen dian 
hui yin qi shen jie shi 
yin ci bo cai bu neng he dou fu tong chi 
xiao cong ye bu neng ban dou fu 
zhong guo nong ye da xue shi pin xue yuan fu jiao shou fan zhi hong fou ding le zhe zhong shuo fa 
cao suan shi yi zhong zhi wu dang zhong guang fan cun zai de wu zhi 
bo cai deng ye cai de cao suan han liang jiao gao 
er gua lei shu cai de cao suan han liang xiang dang di 
fan zhi hong biao shi 
shi wu zhong de cao suan bei xi shou hou 
que shi hui zeng jia shen jie shi de wei xian 
dan xian dai shan shi zhong 
ren men de shu cai she ru liang zai jian shao 
yi ban shu liang de cao suan she ru bu zhi yu yin qi jie shi wen ti 
geng zhong yao de shi 
diao cha fa xian gai she ru liang yu shen jie shi de fa sheng lv cheng xian fu xiang guan 
ji gai she ru liang yue gao 
jie shi fa sheng lv yue di 
yin ci shi min ying dang zai chi shu cai shi duo chi dou zhi pin 
nai lei deng fu han gai de shi wu 
rang cao suan he gai jie he chen dian 
yi jian shao cao suan de xi shou 
jiang di jie shi fa sheng de gai lv 
xu duo ren ren wei 
niu nai zhong han you tan suan yan 
ji dan huang zhong han you tie 
zhe liang zhong wu zhi jie he zai yi qi ke sheng cheng bu yi xi shou de lin suan tie 
shi jian yi zhang 
hui chu xian que tie xing pin xue 
lin chuang shang cheng zuo 
niu nai ji dan pin xue zheng 
fan zhi hong biao shi 
tan suan yan he tie jie he cheng wei bu rong yi xi shou de lin suan tie 
xian ran bu ke xue 
niu nai zhong fu han de shi gai 
er bing mei you shen me 
ji dan huang zhong fu han tie 
dan shi dan huang zhong de gao lin dan bai jiu hui yu tie jie he 
fang ai ta de xi shou 
yin ci ji dan ben shen bing bu shi yi zhong ti gong tie de hao shi pin 
wu lun shi fou yu dao niu nai 
yong ji dan lai bu tie dou bu li xiang 
ru guo zhen xiang bu tie 
da ke bu bi he niu nai 
ji dan guo yi bu qu 
niu nai shi dian xing de pin tie shi pin 
er ji dan shi dian xing de di tie xi shou lv shi pin 
zhi yao chi xie fu han xue hong su tie de hong rou he nei zang lei yi ji fu han wei sheng su bang zhu tie xi shou de shu cai shui guo lei 
jiu neng jie jue bu tie wen ti 
zhi yao shan shi zhong you zu gou de fu tie shi pin 
ji bian mei tian chi niu nai zhu ji dan 
ye bu hui huan shang 
niu nai ji dan pin xue zheng 
yin shi zhu zhong ying yang da pei ben shi jian kang sheng huo de hao xi guan 
ke jin lai wang shang liu chuan de yi xie suo wei 
shi wu da pei jin ji 
que gao de ren yi tou wu shui 
bo cai yu dou fu bu neng tong chi
