niu nai bu neng he ji dan yi qi zhu 
pang xie he shi zi yi qi chi hui zhong du fu xie 
huang hu jian ren men dou bu gan chi le 
ji zhe jin ri zai feng tai yang qiao cai fang shi min ding nv shi 
ta shuo jia li chu fang qiang bi shang tie zhe yi zhang 
shi yong xiang ke 
shi ke ti xing zi ji bu yao 
ji zhe gen ju shi min liu chuan de ban ben 
zheng li chu yi fen 
shi wu xiang ke 
qing jiao shi pin ying yang xue jie de zhuan jia 
fa xian bu shao 
dou shi miu wu 
you ren ren wei 
bo cai zhong han you cao suan 
ta he gai jie he xing cheng chen dian 
hui yin qi shen jie shi 
yin ci bo cai bu neng he dou fu tong chi 
xiao cong ye bu neng ban dou fu 
zhong guo nong ye da xue shi pin xue yuan fu jiao shou fan zhi hong fou ding le zhe zhong shuo fa 
cao suan shi yi zhong zhi wu dang zhong guang fan cun zai de wu zhi 
bo cai deng ye cai de cao suan han liang jiao gao 
er gua lei shu cai de cao suan han liang xiang dang di 
fan zhi hong biao shi 
shi wu zhong de cao suan bei xi shou hou 
que shi hui zeng jia shen jie shi de wei xian 
dan xian dai shan shi zhong 
ren men de shu cai she ru liang zai jian shao 
yi ban shu liang de cao suan she ru bu zhi yu yin qi jie shi wen ti 
geng zhong yao de shi 
diao cha fa xian gai she ru liang yu shen jie shi de fa sheng lv cheng xian fu xiang guan 
ji gai she ru liang yue gao 
jie shi fa sheng lv yue di 
yin ci shi min ying dang zai chi shu cai shi duo chi dou zhi pin 
nai lei deng fu han gai de shi wu 
rang cao suan he gai jie he chen dian 
yi jian shao cao suan de xi shou 
jiang di jie shi fa sheng de gai lv 
xu duo ren ren wei 
niu nai zhong han you tan suan yan 
ji dan huang zhong han you tie 
zhe liang zhong wu zhi jie he zai yi qi ke sheng cheng bu yi xi shou de lin suan tie 
shi jian yi zhang 
hui chu xian que tie xing pin xue 
lin chuang shang cheng zuo 
niu nai ji dan pin xue zheng 
fan zhi hong biao shi 
tan suan yan he tie jie he cheng wei bu rong yi xi shou de lin suan tie 
xian ran bu ke xue 
niu nai zhong fu han de shi gai 
er bing mei you shen me 
ji dan huang zhong fu han tie 
dan shi dan huang zhong de gao lin dan bai jiu hui yu tie jie he 
fang ai ta de xi shou 
yin ci ji dan ben shen bing bu shi yi zhong ti gong tie de hao shi pin 
wu lun shi fou yu dao niu nai 
yong ji dan lai bu tie dou bu li xiang 
ru guo zhen xiang bu tie 
da ke bu bi he niu nai 
ji dan guo yi bu qu 
niu nai shi dian xing de pin tie shi pin 
er ji dan shi dian xing de di tie xi shou lv shi pin 
zhi yao chi xie fu han xue hong su tie de hong rou he nei zang lei yi ji fu han wei sheng su bang zhu tie xi shou de shu cai shui guo lei 
jiu neng jie jue bu tie wen ti 
zhi yao shan shi zhong you zu gou de fu tie shi pin 
ji bian mei tian chi niu nai zhu ji dan 
ye bu hui huan shang 
niu nai ji dan pin xue zheng 
you yang mi he feng shao feng zhu yan de gu zhuang ai qing pian 
da han tao hua kai 
sui ran hao cheng shi liang ren ji 
hou de shou ci yin mu chong feng 
na shi yang mi cai gao zhong bi ye 
ya cang zhe me jiu cai shang ying 
xian ran shi shi yi shi yi 
liang wei ceng jing ming bu jian jing zhuan de zhu yan xian zai yi jing shi dang hong yi fang le 
xin nian qian xi 
guo jia zhu xi xi jin ping tong guo zhong guo guo ji guang bo dian tai 
zhong yang ren min guang bo dian tai 
zhong yang dian shi tai fa biao er ling yi si nian xin nian he ci 
xin hua she ji zhe lan hong guang she 
ju xin hua she dian xin nian qian xi 
guo jia zhu xi xi jin ping tong guo zhong guo guo ji guang bo dian tai 
zhong yang ren min guang bo dian tai 
zhong yang dian shi tai 
fa biao le er ling yi si nian xin nian he ci 
quan wen ru xia 
cong duan pian ke jian 
xi jin ping de ban gong shi cai yong shen se de shi mu jia si 
xing se di tan 
xian de ping shi 
xi jin ping de ban gong zhuo shi fen da 
ban gong zhuo hou mian 
shu li zhe yi mian zhong guo guo qi 
qiang shang gua zhe yi fu wan li chang cheng de tu hua 
qi zhong you bian de yi zhang 
shi ceng jing jian bao de 
zao nian xi jin ping zai fu jian qi dan che zai ai nv xi ming ze de zhao pian 
hai you qi zi peng li yuan de zhao pian 
ling wai yi zhang yi xi ke jian dao shi xi yu peng de fu qi he zhao 
ling dao ren de ban gong zhuo chu le gou da 
fang le bi tong 
re dian xin wen 
nv xing you yi wu yi xiu xiong tie gong yue fei jin quan luo xia sha wang you 
nei xie bei cheng long fu zi qian gui ze guo de shi da xing gan nv xing 
lao qing ren si dui tou e qing di ming xing 
gan ga he ying shun jian 
liang wei cheng nian nv hai zao ye ye wei xie pan dian ye ye ji nei xie wo chuo shi 
quan qiu shi da ling ren tan wei guan zhi de lv you sheng di 
liang xing yang sheng 
an quan tao ni zhen de zhi dao zen me dai ma 
liang xing yang sheng 
jie mi nan nv jian qing gan de er shi ge mi mi 
bei jing xiao ke che chao liang nian yao hao bu zhong zhe zhong qian lv jiang shang sheng 
cong jin tian qi 
xiao ke che yao hao jiang zhi xing xiu gai hou de xin zheng ce 
ye jiu shi jie ti zhong qian gui ze 
yi ji zeng jia le chun dian dong che zhi biao deng 
bei jing chen bao ji zhe cong shi jiao tong wei huo xi 
xin ban xiao ke che zhi biao tiao kong guan li xin xi xi tong yi jin xing le sheng ji gai zao 
yu jin tian ling shi shang xian 
you yu jin nian yao hao she zhi le jie ti zhong qian gui ze 
xin ban wang zhan shang 
yao hao zhe ke cha kan zi ji de lei ji yao hao ci shu 
li ci yao hao qing kuang he xia yi qi jie ti 
cong jin ri kai qi 
shi zhong guo xin yi jie ling dao ceng lv zhi ci nian 
ye bei shi wei quan mian shen hua gai ge yuan nian 
gai ge yi cheng zhong guo ge jie gong shi 
zai xin de yi nian li 
zhu ru shou ru fen pei gai ge xi ze deng duo xiang guan hu guo ji min sheng de zhong da gai ge fang an jiang mian shi 
yang lao jin bing gui deng 
you wang huo de ji ji jin zhan 
jiang wei shi jie dai lai shen me 
ge jie qi dai 
zhong guo ying quan mian shen hua gai ge yuan nian 
zai ji de li yi qun ti yi ran cun zai 
li yi fan li ri qu gu hua di dang xia 
zai cheng ge jie gong shi 
gang gang guo qu de yi nian 
bei shi wei zhong guo gai ge de xin qi dian 
zhe yi nian li 
zhi zheng de zhong guo gong chan dang ying lai shi ba jie san zhong quan hui 
guan jian xing hui yi 
quan mian shen hua gai ge 
de quan xin zhu zhang 
quan hui shen yi tong guo de 
zhong gong zhong yang guan yu quan mian shen hua gai ge ruo gan zhong da wen ti de jue ding 
de yi gong bu 
zhong gong gai ge de jue xin 
hai ti xian zai zhuan she ji gou fang mian 
shi ba jie san zhong quan hui shou ci ti chu cheng li zhong yang quan mian shen hua gai ge ling dao xiao zu 
zhong gong zhong yang zheng zhi ju zhao kai hui yi 
ji jue ding cheng li shang shu ji gou 
you xi jin ping ren zu zhang 
zhe bei jie du wei 
you li yu tu po li yi gu hua dui shen hua gai ge de zhang ai 
lan tu hui jiu 
zhong guo gai ge da mu xuan ji xian kai 
bei shi wei zhong guo quan mian shen hua gai ge yuan nian 
ye bei shi zuo shang shu gai ge ju cuo neng fou qie shi luo shi de 
zhe yi nian li 
dan du er hai 
xin zheng jiang quan mian qi dong 
shou ru fen pei gai ge xi ze 
xin xing cheng zhen hua gui hua 
bu dong chan tong yi deng ji zhi du 
zhao kao gai ge zong ti fang an jiang mian shi 
guo qi gai ge zong ti fang an zhen rong you wang jie kai 
yang lao jin bing gui you wang po ti 
guo fang he jun dui deng ling yu gai ge ye huo you xin jin zhan 
ge jie qi dai 
fa yuan cai pan wen shu quan mian shang wang jie shou gong zhong jian du 
ge ren hai wai zi chan xu shen bao 
cheng zhen pai shui yu wu shui chu li tiao li 
tie lu an quan guan li tiao li 
zui gao ren min fa yuan guan yu ren min fa yuan zai hu lian wang gong bu cai pan wen shu de gui ding 
xin xiu ding de 
guo ji shou zhi tong ji shen bao ban fa 
deng yi pi fa lv fa gui zheng shi shi shi 
you guo wu yuan zhi ding de 
tie lu an quan guan li tiao li 
jiang zi jin ri qi shi xing 
zai dong che zu lie che shang xi yan huo zhe zai qi ta lie che de jin yan qu yu xi yan 
jin zhi zai tie lu xian lu an quan bao hu qu nei shao huang 
fang yang sheng chu 
zhong zhi ying xiang tie lu xian lu an quan he xing che liao wang de shu mu deng zhi wu 
zai tie lu xian lu liang ce jian zao 
she li sheng chan 
chu cun huo zhe xiao shou yi ran 
yi bao huo zhe fang she xing wu pin deng wei xian wu pin de chang suo 
ying dang fu he guo jia biao zhun 
hang ye biao zhun gui ding de an quan fang hu ju li 
tie lu yun shu qi ye ying dang an zhao guo wu yuan tie lu hang ye jian du guan li bu men de gui ding shi shi huo che piao shi ming gou mai 
cha yan zhi du 
shi shi huo che piao shi ming gou mai 
cha yan zhi du de 
lv ke ying dang ping you xiao shen fen zheng jian gou piao cheng che 
dui che piao suo ji zai shen fen xin xi yu suo chi shen fen zheng jian huo zhe zhen shi shen fen bu fu de chi piao ren 
tie lu yun shu qi ye you quan ju jue qi jin zhan cheng che 
qiang diao jin zhi shi shi xia lie wei hai tie lu an quan de xing wei 
cong lie che shang pao reng za wu 
zai dong che zu lie che shang xi yan huo zhe zai qi ta lie che de jin yan qu yu xi yan 
zhan yong jin chu zhan tong dao huo zhe hou che qu 
wei fan gui ding de 
tie lu ji che che liang she ji zhi zao wei xiu jin kou xu ke ban fa 
tie lu yun shu ji chu she bei sheng chan qi ye shen pi ban fa

yi mian shang qi shang xue 
bu nao de shi wu = jiu da shen qi jian nao bu nao shi wu 
ru jin bu jin xiao hai yao jian nao bu nao 
da ren ye yao jing chang zuo xie jian nao de yun dong yu chi xie bu nao de shi wu 
zhe yang bu jin ke yi bao chi ni de si wei qing xi hai ke yi yan chang ni de shou ming 
na sheng huo zhong bu nao de shi wu you nei xie ne ? wo men yao chi shen me bu nao ? yu xiao bian yi qi lai kan wen zhang ba 
bu nao de shi wu 
hua sheng fu han luan lin zhi he nao lin zhi 
ta shi shen jing xi tong suo xu yao de zhong yao wu zhi 
neng yan huan nao gong neng shuai tui 
yi zhi xue xiao ban ning ji 
fang zhi nao xue shuan xing cheng 
shi yan zheng shi

shi ming fu qi shi de

ta fu han dan bai zhi 
ji da nao suo bi xu de an ji suan 
niu nai zhong de gai zui yi bei ren xi shou 
shi nao dai xie bu ke que shao de zhong yao wu zhi 
ta hai han dui shen jing xi bao shi fen you yi de wei sheng su / deng yuan su

di yi ji ji jiang shou guan

ye rang wang you dui di er ji jia bin ren xuan po wei guan zhu 
wang you ye zhan kai re lie tao lun 
qi zhong zui wei guan xin de wen ti you xie ting feng he li ya peng shi fou zhen de tong tai

san shi er li

dan shi xian zai yi jiu shi yong 
you ren pan dian le san shi sui nan ren hai bu jie hun de yuan yin 
ni zhong qiang le ji ge 
ta bian de yue lai yue bu lang man le 
yin wei yi ci hun yin de shi bai 
li guo hun de nan ren hui bian de leng jing er li xing 
ta men bu zai xiang mao tou xiao huo zi na yang 
li hun nan ren hui jue de lang man shi xu huan de 
bu ke kao de yi zhong qing gan

dan shen nv ren yi ban rong yi ji mo 
xin li ye ting fu za 
hai chang you yi zhong te shu de yi lai xing 
ge fang mian zong xiang jie li yan shi zi ji

mei an hao xin

dui zi jia ren xia shou zui mei chu xi 
yi ge ba zhang shi pai bu xiang de 
ke ye bu neng jin shui lou tai xian de yue ya 
you shi hou biao mian shang kan qi lai shi nv fang de wen ti 
ke guan jian qu jue yu nan ren de tai du 
dao de bai huai 
lun li bai huai 
gan xiang zi jia qin qi kai dao de nan ren 
ken ding bu shi hao dong xi 
ren shi ta xiang ni bao zheng cheng nuo 
zhe bei zi zuo niu zuo ma gei ni xiao lao 
ni dou xu yao san si 
zhe ge nan ren neng xiang zi ji de qin qi kai dao 
nan bao yi hou hui shen xiang wai mian 
ta zhu ding ai shang ni ! kan kan ni shi na zhong nan ren sha shou 
ce yan kai shi 
nan xing kan jian mei nv wei sha liu kou shui yan jiu cheng yin gao wan ji su zeng jia 
zhong guo ren you shi hui yong 
chui xian san chi 
lai xing rong nan ren dui nv ren de ai mu 
yi xue ri bao 
kan deng de yi pian wen zhang zuo zheng le zhe yi shuo fa de ke xue xing 
nan ren zai jian dao piao liang nv ren shi 
tuo ye fen mi liang zhen de hui zeng jia 
zhe xie nv xing nian qing mei li 
ta men jiang fen bie jie jin nan xing 
yu ta men liao tian 
nv xing jie jin nan xing can yu zhe qian hou 
yan jiu zhe hui ti qu nan xing kou qiang zhong de tuo ye jin xing fen xi 
jie guo fa xian 
dang nan xing shou shi zhe zhi jian jin xing duan shi jian dui hua shi 
ta men kou qiang zhong de tuo ye jiu hui da liang zeng jia 
qi zhong de gao wan ji su han liang ye sui zhi zeng jia 
yan jiu zhe cheng 
dang nan xing yu mei nv jie chu shi 
ta men shen ti hui chan sheng yi xi lie fan ying 
ti nei ji su sui zhi fa sheng bian hua 
biao xian zai kou qiang fang mian 
jiu shi tuo ye zhong de gao wan ji su zeng jia 
zhe yi lei si xian xiang ye neng zai ji zhui dong wu de qiu ai guo cheng zhong guan ce dao 
zhong yi ren wei 
bai bing qi yu han 
gong han shi dao zhi ge zhong fu ke ji bing he bu yun zheng de zhong yao yuan yin 
dong ji shi gong han de gao fa ji jie 
chi leng shi dou hui dao zhi gong han 
nv ren yi dan gong han 
yue jing bu diao 
si zhi bing liang 
zi gong ji bing deng dou hui zhao shang ni 
que fa yun dong 
jiu zuo ban gong 
zuo xi bu gui lv deng bu liang de sheng huo fang shi 
dou hui ri ji yue lei yang ji zi gong 
re shang gong han 
xiang zhi dao sheng huo zhong nei xie huai xi guan hui rang ni bei gong han 
wei shen me you de nv ren mian se hong run 
can ruo tao hua 
guang cai zhao ren 
er you de nv ren que shi hui tou hui lian 
tou fa gan ku 
pi fu cu cao 
qi zhong yi ge zhong yao de yuan yin jiu shi ti nei 
zhong yi ren wei 
nv xing jian kang de biao zhun jiu shi qi xue chong zu 
ti nei qi xue shi tiao 
hui yan zhong ying xiang shen ti jian kang 
hai hui rang rong yan zao shuai 
qi xue shi tiao de nv ren rong yi chu xian shi mian duo meng 
mian zhang huang ban he tou fa gan ku deng wen ti 
jiu zhi jiu hui dao zhi shen ti ji neng jian tui 
ti zao shuai lao 
zhong yi ren wei 
jing ban tong yuan 
suo yi yue jing bu diao de nv xing zui rong yi zhang se ban 
zheng chang qing kuang xia 
ti nei xin chen dai xie chan sheng de fei wu ke yi tong guo jing xue dai chu 
yin ci bu hui chu xian se su chen zhuo 
er yi dan yue jing shou zu 
ti nei qi xue yun xing bu chang jiu hui dao zhi qi zhi xue yu 
cong er dao zhi fei wu zhu bu chen dian 
chan sheng se ban 
xiang yao cong gen ben shang gan zou lian shang de ban ban dian dian 
jiu yao cong yang chao diao jing kai shi zuo qi 
nv ren dou xiang yong bao qing chun 
er yi zhang nian qing you shen cai de lian dan 
ze shi nian qing de zui hao zheng ming 
sui zhe nian ling de zeng zhang 
shen ti de ge ge qi guan dou hui zou xiang shuai lao 
qi zhong lian dan de shuai lao zui rong yi bei ren cha jue 
wu lun shi yan jiao de zhou wen 
wu shen de yan jing hai shi bu zai jiao nen de chun bu 
dou zai zhao shi shuai lao de lai lin 
xiang yao kang shuai lao 
jiu yao xian cong lian bu kang shuai zuo qi 
lai kan kan ru he gei ni de lian bu wu guan zuo hao bao yang gong zuo 
hua li xing gan 
xing gan zhai nan nv shen zhang xin yu shen chuan an hong se zhang li fu chu xi huo dong 
zhong men da kai 
you ya hua li 
qie fei chang xing gan 
hei se fan ling yu an se tu an shou yao she ji cheng wei zao xing liang jing zhi chu 
yan xia hu nan wei shi zheng re bo de 
xin tian long ba bu 
yin ge zhong lei ren ju qing he zao xing yin fa guan zhong feng kuang tu cao 
gao qun shu dao yan shen zhi wei bo pao hong 
ji zhe zuo ri huo xi 
jiu lian jin yong lao xian sheng ye ren bu zhu yao chu shou guan yi guan le 
chu yu dui zi ji zuo pin de ai hu 
jin yong fang mian yi biao shi you yi dan ren zhe jiang wei shi jing hua ban de zong dao yan gu wen 
shui zhong xing fei pang de jian dan pan duan fang fa 
zao shang qi chuang hou shuang shou wo quan 
ru guo gan dao shou zhi yu shou zhi zhi jian you zhong zhang gan huo shi ji rou zu ai 
na me hen bu xing 
yong shou nie zi ji yao shang de rou 
gan jue ruan de shi shui zhong xing fei pang 
gan jue ying yi dian shi zhi fang xing fei pang 
shui zhong xing fei pang de zhu yao biao xian zheng zhuang 
shi yu yi ban 
dan shou jiao wu li 
bu xi huan yun dong 
chi wan fan hun shen fa ruan xiang tang xia 
zui li fa zhan 
yi huai du zi 
zao chen qi lai shi yan jing deng bu wei fu zhong 
si zhi chen zhong 
fu bu chang hui you bao zhang gan 
er qie shou jiao zhong zhong de 
you qi shi da tui 
tun bu ji fu bu 
he shui jiao duo 
ai chi tian shi 
xi hao zhong kou 
zao shang pao jiao jing li geng chong pei 
da duo shu ren ping shi dou shi zai wan shang lin shui qian pao jiao 
zao shang pao jiao de ren mu qian hai wei shu bu duo 
zhi suo yi xuan ze zao shang pao jiao 
shi yin wei ye jian shui mian zhang shi jian bao chi tong yi zi shi 
xue ye xun huan bu chang 
zao shang pao pao jiao 
ke yi cu jin xue ye xun huan 
tiao jie zhi wu shen jing he nei fen mi xi tong 
jiao zhang shang de shen jing mo shao yu da nao xiang lian 
xi jiao shi yong shuang shou zai wen shui zhong an mo jiao xin 
jiao zhi jian xi 
neng shi da nao gan dao qing song 
shi ren shen qing qi shuang 
jing li chong pei 
qi shi yi ge ren de rong mao gen ta de shen zang ye you guan xi 
shu lao gen xian ku 
ren lao tui xian shuai 
zhong lao nian ren jing chang hui yu dao yao suan tui teng 
tui jiao fa li de wen ti 
yi dan tui jiao fa ruan 
zou lu mei jin 
da bu fen ren ma shang xiang dao ke neng shi que gai le 
hen duo ren bu gai zhi hou qing kuang reng bu jian hao zhuan 
zhe dao di shi yin wei shen me ne 
zai pai chu le qi zhi xing bing bian di qing kuang xia 
zhong lao nian ren chu xian yao suan 
tui wu li deng zheng zhuang 
hen you ke neng shi shen xu de 
zai zhong yi de li lun li 
shi ge gong neng dan wei 
bing bu dan chun zhi xi yi suo dui ying de na ge jiao 
ta de zuo yong fan wei ji hu han gai le xi yi xue zhong nei fen mi xi tong 
sheng zhi xi tong 
mi niao xi tong 
yun dong gu ge xi tong 
hu xi xi tong deng duo ge xi tong 
zhong yi ren wei 
shen wei xian tian zhi ben 
shen wu zang yi ti 
shen wei wu zang zhi mu 
you ci ke jian 
mei ge ren de sheng zhang he fa yu 
dou li bu kai shen jing 
shen jing shen qi neng cui hua wo men she ru ying yang 
bian cheng qi xue zi yang wu zang liu fu 
cong er zhang gu 
shen qi dao di zhang shen me yang 
you mei you shen me ju ti zhi biao ne 
ta men jiu xiang yi zhong wu xing de sheng ming yuan shi wu zhi 
cun zai yu wo men shen ti de ge ge zang qi he xi bao 
hong zhi gu sui jiu shi qi zhu yao de you xing biao xian zhi yi 
hong zhi gu sui neng cu jin ren ti sheng cheng xi bao 
ju shi xi bao 
lin ba xi bao deng mian yi xi bao 
bang zhu wo men di yu ji bing 
sui zhe shuai lao de kai shi 
ren de mian yi gong neng zhu jian xia jiang 
hong zhi gu sui de gong neng xi bao ye zai jian shao 
you yu sui zhi xia jiang 
gu jie gou ye hui fa sheng gai bian 
bian de shu song 
chu xian yao tui wu li 
pi fu lao hua deng zheng zhuang 
gui gen dao di 
zhe dou shi yin wei 
de neng li xia jiang le 
gai shan zhe xie bing zheng 
dan yi bu gai shi bu xing de 
ru guo shen xu 
cheng gu xi bao bu neng fen mi zu gou de gu jiao yuan 
chi jin ren ti de bu gai chan pin jiu bu neng chen ji zai gu ji zhi shang 
hai hui jiang da liang de duo yu gai dai xie wei xue gai he niao gai 
dui ren ti zao cheng shang hai 
er cai yong zhong yi de bu shen fang fa 
qiang hua he ji huo hong zhi gu sui de sheng cheng neng li 
cai neng cong gen ben shang da dao qiang jian yao tui 
yan huan shuai lao de mu di 
liu miao zhao ti gao da nao shou ming 
sui zhe nian ling zeng da 
ni shi bu shi fa xian zi ji wang ji de shi qing yue lai yue duo 
mei guo tui xiu ren yuan xie hui za zhi 
zui xin kan wen 
zhi yao gai shan sheng huo xi guan 
jiu neng rang ni de da nao bao chi liang hao de ji yi li 
mei guo niu yue xi nai shan yi xue yuan ji yi zeng qiang ji hua zhi xing zhu ren shi wei er yi shi jian yi 
duo wai chu zou zou shai tai yang 
yin wei yang guang neng cu jin shen jing sheng zhang yin zi 
shi shen jing xian wei zeng zhang 
xian zai yi you zhuan jia yan jiu shai tai yang de liang shi fou yu ren zhi zhang ai zheng de fa zhan you guan 
sui zan wu ding lun 
dan mei tian jie shou yang guang zhao she 
zhi shao neng xing cheng jiao hao de shui mian mo shi 
bu rong yi you yu 
ru fang shi nv xing mei li de biao zhi 
mei ge nv ren dou xi wang zi ji yong you jian kang mi ren de ru fang 
wei le rang ru fang bao chi jian kang he mei hao de xing zhuang 
duo shu nv xing zai ri chang sheng huo zhong dou shi fen zhu zhong ru fang de bao yang 
zhe xie bao yang zhao shu bing bu quan bu dou ke kao 
ri chang ru fang bao yang xian ru xia mian zhe xie wu qu 
zhi hui rang ni de ru fang zhuang kuang yue lai yue zao gao 
sheng huo zhong bu liang de xiao xi guan 
ye hui rang ni de ru fang mei li xia jiang 
zai han leng de dong ji 
xi yi ge re shui zao ji neng nuan shen you neng fang song shen xin 
xi zao hao chu duo duo 
chu le ke yi qing jie xiao pi wai 
hai ke yi shu jin huo xue 
gai shan shui mian 
ti gao pi fu de xin chen dai xie 
ru guo xi zao de fang shi bu dui 
que hui rang ni sheng bing + duan ming 
xia mian ji ge xi zao de jin qu 
ni qian wan bu yao ta ru 
yue jing qi jian 
you yu ti nei ci ji su shui ping fa sheng bian hua 
pi fu hui gen ping shi you hen da de bian hua 
hei yan quan deng wen ti ye hui pin pin chu xian 
zai zhe ge te shu de jie duan 
nv xing yao ru he tiao li 
cai ke yi he hu hao pi fu 
rang zi ji zai na ji tian li yi jiu guang cai dong ren ne 
ni zhi dao ma 
wo men ren ti nei de du su 
bing man man de duo qu ni de jian kang he mei li ... 
wai lai huan jing de wu ran 
bi ru fu she 
yi ji nei zai de jing shen zhuang tai 
dou hui shi ni ti nei de du su zeng jia 
yi dan ti nei ji du yan zhong 
hen kuai jiu hui ti xian dao wai zai shang 
yin fa se ban 
pi fu cu cao deng wen ti 
bu xiang bei ti du duo qu mei li 
xian zai jiu yao kai shi wei shen ti pai pai du 
ni de shen ti ji du le ma 
ru he pai du yang yan 
shui zi bu dui 
qi lai zhong shui 
liang hao de shui mian zi shi 
ke yi rang ni yi ye hao mian 
xiao chu pi lao 
zi yang jing shen 
er bu liang de shui zi 
bu jin ying xiang shui mian zhi liang 
hai hui re lai jian kang wen ti 
mei ge ren de shui zi dou shi ge you qian qiu 
na zhong shui zi geng you li yu yu nv xing jian kang ne 
bai ling bi kan 
ban gong shi liu da suo ming chang jing da gong kai 
chao jiu wan wu gao gen xie bu li jiao 
bai ling nv xing wei le pei he zhi ye zhuang 
mei tian zao chen chu men qian jiu deng shang gao gen xie 
xia ban hou ji bian kan dian ying 
guang shang chang ye li bu kai 
yi zhi yao dao hui jia hou cai neng tuo xia 
shi ji ge xiao shi dou chuan zhe gao gen xie 
wei hai yuan yin 
zhang shi jian chuan zhe gao gen xie 
shuang jiao chang qi chu yu fei zi ran zhuang tai 
zu gong ya li zeng jia 
de bu dao ren he xiu xi 
jiao zhi bei po cheng dan guo duo de ya li 
jiu er jiu zhi jiu hui chu xian mu zhi wai fan 
zu gong ta xian deng bing zheng 
yue lai yue tong ku 
zui hou de jie guo shi xu yao tong guo shou shu lai jiao zheng 
zai ban gong shi zhun bei yi shuang shu shi de ping di pi xie 
zhe yang zuo neng shi ni de jiao bu bao chi liang hao de wei sheng zhuang tai 
yi xia ti li 
yang sheng xu zhi 
yan jing gao su ni de liu ge mi ma 
yi zao qi lai 
fa xian yan quan an chen fa hei 
zhe ke neng shi xue ye zhong chen ji tai duo fei wu de yuan gu 
xia yan jian pi fu bi jiao bao 
zui rong yi fan ying xue ye yan se 
xiang xiang zui jin shi fou ya li guo da huo guo du pi lao 
zhi pei mi niao he sheng zhi qi guan de shen zang gong neng shi tiao 
ye hui rang yan zhou an chen 
yi xue zhuan jia shuo shao ao ye 
duo chi quan mai shi pin shi xiao chu hei yan quan de zui hao ban fa 
xin nian qian xi 
guo jia zhu xi xi jin ping tong guo zhong guo guo ji guang bo dian tai 
zhong yang ren min guang bo dian tai 
zhong yang dian shi tai fa biao er ling yi si nian xin nian he ci 
xin hua she ji zhe lan hong guang she 
guo jia zhu xi xi jin ping tong guo zhong guo guo ji guang bo dian tai 
zhong yang ren min guang bo dian tai 
zhong yang dian shi tai 
fa biao le er ling yi si nian xin nian he ci 
quan wen ru xia 
yi yuan fu shi 
wan xiang geng xin 
wo xiang quan guo ge zu ren min 
xiang xiang gang te bie xing zheng qu tong bao he ao men te bie xing zheng qu tong bao 
xiang tai wan tong bao he hai wai qiao bao 
xiang shi jie ge guo he ge di qu de peng you men 
zhi yi xin nian de zhu fu 
zhu fu lao ren men jian kang 
zhu fu hai zi men kuai le 
zhu fu mei ge jia ting xing fu an kang 
zai zhe ci jiu ying xin zhi ji 
wu shu gong ren 
zhi shi fen zi 
gan bu reng ran jian shou zai gong zuo gang wei 
bu shao tong bao yi ran ben bo zai shi jie ge de wei zu guo xin qin gong zuo 
xu duo ren min jie fang jun he wu jing guan bing 
gong an gan jing zheng zai lv xing guang rong shi ming 
ta men you de yuan li zu guo 
yuan li qin ren 
you de bu neng tong jia ren tuan ju 
wo dai biao zu guo he ren min 
xiang ta men zhi yi cheng zhi de wen hou 
zhu ta men ping an shun li 
dui wo men guo jia he ren min lai shuo shi hen bu ping fan de yi nian 
wo men gong tong zhan sheng le ge zhong kun nan he tiao zhan 
qu de le xin de xian zhu cheng jiu 
cheng ji lai zhi bu yi 
ning ju le da jia de xin xue he han shui 
wo xiang da jia biao shi zhong xin de gan xie 
wo men dui quan mian shen hua gai ge zuo chu zong ti bu shu 
gong tong miao hui le wei lai fa zhan de hong wei lan tu 
wo men jiang zai gai ge de dao lu shang mai chu xin de bu fa 
wo men tui jin gai ge de gen ben mu di 
shi yao rang guo jia bian de geng jia fu qiang 
rang she hui bian de geng jia gong ping zheng yi 
gai ge shi xu yao wo men gong tong wei zhi fen dou de wei da shi ye 
xu yao fu chu jian xin de nu li 
yi fen geng yun 
yi fen shou huo 
zai gai ge kai fang de wei da shi jian zhong 
wo men yi jing chuang zao liao wu shu hui huang 
zhong guo ren min bi jiang chuang zao chu xin de hui huang 
yu zhou hao han 
xing han can lan 
ying gai shou wang xiang zhu 
tong zhou gong ji 
gong tong fa zhan 
zhong guo ren min zhui xun shi xian zhong hua min zu wei da fu xing de zhong guo meng 
ye zhu yuan ge guo ren min neng gou shi xian zi ji de meng xiang 
wo zhen cheng xi wang 
shi jie ge guo ren min zai shi xian ge zi meng xiang de guo cheng zhong xiang hu li jie 
xiang hu bang zhu 
nu li ba wo men lai yi sheng cun de di qiu jian she cheng wei gong tong de mei hao jia yuan 
sheng huo zong shi chong man xi wang de 
cheng gong zong shi shu yu ji ji jin qu 
bu xie zhui qiu de ren men 
wo men zai qian jin de dao lu shang 
hai hui yu dao ge zhong feng xian he tiao zhan 
rang lao bai xing guo shang geng jia xing fu de sheng huo 
hai you da liang gong zuo yao zuo 
wo men yao qian xu jin shen 
jian ku fen dou 
gong tong pu xie wei da zu guo fa zhan de shi dai xin pian zhang 
xie xie da jia 
ji zhe lu ya nan 
ji zhe cong zhong guo tie lu zong gong si huo xi 
tie lu an quan guan li tiao li 
yi xia jian cheng 
you gong an ji guan gen ju wei fa qing jie deng jiang yu yi 
ze ling gai zheng 
zai jian she zhi liang an quan fang mian 
ren he dan wei he ge ren bu de wei fan gui ding yao qiu tie lu jian she 
shi gong dan wei ya suo jian she gong qi 
zai yun ying an quan fang mian 
lv ke ying dang ping you xiao shen fen zheng jian gou piao cheng che 
dui che piao suo ji zai shen fen xin xi yu suo chi shen fen zheng jian huo zhe zhen shi shen fen bu fu de chi piao ren 
tie lu yun shu qi ye you quan ju jue qi jin zhan cheng che 
tie lu yun shu tuo yun ren tuo yun huo wu 
bao guo shi ni bao 
huang bao huo wu pin ming 
huo zhe zhuang che 
zhuang xiang chao guo gui ding zhong liang de 
you tie lu jian du guan li ji gou ze ling gai zheng 
an bei jin san can bai jing guo shen she 
shi shi qiang shua heng 
shi gong ran tiao xin 
guo ji she hui bi xu yu yi qiang ying hui ji 
an bei jin san kan lai yi shi tie le xin yao jiang ri ben de 
di guo jiu meng 
qiang jia yu ya zhou ren min 
can bai jing guo shen she shi qi shi xian suo wei jun shi qiang guo 
cheng ba ya zhou de bi ran yi bu 
an bei de kuang wang yu gu zhu yi zhi 
shi ri ben jun guo zhu yi li shi wan gu xing de biao xian 
ye yi cheng wei ya zhou he ping mian lin de xian shi wei xian 
jing guo shen she gong feng you er zhan jia ji zhan fan 
ri ben ling dao ren bu gu guo nei wai jiang lie fan dui 
yi yi gu xing can bai jing guo shen she de xing jing 
shi dui ya zhou ren min gan qing de yan zhong shang hai 
ye jiang shen ke ying xiang ya zhou nai zhi shi jie ren min dui dai ri ben de zheng zhi li chang 
guo ji yu lun pu bian ren wei 
ya zhou xu yao de shi guo yu guo zhi jian de xin ren 
er an bei yi zai po huai xin ren fen wei 
can bai jing guo shen she zhi ju geng shi gong ran tiao xin 
qia ru na cui da tu sha de xing cun zhe wei sai er suo shuo 
wo mei you huo zai guo qu zhong 
dan wang shi huo zai wo xin li 
an bei jin tian de ju dong bu neng bu rang ren men hui xiang qi er zhan qian de ri ben 
ri ben bao fa li shi shang kong qian shen ke de jing ji wei ji 
fa xi si yun dong cheng shi er qi 
guo jia gai zao 
yi bai tuo wei ji wei jie kou 
shi tu jian li tian huang zhi fa xi si zhu yi guo jia 
wang xiang gou zhu suo wei 
da dong ya gong rong quan 
yi tong ba ya zhou 
an bei gong kai fou ding dong jing shen pan 
bing bu shi ri ben ren zi ji zuo chu de 
ying gai shuo shi lian he guo de zhan sheng zhe yi fang zuo chu de cai jue 
an bei yang yan 
dui ben guo li shi bao you zi hao gan 
sheng cheng guan yu ri ben zhi min qin lve de ding yi shang wu ding lun 
an bei jiao xiao dui kang zhong guo shi ri ben wei shi jie 
ri ben jiang dai ling ya zhou guo jia zu zhi 
zhong guo wei xie 
zai ya tai an quan ling yu dan ren ling xiu 
sheng ji wei jian cha ting xin wang zhan kai tong 
ta jiang geng ji shi tong bao an jian cha chu xin xi 
geng bian li qun zhong wang shang ju bao 
sheng ji wei jian cha ting wang zhan yu zhong yang ji wei jian cha bu wang zhan gong neng quan mian dui jie 
jiang di yi shi jian zhun que chuan di zhong yang 
sheng wei guan yu dang feng lian zheng jian she he fan fu bai gong zuo de fang zhen zheng ce 
jue ce bu shu 
wang zhan kai she 
ji shi tong bao sheng ji wei jian cha ting he quan sheng ge ji ji jian jian cha ji guan cha ban de an jian xin xi 
wang zhan chang tong wang luo ju bao 
tong guo she zhi de wang luo ju bao chuang kou 
guang fan shou ji an jian xian suo 
fa dong qun zhong can yu fan fu chang lian jian she 
zai xian fang tan 
zai xian zhi bo 
zai xian gou tong 
jiang jia da he wang you de jiao liu 
dui hua he gou tong 
shi ji wei you guan fu ze ren jie shao 
wang zhan te se xian ming 
tu xian hu bei te se 
zhong gong wu da hui zhi ji zhong yang ji wei dan sheng di 
si da lian zheng wen hua pin pai 
liu da jiao yu ji de 
yi ji dian ying 
zhong cheng yu bei pan 
deng ju you hu bei te se de biao zhi xing lian zheng yuan su he fu hao dou de dao zhan xian 
sheng wei chang wei 
sheng ji wei shu ji hou chang an diao yan bing dian ji kai tong wang zhan 
ji zhe wang xing hua tong xun yuan zhao ning 
wu han shi jiang han qu xi ma lu xiao xue zhuan men she zhi 
zhe yi te shu ke tang 
liu dong hua duo 
zai lao shi zhi dao xia yi qi dong shou bao jiao zi 
ci jiu ying xin 
hai zi men ba qin shou zuo de jiao zi dai hui jia 
gei zai han da gong 
xin ku le yi nian de fu mu chang yi chang 
ji zhe li xi ben bao shi jie wang zhu su fang shi xi sheng wang shi hao she 
hu bei sheng nong cun gong zuo hui yi zai wu han zhao kai 
hui yi shen ru guan che luo shi dang de shi ba jie san zhong quan hui 
zhong yang jing ji gong zuo hui yi he zhong yang nong cun gong zuo hui yi jing shen 
zong jie qu nian quan sheng 
bing an zhao zhong yang dui 
gong zuo de xin ding wei 
xin mu biao he xin yao qiu 
dui wo sheng jin nian he jin hou yi ge shi qi de 
gong zuo jin xing le yan jiu bu shu 
sheng wei shu ji li hong zhong chu xi hui yi bing jiang hua 
sheng zhang wang guo sheng zuo gong zuo bu shu 
sheng wei fu shu ji zhang chang er zhu chi hui yi bing zuo zong jie jiang hua 
sheng ling dao wang xiao dong 
wang zhen you deng 
zai wu han zhu hui chang huo ge de fen hui chang chu xi hui yi 
hui yi ren wei 
gang gang zhao kai de zhong yang nong cun gong zuo hui yi 
cong dang he guo jia shi ye fa zhan quan ju chu fa 
shen ke fen xi le nong ye nong cun xing shi 
dui jin hou yi ge shi qi de nong cun gai ge fa zhan jin xing le quan mian bu shu 
xi jin ping zong shu ji he li ke qiang zong li zai hui shang ti chu le hen duo xin si xiang 
ji zhong fan ying le xin yi jie zhong yang ling dao ji ti guan yu xin shi qi 
gong zuo de zhan lve si xiang 
ju you hen qiang de zhen dui xing he zhi dao xing 
gong zuo de zhong yao zhi nan he gen ben zun xun 
wo men yao ren zhen xue xi ling hui hui yi jing shen shi zhi 
qie shi ba si xiang ren shi tong yi dao zhong yang dui 
xing shi de ke xue pan duan shang lai 
ba xing dong cuo shi tong yi dao zhong yang dui 
gong zuo de jue ce bu shu shang lai 
wei gong zuo zong mu biao 
yi xi jin ping zong shu ji ti chu de 
wu da ke ti 
ji liang shi sheng chan 
wan shan nong cun ji ben jing ying zhi du 
shi pin an quan 
shei lai zhong di 
nong cun she hui guan li deng wei gong zuo zhong dian 
hui yi zhi chu 
quan sheng ge ji dang wei 
zheng fu yao zhen dui dang qian nong cun gai ge fa zhan de xin te dian 
zeng qiang zuo hao 
gong zuo de zi jue xing he jin po xing 
qie shi ba nong ye bai zai di yi wei 
qiang hua shou wei du 
cong tou ru li du 
tou zi fang xiang 
zheng ce shi shi 
zheng ji guan deng fang mian ti xian 
zhong zhong zhi zhong 
que bao nong ye fa zhan de kong jian bu neng ji 
mian ji bu neng shao 
zong liang bu neng jian 
yao cong jia qiang nong tian shui li jian she 
shou zhu geng di hong xian 
wan shan nong cun ji ben jing ying zhi du 
zhuang da nong chan pin jia gong ye 
chuang jian fu wu 
gan bu he gao su zhi nong min pei yang ji ji ceng zu zhi jian she deng liu ge fang mian zhuo li 
gong zuo zhong dian 
mei nong ti gong qiang you li de ying zhi cheng 
yao cheng shi ba jie san zhong quan hui dong feng 
yong gai ge chuang xin jing shen jie jue zhi cheng 
de ping jing wen ti 
an zhao rang shi chang zai zi yuan pei zhi zhong qi jue ding xing zuo yong de yuan ze tui jin nong ye ge xiang gai ge 
zai mei hua nong cun 
tui jin cheng zhen hua he nong ye xian dai hua zhong chong fen ti xian ke xue fa zhan guan 
gao du zhong shi nong cun she hui guan li 
zhong dian zhi li shi pin an quan wen ti 
gong zuo ti gong jian shi bao zhang 
hui yi yao qiu 
quan sheng ge ji dang wei 
zheng fu zai gong zuo bu shu 
cai li an pai he gan bu pei bei deng fang mian yao xiang 
zhu yao ling dao yao qin zi zhua 
fen guan ling dao yao ju ti zhua 
shi xian dang zheng ling dao geng yao ba zhu yao jing li fang zai 
dui zhong yang he sheng wei bu shu de 
ge xiang gong zuo ren wu 
yao jin kuai zhi ding gong zuo fang an 
xi hua cuo shi yao qiu 
jia qiang gong zuo zhi dao 
yan ge jian du jian cha 
yao zeng qiang cai zheng tou ru de zhen dui xing 
jing zhun xing he shi xiao xing 
jia qiang tong chou zheng he 
ji zhong yong yu 
gong zuo de guan jian huan jie 
jie jue tu chu mao dun he wen ti 
ji ji yan jiu tan suo kai zhan xin de tou rong zi qu dao 
jian li jian quan 
tou ru wen ding zeng zhang de zhang xiao ji zhi 
fa hui cai zheng zi jin yin dao he gang gan zuo yong 
yao shi ying xin xing shi 
chuang xin xing zheng guan li ji zhi 
jian chi shi chang hua gai ge dao xiang 
jia kuai tui jin zheng fu she nong zhi neng zhuan bian 
ba shi chang neng ban de jiao gei shi chang 
nong min hui ban de jiao gei nong min 
ji ceng gai ban de jiao gei ji ceng 
chuang xin ze ren luo shi ji zhi 
xing cheng yi ji zhua yi ji 
ceng ceng zhua luo shi de gong zuo ge ju 
que bao nong cun gai ge fa zhan ge xiang gong zuo wen bu tui jin 
que bao qiang nong hui nong fu nong zheng ce luo dao shi chu 
hui yi qiang diao 
gong zuo yao you guan jian cuo shi 
yi shi luo shi liang shi zeng chan cuo shi 
jia da nong ji gou zhi deng zheng ce bu tie li du 
jin yi bu tui guang gong chang hua yu yang 
kuo da shuang ji dao zhong zhi mian ji 
er shi luo shi tui jin nong cun gai ge cuo shi 
zhua jin zhi ding gai ge fang an 
ming que gai ge ren wu shu 
lu xian tu he shi jian biao 
li zheng zai nong cun tu di que quan ban zheng 
pei yu xin xing nong ye jing ying zhu ti 
nong cun chan quan jiao yi 
ban hao gai ge lian xi dian shang qu de xin tu po 
san shi luo shi 
si ge yi pi 
gong cheng ti zhi zeng xiao cuo shi 
zhua ling tou qi ye 
zhua ke ji chuang xin 
zhua pin pai zheng he 
zhua long tou dai dong 
yi nong chan pin jia gong ye de xin tu po yin ling xian dai nong ye jian she 
si shi luo shi xin nong cun jian she cuo shi 
ji xu tui jin ge ge ceng mian jian she shi dian 
si hua tong bu 
shi fan zhen jian she he nong cun ren ju huan jing zheng zhi 
wu shi luo shi nong cun she hui zhi li cuo shi 
yi xin yi lun 
huo dong wei zhua shou 
jia qiang nong cun wang ge hua jian she 
jie jue nong cun gong gong fu wu 
zui hou yi gong li 
sheng zheng fu mi shu zhang wang xiang xi 
sheng wei nong cun gong zuo ling dao xiao zu cheng yuan 
sheng zhi you guan dan wei zhu yao fu ze tong zhi 
zheng fu fu ze tong zhi deng 
zai zhu hui chang huo fen hui chang can jia hui yi 
ji zhe cai zhao yang 
zou jin yi shu 
xin nian min zu guan xian yue yin yue hui zai wu han qin tai da ju yuan ju xing 
you wu han yin yue xue yuan dong fang zhong yue tuan yan zou de 
jin she kuang wu 
deng jing dian qu mu ying de guan zhong zhen zhen zhang sheng 
ji zhe sun wen she 
wu han shi jiang an qu xin cun jie zu zhi zhi yuan zhe 
zou fang wei wen gang gang ban jin gong zu fang de li bao zhen deng 
song shang xin nian zhu fu 
ji zhe zhang hong ben bao shi jie wang yuan zhe she 
cong mei shu tong kao yi fen yi duan biao ke yi kan chu 
cong jin nian qi 
mei shu tong kao 
han du li she zhi de yi shu ben ke yuan xiao 
zai nei de zai e zhao sheng yuan xiao de mei shu lei zhuan ye 
bi xu can jia sheng tong yi zu zhi de mei shu lei zhuan ye tong kao 
wei can jia quan sheng mei shu lei zhuan ye tong kao huo tong kao bu he ge kao sheng 
bu neng bao kao suo you gao xiao zu zhi de mei shu lei zhuan ye xiao kao 
ji shi qu de le gao xiao de he ge zheng ye shi zuo wu xiao 
ji zhe gong xue 
tong xun yuan gong ping 
sheng shi pin an quan wei yuan hui ban gong shi dui quan sheng 
qi jian shi pin an quan gong zuo zuo chu zhou mi bu shu 
yao qiu ge de jia qiang ling dao 
jing xin zu zhi 
quan mian pai cha 
qie shi zuo hao shi pin an quan gong zuo 
bao zhang ren min qun zhong shen ti jian kang he sheng ming an quan 
ge de ge bu men yao quan mian pai cha shi pin an quan yin huan 
ren zhen zu zhi kai zhan jie ri qi jian shi pin an quan jian du zhi fa jian cha 
zhen dui xiao fei liang da de liang shi zhi pin 
rou ji rou zhi pin 
qin dan zhi pin 
tiao liao he tiao wei pin deng zhong dian pin zhong jin xing zhuan xiang jian cha 
zhen dui shi pin an quan wen ti yin huan bi jiao ji zhong de ge lei ji mao shi chang 
shi pin pi fa shi chang 
shi pin sheng chan jia gong chang suo deng zhong dian qu yu kai zhan tu ji jian cha 
ji shi fa bu shi pin an quan jian guan xin xi 
yin dao gong zhong li xing xiao fei 
ji shi zhu dong bao guang yi pi xing zhi e lie 
ying xiang mian guang 
zhen she zuo yong da de dian xing an jian 
xing cheng gao ya tai shi 
ying zao liang hao de xiao fei huan jing 
he li an pai zhi shou ren yuan 
bao chi lian luo tong chang 
chang tong tou su ju bao qu dao 
zuo hao shi pin an quan shi gu ying dui zhun bei gong zuo 
ji zhe chen yu 
tong xun yuan sun lin 
shi xi sheng sun shang 
ren ti ge qi guan zu zhi zai er kuo shang dou you xiang ying de ci ji dian 
yi dan qi guan zu zhi fa sheng bing bian 
er shang de mou ge te ding bu wei zhong yi cheng zhi wei 
jiu hui chan sheng yi ding de bian hua he fan ying 
yin ci dang ci ji mou ge er xue shi 
jiu ke yi zhen duan he zhi liao ti nei xiang ying bu wei de ji bing 
ru kan er chui de bao hou ke zhi shen zang gong neng hao bu hao 
kan er chui de pi fu you wu zhou wen ke zhi dong mai shi fou ying hua deng 
ren men chang shuo 
duo chi yu hui bian cong ming 
yin wei yu cun zai da liang de 
chi yu neng bu chong nao zhong shui ping 
cong er shi da nao gong neng de dao jia qiang 
zeng qiang le ji yi li 
ti gao le pan duan li 
yu lei shen shang 
nei xie bu wei ying yang zui feng fu ne ? 
ji lei shi wu qie ji cun yu bing xiang 
ri chang sheng huo zhong 
wo men chang chang shi bu guan san qi er shi yi ba suo you shi wu dou fang jin bing xiang 
ren wei zhe yang you li yu shi wu de chu cun 
ye you li yu wo men shi yong shi fang bian wei sheng 
dan shi que bu zhi 
you xie shi wu shi wan wan bu neng fang jin bing xiang de 
yi dan fang jin bing xiang fan er hui chan sheng bu li yu jian kang de yin su 
xiao bian jiu zheng li le yi xia ji lei jue dui bu neng fang jin bing xiang de shi wu 
ta men bao kuo 
hui shi xiang jiao fa hei fu lan 
jia zhuang xian suo fen mi de ji su tiao jie ti nei de dai xie huo dong 
qi zhong bao kuo tou fa de sheng zhang 
ru guo jia zhuang xian de zhuang kuang yin qi le dan bai zhi dai xie wen luan de hua 
jiu hui dao zhi tuo fa tuo fa he tou fa xi shu 
yin shi jie gou bu liang huo you yu bao yin bao shi yin fa de ying yang bu liang ye ke neng dao zhi tou fa xi shu 
yang sheng xu zhi 
nao xue guan bing 
shou fang zhuan jia 
bei jing xuan wu yi yuan shen jing nei ke zhu zhi yi shi 
shang bang li you 
shi wei zu zhi shu ju xian shi 
zi zhen zi cha 
chu le dao yi yuan jian cha 
hai you yi ge jian dan zi cha fang fa 
ji kan ni de mian bu biao qing shi fou jiang ying 
kan dong xi shi fou qing chu 
si zhi gong neng shi fou zheng chang 
ji bing yu fang 
dong tian shi nao zu zhong de gao fa qi 
yin wei leng nuan wu chang 
ying gai zhu yi bao nuan 
ling wai ping he xin tai ye hen zhong yao 
bu yao sheng qi 
bao pi qi de ren geng yi zhi nao xue guan bing 
jiu yi zhi dao 
cuo guo zhe ge huang jin shi jian 
jiu zhi qi lai hen nan 
yang sheng xu zhi 
ren ti ben shen ye shi ge wu ran yuan 
zai yi ye de shui mian zhong 
ren ti de pi fu hui pai chu da liang de shui zheng qi 
bei zi xi shou huo xi fu shui fen he qi ti 
ru bu rang qi san fa chu qu 
li ji die bei 
yi shi bei zi shou chao ji shou hua xue wu zhi wu ran 
shui jiao liu kou shui huo shi bing 
shi zhong xiao bing yao ni ming 
bu jin jin shi ke ai 
ni hui wei ni shui jiao shi liu kou shui er bu hao yi si ma 
zhe ke bu shi ke ai huo bu wei sheng na me jian dan 
ta ke neng shi you yu ni de shen jing tiao jie zhang ai er yin qi de 
tuo ye fen mi de tiao jie 
wan quan shi shen jing fan she xing de 
wang mei zhi ke 
jiu shi ri chang sheng huo zhong 
tiao jian fan she xing tuo ye fen mi de yi ge li zi 
chu ci zhi wai 
kou qiang nei de wei sheng mei you da sao hao 
ye hui chu xian liu kou shui de xian xiang 
kou qiang li de wen du he shi du zui shi he xi jun de fan zhi 
shui jiao liu kou shui 
ye shi zai ti xing ni 
xiao xin ya zhou bing 
yao qu kan ya yi le 
bu ke qing shi 
zui jin jiao you xie zhong 
hai ban sui zhe tong yang 
zhe ge kan shi xun chang de zheng zhuang 
ke bu neng xiao qiao 
ta hen you ke neng shi zai dui ni shuo 
ni de jing mai chu le wen ti 
wang wang shi you yu jing mai shuan se er yin qi de 
ji shi kan yi sheng de hua jiu mei shen me shi 
bu ran hen ke neng dao zhi xia zhi fu zhong 
shen zhi hui yin fa fei shuan se 
ying xiang dao ni de sheng ming an wei 
jing mai zhong de yi xie xiao xue guan bei du se zhu le 
xue ye jiu hui liu bu chang 
cai hui chu xian jiao zhong de zheng zhuang 
suo yi ni ke bu neng diao yi qing xin 
ru guo ni de jiao zhong 
tong guo an mo bu jin wu fa tui xia qu 
fan er yue lai yue yan zhong de hua 
jiu yao yin qi gao du zhong shi le 
jian kang chang shou shi yi zhong sheng huo xi guan 
geng shi yi zhong sheng huo tai du 
mei tian duo zhu yi yi dian jian kang sheng huo de yao dian 
ri ji yue lei xia lai hui rang ni huo yi fei qian 
rang ni chi chi he he qing song bian cheng zhang shou ti zhi 
wu lun nan nv lao shao dou xi huan zai zhou mo xiu xian de shi hou 
man man de pao yi hu cha 
xiang shou jia ri de xiu xian 
bu shi mei ge ren dou shi he he cha yang sheng de 
wo men lai kan yi xia 
nei xie zhuang kuang xia de wo men xu yao he cha ye ge li qi lai 
fa shao ji he cha 
cha ye zhong ka fei jian bu dan neng shi ren ti ti wen sheng gao 
er qie hai hui jiang di yao xiao 
gan zang bing ren ji yin cha 
cha ye zhong de ka fei jian deng wu zhi jue da bu fen jing gan zang dai xie 
ruo gan zang you bing 
yin cha guo duo chao guo gan zang dai xie neng li 
jiu hui you sun yu gan zang zu zhi 
shen jing shuai ruo shen yin cha 
cha ye zhong de ka fei jian you xing fen shen jing zhong shu de zuo yong 
shen jing shuai ruo yin nong cha 
you qi shi xia wu he wan shang 
jiu hui yin qi shi mian 
jia zhong bing qing 
ke yi zai bai tian de shang wu ji wu hou ge yin yi ci cha 
zai shang wu bu fang yin hua cha 
wu hou yin lv cha 
wan shang bu yin cha 
huan zhe hui bai tian jing shen zhen fen 
ye jian jing qi shu xin 
ke yi zao dian ru shui 
dou dou de wei zhi jing shi ni de shen ti jian kang wen ti 
 e tou  gan zang 
ru guo ni de e tou zong you da li dou dou bu duan 
na shuo ming ni de gan zang yi jing ji lei le guo duo du su 
bu gui lv de sheng huo 
zhou ye dian dao 
zhang shi jian ao ye dou hui rang xin huo wang sheng 
du su jiu hui ji lei xia lai 
dou dou shi liao 
rang shen ti jin ru xiu mian zhuang tai 
na pa shui bu zhe 
ye yao shen ti jin ru liang hao de pai du shi liao 
zhong yi zhi zhao 
ke yi yong lian xin pao cha yin 
chi xie bao xin yang yan de shi wu ru fu ling 
hai ying te bie zhu yi shui mian 
kong bu de zhi ai shi pin ming dan 
zui yi zhi ai de shi pin you nei xie ne ? zhe ge wo jue de da jia ying gai bu tai qing chu 
sui ran xian zai ren men yue lai yue zhong shi jian kang le 
dan shi dui yi xie wen ti hai shi cun zai zhe wu qu de 
yu shi wo hui jin suo neng lai bang zhu ni 
xi wang neng gou ti gong nin suo xu yao de dong xi 
ji dan shi wo men chang chi de shi pin zhi yi 
hen duo shang ban zu wei le tan fang bian 
mei tian zao shang shang ban dou shi yong yi ge ji dan gao ding zi ji de zao can 
wo men chi le zhe me duo ji dan 
bing bu jiu shi dai biao wo men dong de zen me zheng que chi ji dan 
ru guo ni chi fan dui piao de hua 
na jiu gen wo lai kan kan zhe xie chi yu de wu qu 
shuo bu ding ni jiu fan le qi zhong hao ji ge 
ji dan shi wo men sheng huo zhong chang jian de shi pin 
bu zheng que de chi fa dui wo men de jian kang you zhe bu liang ying xiang 
zai sheng huo zhong 
wo men ying zhu yi yi xia wu qu 
dong ji yang sheng 
yang rou bu yi yu cu 
cha ye tong shi 
fou ze hui jiang di zhuang yang xiao guo 
chan sheng rou suan dan bai zhi 
yin fa bian mi 
cheng nian nan xing chang chi lv rou ke yi gai shan you gan shen bu zu yin qi de yao xi suan ruan 
bo qi wu li deng zheng zhuang 
ge zi dan he gou qi zi yi qi qing zheng huo bao tang shi yong 
neng shi yin jing bo qi geng jia you li 
nan ren bu shen de hua ti yi zhi die die bu xiu 
na nan ren chi shen me rou zui bu shen ne 
zhong yi jie shi 
ben cao shi yi 
jiang yang rou yu ren can xiang ti bing lun 
ren wei ta shi wen bu 
zhuang ti de rou lei pin 
xian dai ying yang xue ye zheng shi 
yang rou bu jin ying yang feng fu 
hai han you wei liang xing ji su 
di que you zhuang yang zuo yong 
yang rou bu yi yu cu 
cha ye tong shi 
fou ze hui jiang di zhuang yang xiao guo 
chan sheng rou suan dan bai zhi 
yin fa bian mi 
da jia dou zhi dao xue xing shi yu shu xue you zhe mi qie de guan xi 
dan xue xing chu le ti gong shu xue he shou xue de yi ju zhi wai 
ge zhong ji bing de fa sheng lv ye bu yi yang 
li ru xing de peng you nao xue guan ji bing fa sheng lv jiao gao ; xing de peng you guan xin bing fa sheng lv jiao gao 
jiu gei da jia jie shao bu tong xue xing de ren yu yi xie chang jian ji bing de guan xi 
dong chi luo bo shi zhi you dao ji da jin ji bu ke hu shi 
dong chi luo bo xia chi jiang 
bu lao yi sheng kai yao fang 
yan xia zheng shi shi yong luo bo de hao shi jie 
zhuan jia zhi chu 
dong chi luo bo te zhi bai luo bo 
er qie chi luo bo you hen duo jin ji 
da pei bu qia dang chu le ying yang you sun shi wai 
hai ying xiang shen ti jian kang 
jiang jian shao se su chen dian 
jiang han you feng fu dan bai zhi 
duo zhong wei sheng su 
hu luo bo su 
jiang zhong suo han de jiang la su jin ru ti nei hou 
you hen qiang de kang yang hua xiao guo 
ke fang zhi huo jian shao zhi he su de chen ji 
yu fang lao nian ban 
jiang hai neng yi zhi ai xi bao huo xing 
he jiang cha hai neng zhi liao qing wei gan mao 
zhe ye shi ying guo ren chang yong de fang fa 
bu ke yi ci shi yong guo duo 
zhe liang zhong xing ge de ren zui yi huan ai 
tai zhui qiu wan mei 
bie zuo pin ming san lang 
bao ming bi ge ming zhong yao 
ge xing xin li yin su he ai zheng guan xi mi qie 
zai yin fa ai zheng de yin su zhong 
you wei nv shi 
qian yi duan shi jian zhao wo kan bing 
zong gong sheng le si zhong ai 
bing qie dou shi yuan fa ai 
yi ge fei ai 
yi ge shen ai 
zuo you ru xian xian hou dou sheng ai 
ta mei you ai zheng jia zu shi 
te bie jiao zhen 
zhui qiu wan mei 
ta dui bu xia suo zuo de ren he shi qing dou bu tai fang xin 
hen bu de mei hui dou chong xin zuo yi bian 
ren ji guan xi he jia ting sheng huo ye yin wei ta de guo fen jiao zhen er bu he xie 
cheng shi li nv xing de ru xian ai 
luan chao ai huan zhe 
hen duo dou shi wo men kan qi lai de 
shi sheng huo shang mei you shen me huai xi guan 
gong zuo shang ze shi yi si bu gou 
ren ren zhen zhen 
zhe xie ren wang wang gong zuo ya li xiang dui bi jiao zhong 
chang qi fan suo de gong zuo te dian you zao jiu le ta men jiao zhen er you bi jiao zhui qiu wan mei de ge xing 
yin ci ji yi chan sheng shen xin wen ti 
dou shuo ai zheng yu yi chuan you yi ding guan xi 
dan lin chuang shang 
ye hen chang jian 
wan ming ai zheng huan zhe dang zhong 
zhe zhu yao shi you suo you de jia ting cheng yuan huo fu qi shuang fang dou sheng huo zai xiang jin de jia ting huan jing dang zhong 
yi ji you zhe xiang si de sheng huo fang shi suo dao zhi de 
chu yi chuan he sheng huo fang shi wai 
xing ge yu ai zheng ye you mi qie guan xi 
yi huan ai zheng de ren xing ge te dian da zhi you liang lei qing kuang 
yi shi guo yu jiao zhen de ren 
yi shi guo yu yi yu 
guo yu jiao lv de ren 
bie zuo pin ming san lang 
you yi xie ai zheng huan zhe 
zai gong zuo shang ke yi shuo shi pin ming san lang 
yi xian ai huan zhe hen duo dou shi yin wei pin ming gong zuo 
bu duan gei zi ji shi jia ya li 
jie guo cu shi yi xian ai fa zuo 
gan ai huan zhe fa bing qian ye you hen duo ren zai pin ming gong zuo 
xiang zhe zhong lei xing de ren 
ni yao quan ta 
yi ge ren huo zhe de yi yi bu jin shi gong zuo 
hai you qi ta yi xie you yi yi de shi 
ren yao xue hui qu pin wei 
ti yan sheng huo de qi ta le qu 
ren sheng mei you yi yi ke yan 
yao rang ta men tong ding si tong 
fan ran xing wu 
wei le ge ming 
pin ming gong zuo 
wang le sheng ming 
huo zhe pei shang xing ming 
jue dui bu zhi de 
shen me xiang mao de nv ren cai zui wang fu 
nv xing de mian xing da zhi ke fen wei si zhong xing tai 
fen bie shi jin 
ta men zhe she si zhong bu tong de mian xing 
jin xing mian fang 
mu xing gua zi kou mian 
shui xing mian yuan he huo xing jian mian 
mian xiang zhuan jia wei wo men jie shi le zhe si zhong mian xing de chao ji wang fu mian 
ta shi jin xing mian fang nv xing ruo mian fang 
xing ge ben shu gang qiang 
dui hun yin bu hao 
dan mian you rou bao zhe 
ji neng wai rou nei gang 
biao xian chu yi zhong du te xing ge 
gu dai de zhen lie nv zi 
bian shu ci zhong nv xing 
yan shen ruo neng rou he 
geng shi yi ge shan liang he you ai xin de nv xing 
dong de ti tie bie ren 
er ruo quan bi xiang pei 
ji bi zhi quan gu qi er you rou 
dan quan bi you bu zhi tai gao 
bu hui chao guo zhang fu de bi 
zhe zhong nv xing ze fei chang zhi neng gan 
yi shang suo shuo san zhong mian xiang pei he qi lai de huang jin wang fu xiang ji shi 
mian fang you rou 
yan shen rou he 
quan bi xiang pei 
liang xing yang sheng 
bi yun ji li 
fu fan ying shao 
ke yi fang zhi hen zhang shi jian 
shen zhi dao jue jing shi zai qu chu 
an quan bi yun yao dian 
suo yi yao chang qu zuo guang jian cha 
yi mian huan li kai zheng chang wei zhi er dai huan shou yun 
you fu ke yan zheng 
yue jing guo duo huo bu gui ze ji sheng zhi dao zhong liu zhe bu yi dai huan 
ju wai mei bao dao 
feng ru fei tun shi bu shao nv shi zhui qiu de shen cai 
hai you yi ci ta ya sui le ju yuan de ma tong 
mei xi de shen cai rang ta shang che wu fa kou an quan dai 
nan zhao he shen yi wu 
mei yue zhi zhuang fei shu bai mei yuan 
bu jin ru ci 
ta you ci hai ya sui le ju yuan ma tong 
ta du shu shi ye shou jin tong xue chao xiao 
duo nian lai shang jie nan tao bai yan 
yin xing dong bu bian 
mei xi mei yue ling qu shu bai mei yuan zheng fu can ji jin tie 
bu guo zhe xie dou wu sun ta de zi xin 
ta ren wei zi ji de shen cai you 
zi ji xiang xin jia zhong you 
ju tun ji yin 
yin wei jia li jie mei dou shi xia wei feng man 
reng wu zhu shou shen 
shi liao yang sheng 
dou fu sha jing 
dou fu chi duo le you hai ma 
mei wei bu ke duo tan 
hao dong xi ye yao shi ke er zhi 
chang qi da liang chi dou fu ke neng chan sheng ru xia wen ti 
cu shi dong mai ying hua 
dou zhi pin han you ji wei feng fu de dan an suan 
dan an suan zai mei de zuo yong xia ke zhuan hua wei ban guang an suan 
ta hui sun shang dong mai guan bi nei pi xi bao 
shi dan gu chun he gan you san zhi chen ji yu dong mai bi shang 
dao zhi dong mai ying hua xing cheng 
cu shi tong feng fa zuo 
dou fu han piao ling jiao duo 
piao ling dai xie shi chang de tong feng bing ren he xue niao suan nong du zeng gao de huan zhe 
duo chi dou fu yi dao zhi tong feng fa zuo 
dao zhi dian que fa 
zhi zuo dou fu de da dou han you de zao jiao dai 
hui jia su ti nei dian de pai xie 
chang qi guo liang shi yong dou fu hen rong yi yin qi dian que fa 
dao zhi dian que fa bing 
xi hong shi han you feng fu de gai 
hu luo bo su 
zu wei sheng su he wei sheng su 
xi hong shi suan tian ke kou 
sheng shu jie neng shi yong 
wei wei suan shi kou 
xi hong shi neng sheng jin zhi ke 
jian wei xiao shi 
dui shi yu bu zhen you hen hao de fu zhu zhi liao zuo yong 
xi hong shi rou zhi duo 
dui shen yan bing ren you hen hao de shi liao zuo yong 
chang chi xi hong shi 
hai ke yi shi pi fu xi hua bai xi 
yan huan shuai lao 
lai ang na duo 
jie zhe sheng dan dang qi de wei li 
bei mei ying shi yi gong you wu bu xin pian zai shang zhou gong ying 
re men ying pian 
hua er jie zhi lang 
ji jin piao fang bang qian wu ming 
bang shou reng jiu you shang ying yi jing san zhou de mo huan da pian 
huo bi te ren 
shi mao ge zhi zhan 
lao lao zhan ju 
zai xin lao ying pian de fa li xia 
wang de nan ren 
li zhun ji de yan hen shi he yan gu zhuang 
dou hen fu he gu dian de shen mei 
ta de yan yi ye hen bu cuo 
kong ji de nuo ruo 
jue jiang he shan liang 
zhe nian tou ge zhong gu zhuang ju da xi nao 
ju zhong zao xing 
qing jie deng deng dou shi lai zi wai xing de jie zou 
lin xin ru shi yan de 
qing shi huang fei 
chu guo gong zhu 
gao gui dian ya 
chu le bu hui wu gong 
qi ta wu suo bu zhi 
wu suo bu neng 
xin ban mu wan qing meng sha zao xing lei ren 
sui zhe zhong han liang ban 
tian long ba bu 
ye zao dao wang you dui ren wu zao xing de ji ti tu cao 
dui shi yan duan yu de han guo yan yuan ye shi yi tong luan pi 
ling wai hai ban chu yi wang 
tian long ba bu 
zhu yan zao xing dui bi 
dui a zhu a zi geng shi bu fang guo 
qi zhong dui mu wan qing yi jiao de zao xing zui wei tu chu 
tiao kan cheng mu wan qing meng zhao hei se lei si nei ku shang chang 
xiao fan wang you 
wei bo shai chu yi zu shi yan duan yu de zao xing ju zhao 
da lu na me duo nian qing shuai qi de yan yuan 
que pian pian xuan le ge zui chou zui bu he shi de han guo yan yuan lai yan duan yu 
jin ji fan de zhe zhang lian kan qi lai ru ci you ni 
yong zhong qie jiang ying 
duan yu yuan you de feng liu ti tang 
huo po ling dong zai zhe bu xi li bian de ru ci la ta 
yi xi bai yi piao piao de mei gan ye quan ran bu jian 
qu er dai zhi de shi cang ying lv . 
zhen shi shi shang zui chou duan yu 
zhao pian zhong de duan yu yi shen mo lv de chang pao 
yi fu qiao pi de biao qing 
you zhe ying er fei de lian 
geng xin wei bo 
shang chuan yi wang 
tian long ba bu 
zhong zhu yan he ci ju zhu yan dui bi zhao 
dui a zhu a zi de zao xing ye biao shi qiang lie de bu man 
zao xing chou yi jing shi yuan zui 
que hai yao yi ren tong shi yan a zhu yu a zi 
ni ru ci zao ta jing dian 
qu shang hai guan zhong de yan jing 
ni jia li ren zhi dao ma 
zhao pian zhong de a zi yi shen zi se wai yi 
deng yan zhang zui 
zhen shi wu fa zhi shi 
dui mu wan qing de zao xing biao xian de you wei tu chu 
cheng shi meng zhao hei se lei si nei ku shang chang de 
yang zi xia de rang ren shui bu zhe jue 
bing wei qi ju gai ming wei 
tian lei ba bu 
zhao pian zhong de mu wan qing tou guo hei se si jin 
hei se bo lang xing lei si zhe lian 
yan jing zui ba ruo yin ruo xian 
yang zi que shi lei ren 
ci wei bo zao xing bao guang hou 
wang you fen fen liu yan cheng 
hao huai nian yi wang de jing dian xing xiang 
tian long ba bu 
mu wan qing ban yan zhe zhao xue er ye ren bu zhu tu cao 
tai zhong kou wei le 
ya tong bu shi bing 
tong qi lai yao ren ming 
jin guan ru ci zhi pa 
you ya bing xu yao kan yi sheng de ren que yue lai yue duo 
zhe li mian you yi ge zhong yao yuan yin 
jiu shi wo men cong xiao jian chi de yi xie ai ya hu chi de xi guan 
you ke neng shi cuo de ! 
leng shui hui dao zhi ya ben zhi min gan de ren ya chi suan tong 
er qie bu li yu ya gao nei de you xiao wu zhi fa hui huo xing 
ya gao zhong de zhu yao cheng fen shi mo ca ji he fu hua wu 
shi yan shi yan jiu fa xian 
shua ya shi yong jie jin zi ji ti wen de wen shui xiao guo zui hao 
chi rou bu zhang pang wu da huang jin fa ze 
duo chi bai rou 
shao chi hong rou 
ci nai lao sheng chang tan le 
jian fei qi jian chi rou 
gao dan bai de yu rou 
xia rou dang ran shi shou xuan la 
yin wei ji shi zai shou de zhu rou 
niu rou li ye hui yin cang hen duo ni kan bu dao de zhi fang 
yu rou zhi yao xuan dui bu wei 
jiu ke yi ji hu bu chi jin zhi fang 
tong yang de rou 
bu tong de bu wei 
yin wei zhi fang han liang bu yi yang 
re liang ye shi bu yi yang de 
yin ci chi na kuai rou fei chang guan jian 
bi ru ji chi jian yin wei duo shi ji pi he zhi fang 
suo yi re liang jiu bi ji xiong rou gao 
er qie ji chi jian shi ji quan shen ji su mi du zui gao de wei zhi zhi yi 
yin ci chang shi ji chi jian dui jian fei wu yi 
er chang yong lai zuo niang ku gua 
niang dou fu de rou mi 
wei shi kou gan geng hao 
zai zhi zuo shi yi ban hui jiao ru hen duo fei rou 
yao xuan ze he shi de bu wei peng ren 
peng ren de ban fa hen zhong yao 
sui ran shuo yu rou shi di ka lu li de rou 
ke shi dang ba xue yu zuo cheng le zha yu kuai 
re liang ke jiu he niu rou wan ye cha bu duo le 
qing zheng xue yu de re liang jiu di duo le 
zheng shi zui shi he de peng ren fang shi 
bu jin shao yong le bu shao you 
er qie xiang zheng de fang shi yi ban hui bi hong shao de ban fa shao yong hen duo tang 
hen duo ren dou nan yi kang ju mei shi de you huo 
yi zhi yu yi kou chi cheng yi ge pang zi 
nan dao jian fei shou shen jiu yi ding yao yu mei shi bao chi ju li ma 
bu yao dan xin 
jin tian xiao bian jiao ni chi shen me jian fei 
fen xiang qi da jian fei shi wu 
bing xian shang jian kang jian fei shi pu 
mei wei you ying yang 
rang ni ye neng yi kou chi cheng 
hai zao di ka 
zui zhong yao de shi neng ti sheng dai xie 
bu yue er tong bei shou shen zhuan jia da tui jian 
qi zhong you yi zui hao bao cun 
zuo fa jian dan de hai dai ya ming lie bang shou ! 
jing chang kou chou de ren yao duo chi zhe san lei shi wu 
hen duo ren dou bei kou qi wen ti kun rao 
yi ban lai shuo 
kou qiang zhong you yi wei ji ben you yi xia liang ge yuan yin 
kou qiang bu wei sheng 
wei chang dao gong neng wen luan 
bu guan shi nei ge yuan yin 
zui kui huo shou du shi xi jun 
ru guo qu zhao kou qiang ke yi sheng kan bing 
ta ke neng hui ti chu liang dian jian yi 
ye jiu shi jiang jiu yin shi ping heng 
she ru zu gou de dan bai zhi he tan shui hua he wu 
yi ji fu han ge zhong wei sheng su de shu cai he shui guo 
can hou zui hao shua ya huo yong ya xian ti ya 
qi shi hai you yi zhong fang fa 
you ji zhong shi wu ben shen jiu shi qu chu kou qiang yi wei de neng shou 
bing neng fang zhi kou chou zai du chan sheng 
bu shao de shang ban zu zai zhou yi shang ban de shi hou 
dou gan jue fei chang de lao lei 
ming ming xiu xi le yi ge zhou mo 
dan shi gan jue que bi shang ban shi hou jing shen geng jia de cha 
qi shi zhe xie dou shi yin wei bu liang de sheng huo xi guan suo yin qi de 
jia qi zong he zheng 
bu liang sheng huo xi guan de wei hai hai you nei xie ne 
xiao bian jin tian fen xi yi xia jia qi li zui chang jian de bu liang xi guan you nei xie 
ri chang yang sheng 
wan shang bu shui jiao 
zao shang bu qi chuang 
bu shao de shang ban zu ping ri li shang ban dou xu yao yi zao qi chuang 
gan zhe shi jian qu shang ban 
shui mian de shi jian bing bu chong zu 
suo yi yi dao zhou mo he jia qi de shi hou 
zong shi chong fen de li yong shi jian da shui te shui 
shen zhi hen duo ren dou shi zhong wu cai qi chuang 
dan shi ye bing bu yi wei zhe ta men hui zhun shi de shang chuang shui jiao 
da bu fen de ren shi wan shang wan dian nao 
yi zhi dao ling chen dou bu yuan yi shui jiao 
zhe yang de sheng huo zuo xi shi jian wei bei le zheng chang de sheng wu zhong 
bai tian shi da zi ran an pai gei ren lei jin xing ge zhong huo dong de shi jian 
wan shang shi shui mian de shi jian 
er you zhe xie xi guan de ren pian pian yao yu zi ran gui lv bei dao er chi 
dui shen ti ken ding hui you yi ding de ying xiang 
ren de sheng li zhou qi zhong 
zhe ge shi jian duan xiu xi hao le 
ren de jing li jiu hui de dao bao zheng 
cai neng de dao shen du de shui mian 
ren ti zai shen du shui mian de shi hou 
shi sheng zhang ji su fen mi de wang sheng qi 
ren biao pi xi bao de xin chen dai xie shi zui huo yue de shi jian 
zhe ge shi jian mei you shui jiao de hua 
jiang hui ying xiang dao xi bao zai sheng de su du 
zui zhi jie de biao xian jiu shi dao zhi ji fu de lao hua 
dui yu chu zai sheng zhang fa yu qi de hai zi er yan de hua 
hui ying xiang hai zi shen gao de zeng zhang 
wu can yi qi chi 
fang jia de shi hou 
yi shui jiu shi dao da zhong wu 
wang wang xing guo lai de shi hou yi jing dao le wu fan shi jian le 
suo yi zao can ye jiu sheng le 
ye you bu fen de ren 
ji shi zao qi le 
ye lan de zi ji zuo ge zao can huo zhe xia qu chi ge zao can 
wang wang shi sui bian chi dian ling shi 
deng wu can shi jian de shi hou zai yi qi duo chi yi dian 
zhe yang de yin shi xi guan dui chang wei dao hui chan sheng yi ding de ci ji zuo yong 
jiu er jiu zhi hui xing cheng man xing de chang wei dao ji bing 
zao can bu chi 
zhe ge shi hou de wei yi jing kong le ban tian de shi jian 
tu ran chi xia da liang de shi wu zhi hou 
you ke neng dao zhi xiao hua 
chu xian wei tong 
fu zhang deng de bu shi zheng zhuang 
jian yi ge wei 
ji shi shi jia qi wan qi le ye yao jian chi chi zao can 
zhang wo zheng que wu shui zi shi he shi jian jing shen chong pei yi xia wu 
nin you shui wu jiao de xi guan ma ? guo ji yi xue yan jiu fa xian 
ti zhen jing shen de xiao guo zui hao ; shui tai jiu bu dan rong yi hun chen chen 
zi shi bu dui hai hui ya po xu duo bu wei 
zao cheng shang hai 
shi wei le zou geng yuan de lu ! shang le ban tian ban 
xu duo shang ban zu dou hui zai zhong wu wu shui yi xia 
xia wu shang ban cai you jing shen ! ran er 
zheng que de wu shui zi shi 
ye jue ding le wu shui pin zhi di hao huai 
guo wai yi you yan jiu zheng shi 
jing shen fan er hui geng cha 
geng lei ; er zhong wu you ji hui xiao shui yi xia 
jue dui bi he ka fei ti shen you xiao ! 
zhi jia kan chu shen ti na you ji bing 
zhi dao ni de zhi jia ke yi jie shi ni de zheng ti jian kang zhuang kuang me 
zhe er yi xiao kuai bai 
na yi pian dan hong 
huo zhe yi xie bo wen huo jie jie xing hong ban dou ke neng shi shen ti ji bing de xin hao 
han xing cheng le yi gu bu ke xiao kan de yi ren qun ti 
shi duo nian guo qu le 
han guo yan yi quan xin ren bei chu 
jing zheng ji lie 
xu duo ming zhi de han xing dou zhuan gong zui da de shi chang zhong guo 
ta men fen fen xue xi han yu 
tou shen yu nei di yan yi quan 
ran er ge you chen fu 
xiao bian wei nin xiang xi shu shuo 
ni kun ben shen bing bu shi han guo ren 
dan shi ni kun shi zai han guo chu dao zou hong 
er yu zhong guo ming xing song qian he zuo can jia 
wo men jie hun le 
zu cheng wei ni fu fu 
yin ci zai zhong guo xi shou le zhong duo wei ni fen 
xian zai ni kun ye man man lai zhong guo fa zhan 
can yan ou xiang ju 
yi you er fen zhi yi de xia tian 
zhe ye shi ni kun zai zhong guo de shou xiu 
zhong guo ren sheng huo shui ping ti gao hou 
ren men hai zai si kao zai chi dian shen me neng shi shen ti geng jian kang 
fu he wei sheng su 
xiao mai pei ya you 
zhe xie dou shi ren men shu xi de bu chong ji 
ta men hua xue cheng fen bu tong 
wu li xing tai bu yi 
dan ta men tong chang bei cheng wei 
shan shi bu chong ji 
bao jian shi pin 
er ru jin de shan shi jie gou jue ding le dan cong shi wu yi jing hen nan man zu ren ti zheng chang de ying yang xu qiu 
tong guo shan shi ying yang bu chong ji tiao jie ti nei ying yang ping heng 
ke yi gai shan zheng wei xie ren lei de ya jian kang he yin xing ji e deng ying yang que shi wen ti 
ni ke zeng xiang guo ni shen ti dou xu yao nei xie wei sheng su 
xu yao she ru duo shao 
duo jiu bu chong yi ci 
na jiu yi qi lai du du zhe pian wen zhang 
xiao xin zhe shi zhong shi wu 
ni hai zai si wu ji dan de chi ma 
cheng zhi deng deng 
zhe xie shi wu dou shi wo men ri chang sheng huo zhong de zha dan o 
bu xiang hui diao jian kang 
jiu yi ding yao zhu yi lou 
yao bu bu ru shi bu 
ying yang zhuan jia zhi chu 
zai ri chang yin shi zhong zhu yi ying yang de he li da pei 
bing shi dang bu chong ru xia shi wu 
you zhu nv xing fang bing kang bing 
yin wei zhou qi xing shi xue yi ji sheng yu deng yuan yin 
yue you san cheng yi shang de nv xing dou cun zai qing du que tie xing pin xue 
chang qi pin xue rong yi dao zhi luan chao gong neng xia jiang 
dui nv xing jian kang zao cheng ying xiang 
bu xue yang xue ke wei shi nv xing yi sheng de 
dong wu gan zang 
bo cai deng shi wu bu jin han tie liang gao 
er qie rong yi xi shou 
yi xue zhuan jia te bie ti xing 
nv xing zai jing qi shi yao jin liang shao he nong cha he ka fei 
yi mian qi zhong de dan ning suan yi zhi tie de xi shou 
dui yu shang ban zu lai shuo 
xiao xiao de cao mei zhen de neng rang ni yuan li fu she ma ? nan dao zhen de shi xiao shen cai da ying yang 
he ping guo xiang bi 
cao mei zhong hai han you da liang de wei sheng su yi ji duo fen lei kang yang hua wu zhi 
ying yang jia zhi hen hao 
zhe xie dou shi hen hao de kang fu she wei sheng su 
er qie cao mei ben shen ke yi bi mian rang pi fu zhi zhi yang hua 
gan zao xian xiang 
suo yi jing chang chi ke yi fang zhi pi fu shuai lao 
yang sheng wu qu 
bo cai dou fu ji tong shi niu nai ji dan bu tong zhu 
yin shi zhu zhong ying yang da pei ben shi jian kang sheng huo de hao xi guan 
ke jin lai wang shang liu chuan de yi xie suo wei 
shi wu da pei jin ji 
que gao de ren yi tou wu shui 
bo cai yu dou fu bu neng tong chi 
niu nai bu neng he ji dan yi qi zhu 
pang xie he shi zi yi qi chi hui zhong du fu xie 
huang hu jian ren men dou bu gan chi le 
ji zhe jin ri zai feng tai yang qiao cai fang shi min ding nv shi 
ta shuo jia li chu fang qiang bi shang tie zhe yi zhang 
shi yong xiang ke 
shi ke ti xing zi ji bu yao 
ji zhe gen ju shi min liu chuan de ban ben 
zheng li chu yi fen 
shi wu xiang ke 
qing jiao shi pin ying yang xue jie de zhuan jia 
fa xian bu shao 
dou shi miu wu 
you ren ren wei 
bo cai zhong han you cao suan 
ta he gai jie he xing cheng chen dian 
hui yin qi shen jie shi 
yin ci bo cai bu neng he dou fu tong chi 
xiao cong ye bu neng ban dou fu 
zhong guo nong ye da xue shi pin xue yuan fu jiao shou fan zhi hong fou ding le zhe zhong shuo fa 
cao suan shi yi zhong zhi wu dang zhong guang fan cun zai de wu zhi 
bo cai deng ye cai de cao suan han liang jiao gao 
er gua lei shu cai de cao suan han liang xiang dang di 
fan zhi hong biao shi 
shi wu zhong de cao suan bei xi shou hou 
que shi hui zeng jia shen jie shi de wei xian 
dan xian dai shan shi zhong 
ren men de shu cai she ru liang zai jian shao 
yi ban shu liang de cao suan she ru bu zhi yu yin qi jie shi wen ti 
geng zhong yao de shi 
diao cha fa xian gai she ru liang yu shen jie shi de fa sheng lv cheng xian fu xiang guan 
ji gai she ru liang yue gao 
jie shi fa sheng lv yue di 
yin ci shi min ying dang zai chi shu cai shi duo chi dou zhi pin 
nai lei deng fu han gai de shi wu 
rang cao suan he gai jie he chen dian 
yi jian shao cao suan de xi shou 
jiang di jie shi fa sheng de gai lv 
ni xiang yong you mei li hua nen de pi fu ma 
xiang xin hen duo nv xing peng you dou hui jing chang shi yong yi xie ang gui de hu fu yong pin 
bu guo bao chi pi fu de shui nen 
hu fu yong pin suo qi dao de zuo yong hai shi you xian de 
wo men bu fang zai ri chang sheng huo zhong zhu yi yin shi 
cong shi wu zhong she qu pi fu bi yao de ying yang 
gao su ni chi shen me dui pi fu hao 
da dou han you rang pi fu mao fa piao liang de dan bai zhi 
dan zhi fang que jiao di 
duo chi da dou shao chi rou 
neng da dao jian kang jian fei de xiao guo 
da dou yi huang tong kan cheng zhi wu tai pan 
you lei si nv xing he er meng de zuo yong 
bu dan mei bai 
hai neng yi zhi ti mao 
dou fu han you feng fu dan bai zhi 
rang pi fu de jie gou geng gong gu 
dou fu yi han you feng fu wei ta ming 
you zhu jian ya tong shi ke bi mian yin ya li er xing cheng de 
xi hong shi zhong de fan qie hong su ke bao hu pi fu zhong de jiao yuan 
shi zhi bu yi bo luo 
de guo yan jiu fa xian 
fan qie hong su you zhu zhan ping zhou wen 
shi pi fu xi nen guang hua 
chang chi xi hong shi hai bu yi chu xian hei yan quan 
gu jiao yuan neng bang zhu zhi zao xin xi bao 
bing jiang xi bao jin lian yi qi 
you zhu bao chi pi fu you nen 
bing bi mian pi fu shui fen liu shi 
gu jiao yuan de zhi zao he han liang hui sui zhe nian ling zeng zhang 
xin chen dai xie lv jian man ji qi ta wai zai yin su 
bao kuo zi wai xian deng zhu jian jian shao 
jiao wei lian jia er you di re liang de xue er 
bu dan han you feng fu jiao yuan dan bai 
yi neng wei chi ji fu de tan xing 
ku gua chao xia ren 
jiang ku gua qu rang qie pian 
xia ren qu ke qu rou 
cong hua bian xiang 
er hou dao ru xia ren jiang qi fan chao zhi bian se 
sheng chu zuo bei yong 
jiang ku gua dao ru guo zhong fan chao zhi bian se 
zai jiang xia ren dao ru guo zhong fan chao 
zai dao ru shi liang hao you 
yan jiang qi fan chao zhi shang se 
ji ke chu guo shi yong 
zhe dao cai neng shi yi zhi zhi fang zeng zhang 
er qie re liang di 
chang shi yong neng rang ni qing song jian fei 
jing chang kou chou de ren yao duo chi zhe san lei shi wu 
hen duo ren dou bei kou qi wen ti kun rao 
yi ban lai shuo 
kou qiang zhong you yi wei ji ben you yi xia liang ge yuan yin 
kou qiang bu wei sheng 
wei chang dao gong neng wen luan 
bu guan shi nei ge yuan yin 
zui kui huo shou du shi xi jun 
ru guo qu zhao kou qiang ke yi sheng kan bing 
ta ke neng hui ti chu liang dian jian yi 
ye jiu shi jiang jiu yin shi ping heng 
she ru zu gou de dan bai zhi he tan shui hua he wu 
yi ji fu han ge zhong wei sheng su de shu cai he shui guo 
can hou zui hao shua ya huo yong ya xian ti ya 
qi shi hai you yi zhong fang fa 
you ji zhong shi wu ben shen jiu shi qu chu kou qiang yi wei de neng shou 
bing neng fang zhi kou chou zai du chan sheng 
gai pian yu bo cai chong tu 
bo cai han you da liang cao suan jia 
jin ru ti nei hou fang ai ren ti xi shou gai 
hai rong yi sheng cheng cao suan gai jie shi 
yin shi dang yi di re liang gao ying yang wei yi 
ping shi chi de zhu shi re liang you duo shao ne 
yi qi lai kan kan ba 
dou fu ji dou fu zhi pin de dan bai zhi han liang feng fu 
er qie dou fu dan bai shu wan quan dan bai 
bu jin han you ren ti bi xu de ba zhong an ji suan 
er qie bi li ye jie jin ren ti xu yao 
ying yang jia zhi jiao gao 
dou fu nei han zhi wu ci ji su 
neng bao hu xue guan nei pi xi bao bu bei yang hua po huai 
chang shi ke jian qing xue guan xi tong de po huai 
yu fang gu zhi shu song 
ru xian ai he qian xian ai de fa sheng 
dui bing hou tiao yang 
xi ni ji fu yi hen you hao chu 
you du bu wei 
fan qie hen shou re peng 
dan que shi you du 
sui ran guo rou ben shen bu han du su 
dan qi jing he ye que bao han yi zhong jiao zuo pei tang sheng wu jian de hua xue wu zhi 
zai ye sheng fan jia li zhe zhong wu zhi di han liang geng gao 
dan ren gong zhong zhi de fan qie hai shi duo shao you yi xie ying xiang 
zhe zhong dong xi hui dao zhi wei gong neng wen luan he jiao lv jin zhang 
jing he ye ke yi yong zuo peng ren tiao wei pin 
dan bi xu zai shi yong qian qu chu 
zhe zhong hua xue wu zhi di xiao yong hen da 
ta wang wang yong lai qu chong 
ni xiang yong you mei li hua nen de pi fu ma 
xiang xin hen duo nv xing peng you dou hui jing chang shi yong yi xie ang gui de hu fu yong pin 
bu guo bao chi pi fu de shui nen 
hu fu yong pin suo qi dao de zuo yong hai shi you xian de 
wo men bu fang zai ri chang sheng huo zhong zhu yi yin shi 
cong shi wu zhong she qu pi fu bi yao de ying yang 
gao su ni chi shen me dui pi fu hao 
da dou han you rang pi fu mao fa piao liang de dan bai zhi 
dan zhi fang que jiao di 
duo chi da dou shao chi rou 
neng da dao jian kang jian fei de xiao guo 
da dou yi huang tong kan cheng zhi wu tai pan 
you lei si nv xing he er meng de zuo yong 
bu dan mei bai 
hai neng yi zhi ti mao 
dou fu han you feng fu dan bai zhi 
rang pi fu de jie gou geng gong gu 
dou fu yi han you feng fu wei ta ming 
you zhu jian ya tong shi ke bi mian yin ya li er xing cheng de 
xi hong shi zhong de fan qie hong su ke bao hu pi fu zhong de jiao yuan 
shi zhi bu yi bo luo 
de guo yan jiu fa xian 
fan qie hong su you zhu zhan ping zhou wen 
shi pi fu xi nen guang hua 
chang chi xi hong shi hai bu yi chu xian hei yan quan 
gu jiao yuan neng bang zhu zhi zao xin xi bao 
bing jiang xi bao jin lian yi qi 
you zhu bao chi pi fu you nen 
bing bi mian pi fu shui fen liu shi 
gu jiao yuan de zhi zao he han liang hui sui zhe nian ling zeng zhang 
xin chen dai xie lv jian man ji qi ta wai zai yin su 
bao kuo zi wai xian deng zhu jian jian shao 
jiao wei lian jia er you di re liang de xue er 
bu dan han you feng fu jiao yuan dan bai 
yi neng wei chi ji fu de tan xing 
shu cai de shi da zhi ming cuo wu chi fa 
xi hong shi bu gai fan qian chi 
ying gai zai can hou zai chi 
ke shi wei suan he shi wu hun he da da jiang di suan du 
bi mian wei nei ya li sheng gao yin qi wei kuo zhang 
shi bao bao chan sheng fu tong 
wei bu bu shi deng zheng zhuang 
sui zhe ren men sheng huo shui ping de ti gao 
ren men de sheng huo guan nian ye jian jian fa sheng le gai bian 
ying yang de ping heng yue lai yue shou dao ren men de zhong shi 
ceng jing dan chu ren men yan zhong de cu liang you man man de zou jin le ren men de shi ye 
cu liang ke yi yu fang ji bing 
dan que bi jiao cu cao 
bu yi xiao hua 
suo yi bing bu shi mei ge ren dou shi he chi cu liang 
xian dai sheng huo de jing xi hua he jing zhi hua 
cheng wei zhu duo ying yang ji bing de you yin 
jie chang zhong liu 
fei pang deng deng zheng zai zhu jian wei xie ren lei jian kang 
shi xiang dui jia gong bi jiao zheng gui he jing xi de liang shi er yan de 
zhu yao bao kuo gu lei zhong de yu mi 
mai fu yi ji ge zhong gan dou lei 
bu ke fou ren 
ti chang ren men shi dang chi cu liang ke yi yu fang ji bing 
yin wei xian wei su ke yi yi zhi dan gu chun de xi shou 
jian shao gao xue zhi 
cu jin chang ru dong 
yu fang bian mi 
er zu wei sheng su you qi shi wei sheng su / ze ke yi yu fang jiao qi bing 
hen duo cu liang hai ju you yao yong jia zhi 
ru qiao mai han you qi ta gu wu suo bu ju you de 
ke yi zhi liao gao xue ya 
ru guo she ru guo duo de cu liang ye hui dui ren ti jian kang bu li 
shou xian cu liang ben shen ying yang jia zhi bu gao 
er qie bu rong yi xiao hua 
xi shou lv di 
cu liang li fu han de shi wu xian wei ke ying xiang ren ti dui gai 
tie deng ying yang su de xi shou 
cu liang sui hao que bu shi yi suo you ren qun 
yi xie te shu ti zhi de ren jiu bu yi chang chi cu liang 
wei chang gong neng cha de ren qun 
wei chang gong neng jiao ruo de ren qun 
chi tai duo shi wu xian wei dui wei chang shi hen da de fu dan 
tie deng yuan su de ren qun 
yin wei cu liang li han you zhi suan he shi wu xian wei 
hui jie he xing cheng chen dian 
zu ai ji ti dui kuang wu zhi di xi shou 
huan xiao hua xi tong ji bing de ren qun 
ru guo huan you gan ying hua shi dao jing mai qu zhang huo shi wei kui yang 
jin shi da liang cu liang yi yin qi jing mai po lie chu xue he kui yang chu xue 
jian kang chang shou shi yi zhong sheng huo xi guan 
geng shi yi zhong sheng huo tai du 
mei tian duo zhu yi yi dian jian kang sheng huo de yao dian 
ri ji yue lei xia lai hui rang ni huo yi fei qian 
rang ni chi chi he he qing song bian cheng zhang shou ti zhi 
re dian lian jie 
qi miao sheng li 
ren ti shou yun guo cheng gao qing shi pai 
bei cheng long fu zi qian gui ze guo de shi da xing gan nv xing 
nv xing chu yu mei tu bao guang 
jiang yi yan jiao mei lin zhi ling xiang yan 
huan qiu xiao jie 
ye fang mo si ke ye dian huo la wu zi dian ran quan chang 
gao qing zu tu 
zhong ming xing quan luo zhan shi wan mei shen cai 
san shi nian lai bei qiang jue de mei nv si qiu fan 
tu jie ming xing zao nian han jian chuang xi ji qing zhao 
gao qing zu tu 
wu lun nan nv lao shao dou xi huan zai zhou mo xiu xian de shi hou 
man man de pao yi hu cha 
xiang shou jia ri de xiu xian 
bu shi mei ge ren dou shi he he cha yang sheng de 
wo men lai kan yi xia 
nei xie zhuang kuang xia de wo men xu yao he cha ye ge li qi lai 
fa shao ji he cha 
cha ye zhong ka fei jian bu dan neng shi ren ti ti wen sheng gao 
er qie hai hui jiang di yao xiao 
gan zang bing ren ji yin cha 
cha ye zhong de ka fei jian deng wu zhi jue da bu fen jing gan zang dai xie 
ruo gan zang you bing 
yin cha guo duo chao guo gan zang dai xie neng li 
jiu hui you sun yu gan zang zu zhi 
shen jing shuai ruo shen yin cha 
cha ye zhong de ka fei jian you xing fen shen jing zhong shu de zuo yong 
shen jing shuai ruo yin nong cha 
you qi shi xia wu he wan shang 
jiu hui yin qi shi mian 
jia zhong bing qing 
ke yi zai bai tian de shang wu ji wu hou ge yin yi ci cha 
zai shang wu bu fang yin hua cha 
wu hou yin lv cha 
wan shang bu yin cha 
huan zhe hui bai tian jing shen zhen fen 
ye jian jing qi shu xin 
ke yi zao dian ru shui 
ji dan shi wo men chang chi de shi pin zhi yi 
hen duo shang ban zu wei le tan fang bian 
mei tian zao shang shang ban dou shi yong yi ge ji dan gao ding zi ji de zao can 
wo men chi le zhe me duo ji dan 
bing bu jiu shi dai biao wo men dong de zen me zheng que chi ji dan 
ru guo ni chi fan dui piao de hua 
na jiu gen wo lai kan kan zhe xie chi yu de wu qu 
shuo bu ding ni jiu fan le qi zhong hao ji ge 
ji dan shi wo men sheng huo zhong chang jian de shi pin 
bu zheng que de chi fa dui wo men de jian kang you zhe bu liang ying xiang 
zai sheng huo zhong 
wo men ying zhu yi yi xia wu qu 
re dian lian jie 
qi miao sheng li 
ren ti shou yun guo cheng gao qing shi pai 
bei cheng long fu zi qian gui ze guo de shi da xing gan nv xing 
nv xing chu yu mei tu bao guang 
jiang yi yan jiao mei lin zhi ling xiang yan 
huan qiu xiao jie 
ye fang mo si ke ye dian huo la wu zi dian ran quan chang 
gao qing zu tu 
zhong ming xing quan luo zhan shi wan mei shen cai 
san shi nian lai bei qiang jue de mei nv si qiu fan 
tu jie ming xing zao nian han jian chuang xi ji qing zhao 
gao qing zu tu 
lin xin ru yang mi liu shi shi tong li ya jie hong qiang nei de jue se gong nv men 
gao qing zu tu 
tian jin ying yang xue hui ming yu li shi zhang fu jin ru 
bei jing zhong yi yao da xue yang sheng shi jiao shou zhang hu de 
bei jing zhao yang yi yuan ying yang ke ying yang shi song xin deng ji wei zhuan jia 
zhuan jia zhi chu 
xu yin qi zhu yi 
ji shi jiu zheng 
shi zi de ying yang jia zhi hen gao 
yi ji cu xian wei 
hu luo bo su 
tie deng yuan su he duo zhong wei sheng su 
hai han you hu luo bo su deng duo zhong ying yang cheng fen 
ta ji ke sheng shi 
ye ke jia gong cheng shi bing 
bing ke yong lai niang jiu 
shi zi bu dan ying yang feng fu 
er qie you jiao gao de yao yong jia zhi 
sheng shi neng qing re jie du 
shi jiang ya zhi xue de liang yao 
dui zhi liao gao xue ya 
zhi chuang chu xue 
bian mi you liang hao de liao xiao 
shi ye dou shi hen you jia zhi de yao cai 
zhu yi shi xiang 
bu yao yu han gao dan bai de xie 
xia deng shi pin yi qi chi 
zhong yi xue zhong 
pang xie yu shi zi dou shu han xing shi wu 
gu er bu neng tong shi 
cong xian dai yi xue de jiao du lai kan 
han gao dan bai de xie 
xia zai rou suan de zuo yong xia 
hen yi ning gu cheng kuai 
ji wei shi shi 
shi zi han dan ning 
yi yu tie zhi jie he
