cong er fang ai ren ti dui shi wu zhong tie zhi di xi shou 
suo yi pin xue huan zhe ying shao chi wei hao 
shi zi zhong han you feng fu de tang fen 
guo jiao he wei sheng su 
you liang hao de qing re huo run chang zuo yong 
shi man xing zhi qi guan yan 
dong mai ying hua huan zhe de tian ran de bao jian shi pin 
mi hou tao shi yi zhong ying yang jia zhi ji gao de shui guo 
guo zhong zhi wang 
ta han you liang an suan 
ben bing an suan 
yi liang an suan 
yi ji feng fu de kuang wu zhi 
bao kuo feng fu de gai 
hai han you hu luo bo su he duo zhong wei sheng su 
dui bao chi ren ti jian kang ju you zhong yao de zuo yong 
mi hou tao guo shi rou fei zhi duo 
qing xiang xian mei 
tian suan yi ren 
shi shi cai shou xia de xian guo 
zai chang wen xia ke fang yi ge yue dou bu huai 
zai di wen tiao jian xia shen zhi ke bao xian wu liu ge yue yi shang 
chu xian shi wai 
hai ke jia gong cheng guo zhi 
tang shui guan tou 
zhe xie chan pin huo huang 
se ze you ren 
feng wei ke kou 
ying yang jia zhi bu ya yu xian guo 
yin ci cheng wei hang hai 
gao yuan he gao wen gong zuo ren yuan de bao jian shi pin 
mi hou tao zhi geng cheng wei guo jia yun dong yuan shou xuan de bao jian yin liao 
you shi lao nian ren 
ti ruo duo bing zhe de zi bu guo pin 
zhu yi shi xiang 
mi hou tao bu yao yu niu nai tong shi 
yin wei wei sheng su yi yu nai zhi pin zhong de dan bai zhi ning jie cheng kuai 
bu dan ying xiang xiao hua xi shou 
hai hui shi ren chu xian fu zhang 
suo yi shi yong fu wei sheng su de mi hou tao hou 
yi ding bu yao ma shang he niu nai huo chi qi ta ru zhi pin 
mi hou tao xing han 
bu yi duo shi 
pi wei xu han zhe ying shen shi 
fu xie zhe bu yi shi yong 
xian zhao xing liu chan 
yue jing guo duo he niao pin zhe ji shi 
ru guo mi hou tao tai ying 
ba mi hou tao zhuang ru su liao dai nei 
zai ba qie kai de li huo ping guo tong dai hun zhuang 
cui shu hou shi yong 
shi zi you qu pi lao de zuo yong 
you du bu wei 
fan qie hen shou re peng 
dan que shi you du 
sui ran guo rou ben shen bu han du su 
dan qi jing he ye que bao han yi zhong jiao zuo pei tang sheng wu jian de hua xue wu zhi 
zai ye sheng fan jia li zhe zhong wu zhi di han liang geng gao 
dan ren gong zhong zhi de fan qie hai shi duo shao you yi xie ying xiang 
zhe zhong dong xi hui dao zhi wei gong neng wen luan he jiao lv jin zhang 
jing he ye ke yi yong zuo peng ren tiao wei pin 
dan bi xu zai shi yong qian qu chu 
zhe zhong hua xue wu zhi di xiao yong hen da 
ta wang wang yong lai qu chong 
hong shu nei wu zhi you xiao fang ai 
zhong suo zhou zhi 
hong shu de ying yang shi fen feng fu 
geng wei ke gui de shi 
hong shu ye yi ju duo kui 
lv se shu cai yi zhi yi lai dou bei yu wei zui jian kang de shi wu 
dan qi shi yan se shen de shui guo 
shu cai he gu wu tong yang ye ying yang feng fu 
zhe lei shi wu de yan se lai yuan yu hua qing su he zhi wu se su 
ke neng you zhu yu jiang di huan tang niao bing 
xin zang bing he ai zheng de feng xian 
hei se shi wu yin qi gao se su han liang 
bi qian se shi wu han you geng duo de kang yang hua ji 
kang nai er da xue 
de shi pin hua xue jiao shou bo shi shuo 
hei zao xing wen wei gan 
fu han dan bai zhi 
wei sheng su he wei sheng su 
tie deng wei liang yuan su 
hai you ge zhong ying yang yuan su 
you bu shen yu yang wei de gong xiao 
bing dui yan huan shuai lao 
zeng qiang ji ti huo li 
mei rong yang yan dou hen you bang zhu 
suo yi hei zao bei cheng wei 
ying yang cang ku 
jing chang shi yong ke yi bang zhu nv xing bu qi yang xue 
wei chi shang pi xi bao zu zhi de gong xiao 
yi ji ke yi nuan chang wei 
ming mu huo xue 
li shui jie du 
shi run ze ji fu 
wu xu hei fa jia pin 
cao mi dui ni you hao chu 
er hei mi de hao chu jiu geng da le 
yin wei hei mi de fu ke li you xiang dang gao han liang de wei sheng su 
wei sheng su neng cu jin mian yi xi tong de gong neng 
bao hu xi bao mian shou zi you ji de sun shang 
gen ju lu yi si an na zhou li da xue nong ye zhong xin de yi xiang yan jiu 
hei mi shi ji shang bi lan mei han you geng duo de hua qing su kang yang hua ji 
dong chi luo bo shi zhi you dao ji da jin ji bu ke hu shi 
dong chi luo bo xia chi jiang 
bu lao yi sheng kai yao fang 
yan xia zheng shi shi yong luo bo de hao shi jie 
zhuan jia zhi chu 
dong chi luo bo te zhi bai luo bo 
er qie chi luo bo you hen duo jin ji 
da pei bu qia dang chu le ying yang you sun shi wai 
hai ying xiang shen ti jian kang 
bai luo bo ke xiao shi 
hen duo ren dou zhi dao 
dong chi luo bo xia chi jiang 
yu shi fen fen zai cai chang li mai hui xin li mei 
ying tao luo bo deng bian zhao fa er chi 
dong chi luo bo 
ke bu shi zhi xin li mei he ying tao luo bo 
guo ji zhu ce ying yang shi zou chun lei gao su ji zhe 
dong chi luo bo zhi de shi chi bai luo bo 
zai zhong duo luo bo pin zhong zhong 
dong tian li chi bai luo bo ying yang ye shi zui hao de 
yin wei dong tian tian qi gan zao 
you qi shi zai you kong diao huo nuan qi de fang jian li 
gan zao geng yan zhong 
hen duo ren ti nei you nei re 
bai luo bo zheng hao ke yi qing re pai du 
jia shang dong tian li ren men wu xing zhong jiu hui duo jin shi rou lei 
xu yao da pei liang xing he xing wei gan ping de shi wu 
lai qi dao qing liang 
qu huo de zuo yong 
er xing liang de bai luo bo wu yi shi hen hao de xuan ze 
dong tian tian qi zhuan leng 
ren de huo dong liang jian shao 
rong yi chan sheng ji shi 
er bai luo bo zhong de wei sheng su ke yi bang zhu xiao chu ti nei de fei wu 
cu jin shen ti de xin chen dai xie 
you qi shi qi fu han de mei 
neng gou xi shou shi wu zhong de dian fen 
geng neng hua jie wei zhong de ji shi 
qi dao hen hao de xiao hua xiao guo 
zhuan jia te bie ti xing 
bai luo bo sui ran ju you liang hao de zhu xiao hua zuo yong 
dan yin qi xing liang 
pi wei xu han zhe 
man xing wei yan 
wei kui yang huan zhe bu yi da liang shi yong 
wo men ri chang ji hu mei tian dou li bu kai rou 
dou shi ren men chang chi de mei wei jia yao 
ke shi ni zhi dao nei xie bu wei shi bu neng chi de bu fen ma 
xia mian zhe xie bu wei hui wei hai dao shen ti jian kang 
nin ke yao zhu yi le 
yu ti fu qiang liang ce you yi ceng hei se mo yi 
shi zui xing chou 
ni tu wei zui nong de bu wei 
han you da liang de lei zhi zhi 
rong jun mei deng wu zhi 
e deng qin lei pi gu shang duan zhang wei yu de bu wei 
shi lin ba xian ti ji zhong de di fang 
yin lin ba xian zhong de ju shi xi bao ke tun shi bing jun he bing du 
ji shi shi zhi ai wu zhi ye neng tun shi 
dan bu neng fen jie 
shi ge cang wu na gou de 
shi yong shi ying yi chu zhu bo zi deng chu hui se 
huang se huo an hong se de rou ge da 
ji cheng wei rou zao de dong xi 
yin wei zhe xie di fang han you hen duo bing jun he bing du 
ruo shi yong ze yi gan ran ji bing 
kong bu de zhi ai shi pin ming dan 
zui yi zhi ai de shi pin you nei xie ne ? zhe ge wo jue de da jia ying gai bu tai qing chu 
sui ran xian zai ren men yue lai yue zhong shi jian kang le 
dan shi dui yi xie wen ti hai shi cun zai zhe wu qu de 
yu shi wo hui jin suo neng lai bang zhu ni 
xi wang neng gou ti gong nin suo xu yao de dong xi 
huo tui deng shi pin zai yan zhi guo cheng zhong 
dou ke neng chan sheng er jia ji ya xiao suan yan 
zai ti nei zhuan hua wei zhi ai wu zhi er jia ji ya xiao suan an 
guo liang shi yong zhe lei shi wu 
hui dao zhi wei 
yi xian deng xiao hua dao ai bian de ji lv sheng gao 
cong zhe ge jiao du lai kan 
yan zhi pin ju you yi ding de zhi ai xing 
shao kao de ge zhong rou lei ru zhi qian jing guo bu qia dang yan zhi yi chan sheng guo liang ya xiao suan yan 
kao jiao de rou he yu pi han you qiang zhi ai wu ben bing pi 
kong fu chi shi 
zhe liang zhong wu zhi zhi jie yu wei zhan mo jie chu 
bi ren qun ping jun huan wei ai bi lv gao er shi bei zuo you 
jian yi chi shao kao qian bu yao kong fu 
chi shao kao bu yao tai qin 
bu chi jiao rou jiao pi 
zhi ai wu zhi hai you xiang dang yi bu fen hun zai kao rou shi mi man de yan huo li 
bao han du qi de kao rou yan huo gei da jia dai lai de shang hai ye shi yao shi fen xiao xin de 
he zhi ai wu yi yang xu yao yin qi zhong shi de shi rou chuan ben shen hai cun zai ji sheng chong wen ti 
jia chu shen shang dou you yi zhong jiao zuo xuan mao chong de ji sheng chong 
he zhu rou zhong de nang chong yi yang 
xuan mao chong neng shi ren zhi can 
niu shen shang dou you xuan mao chong 
er yang shen shang de xuan mao chong zai jia chu zhong shi bi jiao duo de 
xun dou fu gan deng han ben bing pi zhi ai wu 
chang shi yi huan shi dao ai he wei ai 
xun zhi shi pin sui ran xiang qi you ren 
fang fu neng li hen qiang 
suo yi zhi ai ji lv ye gao 
zhe zhong te dian shi yin wei zhi zuo shi mu xie men shao chan sheng de yan xun qi ti zao cheng de 
zhe zhong qi ti zhong han you zhi ai wu zhi ben bing pi 
er qie rou lei xun zhi shi pin de zhi ai wu liang da yu dian fen lei xun kao shi pin 
suo yi wo men ying dang shao chi shen chi xun kao zhi pin 
duo he cha duo chi yu yin shi 
rang ni chang shou 
zui jin de tian qi zong shi wu meng meng de 
gen ju qi xiang zi liao tong ji 
quan guo duo ge di qu duo ge cheng shi zheng zai jing shou 
tian qi de kao yan 
zhe zhong wu mai tian qi yi jing chi xu duo tian 
bing qie hai you ji xu chi xu xia qu de ji xiang 
wu mai sui ran shi yi zhong qi xiang 
dan shi you yu qi zhong han you da liang de wu ran wu 
bu jin lv lv shua xin kong qi de zhi 
tong shi dui ren ti ye zao cheng le shang hai 
zai zhe yang de huan jing xia 
ren men chi shen me neng jian kang 
ren men chi shen me neng chang shou ne 
xiao bian tui jian yin shi 
bang ni geng jia chang shou 
li ya peng li hun qian wei li yan guo sheng ri 
ju tai wan mei ti bao dao 
bu liao li ya peng ri qian chuan she xian ji gong yi lian cai zao diao cha 
zi shen nan bao 
nv er yi du du zi liu zai bei jing 
ju xi wang fei hao you zhao wei ting shen er chu 
li yan zai xiang gang qi ju 
ta jiang quan li zhan kai qiang jian hu quan da zhan 
hu nan wei shi kua nian yan chang hui zai hu nan guo ji hui zhan zhong xin ju xing le cai pai 
cong xia wu kai shi 
yu quan deng ming xing xiang ji liang xiang 
lin zhi ying ze chuan shang ao te man zhan pao jia shi pao che ru chang 
zai hou tai de cai fang jian 
cong dian ying dian shi 
yin yue dao chu shu 
ta dou hui you suo zuo wei 
er jin nian jin jin shi nuan shen 
han guo mou mei ti bao liao 
han guo yi ren li sheng ji yu han guo ou xiang zu he shao nv shi dai cheng yuan yun er re lian yue hui bei pai 
yi mi mi jiao wang le si ge yue 
sui hou bu jiu li sheng ji de jing ji gong si que ren le gai xiao xi 
zheng chang yan chu zai xiao bang de 
jiang xiao diao ye qu 
li yun di xian zou le 
xiao bang jiang da diao ye qu 
shu man da diao huan xiang qu 
li si te ta lan tai la wu qu 
yun nan min ge wu shou 
li yun di tou lu 
xin zhuan ji ye zai chou bei zhong 
bei jing qin tong bei bei 
jia na da hua yi gang qin shen tong wang shuai wen deng tai yan zou 
jin qi yin re bo jie mu 
ba ba qu na er 
ren qi chao wang de wang shi ling he ma ma li xiang liang xiang 
li yun di xian shou ba shou jiao 
wang shi ling yan zou er ge 
you qin zi ban zou 
you wang shi ling yan chang gai ge qu 
quan chang yi pian wen xin 
wang shi ling hai qin wen le li yun di 
zhang liang yu tian liang de qu bie 
zhang liang he tian liang de qu bie 
ni zhi dao shi shen me ma 
you wang you zai wei bo shang fa chu yi zhang guan yu tian liang he zhang liang zhi jian qu bie 
yi zhang tu wan quan quan shi le 
zhi jian de qu bie 
xiao fan le wang you 
dao di zhang liang he tian liang you shen me qu bie ne 
yuan lai zhang liang lai zi 
tian liang lai zi 
zhang liang de xiao mi mi yan jia zhang lian 
tian liang de yuan lian jia shuang yan pi mao yan 
wang you men dou xiao fan le 
dang ran ye bu fa you fen si ti 
dou yao bei ni men wan huai le 
ri qian mou tian wan shang 
wen zhang ma yi li fu fu xie nv er ji fu mu jia shi lia zuo jia fu huo guo dian 
wen zhang yi lu xiao pao qian zhu da fu pian pian de ma yi li 
dan ma yi li si hu jue de feng you dian da 
hua yi xiong di qi xia dang hong ge shou 
hua yu yue tan ding ji chang jiang yao bei na 
yi yu bu jiu qian shang shi 
chang pian zhong si shou ge qu zai bao guang hou bian li ke de dao le ting zhe men quan fang mian de ren ke yu zan shang 
mei shou xin ge zhi jin dou wei ju ge da bang dan de qian san xi wei 
yao bei na ye ping jie ci zhang chang pian zai sui mo nian chu huo de le zui jia 
zui ju ren qi nv ge shou 
guan zhong zui xi ai de ying shi ge qu ge shou deng yi xi lie chong tou da jiang 
tian long ba bu 
li de qiao a zhu liu jin ling gei guan zhong liu xia le shen ke de yin xiang 
qi ben ren que zao yu guo mi jian he le suo 
ru jin jing kuang bi lan jie ying hai qi can 
you bu shao yan chu ji hui 
dan shi da duo wei pei jue 
zhe zi yan zai she hui shang shi bu dao de de ti xian 
er zai fu za de zhi chang shang 
hen duo zhi ye nv xing hui bei she hui de xian shi qian gui ze hua 
ta men ye xu shi bi bu de yi 
ye xu shi yi xiang qing yuan 
ye xu shi deng jia jiao huan 
he jun xiang bu yong dang bing 
zhou jie lun you bing bu dang bing 
que neng da lan qiu 
chui gong jie li 
shou dao mian yi zheng ming 
you wang you yin er zheng li chu tai wan nan yi ren mian yi yuan yin 
xin zang er jian ban mo tuo chui 
xian tian xing xin lv bu zheng 
xin shi ban mo bi suo bu quan 
deng xin zang wen ti cheng wei mian dang bing li you di yi ming 
ming dan zhong di er duo de yuan yin shi 
bao kuo luo zhi xiang 
lan zheng long he chen han dian jie yi ci yuan yin mian yi 
ji zhui wen ti 
ye shi yi da kun rao 
yi ji li wei dou yin 
jiang zhi xing ji zhui yan 
bu yong dang bing 
jie san de ou xiang tuan ti 
you wang you chao 
yi ren neng chang neng tiao neng da lan qiu 
zen me yu dao dang bing jiu bing tong yi dui 
bu guo ye you ren xuan ze guai guai jin 
ming dao geng zi yuan jia ru 
san jun yi dui 
zai guo qing jie biao yan lian qiang 
xing xiang huan ran yi xin 
zheng yuan chang ye yu jin nian tui wu 
kuan guan jie gu mo po lie 
di diao zhu yuan kai dao ye bu xi wang 
hen xiang shou dang bing de gan jue 
kan dao ming dao yu zheng yuan chang tui wu hou xie xia zhong dan 
liang ren shuai diao 
tui wu chu lai jie shen zhi qing shuang 
dan yan yi quan hai you xu duo ren yi xue ji zai shen tuo yan 
huo yi shen ti bing tong yan tui 
ling qu die xin ku pei yang kai xing xiang dou bu duan bei wai jie zhi yi 
sun li yang rong yin tao pan dian ying shi ju zhong shi da chu gui niang niang shei zui mei 
ying shi ju zhong 
huang di shi hou gong jia li san qian 
er qie hai zai bu shi de zhao jin geng jia xin xian de fei zi 
yin wei huang di de fei zi zhong duo 
suo yi mei you na me duo de shi jian zhao gu dao mei yi ge fei zi 
cong er rang fei zi men zi gan duo luo 
zai huang gong zhong mai nong feng sao 
gou yin qi ta de nan ren 
jin tian wo men jiu lai pan dian yi xia shi da chu gui niang niang 
kan shei geng jia feng sao 
xiao huan yun jian dan lai shuo bu shi chu gui 
shi xin li zhuang de ren yi zhi dou bu shi huang shang 
er shi he zi ji yi qi zhang da de gao zhan 
lu zhen chuan qi 
zhong cheng gong su zao le zhe me yi ge ke bei de jue se 
sui ran yi jing shi huang di de qi zi 
dan shi yi jiu ai zhe chen xiao 
er qie zai ju zhong tuo yi gou yin gao zhan 
dan bei qi ju jue 
yin wei mei ge ren de xing ge dou bu jin xiang tong 
suo yi ai hao ye jiu da bu yi yang 
wo men de mei nv zhu bo men ye shi ru ci 
chu le guang xian liang li de wai biao 
qi shi yu pu tong ren mei you shen me liang yang 
ta men ye hui feng kuang 
geng hui xiang shou sheng huo 
ta men wang wang duo cai duo yi 
chuang zuo ge qu 
chu yi deng deng 
rang ren bu de bu you zhong de pei fu 
re dian lian jie 
qi miao sheng li 
ren ti shou yun guo cheng gao qing shi pai 
bei cheng long fu zi qian gui ze guo de shi da xing gan nv xing 
nv xing chu yu mei tu bao guang 
jiang yi yan jiao mei lin zhi ling xiang yan 
huan qiu xiao jie 
ye fang mo si ke ye dian huo la wu zi dian ran quan chang 
gao qing zu tu 
zhong ming xing quan luo zhan shi wan mei shen cai 
san shi nian lai bei qiang jue de mei nv si qiu fan 
tu jie ming xing zao nian han jian chuang xi ji qing zhao 
gao qing zu tu 
lin xin ru yang mi liu shi shi tong li ya jie hong qiang nei de jue se gong nv men 
gao qing zu tu 
fu zhou zhang chun hua yuan xiao qu ju min cheng 
shi fa qian ceng ting dao fu qi zheng chao nan zi bao zhe si sui er tiao lou 
shuang shuang yun ming 
jia ren bei tong bu yi 
cong fu zi lia tiao lou wei zhi wang xia kan 
xun si he ji mao pi fa shi chang shi yong you pi fa zhuan qu 
jing ying hu san zhuang you fen zhuang rong qi da kai fa men hou jin sheng shao liang di you 
ji zhe jin yu meng 
xin chu tai de san zhuang you xiao shou jin ling zheng shi kai shi zhi xing 
dui quan shi zhong xiao xing nong mao liang you shi chang jin xing tu ji jian cha 
jian cha guo cheng zhong 
mu qian zan wei fa xian shi chang shang cun zai xiao shou 
shi yong you de wei fa xing wei 
yi san zhuang you fen zhuang rong qi bei xian chang ze ling chai chu 
ji zhe sui tong wu han shi shi yao jian ju zhi fa zong dui zhi fa ren yuan lai dao xun si he ji mao pi fa shi chang shi yong you pi fa zhuan qu 
jian cha you wu san zhuang you xiao shou qing kuang 
zhi fa ren yuan dui gou xiao tai zhang ji lu 
shi yong you jin huo fa piao 
he ge zheng shu deng jin xing le jian cha 
qian mian jian cha ji jia wei fa xian you san zhuang you xiao shou 
dang zhi fa ren yuan lai dao zhen xing liang you jing ying bu nei jian cha shi 
he ran fa xian yi ge fen you qi fang zai men mian men kou 
zhi fa ren yuan sui ji zan kou le gai fen you qi 
bing kai zhan jian cha 
jian cha fa xian gai fen you qi wei kong 
wei shen me gai fen you qi hai wei chai chu 
shi fou hai you san zhuang you xiao shou 
mian dui zhi fa ren yuan de xun wen 
dian lao ban shuo shi zheng fu yi jing xia fa tong gao 
quan shi cong yuan dan kai shi jin shou 
dian nei yi mei you san zhuang you xiao shou 
rong qi shi yin wei mei you di fang fang zhi 
zan shi cun fang yu dian nei 
bing qie biao shi an yao qiu ma shang xian chang chai chu 
xi jin ping zai he dian zhong shuo 
wo jin dai biao zhong guo zheng fu he ren min 
bing yi wo ge ren de ming yi 
xiang ni bing tong guo ni xiang you hao de e luo si ren min 
zhi yi cheng zhi de zhu he 
wo men cong tui dong guo ji xing shi jian kang wen ding fa zhan he zhong e liang guo fa zhan zhen xing da ju chu fa 
yi zhan lve si wei he quan qiu shi jiao shen shi he fa zhan zhong e quan mian zhan lve xie zuo huo ban guan xi 
cu jin shuang fang ge ling yu he zuo qu de zhong yao jin zhan 
wo dui ci biao shi man yi 
wo shi zhong ren wei 
qiang you li de zhong e guan xi shi wo men liang guo ren min de fu yin 
ye shi shi jie ren min de fu yin 
zai xin de yi nian 
wo yuan ji xu tong ni bao chi mi qie gou tong he jie chu 
xie shou nu li 
tui dong zhong e ge ling yu he zuo bai chi gan tou 
geng jin yi bu 
bu duan kai tuo liang guo guan xi fa zhan xin ju mian 
ming hou nian jiang ju ban de zhong e qing nian you hao jiao liu nian huo dong bi jiang zeng jin liang guo qing nian xiang hu liao jie he you yi 
shi zhong e shi dai you hao 
gong tong zhen xing de li nian geng jia shen ru ren xin 
wei zhong e quan mian zhan lve xie zuo huo ban guan xi chi xu shen ru fa zhan zuo chu xin gong xian 
pu jing zai he dian zhong shuo 
jin zhi yi zhong xin de zhu he 
zai ji jiang guo qu de yi nian 
e zhong guan xi xi shi pin chuan 
wei e zhong quan mian zhan lve xie zuo huo ban guan xi fa zhan 
wei cu jin liang guo zai guo ji shi wu zhong de xie tiao pei he zhu ru le qiang jing dong li 
e zhong hu ban lv you nian huo dong qu de le yuan man cheng gong 
ju ban zhe yi da xing huo dong jiang jin yi bu zeng jin e zhong liang guo ren min zhi jian de xiang hu li jie he xin ren 
guo wu yuan zong li li ke qiang tong e luo si zong li mei de wei jie fu ye hu zhi xin nian he dian 
quan guo zheng xie zai bei jing ju xing xin nian cha hua hui 
zhong gong zhong yang zong shu ji 
guo jia zhu xi 
zhong yang jun wei zhu xi xi jin ping zai cha hua hui shang tong yu hui ren shi qin qie jiao tan 
xin hua she ji zhe ju peng she 
ji zhe liu wei tao 
dang he guo jia ling dao ren xi jin ping 
zhang gao li deng tong ge min zhu dang pai zhong yang 
quan guo gong shang lian fu ze ren he wu dang pai ren shi dai biao 
zhong yang he guo jia ji guan you guan fang mian fu ze ren yi ji shou du ge zu ge jie dai biao huan ju yi tang 
zhong gong zhong yang zong shu ji 
guo jia zhu xi 
zhong yang jun wei zhu xi xi jin ping zai cha hua hui shang fa biao zhong yao jiang hua 
qiang diao yao da li hong yang yu shi ju jin 
rui yi jin qu 
qin yu tan suo 
yong yu shi jian de gai ge chuang xin jing shen 
zheng dang gai ge de jian ding yong hu zhe he ji ji shi jian zhe 
yong zi ji qin lao de shuang shou zai gai ge shi jian zhong chuang zao geng jia xing fu de sheng huo 
xi jin ping zai jiang hua zhong dai biao zhong gong zhong yang 
guo wu yuan he zhong yang jun wei 
xiang ge min zhu dang pai 
gong shang lian he wu dang pai ren shi 
ge ren min tuan ti 
xiang quan guo guang da gong ren 
zhi shi fen zi 
gan bu he ge jie ren shi 
xiang ren min jie fang jun zhi zhan yuan 
wu jing guan bing he gong an min jing 
xiang xiang gang te bie xing zheng qu tong bao 
ao men te bie xing zheng qu tong bao 
tai wan tong bao he hai wai qiao bao 
xiang guan xin he zhi chi zhong guo xian dai hua jian she de guo ji you ren zhi yi cheng zhi de zhu fu 
zhu da jia xin nian hao 
xi jin ping zhi chu 
zhong gong zhong yang tuan jie dai ling quan guo ge zu ren min 
jian chi wen zhong qiu jin gong zuo zong ji diao 
chen zhuo ying dui ge zhong feng xian he tiao zhan 
quan mian tui jin she hui zhu yi jing ji jian she 
zheng zhi jian she 
wen hua jian she 
she hui jian she 
sheng tai wen ming jian she 
dui quan mian shen hua gai ge zuo chu zong ti bu shu 
tui dong guo fang he jun dui jian she mai chu xin bu fa 
tui dong quan fang wei wai jiao da kai xin ju mian 
qun zhong lu xian jiao yu shi jian huo dong qu de zhong yao jie duan xing cheng guo 
shi xian liang hao kai ju 
xi jin ping qiang diao 
xin de yi nian 
ying gai you xin de fen dou 
xin de shou huo 
wo men yao quan mian guan che luo shi zhong gong shi ba da he shi ba jie er zhong 
san zhong quan hui jing shen 
yi deng xiao ping li lun 
san ge dai biao 
zhong yao si xiang 
ke xue fa zhan guan wei zhi dao 
jian chi gai ge chuang xin 
jian chi wen zhong qiu jin 
quan mian zuo hao ge xiang gong zuo 
yao bao chi xiang gang 
ao men chang qi fan rong wen ding 
he ping tong yi 
yi guo liang zhi 
wei liang an tong bao mou fu zhi 
yao tong ge guo ren min yi dao wei ren lei he ping yu fa zhan de chong gao shi ye er bu xie nu li 
xi jin ping zhi chu 
zhong gong shi ba jie san zhong quan hui chui xiang le quan mian shen hua gai ge xin de hao jiao 
kai gong mei you hui tou jian 
wo men yao jian ding bu yi shi xian gai ge mu biao 
dang jin shi jie 
ji yu he tiao zhan bing cun 
feng yun bian huan 
zui xu yao de shi zhan lve ding li 
jing zheng ji lie 
zui zhong yao de shi ji liu yong jin 
ying jie tiao zhan 
zui gen ben de shi gai ge chuang xin 
zui ben zhi di yao qiu jiu shi chuang xin 
zhong hua min zu shi ju you wei da chuang xin jing shen de min zu 
wo men de shi ye shi yi dian yi di gan chu lai de 
wo men de dao lu shi yi bu yi ge jiao yin zou chu lai de 
wo men yao jian chi yi qie cong shi ji chu fa 
ning ju guang da ren min qun zhong zhi hui he li liang 
shan zuo shan cheng 
nu li ba quan mian shen hua gai ge de lan tu bian wei xian shi 
xi jin ping qiang diao 
zai ji jiang guo qu de yi nian li 
ren min zheng xie gao ju ai guo zhu yi 
she hui zhu yi qi zhi 
tui jin zheng zhi xie shang 
min zhu jian du 
can zheng yi zheng zhi du jian she 
wei tui dong jing ji she hui fa zhan 
shen hua gai ge kai fang 
jian quan she hui zhu yi xie shang min zhu zhi du deng ge xiang shi ye zuo chu le zhong yao gong xian 
zai xin de yi nian li 
can jia ren min zheng xie de ge dang pai tuan ti he ge zu ge jie ren shi yao yin dao suo lian xi cheng yuan he qun zhong li jie gai ge 
zhi chi gai ge 
can yu gai ge 
ren min zheng xie yao chong fen fa hui zuo wei xie shang min zhu zhong yao qu dao zuo yong 
liang ge yi bai nian 
fen dou mu biao zuo chu xin de geng da de gong xian 
jiang hua quan wen jian di san ban 
cha hua hui you zhong gong zhong yang zheng zhi ju chang wei 
quan guo zheng xie zhu xi yu zheng sheng zhu chi 
xi jin ping zong shu ji de zhong yao jiang hua 
hui gu zong jie le ji jiang guo qu de yi nian 
zai ji wei cuo zong fu za de xing shi xia 
zhong gong zhong yang tuan jie dai ling quan guo ge zu ren min zai gai ge kai fang he she hui zhu yi xian dai hua jian she zhong qu de de xin cheng jiu 
dui zuo hao ming nian dang he guo jia ge xiang gong zuo ti chu le ming que yao qiu 
bing fa chu le hong yang gai ge chuang xin jing shen de zhong yao hao zhao 
jiang hua chong fen ken ding le tong yi zhan xian he ren min zheng xie wei rao dang he guo jia zhong xin gong zuo zuo chu de gong xian 
dui zuo hao xin xing shi xia de tong yi zhan xian 
ren min zheng xie gong zuo ti chu le yin qie xi wang he ming que yao qiu 
wo men yi ding yao ren zhen xue xi guan che xi jin ping zong shu ji de zhong yao jiang hua jing shen 
ba si xiang he ren shi tong yi dao zhong gong zhong yang jue ce bu shu shang lai 
ba zhi hui he li liang ning ju dao li jie 
zhi chi he can yu gai ge shang lai 
pu xie tong yi zhan xian he ren min zheng xie shi ye xin pian zhang 
wei dang he guo jia shi ye fa zhan zuo chu xin gong xian 
min ge zhong yang zhu xi wan e xiang dai biao ge min zhu dang pai zhong yang 
quan guo gong shang lian he wu dang pai ren shi jiang hua 
rui yi jin qu 
gong jian ke nan 
wei quan mian jian cheng xiao kang she hui 
bu duan duo qu zhong guo te se she hui zhu yi xin sheng li 
shi xian zhong hua min zu wei da fu xing de zhong guo meng er nu li fen dou 
cha hua hui shang 
xi jin ping deng lai dao ge jie ren shi zhong jian 
tong da jia qin qie wo shou 
hu zhi wen hou 
bu fen quan guo zheng xie wei yuan he wen yi gong zuo zhe biao yan le jing cai jie mu 
yu hui zhe gong xu you yi 
tong ying xin nian 
hui chang qi fen shi fen re lie 
zai jing zhong gong zhong yang zheng zhi ju wei yuan 
zhong yang shu ji chu shu ji 
bu fen zai jing quan guo ren da 
guo wu yuan ling dao tong zhi 
quan guo zheng xie ling dao tong zhi he ceng ren quan guo zheng xie fu zhu xi de zai jing lao tong zhi chu xi cha hua hui 
zheng zhou shi wei shu ji wu tian jun zai zi zhu shou mai ji qian mai piao 
wu tian jun da cheng di tie jie shou cai fang 
ju zhong guo zhi sheng 
xin wen zong heng 
zui jin yi ze 
ji zhe cai fang 
qiao yu zheng zhou shi wei shu ji 
de xiao xi yin fa wang you re yi 
shi zheng zhou di tie kai tong hou ying lai de shou ge gong zuo ri 
dang nian wan shang zheng zhou dian shi tai 
zheng zhou xin wen 
wan jian xin wen 
dou bo le fa le yi tiao 
ji zhe di tie cai fang ou yu shi wei shu ji 
de dian shi xin wen 
zhe pian bao dao bo chu hou 
li ji zai hu lian wang shang yin fa guan zhu 
you wang you wei ling dao gan bu jie di qi 
ting min yi de ju dong jiao hao 
ye you wang you ren wei shi wei shu ji cheng zuo di tie hen zheng chang 
bu suan xin wen 
hai you bu shao wang you fa chu yi wen 
zen me na me qiao 
wei shen me ji zhe jiu neng 
er qie hai dai zhe she xiang ji 
ji zhe ou yu shu ji 
de xin wen jiu jing shi zen me zhi zuo chu lai de 
shi zheng zhou di tie kai tong hou ying lai de shou ge gong zuo ri 
dang nian wan shang zheng zhou dian shi tai 
zheng zhou xin wen 
wan jian xin wen 
dou bo le fa le zhe tiao 
ji zhe di tie cai fang ou yu shi wei shu ji 
de dian shi xin wen 
dian shi yin xiang 
liang wei ji zhe zai di tie yi hao xian hui zhan zhong xin zhan cai fang shi 
hu ran fa xian zai zi zhu shou piao ji qian mai piao de yi wei nan shi fei chang shu xi 
zi xi yi kan 
zheng shi shi wei shu ji wu tian jun 
cong zuo tian qi 
bu shao shi ming ren zheng de wei bo dou dui zhe tiao xin wen zhuan fa bing ping lun 
zheng zhi di tie kai tong 
shu ji zuo de tie 
jing tou ping wen 
bu shao wang you fa chu zhi yi 
zhe yang de xin wen shi 
zhe xie ping lun rang zheng zhou dian shi tai ji zhe xu jin jiao ku bu die 
bai fen zhi bai de shi ou yu 
wo men zai cai fang zheng hao kan dao le shu ji 
zhe ge wo jue de shi zhen shi de 
bi ru shuo wang shang shuo de zuo xiu a 
wo ye mei you xiang dao hui you zhe yang de fan ying 
ta zhe yi ge duo yue lai tian tian pao zai di tie li 
xu jin he she xiang ji zhe lu xiang yong jiu gan dao le di tie lv cheng guang chang zhan 
yan lu cai fang dao hui zhan zhong xin zhan xia che 
jiu shi zai zhe li 
xu jin yu dao le qian lai gou piao cheng che de zheng zhou shi wei shu ji wu tian jun 
wo men hu ran fa xian zai zi zhu shou piao ji qian you yi ge mai piao de nan shi fei chang shu xi 
zi xi yi kan 
zheng shi wo men de shi wei shu ji wu tian jun 
hou lai wo men liao jie le yi xia 
yuan lai shi jin tian shang wu wu tian jun shu ji zai zheng dong xin qu kai wan hui hou lin shi jue ding cheng zuo di tie fan hui shi wei 
zhe ge shi hou wo jiu jue de shi bu shi ke yi pai tiao xin wen 
zan men de shu ji lai cheng zuo di tie 
wo jiu rang she xiang pai le yi xie hua mian 
chu yu zhi ye min gan 
liang wei ji zhe ren wei zhe shi yi tiao nan de de hao su cai 
wu tian jun shu ji mai wan piao hou 
liang ren jiu xiang shu ji ti chu neng fou gen sui cai fang 
dang shi bei wu shu ji wan yan xie jue 
dang shi jiu xiang shu ji ti chu neng fou gen sui cai fang 
dang shi shu ji wan yan xie jue le wo men 
sui hou ta jiu xia zhan tai deng shang lie che le 
you yu ji zhe wo men hai mei wan cheng cai fang 
hai yao cai fang cheng ke 
jiu deng shang le tong yi liang che 
shang che yi hou 
wo men kan dao hen duo shi min ren chu le shu ji 
shu ji hai gen cheng ke jin xing le hen hao de jiao liu 
wo men jiu sui ji kai ji jin xing pai she 
hui dao dan wei yi hou 
xu jin he lu xiang yong xiang bu men fu ze ren he dang tian zhi ban bian ji hui bao le pai she dao de su cai 
da jia dou ren wei zhe shi yi tiao hen bu cuo de xin wen 
jiu rang qi bian fa le yi tiao xiao xi 
fang zai dang tian you guan di tie de xi lie bao dao gao jian zhong bo chu 
mian dui bu shao ren dui yu 
sui ran ping chang bu pao shi zheng xin wen 
dan shi yu dao zhe yang de hao xian suo 
ta hai shi hui qu bu zhuo de 
nin zhi qian yu dao guo wu shu ji ma 
fei gong zuo zhuang tai xia shi mei you yu dao guo de 
zhe tiao xin wen bo chu lai yi hou wang you hen duo dou zhi yi tai qiao le 
nin shi zen me kan dai wang you de guan dian ne 
zuo wei xin wen ren 
wo men jian shou 
zhen shi ken ding shi di yi wei de 
wo men zuo de xin wen shi mei you ren he xu jia de cheng fen 
zhe ye shi zuo wei xin wen ren de yi ge di xian 
wo ye xiang xin zai ren he yi ge cheng shi 
ru guo zai dang di de gong gong chang he 
bi ru shuo kan dao zi ji de shi wei shu ji cheng zuo gong gong jiao tong 
zhe yang de yi ge chang jing 
wo xiang ren he yi ge ji zhe dou hui bu zhuo zhe tiao xin wen 
zhe ye shi yi ge ji zhe zui qi ma de zhi ye min gan 
ji zhe wu zhe hua zheng zhou tai ji zhe zhou lin lin 
chu jiu ying xin 
yu shi jue ding tu bu cong an hui lai an zou dao nan jing de liu he 
ta mei le li qi 
ji han jiao po zai lu bian se se fa dou 
xun luo min jing kan dao le zhe yi mu 
zui zhong jiang ta an quan song dao le fu mu shen bian 
liu he fen ju cheng qiao pai chu suo min jing xun luo zhi cheng qiao jie dao gui hua cun lu kou shi 
fa xian yi ming xiao huo zuo zai lu bian se se fa dou 
xiao huo zi xing xu 
liu he xiong zhou jie dao ling yan ren 
wo zhe ye shi xiang liu ge te bie de ji nian 
mei xiang dao gao gu le zi ji 
xiao xu xiang min jing jie shao shuo 
zi ji zai an hui lai an shang ban 
yin wei yuan dan ti qian fang jia 
shi jian bi jiao chong yu 
ta jiu bu xiang zuo che hui jia le 
er shi jue ding tu bu 
suan shi yi zhong tiao zhan ba 
lai ying jie xin nian 
dan wei xia ban hou 
ta jian dan chi le dian dong xi jiu kai shi chu fa 
yin wei tian hei mi le lu 
jia zhi shou ji mei you dian le 
xiao xu zai han feng zhong se se fa dou 
yu shi dun zai lu bian yi la ji xiang pang bi han 
min jing jiang xiao xu dai hui pai chu suo 
ti gong le shui he shi wu 
he shi qing kuang hou 
you lian ye jiang ta an quan song zhi fu mu shen bian 
ji zhe lu ya nan 
ji zhe cong zhong guo tie lu zong gong si huo xi 
tie lu an quan guan li tiao li 
yi xia jian cheng 
you gong an ji guan gen ju wei fa qing jie deng jiang yu yi 
ze ling gai zheng 
zai jian she zhi liang an quan fang mian 
ren he dan wei he ge ren bu de wei fan gui ding yao qiu tie lu jian she 
shi gong dan wei ya suo jian she gong qi 
zai yun ying an quan fang mian 
lv ke ying dang ping you xiao shen fen zheng jian gou piao cheng che 
dui che piao suo ji zai shen fen xin xi yu suo chi shen fen zheng jian huo zhe zhen shi shen fen bu fu de chi piao ren 
tie lu yun shu qi ye you quan ju jue qi jin zhan cheng che 
tie lu yun shu tuo yun ren tuo yun huo wu 
bao guo shi ni bao 
huang bao huo wu pin ming 
huo zhe zhuang che 
zhuang xiang chao guo gui ding zhong liang de 
you tie lu jian du guan li ji gou ze ling gai zheng 
ji zhe xu juan 
zui gao ren min fa yuan xia fa le 
guan yu shi shi liang xing gui fan hua gong zuo de tong zhi 
guan yu chang jian fan zui de liang xing zhi dao yi jian 
yao qiu ge gao ji ren min fa yuan gen ju 
zhi ding shi shi xi ze 
bing zheng shi shi shi liang xing gui fan hua gong zuo 
gong wu bu fen 
di yi bu fen wei 
liang xing de zhi dao yuan ze 
di er bu fen wei 
liang xing de ji ben fang fa 
di san bu fen wei 
chang jian liang xing qing jie de shi yong 
di si bu fen wei 
chang jian fan zui de liang xing 
jiu jing guo duo nian shi xing de jiao tong zhao shi zui 
shi min xu xian sheng zai nan jing hong shan dong wu yuan you wan shi 
kan jian mi mi ma ma de ma que 
yu tian e zheng shi you qu de yi mu 
ji zhe zai xian chang fa xian 
hong shan dong wu yuan tian e 
you shi ji ping fang mi de mian ji 
zhou wei zhang zhe lu wei he yi ke da shu 
hai you yi ge xiao wu 
ji zhi cheng nian tian e shai tai yang 
er san zhi you zai tian e chi zhe dao gu 
shu bai zhi ma que pan ju tian e di pan yu ta men 
ji ji zha zha jiao ge bu ting 
ting dao jiao bu sheng 
ma que hua ran fei li 
you de luo zai shu zhi shang 
xiao wu ding shang guan wang 
ju si yang yuan cheng 
zhi yin tian e chi dong xi zi shi tai you ya 
suo yi ma que cai feng yong er shang qiang shi de 
tong xun yuan xu fu geng 
yang zi wan bao ji zhe fan xiao lin she 
nan xing zai dong ji xing yu zui gao 
jie guo biao ming 
jing zi de shu liang sui zhe ji jie de bian hua er you suo bu tong 
cong dong ji dao xia ji 
er qie jing zi huo dong de su du ye you suo jiang di 
you que xian de jing zi shu mu ze xiang dui zeng jia 
yan jiu ren yuan shuo 
zhe shi you yu nan xing de sheng zhi qi guan zai pian leng de wen du xia 
huo li hui geng qiang 
nan xing zai dong ji xing yu zui gao 
zhong xi yi guan nian xiang bei 
zhong yi shang you 
dong bu cang jing 
chun bi wen bing 
ye jiu shi ti xing nan xing zai qiu dong ji jie shou xian yao jie zhi fang shi 
bi yao shi zuo dao bi jing bu xie 
jian shao ti li de guo du xiao hao lai da dao 
de yang sheng yao qiu 
mian dui zhong xi yi guan nian xiang bei 
qi shi ge you ge de dao li 
sheng huo tiao jian 
xing sheng huo ci shu ye geng duo 
hong shu nei wu zhi you xiao fang ai 
zhong suo zhou zhi 
hong shu de ying yang shi fen feng fu 
geng wei ke gui de shi 
hong shu ye yi ju duo kui 
chang shou neng yi chuan 
shang hai fu dan da xue sheng ming ke xue xue yuan fu jiao shou wang xiao feng ren wei 
ci shi sheng huo xi guan yin su hai zhan you fei chang da de bi zhong 
huan ju hua shuo 
nian qing shi ai bu ai xi shen ti 
dui shou ming de ying xiang shi hen da de 
yi chuan de zuo yong kai shi yue lai yue tu xian 
bing qie sui zhe nian ling de zeng zhang 
yi chuan yin su de bi zhong ye yue lai yue da 
mei guo ye shi wa da xue yan jiu xian shi 
ye jiu shi shuo 
huo dao zhe ge sui shu 
pin de jiu shi shei de ji yin hao le 
chang shou zhe de hou dai geng rong yi chang shou 
wang xiao feng jiao shou shuo 
yi jing you que zao di zheng ju biao ming 
ru guo ni de qin shu chang shou 
na me ni chang shou de ji lv ye hui zeng jia 
er qie qin yuan guan xi yue jin 
zhe zhong ying xiang yue ming xian 
zen me li jie ne 
ru guo ni de gu gu chang shou 
shu shu chang shou 
wai gong chang shou 
a yi chang shou 
ni dang ran ye ke neng chang shou 
dan shi ru guo ni de xiong di jie mei chang shou 
ni zhan de guang hui geng duo 
mei guo bo er si bo shi yan jiu cheng 
ru guo ni you xiong jie shi bai sui shou xing 
zhi you quan dang si xiang he yi zhi tong yi le 
cai neng tong yi quan guo ge zu ren min si xiang he yi zhi 
cai neng xing cheng tui jin gai ge de qiang da he li 
wo wei rao quan hui ti chu de zhi dao si xiang 
zong ti si lu 
mu biao ren wu 
jiu guan che luo shi quan hui jing shen ti ji dian yao qiu 
jian chi ba wan shan he fa zhan zhong guo te se she hui zhu yi zhi du 
tui jin guo jia zhi li ti xi he zhi li neng li xian dai hua zuo wei quan mian shen hua gai ge de zong mu biao 
wo men cai hui zai ge fang mian xing cheng yi zheng tao geng jia cheng shu geng jia ding xing de zhi du 
zhe ci quan hui zai deng xiao ping tong zhi zhan lve si xiang de ji chu shang 
ti chu yao tui jin guo jia zhi li ti xi he zhi li neng li xian dai hua 
zhe shi wan shan he fa zhan zhong guo te se she hui zhu yi zhi du de bi ran yao qiu 
shi shi xian she hui zhu yi xian dai hua de ying you zhi yi 
wo men zhi suo yi jue ding zhe ci san zhong quan hui yan jiu quan mian shen hua gai ge wen ti 
bu shi tui jin yi ge ling yu gai ge 
ye bu shi tui jin ji ge ling yu gai ge 
er shi tui jin suo you ling yu gai ge 
jiu shi cong guo jia zhi li ti xi he zhi li neng li de zong ti jiao du kao lv de 
guo jia zhi li ti xi he zhi li neng li shi yi ge guo jia zhi du he zhi du zhi xing neng li de ji zhong ti xian 
guo jia zhi li ti xi shi zai dang ling dao xia guan li guo jia de zhi du ti xi 
bao kuo jing ji 
sheng tai wen ming he dang de jian she deng ge ling yu ti zhi ji zhi 
fa lv fa gui an pai 
ye jiu shi yi zheng tao jin mi xiang lian 
xiang hu xie tiao de guo jia zhi du 
guo jia zhi li neng li ze shi yun yong guo jia zhi du guan li she hui ge fang mian shi wu de neng li 
bao kuo gai ge fa zhan wen ding 
nei zheng wai jiao guo fang 
zhi dang zhi guo zhi jun deng ge ge fang mian 
guo jia zhi li ti xi he zhi li neng li shi yi ge you ji zheng ti 
xiang fu xiang cheng 
you le hao de guo jia zhi li ti xi cai neng ti gao zhi li neng li 
ti gao guo jia zhi li neng li cai neng chong fen fa hui guo jia zhi li ti xi de xiao neng 
zen yang zhi li she hui zhu yi she hui zhe yang quan xin de she hui 
en ge si mei you yu dao quan mian zhi li yi ge she hui zhu yi guo jia de shi jian 
ta men guan yu wei lai she hui de yuan li hen duo shi yu ce xing de 
lie ning zai e guo shi yue ge ming hou bu jiu jiu guo shi le 
mei lai de ji shen ru tan suo zhe ge wen ti 
su lian zai zhe ge wen ti shang jin xing le tan suo 
qu de le yi xie shi jian jing yan 
dan ye fan xia le yan zhong cuo wu 
mei you jie jue zhe ge wen ti 
wo men dang zai quan guo zhi zheng yi hou 
bu duan tan suo zhe ge wen ti 
sui ran ye fa sheng le yan zhong qu zhe 
dan zai guo jia zhi li ti xi he zhi li neng li shang ji lei le feng fu jing yan 
qu de le zhong da cheng guo 
gai ge kai fang yi lai de jin zhan you wei xian zhu 
wo guo zheng zhi wen ding 
jing ji fa zhan 
she hui he xie 
min zu tuan jie 
tong shi jie shang yi xie di qu he guo jia bu duan chu xian luan ju xing cheng le xian ming dui zhao 
wo men de guo jia zhi li ti xi he zhi li neng li zong ti shang shi hao de 
shi shi ying wo guo guo qing he fa zhan yao qiu de 
wo men ye yao kan dao 
xiang bi wo guo jing ji she hui fa zhan yao qiu 
xiang bi ren min qun zhong qi dai 
xiang bi dang jin shi jie ri qu ji lie de guo ji jing zheng 
xiang bi shi xian guo jia chang zhi jiu an 
wo men zai guo jia zhi li ti xi he zhi li neng li fang mian hai you xu duo bu zu 
you xu duo ji dai gai jin de di fang 
zhen zheng shi xian she hui he xie wen ding 
guo jia chang zhi jiu an 
hai shi yao kao zhi du 
kao wo men zai guo jia zhi li shang de gao chao neng li 
kao gao su zhi gan bu dui wu 
wo men yao geng hao fa hui zhong guo te se she hui zhu yi zhi du de you yue xing 
bi xu cong ge ge ling yu tui jin guo jia zhi li ti xi he zhi li neng li xian dai hua 
tui jin guo jia zhi li ti xi he zhi li neng li xian dai hua 
jiu shi yao shi ying shi dai bian hua 
ji gai ge bu shi ying shi jian fa zhan yao qiu de ti zhi ji zhi 
fa lv fa gui 
you bu duan gou jian xin de ti zhi ji zhi 
fa lv fa gui 
shi ge fang mian zhi du geng jia ke xue 
geng jia wan shan 
she hui ge xiang shi wu zhi li zhi du hua 
yao geng jia zhu zhong zhi li neng li jian she 
zeng qiang an zhi du ban shi 
yi fa ban shi yi shi 
shan yu yun yong zhi du he fa lv zhi li guo jia 
ba ge fang mian zhi du you shi zhuan hua wei guan li guo jia de xiao neng 
ti gao dang ke xue zhi zheng 
min zhu zhi zheng 
yi fa zhi zheng shui ping 
jin yi bu jie fang si xiang 
jin yi bu jie fang he fa zhan she hui sheng chan li 
jin yi bu jie fang he zeng qiang she hui huo li 
quan hui jue ding ti chu de zhe 
san ge jin yi bu jie fang 
ji shi gai ge de mu di 
you shi gai ge de tiao jian 
jie fang si xiang shi qian ti 
shi jie fang he fa zhan she hui sheng chan li 
jie fang he zeng qiang she hui huo li de zong kai guan 
mei you jie fang si xiang 
wo men dang jiu bu ke neng zai shi nian dong luan jie shu bu jiu zuo chu ba dang he guo jia gong zuo zhong xin zhuan yi dao jing ji jian she shang lai 
shi xing gai ge kai fang de li shi xing jue ce 
kai qi wo guo fa zhan de li shi xin shi qi 
mei you jie fang si xiang 
wo men dang jiu bu ke neng zai shi jian zhong bu duan tui jin li lun chuang xin he shi jian chuang xin 
you xiao hua jie qian jin dao lu shang de ge zhong feng xian tiao zhan 
ba gai ge kai fang bu duan tui xiang qian jin 
shi zhong zou zai shi dai qian lie 
jie fang he fa zhan she hui sheng chan li 
jie fang he zeng qiang she hui huo li 
shi jie fang si xiang de bi ran jie guo 
ye shi jie fang si xiang de zhong yao ji chu 
quan mian jian cheng xiao kang she hui 
shi xian she hui zhu yi xian dai hua 
shi xian zhong hua min zu wei da fu xing 
zui gen ben zui jin po de ren wu hai shi jin yi bu jie fang he fa zhan she hui sheng chan li 
jie fang si xiang 
jie fang he zeng qiang she hui huo li 
shi wei le geng hao jie fang he fa zhan she hui sheng chan li 
deng xiao ping tong zhi shuo 
ge ming shi jie fang sheng chan li 
gai ge ye shi jie fang sheng chan li 
she hui zhu yi ji ben zhi du que li yi hou 
hai yao cong gen ben shang gai bian shu fu sheng chan li fa zhan de jing ji ti zhi 
jian li qi chong man sheng ji he huo li de she hui zhu yi jing ji ti zhi 
cu jin sheng chan li de fa zhan 
wo men yao tong guo shen hua gai ge 
rang yi qie lao dong 
zi ben deng yao su de huo li jing xiang beng fa 
rang yi qie chuang zao she hui cai fu de yuan quan chong fen yong liu 
yao chu li hao huo li he you xu de guan xi 
she hui fa zhan xu yao chong man huo li 
dan zhe zhong huo li you bi xu shi you xu huo dong de 
si shui yi tan bu xing 
an liu xiong yong ye bu xing 
wo men jiang yao jian ding dao lu zi xin 
li lun zi xin 
zhi du zi xin 
yao you jian ru pan shi de jing shen he xin yang li liang 
ye yao you zhi cheng zhe zhong jing shen he xin yang de qiang da wu zhi li liang 
zhe jiu yao kao tong guo bu duan gai ge chuang xin 
shi zhong guo te se she hui zhu yi zai jie fang he fa zhan she hui sheng chan li 
jie fang he zeng qiang she hui huo li 
cu jin ren de quan mian fa zhan shang bi zi ben zhu yi zhi du geng you xiao lv 
geng neng ji fa quan ti ren min de ji ji xing 
geng neng wei she hui fa zhan ti gong you li tiao jian 
geng neng zai jing zheng zhong ying de bi jiao you shi 
ba zhong guo te se she hui zhu yi zhi du de you yue xing chong fen ti xian chu lai 
yi jing ji ti zhi gai ge wei zhong dian 
fa hui jing ji ti zhi gai ge qian yin zuo yong 
quan hui jue ding yong 
liu ge jin jin wei rao 
miao hui le quan mian shen hua gai ge de lu xian tu 
tu chu qiang diao yi jing ji ti zhi gai ge wei zhong dian 
fa hui jing ji ti zhi gai ge qian yin zuo yong 
wo guo reng chu yu bing jiang chang qi chu yu she hui zhu yi chu ji jie duan de ji ben guo qing mei you bian 
ren min ri yi zeng zhang de wu zhi wen hua xu yao tong luo hou de she hui sheng chan zhi jian de mao dun zhe yi she hui zhu yao mao dun mei you bian 
wo guo shi shi jie zui da fa zhan zhong guo jia de guo ji di wei mei you bian 
zhe jiu jue ding le jing ji jian she reng ran shi quan dang de zhong xin gong zuo 
zhi yue ke xue fa zhan de ti zhi ji zhi zhang ai bu shao ji zhong zai jing ji ling yu 
jing ji ti zhi gai ge ren wu yuan yuan mei you wan cheng 
jing ji ti zhi gai ge de qian li hai mei you chong fen shi fang chu lai 
jian chi yi jing ji jian she wei zhong xin bu dong yao 
jiu bi xu jian chi yi jing ji ti zhi gai ge wei zhong dian bu dong yao 
jing ji ji chu jue ding shang ceng jian zhu 
jing ji ti zhi gai ge dui qi ta fang mian gai ge ju you zhong yao ying xiang he chuan dao zuo yong 
zhong da jing ji ti zhi gai ge de jin du jue ding zhe qi ta fang mian hen duo ti zhi gai ge de jin du 
ju you qian yi fa er dong quan shen de zuo yong 
ma ke si zai 
ren men zai zi ji sheng huo de she hui sheng chan zhong fa sheng yi ding de 
bu yi ta men de yi zhi wei zhuan yi de guan xi 
ji tong ta men de wu zhi sheng chan li de yi ding fa zhan jie duan xiang shi he de sheng chan guan xi 
zhe xie sheng chan guan xi de zong he gou cheng she hui de jing ji jie gou 
ji you fa lv de he zheng zhi de shang ceng jian zhu shu li qi shang bing you yi ding de she hui yi shi xing shi yu zhi xiang shi ying de xian shi ji chu 
zai quan mian shen hua gai ge zhong 
wo men yao jian chi yi jing ji ti zhi gai ge wei zhu zhou 
nu li zai zhong yao ling yu he guan jian huan jie gai ge shang qu de xin tu po 
yi ci qian yin he dai dong qi ta ling yu gai ge 
shi ge fang mian gai ge xie tong tui jin 
xing cheng he li 
er bu shi ge zi wei zheng 
fen san yong li 
jian chi she hui zhu yi shi chang jing ji gai ge fang xiang 
ti chu jian li she hui zhu yi shi chang jing ji ti zhi de gai ge mu biao 
zhe shi wo men dang zai jian she zhong guo te se she hui zhu yi jin cheng zhong de yi ge zhong da li lun he shi jian chuang xin 
jie jue le shi jie shang qi ta she hui zhu yi guo jia chang qi mei you jie jue de yi ge zhong da wen ti 
wo men wei rao jian li she hui zhu yi shi chang jing ji ti zhi zhe ge mu biao 
tui jin jing ji ti zhi yi ji qi ta ge fang mian ti zhi gai ge 
shi wo guo cheng gong shi xian le cong gao du ji zhong de ji hua jing ji ti zhi dao chong man huo li de she hui zhu yi shi chang jing ji ti zhi 
cong feng bi ban feng bi dao quan fang wei kai fang de wei da li shi zhuan zhe 
shi xian le ren min sheng huo cong wen bao dao xiao kang de li shi xing kua yue 
shi xian le jing ji zong liang yue ju shi jie di er de li shi xing fei yue 
ji da diao dong le yi wan ren min de ji ji xing 
ji da cu jin le she hui sheng chan li fa zhan 
ji da zeng qiang le dang he guo jia sheng ji huo li 
wo men ye yao kan dao 
sui ran wo guo she hui zhu yi shi chang jing ji ti zhi yi jing chu bu jian li 
dan shi chang ti xi hai bu jian quan 
shi chang fa yu hai bu chong fen 
te bie shi zheng fu he shi chang guan xi hai mei you li shun 
shi chang zai zi yuan pei zhi zhong de zuo yong you xiao fa hui shou dao zhu duo zhi yue 
shi xian dang de shi ba da ti chu de jia kuai wan shan she hui zhu yi shi chang jing ji ti zhi de zhan lve ren wu hai xu yao fu chu jian ku nu li 
jian chi she hui zhu yi shi chang jing ji gai ge fang xiang 
he xin wen ti shi chu li hao zheng fu he shi chang de guan xi 
shi shi chang zai zi yuan pei zhi zhong qi jue ding xing zuo yong he geng hao fa hui zheng fu zuo yong 
zhe shi wo men dang zai li lun he shi jian shang de you yi zhong da tui jin 
jian chi she hui zhu yi shi chang jing ji gai ge fang xiang 
bu jin shi jing ji ti zhi gai ge de ji ben zun xun 
ye shi quan mian shen hua gai ge de zhong yao yi tuo 
shi shi chang zai zi yuan pei zhi zhong fa hui jue ding xing zuo yong 
zhu yao she ji jing ji ti zhi gai ge 
dan bi ran hui ying xiang dao zheng zhi 
sheng tai wen ming he dang de jian she deng ge ge ling yu 
yao shi ge fang mian ti zhi gai ge chao zhe jian li wan shan de she hui zhu yi shi chang jing ji ti zhi zhe yi fang xiang xie tong tui jin 
tong shi ye shi ge fang mian zi shen xiang guan huan jie geng hao shi ying she hui zhu yi shi chang jing ji fa zhan ti chu de xin yao qiu 
yi cu jin she hui gong ping zheng yi 
zeng jin ren min fu zhi wei chu fa dian he luo jiao dian 
gai ge kai fang yi lai 
wo guo jing ji she hui fa zhan qu de ju da cheng jiu 
yong you le yi xi zhi di 
ran er mei you yi ge ren hui sui sui bian bian cheng gong 
ta men guang xian de bei hou yi ding you xiang dang li liang de zhi cheng 
xia mian jiu yi qi lai pan dian xia liu shi shi 
xu lu deng yi zhong xin sheng dai nv xing de bei jing shun bian yi xia ba 
ju zhong guo zhi sheng 
xin wen wan gao feng 
fei fei yang yang dan que wu li kan hua de zhang yi mou chao sheng shi jian 
ban sui zhe zhang yi mou ji qi qi zi chen ting gong kai zhi qian ming lang qi lai 
jiang su wu xi shi ren kou ji sheng wei zhu ren xu wei ying jie shou cai fang shi biao shi 
zai zhang yi mou de zhu dong pei he xia 
chao sheng diao cha 
jin zhan shun li 
yu ji yuan dan hou gong bu chu li jie guo 
zhu ming dao yan zhang yi mou she xian 
yi shi bei mei ti re chao 
dang shi ceng zuo chu zheng mian hui ying de wu xi shi ji sheng wei ye yin shu du 
zheng zai diao cha zhong 
bao shou gong zhong zhi yi 
zai zuo tian de cai fang zhong 
wu xi shi ren kou ji sheng wei zhu ren xu wei ying shou xian dui ci zuo le yi ge cheng qing 
ta jie shi wu xi shi ji sheng wei zhi suo yi chi chi mei you jie ru diao cha 
shi yin wei gen ju fa lv gui ding diao cha zhu ti nan yi que ding 
jiu chen ting de chao sheng shi jian lai shuo ta de chu li bi jiao fu za 
jin guan you wang min ti chu hen zao yi qian jiu fa xian le zhe ge qing kuang 
yin wei an zhao guo jia ren kou guan li ji hua sheng yu tiao li lai kan 
ta de ji hua sheng yu de guan li ying gai zai ta de xian ju zhu di guan li wei zhu 
yin wei chen ting bao kuo ta de hai zi he ling yi ge nan fang dang shi ren zhang yi mou ta men dou chang qi bu zai wu xi sheng huo gong zuo ju zhu 
an zhao tiao li ta ying gai zai xian ju zhu di guan li wei zhu 
wo men wu xi zhi neng pei he ta zuo 
zhe shi fa lv shang gui ding de 
suo yi jiu yi zhi you zheng yi mei you ding xia lai 
zhe ge jiu shi an zhao ji hua sheng yu de xiang guan fa gui 
bao kuo she hui fu yang fei zeng shou guo wu yuan ban bu de tiao li gui ding 
dang you zhe zhong you zheng yi di qing kuang zhi xia 
mei fa jie jue 
yao you wo men gong tong de shang ji ren kou ji sheng bu men qu zhi ding 
hu kou shang zai wu xi le jiu you wu xi lai jie jue 
zhang yi mou he qi zi chen ting shou ci tong shi gong kai lou mian 
dui chao sheng wen ti 
zai mei ti shang gong kai xiang gong zhong zhi qian 
chao sheng wei fan le guo jia ji sheng zheng ce 
shi wo he wo tai tai zuo cuo le de yi jian shi qing 
dui yu zhang yi mou de zhe zhong zuo fa xu wei ying biao shi le zan xu 
tong shi ta ye gao su ji zhe jin yi ge yue yi lai 
zai zhang yi mou ben ren de zhu dong pei he xia 
an jian you le jiao kuai jin zhan 
na me mu qian zhang yi mou ye hui ying le gong zhong dui zhe ge wen ti de guan zhu 
ta zi ji yi jing xiang gong zhong dao le ge qian 
wo men jue de hen hao 
dui shi qing de shun li jie jue hen you bang zhu 
hai xu zheng xun ge fang mian de yi jian 
bing fei ji sheng bu men yi jia zhi yan 
yu ji dao yuan dan hou 
hui gei gong zhong yi ge man yi de chu li jie guo 
na me mu qian zhe li mian she ji dao de min gan wen ti hai shi dui yu ta shou ru de he ding 
na me xian zai dui yu shou ru de he ding wen ti 
chu le zhang yi mou ben ren shen bao de yi wai hai yao zheng ji dao she hui ge fang de yi jian 
jiu shi hai you ren ti chu lai shou ru shang hai you yi xie qing kuang 
na me wo men da suan yuan dan yi guo jiu ke yi lai jie jue le 
zhe ge shi qing hai que que shi shi you bu de wo men dan fang mian lai ding 
zhe ge hui sui shi sui di chu xian yi xie bian hua 
wo men xiang xin you zhang yi mou ben ren ren zhen de zhen cheng de pei he 
zui zhong zhe ge shi qing yi ding hui de dao yi ge yuan man de jie jue 
ling ju wu xi bin hu qu ji sheng ju gong zuo ren yuan biao shi 
you yu mu qian an jian reng zai zhi xing guo cheng zhong 
cheng xu hai mei zou wan 
zan bu fang bian xiang gong zhong gong kai she an xi jie 
mu di ying xin 
ping xuan jie guo xian shi 
ming lie bang shou de shi zhi li zhong bu xiao cheng de xi su 
ying guo she jiao wang zhan zu zhi yi xiang quan qiu fan wei de tou piao 
ping xuan chu zui qi te de ci jiu ying xin xi su 
qian qi bai guai 
zhe zhong xi su zhu yao liu xing yu nong cun di qu 
fei chang zi xi 
ru guo ting ming bai 
na jiu yi wei zhe lai nian zou mei yun 
ru guo mei ting dong 
ze yu shi zhe hao zhao tou 
di san ming shu yu ai er lan ren 
ta men yong jiu mian bao qiao da qiang bi 
xiang zheng gan zou e mo 
lai nian ying lai hao yun 
ru guo ni zai nan fei yue han nei si bao de xi er si bo lei guo nian 
zui hao bie shang jie 
dang di ju min xi guan ba jiu jia ju reng chu chuang hu ying jie xin nian 
xiao dao wei bo lu 
da dao shui chuang 
zhi jie cong chuang hu reng chu qu 
na pa zhu zai gao ceng 
ling dang di jing cha tou teng bu yi 
zhe yi xi su ming lie bang dan di si ming 
xi bo li ya ren de ying xin xi su ling ren da leng zhan 
ming lie di wu 
dang di ren zai bei jia er hu de bing mian shang zao yi ge dong 
xie dai yi ke 
qian ru hu di 
zhong zai fang song 
ying guo ai ding bao ren de ying xin huo dong ze wen nuan xu duo 
ta men ban cheng hai dao 
shou ju huo ba zou shang jie tou you xing 
zai yi pian hong hong huo huo zhong ying jie xin de yi nian 
zhe yi xi su lie bang dan di liu ming 
zui shou hui yuan xi ai de xi su dang shu yi da li wei ni si de jie wen chuan tong 
dang ling dian xin nian zhong sheng qiao xiang shi 
ju ji zai wei ni si sheng ma ke guang chang de ren men xiang hu yong bao jie wen 
ci jiu ying xin de qi te xi su hai you dan mai ren de tiao yi zi 
fen lan ren de rong qian deng 
jin guan ying xin fang shi cun zai di qu he wen hua cha yi 
dui da duo shu ren er yan 
xin nian de qing zhu huo dong jiu shi yi ge rang da jia ke yi fa xie qing xu 
huan jie ya li 
chong jing wei lai de ji hui 
bian huan mo ce de tai kong rang ren lei xin chi shen wang 
zhi shen yu shen mi de xing yun zhi zhong 
mei ri you bao 
wei ren men jie kai le yu zhou qian suo wei jian de shen mi tu jing 
rang ren men you ji hui yi du te de shi jiao xin shang jiu jin shan jin men da qiao de zhuang li 
man ha dun liu guang yi cai de ye jing 
ao da li ya mian yan wu jin de huang jin hai an 
yi ji tai ping yang shang kong fan teng de hei ya ya de feng bao yun deng 
ran er tai kong de zhuang mei bing fei zhi neng jie zhu kong jian zhan cai neng you xing mu du 
ta tong guo zai wang yuan jing shang pei zhi dan se xiang ji 
shi tai yang biao mian yue dong de ju da huo yan zai zhao pian zhong yi ran qing xi ke jian 
ha bo wang yuan jing ye wei ren men sheng dong cheng xian le ren men rou yan wu fa shi bie de fen fan xing yun dong tai 
bi ru liang zuo xing yun xiang zhuang de jing ren hua mian 
tu xing shen qi de liu jiao feng bao zhan xian chu de hong cheng lv hun he wei se an ying 
tai kong zhong wu shu chen ai xi si fan she chu de da pian gui yi lv guang 
ren men hai ke yi xin shang dao cong tai kong jiao du pai she de san da yang shang kong rang ren yi wai de de ping jing yu qing lang hua mian 
yi zhang zhang ling ren bing xi zhu zu de tu pian huan xing le ren men dui guang mao tai kong yu di qiu de re ai 
zhong guo shou ci luo yue cheng gong ji nian 
you piao shou fa yi shi shang 
tan yue yu hang tian gong cheng zhong xin 
zhong guo you zheng ji tuan gong si 
zhong guo gong shang yin hang gong tong qian shu 
zhan lve he zuo xie yi 
xin hua wang chen jing chao she 
zhong guo shou ci luo yue cheng gong ji nian 
you piao shou fa yi shi zai bei jing ren min da hui tang ju xing 
nei rong fen bie wei chang e san hao zhuo lu qi he yu tu hao yue qiu che 
shi zhong guo you zheng wei ji nian chang e san hao cheng gong luo yue er te bie fa xing de you piao 
jing zhong guo you zheng he zhun 
zhong guo gong shang yin hang he tan yue yu hang tian gong cheng zhong xin tong bu xian liang fa xing 
zhong guo shou ci luo yue cheng gong ji nian 
you piao fang yin jin yin zhi pin he tan yue huo jian can hai fang yin you piao zhi pin 
xuan bu gao fen yi hao wei xing jiang zai guo tu zi yuan diao cha yu dong tai jian ce 
huan jing jian ce 
qi hou bian hua 
jing zhun nong ye he cheng shi gui hua deng ling yu fa hui zhong yao zuo yong 
zuo wei wo guo shi liu ge ke ji zhong da zhuan xiang zhi yi 
gao fen zhuan xiang shi jian xing chuang xin qu dong fa zhan zhan lve de chuang xin gong cheng 
shi fu wu jing ji jian she he she hui fa zhan de ying yong gong cheng 
guo fang ke gong ju ju zhang xu da zhe shuo 
gao fen yi hao tou ru shi yong 
biao zhi zhe wo guo yao gan wei xing ying yong jin ru dao xin jie duan 
gao fen yi hao zai jiu quan wei xing fa she zhong xin you chang zheng er hao ding huo jian jing zhun song ru yu ding gui dao 
ke bei kan zuo 
tai kong she ying shi 
kong jian fen bian lv zhi cong wei xing zhao pian shang neng bian bie di mian mu biao di zui xiao chi cun 
yi wei zhe cong wei xing shang ke yi kan dao di mian shang de xiao qi che 
shen zhi zi xing che 
shi jian fen bian lv zhi chong fu guan cha tong yi di wu suo xu de shi jian 
yi ban er yan 
kong jian fen bian lv he shi jian fen bian lv shi yi dui 
xu yao xi sheng yi fang lai bao zheng ling yi fang 
gao fen yi hao shi xian le zhe liang zhe de you hua zu he 
ce shi shi yong qi jian 
guo tu zi yuan bu 
huan bao bu he nong ye bu deng zhu yao yong hu dan wei dui gao fen yi hao zai ya an di zhen 
gan su min xian di zhen 
dong bei hong lao zai hai 
hua bei hua dong wu mai zhong qi dong ying ji mo shi ti gong da liang jing zhun shu ju ji yu hao ping 
gao fen yi hao ying ya tai kong jian he zuo zu zhi qing qiu 
shang bai wan lai zi mei guo he shi jie ge de de ren men hui ju zai niu yue shi dai guang chang 
shi jie de shi zi lu kou 
niu yue shi dai guang chang ju xing sheng da de qing zhu huo dong 
lai zi shi jie ge de de re qing you ke hui ju zai shi dai guang chang 
jiang shi dai guang chang de jie dao ji de shui xie bu tong 
zhong xin she fa ruan yu lin she 
ao da li ya xi ni gang zai xin nian zhong sheng qiao xiang de shun jian ran fang yan hua ying jie xin de yi nian dao lai 
mei dao xin nian 
ge guo min zhong dou yi zi ji de fang shi ci jiu ying xin 
qi zhong bu fa yi xie fei yi suo si de xi su 
gen ju dui ge guo min zhong de yi xiang diao cha 
nan fei zui da cheng shi yue han nei si bao de gao kong diu jia ju xi su cheng wei di si li qi he di si you qu de guo nian fang shi 
er zui li qi 
zui gui yi de fang shi 
ze shi zhi li ta er ka min zhong yu si qu de jia ren gong ying xin nian 
yue han nei si bao de xi er bu lao di qu wei yu cheng shi de zhong xin di dai 
zai gai di qu 
mei nian xin nian lai lin zhi ji 
ren men dou hui ba jia li de yi xie jia ju cong gao lou de chuang hu diu chu qu 
yi ci ci jiu ying xin 
ke wei ji wei xian you ci ji 
yue han nei si bao de zhe xiang lei si 
de xi su ming lie di si 
er gao ju zui li qi 
zui gui yi de guo nian fang shi bang shou de 
ze dang shu zhi li zhong bu cheng shi ta er ka min zhong yu si qu de qin ren 
yi qi shou sui 
gong ying xin nian 
luo ma ni ya de yi ge shi tu qing ting dong wu jiao tan 
xun qiu lai nian hao yun de xi su 
pai ming guo nian li qi bang di er 
di san ming de xi su lai zi ai er lan 
dang di min zhong jiang mian bao meng zhi dao qiang shang 
shi tu yi ci 
jing zou e ling 
jin sui yue han nei si bao diu jia ju xi su de 
shi xi bo li ya di qu de ren bao zhe da shu tiao ru bing dong de da hu 
yi ji mei guo bei ka luo lai na yi ge xiao zhen zai da ting guang zhong zhi xia de 
ci ci diao cha hai ping xuan chu le zui you qu de guo nian fang shi 
pai ming di yi de shi yi da li wei ni si de 
ji ti jie wen 
hen duo guo wai min zhong dui ci ye xiang wang bu yi 
yue yue yu shi 
jin sui qi hou de shi mo xi ge de chuan hong se nei yi qi qiu hao yun 
di san ming shi tai guo de san tian po shui jie 
yue han nei si bao de diu jia ju xi su 
zai ci bang dan shang ye tong yang pai ming di si 
yu ji quan nian zhe liang ge zhi biao dou jiang da dao yu qi mu biao 
zhe chao chu le hen duo ren yu liao 
yi xie jing ji xue jia ceng dan xin zhong guo jing ji hui fa sheng ying zhuo lu 
xian zai lai kan 
zhe zhong qing kuang bu hui zai zhong guo fa sheng 
zhong guo de fa zhan huan jing bing bu shun feng shun shui 
geng xiang ni shui xing zhou 
sui ran mei guo tong guo liang hua kuan song shou duan shi jing ji lve you hui sheng 
dan bao kuo ou yuan qu zai nei de zhu yao jing ji ti yi ran mei you wan quan zou chu shuai tui 
yin wei ji er qi de xiao fei xu qiu xia jiang yi ji mao yi bao hu zhu yi deng yin su ji xu yan zhong ying xiang zhong guo wai mao zeng zhang 
guo nei ying xiang jing ji fa zhan de yin su bao kuo 
guo du tou zi zao cheng de chan neng guo sheng 
di fang zheng fu guo gao de zhai wu fu dan 
lao dong li cheng ben guo kuai zeng zhang 
fang di chan shi chang guo re deng 
zhe xie yin su dou ceng bei yong lai zhi chi zhong guo jing ji xing jiang ying zhuo lu de guan dian 
sui mo yi zhi 
ge lu guan dian zhu jian qu yu yi zhi 
na jiu shi zhong guo jing ji sui yi gao bie bao chi duo nian de liang wei shu zeng zhang 
ying zhuo lu bu tai ke neng chu xian 
xin shang ren de zhong guo ling dao ceng zhi zheng di yi nian chong fen zhan shi le dui hong guan ju shi de ba kong neng li 
yi xie zhong yao hui yi he wen jian fan fu qiang diao de guan jian ci wei 
wen zhong qiu jin 
gai ge chuang xin 
dan zi yao da 
bu zi yao wen 
jie fang si xiang 
shi shi qiu shi 
yu shi ju jin 
qiu zhen wu shi 
jia qiang ding ceng she ji yu mo zhe shi tou guo he xiang jie he 
zheng ti tui jin he zhong dian tu po xiang cu jin deng 
zhe xie guan jian ci cheng gong yin ling zhong guo jing ji fa zhan 
zhong guo te se 
de xi hua yu chan shi 
gai ge kai fang zhi chu 
mo zhe shi tou guo he 
shi ge xiang liang de kou hao 
dang shi de ling dao ren ding xia le gai ge kai fang de da fang xiang 
ju ti fang fa he bu zhou zhu yao kao zai shi jian zhong mo suo 
jing guo san shi wu nian de ji lei yu chen dian 
zhong guo yi zong jie chu feng fu jing yan 
dui kan de zhun 
na de wen de gai ge you le ding ceng she ji de zi ben 
zai gai ge jin ru shen shui qu de jin tian 
hen duo dai jie jue de wen ti 
dai gai ge de ling yu dou shi ying gu tou 
yi ran xu yao mo suo 
mo zhe shi tou guo he 
shang hai zi you mao yi qu de she li jiu shi yi ge hen hao de li zi 
ren men hen rong yi jiang qi yu dang nian she li shen zhen te qu xiang bi 
gen ju mu qian zhang wo de xin xi 
zhong guo de hui lv 
shui shou deng jin rong ling yu de gai ge xia yi bu zen me zou 
shi chang jiang ru he jin yi bu kai fang deng 
dou jiang zai zi mao qu zhe ge 
li xian xing shi yan 
geng wei nan de de shi 
zai shi xian jing ji 
wen zhong you jin 
wen zhong xiang hao 
zhong guo ling dao ceng ba gai ge tui jin dao le guan jian ling yu he guan jian hang ye 
zheng fu zhi neng zhuan bian 
da fu xue jian xing zheng shen pi shi xiang 
kuo da ying gai zeng shi dian fan wei 
shi shi you li yu xiao wei qi ye fa zhan de shui shou zhi du 
fang kai jin rong ji gou dai kuan li lv guan zhi 
tui dong min jian zi ben jin ru jin rong ye 
gai ge xin gu fa xing zhi du 
zi yuan xing chan pin jia ge gai ge chu tai xin cuo shi deng 
jiao wang dan bu guo zheng 
shi jian hai ji yi you xin 
you yu yin hang guo fen fang dai 
dao zhi yin hang jian shi chang liu dong xing chu xian jin zhang 
tong ye chai jie li lv biao sheng 
yang hang mei you xiang yi wang yi yang xun su jie ru 
er shi du cu shang ye yin hang tiao zheng dai kuan jie gou 
bing xiang fu he hong guan shen shen yao qiu de jin rong ji gou ti gong zi jin zhi chi 
guo wu yuan ye jie ci shi ji sheng ming jiang jia da dui xian jin zhi zao ye he zhan lve xing xin xing chan ye de xin dai zhi chi 
zhe gei ge shang ye yin hang shang le sheng dong er xian shi de yi tang ke 
bi po tiao zheng yuan you de jing ying si lu 
xin gai ge yuan nian 
zhong gong shi ba jie san zhong quan hui tong guo de xin ju cuo wu yi jiang dui zhong guo wei lai de fa zhan chan sheng jue ding xing zuo yong 
zhe xie ju cuo de shi shi bu dan hui shi zhong guo zai cheng gong de dao lu shang ji xu qian xing 
ye jiang shi shi jie ji xu shou yi yu zhong guo de fa zhan 
zhong guo shou ci luo yue cheng gong ji nian 
gai you piao nei rong fen bie wei chang e san hao zhuo lu qi he yu tu hao yue qiu che 
gai tao you piao cai yong lian piao de xing shi she ji 
hua mian geng jia hong da 
cong yu tu hao zai yue mian liu xia de di yi xing zhong guo jiao yin 
dao zai yue qiu shang zhan xian wu xing hong qi 
biao zhi zhe zhong guo cheng wei shi jie shang di san ge you neng li du li zi zhu shi shi yue qiu ruan zhuo lu de guo jia 
zhong guo shou ci luo yue cheng gong ji nian 
shao shi xin she 
xin hua she fa 
gong ban yang lao ji gou jiang you xian bao zhang gu lao you fu dui xiang deng fu wu xu qiu 
bing jiang bu zai pei bian zhi huo zi jin 
quan bu gai wei min ying huo qi ye 
min zheng bu xia fa guan yu kai zhan gong ban yang lao ji gou gai ge shi dian gong zuo de tong zhi 
cong jin nian kai shi 
quan guo ge de zhi shao xu xuan ze yi ge dan wei kai zhan shi dian gong zuo 
min zheng bu cheng 
bu shao gong ban yang lao ji gou cun zai zhe zhi neng ding wei bu ming que 
yun xing ji zhi bu jian quan 
fa zhan huo li bu zu deng tu chu wen ti 
po qie xu yao shen hua gai ge 
ci ci kai zhan de gong ban yang lao ji gou gai ge shi dian 
jiang ming que gong ban yang lao ji gou zhi neng ding wei 
gong ban yang lao ji gou jiang you xian bao zhang gu lao you fu dui xiang 
jing ji kun nan de gu gua 
gao ling deng lao nian ren de fu wu xu qiu 
chong fen fa hui tuo di zuo yong 
chu le gai zhi 
gong ban yang lao ji gou hai jiang zeng qiang fu wu gong neng 
ti gao hu li xing chuang wei de shu liang he bi zhong 
tong zhi hai ti chu 
gong ban yang lao ji gou te bie shi xin jian ji gou ying dang zhu bu tong guo gong jian min ying deng fang shi 
gu li she hui li liang yun ying 
hai jiang tan suo ti gong jing ying xing fu wu de gong ban yang lao ji gou gai zhi 
you tiao jian de di fang 
zhong guo yin lian ri qian fa bu yuan dan 
chun jie an quan yong ka ti shi 
ti xing yin lian ka chi ka ren zeng qiang zhi fu an quan yi shi 
ti gao feng xian fang fan neng li 
zhong guo yin lian ti shi 
zai wang luo gou wu shi ying yan ge bao mi ge ren xin xi 
zhu yi shi bie diao yu wang zhan 
shen fen zheng hao 
yin hang ka hao 
jiao yi duan xin yan zheng ma 
yi ji xin yong ka you xiao qi 
bei mian qian ming tiao shang shu zi de hou san wei 
deng ge ren xin xi wu bi tuo shan bao guan 
ren he suo yao duan xin yan zheng ma de xing wei dou shi zha pian 
zai deng lu wang zhi shi 
bu yao qing xin 
gou wu wang zhan 
bing jing ti tong guo you jian 
liao tian gong ju fa lai de suo wei 
an quan zhong xin 
ren zheng zhong xin 
dan bao ping tai 
deng diao yu wang zhan lian jie 
zhi fu shi liu yi 
wan cheng wang gou ding dan jin ru zhi fu ye mian shi 
wang zhi qian zhui hui bian cheng 
biao shi shu ju chuan shu jia mi 
ruo zhi fu ye mian wang zhi qian zhui reng shi 
qing ti gao jing ti 
ju zhong guo zhi sheng 
xin wen zong heng 
di san ci quan guo jing ji pu cha da mu zheng shi la kai 
zhe ci jing ji pu cha de dui xiang shi zai zhong guo jing nei cong shi di er chan ye he di san chan ye de quan bu fa ren dan wei 
chan ye huo dong dan wei he ge ti jing ying hu 
pu cha de zhu yao nei rong bao kuo dan wei ji ben shu xing 
cong ye ren yuan 
cai wu zhuang kuang 
sheng chan jing ying qing kuang 
sheng chan neng li 
yuan cai liao he neng yuan ji zhu yao zi yuan xiao hao deng deng 
mo qing jia di 
xiang bi qian liang ci 
zhe yi ci jing ji pu cha jiang ru he jin xing 
zen yang cai neng bao zheng shu ju de zhen shi xing 
pu cha yuan men you lai zi he fang 
lai ting zhong yang tai ji zhe zhang mian mian de bao dao 
wu nian yi ci de jing ji pu cha zai ci jin ru wo men de sheng huo 
jing ji pu cha 
kan shi he pu tong bai xing de sheng huo ju li po yuan 
dan jiu xiang guo ri zi yao zhi dao zi jia de 
jing ji pu cha qi shi jiu shi gei guo jia de jing ji hao mai 
mo qing guo jia de jia di 
guo wu yuan jing ji pu cha ban gong shi zhu ren xu yi fan 
jing ji pu cha zhu yao shi wei le quan mian xiang xi liao jie wo guo er san chan ye fa zhan zhuang tai 
shi you guo jia tong yi zu zhi de yi xiang zhong da guo qing guo li diao cha 
tong guo pu cha ke yi de dao de ke guan 
zhen shi fan ying wo guo jing ji she hui fa zhan quan mao de xin xi 
neng gou wei guo jia ke xue zhi ding zhong chang qi ji hua ti gong xiang shi de can kao yi ju 
di san ci quan guo jing ji pu cha she ji chu di yi chan ye wai de suo you dan wei he ge ti jing ying hu 
guo jia tong ji ju ju zhang ma jian tang shuo 
he qian liang ci jing ji pu cha xiang bi 
zhe yi ci jiang quan li tui jin pu cha quan liu cheng de dian zi hua 
ye jiu cheng wei le wo guo pu cha shi shang xian dai xin xi ji shu ying yong shui ping zui gao de yi ci she hui diao cha shi jian 
zhe ci pu cha jiang tong guo wei xing yao gan ying xiang zi liao he xiang guan de li shu ju tong yi hua fen pu cha qu

shu ju cai ji he shang chuan

bian jie jia gong pu cha shu ju

pu cha guo cheng zhong 
pu cha yuan jiang shou chi dian zi zhong duan she bei 
dui suo you pu cha dui xiang jin xing ding wei

dian zhu xing ming 
pu mian di zhi

zhe yang jiu wan cheng le yi hu de pu cha gong zuo
