yao zhi ding shi shi hao guo jia xin xing cheng zhen hua gui hua 
guo jia fa gai wei hui hou ye ming que biao shi 
jiang zhua jin xiu ding wan shan guo jia xin xing cheng zhen hua gui hua 
zheng qu jin kuai fa bu shi shi 
gang gang bi mu de zhong yang nong cun gong zuo hui yi ze jin yi bu xi hua le cheng zhen hua de shi jian biao 
ti chu san ge 
tui jin yi ren wei he xin de cheng zhen hua 
kan de jian shui 
ji de zhu xiang chou 
min zhong qi dai zhong yang cheng zhen hua gong zuo hui yi miao hui de zhe yi mei hao tu jing zao ri shi xian 
guo jia xin xing cheng zhen hua gui hua 
zhe yi ding ceng she ji de mian shi 
guo qi gai ge zong ti fang an you wang jie zhen rong shi chang hua cheng qi he xin 
guo zi wei fu zhu ren huang shu he ri qian zai shen hua guo you qi ye gai ge deng you guan qing kuang fa bu hui shang biao shi 
guo zi wei zheng zai an zhao san zhong quan hui de yao qiu 
zhua jin xiu gai he wan shan shen hua guo you qi ye gai ge de yi jian 
xia yi bu jiang an zhao zhong yang de tong yi bu shu shi shi fa bu 
shen hua guo you qi ye gai ge yao jian chi yi xia san xiang ji ben yuan ze 
jian chi ji ben jing ji zhi du 
jian chi shi chang hua gai ge fang xiang 
jian chi zheng qi fen kai 
zheng zi fen kai 
suo you quan yu jing ying quan fen kai 
jin qi ju xing de zhong yang qi ye 
di fang guo zi wei fu ze ren hui yi dui guo zi guo qi gai ge jin xing le xi zhi an pai 
gen ju hui yi de bu shu 
fa zhan hun he suo you zhi 
qi ye nei bu gai ge 
wan shan jian guan ti zhi he jie jue li shi yi liu wen ti wu ge fang mian qu de shi zhi xing jin zhan 
zai zhe fen guan fang miao hui de xin jie duan guo you qi ye gai ge de 
jia kuai ti sheng guo you qi ye de shi chang hua shui ping cheng wei qi he xin 
zai wai jie kan lai 
sui zhe guo qi gai ge fang an de chu tai 
chang jiu yi lai guo you qi ye pu bian cun zai de xin chou he zhi wu xiao fei guo gao 
shi chang hua cheng du bu gou deng gu ji you wang de dao gai guan 
zhao kao gai ge zong ti fang an jiang chu tai yu po 
yi kao ding zhong shen 
ju jiao yu bu xin wen fa yan ren tou lu 
kao shi zhao sheng zhi du gai ge de zong ti fang an ji gao kao gai ge deng ge ling yu gai ge shi shi yi jian mu qian zheng zai yan jiu zhi ding zhong 
yu ji jiang yu jin nian shang ban nian fa bu 
zuo wei min zhong zui wei guan xin de wen ti zhi yi 
jiao yu ling yu shen shui qu duo gai ge ren wu zhong 
yi kao ding zhong shen 
de zhi du duo nian lai bao shou gou bing 
ye shi ci lun gai ge yao gen chu de zui da bi duan 
wei jie jue zhe yi wen ti 
pu tong gao xiao jiang zhu bu tui xing ji yu tong yi gao kao he gao zhong xue ye shui ping kao shi cheng ji de zong he ping jia 
duo yuan lu qu ji zhi 
chu gai ge gao kao zhao kao zhi du zhi wai 
ji jiang fa bu de zong ti fang an hai hui zai xiao xue chu zhong dui kou zhi sheng 
shi xing xue qu zhi 
you tiao jian di qu xin jian xiao shi xing jiu nian yi guan zhi ban xue huan jie dai cheng shi ze xiao re 
yan jiu sheng kao shi zhao sheng zhi du ji xue xi cheng guo zhuan huan ren ding zhi du deng liu fang mian jin xing tan suo 
gen ju xin yi lun jiao gai 
de shi jian biao she zhi 
bu dan jiao yu bu yao chu tai zong ti fang an 
ge sheng fen hai jiang zai nian di chu tai dang di ju ti shi shi ban fa 
you tiao jian de sheng fen kai shi zong he gai ge shi dian huo zhuan xiang gai ge shi dian 
ru jin jiao gai de xin hao yi ming que 
gai ge neng fou you tu po 
jiang duo da cheng du man zu min zhong su qiu 
li du huo jiang sheng ji zhi du fan fu jiang ken ying gu tou 
yang gang he li chong xi 
jian ding bu yi ba dang feng lian zheng jian she he fan fu bai dou zheng yin xiang shen ru 
yu shi zhe zhong gong jiang yi pin lv geng gao 
li du geng qiang de 
zhong gong shi ba da yi lai 
zhe xie shu ju ti zhen she hui fan fu xin xin 
ye rang min zhong dui xin yi nian li zhong gong yan da 
lao hu cang ying 
bao you geng gao qi dai 
fan fu xu biao ben jian zhi 
cong ding ceng she ji gui hua wei lai wu nian zhong gong fan fu lu jing 
dao hui yi fei guan li ban fa 
li xing jie yue fan dui lang fei tiao li 
guo nei gong wu jie dai guan li gui ding deng deng 
zhe xie zhi du neng fou zhen luo di 
shi ba jie san zhong quan hui ti chu gai ge dang de ji lv jian cha ti zhi 
yao qiu xun shi zhi du quan fu gai 
tan suo shi xing guan di zhi deng 
san zhong quan hui hou 
guan fang you jie lian shi fang chu shi dian xin ti ren ling dao gan bu cai chan gong kai 
ren zhi gang wei guan li ban fa 
fen jie yi ba shou quan li 
zhi ding gan bu dai yu biao zhun deng fan fu xin zheng xin hao 
xin nian kai qi 
zhe xie zhi du fan fu de 
bei shou guan zhu 
fen xi ren wei 
fan fu guan xi min zhong dui ji xu shen hua gai ge de ren ke yu zhi chi 
zai quan mian shen hua gai ge zheng cheng qi bu de di yi nian 
zhong gong sheng ji fan fu 
qiang hua zheng feng de tai shi jiang chi xu 
de xian ming di se 
zhong guo wai jiao jing cai kai ju 
xin de yi nian 
mian lin ke neng cun zai de fan dan ya li 
zhong chang shou zhu 
tiao zhan bu xiao 
liang chang gui bin yun ji de 
zhu chang wai jiao 
kan tou shi zu 
feng hui zai hui zhong guo 
jiang yu jin nian qiu ji zai bei jing ju ban 
zhong guo ling dao ren jiang yu nei xie guo jia yuan shou hui wu 
yin ren guan zhu 
da guo guan xi fang mian yi shi kan dian pin pin 
zhong mei ru he chong shi he tuo zhan xin xing da guo guan xi yin ren guan zhu 
er ni yu nian chu zou ma shang ren de xin ren zhu hua da shi geng wei ci ping tian kan dian 
zhong mei zai shuang bian tou zi xie ding tan pan fang mian you wang qu de shi zhi xing jin zhan 
zhong e zai tou zi 
gao ke ji chuang xin deng ling yu de he zuo you ke neng qu de xin tu po 
zhong ou zai luo shi 
shi xian shuang fang fa zhan zhan lve de dui jie fang mian jiang hui you xin ju cuo 
zhou bian reng jiang shi zhong zhong zhi zhong 
jian yu an bei ri qian de 
zhong ri guan xi liao nan 
ri qu fu za de chao xian ban dao ju shi jiang he qu he cong 
ge jie yi ce de jin zheng en fang hua neng fou cheng hang 
cun jiao da bian shu de nan hai wen ti jiang xiang he chu 
dou you dai guan cha 
you hao he zuo reng shi jin nian zhong guo zhou bian wai jiao de zhu ji diao 
zhu da jing ji wai jiao 
mou qiu yu dong meng guan xi de 
zuan shi shi nian 
ji ji jing ying yu nan ya 
zhong ya deng guan xi 
da zao wen ding you hao fan rong de zhou bian zhan lve yi tuo 
shi ba jie san zhong quan hui ti chu cheng li guo jia an quan wei yuan hui 
zhe yi bei shi wei jia qiang zhong yang dui wai shi gong zuo de ji zhong tong yi ling dao he tong chou xie tiao de zui xin ju cuo 
liao zai jin nian you shi zhi xing jin zhan 
jun dui gai ge zhuo li 
neng da sheng zhang 
qiang jun zhi lu huo tui xin ju 
shi ba jie san zhong quan hui dui guo fang he jun dui gai ge de zong bu shu zhong 
shen hua jun dui ti zhi bian zhi tiao zheng gai ge 
bei shou guan zhu 
you fen xi cheng 
yi ci wei qi dian 
zhong guo jun dui jiang tui jin zhan lve xing 
hong guan xing bian ge 
xin nian kai qi 
de yao qiu xia 
zhong guo jun dui ru he you hua jun dui gui mo jie gou 
jian shao fei zhan dou ji gou he ren yuan 
ru he zai jun dui zheng ce zhi du tiao zheng gai ge shang 
jian li jun guan zhi ye hua zhi du 
ru he geng jia zhu zhong lian he di fang 
tui dong xing cheng jun min rong he shen du fa zhan de ge ju 
gai ge lu jing qing xi zhi hou de zhu duo shen ceng gai ge yin ren guan zhu 
cong jin jiu fan she de 
dao jun che huan xin pai qi hao che 
xin de yi nian li 
bao kuo fan fu zhi tan zai nei 
jie fang jun zai zheng su jun feng jun ji fang mian de li du liao jiang chi xu 
guo qu yi nian 
gao mi du de zhen da shi kang yin lai shi jie mu guang 
zhong guo jun dui jiang shou ci can jia mei guo zhu dao de 
lian he jun yan 
shi jie zhan chang 
jie fang jun de liang xiang bei shou qi dai 
yi zhong guo shou sou hang mu liao ning jian wei he xin de hang mu zuo zhan ti xi jian she chuang zao le duo ge 
zai zhong guo hai jun zou xiang 
de zhan lve zhuan xing zhong 
zhong guo hang mu hua ti bi jiang ji xu yin lai gao guan zhu du 
xin de yi nian li 
bao kuo xun hang diao yu dao zai nei 
zhong guo jun dui zai ying dui zhou bian an quan ju shi 
jian jue han wei guo jia zhu quan fang mian de ju cuo ye jiang geng yin ren guan zhu 
ji xu gong jian duo xiang yi ti you dai tui jin 
liang an guan xi ke wei zai 
nan zhong qiu jin 
zhe yang de gong jian jiao bu zai jin nian bu hui zhi bu 
liang an ling dao ren shi xian hui wu bing fei duan qi ke shi xian 
bu guo liang an dou le guan qi cheng 
shuang fang liang an shi wu zhu guan bu men fu ze ren qu nian jian mian tong yi jian li zhi jie lian xi 
jia qiang jiao liu gou tong 
tui dong hu fang 
guo wu yuan tai ban biao shi 
you guan an pai zheng zai gui hua zhong 
hu fang zai jin nian zhi de qi dai 
liang an min jian zheng zhi dui hua jiang ji xu tui jin 
zuo wei dui hua zhong yao ping tai de di er jie liang an he ping lun tan jin nian jiang zai tai wan ju xing 
ci lun tan ji qi ta dui hua ping tai jiu zheng zhi yi ti hui qu de nei xie xin gong shi yi ji jin yi bu de jie jue fang an 
cheng wei liang an guan xi gong jian ke nan de zhi biao zhi yi 
liang an gao duan jiao liu jiang bao chi re du 
yan xu guan li 
guo gong liang dang gao ceng yu ji jin nian jiang ze qi hui mian 
ji xu jiu liang an guan xi zhong da wen ti jiao huan yi jian 
shi fang xin xin xi 
zhe jiang wei liang an guan xi gong jian ke nan ti gong xin dong li 
er shi tu tiao zheng da lu zheng ce que reng wei tuo 
de min jin dang 
jin nian neng fou mai chu da bu 
yu da lu jiao wang shi xian zheng chang hua 
zhi de guan cha 
hai xie hai ji liang hui xie shang jin nian ren wu fan zhong 
jiang chu ji huo wu mao yi xie yi 
liang hui hu she ban shi ji gou deng duo xiang yi ti 
ling yi fang mian 
fu wu mao yi xie yi zhi jin wei neng zai tai wan tong guo sheng xiao 
jin nian ru he tui dong yi qian xie yi jin kuai luo shi 
ru he ke fu zu li da cheng bing luo shi hou xu shang tan cheng guo 
you dai shuang fang nu li 
liang an ge jie ci qian yi duo ci hu yu jian li wen jiao jiao liu he zuo kuang jia xing ji zhi 
yi ji xin wen jiao liu zheng chang hua 
dan shang wei cheng wei xian shi 
jin nian ruo neng you suo tu po 
jiang wei liang an guan xi xie shang nong zhong yi bi 
sui zhe liang an min jian jiao liu bu duan jia shen 
liang an zhi jian ren liu 
zi jin liu wang lai ji dai geng wei bian li 
geng wei kuo da shen hua 
jin yi bu jie jue zhe xie wen ti 
liang an guan xi xiang qian gong jian jiang ju bei geng wen gu ji chu 
zai e luo si quan jing ti sheng jing jie ji bie 
fang fan kong bu xi ji 
yan mi pai cha ren yuan mi ji di dian 
e luo si guo jia fan kong wei yuan hui zheng shi 
pu jing yi jing xia ling ti sheng e luo si quan jing de jing jie ji bie 
tong shi yao qiu dui fu er jia ge lei zuo chu te bie an quan bu shu 
e guo ji wen chuan dian xun she bao dao 
guo jia fan kong wei yuan hui li ji gen ju pu jing zhi shi zhao kai jin ji hui yi 
jue ding ba fu er jia ge lei de nei zheng bu zhuan shu xue yuan ren yuan yi ji bu shu yu ka la qi shi de nei wu bu dui lin shi hua gui nei zheng bu fu er jia ge lei di qu fen bu zhi hui 
gen ju nei zheng bu de xiao xi 
chu xin nian qian hou de li xing an quan bu shu wai 
nei zheng bu zheng 
cai qu e wai cuo shi que bao an quan 
che liang ji qing bao zhong chu xian de di zhi jiang jie shou geng yan ge jian cha 
e guo jia fan kong wei yuan hui zhu fu er jia ge lei zhou dai biao pi li pu qiu ke jie shao shuo 
xuan feng - fan kong 
zhuan xiang xing dong 
zhuan xiang xing dong zhu yao mu di shi jia qiang dui huo che zhan he shang chang deng ren yuan mi ji di dian de xun shi jian cha li du 
bi mian kong bu xi ji zai du fa sheng 
gai zhou jiang qu xiao xin nian suo you qing zhu huo dong 
e hu yu guo ji he zuo fan kong 
liang qi bao zha jun bei ding xing wei kong bu xi ji 
fu er jia ge lei gang gang fa sheng yi qi gong gong qi che zi sha shi bao zha xi ji shi jian 
zao cheng shu shi ren shang wang 
fu er jia ge lei pi lin e bei gao jia suo lian bang qu 
gai di qu fei fa wu zhuang huo yue 
kong bu zhu yi mei you guo jie 
guo ji she hui zhi you gong tong nu li cai neng you xiao ying dui kong bu wei xie 
de guo zong tong ju chu xi dong ao hui kai mu shi 
ju e luo si mei ti zuo ri bao dao 
ji tuo fu biao shi 
mu qian chu xi kai mu shi de zheng yao ming dan hai mei you zui hou que ding 
xian zai yi jing ming que de shi 
zheng fu shou nao huo zhe guo wang jiang chu xi kai mu shi 
yi xie ou zhou guo jia ling dao ren ju jue chu xi suo qi dong ao hui 
bao kuo fa guo zong tong ao lang de he de guo zong tong gao ke 
che chen kong bu tou mu ceng yang yan 
shi yong zui da li liang 
po huai suo qi dong ao hui 
jin guan bao zha an gei suo qi dong ao hui meng shang le yin ying 
ao wei hui dui e luo si zheng fu neng gou wei suo qi dong ao hui ti gong an quan bao zhang bao you xin xin 
jie zhi mu qian 
zui gao ren min fa yuan xia fa le 
guan yu shi shi liang xing gui fan hua gong zuo de tong zhi 
guan yu chang jian fan zui de liang xing zhi dao yi jian 
yao qiu ge gao ji ren min fa yuan gen ju 
zhi ding shi shi xi ze 
bing zheng shi shi shi liang xing gui fan hua gong zuo 
gong wu bu fen 
di yi bu fen wei 
liang xing de zhi dao yuan ze 
di er bu fen wei 
liang xing de ji ben fang fa 
di san bu fen wei 
chang jian liang xing qing jie de shi yong 
di si bu fen wei 
chang jian fan zui de liang xing 
jiu jing guo duo nian shi xing de jiao tong zhao shi zui 
zheng zhou shi wei shu ji wu tian jun zai zi zhu shou mai ji qian mai piao 
wu tian jun da cheng di tie jie shou cai fang 
zheng zhou dian shi tai 
zheng zhou xin wen 
yi ze xin wen cheng 
dang tian zao shang 
zheng zhou shi wei shu ji wu tian jun zai zheng dong xin qu kai wan hui hou 
lin shi jue ding cheng zuo di tie fan hui shi wei 
yu mi shu zai hui zhan zhong xin zhan zi zhu shou mai ji qian mai piao shi 
bei zheng zai cai fang de zheng zhou dian shi tai ji zhe ren chu 
wu tian jun zai di tie nei yu shi min jiao tan 
ting qu jian yi 
ta zai lv cheng guang chang zhan xia che 
ji zhe ou yu shi wei shu ji 
zai ci ri zao dao le wang luo yu lun zhi yi 
zhen de shi ou yu ma 
que ding bu shi an pai de 
ji zhe jiu ci shi cai fang she shi zheng zhou dian shi tai shi zheng pin dao ji zhe xu jin 
ta zai jie shou xin jing bao ji zhe cai fang shi cheng 
yu shi wei shu ji que shi shi ou yu 
dui yu wang you de zhi yi 
zhe ze xin wen jian li zai xin wen zhen shi xing ji chu zhi shang 
wan quan jing de qi jian yan de 
mei gei wo men da zhao hu 
zheng zhou gui dao jiao tong you xian gong si zong he bu yi ming han xing bu zhang cheng 
zhi qian bing bu zhi dao shi wei shu ji yao lai cheng zuo di tie 
zhi dao shi wei shu ji zai ti yan wan hou gei gai dan wei ling dao da dian hua 
cai zhi dao ci shi 
gen wo men ling dao da le dian hua 
shuo ta ti yan le yi xia di tie 
ju da he wang bao dao 
zheng zhou tu jiang bao yu 
shi ren zheng zhou shi dai shi zhang de wu tian jun chi jiao zhan zai yu shui zhong yong shou tao du zhu pai shui guan dao de shu ye 
dang shi zhe yi mu bei yi ming wang you pai dao 
shang chuan dao wang luo hou 
wu tian jun bei cheng zhi wei 
zui mei shen ying 
shu ji xi huan dao chu zou zou 
zheng zhou shi wei xuan chuan bu xin wen chu yi gong zuo ren yuan dui xin jing bao ji zhe biao shi 
shi wei shu ji xi huan dao chu zou zou 
ping shi ye hui qi zi xing che zai shi li guang guang 
dui yu wang you zhi yi de 
ta cheng ke neng you yu da jia bu liao jie 
zao cheng guo fen jie du 
ju ren min wang dian ju zheng zhou shi wei gong zuo ren yuan jie shao 
xin nian cha hua hui zai wei yu zheng dong xin qu de zheng zhou guo ji hui zhan zhong xin ju xing 
ruo yao cheng che gan wang zheng zhou shi wei dang wai ren shi zuo tan hui hui chang 
wu tian jun dan xin lu shang dan wu shi jian tai jiu 
jue ding cheng zuo gang gang kai tong de zheng zhou shou tiao di tie 
shun bian ti yan yi xia yun xing qing kuang 
ting shi min yi jian 
gen fang hai bei shu ji xie jue 
ni dang tian de gong zuo an pai shi 
ti qian yi tian wo men xin wen bu jiu dui zhou yi dang tian de bao dao jin xing le ce hua 
dang tian wo men fen san lu ji zhe 
fen bie qu di tie 
san huan lu he shi qu zhu gan dao cai fang 
lai kan shou ri jiao tong he ke liu qing kuang 
wo bei fen qu di tie cai fang 
wo he she xiang ji zhe cong lv cheng guang chang zhan yan lu cai fang dao hui zhan zhong xin zhan 
zai hui zhan zhong xin zhan cai fang shi 
hu ran fa xian zai zi zhu shou mai ji qian mai piao de ren hen yan shu 
zi xi yi kan 
ju ran shi shi wei shu ji wu tian jun 
ou yu shu ji hou 
ni de fan ying shi shen me 
chu yu xin wen ren de zhi ye min gan 
wo ma shang gen zhe qu le 
dang shi hai wen le shu ji neng bu neng gen zhe cai fang 
dan shu ji xie jue le 
shuo ni men mang ba 
fan zheng wo men ye hai mei cai fang wan 
wo ye bu xiang cuo guo zhe ge xin wen 
jiu gen shang le che gen pai 
yi zhi dao ta xia che 
ran hou wo men ba gong zuo ji xu zuo wan hou 
hui qu xiang bu men zhu ren he zhi ban bian ji hui bao le 
ta men dou jue de hen bu cuo 
jiu fang dao le dang tian di tie de xi lie bao dao dang zhong 
wei shen me xuan ze le 
hen que qie de shi shi 
er qie wo shi cai jing ji zhe 
shi yi ge yue qian wei ying jie di tie bao dao er bei chou diao qu de 
ye bu shi zhuan men gen ling dao pao de shi zheng ji zhe 
dang tian shi wei shu ji jiu zai hui zhan zhong xin di tie zhan fu jin kai hui 
shi wei jiu zai lv cheng guang chang zhan 
gang hao di tie zhi da 
ta ye shi lin shi jue ding 
rang wo men yi qi lai kan kan hai you nei xie xin gui 
he nan zhou kou zheng fa wei shu ji zhu jia chen bei diao cha 
guan fang zan wei tong bao qi she xian nei xie yan zhong wei ji wei fa wen ti 
zheng mei dong shi zhang she yan zhong wei ji wei fa bei cha 
zhong ji wei jian cha bu wang zhan fa bu xiao xi 
he nan sheng zhou kou shi wei chang wei 
zheng fa wei shu ji zhu jia chen she xian yan zhong wei ji wei fa 
mu qian zheng jie shou zu zhi diao cha 
guan fang zan wei tong bao zhu jia chen she xian le nei xie yan zhong wei ji wei fa wen ti 
ju he nan sheng zheng fu wang deng guan wang xian shi 
ci qian ban yue 
zhu jia chen hai ceng duo ci chu xi ge lei hui yi 
ta ceng chu xi zhou kou shi xin fang gong zuo xian chang hui shang 
xia wu ta chu xi le 
fa zhi zhou kou 
jian she gong zuo tui jin hui 
zhu jia chen an fang zheng feng su ji hui tou kan huo dong 
zhu jia chen zhu chi zhao kai tai kang xian gong an ju ban zi cha bai pou xi hui 
cun min zuo tan hui 
gong kai zi liao xian shi 
ci qian ceng dan ren zhong gong zhou kou shi wei chang wei 
tong zhan bu zhang 
zheng zhou mei tan gong ye 
you xian ze ren gong si dong shi zhang 
dang wei shu ji meng zhong ze 
ye yin she xian yan zhong wei ji wei fa 
zheng jie shou diao cha 
zheng mei ji tuan shi guo you mei tan qi ye di yi gu 
gai ji tuan yi fa bu gong gao 
cheng meng zhong ze bei he nan ji wei shi shi 
shuo shi yan jiu sheng xue li 
cong ji ceng mei kuang ji shu yuan gan qi 
li jing zong gong 
he bi mei ye ji tuan dang wei shu ji 
fu dong shi zhang deng zhi 
ren di si jie dong shi hui dong shi zhang 
guo jia zhu xi xi jin ping zai ban gong shi fa biao er ling yi si nian xin nian he ci 
xin hua she ji zhe lan hong guang she 
xi jin ping he qi zi peng li yuan zai fu jian dong shan dao 
xi jin ping zai fu zhou dai nv er wan shua 
xi jin ping he mu qin qi xin san bu 
xi jin ping yu fu qin xi zhong xun 
qi zi peng li yuan 
nv er de jia ting zhao 
xi jin ping zai dou bo lin zou shang qiu chang 
yi shi qiu ji 
xin nian qian xi 
guo jia zhu xi xi jin ping tong guo zhong guo guo ji guang bo dian tai 
zhong yang ren min guang bo dian tai 
zhong yang dian shi tai 
fa biao le er ling yi si nian xin nian he ci 
quan wen ru xia 
yi yuan fu shi 
wan xiang geng xin 
wo xiang quan guo ge zu ren min 
xiang xiang gang te bie xing zheng qu tong bao he ao men te bie xing zheng qu tong bao 
xiang tai wan tong bao he hai wai qiao bao 
xiang shi jie ge guo he ge di qu de peng you men 
zhi yi xin nian de zhu fu 
zhu fu lao ren men jian kang 
zhu fu hai zi men kuai le 
zhu fu mei ge jia ting xing fu an kang 
zai zhe ci jiu ying xin zhi ji 
wu shu gong ren 
zhi shi fen zi 
gan bu reng ran jian shou zai gong zuo gang wei 
bu shao tong bao yi ran ben bo zai shi jie ge de wei zu guo xin qin gong zuo 
xu duo ren min jie fang jun he wu jing guan bing 
gong an gan jing zheng zai lv xing guang rong shi ming 
ta men you de yuan li zu guo 
yuan li qin ren 
you de bu neng tong jia ren tuan ju 
wo dai biao zu guo he ren min 
xiang ta men zhi yi cheng zhi de wen hou 
zhu ta men ping an shun li 
dui wo men guo jia he ren min lai shuo shi hen bu ping fan de yi nian 
wo men gong tong zhan sheng le ge zhong kun nan he tiao zhan 
qu de le xin de xian zhu cheng jiu 
cheng ji lai zhi bu yi 
ning ju le da jia de xin xue he han shui 
wo xiang da jia biao shi zhong xin de gan xie 
wo men dui quan mian shen hua gai ge zuo chu zong ti bu shu 
gong tong miao hui le wei lai fa zhan de hong wei lan tu 
wo men jiang zai gai ge de dao lu shang mai chu xin de bu fa 
wo men tui jin gai ge de gen ben mu di 
shi yao rang guo jia bian de geng jia fu qiang 
rang she hui bian de geng jia gong ping zheng yi 
gai ge shi xu yao wo men gong tong wei zhi fen dou de wei da shi ye 
xu yao fu chu jian xin de nu li 
yi fen geng yun 
yi fen shou huo 
zai gai ge kai fang de wei da shi jian zhong 
wo men yi jing chuang zao liao wu shu hui huang

yu zhou hao han 
xing han can lan 
ying gai shou wang xiang zhu 
tong zhou gong ji 
gong tong fa zhan 
zhong guo ren min zhui xun shi xian zhong hua min zu wei da fu xing de zhong guo meng 
ye zhu yuan ge guo ren min neng gou shi xian zi ji de meng xiang 
wo zhen cheng xi wang 
shi jie ge guo ren min zai shi xian ge zi meng xiang de guo cheng zhong xiang hu li jie 
xiang hu bang zhu 
nu li ba wo men lai yi sheng cun de di qiu jian she cheng wei gong tong de mei hao jia yuan 
sheng huo zong shi chong man xi wang de 
cheng gong zong shi shu yu ji ji jin qu 
bu xie zhui qiu de ren men 
wo men zai qian jin de dao lu shang 
hai hui yu dao ge zhong feng xian he tiao zhan 
rang lao bai xing guo shang geng jia xing fu de sheng huo 
hai you da liang gong zuo yao zuo 
wo men yao qian xu jin shen 
jian ku fen dou 
gong tong pu xie wei da zu guo fa zhan de shi dai xin pian zhang 
xie xie da jia 
ban gong shi shou du bao guang shu jia shang bai fang liu zhang zhao pian 
guo jia zhu xi xi jin ping fa biao xin nian he ci 
qi ban gong shi ye shou du bao guang 
tou guo yang shi jing tou ke yi kan dao 
xi jin ping ban gong shi bei jing shi yi fu chang cheng hua zuo 
ban gong zhuo shang you san bu dian hua 
er hong yi bai 
shen hou shu jia shang bai fang le si fu zhao pian 
ta yu jia ren tui zhe lun yi shang de fu qin 
ta qian mu qin de shou san bu 
ta yu fu ren he ying 
ta qi zhe zi xing che zai zhe nv er 
you ce shu jia shang you liang zhang tu pian 
ke yi pan ming yi zhang ta ti zu qiu de zhao pian 
ju yang guang wang 
ju xin hua she dian 
zan shi mei you ping min si wang bao gao 
zai shou du jin sha sa 
kong bu fen zi 
kong bu fen zi 
kong bu fen zi 
zai en ji li guo ji ji chang bei da si 
chu jin sha sa wai 
mu qian zan bu qing chu xi ji zhe de zhen shi shen fen 
zhe huo xi ji zhe mei you fa dong zheng bian de shi li 
zhi shi xiang kong he min zhong 
zhe yi shi jian sui hou jiang jin ru si fa cheng xu 
ji wang kai lai 
nu li gou jian zhong mei xin xing da guo guan xi 
zhong mei liang guo zheng shi jian li le wai jiao guan xi 
ta bu jin fan kai le zhong mei liang guo guan xi xin de yi ye 
er qie dui guo ji xing shi de yan bian chan sheng le shen yuan ying xiang 
zai zhong mei ji dai ling dao ren he liang guo ren min de gong tong nu li xia 
zhong mei guan xi zou guo le feng feng yu yu 
qu de le li shi xing de fa zhan 
zhong mei liang guo yi hu wei di er da mao yi huo ban 
di san da chu kou shi chang 
liang guo guan fang jiao wang qu zhi ke shu 
liang guo hai jian li le zhan lve yu jing ji dui hua 
zhong mei ren yuan wang lai jin ji qian ren ci 
liang guo mei tian you shang wan ren chuan suo yu tai ping yang liang an 
tong guo hu lian wang 
shou ji hu dong de min zhong geng nan yi ji shu 
zhong mei zai guo ji he di qu wen ti shang de he zuo ye yuan wei xiang jin tian zhe yang guang fan he mi qie 
wu lun zai ying dui guo ji jin rong wei ji 
qi hou bian hua 
neng yuan an quan 
liang shi an quan deng quan qiu xing tiao zhan shang 
hai shi zai tui dong jie jue chao he 
xu li ya deng di qu re dian wen ti fang mian 
zhong mei dou bao chi zhe mi qie de gou tong yu xie tiao 
fa hui zhuo zhong yao zuo yong 
zhong mei liang guo yi cong dang chu de xiang dui ge jue zhuang tai bian cheng le ni zhong you wo 
wo zhong you ni de li yi gong tong ti 
zhong mei guan xi de zhan lve yi yi yu quan qiu ying xiang yu lai yu tu xian 
yi ge liang hao de zhong mei guan xi bu jin fu he liang guo ren min de gen ben li yi 
ye you li yu cu jin ya tai di qu nai zhi shi jie de he ping 
wen ding yu fa zhan 
qi zhong ji dian zhi de te bie ming ji 
ba wo zheng que fang xiang shi fa zhan zhong mei guan xi de guan jian suo zai 
zhong mei guan xi zou xiang shi zhong qian dong shi jie 
zhong mei he ze liang li 
dou ze ju shang 
he zuo shi shuang fang de wei yi zheng que xuan ze 
zhi yao jian chi cong liang guo ren min de gen ben li yi chu fa 
jian chi zhong mei san ge lian he gong bao zhi chu de fang xiang 
jian chi liang guo yuan shou da cheng de yi xi lie zhong yao gong shi 
yao ding qing shan bu fang song 
jiu neng que bao zhong mei guan xi shi zhong yan zhe jian kang wen ding de gui dao chi xu xiang qian fa zhan 
ji ji xun qiu gong tong li yi shi tui jin zhong mei guan xi fa zhan de dong li yuan quan 
zuo wei shi jie shang zui da de fa zhan zhong guo jia he zui da de fa da guo jia 
zhong mei yong you guang fan gong tong li yi 
jian fu zhong yao de gong tong ze ren 
ren he qing kuang xia 
shuang fang dou bu neng wang le zhe yi ji ben shi shi 
zhi yao shuang fang ju jiao gong tong li yi 
bu duan zuo da he zuo dan gao

yong xu fa zhan 
xiang hu zun zhong shi guan kong hao liang guo fen qi de zheng que fang fa 
zhong mei zheng zhi zhi du 
fa zhan shui ping 
li shi wen hua chuan tong bu tong 
cun zai zhe yang na yang de mao dun yu fen qi shi zheng chang de

tong guo dui hua xie shang ji lei hu xin 
ju tong hua yi 
jiu neng bi mian liang guo guan xi shou dao bu bi yao de gan rao 
ren min zhi jian de you yi yong yuan shi zhong mei guan xi fa zhan de zhong yao ji chu 
zhong mei guan xi de fa zhan li bu kai liang guo ren min de guang fan can yu he da li zhi chi 
shuang fang yao nu li tuo kuan qu dao 
gu li ge jie shuang xiang jiao liu 
hou zhi min jian you hao qing yi 
zhe yang cai neng shi zhong mei guan xi shi zhong bao chi sheng ji yu huo li 
dou zhuan xing yi 
jin tian de zhong mei guan xi zhan zai le xin de li shi qi dian shang 
xi jin ping zhu xi he ao ba ma zong tong zai an na bo ge zhuang yuan hui wu shi jiu gou jian zhong mei xin xing da guo guan xi da cheng zhong yao gong shi 
wei liang guo guan xi fa zhan zhi ming liao zheng que fang xiang

ji bu chong tu bu dui kang 
xiang hu zun zhong 
he zuo gong ying 
zhong mei shuang fang ying ba liang guo yuan shou zhe yi zhong yao gong shi zhuan hua wei ju ti de zheng ce he ju cuo 
luo shi dao zhong mei guan xi de fang fang mian mian 
yao bu duan zeng jin zhan lve hu xin 
bao chi gao ceng ji ge ji bie mi qie jiao wang shi tou 
jia shen xiang hu liao jie 
bi mian wu jie he wu pan 
zhong guo jian chi zou he ping fa zhan dao lu 
shi zhong shi cu jin shi jie he ping fa zhan de zheng neng liang 
mei guo ying zheng que ren shi zhong guo de zhan lve yi tu

fan rong de zhong guo

zhong mei guan xi cai neng zou wen 
jin er zou hao 
yao ji ji tuo zhan ge ling yu wu shi he zuo

rang gai ge de shen hua cheng wei jia qiang wu shi he zuo de guo cheng 
nu li da zao he zuo de xin liang dian 
tuo zhan he zuo de xin ling yu 
kai pi he zuo de xin jing jie 
yao tui dong shuang bian tou zi xie ding tan pan jin zao qu de tu po 
shi xian zhong mei jing ji he zuo de xin fei yue 
ke fu ge zhong zu li he gan rao 
zao ri jie jue mei guo gao ji shu chan pin dui hua chu kou xian zhi

jia qiang zai mao yi tou zi

da ji hai dao 
ren dao zhu yi jiu yuan

gong tong fan dui yi qie xing shi de bao li kong bu huo dong 
jia qiang fang kuo san 
zhi fa yi ji ke jiao wen wei ti deng guang fan ling yu de dui hua

nan bei su dan

neng yuan an quan 
liang shi an quan 
wang luo an quan 
liu xing bing deng quan qiu xing wen ti shang de he zuo 
wei guo ji she hui ti gong geng duo gong gong chan pin 
yao tuo shan chu li shuang bian guan xi zhong de min gan wen ti 
she cang ji qi ta she ji zhong guo zhu quan he ling tu wan zheng de zhong da wen ti shang 
mei fang ying zun shou yuan ze 
ke shou cheng nuo 
jin shen chu li 
bi mian zhong mei guan xi zai shou zhe teng 
yao jin yi bu huo yue ge jie jiao liu 
ji xu jia qiang liang guo li fa ji gou 
di fang zheng fu zhi jian de dui hua yu jiao wang 
tui jin gong shang qi ye jie 
xue shu jie zhi jian de hu dong 
cu jin liang guo qing nian he xue sheng zhi jian de wang lai 
rang liang guo ge jie geng jia pin fan 
zeng jin xiang hu liao jie he you yi 
shi zhi chi zhong mei he zuo de li liang he sheng yin shi zhong cheng wei liang guo min yi de zhu liu 
yao bing chi yu shi ju jin de jing shen 
tui dong zhong mei guan xi de hang chuan po lang qian xing 
zhong mei guan xi fa zhan shi ben shen jiu shi yi bu bu duan shun ying shi shi 
bu duan tiao zheng chuang xin 
bu duan kai chuang wei lai de li shi 
liang guo ke fu zheng zhi qi jian he zhi du cha yi zou dao yi qi 
yuan yu liang guo ling dao ren ji yu guo ji ge ju yan bian da shi zuo chu de zheng zhi jue duan 
zhong mei gou jian xin xing da guo guan xi geng xu yao shuang fang ji xu chuang xin si wei 
ji ji xing dong 
rang zhong mei guan xi shi zhong zou zai shi dai de qian lie 
fu jin zhui xi 
zhong mei guan xi yi jing qu de de cheng jiu you mu gong du 
zhan wang wei lai 
wo men dui zhong mei guan xi de qian jing chong man xin xin 
zhi yao zhong mei shuang fang jian chi liang guo yuan shou que ding de fang xiang 
yi zha shi de xing dong xiang xiang er xing 
zhong mei gou jian xin xing da guo guan xi de hong wei mu biao jiu yi ding neng gou shi xian 
chao xian zui gao ling dao ren jin zheng en dang tian fa biao dian shi xin nian jiang hua 
qiang diao xin de yi nian jiang ji xu jia qiang jing ji qiang guo jian she 
ti gao ren min sheng huo shui ping 
jia qiang guo fang li liang 
zai zu guo tong yi dou zheng zhong qu de xin de jin zhan 
jin zheng en hui gu le guo qu yi nian chao xian zai ge ling yu qu de de cheng ji 
te bie ti dao chao xian lao dong dang cai qu jian jue cuo shi qing chu le dang nei zong pai wu dian 
zai shi dang de shi hou xia le zheng que de jue xin 
jie fa bing su qing le fan dang fan ge ming zong pai tuan huo 
shi dang he ge ming dui wu geng jia jian ding 
chao xian de yi xin tuan jie geng jia jia qiang 
jin zheng en biao shi 
chao xian zai jin nian jing ji jian she he ti gao ren min sheng huo nu li zhong jiang nong ye zuo wei zhu gong fang xiang 
jiang suo you li liang ji zhong yu nong ye sheng chan 
chao xian jiang ji xu da li jia qiang guo fang li liang 
you qi shi jia qiang jun dui ji ben zhan dou dan wei lian dui de jian she 
zai guo fang gong ye bu men geng duo sheng chan qing liang hua 
zhi neng hua he jing mi hua de chao xian shi xian dai wu zhuang zhuang bei 
hang shi zi wei guo fang li liang 
jin zheng en qiang diao 
yao che di jian li wei yi ling dao ti xi 
lao gu bao zhang dang dui wu de chun jie xing 
jia qiang dang zu zhi de zhan dou zhi neng he zuo yong 
dui fang hai dang he ge ming dui wu tong yi tuan jie de xi wei xian xiang he yin su dou yao bao chi jing ti bing che di jia yi ke fu 
ji xu kai zhan qing chu sun hai chao xian zhi du de yi se si xiang he tui fei feng chao de dou zheng 
jian jue fen sui di ren si xiang wen hua shen tou yin mou 
jin zheng en biao shi 
jin nian yao guan che jin ri cheng he jin zheng ri de yi xun 
zai zu guo tong yi yun dong zhong qu de xin jin zhan 
bei fang he nan fang ying jian chi zu guo tong yi san da xian zhang he 
bei nan gong tong xuan yan 
de zi zhu yuan ze 
wo men min zu zi ji 
zun zhong bing cheng shi lv xing xuan yan 
bi xu ying zao qi fen gai shan chao han guan xi 
chao xian min zu xiang hu fei bang fan mu zhi hui rang bu xi wang zu guo tong yi de shi li zuo shou yu li 
jin zheng en biao shi 
he ping dui yu chao xian ren min lai shuo wu bi zhen gui 
dan he ping bu shi qi pan he qi qiu jiu neng gou de lai de 
zai chao xian ban dao shang zhen dui chao xian de he zhan zheng yin yun bu san de xing shi xia 
chao xian jue bu hui xiu shou pang guan 
jiang yi qiang you li de zi wei li liang lao gu han wei guo jia zhu quan he he ping 
chao xian dang he zheng fu jin hou jiang lao gu jian chi zi zhu 
you yi de dui wai zheng ce li nian 
tong zun zhong chao xian zhu quan bing you hao xiang dai de suo you guo jia kuo da fa zhan you hao he zuo guan xi 
wei shi jie he ping 
an quan he ren lei gong tong fan rong er ji ji nu li 
qu huan bao ju zhang sheng cheng 
fen fen zhong ke yi gao kua yi jian chang 
ju bao zheng lu yin shu shi she an ju zhang bei mian zhi 
ri qian bei shi ming ju bao she xian le suo qi ye 
fen fen zhong ke yi gao kua yi jian chang 
de qing cheng qu huan bao ju ju zhang chen bai he yi bei mian qu qing cheng qu qu wei wei yuan 
qu huan bao ju dang zu shu ji 
ju zhang deng zhi wu bing li an diao cha 
ju bao chen bai he de lu yin 
nei rong shu shi 
qing yuan shi min xiao nv shi na zhe yi duan dian hua lu yin cai liao shi ming ju bao qing yuan qing cheng qu huan bao ju zhang chen bai he 
zi cheng chen bai he de nan zi yu ren tao lun ru he qiao zha xia qu qi ye qian cai 
fen fen zhong ke yi gao kua yi jian chang 
gai nan zi cheng 
zuo liang ci jiu ke yi 
ni kan ta gan bu gan jie fa 
ta yi jia chang zhi yi yi ji qian wan yuan 
wo men wu fei yao ta yi bai ji shi wan yuan 
qing cheng qu ji wei cheng li diao cha zu dui ci jin xing diao cha 
dui lu yin de zhen shi xing jin xing jian ding 
chen bai he ze dui mei ti cheng 
lu yin zhong de nan zi bu shi zi ji 
lu yin xi wei zao 
qing yuan shi qing cheng qu zai tong bao zhong cheng 
jing guang dong sheng gong an si fa jian ding zhong xin zhuan jia jian ding he qing cheng qu ji wei deng xiang guan bu men de diao cha qu zheng 
shang shu lu yin nei rong shu shi 
chen bai he que you tan lun le yu qi shen fen bu xiang fu de nei rong 
fa xian chen bai he hai she xian qi ta wei ji wen ti 
jing qing cheng qu wei jue ding 
mian qu chen bai he de qing cheng qu qu wei wei yuan 
qu huan bao ju dang zu shu ji 
ju zhang zhi wu 
an cheng xu ban li 
bing dui qi jin xing li an diao cha 
qing cheng qu ji wei chang wei guo gui xing zuo tian biao shi 
zai xiao nv shi shi ming ju bao zhi hou 
ye you yi jia qi ye dao ji wei ju bao chen bai he 
dan guo gui xing wei tou lu ju ti ju bao nei rong 
ji zhe zhu yi dao 
ju bao lu yin zhong yu chen bai he liao tian de hai you qi ta ren yuan 
qing cheng qu ji wei cheng 
mu qian zhi dui chen bai he de sheng yin jin xing le jian ding 
tong shi ye zheng zai dui lu yin zhong de qi ta ren yuan jin xing diao cha 
xiao nv shi gao su ji zhe 
ta yu chen bai he shi pu tong peng you guan xi 
chen dou mei you jie dian hua 
mei xiang dao ta jie le 
dan zhi ting dao ta gen bie ren tan lun ju bao lu yin zhong de nei xie hua 
xiao nv shi hai gao su ji zhe 
zai ta shi ming ju bao chen bai he bing you mei ti jin xing bao dao hou 
chen bai he ceng tong guo peng you qing qiu xiao nv shi xiang ji wei 
lu yin xi wei zao 
bei xiao ju jue 
ju wai jiao bu zhong guo ling shi fu wu wang yuan yin zhu ye ka jie lin bao zong ling guan xiao xi 
hou you yu fei ji chu xian ji xie gu zhang 
dao zhi hang ban yan wu 
cheng ke zhi liu 
hang kong gong si an pai zhi liu cheng ke ru zhu ji chang bin guan bing ti gong can shi 
you yu yuan fei ji nan yi zai duan shi jian nei xiu fu 
hang kong gong si cong mo si ke diao pai yi jia bei yong fei ji fu ke shi 
dan gai bei yong fei ji di da hou ye chu xian gu zhang 
hang kong gong si ni zai ci an pai zhi liu cheng ke ru zhu bin guan shi 
bu fen zhi liu zhong guo cheng ke dui zhang shi jian zhi liu he hang kong gong si de you guan an pai biao shi bu man 
qing xu ji dong 
jian chi zai hou ji ting deng hou 
zhong guo zhu ye ka jie lin bao zong ling guan huo xi ci shi hou gao du zhong shi 
li ji qi dong ling bao gong zuo ying ji yu an 
jin li an fu zhi liu zhong guo cheng ke qing xu 
bing sui ji yu wu la er hang kong gong si he ji chang fang mian liao jie he shi qing kuang 
wu la er hang kong gong si gao 
gai hang ban yan wu que xi ji xie gu zhang suo zhi 
bing yi ji shi gao zhi zhi liu cheng ke 
zhong guo zhu ye ka jie lin bao zong ling guan xun su lian xi wu la er hang kong gong si zong bu fu ze ren 
yao qiu jin kuai zai pai fei ji fu ke shi yun song zhi liu cheng ke 
kao lv dao yin hang ban yan wu 
ci pi zhi liu zhong guo cheng ke zhong you bu fen ren cun zai qian zheng guo qi deng qing kuang 
zhong guo zhu ye ka jie lin bao zong ling guan lian xi ji chang bian jian he yi min bu men 
qing qi ti gong bi yao xie zhu 
jin kuai tuo shan jie jue 
ji chang bian fang he yi min bu men ji shi wei you guan zhi liu zhong guo cheng ke ban li le qian zheng yan qi deng shou xu 
zong ling guan hai lian xi wu la er hang kong gong si zhu ji chang dai biao 
yao qiu qi ke fu kun nan 
jin ke neng zuo hao zhi liu zhong guo cheng ke de fu wu bao zhang gong zuo 
jing ge fang gong tong nu li 
zhong gong zhong yang ban gong ting 
guo wu yuan ban gong ting yin fa 
guan yu ling dao gan bu dai tou zai gong gong chang suo jin yan you guan shi xiang de tong zhi 
ti chu ge ji ling dao gan bu bu de zai jin zhi xi yan de gong gong chang suo xi yan 
ge ji dang zheng ji guan gong wu huo dong zhong yan jin xi yan 
yao ba ge ji dang zheng ji guan jian cheng wu yan ji guan deng wu xiang yao qiu 
zhong guo wang shi 
ji zhe jin qi zai hu nan 
zai xi yan cheng wei yi zhong 
pu bian li yi 
zheng fu ji guan jin yan shi xiao reng you dai guan cha 
chou bu chou yan zhu yao kan 
zui da de ling dao 
hu nan sheng wei jing ji gong zuo hui yi xian chang 
mian dui ji bai wei lai zi ge xian shi zhou de dang zheng yi ba shou 
hu nan sheng wei shu ji xu shou sheng zai zuo wan bao gao hou te bie ti xing zai chang gan bu 
yao an zhong yang yao qiu zuo 
xu shou sheng zhuan men ti dao le zhong yang xia fa de ling dao gan bu dai tou zai gong gong chang suo jin yan de gui ding 
bu neng dang er xi 
xu shou sheng gao sheng shuo 
zhong yang gong bu le ling dao gan bu zai gong gong chang suo jin zhi xi yan de gui ding 
can hui de quan ti ren yuan dou yao yan ge zun shou 
zai hui yi jian xi 
ji zhe hai shi kan dao yi xie yu hui dai biao zai zou lang guo dao deng gong gong chang suo 
hai you dai biao si xia yi lun shuo 
wei shen me bu rang chou yan le 
xian chang duo ming guan yuan biao shi 
hu nan mou xie zheng fu ji guan kai hui shi 
hui chang li shi chang yan wu liao rao 
yun zhe wu zhao 
hui yi shi li lian ren dou kan bu qing 
er jin ji nian 
sheng li zhu yao ling dao zhong bu chou yan de zhan le jue da duo shu 
kai hui shi di qing kuang ye fa sheng le bian hua 
yi wei jing chang can jia guo hu nan sheng zhong yao hui yi de guan yuan gao su ji zhe 
guo qu zai hu nan you ge tong xing de 
ji hui chang chou bu chou yan zhu yao kan 
zui da de ling dao 
yi ba shou bu chou yan 
jiu dou qiang xing bie zhe 
yi ba shou chou yan 
xia mian de gan bu jiu gen zhe pen yun tu wu qi lai 
yi qian ji zhe zai hu nan sheng di fang zheng fu ji guan cai fang shi 
di shang yi gen yan 
zhun bei yi xie san yan yi zuo dai ke zhi yong 
zhe ye cheng le ge ge ban gong shi de 
dan zui jin ji nian lai 
ji guan gan bu chou yan de bi li zhu jian suo xiao 
hen duo di fang de zheng fu ji guan ye dou zai chuang jian 
wu yan ban gong shi 
ji zhe zou jin hu nan mou sheng zhi ji guan de ban gong lou 
kan dao zhi you yi lou tie you 
qing wu xi yan 
zai si lou wen yin shi men kou 
di shang yi ge lan se yan di fei chang xian yan 
lou ti guai jiao chu de la ji tong shang 
yi wei gong zuo ren yuan jie shi shuo 
zhe xie yan tou ke neng shi guo lai ban shi de ren reng xia de 
ji guan gan bu guo qu hui zai zou lang 
wei sheng jian xi yan 
dan xian zai zhe zhong xian xiang bi jiao shao le 
yi xia jie yan rong yi nei fen mi shi tiao 
ji zhe zai he nan sheng zhong yao gong wu jie dai he hui yi ding dian chang suo he nan fan dian kan dao 
yi lou da ting nei xing mu wei zhi 
tie you duo chu 
jin zhi xi yan biao zhi 
dan hui yi shi nei reng ran xian you jian dao jin zhi xi yan gao shi 
ju qian tai gong zuo ren yuan jie shao 
ru guo kai hui yong hu you xiang guan xu qiu 
hui yi shi nei ke yi xuan gua jin yan biao zhi 
sui hou ji zhe you lai dao he nan sheng yi min ban liao jie qing kuang 
yi wei gan bu biao shi 
ta fei chang yong hu guo jia chu tai ling dao gan bu gong wu huo dong zhong yan jin xi yan zheng ce 
bu guo zhe xu yao guo cheng 
bu neng zhao ji 
hen duo xi huan xi yan de ling dao yi jing yang cheng le xi guan 
hen nan yi xia jie yan 
zhe yang shen ti rong yi nei fen mi shi tiao 
yin ci ying gai man man lai jie 
xu yao yi ge guo cheng 
guo jia gong wu yuan ying gai you qi zhu zhong xing xiang 
ying gai dai tou zai hui yi shi deng gong gong chang suo jin zhi xi yan 
ru guo yan yin bi jiao da 
ke yi dao wei sheng jian 
xi yan shi deng si mi kong jian xi yan 
ji zhe sui hou you lai dao he nan sheng qi xiang ju he he nan sheng shui li ting 
ju he nan sheng qi xiang ju dang ban liang zhu ren jie shao 
qi xiang ju ban gong lou wei wu yan ban gong lou 
ta men hen zao jiu zai lou ti jian 
gong gong qu yu xuan gua le jin zhi xi yan biao zhi 
kai hui shi jin zhi xi yan 
zai da ting yu lou dao nei 
ji zhe mei you fa xian yan tou 
ye mei you kan dao you ling dao gan bu xi yan di qing kuang 
zai he nan sheng shui li ting 
da ting nei gong gong chang suo jin zhi xi yan de biao zhi pai ye zao yi gua shang 
ju bu yuan yi tou lu xing ming de yi wei wai di qian lai kai hui de ling dao tou lu 
zai shui li ting kai hui de ge di shi tong zhi ye hen zhu yi xing xiang 
yi ban bu hui zai hui yi shi deng gong gong chang suo xi yan 
shi zai yan yin bi jiao da de 
ye yao ren dao kai wan hui xiu xi shi jian 
tong feng tiao jian hao de di fang xi yan 
zhong yu you le dang jian pai 
ji zhe lai dao hang zhou mou si xing ji fan dian 
nian mo you duo ge sheng shi bu men hui yi zai zhe li zhao kai 
zai qi zhong yi ceng hui yi zhong xin 
ji zhe kan dao 
kai hui zhong jian bu shi you ren cong hui yi shi zou dao guo dao huo zhe da ting zhong chou yan 
you de du zi chou yan 
you de san san liang liang bian liao bian chou 
jian dao ji zhe cai fang 
qi zhong yi wei zheng zai chou yan de mou gan bu hen jing ya 
wo hai bu zhi dao zhe ge gui ding 
bu hao yi si 
yi hou bu chou le 
shuo zhe ta xi mie le xiang yan 
ji mang zou hui hui yi shi 
ling yi wei chou yan de gan bu ye xian de bu hao yi si 
shi zai ao bu zhu le 
wo qu ce suo chou ba 
ce suo ye ke neng suan gong gong chang suo 
mei zai zhi sheng 
zhe jiang sheng ren min da hui tang ye shi ling dao gan bu ji zhong kai hui de chang suo 
ji zhe kan dao zhe li hui chang tie you jin zhi xi yan de biao yu 
zhe li zhi you yi ge min qi zai kai hui 
hui yi zhong chang xiu xi qi jian 
bu shao ren zai da tang nei wai chou yan 
yi xie yan di bei sui shou reng zai di shang 
ji zhe mei you kan dao you fu wu yuan shang qian zu zhi 
zhe li li bin bu de xiang guan fu ze ren gao su ji zhe 
ta men de yuan ze shi lou li bu fang yan hui gang 
bu ti gong yan pin 
hui chang nei jin yan 
kai hui shi yi dan fa xian you ren chou yan 
fu wu yuan jiu hui shang qian zu zhi 
dan zai hui chang wai 
wo men ye bu tai hao guan 
dui yu zhe ci zhong yang de xin gui ding 
zhe wei fu ze ren shuo 
hai mei you shou dao ju ti de cao zuo gui fan 
zhe jiang sheng mou ting ju de yi wei ban gong shi zhu ren wang mou zi chao 
yan ling yu gong ling yi yang zhang 
mei tian dou yao chou diao yi bao yan 
ta tan cheng kan dao zhong yang gui ding de shi hou 
xin li you xie jiao lv 
pa zi ji ke zhi bu zhu 
bu guo dang tian wan shang ta jiu zai zi ji de peng you quan zhuan fa le zhe tiao xin wen 
bing qing peng you tong shi lai jian du 
zhong yang gui ding mei de shuo 
wo men lao yan min zhi neng zi ji xiang ban fa qu ke fu 
cong ling yi jiao du shuo zhe ye shi hao shi 
wei jie yan ti gong le dong li 
zhe jiang yi wei xian ji xuan chuan bu fu bu zhang shuo 
ta shi bei dong xi yan zhe 
ji bie ren gei ta di yan de shi hou ye hui xi 
zi ji bu zhu dong xi 
gan bu zhi jian dou jiang mian zi 
you qi shi ling dao xi yan 
ni bu xi jiu bu tai hao kan 
zhe ci zhong yang de jin yan ling you wang 
xiang ta zhe yang de ren 
jiu xiang he jiu yi yang 
qi shi hen duo gan bu bu xiang he jiu 
dan ai yu mian zi bu de bu he 
xian zai guo jia cha jiu jia yan le 
jiu you le jie kou 
fen wei hao le he jiu ye jiu shao le 
yi hou wo ju jue chou yan jiu you le dang jian pai 
zhe wei gan bu ye tan cheng 
jin yan xu yao shi jian 
hai xu yao ge bu men de zui gao ling dao dai tou 
hang zhou shi min zhang jian kang ren wei 
ling dao gan bu dai tou jin yan xu yao geng qiang you li de luo shi shou duan 
bi ru bei ju bao huo bei fa xian chou yan 
kou chu jiang jin shen zhi bu neng jin sheng 
zhe yang cai you wei she li 
zhong yang ri bao 
ru guo yi ge guo jia jiang guo ji she hui de pu bian jia zhi guan he dao de ji zhun zhi zhi bu gu 
bu guan jing ji neng li duo qiang 
ye bu neng jiang qi shi wei yi liu guo jia 
xi wang ri ben bu yao zai yong jie qi li shi shang ba de xing wei 
lai cui hui guo jia zhi jian de xin ren 
shang hai guo min de gan qing 
sui ran mei you zhi ming dao xing 
dan zhen dui ri ben shou xiang an bei jin san can bai jing guo shen she de xing wei 
fa biao le qiang ying de 
yi liu guo jia lun 
pu jin hui biao shi 
yi liu he yi deng guo jia shi wan quan bu tong de 
yi deng shi zai jing zheng zhong de dao le hao de ming ci 
yi liu cai shi tong shi ju bei le liang hao de pin de he shi li 
jiu suan shi yi deng guo jia 
dan yu gong tong ti de jia zhi guan he li yi bei dao er chi 
er qie wu shi zi ji de xing wei gei zhou wei de qi ta guo jia zao cheng de huai ying xiang 
zhe jue suan bu shang yi liu guo jia 
zai ci jiu ying xin shi ke 
ge guo zheng yao fen fen fa biao xin nian he ci 
biao da dui xin nian de qi ji 
xi jin ping shuo 
wo men tui jin gai ge de gen ben mu di 
shi yao rang guo jia bian de geng jia fu qiang 
rang she hui bian de geng jia gong ping zheng yi 
e xin she bao dao 
jiang ji xu yan li da ji kong bu zhu yi zhi zhi che di gen chu 
ta hai zhi chu 
bao kuo gao shui ping ju ban suo qi dong ao hui 
wo men dai zhe le guan zhu yi jing shen zhan wang wei lai 
zhen cheng xiang xin yi qie yue lai yue hao 
xiang xin ying lai xing yun he cheng gong 
ying xiang chi jiu er qie nan yi kong zhi 
ta zai zhi ci zhong hu yu fa guo qi ye dan fu qi ze ren 
yi jiao di gong zi he jian shao dui gong ren yao qiu wei yuan ze 
jie jue shi ye lv de wen ti 
de guo zhi sheng 
de guo zong li mo ke er de xin nian he ci qiang diao de guo qu de de cheng jiu tong zheng ge ou zhou de jin bu xi xi xiang guan 
mo ke er biao shi 
de guo zheng fu wei lai reng you hen duo gong zuo yao zuo 
yi bao chi guo jia qiang sheng 
ta hai hu yu de guo min zhong wei lai bao chi yong qi 
bing cheng dan geng duo de she hui ze ren 
ju han lian she bao dao 
xin de yi nian 
zheng fu jiang tui jin gai ge 
pu jin hui cheng 
yao bao hu hao jing ji fu su shi tou 
fa zhan guo jia jing ji de zui zhong yao qian ti tiao jian shi guo jia an quan 
han zheng fu jiang bao chi wan wu yi shi de an quan tai shi 
jia qiang wei ji guan li ti zhi 
ji ji wei hu ban dao he ping 
gou jian he ping tong yi de ji chu 
ju chao zhong she bao dao 
hui gu yi nian lai de cheng jiu ji jin nian zhong da ren wu 
ta qiang diao yao ying zao gai shan bei nan guan xi de fen wei 
hu yu ting zhi hu xiang fei bang he fan mu chou shi 
jin zheng en shuo 
wei le gai shan bei nan guan xi 
jin hou ye jiang zuo chu ji ji de nu li 
man gu you bao 
de ge ren zhu ye shang fa biao xin nian he ci 
xi wang tai guo neng zhong gui he xie he ping jing 
ying la cheng nuo 
zai dang qian ju shi xia ta jiang ji xu ren zhen gong zuo 
jue bu qi nei 
bao chi ren nai 
tong shi ye jiang wei guo jia hui fu he xie jin li 
ju fan fei tong xun she xiao xi 
yao wei shi xian fan rong zhi meng er ji xu gong tong nu li 
ta hu yu min zhong ji cheng qian zong tong man de la de yi zhi 
ji xu zhi xing min zu he jie zheng ce 
jia qiang min zu tuan jie 
zu ma hai xi wang zai xin de yi nian li nan fei neng yu shi jie ge guo jian li geng wei lao gu de guan xi 
xi ni xian qu chen bao 
ao da li ya zong li a bo te zai he ci zhong cheng nuo jiang gei yu min zhong geng duo xuan ze 
geng duo zi you he geng shao de zheng fu xian zhi yao qiu 
a bo te cheng 
zai xin de yi nian li 
xi wang geng duo de ren neng gou qu nu li 
yin wei zhe shi gou jian fan rong qiang da guo jia de tu jing 
fen lan guo jia guang bo dian shi wang xiao xi shuo 
fen lan zong li ka tai ning zai he ci zhong biao shi yao wei gou jian geng hao de fen lan er nu li 
tong guo bu duan jie shou geng duo de jiao yu he pei xun 
fen lan ren yong you nu li gai jin zi ji de jue xin 
ta men zi ji ji jia ting de sheng huo geng jia mei hao 
bing jiang guo jia yi geng hao de zhuang tai liu gei zi sun hou dai 
ao ba ma zong tong dai zhe nv er ma li ya zai hua sheng dun de zheng zhi he san wen shu dian mai shu 
niu yue shi bao 
mei guo zong tong ao ba ma shang zhou gou mai le 
sheng ming ru bu xiu fan xing 
ao ba ma ping shi du shen me shu 
po yin ren guan zhu 
ye xu neng rang wai jie ke yi kui jian zhe wei zong tong de si xiang 
bao dao ren wei 
ao ba ma de du shu kou wei shi ji shang pian xiang yu wen xue 
yu hen duo mei guo zong tong bao lan li shi 
ren wu zhuan ji de fang xiang lve you bu tong 
yue du qing dan yi kui zong tong 
ao ba ma zong tong cong wei ta zu che chen qi qu de shan qu 
dan ru guo ta fan kai shang zhou mo zi ji gou mai de xiao shuo zhong na ben 
sheng ming ru bu xiu fan xing 
ta bian hui bei dai wang na pian bao li he bei ju bu duan de tu di 
wu gu zhe bei juan ru zhan zheng de ji lv he zhan dou ren yuan yi yang gao 
zai jin nian bo shi dun ma la song bi sai xian chang de bao zha an rang che chen chong fan ge da mei ti de tou ban wei zhi hou 
ta shi zai si suo zi ji tong e luo si de jin zhang guan xi 
bu guan zen yang 
xiang bi yu ban gong zhuo shang nei xie man shi tu biao di qing bao wen jian 
zhe bu xiao shuo neng rang ao ba ma zong tong dui shi jie shang chong tu zui can ku di qu zhi yi xing cheng geng wei shen qie de gan xing ren shi 
shen chu ta zhe ge wei zhi de ren zong shi hui jie shou da liang shi shi he shu ju 
dan zhe bu xiao shuo shi guan yu jing li 
guan yu xin li he ling hun de 
yue du qing dan da kai le yi shan tong wang zong tong nei xin shi jie de nan de de chuang hu 
rang wai jie de yi kui jian 
chu le nei xie zhan ju le ta bai tian da bu fen shi jian de chong fu er ping dan de jian bao wai 
zhe wei zong si ling guan ke neng hai hui xiang xie shen me 
bai gong chuang tou gui shang de shu hui rang zong tong fang song xin qing 
tao li fan xin shi huo shi de dao ling gan 
ta men hai neng ying xiang zong tong ying dui bai zai mian qian de wei ji he tiao zhan de fang shi 
xu duo dou hui bei yong lai zuo wei li wu 
ha luo de he zi se la bi 
zhe yang de tong hua shu ji ken ding bu hui dui ying dui cha dang 
guo hui yi yuan qi dao shen me qi di zuo yong 
dan ji bian ta men bei song ren 
qi zhong yi xie shu ye neng fan ying chu ao ba ma du guo nei xie shu 
huo xiang du shen me shu 
zhe xie shu shi guan yu shen fen ren tong he zai zao 
guan yu shen wei mei guo ren yi wei zhe shen me 
guan yu jia ting 
bei pan he jiu shu de zhu zuo 
yi qian de hen duo mei guo zong tong dou bao lan mei guo li shi he ren wu zhuan ji ta 
dan yu ta men bu tong 
ao ba ma de kou wei qing xiang yu wen xue 
zhe yu ta de di yi ben hui yi lu shen ru tan suo zhong zu he zi wo wen ti zhe yi dian xiang fu 
yue du xuan ze nai ren xun wei 
zhe ben shu de zhu jue shi lai zi yin du de xiong di lia 
yi ge lai mei guo kai qi le quan xin de sheng huo 
ling yi ge zai zu guo tou shen zheng zhi 
la xi li shuo 
fu qin lai zi ken ni ya 
mu qin lai zi kan sa si zhou de ao ba ma 
ke neng lian xiang dao le zi ji po wei mao dun de li cheng 
ta he wo yi yang 
dui mei guo huai you yi zhong shuang chong kan fa 
xu duo ren dou zhe yang 
xu duo tu sheng tu zhang de mei guo ren ye dui zhe ge guo jia you yi zhong bu tong de shi jiao 
la xi li shuo 
zai mou zhong yi yi shang 
ta ye you yi bu fen lai zi mei guo yi wai 
ta ji ti xian le na zhong mao dun 
ye ti xian le na zhong feng fu 
ge lou li de fu 
zuo zhe ji shu le ri ben nv xing zuo wei yi min gong ren de 
zhao pian xin niang 
bei dai dao mei guo 
jie guo quan jia zai er zhan qi jian bei ding xing wei di guo qiao min 
shen xian ji zhong ying de gu shi 
tan jiu le yi min yu mei guo de ke ti 
ru guo you shen me ren zhi dao lai zi fei chang jian nan de chu jing de wai lai zhe you he gan shou 
ru guo you shen me ren bi xu yu bu tong wen hua da jiao dao 
na me zhe ge ren jiu shi ao ba ma 
jiang su quan mian zheng he xin xing nong cun she hui yang lao bao xian he he cheng zhen ju min yang lao xian liang xiang zhi du 
shi xing quan sheng tong yi de cheng xiang ju min she hui yang lao bao xian zhi du 
zheng he hou de cheng xiang ju min she hui yang lao bao xian ji jin chou ji zhu yao you ge ren jiao fei 
ji ti bu zhu he zheng fu bu tie gou cheng 
can bao ren yuan an gui ding jiao na yang lao bao xian fei 
ju you jiang su sheng hu ji 
wei can jia qi ye zhi gong ji ben yang lao bao xian de nong cun ju min he cheng zhen fei cong ye ju min 
jun ke zai hu ji de zi yuan can jia cheng xiang ju min she hui yang lao bao xian 
can jia cheng xiang ju min she hui yang lao bao xian de ren yuan 
mei chao guo yi nian 
gen ju guo jia zheng ce he quan sheng jing ji she hui fa zhan 
yi ji wu jia bian dong deng qing kuang 
jiang su sheng jiang shi shi tiao zheng ji chu yang lao jin de zui di dai yu biao zhun 
jiang su jin nian lai bu duan wan shan cheng xiang ju min yang lao bao zhang zhi du 
cheng xiang ju min zai yang lao wen ti shang cong ci 
ju ri ben xin wen wang bao dao 
gai ji gou cheng 
jin hou jiang tong guo yi xue jian cha he xun lian deng kao he 
suo you yi zhu zhe dou shi 
dan cheng ji piao 
wu fa fan hui di qiu 
huo xing ji hua de shou ci ren wu zhi zai wei zai ren xiang mu ce shi ji shu wen ti 
ru guo jin xing shun li 
xiang guan gong si yi jing yu ling wai liang jia gong si da cheng he zuo xie yi 
qi zhong yi jia jiang fu ze zhi zao huo xing deng lu qi 
er ling wai yi jia jiang zhi zao yi ke tong xun wei xing 
yi shen zuo ze 
xin hua she fa zhu hui qing zuo 
gan su lan zhou shi zhong xiao xue 
jiu dian si da lei qu yu xian zhi xi yan 
ji lin chang chun shi gong wu yuan bu de zai gong gong chang suo he gong zhong mian qian xi yan 
yi sheng bu zai huan zhe mian qian xi yan 
jiao shi bu zai xue sheng mian qian xi yan 
sui zhe zhong yang ri qian chu tai 
ling dao gan bu dai tou zai gong gong chang suo jin yan 
ge de jin yan kong yan 
zhuan jia ren wei 
ci ci zhong yang xin gui zhua zhu le 
ling dao dai tou 
zhe ge guan jian 
fu yu qun zhong he yu lun jian du quan cheng le you li bao zhang 
jiang zai jing hua gong gong huan jing 
gong kuan mai yan 
jiu zheng gan bu bu liang xi qi deng fang mian chan sheng shen yuan ying xiang 
kong yan xin gui bu liu si jiao 
yan qiang gan bu 
zao yu gan ga 
zhe ji tian wo de dian hua dou bei da bao le 
dou shi guo nei wai tong hang 
mei ti da lai de 
ren wei zhong guo kong yan shi ye ying lai le shi nian lai zui da de zheng ce zhi chi 
zhong guo kong zhi xi yan xie hui chang wu fu hui zhang xu gui hua gao su ji zhe 
guan yu ling dao gan bu dai tou zai gong gong chang suo jin yan you guan shi xiang de tong zhi 
lian ri lai yin qi guang fan guan zhu 
lan zhou shi gong gong chang suo kong zhi xi yan tiao li 
ti yu chang deng ba da lei chang suo quan mian jin yan 
yu le chang suo si da lei qu yu xian zhi xi yan 
lan zhou jin ru 
quan mian kong yan 
chang chun shi fang zhi yan cao yan wu wei hai ban fa 
gui ding geng xi 
li du geng da 
gong wu yuan bu zai gong gong chang suo he gong zhong mian qian xi yan 
yi sheng bu zai huan zhe mian qian xi yan 
jiao shi bu zai xue sheng mian qian xi yan 
jia zhang bu zai hai zi mian qian xi yan 
ren he ren bu de zai fu nv 
er tong he lao nian ren ji zhong huo dong de qu yu xi yan 
bei jing shi yi ji hua 
bu shao sheng shi ye jiang lu xu chu tai guan yu jin yan kong yan de tiao li 
jin yan kong yan jiang ying lai 
gen jin zhong yang jin yan xin gui chu tai de zhe xie di fang gui ding 
wu yi li wai jiang 
gong wu yuan zuo biao shuai 
ling dao fu ze zhi 
zuo wei zhong yao nei rong 
geng xian zhu de shi 
ge ren zai gong gong chang suo sui yi xi yan 
gong gong chang suo kong yan bu li deng xing wei jiang shou dao fa lv ceng mian yue shu 
zhong yang jin ling chu tai hou 
yan yin hen da 
de ling dao gan bu cheng wei guan zhu jiao dian 
an hui yi wei 
yi tian liang bao yan 
de xian wei shu ji gao su ji zhe 
zhe ji tian ta de dian hua ye bei 
shang ji rang ta li ji jie yan 
tong ji gan bu you de quan ta zhu yi 
you de kai wan xiao tiao kan 
yi hou hai xi bu xi yan 
zan shi hai jie bu diao 
shang ban bie zhe 
shan dong sheng mou ting ban gong shi yi ming gan bu gan dao 
wo jing chang zai ban gong shi ao ye xie cai liao 
quan kao yan ti shen 
zhe bu yao le ming le 
jin yan xin zheng 
mei you si jiao 
ce suo dou bu zhun chou 
jiu suan pao dao lou xia chou ye bu xing 
yin wei shi gong wu shi jian 
wan yi bei ban shi qun zhong pai xia lai chuan dao wang shang 
yao chu yang xiang 
wei le yi gen yan wo fan bu shang 
zuo si you xiang 
ta zhun bei jie yan 
duo ming gan bu biao shi 
zhi yao jin yan xin zheng jian chi xia qu 
gan bu jie yan jiang cheng wei qu shi 
jiu suan zan shi nan shou yi dian 
chang yuan lai kan 
dui shen ti jian kang ye shi hao shi 
dan ye you yi xie gan bu kai shi 
zhuan yi zhen di 
zai hu bei wu han yi jia xing zheng dan wei 
gong zuo ren yuan jie shao 
zhe liang tian duo dao ce suo chou yan de ren te bie duo 
hai you ren zai xun zhao zheng ce 
ta men xiang ling dao jian yi 
neng bu neng she li zhuan men de xi yan shi 
ri ben nei ge zong wu da chen xin teng yi xiao can bai le jing guo shen she 
zhong fang dui ci you he ping lun 
wo men dui nei ge zong wu da chen can bai jing guo shen she biao shi qiang lie kang yi 
zhe shi ji ri ben shou xiang an bei jin san han ran can bai jing guo shen she hou 
ri ben nei ge cheng yuan zai li shi wen ti shang cai qu de you yi tiao xin xing dong 
zai ci bao lu chu ri ben fang mian qi tu wei jun guo zhu yi zhan zheng zui fan zhang mu 
tiao zhan shi jie fan fa xi si zhan zheng jie guo he zhan hou guo ji zhi xu de wei xian dong xiang 
zhong guo ren min he qi ta ya zhou guo jia de ren min jue bu yun xu ri ben kai li shi dao che 
wo men yan su dun cu ri fang fan xing li shi 
gai xian yi zhe 
shi jie fan wei nei pin fa de yan zhong 
sheng wu shi jian 
shi de guo fang yi jing tu po lu 
dian de jiang jie 
sheng wu jiang yu 
sheng wu jiang yu 
shi yi ge guo jia wei le bao hu sheng ming zi yuan yi ji yu zhi xiang guan de quan yi kong jian 
ying gai ju bei de sheng wu an quan bao hu he sheng wu wei xie fang yu shi li de fan wei 
sheng wu jiang yu 
an quan yu guo jia he xin li yi mi qie xiang guan 
shi guo jia an quan de zhong yao zu cheng bu fen 
yue lai yue shou dao ge guo zheng fu de gao du zhong shi 
xu duo guo jia ba sheng wu an quan na ru guo jia zhan lve 
zuo wei guo fang he jun shi bo yi de zhi gao dian 
wo guo zheng zhi jing ji fa zhan zhuan xing qi he she hui mao dun tu xian qi 
geng xu cong guo jia an quan de zhan lve gao du shen ke ren shi quan qiu sheng wu an quan xing shi 
chong fen jie jian xian jin sheng wu an quan guan li jing yan 
gou jian xin xing sheng wu wei xie fang yu ti xi 
wei shi xian fu guo qiang jun mu biao bao jia hu hang 
quan qiu sheng wu an quan xing shi yan jun 
wo guo mian lin yan zhong sheng wu wei xie 
sui zhe guo ji xing shi ri qu fu za 
you de yuan huan jing 
li yi zheng duan deng yin fa de sheng wu an quan wen ti yu jia tu chu 
wei hu guo jia an quan he she hui wen ding 
xu yao lao gu shu li 
sheng wu jiang yu 
qie shi ren qing mian lin de sheng wu wei xie 
quan qiu sheng wu an quan xing shi fei chang yan jun 
quan qiu sheng wu an quan xing shi cheng xian ying xiang guo ji hua 
wei hai ji duan hua 
fa zhan fu za hua de te dian 
jin zhi sheng wu wu qi gong yue 
you ling nan xing 
sheng wu wu qi yan fa lv jin bu zhi 
sheng wu zhan de wei xie reng ran cun zai 
bing yuan ti kua wu zhong gan ran 
kua di yu chuan bo 
zao cheng xin fa tu fa chuan ran bing bu duan chu xian 
you zi ran zai hai 
ren wei yin su zao cheng de tu fa gong gong wei sheng shi jian ceng chu bu qiong 
huan jing wu ran 
wai lai wu zhong ru qin deng zao cheng yan zhong sheng tai huan jing po huai 
ji yin zi yuan liu shi xian xiang shi you fa sheng 
zhe xie jun cheng wei shi jie ge guo gong tong mian dui de zhong da sheng wu an quan wen ti 
xin xing sheng wu wei xie te dian ming xian bian hua 
shou guo ji zheng zhi dou zheng chi xu jin xing 
wu qi zhuang bei gao xin ji shu hua 
ren wei gu yi xing dong deng yin su de ying xiang 
xin xing sheng wu wei xie de te dian fa sheng ming xian bian hua 
wei lai sheng wu wei xie zhu yao biao xian xing shi ke neng shi tu fa de ren huo dong 
zhi wu yi qing 
yu zi ran fa sheng de chuan ran bing yi qing huo tu fa gong gong wei sheng shi jian hen nan fen qing 
bing yuan ti ke neng qu yu di zhi si 
nan zhui su de te xing 
shi shi shou duan ke neng shi he cheng he shi fang xin bing yuan ti zhi zao ke yi yi qing deng 
wei hai fan wei bu jin zhi xiang sheng ming jian kang 
er qie zhong zai wei xie she hui he zheng fu 
yi da cheng zheng zhi 
jun shi mu di 
wo guo sheng wu an quan wei xie zhong lei zeng duo 
wo guo zuo wei dang jin shi jie kuai su fa zhan de xin xing jing ji ti 
chu yu shi jie fu za ge ju de zhong xin 
da guo bo yi de xuan wo 
mian lin duo zhong sheng wu wei xie 
yi xie guo jia huo zu zhi li yong bing yuan ti shi shi sheng wu wei xie de feng xian bu duan zeng jia 
cheng wei guo jia an quan mian lin de zhong da tiao zhan 
zhong da xin fa tu fa chuan ran bing yi qing 
shi yuan xing ji bing 
dong wu yi bing zeng jia deng wen ti 
yan zhong wei hai ren min jian kang 
ji yin zu xue 
he cheng sheng wu ji shu ying yong 
yi ji sheng wu shi yan shi xie lou shi gu 
cun zai zhe qian zai feng xian 
wai lai wu zhong ru qin zao cheng wu zhong mie jue su du jia kuai 
yi chuan duo yang xing sang shi 
sheng tai huan jing po huai qu shi bu duan jia ju 
ren min ri bao 
wo guo ji hu suo you sheng tai xi tong jun zao ru qin 
qi zhong da mian ji fa sheng 
sheng wu an quan di wei zhong yao 
wo guo sheng wu wei xie fang yu neng li ji xu jia qiang 
wo guo xu yao qiang hua 
sheng wu guo fang 
jie jian guo ji xian jin de sheng wu an quan guan li jing yan 
jin kuai mi bu sheng wu wei xie fang yu neng li de bu zu 
sheng wu an quan shi guo jia he xin li yi de zhong yao bao zheng 
yi ge guo jia ru guo chu xian sheng wu an quan wen ti 
jiang hui yan zhong ying xiang dao min zhong jian kang 
jing ji yun xing 
she hui zhi xu 
guo jia an quan he zheng ju wen ding 
dui jing ji zao cheng de sun shi wu fa gu ji 
di yi ci shi jie da zhan ceng yin chuan ran bing bao fa liu xing 
dui jiao zhan shuang fang de zhan zheng sheng fu chan sheng le zhong yao ying xiang 
zuo hao sheng wu wei xie fang yu gong zuo 
she ji guo jia an quan deng he xin li yi 
bi xu jia qiang 
sheng wu an quan shi guo jia zhan lve mu biao di zhong yao zhi zhu 
xu duo guo jia ba sheng wu an quan na ru guo jia an quan zhan lve 
jian li yi jun dui xiang guan ji gou wei zhu de sheng wu fang yu ti xi 
bing cong guo fang he jun shi jiao du ji ji qiang zhan zhan lve zhi gao dian 
mei guo xian hou zhi ding ban bu le sheng wu dun pai ji hua 
sheng wu jian ce ji hua he sheng wu chuan gan ji hua 
bing wei rao zhe san ge ji hua bu shu le yi xi lie ming xian ju you guo fang he jun shi yi tu de xiang mu ren wu 
zai sheng wu fan kong he yi qing chu zhi zhong fa hui zhong yao zuo yong 
de guo jiang chuan ran bing ding xing wei guo jia an quan wei xie 
ao da li ya deng guo ye fen bie ba an quan 
guo fang deng bu men na ru gong gong wei sheng ti xi 
zhe xie zu yi zheng ming sheng wu an quan zai guo jia zhan lve bu shu zhong de zhong yao di wei 
wo guo sheng wu wei xie fang yu neng li jian she ji xu jia qiang 
wo men dang he zheng fu mi qie guan zhu sheng wu an quan wen ti 
ti chu yao jia kuai fa zhan sheng wu an quan ji shu 
gou jian xian jin guo jia an quan he gong gong an quan ti xi 
you xiao fang fan dui ren min sheng huo he sheng tai huan jing de sheng wu wei xie 
wo guo zhu bu jian li le bing yuan wei sheng wu sheng wu an quan guo jia zhong dian shi yan shi 
guo jia sheng wu fang hu zhuang bei gong cheng ji shu yan jiu zhong xin deng ke ji zhi cheng ping tai 
bing ba jun dui ji bing yu fang kong zhi ji gou na ru guo jia gong gong wei sheng ti xi jian she 
yi jing gou jian le chu bu de sheng wu wei xie fang yu ti xi 
zai fei dian xing fei yan 
yu fa da guo jia xian jin de sheng wu an quan guan li jing yan xiang bi 
wo guo zai sheng wu wei xie jian ce yu jing 
ying ji chu zhi he ke ji zhi cheng deng fang mian reng ran cun zai bu shao bo ruo huan jie 
ji xu cong zhan lve gui hua yan jiu 
zu zhi guan li ti zhi 
ke xue ji shu yan jiu 
xuan chuan jiao yu pei xun deng fang mian jia qiang jian she 
sheng wu an quan she ji mian guang 
ji xu gou jian xin xing sheng wu wei xie fang yu ti xi 
wo guo sheng wu an quan she ji bu men jiao duo 
ji xu yi shen hua gai ge wei qi ji 
qiang hua guo jia yi zhi 
zhi ding zhan lve gui hua 
gou jian tong yi zhi hui 
bu men xie tong 
quan min can yu de xin xing sheng wu wei xie fang yu ti xi 
jian li quan wei gao xiao de sheng wu wei xie fang yu zu zhi guan li ti xi 
da tong tiao kuai fen ge de sheng wu an quan guan li ge ju 
zai ge ji zheng fu jian li quan wei de sheng wu an quan guan li ji gou 
shi shi tong yi ling dao 
xie tiao he zhi hui 
qiang hua jun dui zai guo jia sheng wu wei xie fang yu zhong de te shu di wei he zhong yao zuo yong 
fa hui jun dui gao du ji zhong tong yi 
ke ji shi li jiao qiang 
ying ji fan ying jiao kuai de ming xian you shi 
yi jun dui xiang guan zhuan ye li liang wei zhu ti 
gou jian ping zhan yi ti xian jie 
yi ji duo bu men lian he chu zhi de fen gong xie tiao ji zhi 
tong shi jia qiang xiang ying de fa gui zhi du jian she 
you shi hu bu 
gou jian sheng wu wei xie fang yu ke ji zhi cheng ti xi 
zai mo qing wo guo sheng wu wei xie fang yu neng li ti xi jian she xian zhuang de ji chu shang jin xing bu que pei tao 
ti gao zheng ti shui ping 
zhen dui quan qiu sheng wu an quan xing shi yi ji wo guo wei lai ke neng mian lin de sheng wu wei xie 
xi tong lun zheng sheng wu wei xie fang yu de ke ji xu qiu 
qian zhan bu shu guo jia he jun dui sheng wu wei xie fang yu zhong da ke ji zhuan xiang 
zhong dian zai jian ce yu jing 
ying ji chu zhi 
ji chu yan jiu deng fang mian jia da ke ji zhi cheng li du 
zai sheng wu liang yong pin an quan guan kong fang mian jia qiang dui ce yan jiu 
jian li duo yuan fen ceng de sheng wu wei xie fang yu jiao yu pei xun ti xi 
ba sheng wu an quan zhi shi na ru guo fang jiao yu ti xi 
jian li yi jun shi yi xue ke yan he jun dui ji bing yu fang kong zhi ji gou wei gu gan 
yi guo jia xiang ying ji gou wei yi tuo de jiao yu pei xun ti xi 
tong guo duo zhong xing shi 
kai zhan sheng wu an quan xuan chuan jiao yu 
shi ge ji zheng fu 
she hui ge jie chong fen ren shi sheng wu an quan de zhong yao xing 
jun dui yao shi zhong fa hui hao 
shi ke zhui zong quan qiu de sheng wu an quan dong tai 
zhong dian cong fan sheng wu zhan 
fan sheng wu kong bu de jiao du 
shen ru yan pan wo guo mian lin de 
bu duan bian hua de sheng wu wei xie 
jian jue han wei guo jia de 
sheng wu jiang yu 
jun shi yi xue ke xue yuan yuan zhang 
zhong guo ke xue yuan yuan shi 
jun shi yi xue ke xue yuan zheng wei 
guo wu yuan gang ao ban fa yan ren jiu xiang gang jing fang ju bu shan chuang zhu gang bu dui ying qu zhe yi shi da xin hua she ji zhe wen 
xiang gang ren you xian 
zu zhi cheng yuan shan chuang zhu gang bu dui ying qu bing bei xiang gang te bie xing zheng qu jing fang ju bu yi shi hui da le xin hua she ji zhe ti wen 
gai fa yan ren biao shi 
dui xiang gang ge bie ren dao zhu gang bu dui ying qu men wai jin xing zi rao 
bing shan zi chuang ru zhong huan jun ying de xing wei 
zhong yang zheng fu yan zhong guan zhu 
zhu gang bu dui gen ju 
zhong hua ren min gong he guo xiang gang te bie xing zheng qu ji ben fa 
zhong hua ren min gong he guo xiang gang te bie xing zheng qu zhu jun fa 
zai gang lv xing fang wu zhi ze 
zhe shi guo jia zhu quan de xiang zheng 
bao kuo zhong huan jun ying zai nei de suo you zhu jun ying qu shou dao fa lv bao hu 
bu ke qin fan 
ge bie ren wu shi fa lv gui ding 
shan chuang zhu jun ying qu 
li ying shou dao fa lv cheng chu 
yan shen yue du 
xiang gang liang nan zi shan chuang jie fang jun zhu gang bu dui zong bu bei jing fang ju bu 
jing sou ji you guan zheng ju ji diao cha hou 
xiang gang jing fang biao shi 
ta men de xing wei chu fan 
gong an tiao li 
zai wu xu ke zheng qing kuang xia jin ru xiang gang zhu jun jin qu 
liang ming bei bu nan zi xian zheng bei kou liu diao cha 
shu ming xiang gang shi min wei jing jie fang jun zhu gang bu dui pi zhun 
bing bu gu jun ying ying men shao bing de jing gao 
qiang xing chuang ru zhong huan jun ying jin xing zi rao 
ru guo ni men shi 
dan du fu qi 
na me gong xi 
ni men ke yi sheng liang ge hai zi le 
ru guo ni shi xiao wei qi ye zhu 
mian shui zheng ce huo xu neng rang ni shou yi 
ru guo ni shi zu qiu mi 
na me ba xi shi jie bei yi ding bu rong cuo guo 
zhe xie shi jiang rang qian qian wan wan ge jia ting 
dan du liang hai zheng ce 
qi dong shi shi yi fang shi du sheng zi nv de fu fu ke sheng yu liang ge hai zi de zheng ce 
zhong gong zhong yang guan yu quan mian shen hua gai ge ruo gan zhong da wen ti de jue ding 
zhong ti chu qi dong shi shi 
dan du liang hai zheng ce 
zhe shi wo guo ren kou zheng ce shi ying jing ji she hui fa zhan xing shi zuo chu de you yi zhong da diao zheng 
an zhao zhong yang bu shu 
dan du liang hai zheng ce 
shi shi bu zhou wei 
ge sheng qu shi zheng fu zai quan mian ping gu dang di ren kou xing shi 
ji hua sheng yu gong zuo ji chu ji zheng ce shi shi feng xian di qing kuang xia 
dan du liang hai zheng ce 
shi shi fang an 
bao guo wu yuan zhu guan bu men bei an 
you sheng ji ren da huo qi chang wei hui xiu ding di fang fa gui huo zuo chu gui ding 
yi fa zu zhi shi shi 
dan du liang hai zheng ce 
you li yu sheng yu zheng ce wan shan he ren kou jun heng fa zhan 
yuan yi sheng yu liang ge hai zi de bu shao 
you xie shi ren wei 
yang er fang lao 
duo zi duo fu 
you xie ze shi xi wang 
hai zi you ge ban 
hai zi gei sheng huo dai lai le qu 
sui ran you xie fu he zheng ce zhe zan wu sheng yu yi yuan 
dan zhe xiang zheng ce reng ran shi ge hao xiao xi 
zhi shao you le xuan ze de ji hui 
mei zhun jiang lai gai bian zhu yi ne 
zan mian zheng shou zeng zhi shui he ying ye shui 
ju cai zheng bu xiao xi 
zhi jie guan xi ji qian wan ren de jiu ye he shou ru 
chu tai shui shou you hui zheng ce 
jiang gai shan xiao wei qi ye de fa zhan huan jing 
shi fang xiao wei qi ye de jiu ye qian li 
sui ran kan shi jian shui gui mo bu shi hen da 
dan zheng ce fu she mian fei chang guang 
zhe xiang zheng ce hai jiang jiang di chuang ye de men kan 
wei you yi chuang ye de ren ti gong ming que de yu qi 
yi chuang ye dai dong jiu ye 
yi jiu ye zeng jia shou ru 
xiao wei qi ye huo li jiang jin yi bu shi fang 
shi pin tian jia ji biao zhi tong ze 
dui shi pin tian jia ji de biao qian 
shuo ming shu he bao zhuang deng nei rong jin xing le gui fan 
shi pin yong xiang liao tong ze 
shi pin tian jia ji biao zhi tong ze 
she jian shang de zhong guo 
ling ren jiao ao 
she jian shang de an quan 
ling ren dan you 
chang qi yi lai 
shi pin an quan wen ti shi zhong shi ren men guan zhu de zhong dian zhi yi 
min yi shi wei tian 
shi yi an wei xian 
dan yuan xin shi pin an quan guo jia biao zhun de shi shi 
neng gou bao zhang 
she jian shang de an quan 
yi di gao kao 
jiang da mian ji shi shi 
yi di gao kao yuan nian 
xu duo sheng fen gong bu yi di gao kao de shi shi fang an 
bing kai shi po bing shi shui 
yuan yuan di yu yu qi 
bi li bu dao yi cheng 
yi di gao kao jiang da mian ji shi shi 
ge sheng zhi ding le you tiao jian fang kai wai lai wu gong ren yuan sui qian zi nv can jia gao kao de zheng ce 
huo jiang gei geng duo xue sheng dai lai fang bian 
gao kao guan hu jiao yu gong ping 
li lai wei she hui gao du guan zhu 
jie jue jin cheng wu gong ren yuan sui qian zi nv gao kao wen ti de hu sheng qiang lie 
yi di gao kao de po bing shun ying le zhe zhong hu sheng 
jin guan xu duo di qu zheng ce jiao wei kai fang 
dan zai bei shang guang deng sui qian zi nv ji zhong de zhong dian liu ru de 
yi di gao kao men kan bi jiao gao 
mao dun reng ran tu chu 
qi dai yi di gao kao zheng ce zhen zheng gei sui qian zi nv dai lai bian li he gong ping 
jiang zai ming nian he shi de shi hou ze ji shi shi 
fei ji che diao lun dang hou 
ji ke qi dong fa dong ji er hua xing 
ye nei zhuan jia shuo 
yu yuan lai guan cang men ji wei hang ban zheng dian de tong ji biao zhun xiang bi 
xin biao zhun yi wei zhe min hang ge lian tiao quan bu zuo hao le hang ban qi fei de zhun bei 
hang ban zheng dian de xin biao zhun shi yi ge jin bu 
jing chang cheng zuo fei ji chu xing de lv ke 
huo xu you guo guan bi cang men hou 
zhang shi jian zuo zai fei ji shang ku deng qi fei 
shen zhi ku deng shu xiao shi hou bei gan xia fei ji de zao yu 
xin biao zhun shi shi hou 
zhe ge xian xiang you wang bu zai chu xian 
ti gao hang ban zheng dian lv jin kao xin biao zhun xian ran bu gou 
hai xu duo fang gong tong nu li 
ru guo ni shi ti yu mi 
zhe shi yi ge ti yu da sai nian 
qi zhong guan zhu du zui gao de sai shi wu yi shi suo qi dong ao hui he ba xi shi jie bei 
shi jie bei zu qiu sai jiang zai ba xi shang yan 
si nian yi du de sheng hui jiang xi yin quan shi jie de mu guang 
bing xue he ji qing jiao xiang hui ying xia 
ti tan jiang dan sheng zen yang de jing dian 
shang jie dong ao hui 
zhong guo dai biao tuan qu de le li shi zui hao cheng ji 
zhe ci neng fou xu xie hui huang 
zuo wei shi jie di yi yun dong de zui gao shui ping jing ji 
jin nian shi jie bei shei jiang wen ding 
zhe yi qie dou ling ren zai qi dai zhong jin xiang huan le 
tu wei shen jian hua wei xie dai da jian xing li de lv ke jie shao cheng che zhu yi shi xiang 
tu wei shen jian hua zai che xiang nei yu zhong dian lv ke jiao dan 
ji zhe ning yuan 
gong zuo qing song 
biao mian feng guang 
si hu hen you fan er 
dan nei hang ren dou zhi dao 
zhe ge gang wei fei chang lei ren 
qie hao shen fei li 
bu jin yao zhua hao guan li 
dai hao dui wu 
wei lv ke ti gong you zhi fu wu 
ke wei ze ren zhong 
mei you jing zhan de ji neng he chao qiang de yi li shi nan yi sheng ren de 
dai zhe dui zhe ge gang wei de hao qi 
dai dui wu de 
hang jia li shou 
shen jian hua diao ren di wu bao cheng zu lie che zhang jian dang zhi bu shu ji 
bao dao yi shi 
shen jian hua xin li hen fan chou 
yuan yin shi zhe xie zhi gong ke yun ye wu sheng shu 
mei you cheng wu gong zuo jing yan 
si xiang ye bu wen ding 
san tian liang tou zhao che dui ling dao 
yao qiu hui yuan dan wei shang ban 
shen jian hua gai bian le ce lve 
dui che ban zhi gong qing kuang jin xing le fen xi mo di 
ta yong le yi ge yue de shi jian 
zhu yi yu xin zhi gong jin xing tan xin 
jian jian zhang wo le xin zhi gong ji ben qing kuang 
zai yu xin zhi gong de jiao liu zhong 
shen jian hua shen zhi 
cheng xin lie che 
he xie zhi lv 
gong zuo mu biao 
bu duan su zao liang hao de fu wu xing xiang 
bi xu jian chi yi ren wei ben 
wei le ti gao xin zhi gong ye wu 
ta dai ling che ban you xiu dang tuan yuan 
ye wu gu gan yu xin zhi gong kai zhan yi dui yi 
cong li lun ji chu pei xun 
zuo ye biao zhun 
an quan zhi shi dao lu feng guan li zhi du 
ke yun fu wu ji qiao deng 
yi dian yi di chuan shou ye wu zhi shi 
jin yong le yi ge ban yue de shi jian 
xin zhi gong dui che men guan li 
lie che ying ji chu zhi deng you le shu lian de zhang wo 
shen jian hua chang shuo 
liang hao de fu wu huan jing 
yao yong zhen cheng de tai du qu gou tong lv ke 
yong you zhi di fu wu qu da dong lv ke 
wei le rang xin zhi gong jin zao shi ying xin gang wei 
shen jian hua jiang zi ji duo nian mo suo chu le yi tao 
wei xiao fu wu 
wen ming fu wu 
yan shen fu wu 
xi jie fu wu 
tie lu zhi gong qin qie de wei xiao 
wen ming de yong yu 
zhu dong wen hou sheng 
guan zhu mei ge xi jie de gong zuo tai du he gong zuo fang shi 
dou neng rang ni bei gan wen xin he shu shi 
zai shen jian hua de nu li xia 
can che she zhi le 
wei jing chang cheng zuo ben ci lie che de lv ke shi xing 
san mian fei yi da zhe 
che xiang she li le 
mu ying bu ru shi 
zhi leng nuan de 
shen jian hua dui zhi gong de guan ai 
ren ren jie zhi 
zhe yuan yu ta dui tie lu de re ai 
dui che ban de tong shi di qing yi 
tie lu gan le ji shi nian 
yu dao zhe yang de shi hai shi di yi ci 
zai wo sheng bing ya tong nan shou de shi hou 
shi ta gei wo mai de yao 
shi ta wei wo da zhen shu ye zhi 
shen che wu wei bu zhi de guan huai he qin qie de xiao lian wo yong yuan bu hui wang ji 
tan qi shen jian hua de hao 
lie che yuan mi deng hua bu you de shu qi le mu zhi 
mian dui cheng wu can 
mei fa xia yan 
shen jian hua de zhi qing kuang hou 
lian mang gan dao guang bo shi xun zhao zhi liao ya tong de yao pin 
ke shi yao xiang li bing mei you ta xiang yao de na zhong yao 
fan hui can che de tu zhong 
shen che zhang yong dian hua yu luo yang zhan ke yun zhi ban yuan qu de lian xi 
qing qiu bang zhu gou mai zhi liao ya tong de yao pin 
che dao luo yang zhan 
lao mi fu yao hou 
ya yi jiu fei chang teng tong 
ping jie zi ji zao nian zai heng yang zhong xin yi yuan zuo guo san nian hu shi de jing yan 
shen jian hua ren wei bi xu zhu she jia xiao zuo xiao yan cai xing 
ta fa dong lie che yuan zhao che xiang li tie lu tong qin de zhi gong 
wen wen ta men neng bu neng bang mang gou mai ji ping yao ye 
zhao dao le yi wei bian cheng zhi gong 
zai zhe wei zhi gong de re xin bang zhu xia 
shen jian hua ba mi deng hua jiao dao can che 
qin zi wei ta zuo pi shi 
zhu she yao ye 
shen jian hua de zhang fu 
can che chu shi fu ming hua zhu dong wei mi deng hua ao zhi zhou fan 
xiang lin che xiang de tong shi zhi dao lao mi shen ti bu shu fu 
bang zhu da sao che xiang wei sheng 
qing li la ji 
lao mi kan zai yan li 
xin li nuan nuan de 
jing guo liang ge duo xiao shi de shu ye 
ta de ya tong you suo hao zhuan 
che dao yue yang zhan 
xin zhong chong man gan ji de lao mi 
da xiao le yuan ben zhun bei xia che hui jia kan bing zhi liao de nian tou 
ji xu jian chi gong zuo 
you zhen qing de lv ke 
zuo hao yi shi yi 
zuo hao yi shi nan 
zai fu wu lv ke zhong 
shen jian hua yu tong shi men shi zhong jian chi zhe zhe ge li nian 
bing bu duan gai shan zi ji de fu wu fang shi 
yong dai lv ke ru qin ren de tai du ba mei yi jian xi xiao de shi qing zuo hao 
gan xie ni men bang wo song hui le dian nao 
li mian de hen duo zi liao dou fei chang zhong yao 
ru guo bu shi ni men wo zhen bu zhi dao gai zen me ban cai hao 
shen jian hua wei xiao zhe shuo 
mei you shen me 
zhe shi wo men ying gai zuo de 
yi wei ming jiao liu hong fa de lv ke cong shen jian hua shou zhong jie guo shi er fu de de bi ji ben dian nao 
jiang sui xing de bi ji ben yi wang zai lie che shang 
you gai che xiang cheng wu yuan shi de 
bing gao zhi shen jian hua 
tong guo dian nao bao nei de dian hua lian luo fang shi 
shen jian hua shun li he shi zhu qu de lian xi 
bing fan cheng dao da chang sha che zhan shi 
jiang dian nao gui ji shi gui huan 
xiang wei lv ke song hai yi shi wu pin 
huo shi jie jue lv ke kun nan de shi 
che ban ji hu tian tian fa sheng 
shuo qi wei lv ke zuo hao shi 
shen jian hua xian de hen zi hao 
bei lv ke po fan cai yi jiu wei xiao 
lie che you zhong dian 
fu wu wu zhi jing 
zai yu dao ji nan xian zhong ren wu shi 
shen jian hua tong yang neng ba lie che he lv ke an quan bai zai di yi wei 
yong xing dong quan shi zhe yi ming gong chan dang yuan de cheng nuo 
he xi nan ji feng ying xiang 
guang dong pu jiang da dao bao yu 
zai zhan mao xian shang zou zou ting ting 
wan dian shi duo ge xiao shi 
fen xi qing kuang hou 
fu dui zhang huang ke ke tong shen jian hua ji shi zu zhi che ban gu gan zhao kai bu zhi hui 
jing guo yan jiu 
jue ding yong kou tou xuan chuan he guang bo xuan chuan xiang jie he de fang shi lai wen ding lv ke qing xu 
shen jian hua yu fu che zhang
