zhi ban yuan deng ren fen tou bao bao che xiang 
jiang lie che wan dian de zhuang kuang 
fu wu de nan du yi ji ji xu wan dian de ke neng xing ji shi tong bao gei lv ke 
bing ba ge che zhan huan cheng qi ta jiao tong gong ju ke xing xing de jie bo fang shi gao zhi lv ke 
qing lv ke ti qian zuo hao xuan ze 
bing dui mei yi wei qian lai zi xun de lv ke 
dou jin xing xiang xi de yin dao jie shi 
zai yu lv ke gou tong de guo cheng zhong 
shen jian hua de yi fu bei lv ke po le fan cai 
ta ca xi gan jing 
ji xu wei xiao zhe xiang lv ke zuo hao xuan chuan jie shi 
zai lie che duan dian 
duan liang di qing kuang xia 
chu shi fu ming hua wei lv ke zhun bei le mian fei de he fan he kuang quan shui 
jin zui da de nu li rang lv ke he cheng wu yuan chi shang yi kou re fan 
lie che gong zuo ren yuan de zhen qing shi yi da dong le lv ke de xin 
bu fen lv ke zai liao jie qing kuang hou 
jue ding cai na lie che ti chu de jian yi 
tong xun yuan ceng bo 
hai nan sheng gong lu tiao li 
jin qi shi xing 
gong lu jian she shi gong jin liang bu rao min 
gong shi shi gong shi jian he gong qi xian shi fen duan shi gong 
gong lu wei xiu he gai jian yao gong shi shi gong shi jian he gong qi 
xian shi fen duan shi gong 
jin liang bi mian rao min 
hai nan sheng gong lu tiao li 
yi xia jian cheng 
dui jia qiang gong lu jian she yu yang hu 
lu zheng guan li deng jun zuo le ming que gui ding 
yi min wei ben 
yi da liang dian 
zhe shi ji zhe jin tian cong sheng jiao tong yun shu ting huo xi de 
shi wo sheng di yi bu zhuan men dui gong lu jin hang gui fan de di fang xing fa gui 
tian bu le wo sheng gong lu li fa de kong que 
tong guo li fa 
mu di shi gui fan liang hao de gong lu jian she zhi xu 
yi fa bao zhang gong lu de wan hao 
an quan he chang tong 
wei gong zhong ti gong geng jia bian jie 
gao xiao de gong gong fu wu 
sheng jiao tong yun shu ting fu ting zhang zhou wen xiong shuo 
dui ru he jia qiang gong lu gui hua yu jian she 
gong lu yang hu 
lu zheng guan li deng jun zuo le ming que gui ding 
tu xian le zhu duo liang dian 
jie he wo sheng lv hua bao dao xing dong 
ti chu jia kuai tui jin lv se gong lu yu lv you gong lu jian she 
gu li dan wei he ge ren tou zi gong lu lv hua 
ming que ti chu 
gong lu lv hua ying tu chu dang di zhi wu sheng tai yu jing guan te se 
jian cheng duo shu zhong 
duo xiao yi de ju you ben sheng di yu te se de lv se chang lang ; tong shi 
hai hua ding gong lu jian zhu kong zhi qu de fan wei 
ren he dan wei he ge ren bu de zai kong zhi qu nei xiu jian jian zhu wu he di mian gou zhu wu ; 
hai jin yi bu li shun le wo sheng xian dao guan yang ti zhi 
ming que xian dao ying you shi 
xian gong lu guan li ji gou fu ze guan yang 
zhi de yi ti de shi 
gong lu jian she yu yang hu zuo ye yao yi min wei ben 
gong lu yang hu zuo ye ying yan ge kong zhi feng bi gong lu shi gong 
que xu feng bi gong lu de 
chu jin ji qing kuang wai 
shi gong shi jian 
rao xing lu xian deng xin xi 
bing zai shi gong lu duan qian fang ji rao xing chu she zhi gong gao pai ; bu neng rao xing de 
ying xiu jian lin shi dao lu 
gong lu yang hu dan wei ying zai gui ding de qi xian nei wan cheng shi gong 
bu de wu gu tuo yan ; wei zai gui ding de qi xian nei wan cheng shi gong de 
yi zhao yang hu shi gong he tong de yue ding zhui jiu wei yue ze ren 
hai nan xin wen tui jian 
hai nan sheng ji wei gong bu wei fan zhong yang ba xiang gui ding wen ti ju bao fang shi 
san sha cheng li zhao biao cai gou zhong xin gui fan zheng fu cai gou xing wei 
hai kou cheng guan yin da can ji ren bei wei gong ? hui ying cheng you ren ce hua 
guo ji dang dai yi shu zhan hua yu qing nian jiang jie xiao hai nan yi shu jia huo jiang 
huang gui ti xuan jiang ge ren shi ji 
zi liao tu pian 
hai nan ying shi lan tian bai yun 
kong qi qing xin 
hai shui qing che de hai dao 
ying shi ye tian e 
song shu deng ye sheng dong wu de tian tang 
wei ba hai nan jian she cheng meng xiang zhong de shi wai tao yuan 
wo men mei yi ge ren dou you yi wu guan hao zi ji de zui ba 
bu chi ye sheng bao hu dong wu 
ren da dai biao huang gui ti jian yi 
gong wu yuan ying dai tou jin chi ye sheng bao hu dong wu 
zuo yi ge wen ming shou fa de ren 
hai nan sheng zong gong hui lao dong mo fan he dao de mo fan shi ji di san chang bao gao hui ri qian zai sheng ren da hui tang ju xing 
sheng ren da chang wei hui fu zhu ren 
sheng zong gong hui zhu xi chen hai bo chu xi bao gao hui 
zhe yi ci xuan jiang huo dong shi wei le hong yang she hui zhu yi he xin jia zhi 
xiang sheng zhi ji guan gan bu chuan da 
zun zhong lao dong 
zun zhong zhi shi 
zun zhong ren cai 
zun zhong chuang zao 
de jia zhi guan 
hong yang zheng qi 
chuan di zheng neng liang 
lai zi xing zhi ji guan 
ling ting mo fan men jiang shu zai ping fan gang wei shang shi xian zi wo jia zhi de gan ren shi ji 
jue bu rang yi ge hai zi diao dui 
zai sheng ren da dai biao 
dao de mo fan huang gui ti de shou ji li 
yi zhi bao cun zhe nan hai wang de yi ge ye mian 
shang yi tiao shi 
hai nan sheng dao de mo fan chen qi xian bing shi 
xia yi tiao shi 
huang gui ti bei ping wei hai nan sheng dao de mo fan 
liang tiao xin wen cheng qian qi hou 
huang gui ti li jie wei zhe shi yi fen chen dian dian de ze ren 
ta ren wei chen qi xian lao shi yi sheng qing pin 
gei le xu yao bang zhu de pin kun hai zi 
chen qi xian lao shi huo de hen zhen shi 
ta cheng dan qi le yi ge zhong guo ren ying you de dan dang 
er huang gui ti zheng zai cheng dan qi zhe fen dan dang 
huang gui ti ren wei chen qi xian lao shi de zhong zhong zuo fa 
jiu shi xi wang mei yi ge hai zi dou shou dao liang hao jiao yu 
xi wang zhong guo jin kuai cong fa zhan zhong guo jia kua ru fa da guo jia de hang lie 
cheng wei shi jie qiang guo 
guang wei ren zhi de shi 
cong xiao xue sheng dao da xue sheng 
you san qian duo ren jie shou guo ta de zhi jie bang zhu 
na pa zai ta shi ye zui kun nan de shi hou 
ta ye hui na chu yi bu fen qian zhi chi pin kun de da xue sheng yuan meng 
zai chu qian chu li bang zhu pin kun xue sheng ji xu du shu de shi hou 
pin kun hai zi bu neng xuan ze zi ji de chu sheng de 
tong guo jie shou jiao yu 
tong guo ta men zi ji de nu li 
ta men ke yi gai bian wei lai de ming yun 
huang gui ti zai bao gao hui shang de hua yin qi chi xu bu duan de zhang sheng 
zhi ming ping lun yuan shi gong xie dao 
chen qi xian lao ren zou le 
huang gui ti he ta de huo ban men lai le 
cong yi ge ren dao yi qun ren 
cong nian lao ren dao nian qing ren 
hai nan sheng dao de mo fan zheng zai fa hui mei ge ren de shi fan zuo yong 
xiang ta men na yang dui dai sheng huo 
xiang ta men na yang hui bao she hui 
zhi yao ren ren dou xian chu yi dian ai 
zhe ge she hui jiu hui bian de geng jia mei hao qi lai 
yao rang niao er zai hai nan zi you fei xiang 
ting wan ying ge ling tuan dui dai biao liu lei suo zuo de bao gao 
huang gui ti shuo 
ying ge ling shi xing yun de 
xi wang hai nan suo you de bao hu qu dou neng gou de dao zui hao de bao hu 
wo xi wang hai ou zai hai nan de hai bian neng gou zi you de fei xiang 
wo xi wang kan dao hai nan cheng wei ye tian e 
bai mian ji de tian tang 
wo xi wang hai nan de hai shui 
he shui geng qing che 
wo xi wang qing shan lv shui 
kong qi qing xin yong yuan shi hai nan de te se 
wei ba hai nan jian she cheng meng xiang zhong de shi wai tao yuan 
wo men mei yi ge ren dou you yi wu guan hao zi ji de zui ba 
bu chi ye sheng bao hu dong wu 
ren da dai biao huang gui ti jian yi 
gong wu yuan ying dai tou jin chi ye sheng bao hu dong wu 
zuo yi ge wen ming shou fa de ren 
sheng zheng fu ying li gui yan cheng chi ye sheng bao hu dong wu de gong wu yuan 
yi jing fa xian yi lv mian zhi 
huang gui ti zai cheng mai xian zhong xing zhen yong you yi ge nong chang 
mi lin shen chu de shui tang shang 
you cheng qun de ye ya he lu niao 
shan shang hai you song shu 
shan zhu he ye ji 
wei shou hu zhe pian shan lin 
ta zhuan men zhao ji cun min zu jian le hu lin hu niao dui 
zai fu jin cun zhuang xuan chuan huan bao li nian 
zhe me hao de sheng tai huan jing 
zen me neng po huai diao ne 
wo de chu zhong shi 
bu yao ba niao da guang chi guang 
yao rang niao er zi you fei xiang 
hai nan chang dao lv se jue qi 
wo ren wei da jia dou gai wei bao hu sheng tai jin dian li 
zuo yi ge wen ming de xian dai ren 
huang gui ti shuo 
jue bu rang yi ge hai zi diao dui 
huang gui ti zu zhi le pu fa zhi yuan zhe dao quan sheng zou jie chuan hu pu fa 
he ling suo you de shi bao zhe fang xia quan tou 
du jue bao li 
rang geng duo de fu nv er tong mian shou shang hai 
hu yu zhi fa ji guan bu neng nve dai ou da 
xing xun bi gong zai ya ren yuan 
bing zai zhong qiu jie gei quan sheng shu wan ming fu xing ren yuan 
fan zui xian yi ren 
jie du xue yuan song shang ai xin yue bing 
pu fa bao zhi 
rang ta men gan shou dao she hui de wen nuan 
ta de yi xi lie shan ju 
zai she hui shang yin qi qiang lie fan xiang 
shou dao pu bian zan yu 
da lao po shi jia wu shi 
er zhong guo xiang you qing guan nan duan jia wu shi de shuo fa 
chang qi yi lai 
ren men dou yi wei zhi zhi jia ting bao li 
nan dian zai min jian 
yi huang gui ti wei shou de zhi yuan zhe men 
wan ru xiang feng che zuo zhan de tang ji he de 
ta men zou cun chuan hu 
fan bao li pu jiu xiang zhen xing 
hu yu bao hu fu nv er tong 
gong an ji guan ying yan cheng jia bao zhe 
shei cai neng gou rang jia bao zhe fang xia quan tou 
wei you gong an de shou kao 
fa lv de zhi cai 
ge ji gong an ji guan ying fu qi ze ren 
bu yao ba zi ji ying fu qi de ze ren tui gei fu lian 
ge ji jian cha yuan ying jia da dui gong an xing zheng bu zuo wei de jian du li du 
wo zuo zhe xie shi 
jiu shi yao rang fu xing ren yuan gan jue dao wen nuan yu gong zheng 
wo jing chang gen ta men jiang 
zhong guo meng bu shi yi ge ren wan cheng de 
ni men ye you meng 
she hui mei you wang ji ni men 
ni men zou chu zhe ge jian yu da men de shi hou ye shi hao han yi tiao 
ni men ye neng chuan di zheng neng liang 
duan lian hao shen ti 
xue xi bing zun shou fa lv 
zai bao gao hui shang 
huang gui ti zhe duan hua zai ci ying de lei ming ban de zhang sheng 
huang gui ti ji de 
zai gen fu xing ren yuan jiao liu de shi hou 
ta rang fu xing ren yuan cheng nuo 
dang ta men zou chu jian yu da men de shi hou 
kan dao luo shui de hai zi yi ding yao qu jiu 
ta men da sheng hui da 
di er ge cheng nuo shi 
ta men cong ci zai ye bu neng shang hai bie ren 
ta men qi sheng gao hu 
wo men yi ding bu hui zai shang hai bie ren 
zai sheng si fa ting deng dan wei de zhi chi xia 
huang gui ti zou fang le fu xing ren yuan gong zuo de di fang 
xiu xi de di fang 
gen ta men jiao liu 
cheng ta men wei xiong di 
ta jie dao le hao ji bai feng fu xing ren yuan ji lai de xin 
qi zhong you yi wei zai xin kang jian yu de fu xing ren yuan gei ta xie xin shuo 
huang gui ti dai biao 
nin de bo ai gu li wo men ying jie xin sheng 
nin song lai de yue bing 
wo men yao yi kou 
xin jiu tian yi xia 
yi ru ji wang chuan di zheng neng liang 
ju min lou shang de fang dao wang wei shen me chai bu diao ne 
wei shen me ren yao qu zhua ye sheng bao hu dong wu ne 
wei shen me you ren wei yi ji zhi si qu shang hai bie ren ne 
wo jing chang zai xiang 
yao zuo xie shen me cai neng gai bian zhe xie bu he xie de shi wu 
huang gui ti zai bao gao zhong chang tan xin sheng 
wo ben ren jiang yi ru ji wang 
jie jin suo neng bang zhu nei xie xu yao bang zhu de ren 
te bie shi nei xie pin kun de hai zi 
jin tian wo men guan xin ta men 
rang ta men gan shou dao wen nuan 
rang ta men shou dao liang hao de jiao yu 
ming tian wo men zou zai da jie shang hui hen an quan 
ru guo jin tian bu guan xin ta men 
wo xiang ming tian ke neng hui you ren na zhe bi shou lai 
ta re qie hu huan 
jin tian de zhong guo 
xu yao geng duo de ren fa chu guang 
xu yao geng duo de zheng neng liang 
xu yao ren ren jie shou gao deng jiao yu 
xu yao ren ren dong fa 
xu yao bao hu hao wo men de sheng tai huan jing 
jiu xiang wo men guo jia de ling dao ren suo chang dao de yi yang 
yao rang jin tian de zhong guo cheng wei mei li 
ping an de zhong guo 
shi xian zhong guo meng 
yao rang suo you de ren guo shang xing fu 
fu you de ri zi 
zhi ming ping lun yuan shi gong ping lun cheng 
zhe wei zi you shi xue bing mei you du guo hen duo shu de shang ren 
jing guo duo nian de shang hai jin yin 
shen zhi shi yi ge shi ren 
ta xi wang mei yi ge jia ting he mu 
xi wang mei yi ge hai zi dou neng de dao liang hao de jiao yu 
xi wang suo xiao cheng xiang cha bie 
yi ge lian fan ren de quan yi dou neng de dao bao hu de she hui 
ying gai shi wo men zhui qiu de wen ming he xie she hui 
biao mian shang kan 
zhe xie yi ti si hu you dian hu bu da jie 
ke shen jiu que neng fa xian 
huang gui ti de si kao chuang xin 
dou yi zhi zai wei rao he xie zuo wen zhang 
ta shen zhi gan yuan zuo yi ge tang ji ke de shi de dou shi 
yong zi ji de dao de he liang xin 
he luo hou zuo zhan 
he e su zuo zhan 
he yi qie bu he xie de yin su zuo zhan 
shei sheng shei fu bing bu zhong yao 
zhong yao de shi you ren xuan zhan 
you ren can yu 
you ren si kao 
you ren xing dong 
qiong zhong zui pin kun shan cun ta shang zhi fu xin lu 
da cong cun xin cun bai 
qing zhu qiao qian zhi xi nan dao wan bao ji zhe shi zhong hua she 
qiong zhong zui luo hou 
zhu jin zhan xin de xian dai hua bie shu 
qiong zhong diao luo shan rui jin zhong yang zhuan ye he zuo she 
da cong cun ke zhan zheng shi zai da cong xin cun gua pai 
zhe biao zhi zhe zhe ge yuan shi li cun zhong yu gao bie yi qiong er bai de li shi 
zheng shi ta shang yi tiao chong man xi wang de zhi fu xin lu 
gao bie peng wu zhu bie shu 
qing shan jiao xia 
lv shui zhi shang 
wu ding shang gan gong niao zhen chi yu fei 
fang yan xia da li shen xu xu ru sheng 
xin ju nei xian dai hua jia dian yi ying ju quan 
zai xi qing de bian pao sheng zhong 
fu jin shi li ba cun de li zu 
miao zu tong bao shen zhe jie ri de sheng zhuang huan ju zai yi qi 
zhuan cheng gan lai jian zheng 
qing he da cong cun xi qian xin ju zhe yi sheng shi 
kan dao zhe yi qie 
da cong cun cun min li yan wan ru zhi shen meng jing 
zhi dao kan dao zi ji de lao gong huang jia rong zai fang wu zeng song zu lin yi jiao xie yi shang qian zi 
zhi dao zi ji na dao yao shi qin shou da kai xin fang de men 
ta cai xiang xin zhe yi qie shi zhen de 
ru guo ni jian guo ge he xiang wang de da cong jiu cun de mu yang 
ni ye xu hui he ta yi yang nan yi zhi xin 
xing fu lai de tai tu ran 
da cong cun wei yu diao luo shan xiang xiang tu cun wei hui 
cun zhuang yan he er jian 
cun she duo shi zhu mu jie gou de peng wu 
ji hu mei you 
bu tou feng de qiang 
mei feng yu ji lai lin 
fan lan de he shui jiu hui jiang cun zhuang yan mo 
zhu le san dai ren de lao fang zi 
li jing bai nian feng yu 
zao yi po bai bu kan 
da cong cun shan duo tian di shao 
jiao tong bu bian 
cun min de shou ru ji di 
de zhi da cong cun de xian zhuang hou 
wo guo zhu ming xue zhe 
gai ge li lun jia 
ren min ri bao 
yuan fu zong bian ji zhou rui jin xian sheng fei chang zhen han 
bang zhu cun min gai shan sheng huo huan jing 
tuo pin zhi fu 
da cong xin cun xin jian luo cheng 
zhi fu xin lu 
shou ren yi yu 
bu ru shou ren yi yu 
zai yuan jian da cong cun de guo cheng zhong 
zhou rui jin ren wei 
jin gai bian cun min men de ju zhu huan jing shi yuan yuan bu gou de 
tong guo yan jiu fen xi 
zhou rui jin ti chu le yi ge jiang da cong cun cun min gai zao cheng wei xin nong min de 
ji hua ju ti wei 
yi zui kuai de su du gai shan cun min de sheng huo huan jing 
da li fa zhan jing ji 
zao jiu yi ge xin nong cun ; di er bu 
tong guo zou xin de he zuo jing ying dao lu 
tong guo yi duan shi jian de pei yu 
dai cun min de jie dai neng li 
fu wu neng li deng zheng ti ti gao hou 
zai da cong cun fa zhan lv you ye 
ji hua da zhi de si lu da zhi ru xia 
yi shi zu jian tuan dui 
wu ye guan li zu 
jing ying guan li zu 
ba da cong cun jian she cheng fu mei xiang cun 
zu zeng xie yi 
yue shu cun min xing wei 
you xiao yin dao cun min zhuan bian si xiang guan nian he sheng chan sheng huo fang shi ; san shi tong guo 
zheng fu + qi ye + nong cun + nong hu 
de fa zhan mo shi 
yin ru di san chan ye 
dai dong di yi chan ye fa zhan ; si shi yi jia ting cheng bao wei ji chu 
yi he zuo jing ji wei zai ti 
jiang nong min chong xin zu zhi qi lai mou fa zhan 
rang cun min zhan zai yi ge fan zhan de xin qi dian shang 
zhe bi rang ta men zhu shang xin fang zi de yi yi geng da 
zhou rui jin shuo 
tong guo yi shang ji fang mian ju cuo 
jin kuai ti gao cun min de jing ji shou ru 
tong shi zhu bu gai bian cun min de si xiang guan nian 
shi zhi cheng wei ju bei xin guan nian 
zhang wo xin ji neng de xin xing nong min 
ji zhe cong hai nan sheng lv you ke yun guan li fu wu you xian gong si 
yi xia jian cheng 
guan li gong si 
hai nan sheng wu jia ju guan yu lv you qi che tuan dui ke yun jia ge de tong zhi 
ji zhe cong gai gong si 
sui zhe hai nan ji da guo ji ti yu xiu xian sai shi de kai zhan yi ji hui yi tuan 
you lun deng lv you tuan dui de fen zhi ta lai 
wo sheng lv you tuan dui ming xian zeng jia 
wei you xiao huan jie che xing yu tuan xing bu pi pei de jie gou xing xu qiu mao dun 
zhu dong rang li lv xing she 
que bao le lv xing she yong che xu qiu 
ji ben neng bao zhang chun yun qi jian lv xing she yong che xu qiu 
chun yun qi jian 
guan li gong si hai jiang an zhao sheng dao lu yun shu ju yi ji hai kou shi dao lu yun shu guan li chu de tong yi bu shu 
zai chun yun sheng nei ban che ke yun gao feng shi duan 
cai qu lv you che gong si ding xiang bao zhang re dian ban xian de cuo shi 
you xu zu zhi lv you che zhi yuan sheng nei ban xian yun shu 
que bao guang da ren min qun zhong chun jie jia qi tan qin fang you de chu xing xu qiu he an shi fan xiang fan gang 
ji zhe ning yuan 
ren min wang hai nan shi chuang ci qian bao dao le san ya shi zhong ji ren min fa yuan yuan ban gong lou yin guo du zhuang xiu er bian cheng 
ji zhe jin tian cong you guan qu dao zheng shi 
jing guo jin ban nian shi jian de zheng xiu 
gai ban gong lou de gai zao zhuang xiu gong cheng yi jing jie jin shou wei 
tong guo yan shou hou reng gui san ya zhong yuan shi yong 
san ya zhong yuan ji hua jiang qi you nei dao wai zhuang shi yi fan 
yi gai bian ta lve xian 
yin wei she ji ji hua de yi zai bian geng 
zai zhuang xiu shen qing huo de pi zhun 
suo xu de zi jin ye bo fu dao wei hou 
shi gong dan wei kai shi jin chang shi gong 
dan rang ren yi wai de shi 
yin wei jia zhuang le guo zhong de gang jie gou he shi yong le guo duo de zhuang shi cai liao 
zhe zuo da lou de di ji wu fa zai cheng shou chao zhong de fu he 
zui zhong zhi shi da lou zhu ti chu xian le qing xie 
jing zhuan ye ji gou jian ce 
zhe zuo bei lie wei 
ban gong lou bu de bu ting gong 
geng wei rang ren jing ya de shi 
bing ting gong zhi hou 
zhe zuo ban gong lou bian cheng le shei ye bu yuan jie shou he li hui de 
tang shou shan yu 
san ya zhong yuan zhuang xiu ban gong lou wei wan gong yi cheng wei fang 
chu yu ting gong zhuang tai de san ya zhong yuan ban gong lou 
zhong jian bu fen ji shi jia zhuang de gang jie gou 
ci shi jing mei ti bao guang hou 
san ya shi wei 
shi zheng fu zuo chu jue ding 
yi shi qi dong ze ren zhui jiu 
you shi ji wei jian cha ju hui tong hai nan sheng gao yuan ji jian zu zu cheng lian he diao cha zu dui san ya zhong yuan zai ban gong lou gai zao zhuang xiu gong cheng zhong ke neng cun zai de jue ce shi wu 
jian du guan li hun luan deng wen ti jin xing diao cha 
dui fa xian de wen ti jiang zhui jiu ze ren 
dui xiang mu she ji 
jian li deng huan jie cun zai de wen ti ye jiang yi bing qing li zhui jiu 
er shi jia kuai tui jin san ya zhong yuan ban gong lou chu zhi 
jin kuai hui fu he wan cheng gai ban gong lou gai zao zhuang xiu 
gai lou gai zao zhuang xiu wan cheng hou 
zuo wei san ya zhong yuan de ban gong yong fang ji xu shi yong 
san shi zan ting yuan xuan zhi zai feng huang zhen de san ya zhong yuan xin li an shen pan xin fang da lou xiang mu 
dui xiang mu di bi yao xing jin yi bu lun zheng 
ru que xu jian she 
ye yao dui jian she gui mo jin xing bi yao de ya suo 
gen ju guo jia jian zhu gong cheng zhi liang jian du jian cha jian yan zhong xin de jian ding bao gao 
xu chai xie diao zhi qian jia zhuang de guo zhong gang jie gou 
yuan ban gong lou cai neng chong xin zhuang xiu shi yong 
jin nian xia ban nian 
wei le chai xie zhe xie gang jie gou 
chong xin hui fu yuan zhong yuan ban gong lou de di ji he zai 
san ya shi zheng fu you ling wai bo kuan jin xing shi gong 
tong shi zhi ding yi ming fu shi zhang fu ze gai xiang gong zuo 
you re xin wang you ti gong gei ren min wang hai nan shi chuang de tu pian xian shi 
san ya zhong yuan de ban gong lou zheng zai shi yong da xing diao zhuang she bei diao xie ci qian zai zhuang xiu guo cheng zhong wai jia zhuang de guo zhong gang jie gou 
ji zhe jin tian cong re xin wang you liao jie dao 
mu qian san ya zhong yuan yuan ban gong lou gai zao chu zhi gong zuo yi jing jie jin wei sheng 
yuan jia gua de guo zhong gang jie gou deng ying xiang gai lou di ji he zai de wu pin yi jing quan bu chai chu 
zhe yi shuo fa de dao le san ya zhong yuan you guan bu men fu ze ren di zheng shi 
gai fu ze ren cheng 
gen ju mu qian de gong cheng jin du 
dai you guan bu men yan shou tong guo hou 
reng you gai yuan shi yong 
ji zhe tong shi liao jie dao 
san ya shi jie zhi mu qian shang wei gong bu dui san ya zhong yuan zai ban gong lou gai zao zhuang xiu gong cheng zhong ke neng cun zai de jue ce shi wu 
jian du guan li hun luan deng wen ti de diao cha jie guo 
ye wei gong bu dui you guan ze ren ren de chu li jie guo 
hai nan re dian xin wen tui jian 
min sheng shi shi 
san sha shu ji shi zhang xiao jie 
san ya zhong yuan ban gong lou cheng wei lou zhui zong 
zheng xiu ji jiang wan cheng 
san sha xin wen 
yuan dan shou fa xiao jie qian ming song ben wang ji zhe 
ben wang guan zhu 
te kun hu huang shi xuan xin nian jiang yuan dian dong che meng xiang 
a po wei shou nve zhe zuo zheng zao ou pai chu suo wu xia wen 
yuan dan hai nan you zhang dan xie man ying zi you ke le you xin jing dian 
hai nan shi shi xin jiao gui yi nian 
a po na chu ou da zhong bei si lan de yi fu 
jing fang yi zhi dou mei you yin xun 
nan dao wo jiu zhe me bai bai ai da le 
jia zhu cheng mai xian fu shan zhen hong guang nong chang de cun min wang a po gao su ren min wang hai nan shi chuang ji zhe 
you yu ta gei chang qi shou zhang fu nve dai de cai nv shi zuo zheng 
cai nv shi de jia po li xiu ju duo ci dang mian ru ma ta 
guai ta duo guan xian shi 
wang a po shen zhi zao dao li xiu ju he qi zhang fu li yong shen dong shou ou da 
dao zhi ta duo chu yu shang 
xia qu hong guang pai chu suo diao cha reng wu xia wen 
gei ren zuo zheng zao ru ma bao fu bei ou da duo chu yu shang zhu yuan 
yuan lai wo men guan xi hai hao 
dan zi cong wo da ying gei ta de xi fu zuo zheng hou 
jiu jing chang zao dao dui fang bao fu xing ru ma 
wang a po hui yi shuo 
cai nv shi duo nian lai yi zhi zao zhang fu li kai lun nve dai ou da 
ci shi zao mei ti bao guang hou 
ta jiu fei chang guan zhu ci shi 
zi cong wo da ying gei cai nv shi zuo zheng hou 
cai nv shi de jia po li xiu ju he qi jia gong li yong shen jiu huai hen zai xin 
duo ci ru ma wo 
wang a po gao su ji zhe 
li xiu ju mei ci jing guo ta jia men kou 
dou hui dui zhe men kou po kou da ma 
cheng wang a po duo guan xian shi 
shuo jia hua zuo jia zheng 
wo mei xiang dao ta men jing ran hui you ru ma sheng ji dao dong shou da wo 
a po hui yi cheng 
ta tong wang chang yi yang dao jia dui mian de xiao dian qu zuo zhe he peng you xian liao 
dang shi cai nv shi jia gong li yong shen zou guo lai 
liang ren bu gan shi ruo zheng chao hou li yong shen dang ji li kai xian chang 
yi hui jiu pei tong cai nv shi jia po li xiu ju yi tong guo lai 
ta men ma zhe ma zhe 
li xiu ju jiu tu ran dong shou da wo 
li yong shen ye zai hou mian dong shou da wo hou bei 
wang a po shuo 
li xiu ju gen sui li yong shen lai dao xian chang 
jiu da sheng ru ma wang a po 
hai sheng cheng yao xun ji bao fu wang a po 
wang a po ye li sheng hui ying 
li xiu ju qi bu guo tu ran jiu dong shou ou da ta 
ta ye bu gan shi ruo yu li xiu ju xiang hu tui sang 
li yong shen jian zhuang li ji cong pang ou da ta de bei bu 
ou da shi jian guo qu ban ge yue xia qu jing fang diao cha wu jie guo 
shi qing guo qu zhe me jiu 
er xia qu pai chu suo dao xian zai dou mei you dui ci shi zuo chu ren he da fu 
zhi shao ying gai rang liang jia zuo xia lai tiao jie jiang qing chu 
wang a po shuo 
wang a po gao shuo 
bing hao hui jia hou 
sui ran bu shao cun min fei chang tong qing ta 
ke dang ta yao qiu cun min wei ta zuo zheng shi 
jun zao dao ju jue 
ni bei da zhe me jiu ren jia dou mei shi hao hao de 
pai chu suo ye bu chu li 
ru guo wo men gei ni zuo zheng 
qi bu shi ye yao bei bai bai ai da 
bu yuan yi jie shou cai fang 
cheng mai xian hong guang pai chu suo jiao dao yuan ling min zai jie shou ji zhe cai fang shi shuo 
you yu wang a po gang gang chu yuan 
shi qing diao cha hai zai ban li zhong 
hen duo cun min dou bu gan zuo zheng 
xian zai hai mei you jie guo 
wo men hai zai zuo gong zuo 
dan shi gong zuo hen nan de 
zhi neng zai cong duo fang mian zai liao jie 
duo jiu zuo tong gong zuo hai bu hao hui da 
wo men hui jin kuai chu li de 
qi che huan hai nan dao ban 
ba ba qu na er 
ji zhe fu wu ping 
jian xi ji zhe fu xiao ye 
ba ba qu na er 
ba qin zi huo dong tui xiang she hui de ju jiao dian 
ba ba qu na er 
ci ci huan hai nan dao qi xing shi shang hai yi xue xiao zu zhi de qin zi huo dong -- jia zhang pei tong hai zi gong tong qi xing 
bao kuo xue sheng jia zhang 
ju ban zhe yang huo dong de mu di zai yu rang hai zi yuan li dian zi chan pin 
duan lian shen ti 
pei yang xin xing qu 
ci ci huan dao de xue sheng fen wei dui yu dui 
quan cheng qi xing hen lei 
dan hen kai xin 
wo jue de qi xing guo cheng zhong tuan dui he zuo fei chang zhong yao 
wo men zai qi xing shi you gao nian ji de da ge ge dai zhe wo men 
you ren sheng bing le hai zai jian chi 
da jia xiang hu gu li he zuo qi wan quan cheng 
ci ci huo dong zu zhi fang fu ze ren ni shi hai shuo 
qi xing huo dong rang hai zi zai yi zhi li shang de dao ji da duan lian 
hen hao zhan xian le da jia de tuan jie feng xian jing shen 
yi hou xue xiao hai hui ju ban lei si huo dong 
gu li geng duo xue sheng can yu 
ye hui zai ri hou de fa zhan zhong bu duan wan shan ju le bu 
yuan jian jian neng xing cheng yi zhong ti zhi 
hai nan dao de dao lu fei chang shi he qi xing 
huan jing you mei 
ju min re qing 
yi hou wo men hai hui zai lai huan dao 
dai zhe er nv yi qi qi xing de xie xian sheng cheng 
jia zhang pei zhe hai zi yi qi qi xing 
rang hai zi gan shou bu yi yang de jia ting wen nuan -- yu hai zi yi tong jing li cuo zhe 
shou huo cheng gong de xi yue 
ye rang hai zi ba zai ke tang shang xue dao de zhi shi yong yu shi jian 
du wan juan shu 
bu ru xing wan li lu 
jian xi ji zhe fu xiao ye 
qi che dao hong shu lin yu cun min yi qi hu dong zuo you xi jian ya dan 
ying qu yan feng zheng zong xian shui ya 
can jia hai kou shi wen hua guang dian chu ban zong ju zhu ban de 
hai kou ti yu xiang cun xing -- zou jin lu wei cun 
yu dang di cun min yi qi jin xing chuan di shi mao jin 
jian ji dan deng hu dong huo dong 
ying qu yan feng xian shui ya 
yan feng xian ya dan 
shi yong you deng jiang pin 
dang di cun min ye wei qi you men ji qing yan yi le 
zhong guo de diao yu dao 
shei bu shuo za jia xiang hao 
huan ge re wu ying jie xin de yi nian 
lu wei cun cun min wang xian sheng cheng 
cun li ren de fu ye jing ji gao de hong hong huo huo 
you de ren chu hai bu lao hai xian 
you de ren gao hai xian yin shi 
you de yang sheng hao 
you de yang zhi xian shui ya 
xu duo chan ye yi jing xing cheng le yan feng de pin pai te se 
dang di cun min de ri zi ye yue guo yue hao 
yan feng zhen nei de qi xing lv dao shen shou zi xing che ai hao zhe men huan ying 
jing chang kan dao che you qi che dao zhe li kan hong shu lin 
pin chang xian shui ya 
mei xiang dao jin tian neng gen che you men huan ju yi tang 
yi qi wan you xi 
chang ge tiao wu 
cun min men ye neng ti yan zhe xie shou jia ji qian yuan de zi xing che shi bu shi pao de bi mo tuo che hai kuai 
jin nian liu shi yu sui de che you xu da jie cheng 
ta re ai shang le zi xing che yun dong 
tong guo zhe xiang yun dong jia qiang le xin fei gong neng 
shen ti ye geng bang le 
er shi duo gong li lu cheng qi xia lai 
lian bu hong xin tiao 
tong guo zhe xiang yun dong 
ta ren shi le geng duo de che you 
tuo kuan le zi ji de sheng huo quan zi 
kan dao le hai nan geng duo de mei li xiang cun 
geng duo de mei li feng jing 
ta fei chang gan xie hai kou shi zi xing che yun dong xie hui 
gan xie hai kou shi wen ti ju 
gan xie wei guo jia fu qiang er fen dou zhe de ren men 
rang ta men lao ren jia neng gou lao you suo le 
ru guo shen ti tiao jian yun xu 
ta xi wang neng gou yu geng duo de che you qi xing dao geng yuan de di fang kan kan zu guo da hao he shan 
hai kou shi zi xing che yun dong xie hui xiang guan fu ze ren biao shi 
xi wang tong guo zhe yang de xiang cun qi xing huo dong 
feng fu qi you de sheng huo 
rang qi you zai kuai le zhong duan lian shen ti 
xiang shou kong qi qing xin 
cun min men ye neng xi huan shang zi xing che zhe xiang yun dong 
wei zi ji mang lu de sheng huo zeng tian le qu 
jia ru zi xing che ai hao zhe de hang lie zhi zhong 
xiang shou jian kang kuai le de qi xing sheng huo 
ji zhe mao lei 
xin nian yi shi 
hai nan san ya ya long wan yang guang ming mei 
qi hou wen nuan 
kong qi xin xian 
tian kong ge wai qing lang 
ti yan re dai sen lin you 
mu yu san ya wen nuan de yang guang 
gan shou ya long wan re dai tian tang yi ni duo cai de hai an yu lin feng guang 
yuan dan jie dang tian 
san ya ya long wan re dai tian tang sen lin lv you qu ke liu liang you suo zeng jia 
jing qu you ren ru zhi 
zai kai wang shan ding gong yuan de you lan che shang 
de jiao han sheng hui dang shan gu 
zai guo jiang long suo qiao jing dian 
jing qu zhong de lan hua gu 
long xing tian xia guang chang he da fu shi deng jing dian you ren cuan dong 
deng gao wang yuan 
tan mi re dai yu lin 
zi jia you ji ben dao ju min you cheng wei yuan dan jie de liang dian 
yuan dan jie dang tian 
ya long wan re dai tian tang sen lin lv you qu yun ying zheng chang 
jing qu zhi xu jing ran 
tong xun yuan huang qing you 
ji zhe ning yuan 
zuo wei san sha shi zheng quan jian she de yi ge zhong yao zu cheng bu fen 
san sha shi zheng fu wang zai jin tian shang wu shang xian yun xing 
er yi ji lu san sha jian she de 
wei zong zhi de nei bu bao zhi 
san sha xin wen 
ye zai jin tian shou fa 
san sha shi zheng fu wang zhan yi jian yao 
qing xi wei she ji li nian 
zhu yao fen wei jing tai he dong tai liang da ban kuai 
she you san sha xin wen 
gong zuo dong tai 
li shi deng ban kuai 
tong guo gai wang zhan 
san sha de li shi feng mao 
dao qing min qing deng bian ke yi lan wu yu 
san sha shi zheng fu wang zhan wang zhan kai tong hou jiang ji shi fa bu san sha shi wei 
shi zheng fu de gong zuo dong tai 
yu ci tong shi 
san sha shi nei bu bao zhi 
san sha xin wen 
ye zai jin tian shou fa 
yong xing dao di chu pian yuan 
jiao tong bu bian 
kan bu dao dang tian de bao zhi 
san sha shi wei 
shi zheng fu fei chang guan xin zhu dao jun min de wen hua sheng huo 
yao qiu shi xin wen zhong xin zhu ban 
san sha xin wen 
san sha xin wen 
mu qian wei zhou bao 
mei zhou wu yin fa 
mei qi liang ge ban 
bao zhi she you yao wen su di 
mei ti kan san sha 
shu huai san sha 
guo nei dong tai 
nan hai feng yun deng lan mu 
zhi zai xuan chuan guo jia de da zheng fang zhen he zhong da dong xiang 
bao dao san sha shi de gong zuo dong tai he jian she cheng jiu 
fan ying quan shi ren min de yuan wang he xin sheng 
wei san sha shi guang da ji guan gan bu 
bu dui guan bing he yu min qun zhong ti gong yi ge chuan bo xin xi 
jiao liu gong zuo he gou tong gan qing de xin ping tai 
wei quan mian jian she zhu quan san sha 
xing fu san sha 
mei li san sha fa hui du te zuo yong 
san sha shi wei shu ji 
shi zhang xiao jie shuo 
zi dan sheng zhi ri qi 
san sha jiu yi qi te shu de di li wei zhi he jian fu de te shu shi ming 
qian xi zhe quan guo ren min de mu guang 
cheng wei ge da mei ti ju jiao de re dian 
ju bu wan quan tong ji 
san sha she shi yi lai 
san sha shi de gong zuo shi yi xiang zhan xin er chong man tiao zhan de gong zuo 
mei you xian cheng jing yan ke yi jie jian 
mian lin xu duo te shu kun nan 
san sha ren wei you yi zhi zheng zhao xi 
ri ye jian cheng de jin po gan 
ta shi liu yin 
zhua tie you hen de jin tou 
chuang xin mou yuan lv 
shi gan xing san sha 
cai neng wei quan guo ren min jiao shang yi fen man yi de da juan 
san sha xin wen 
jiu shi yao ji lu san sha jian she de 
ke hua san sha fa zhan de 
hong yang san sha ren de 
ning ju jia kuai san sha jian she fa zhan de zheng neng liang 
san sha xin wen 
shou fa shi jie shu hou 
xiao jie yi ji can jia shou fa shi qi ta ling dao 
jia bin hai gong tong zai yi fen bao zhi shang qian ming liu nian 
zhi hou ta you ying ren min wang hai nan shi chuang ji zhe yao qiu 
zai ling yi fen bao zhi shang qian xia zi ji de ming zi 
song gei ji zhe zhen cang 
ji zhe ning yuan 
jin tian xia wu 
ci ci yan lian fen liang ge jie duan 
di yi jie duan jin xing bian dui hang xing yan lian 
di er jie duan jin xing shang shu liang tao hai shang zong he xing zheng zhi fa ying ji yan lian 
can yan li liang yi san sha shi hai shang zong he xing zheng zhi fa li liang wei zhu 
ji ke qian wang cha chu 
dao da yu ding hai yu fa xian fei fa zuo ye yu chuan 
deng lin jian cha 
bing zu zhi gai yu chuan fei fa zuo ye 
po huai le sheng tai zi yuan 
zhong hua ren min gong he guo yu ye fa 
zhong guo ren min gong he guo shui sheng ye sheng dong wu bao hu shi shi tiao li 
deng xiang guan fa lv 
bing mo shou yu huo wu ji dui dang shi ren jin xing jiao yu 
xu pai chuan qian wang jie song gai yu min dao san sha shi ren min yi yuan jin xing jiu zhi 
zhi hui bu jie dao bao gao hou 
xi yu ma tou 
bing jiao san sha shi ren min yi yuan jin xing jiu zhi 
jie dao bing huan bing an dun hao 
song da ma tou yu yi yuan zuo hao jiao jie 
bing huan de dao ji shi jiu zhi 
san sha shi fu shi zhang xu jie shuo 
san sha she shi hou 
hai shang jing ji huo dong ri yi zeng duo 
dan fei fa lv you 
dao cai wen wu 
fei fa bu lao deng wei fa xing wei shi you fa sheng 
yin ci jia qiang hai shang zong he xing zheng zhi fa 
ti gao hai shang kuai su jiu yuan neng li ji wei bi yao 
tong shi ye shi gai shi hai shang zong he zhi fa dui wu de zhong yao zhi ze zhi yi 
yan lian de zhu yao mu di jiu shi tong guo duan lian ge bu men kuai su fan ying 
xiang hu xie zuo 
chu zhi zhi fa xing wei 
shi shi ying ji jiu yuan de neng li 
bao zhang ren min qun zhong sheng ming cai chan an quan 
tui dong san sha shi ge xiang shi ye xiang qian fa zhan 
hai nan re dian xin wen tui jian 
min sheng shi shi 
san sha shu ji shi zhang xiao jie 
san ya zhong yuan ban gong lou cheng wei lou zhui zong 
zheng xiu ji jiang wan cheng 
san sha xin wen 
yuan dan shou fa xiao jie qian ming song ben wang ji zhe 
ben wang guan zhu 
te kun hu huang shi xuan xin nian jiang yuan dian dong che meng xiang 
a po wei shou nve zhe zuo zheng zao ou pai chu suo wu xia wen 
yuan dan hai nan you zhang dan xie man ying zi you ke le you xin jing dian 
hai nan shi shi xin jiao gui yi nian 
ji zhe ning yuan 
hai kou shi xiao fang zhi dui zu zhi kai zhan le yuan dan xiao fang an quan 
dui da xing qun zhong xing huo dong ju ban chang suo 
shi chang deng gong zhong ju ji chang suo ji ge wu yu le chang suo jin xing sui ji chou cha 
xiao chu huo zai yin huan 
que bao jie ri qi jian xiao fang an quan wen ding 
zai jian cha guo cheng zhong 
zhi dui zhi fa ren yuan fa xian hai kou long hua mi le xing yin yue cha zuo cun zai ying ye qi jian bu fen bao xiang jin xing ju bu zhuang xiu 
bu fen fang huo men bi men qi sun huai 
mie huo qi pei bei bu zu 
shu san tong dao lou ti jian dui fang za wu 
yuan gong xiao fang an quan pei xun bu dao wei deng xiao fang an quan wen ti 
wei yan su cheng chu xiao fang wei fa xing wei 
du cu gai chang suo jin kuai luo shi zheng gai cuo shi 
zhong hua ren min gong he guo xiao fang fa 
you guan gui ding 
yi fa dui gai yu yi lin shi cha feng chu li 
dai huo zai yin huan zheng gai wan bi 
jing xiao fang bu men fu cha he ge hou 
jiang ke hui fu ying ye 
hai kou shi gong an

wu ge yi lv 
yong zu cha feng

ti gao dan wei 
si ge neng li 
jian she shui ping

san sha shi wei shu ji 
shi zhang xiao jie zai san sha shi zheng fu zhu di yong xing dao fa biao xin nian zhu fu 
ye shi san sha jian she fa zhan de ji yu zhi nian 
geng shi san sha ren da you zuo wei zhi nian 
zhu yuan san sha pi bo zhan lang 
yang fan qian jin 
ma dao cheng gong 
shi san sha ji bu ping fan de yi nian 
zhong yang gao du zhong shi 
qin qie guan huai 
xi jin ping zong shu ji xian hou zuo le duo ci ming que zhong yao zhi shi 
san sha shi shen ke li jie 
zhun que luo shi zhong yang zhan lve yi tu 
shi zhong ba wei hu guo jia zhu quan he an quan de chong gao zhi ze zuo wei shou yao ren wu

kai tuo chuang xin 
bu ru shi ming 
de dao le zhong yang ling dao 
bu dui shou zhang deng yi ji sheng wei sheng zheng fu

shi san sha ren yi 
yi tian ye bu dan wu 
de jing qi shen 
nu li bian zhi 
de nan wang sui yue 
ye shi zhan tian dou hai 
pi bo zhan lang 
jun min xie shou pu xie da ai wu jiang de ying xiong sui yue 
mei yi jian shi dou shi yi ge nan wang de gu shi 
san sha yi nian lai de gu shi jiang bu wan 
san sha gong zuo cheng ji lai zhi bu yi 
mi zu zhen gui 
san sha de mei yi bu dou shi fen jian nan bu yi 
mei yi ding dian de jin bu bian hua dou ning ju zhe san sha jun min de xin xue yu han shui 
bu ji kui bu 
he yi zhi qian li 
wo men shi ke lao ji jian fu chong gao shi ming 
wo men zai ji xiao sheng wei da sheng 
yi shi jian ying kong jian de zhan dou sui yue zhong ye you sheng li de xi yue he cheng jiu gan 
xiao jie biao shi 
zai san sha gong zuo de guo cheng zhong 
wo men shen shen de ti hui dao 
ba wo fang xiang shi zuo hao san sha gong zuo de qian ti bao zheng 
gan yu dan dang 
shan yu dan dang shi zuo hao san sha gong zuo de zhong yao pin ge 
ta shi liu yin 
zhua tie you hen shi zuo hao san sha gong zuo de bi bei zuo feng 
jian chi jun min tuan jie 
rong he shi fa zhan shi san sha jian she fa zhan de bi you zhi lu 
ju ji ge jie zheng neng liang shi zuo hao san sha gong zuo de zhong yao bao zheng 
yong yu gai ge chuang xin shi zuo hao san sha gong zuo de qiang da dong li 
xiao jie biao shi diao

ye shi san sha jian she fa zhan de ji yu zhi nian

hui shou guo qu 
wo men hao qing man huai 
zhan wang wei lai 
wo men xin xin bai bei 
wo men yao jin yi bu guan che luo shi xi jin ping zong shu ji zhong yao zhi shi jing shen 
jian ding xin xin 
dan dang ke nan 
rui yi jin qu 
zai pu xie zhu quan san sha 
xing fu san sha 
mei li san sha de zhuang li hua juan 
ying xiong shi pian he dong ren gu shi 
ji zhe ning yuan 
wo men ban jin lai 
huan hai da sha 
dou kuai qi ba nian le 
yuan lai mai fang shi 
shuo shi bu jiu jiu ke yi ban xia fang chan zheng 
ke dao xian zai fang chan zheng hai mei ying 
ji zhe jie dao wei yu hai kou shi jin mao xi lu de huan hai da sha bu fen ye zhu fan ying cheng 
dan duo nian ban bu xia fang chan zheng 
ji zhe zai cai fang zhong liao jie dao 
dan mu qian reng wu xia wen 
jian she dan wei yu shi gong dan wei zhi jian xiang hu tui tuo ze ren 
hai kou huan hai da sha xiang mu wei yu hai kou shi jin mao xi lu 
jin guan gai da sha jin zhu de gong si zhong duo 
dan you yu gai da sha shu yu yi zuo mei you jing guo jun gong yan shou de jian zhu 
yi bai duo ming ye zhu de shou zhong 
zi ran ye mei you he fa de fang wu suo you quan zheng 
wo men dou mei you na dao fang chan zheng 
wo men xiang kai fa shang zhui yao fang chan zheng 
kai fa shang lv ci cheng zheng zai ban li 
jie guo yi zhi tuo dao xian zai 
huan hai da sha ye zhu wang xian sheng cheng 
shi ta men suo you ye zhu de xin tou zhi tong 
ji zhe liao jie dao 
ji zhe zai yi fen xiang guan wen jian shang kan dao 
you hai kou shi jie jue ban li fang chan zheng li shi yi liu wen ti ban gong shi qian tou 
ben ci lian xi hui yi shang 
you hai kou guo tu 
shi zheng shi rong deng duo bu men fu ze ren shen jia 
lian xi hui yi ji yao 
huan hai da sha zong he lou xiang mu wei yu hai kou shi jin mao qu 
jian she dan wei wei hai nan yong sheng shi ye tou zi you xian gong si 
gai xiang mu yi tong guo xiao fang 
huan bao yan shou he ge 
wei tong guo gui hua zhi liang yan shou 
jing lian xi hui yi yan jiu jue ding 
bing yi hui yi ji yao de xing shi tong yi gai xiang mu zai tong guo gui hua he shi he zhi liang yan shou hou 
ban li chan quan deng ji 
kai fa shang cheng shi gong fang bu yuan ti gong cai liao pei he yan shou 
huan hai da sha de chan quan deng ji wen ti 
kan shi bing bu nan 
bing mei you xiang xiang xiang zhong na me rong yi na dao fang chan zheng 
lian xi hui yi ji yao 
ye zhu wei he reng wu fa na dao fang chan zheng ne 
huan hai da sha kai fa shang 
hai nan yong sheng shi ye tou zi you xian gong si xiang guan fu ze ren jie shou ji zhe cai fang shi cheng 
huan hai da sha fang chan zheng chi chi wu fa ban li shi yin wei shi gong fang guang dong ba jian hai nan fen gong si bu yuan yi ti gong xiang guan shi gong zi liao 
ye wei neng qu de jun gong zong he yan shou bei an zheng 
ye jiu shi shuo 
huan hai da sha mu qian shang wei tong guo gui hua jun gong yan shou 
gai fu ze ren biao shi 
you yu guang dong ba jian she hai nan fen gong si de 
dao zhi huan hai da sha zong he lou xiang mu chi chi bu neng zheng ti yan shou 
ye zhu de fang chan zheng zi ran ye wu fa ban li 
gai fu ze ren gao su ji zhe 
he tong yue ding cheng jian huan hai da sha bu fen xiang mu 
gong cheng tong guo yan shou hou 
wo men gong si yi lv xing le dui guang dong ba jian hai nan fen gong si de fu kuan yi wu 
gai fu ze ren cheng 
dui yu gai xiang mu 
da sha jian zhu gong cheng zhi liang jie guo fu he gui hua yao qiu 
you yu guang dong ba jian hai nan fen gong si jiang gong cheng zhuan bao gei yi liang xing bao gong tou 
gai bao gong tou yi zhi bu ti jiao xiang guan yan shou zi liao 
suo yi mei fa yan shou 
gai fu ze ren ren wei 
huan hai da sha zong he lou xiang mu wei tong guo jun gong yan shou 
yi ji ye zhu na bu dao fang chan zheng 
shi guang dong ba jian hai nan fen gong si zao cheng de 
ye zhu na bu dao fang chan zheng 
wo men ye hen ji 
wo men yi zhi zai yu dui fang xie shang 
dan mei you ren he jin zhan 
shi gong fang cheng kai fa shang yao qiu jia jian liang ceng dao zhi wu fa yan shou 
shi luan shuo de 
shi qing de zhen zheng yuan yin bu shi na yang 
guang dong ba jian hai nan fen gong si zong jing li yi xian sheng jiu ci jie shou ji zhe cai fang shi cheng 
zhen zheng dao zhi ye zhu bu neng na dao fang chan zheng de yuan yin shi 
huan hai da sha jia jian de liang ceng lou shi wei fa jian zhu 
mu qian gen ben mei fa tong guo gui hua jun gong yan shou 
huan hai da sha 
yuan lai shi ban la zi lou 
wo men shi hou lai jie shou shi gong de 
yi xian sheng cheng 
ta men zai shi gong guo cheng zhong 
kai fa shang yao qiu gai gong si zai yuan you jian zhu shang jia gai liang ceng lou 
wo men dang shi jiu dui ci ti chu yi yi 
dao shi shi tong bu guo jun gong yan shou de 
jian she dan wei yong sheng gong si hai zhuan men gei wo men gong si chu le yi fen 
shang mian xie de hen ming que 
shuo zai jin hou jun gong yan shou fang mian ru yin wei wei gui jia ceng yuan yin tong bu guo jun gong yan shou 
yu shi gong dan wei wu guan 
bing qie yi zhao shi gong he tong shi wei tong guo jun gong yan shou ji yu shi gong fang jie suan gong cheng kuan 
bu shi wo men bu ti gong cai liao gei ta men 
jiu shi gei le ye tong bu guo yan shou de 
yi xian sheng huan biao shi 
jia jian de liang ceng bu neng yan shou 
ta men jiu bu gan le 
yi xian sheng huan ren wei 
shi gong dan wei dui da sha de zhi bao qi yi jing guo le 
dan yi zhi mei you gei 
shi shuang fang bi ci dou bu xin ren 
gei le shi gong dan wei zhe bi qian 
ta men ti gong bu liao cai liao zen me ban 
hai nan yong sheng gong si fu ze ren ye biao shi 
ta men yi an zhao xiang guan gui ding 
mu qian ye yi jing jiu huan hai da sha cun zai de yan shou ji fang chan zheng wen ti xiang hai nan sheng ji hai kou shi you guan bu men bao gao 
qing qiu xiang guan bu men chu mian xie tiao 
dui yu ci shi jin zhan 
ren min wang hai nan shi chuang jiang jin yi bu guan zhu 
hai kou shi you guan bu men zhao kai lian xi hui yi 
jie jue fang chan zheng li shi yi liu wen ti 
shang bai ye zhu reng ran mei you qu de xiang ying de fang chan zheng 
ta men yi ran mei you qu de he fa de fang wu suo you quan zheng 
ji zhe li wei min 
qiong hai jia ji zhen long shou cun wei hui gan bu hui tong qiong hai gong an ju shang yong pai chu suo fu ze ren 
zai ci yi tong lai dao jia ji zhen long shou cun wei hui nan tian yuan cun 
kan wang te kun jia ting huang shi xuan yi jia 
qiong hai jia ji zhen he shang yong pai chu suo fu ze ren kan wang huang shi xuan yi jia shi 
huang shi xuan shuo ta xin nian zui da yuan wang shi you yi tai can ji ren zhuan yong dian dong che 
yi nian guo qu 
ji zhe gen sui qiong hai jia ji zhen long shou cun wei hui ji dang di pai chu suo fu ze ren yi xing 
dui huang shi xuan jia jin xing le yi ci hui fang 
ji zhe liao jie dao 
zhe shi yi ge liu kou zhi jia 
he lai zi dan zhou de zhi li can ji nv ren jie hun hou 
sheng chu de da er zi a xing ye cun zai zhi li zhang ai 
yi jia ren kao huang shi xuan he er er zi zhe 
lao li wu nong ku du shi ri 
zhen zheng fu long shou cun wei hui he xia qu pai chu suo gei huang jia dai lai da mi 
hua sheng you deng wei wen pin he guo nian de hong bao 
rang zhe ge pin kun jia ting de xiao yuan zi yi shi chong man she hui da jia ting de ren jian wen nuan 
sui xing de long shou cun wei hui li shu ji gao su ji zhe 
huang shi xuan shuo 
ri zi you xie jin zhang 
dan hai suan guo dei qu 
huang shi xuan gao su ji zhe 
ta de xin nian yuan wang shi 
you yi tai zi ji de can ji ren dian dong che 
zhe yang ta jiu ke yi wai chu da li suo neng ji de gong 
zhuan dao qian tie bu jia yong 
sui xing de long shou cun wei hui li shu ji biao shi 
ta jiang he cun wei hui cheng yuan xie shang 
jin kuai gei huang shi xuan jie jue yi tai dian dong che 
hai nan re dian xin wen tui jian 
min sheng shi shi 
san sha shu ji shi zhang xiao jie 
san ya zhong yuan ban gong lou cheng wei lou zhui zong 
zheng xiu ji jiang wan cheng 
san sha xin wen 
yuan dan shou fa xiao jie qian ming song ben wang ji zhe 
ben wang guan zhu 
te kun hu huang shi xuan xin nian jiang yuan dian dong che meng xiang 
a po wei shou nve zhe zuo zheng zao ou pai chu suo wu xia wen 
yuan dan hai nan you zhang dan xie man ying zi you ke le you xin jing dian 
hai nan shi shi xin jiao gui yi nian 
ji zhe ji yu 
wei gai bian cheng shi luan xiang 
te bie shi yuan dan 
chun jie liang da jie ri qi jian de cheng shi guan li zhuang kuang 
hai kou shi ge qu ji cheng guan 
jiao jing deng bu men fang qi xiu xi shi jian 
zu zhi kai zhan yi 
zhan dao jing ying 
luan bai luan mai 
luan ting luan fang 
luan diu luan tu 
wei zhu yao nei rong de zhuan xiang zheng zhi 
tong guo zheng zhi cheng shi luan xiang ming xian hao zhuan 
dui huan jing wei sheng kai zhan zong he zheng zhi 
zhong dian dui zhan dao jing ying de da pai dang 
shao kao tan dian jin xing 
chi xu kai zhan yi ge yue de da gui mo zheng zhi 
hai kou shi shi zheng shi rong guan li wei yuan hui xiang guan fu ze ren jie shao 
chi xu kai zhan yi ge yue 
yi bao zheng yuan dan chun jie qi jian cheng qu huan jing gan jing zheng jie 
ci ci zheng zhi fan wei wei cheng qu zhu gan dao 
chuang kou di duan 
nong mao shi chang zhou bian wei zheng zhi li zhong dian 
qi zhong xiu ying qu zheng zhi dao lu wei xiu ying da dao 
hai xiu xi lu 
xiu ying shi chang 
hai bo shi chang 
gang feng shi chang zhou bian 
qi che xi zhan 
hai kou huo che zhan zhou bian 
long hua qu zhi dao lu wei jie fang lu 
xin hua nan lu 
de sheng sha lu 
bin hai da dao 
guo mao da dao 
ye hai da dao 
long kun nan lu yan chang xian 
qiu hai da dao yan chang xian 
qi che nan zhan zhou bian 
jin niu ling gong yuan 
hai kou gong yuan 
wan lv yuan zhou bian 
qiong shan qu zhi dao lu wei guo xing da dao 
long kun nan lu 
nong mao shi chang zhou bian 
qi che dong zhan zhou bian 
mei lan qu zhi dao lu wei guo xing da dao 
hai xiu dong lu 
hai dian san xi lu 
nong mao shi chang zhou bian 
bai sha men gong yuan zhou bian 
zhong dian zheng zhi zhan dao jing ying xing wei 
ci ci de zheng zhi nei rong she ji zhong duo 
qi zhong zhan dao jing ying xing wei deng wei zheng zhi zhong dian 
ci ci quan mian zheng zhi shu dao zao tan dian 
wu zheng liu dong tan dian 
lu tian shi chang deng ge lei fei fa zhan dao jing ying xing wei 
qiang hua tan dian qun 
zao can dian de guan li 
shi xing ding dian 
ding shi jing ying 
ding ren guan li 
zuo dao guan li gui fan 
jing ying you xu 
wei sheng zheng jie 
zao tan dian yan ge xian shi jian xian di dian jing ying 
dian pu yan jin chu dian jing ying 
jia qiang shui guo 
huo wu che zhan dao jing ying zheng zhi li du 
yan jin shui guo 
huo wu che zai quan shi zhu ci gan dao 
chuang kou di duan 
xue xiao zhou bian she tan xiao shou 
yan jin shui guo 
huo wu yun shu che liang sui yi zhan dao xiao shou jing ying 
hen zhua ye jian zhan dao tan dian de zhuan xiang zheng zhi 
jian jue qu di shi min fan ying qiang lie 
mei ti bao guang he ying xiang jiao tong 
yan zhong rao min de ge lei ye shi pai dang he liu dong yin shi tan dian 
jia qiang hai kou shi kong qi zi dong jian ce dian zhou bian huan jing zheng zhi 
qiang hua yang chen wu ran kong zhi 
jian du ni tou che 
zha tu yun shu che gui fan shang lu 
qiang hua jian she gong di jian cha 
qiang hua lu tian shao kao 
fen shao la ji cha chu 
zheng zhi nei rong hai bao kuo 
jia qiang dui zhu cheng qu zhu yao jie dao 
gong jiao zhan deng di duan de wei sheng bao jie li du 
te bie shi jia qiang dui bei jie xiao xiang 
cheng xiang jie he bu 
ji mao shi chang 
ju min mi ji qu 
yan jie jian zhu li mian 
ma tou he shui yu de qing sao bao jie li du 
ding qi zai zhu gan dao sa shui 
ji shi qing xi bei wu ran lu mian 
an zhao gui ding luo shi jiang chen cuo shi 
zheng zhi huo dong jiang an zhao 
yong lu yu min 
hai lu yu min 
ru shi jing ying 
cai qu shi qu lian dong 
qu jie lian yun de fang shi 
cuo shi zheng zhi 
jiao cha zhi fa 
you xu shu dao 
ding gang ding ze guan li deng fang shi 
ji xu dui quan shi ge lei fei fa zhan dao jing ying xing wei he wei fan jing ying xing wei he wei fan shi rong zhi xu guan li gui ding de xing wei jin xing da gui mo 
gao qiang du de zheng zhi 
tong guo zhuan xiang zheng zhi 
shi hai kou shi zhu ci shi rong shi mao zhen zhen zheng zheng you jiao da gai guan 
jie xiang ju min huan jing rong mao ming xian gai shan 
qian gui ze zhi yi 
nan ren hen zai yi nv ren de guo qu 
suo wei nv ren de guo qu 
zai nan ren kan lai 
bu shi nv ren you guo ji ci lian ai jing li 
nan ren zai yi de shi nv ren shi fou chu nv 
ru guo bu shi chu nv 
nan ren geng xiang zhi dao nv ren zai ren shi ta zhi qian ni dao di he duo shao ge nan ren you guo qin mi jie chu 
nan ren dou xi guan hun qian shi xing 
ye ke yi dui zi ji hun qian shi xing de xing wei bu cheng dan ren he ze ren 
dan nan ren yun xu zi ji hun qian sui bian shang chuang de tong shi 
dui zi ji wei lai lao po zai zhe fang mian de zuo pai que yao qiu fei chang yan ge 
wei ci hui cheng xian yi zhong zhuang tai 
hun qian tai feng dian de nv ren 
dao le shi hun nian ling 
hen nan zhao dao xin yi de dui xiang 
er hun qian hua xin de nan ren shou zhe fang mian de ying xiang ji hu ke yi hu lve bu ji 
ge ren zhi neng bei xian shi gai bian ru guo ni bian de zu gou qiang da 
bie ren jiu wu fa ju jue ni 
ru guo ni ke yi ming ling zi ji 
kun nan jiu wu fa zu ai ni 
zhi you shou xian gai bian le ni zi ji 
ni cai neng qu gai bian ni de shi jie 
gai bian ni de sheng huo 
wei he huai cai bu yu de zong shi wo shi shang mei you huai cai bu yu 
zhi you bu dong de zi wo tui xiao de ren 
huai cai bu yu de zhen xiang jiu shi zi ji bu gou you xiu 
bu gou nu li 
zhe zi yan zai she hui shang shi bu dao de de ti xian 
er zai fu za de zhi chang shang 
hen duo zhi ye nv xing hui bei she hui de xian shi qian gui ze hua 
ta men ye xu shi bi bu de yi 
ye xu shi yi xiang qing yuan 
ye xu shi deng jia jiao huan 
hai nan sheng zheng fu cheng nuo wei qun zhong luo shi 
shi da min sheng shi shi 
nei rong han gai yi liao 
bao zhang xing zhu fang 
she hui bao zhang 
an quan yin shui 
sha tu lu jian she deng zhu duo fang mian 
ren min wang hai nan shi chuang jiang dui zhe xie 
min sheng shi shi 
di qing kuang jin xing pan dian 
zong jie xiang guan luo shi qing kuang 
jing qing guan zhu 
ji zhe wu sheng jing 
you zhuan men de ren zhao gu wo men de chi he 
hai you ren pei zhe shuo shuo hua xia xia qi 
xian zai dui zai jing lao yuan de sheng huo fei chang man yi 
ti gao she hui bao zhang shui ping shi hai nan sheng wei 
zhe yi nian lai 
ju hai nan sheng min zheng ting xiang guan fu ze ren jie shao 
cheng shi di bao ti biao gong zuo quan mian wan cheng 
wu bao gong yang ti biao gong zuo quan mian wan cheng 
sheng tuo lao yuan jian cheng tou ru shi yong 
lao yuan xiang mu jian she yi jing quan bu jun gong 
hai nan sheng she qu ju jia yang lao wang luo fu wu ping tai jian cheng bing tou ru yun ying 
hai nan sheng min zheng ting lian he sheng cai zheng ting xia fa 
guan yu ti gao quan sheng cheng shi ju min zui di sheng huo bao zhang biao zhun de tong zhi 
bu shu xiang guan gong zuo 
cheng shi di bao ti biao gong zuo quan mian wan cheng 
ye dui nong cun wu bao gong yang ti biao gong zuo ti chu le ju ti yao qiu 
hai nan sheng min zheng ting xiang guan fu ze ren gao su ji zhe 
wu bao gong yang ti biao gong zuo quan mian wan cheng 
gai fu ze ren biao shi 
cheng shi di bao ti biao he nong cun wu bao gong yang ti biao hou 
qie shi bao zhang le kun nan qun zhong de ji ben sheng huo quan yi 
dui yu gai shan kun nan jia ting ji ben sheng huo tiao jian 
ti gao jiu zhu dui xiang sheng huo shui ping fa hui le zhong yao zuo yong 
ge shi xian zai ti biao guo cheng zhong 
ji shi jiang fu he tiao jian de di bao dui xiang na ru bao zhang fan wei 
tong shi qing tui bu fu he tiao jian de dui xiang 
jie zhi di san ji du 
sheng tuo lao yuan jian cheng tou ru shi yong 
hai nan zheng mian lin ren kou lao ling hua de yan jun tiao zhan 
lao nian ren kou ji shu zeng da 
ban shi neng lao ren shu liang bu duan zeng zhang 
kong chao jia ting ri qu zeng duo 
jia ting yang lao gong neng bu duan ruo hua 
you ci dai lai de xin qing kuang 
xin tiao zhan ri yi tu chu 
sheng tuo lao yuan jian she shi hai nan sheng wei 
sheng zheng fu lian xu liang nian lie ru wei min ban shi shi gong cheng zhong de yi xiang nei rong 
sheng tuo lao yuan ji ding qi tuo yang 
sheng huo zhao liao 
wen hua yu le 
bao jian kang fu 
lin shi zan zhu 
xiu xian du jia 
jing shen wei jie ji lin zhong guan huai deng duo xiang gong neng wei yi ti 
zhu yao jie na cheng shi wu ren zhao liao de lao ren he du ju 
shi neng deng yang lao kun nan de lao nian ren 
hai nan sheng min zheng ting ting zhang miao jian zhong biao shi 
shou ge tuo lao yuan shi hai nan tui jin she hui yang lao fu wu ti xi jian she 
fa zhan yang lao fu wu ye de zhong da jin zhan 
hai nan sheng min zheng ting jiang ji xu jia kuai tui jin 
yi ju jia wei ji chu 
she qu wei yi tuo 
ji gou wei zhi cheng 
de yang lao fu wu ti xi 
tuo lao yuan nei de fang jian she shi qi bei 
suo you ke fang dou pei you dian shi 
bi gui ji dan du xiao chu fang he wei sheng jian 
qie suo you wei sheng jian de ma tong bian dou you hu jiao ling 
lao ren yi dan chu xian zhuang kuang 
ke yi li ji hu jiao hu shi he hu gong 
wei sheng jian an zhuang le ke yi zhe die de lin yu zuo yi 
lao ren ke yi zuo zhe xi zao 
zai ma tong he xi lian chi bian shang hai an zhuang le bu xiu gang fu shou 
yi fang lao ren shuai dao 
jie zhi mu qian 
xiang shou you hu li ren yuan ti gong de zhuan ye hua 
biao zhun hua de hu li fu wu 
nian di tou ru shi yong 
hai nan sheng bu duan jia da da xing jing 
lao yuan de jian she 
neng gou an du wan nian 
qi zi qu shi hou 
wang a gong jiu zhu jin le yang lao yuan 
xian zai yi jing xi guan le zhe yang an ran de wan nian sheng huo 
zuo wei sheng wei 
sheng zheng fu jin nian yao zhong dian ban hao de shi jian min sheng shi shi nei rong zhi yi 
hai nan sheng yao wan cheng wen chang shi wen cheng zhen yang lao yuan 
tun chang xian tun cheng zhen yang lao yuan 
le dong xian bao you zhen yang lao yuan 
hai kou shi da zhi po zhen jing lao yuan 
cheng mai xian jin jiang zhen zhong xin yang lao yuan 
qiong hai shi jia ji yang lao yuan 
lao yuan xiang mu jian she yi jing quan bu jun gong 
ju hai nan sheng min zheng ting she hui jiu zhu chu you guan fu ze ren jie shao 
hai nan sheng gong ban jing lao yuan da duo jian yu shang shi ji ba jiu shi nian dai 
da bu fen jing lao yuan zhan di gui mo xiao 
jian she biao zhun di 
hai nan sheng tong guo xin jian he gai kuo jian jing lao yuan xiang mu 
jiang yi liao fu wu song jin jing lao yuan 
zheng fu gou mai she hui fu wu deng fang shi 
bu duan jia da jing lao yuan jian she li du 
ti sheng jing lao yuan guan li fu wu shui ping 
rang yue lai yue duo de lao nian ren zai ci an xiang wan nian 
gai fu ze ren biao shi 
lao yuan xiang mu jian cheng hou 
jiang jin yi bu you hua hai nan sheng nong cun jing lao yuan jian she bu ju 
ji da gai shan nong cun wu bao gong yang dui xiang ju zhu tiao jian 
ti gao nong cun wu bao ji zhong gong yang lv 
jian she quan sheng she qu ju jia yang lao wang luo fu wu ping tai 
gen ju mu biao ji hua 
hai nan sheng jin nian yao jian she quan sheng she qu ju jia yang lao wang luo fu wu ping tai 
ji hua wei quan sheng 
gai fu wu ping tai zhu yao cong jin ji jiu yuan 
ji zhe ri qian cong hai nan sheng min zheng ting liao jie dao 
hai nan sheng she qu ju jia yang lao wang luo fu wu ping tai jian cheng bing tou ru yun ying 
kai tong le ping tai hu jiao fu wu re xian 
wan cheng le quan bu fa fang ren wu 
zou shi ding wei 
zheng ce zi xun 
jing shen guan ai deng xin xi fu wu 
chu le huo qu xin xi fu wu deng gong neng wai 
hai nan sheng lao ren hai ke yi zai yi jing tui xing she qu ju jia yang lao fu wu shi dian gong zuo de hai kou 
ping tai jian she ye cu jin le quan sheng she qu ju jia yang lao fu wu shi dian gong zuo de fa zhan 
hai nan sheng min zheng ting you guan fu ze ren biao shi 
hai nan sheng jiang ba xing jian he gai kuo jian yang lao fu wu ji chu she shi jie he qi lai 
zhong dian zhua hao xiang zhen zhong xin jing lao yuan jian she 
xing cheng bu ju he li 
gong neng pei tao 
shi ying cheng xiang bu tong te dian de yang lao fu wu wang luo 
bu duan tui jin yi ju jia yang lao wei ji chu 
she qu fu wu wei yi tuo 
ji gou yang lao wei zhi cheng de hai nan yang lao fu wu ti xi jian she 
rang jin tian de gai ge wei ming tian pu lu 
you shi xin de yi nian 
you shi xin de yi tian 
dui yu peng bo xiang shang 
kuai su fa zhan de zhong guo lai shuo 
dan zai fei shi de guang yin zhong 
que liu xia le fen dou zhe shen shen de yin ji 
li shi jiang ji zhu shen me 
shi tai xing shen chu fang pin wen ku de xin xin xiang yin 
hai shi chang e ben yue yu tu ling kong de huan hu que yue 
shi diao jie gou zhuan fang shi de zha shi tui jin 
hai shi wen zeng zhang hui min sheng de wu shi zhi ju 
shi wei hu guo jia zhu quan he an quan de chen zhuo jian yi 
hai shi lv xing guo ji yi wu 
cu jin he ping fa zhan de you yi xin pian 
lao hu cang ying yi qi da 
de guo gan xing dong 
hai shi ba xiang gui ding zhua tie you hen de jian chi bu xie 
shi ken ying gu tou she xian tan 
zhong dian ling yu gai ge de zong shen tui jin 
hai shi qun zhong lu xian jiao yu shi jian huo dong suo huan fa chu de qiang da zheng neng liang 
po lang qian xing de zhong guo 
wan cheng le cheng shang qi xia de li shi jiao jie 
kai shi le ji wang kai lai de mou pian bu ju 
man huai dui min zu de ze ren 
dui ren min de ze ren 
dui dang de ze ren 
xin yi jie zhong yang ling dao ji ti 
jiang shi xian min zu fu xing de zhong guo meng hua wei yi wan ren min de zhi hui he li liang 
ji li zhe zhong hua er nv mai xiang xin de zheng cheng 
mian dui ji qi fu za de guo ji guo nei xing shi 
wo men zong lan quan ju 
shi zhong jian chi yi jing ji jian she wei zhong xin 
shi xian le jing ji she hui fa zhan wen zhong you jin 
wen zhong xiang hao de liang hao kai ju 
wo men rui yi chuang xin 
yong yi xi lie gai ge ju cuo bao chi fa zhan huo li 
ji chu nei sheng dong li 
wo men yi zhuan zuo feng tui dong dang de jian she mai chu xin bu fa 
ying de le ren min de xin ren he zhi chi 
dang de ning ju li he zhan dou li jin yi bu zeng qiang 
wo men jiang gong ping zheng yi de li nian guan chuan yu zhi guo li zheng de fang fang mian mian 
shi xian hao wei hu hao fa zhan hao ren min qun zhong de qie shen li yi 
wei geng duo ren chuang zao zhe ren sheng chu cai de ji hui 
qian qian wan wan pu tong zhong guo ren yong zi ji de han shui 
jiao zhu qi tong wang zhong guo meng de lu ji 
wo men de tian yu ku 
ning ju cheng zhe ge guo jia mai xiang ming tian de qiang jing dong li 
zai ru ci duan de shi jian hui ju ru ci duo de kai shi 
rang ru ci duo de bian ge zhan xian ru ci da de jue xin 
ji bian shi dui zhong guo guan wang he zhi yi de ren men 
mian dui zhe yang de cheng jiu 
zhe yang de fen dou 
ye bu neng bu bao yi qin pei he jing yi 
dui zhong guo de wei lai bao you re qie de qi dai 
li shi shi yi ge bu duan yan xu de guo cheng 
zai gong jian ke nan de zhong guo dao lu shang 
xun zhe shi ba jie san zhong quan hui de hao jiao 
zhong guo ren min zai xin de yi nian li 
kai shi le quan mian shen hua gai ge de wei da jin jun 
zhe shi yi ci jian yan jin qu yi shi de jin jun 
shi jie da shi 
hao hao dang dang 
bian ge shi da shi suo qu 
ren xin suo xiang 
mian dui bi ren de xing shi 
suo you de guo jia dou zai qiu xin qiu bian 
qiu bian qiu xin 
qian fan jing fa 
ji ji zhong liu 
zhong guo de xian dai hua jian she 
guan jian zai ba zhi du you shi zhuan hua wei shi shi zai zai de jing zheng you shi 
xin de yi nian 
jin yi bu jie fang si xiang 
jie fang he fa zhan she hui sheng chan li 
jie fang he zeng qiang she hui huo li 
wo men cai neng geng shang ceng lou 
zhe shi yi ci kao yan ji yu yi shi de jin jun 
wo men ceng cuo shi gan shang shi dai de da hao shi ji 
ji ruo ji pin 
bei shou qi ling 
jing guo ji dai ren yu xue fen zhan he jian ku da pin 
jin tian de zhong guo cai chong xin hui dao yi ge jiao wei you li de qi dian 
ying de le xiang dui you li de fa zhan huan jing 
wo men reng chu zai bing qie chang qi chu yu she hui zhu yi chu ji jie duan 
guo ji di wei hai bu suan gong gu 
fa zhan huan jing ye bing bu ping he 
jing zhu fen miao bi zheng 
ji yu shao zong ji shi 
xin de yi nian 
zhua zhu qian zai nan feng de li shi ji yu 
zhen xi lai zhi bu yi de da hao xing shi 
bu duan ji fa dang he guo jia de sheng ji huo li 
wo men cai neng cheng shi er shang 
zhe shi yi ci li lian ze ren yi shi de jin jun 
cong lai jiu mei you guo yi cu er jiu de bian ge 
yong yuan dou bu hui you yi lao yong yi de jin bu 
wan shan zhong guo te se she hui zhu yi zhi du 
tui jin guo jia zhi li ti xi he zhi li neng li xian dai hua 
zai quan xin shi dai bei jing xia wo men zheng zai zhan kai yi chang wei da de ge ming 
mian dui chen ke ji bi 
ji liu xian tan 
ying nan er shang 
bei shui yi zhan 
zhe shi wo men zhe yi dai ren duo bu kai ye bu ying duo de ze ren 
tui bu diao ye bu rong tui de shi ming 
xin de yi nian 
yi geng da de jue xin chong po si xiang guan nian de zhang ai 
tu po li yi gu hua de fan li 
wo men cai neng ying de ming tian 
shi quan mian shen hua gai ge di yi nian 
wan shi kai tou nan 
zhi nan jiu bu nan 
mei you yi wang wu qian de jin qu yi shi 
mei you cheng shi er shang de ji yu yi shi 
mei you gan yu dan dang de ze ren yi shi 
zuo tian de gai ge bu hui wei jin tian dian ji 
jin tian de gai ge ye nan yi wei ming tian pu lu 
shi ba jie san zhong quan hui kai qi yi ge xin de shi jian chuang kou 
jin mi tuan jie zai yi xi jin ping tong zhi wei zong shu ji de dang zhong yang zhou wei 
na chu zhong ren shi chai de xin jin er 
na chu feng shan kai lu de chuang jin er 
na chu shuai kai bang zi de gan jin er 
na chu zhua tie you hen de ren jin er 
na chu yong yi du xing de wen jin er 
po chu si xin 
cheng quan gong yi 
jian ding xin xin 
ning ju gong shi 
wo men jiu neng ba san zhong quan hui jing shen zhuan hua cheng gai zao xian shi shi jie de qiang da li liang 
yong wo men zhe yi dai ren de bu xie nu li 
jiang zhong guo te se she hui zhu yi wei da shi ye tui xiang zhan xin jing jie 
tiao wang xin nian de di yi lv shu guang 
ying jie wo men de 
ye xu reng you kun nan he tiao zhan 
dan dui yu shi xian min zu fu xing de zhong guo meng xiang 
wo men cong wei xiang jin tian zhe yang chong man xin xin 
dong fang yu xiao 
mo dao jun xing zao 
ta bian qing shan ren wei lao 
feng jing zhe bian du hao 
rang wo men xie shou fen dou 
zao jiu zhong guo de wei lai 
ni wo de ming tian 
xin hua she xin nian xian ci 
mai xiang shi xian mei hao meng xiang de xin zheng cheng 
xin hua she she ping 
mai xiang shi xian mei hao meng xiang de xin zheng cheng 
xin nian de shu guang pen bo yu chu 
ying xian zai dong fang di ping xian shang 
ying zhe xin de meng xiang he xi wang 
zhong guo ren min man huai xin xin 
ang yang fen jin 
ta shang shi xian zhong guo meng de xin zheng cheng 
shi xu geng ti 
sui yue ru ge 
jian zheng zhe zhong hua min zu tong xin zhu meng de pang bo li liang 
shu xie xia yi wan ren min kai tuo fen jin de zhan xin pian zhang 
zhi shen zhong hua min zu bai nian fu xing de shi kong zuo biao 
zai quan mian jian cheng xiao kang she hui de jue ding xing jie duan 
zai shi xian wei da jie li de kai ju zhi nian 
yi xi jin ping tong zhi wei zong shu ji de xin yi jie zhong yang ling dao ji ti 
mian dui ji qi cuo zong fu za de guo nei wai xing shi 
zong lan quan ju 
yun chou wei wo 
tuan jie dai ling quan dang quan guo ge zu ren min kai chuang le ge xiang shi ye de zhan xin ju mian 
lao lao ba wo wen zhong qiu jin zong ji diao 
qian san ji du jing ji zeng su 
liang shi sheng chan 
ren min sheng huo chi xu gai shan 
gai ge kai fang li du jia da 
she hui da ju he xie wen ding 
wai jiao guo fang qi xiang yi xin 
dang feng zheng feng xin feng fu mian 
dang xin min xin wan zhong yi xin 
jing cai de kai ju 
huo de ren min hao ping 
ying de shi jie zhu mu 
liang ge yi bai nian 
fen dou mu biao dian ding le jian shi ji chu 
yu yi nian lai zhi guo li zheng de chu se cheng ji 
jiao hui yu jin chao 
zhao shi zhe wei lai 
li shi guan chuan shi zhi bu yu de xin nian 
xian shi di li yi wang wu qian de xin xin 
kai shi xin de chu fa 
wo men jian xin 
zai dang de dai ling xia yi ding neng chuang zao shu yu jin tian 
mian xiang wei lai de xin ye ji 
zai bai nian fu xing de fen jin li shi zhong shu xie xin hui huang 
xin de qi dian zhao huan shi ming yu dan dang 
wei da mu biao ning ju xin xin he li liang 
dang de shi ba jie san zhong quan hui zuo chu le quan mian shen hua gai ge zong ti bu shu 
zhong yang jing ji gong zuo hui yi 
wei rao gai ge bu ju 
zhen dui wen ti lao zi 
yi quan mian shen hua gai ge tui dong ke xue fa zhan de da qi ju tai shi qing xi 
quan mian tui jin 
wu wei yi ti 
zhong guo te se she hui zhu yi jian she de zong bu ju geng jia ming que 
gei ren xin xin 
geng cui ren fen jin 
shen ke ling hui he ba wo zhong yang jing shen 
ba si xiang he xing dong tong yi dao zhong yang jue ce bu shu shang lai 
ba zhi hui he li liang ji zhong dao guan che luo shi shang lai 
wo men jiu neng qi xin xie li 
tui dong jing ji she hui fa zhan zai shang xin tai jie 
lan tu yi jing hui jiu 
hao jiao yi jing chui xiang 
yi wan ren min ang yang dou zhi 
dou sou jing shen 
xiang zhe gong tong meng xiang fen li ting jin 
zhe shi he deng zhuang guan de jing xiang 
zhe shi he qi wei da de shi jian 
xian dong mei yi duo fen dou de lang hua 
ding neng hui cheng xiong yong peng pai de fa zhan bo tao 
fang fei mei yi ge mei hao de meng xiang 
jiu neng ning ju shi xian min zu fu xing de pang bo li liang 
wei rao quan mian shen hua gai ge de ren wu shu 
yi ge ren wu yi ge ren wu zhua luo shi 
yi xiang gong zuo yi xiang gong zuo qiu shi xiao 
wen zha wen da 
bu bu wei ying 
jiu neng zhang wo quan nian gong zuo de zhu dong quan 
ji xiao sheng wei da sheng 
tui dong zhong guo te se she hui zhu yi shi ye mai chu xin bu fa 
shi quan mian wan cheng 
gui hua de guan jian yi nian 
gai ge fa zhan ren wu zhong da er jian ju 
jin jin zhua zhu guan xi quan ju de da shi 
ji zhong yong li 
jing zhun fa li 
jian chi gai ge chuang xin 
zai zeng qiang jing ji huo li 
tui dong fa zhan fang shi zhuan bian shang shi xian xin tu po 
fa hui jing ji ti zhi gai ge zhong yao qian yin zuo yong 
dai dong ge ling yu gai ge xie tong tui jin qu de xin jin zhan 
rang fa zhan cheng guo geng duo geng gong ping hui ji quan ti ren min 
shun ying ren min xin qi dai 
zai bu duan gai jin zuo feng de tong shi fan fu chang lian jin yi bu kai chuang xin ju mian 
chi zhi yi heng 
jiu jiu wei gong 
yi ding neng zai jian shi kai ju de ji chu shang 
shi xian quan mian shen hua gai ge xin mu biao 
chuang zao jing ji she hui fa zhan de xin cheng jiu 
zhong hua min zu dui ren lei fa zhan de tan suo da dao le xin de gao du 
xi shun zhe zhong hua min zu man chang fen dou ji lei de wen hua yang fen 
wo men zou zi ji de lu 
ju you wu bi guang kuo de wu tai 
ju you wu bi shen hou de li shi di yun 
ju you wu bi qiang da de qian jin ding li 
zhong guo ren min ying gai you zhe ge xin xin 
mei yi ge zhong guo ren dou ying gai you zhe ge xin xin 
lan tu shi fang xiang zhi yin 
xin xin shi li liang yuan quan 
xi jin ping zong shu ji ji qing yang yi de zi xin biao da 
ji li zhe mei yi ge zhong hua er nv wei shi xian min zu fu xing de wei da meng xiang er bu xie fen dou 
chan sheng yu guo qu de xian zai 
yun yu zhe wei da de wei lai 
zhan zai xin de li shi qi dian 
yi jing qu de de cheng jiu 
zheng zai tui jin de gai ge 
jiang yao shi xian de mu biao 
fu yu wo men geng jia jian ding de dao lu zi xin 
li lun zi xin 
zhi du zi xin 
ji yu wo men ying nan er shang de fen jin li liang 
rang wo men jin mi tuan jie zai yi xi jin ping tong zhi wei zong shu ji de dang zhong yang zhou wei 
tong xin tong de 
li jing tu zhi 
mai xiang meng xiang cheng zhen de mei hao ming tian 
lai yuan : xin hua she 
xin nian qian xi 
guo jia zhu xi xi jin ping tong guo zhong guo guo ji guang bo dian tai 
zhong yang ren min guang bo dian tai 
zhong yang dian shi tai fa biao er ling yi si nian xin nian he ci 
xin hua she ji zhe lan hong guang she 
guo jia zhu xi xi jin ping tong guo zhong guo guo ji guang bo dian tai 
zhong yang ren min guang bo dian tai 
zhong yang dian shi tai 
fa biao le er ling yi si nian xin nian he ci 
quan wen ru xia 
yi yuan fu shi 
wan xiang geng xin 
wo xiang quan guo ge zu ren min 
xiang xiang gang te bie xing zheng qu tong bao he ao men te bie xing zheng qu tong bao 
xiang tai wan tong bao he hai wai qiao bao 
xiang shi jie ge guo he ge di qu de peng you men 
zhi yi xin nian de zhu fu 
zhu fu lao ren men jian kang 
zhu fu hai zi men kuai le 
zhu fu mei ge jia ting xing fu an kang 
zai zhe ci jiu ying xin zhi ji 
wu shu gong ren 
zhi shi fen zi 
gan bu reng ran jian shou zai gong zuo gang wei 
bu shao tong bao yi ran ben bo zai shi jie ge de wei zu guo xin qin gong zuo 
xu duo ren min jie fang jun he wu jing guan bing 
gong an gan jing zheng zai lv xing guang rong shi ming 
ta men you de yuan li zu guo 
yuan li qin ren 
you de bu neng tong jia ren tuan ju 
wo dai biao zu guo he ren min 
xiang ta men zhi yi cheng zhi de wen hou 
zhu ta men ping an shun li 
dui wo men guo jia he ren min lai shuo shi hen bu ping fan de yi nian 
wo men gong tong zhan sheng le ge zhong kun nan he tiao zhan 
qu de le xin de xian zhu cheng jiu 
cheng ji lai zhi bu yi 
ning ju le da jia de xin xue he han shui 
wo xiang da jia biao shi zhong xin de gan xie 
wo men dui quan mian shen hua gai ge zuo chu zong ti bu shu 
gong tong miao hui le wei lai fa zhan de hong wei lan tu 
wo men jiang zai gai ge de dao lu shang mai chu xin de bu fa 
wo men tui jin gai ge de gen ben mu di 
shi yao rang guo jia bian de geng jia fu qiang 
rang she hui bian de geng jia gong ping zheng yi 
gai ge shi xu yao wo men gong tong wei zhi fen dou de wei da shi ye 
xu yao fu chu jian xin de nu li 
yi fen geng yun 
yi fen shou huo 
zai gai ge kai fang de wei da shi jian zhong 
wo men yi jing chuang zao liao wu shu hui huang 
zhong guo ren min bi jiang chuang zao chu xin de hui huang 
yu zhou hao han 
xing han can lan 
ying gai shou wang xiang zhu 
tong zhou gong ji 
gong tong fa zhan 
zhong guo ren min zhui xun shi xian zhong hua min zu wei da fu xing de zhong guo meng 
ye zhu yuan ge guo ren min neng gou shi xian zi ji de meng xiang 
wo zhen cheng xi wang 
shi jie ge guo ren min zai shi xian ge zi meng xiang de guo cheng zhong xiang hu li jie 
xiang hu bang zhu 
nu li ba wo men lai yi sheng cun de di qiu jian she cheng wei gong tong de mei hao jia yuan 
sheng huo zong shi chong man xi wang de 
cheng gong zong shi shu yu ji ji jin qu 
bu xie zhui qiu de ren men 
wo men zai qian jin de dao lu shang 
hai hui yu dao ge zhong feng xian he tiao zhan 
rang lao bai xing guo shang geng jia xing fu de sheng huo 
hai you da liang gong zuo yao zuo 
wo men yao qian xu jin shen 
jian ku fen dou 
gong tong pu xie wei da zu guo fa zhan de shi dai xin pian zhang 
xie xie da jia 
mei nian zhi shao wei lao nian ren mian fei ti jian yi ci 
guan yu jin yi bu jia qiang lao nian ren you dai gong zuo de yi jian 
yao qiu zheng fu he she hui zai zuo hao gong min she hui bao zhang he ji ben gong gong fu wu de ji chu shang 
yu deng fang mian 
ji ji wei lao nian ren ti gong ge zhong xing shi de jing ji bu tie 
you xian you hui he bian li fu wu 
bu duan ti sheng lao nian ren sheng huo zhi liang 
gong fen zong ti yao qiu 
you dai xiang mu he fan wei 
zu zhi shi shi san ge bu fen 
ti chu lao nian ren you dai gong zuo de zhu yao mu biao shi 
shi xian xian ji yi shang ren min zheng fu quan mian jian li jian quan lao nian ren you dai zheng ce 
she hui jing lao fen wei geng jia nong hou 
shi xian you dai gong zuo guan li jin yi bu gui fan 
you dai xiang mu jin yi bu tuo zhan 
you dai shui ping jin yi bu ti sheng 
lao nian ren guo shang geng jia xing fu de xiao kang sheng huo 
ge de ke yin di zhi yi 
ji chu shang he li que ding you dai dui xiang he you dai biao zhun 
shuai xian zai wei sheng bao jian 
jiao tong chu xing 
shang ye fu wu 
wen ti xiu xian deng fang mian 
dui chang zhu ben hang zheng qu yu nei de lao nian ren gei yu tong deng you dai 
bing gen ju ben di shi ji qing kuang 
zhu bu tuo zhan tong deng you dai fan wei 
cong zheng wu fu wu 
wei sheng bao jian 
jiao tong chu xing 
shang ye fu wu 
wen ti xiu xian 
wei quan fu wu deng fang mian dui lao nian ren you dai gong zuo ti chu yao qiu 
ru zai wei sheng bao jian you dai fang mian 
lao you bing can yun 
zai wen ti xiu xian you dai fang mian 
yao qiu ge ji ge lei bo wu guan 
gong gong tu shu guan 
wen hua guan deng gong gong wen hua fu wu she shi 
xiang lao nian ren mian fei kai fang deng 
yao jin yi bu fa hui xing zheng jian du he she hui jian du de zuo yong 
jian li jian quan xin xi fan kui he jian du ji zhi 
she li fu wu he jian du re xian 
yi fa tuo shan jie jue hao ju bao he tou su wen ti 
dui lao nian ren you dai gong zuo zhong fan ying qiang lie de tu chu wen ti 
yao jin zao fa xian 
ji shi jie jue 
dui bu an gui ding lv xing you dai lao nian ren yi wu de 
you you guan zhu guan bu men ze ling gai zheng 
xin wen bei jing 
lao nian ren you dai zheng ce de 
sui zhe ren kou lao ling hua ri qu jia kuai yi ji lao nian ren she hui bao zhang xu qiu de ti gao 
lao nian ren you dai zheng ce zai zhi xing zhong mian lin yi xie xin qing kuang he xin wen ti 
ge de you dai zheng ce sui pian hua wen ti tu chu 
guan yu jia qiang lao nian ren you dai gong zuo de yi jian 
ji yu di fang hen da zi you cai liang kong jian 
zao cheng ge de you dai zheng ce cha yi jiao da 
you dai zheng ce zai quan guo fan wei nei shi du tong yi de hu sheng ri yi gao zhang 
ling yi fang mian 
dui nong cun lao nian ren you dai wen ti guan zhu bu gou 
ji yu cheng xiang er yuan jie gou de cha yi he nong cun ji chu gong gong she shi de bu zu 
hen duo you dai xiang mu dui yu nong cun lao nian ren er yan xing tong xu she 
ji dai tong guo yan jiu zhi ding pei tao wan shan de you dai zheng ce jia yi gai shan 
cai zheng bu chang ji zhi que wei ye shi lao nian ren you dai zheng ce zai yi xie di fang nan yi luo shi de yuan yin zhi yi 
zhuan jia biao shi 
zheng fu qing ke 
qi ye mai dan 
de xian xiang guang fan cun zai 
yi ding cheng du shang zeng jia le qi ye yun ying cheng ben 
ying xiang le she hui can yu ti gong lao nian ren you dai xiang mu di ji ji xing 
ci ci fa bu de 
guan yu jin yi bu jia qiang lao nian ren you dai gong zuo de yi jian 
ji yu le bu chong he wan shan 
zhong ji wei wang zhan 
ju zhong yang ji wei wang zhan xiao xi 
zhong yang ji wei jia da dui wei fan zhong yang ba xiang gui ding jing shen dian xing wen ti de tong bao bao guang li du 
zai zhong yang ji wei jian cha bu wang zhan zhuan men kai she 
jie zhi mu qian 
shi ming tong bao yi cheng qu shi 
lan mu jin ri jin xing le gai ban 
jiang zhong yang ji wei 
yi ji xin jiang sheng chan jian she bing tuan 
zhong yang he guo jia ji guan ge bu wei ji jian zu 
bao kuo guo you qi shi ye dan wei 
guo you jin rong ji gou 
de tong bao fen lei xian shi 
wang min zhi yao dian ji xiang guan fen lei mu lu 
jiu ke yi cha kan gai fen lei tiao mu xia de tong bao qing kuang 
lan mu hai zai xian zhu wei zhi she zhi le 
huan ying ju bao 
huan ying guang da wang min ji xu ju bao ge lei wei fan zhong yang ba xiang gui ding jing shen yi ji 
fang mian de wen ti 
ye shi chun yun huo che piao quan mian kai shou de di si tian 
ji chun yun shou ri shou piao dui di san fang qiang piao cha jian jin xing ping bi hou 
shang wu you chu xin dong zuo 
jiang gu ding de yan zheng ma bian cheng le bu duan yao dong de dong tai yan zheng ma 
zhe yi sheng ji gei ke zi dong shi bie yan zheng ma de qiang piao cha jian zao cheng le bu xiao de ma fan 
qiang piao cheng gong lv jiang di 
yi qian qing xi 
gu ding de yan zheng ma bian cheng le zuo you yao bai de dong tai yan zheng ma 
shi bie cai neng zhun que shu ru 
bei qing bao ji zhe shi yan hou fa xian dong tai yan zheng ma xu yao zai liang ge huan jie shu ru 
yi ge zai deng lu shi 
ling yi ge shi zai che piao yu ding huan jie 
yu gu tai ma xiang bi 
dong tai yan zheng ma de shi bie que shi you xie kun nan 
er qie shu ru hai qu fen chu le da xiao xie 
shu ru su du que shi bi yi qian yao man shu miao zhong 
dong tai yan zheng ma tui chu hou 
bu fen wang you kai shi zai wang luo shang tu cao 
ta men fa xian shi yong 
zi dong tian xie yan zheng ma 
de qiang piao ruan jian kai shi bu hao yong 
ding piao cheng gong lv kai shi jiang di 
ta men ren wei chun yun qiang piao fen miao bi zheng 
dong tai yan zheng ma qi xing guai zhuang hui jiang di shu ru su du 
wang zhan wei shen me hui she zhi yan zheng ma de huan jie 
ta you shen me bi yao xing 
ye nei zhuan ye ren shi biao shi 
wang zhan she zhi yan zheng ma de chu zhong jiu shi wei le fang zhi ji qi zi dong hua gong ji 
yan zheng ma ke yi qu fen yong hu shi ji suan ji hai shi ren 
neng fang zhi e yi po jie mi ma 
lun tan guan shui 
yong yan zheng ma shi xian zai hen duo wang zhan tong xing de fang shi 
bi ru wang shang yin hang 
bai du she qu deng 
zuo dao xiang dui de gong ping 
xiang guan xin wen 
ji zhe cong zhi fu bao liao jie dao 
bao kuo wang zhan gai ban 
kai tong zhi fu bao fu kuan 
tui chu shou ji duan ying yong 
jin yi bu ti sheng le cheng ke gou piao 
fu kuan de bian jie xing 
wang luo gou piao zai ye bu yong ju ni yu ji jia yin hang huo shi shou xian yu zai xian zhi fu gong neng 
yi tai dian nao 
yi ge zhi fu bao zhang hao 
rang chun yun hui jia zhi lu ru tong wang luo gou wu ban fang bian 
zheng zhou shi wei shu ji wu tian jun zai zi zhu shou mai ji qian mai piao 
wu tian jun da cheng di tie jie shou cai fang 
zheng zhou dian shi tai 
zheng zhou xin wen 
yi ze xin wen cheng 
dang tian zao shang 
zheng zhou shi wei shu ji wu tian jun zai zheng dong xin qu kai wan hui hou 
lin shi jue ding cheng zuo di tie fan hui shi wei 
yu mi shu zai hui zhan zhong xin zhan zi zhu shou mai ji qian mai piao shi 
bei zheng zai cai fang de zheng zhou dian shi tai ji zhe ren chu 
wu tian jun zai di tie nei yu shi min jiao tan 
ting qu jian yi 
ta zai lv cheng guang chang zhan xia che 
ji zhe ou yu shi wei shu ji 
zai ci ri zao dao le wang luo yu lun zhi yi 
zhen de shi ou yu ma 
que ding bu shi an pai de
