ji zhe jiu ci shi cai fang she shi zheng zhou dian shi tai shi zheng pin dao ji zhe xu jin 
ta zai jie shou xin jing bao ji zhe cai fang shi cheng 
yu shi wei shu ji que shi shi ou yu 
dui yu wang you de zhi yi 
zhe ze xin wen jian li zai xin wen zhen shi xing ji chu zhi shang 
wan quan jing de qi jian yan de 
mei gei wo men da zhao hu 
zheng zhou gui dao jiao tong you xian gong si zong he bu yi ming han xing bu zhang cheng 
zhi qian bing bu zhi dao shi wei shu ji yao lai cheng zuo di tie 
zhi dao shi wei shu ji zai ti yan wan hou gei gai dan wei ling dao da dian hua 
cai zhi dao ci shi 
gen wo men ling dao da le dian hua 
shuo ta ti yan le yi xia di tie 
ju da he wang bao dao 
zheng zhou tu jiang bao yu 
shi ren zheng zhou shi dai shi zhang de wu tian jun chi jiao zhan zai yu shui zhong yong shou tao du zhu pai shui guan dao de shu ye 
dang shi zhe yi mu bei yi ming wang you pai dao 
shang chuan dao wang luo hou 
wu tian jun bei cheng zhi wei 
zui mei shen ying 
shu ji xi huan dao chu zou zou 
zheng zhou shi wei xuan chuan bu xin wen chu yi gong zuo ren yuan dui xin jing bao ji zhe biao shi 
shi wei shu ji xi huan dao chu zou zou 
ping shi ye hui qi zi xing che zai shi li guang guang 
dui yu wang you zhi yi de 
ta cheng ke neng you yu da jia bu liao jie 
zao cheng guo fen jie du 
you xun ju ren min wang dian ju zheng zhou shi wei gong zuo ren yuan jie shao 
xin nian cha hua hui zai wei yu zheng dong xin qu de zheng zhou guo ji hui zhan zhong xin ju xing 
ruo yao cheng che gan wang zheng zhou shi wei dang wai ren shi zuo tan hui hui chang 
wu tian jun dan xin lu shang dan wu shi jian tai jiu 
jue ding cheng zuo gang gang kai tong de zheng zhou shou tiao di tie 
shun bian ti yan yi xia yun xing qing kuang 
ting shi min yi jian 
gen fang hai bei shu ji xie jue 
ni dang tian de gong zuo an pai shi 
ti qian yi tian wo men xin wen bu jiu dui zhou yi dang tian de bao dao jin xing le ce hua 
dang tian wo men fen san lu ji zhe 
fen bie qu di tie 
san huan lu he shi qu zhu gan dao cai fang 
lai kan shou ri jiao tong he ke liu qing kuang 
wo bei fen qu di tie cai fang 
wo he she xiang ji zhe cong lv cheng guang chang zhan yan lu cai fang dao hui zhan zhong xin zhan 
zai hui zhan zhong xin zhan cai fang shi 
hu ran fa xian zai zi zhu shou mai ji qian mai piao de ren hen yan shu 
zi xi yi kan 
ju ran shi shi wei shu ji wu tian jun 
ou yu shu ji hou 
ni de fan ying shi shen me 
chu yu xin wen ren de zhi ye min gan 
wo ma shang gen zhe qu le 
dang shi hai wen le shu ji neng bu neng gen zhe cai fang 
dan shu ji xie jue le 
shuo ni men mang ba 
fan zheng wo men ye hai mei cai fang wan 
wo ye bu xiang cuo guo zhe ge xin wen 
jiu gen shang le che gen pai 
yi zhi dao ta xia che 
ran hou wo men ba gong zuo ji xu zuo wan hou 
hui qu xiang bu men zhu ren he zhi ban bian ji hui bao le 
ta men dou jue de hen bu cuo 
jiu fang dao le dang tian di tie de xi lie bao dao dang zhong 
wei shen me xuan ze le 
hen que qie de shi shi 
er qie wo shi cai jing ji zhe 
shi yi ge yue qian wei ying jie di tie bao dao er bei chou diao qu de 
ye bu shi zhuan men gen ling dao pao de shi zheng ji zhe 
dang tian shi wei shu ji jiu zai hui zhan zhong xin di tie zhan fu jin kai hui 
shi wei jiu zai lv cheng guang chang zhan 
gang hao di tie zhi da 
ta ye shi lin shi jue ding 
ben zu gao jian 
chu shu ming wai 
cai xie xin jing bao ji zhe yang feng 
ju xin hua she dian guang dong sheng qing yuan shi qing cheng qu zheng fu zuo ri dui wai fa bu xin xi cheng 
ri qian bei shi ming ju bao she xian le suo qi ye 
fen fen zhong ke yi gao kua yi jian chang 
de qing cheng qu huan bao ju ju zhang chen bai he 
yi bei mian qu qing cheng qu qu wei wei yuan 
qu huan bao ju dang zu shu ji 
ju zhang deng zhi wu bing li an diao cha 
ju bao chen bai he de lu yin 
nei rong shu shi 
you qing yuan shi min xiang gai shi qing cheng qu ji wei shi ming ju bao chen bai he wei ji 
bing ti gong yi duan dian hua lu yin 
cheng chen bai he xiang qi ta ren jiang shou ru he li yong shou zhong zhi quan lai qiao zha le suo xia qu qi ye 
chen bai he jie shou guang dong bu fen mei ti cai fang shi cheng 
dui ci shi li an diao cha 
bing yao qing xiang guan bu men tong guo ji shu shou duan dui lu yin de zhen shi xing jin xing jian ding 
qing cheng qu zheng fu wang zhan zuo ri fa bu 
guan yu qing cheng qu huan bao ju ju zhang chen bai he you guan wen ti de tong bao 
cheng jing diao cha qu zheng 
guan yu qun zhong shi ming ju bao chen bai he de dian hua lu yin nei rong shu shi 
chen bai he que you tan lun le yu qi shen fen bu xiang fu de yan lun 
tong shi fa xian chen bai he hai she xian qi ta wei ji wen ti 
zheng li he de guo ren luo bo te bei ya ru fa ting 
luo bo te mian dai xiao rong 
yi lian qing song 
yang cheng wan bao 
nan fang du shi bao 
yu de guo ji nan you luo bo te hun ji shen zhen fu hao quan 
ci an zai shen zhen zhong yuan yi shen xuan pan 
zhu fan zheng li he tong zha pian zui ming he wei zao ju min shen fen zheng zui ming cheng li 
shu zui bing fa zhi xing wu qi tu xing 
cong fan luo bo te fan he tong zha pian zui 
bing qu zhu chu jing 
zha pian jin bai wan mei yuan zuan shi 
shen zhen zhong yuan shen li cha ming 
wei shi shi zha pian huo dong 
bei gao ren zheng li 
shi yong lin yi de jia ming zi 
huo tong bei gao ren luo bo te 
huang cheng qi neng zai jing wai qu de zhu bao da e ding dan 
xian xiang bei hai ren lin mou cai gou shao liang jia zhi jiao di de zuan shi 
qu de lin mou de xin ren hou 
zai yao qi ti gong jia zhi jiao gao de zuan shi 
bei gao ren zheng li 
luo bo te yong qu de de gao jia zhi zuan shi xiang hong xing da gong si dian dang tao qu zi jin 
jiang tao qu de zi jin yi bu fen yong yu chao gu mou li 
yi bu fen yong yu gou mai di jia zhi de zuan shi jin xing jia gong xiao shou 
zhi zao qi jin xing zuan shi zhu bao mao yi de jia xiang 
hai jiang yi bu fen yong yu zhi fu dao qi de xiao e huo kuan 
pian qu lin mou xin ren ji xu ti gong zuan shi 
gong qi ji xu dian dang tao qu zi jin 
bei gao ren zheng li 
luo bo te tong guo shang shu shou fa 
pan jue shu hai xian shi zheng li wei xing shi zai tao ren yuan 
zheng li wei yan gai zhen shi shen fen 
shi yong fei fa qu de de xu jia hu ji shen fen 
huo tong bei gao ren luo bo te cai yong dui wai bian zao luo bo te wei guo wai da xing ji jin guan li ren 
de guo da jia zu ji cheng ren deng shen fen 
yi zhang kong ju e ji jin zai zhong guo kai zhan rong zi 
tou zi deng jin rong ye wu wei ming 
pian qu ta ren xin ren 
yi zai shen zhen shi kai she de liang jia tou zi gong si zuo wei zha pian zai ti 
xu gou xiang mu dui wai kai zhan he zuo tou zi 
dai wei li cai 
gou mai tu di deng ye wu 
xian hou pian qu bei hai ren zhang yong qian 
liu hai long deng ren de zi jin hou 
you tong guo chai dong qiang bu xi qiang de shou fa 
xiao bu fen yong yu zhi fu li xi 
da bu fen ze tong guo 
di xia qian zhuang 
ji qi zai jing nei wai kai she de gong si 
ge ren zhang hu jin xing duo ci zhuan yi 
jiang ta ren ju e zi jin fei fa zhan wei ji you 
fa yuan ren ding de shu e yu ci qian gong su ji guan qi su jin e you xie xu cha yi 
gai an shou hai ren duo shi shang jie ming ren 
bao kuo tai wan yi da tou zi you xian gong si dong shi zhang deng wen cong 
zong cai ji dang wei shu ji dong bing gen 
luo bo te shu cong fan huo qing pan 
zheng li chu sheng yu shang hai mou gang tie gong si zhong ceng jia ting 
da xue bi ye hou ceng zai mou yin hang wai hui bu gong zuo 
sui hou chuang ban le yi jia tou zi zi xun gong si 
duo ming zheng li fu qin de tong shi he qin qi zhao dao ta 
cheng zheng li bang ta men li cai 
na le ji bai wan shen zhi shang qian wan yuan jiu bu jian le 
shang hai jing fang kai shi wang shang zhui tao 
pan jue shu cheng 
zheng li xu jia ban li le ming wei 
bing fen bie wei zao le ju min shen fen zheng hao ma 
fa yuan jing shen li ren wei 
luo bo te yi fei fa zhan you wei mu di 
lv xing he tong guo cheng zhong pian qu dui fang dang shi ren de cai wu 
shu e te bie ju da 
xing wei jun yi gou cheng he tong zha pian zui 
zheng li wei zao ju min shen fen zheng 
qing jie yan zhong 
qi xing wei you yi gou cheng wei zao ju min shen fen zheng zui 
luo bo te cheng zi ji yu ci an wu guan 
qian tian fa yuan pan jue ren ding ta ye fan you he tong zha pian zui 
dan shou zheng li zhi shi can yu fan zui 
qi ci yao zuo yong 
shu yu cong fan 
fa yuan yu yi jian qing chu fa 
fa yuan ren ding zheng li zai gai an zhong shu yu zhu fan 
gen ju er bei gao ren can yu fan zui de ci shu 
she an jin e 
gui an hou de ren zui 
hui zui tai du deng ju ti qing jie 
gen ju xiang guan fa lv gui ding 
yi fa zuo chu le shang shu pan jue 
lai tai lv you shi fa bing 
mu qian reng zai jia hu bing fang zhi liao 
tai liu xing yi qing zhi hui zhong xin fu ze ren zhi chu 
bing ru zhu jia hu bing fang zhi jin 
zhi you huan zhe de liang ge nv er liu zai tai wan zhao gu fu qin 
liang ren jun wei chu xian zheng zhuang 
zhong guo zheng shi qi dong di san ci quan guo jing ji pu cha deng ji gong zuo 
guo wu yuan di san ci quan guo jing ji pu cha ling dao xiao zu fu zu zhang 
guo jia tong ji ju ju zhang ma jian tang shuo 
zhe ci jing ji pu cha shi he ping shi qi zui da de she hui dong yuan huo dong zhi yi 
tong shi you shi xin xi hua cheng du zui gao de yi ci jing ji pu cha 
zhe ci pu cha cai yong quan guo tong yi de dian zi di tu hua fen pu cha xiao qu 
yong shou chi dian zi zhong duan she bei dui qi ye jin xing kong jian ding wei 
dui gong shang deng ji 
shui wu deng ji 
zu zhi ji gou dai ma deng xiang guan zheng zhao jin xing pai she liu di 
tong shi lu ru xiang guan pu cha shu ju 
tong guo zhe ci pu cha 
bu jin ke yi mo qing quan guo di er 
san chan ye de jia di 
er qie ke yi you ci xing cheng quan guo tong yi de kong jian di li xin xi xi tong 
jing ji pu cha li guo li min li da jia 
pu cha cheng gong hai yao kao da jia 
xi wang guang da pu cha dui xiang neng gou yi zhao tong ji fa he jing ji pu cha tiao li de yao qiu 
ru shi tian bao pu cha shu ju 
suo you pu cha ji gou he pu cha ren yuan dou you yi wu wei pu cha dui xiang bao mi 
pu cha shu ju bu zuo wei ren he chu fa de yi ju 
ma jian tang hu yu bei diao cha dui xiang li jie 
zhi chi pu cha yuan de gong zuo 
ta hai qiang diao yao que bao jing ji pu cha shu ju zhi liang 
yan su cha chu nong xu zuo jia xing wei bing gong kai bao guang 
ji zhe cong guo jia tong ji ju liao jie dao 
di san ci quan guo jing ji pu cha gong zuo ren yuan ru hu deng ji shi 
hui pei dai tong yi de pu cha yuan zheng huo pu cha zhi dao yuan zheng 
shang mian you gong zuo ren yuan xing ming he pu cha ji gou gong zhang 
pu cha zhu yao nei rong bao kuo dan wei ji ben shu xing 
cong ye ren yuan 
cai wu zhuang kuang 
sheng chan jing ying qing kuang 
sheng chan neng li 
yuan cai liao he neng yuan ji zhu yao zi yuan xiao hao 
ke ji huo dong qing kuang deng 
zhong guo zheng shi qi dong di san ci quan guo jing ji pu cha deng ji gong zuo 
ge ren hai wai zi chan 
fu zhai zhuang kuang xu shen bao 
da xing you le she shi ling jian 
fa yuan cai pan wen shu quan mian shang wang jie shou gong zhong jian du 
ge ren hai wai zi chan xu shen bao 
cheng zhen pai shui yu wu shui chu li tiao li 
tie lu an quan guan li tiao li 
zui gao ren min fa yuan guan yu ren min fa yuan zai hu lian wang gong bu cai pan wen shu de gui ding 
xin xiu ding de 
guo ji shou zhi tong ji shen bao ban fa 
deng yi pi fa lv fa gui zheng shi shi shi 
you guo wu yuan zhi ding de 
tie lu an quan guan li tiao li 
jiang zi jin ri qi shi xing 
zai dong che zu lie che shang xi yan huo zhe zai qi ta lie che de jin yan qu yu xi yan 
jin zhi zai tie lu xian lu an quan bao hu qu nei shao huang 
fang yang sheng chu 
zhong zhi ying xiang tie lu xian lu an quan he xing che liao wang de shu mu deng zhi wu 
zai tie lu xian lu liang ce jian zao 
she li sheng chan 
chu cun huo zhe xiao shou yi ran 
yi bao huo zhe fang she xing wu pin deng wei xian wu pin de chang suo 
ying dang fu he guo jia biao zhun 
hang ye biao zhun gui ding de an quan fang hu ju li 
tie lu yun shu qi ye ying dang an zhao guo wu yuan tie lu hang ye jian du guan li bu men de gui ding shi shi huo che piao shi ming gou mai 
cha yan zhi du 
shi shi huo che piao shi ming gou mai 
cha yan zhi du de 
lv ke ying dang ping you xiao shen fen zheng jian gou piao cheng che 
dui che piao suo ji zai shen fen xin xi yu suo chi shen fen zheng jian huo zhe zhen shi shen fen bu fu de chi piao ren 
tie lu yun shu qi ye you quan ju jue qi jin zhan cheng che 
qiang diao jin zhi shi shi xia lie wei hai tie lu an quan de xing wei 
cong lie che shang pao reng za wu 
zai dong che zu lie che shang xi yan huo zhe zai qi ta lie che de jin yan qu yu xi yan 
zhan yong jin chu zhan tong dao huo zhe hou che qu 
wei fan gui ding de 
tie lu ji che che liang she ji zhi zao wei xiu jin kou xu ke ban fa 
tie lu yun shu ji chu she bei sheng chan qi ye shen pi ban fa 
tie lu ji che che liang jia shi ren yuan zi ge xu ke ban fa 
si jian pei tao gui zhang 
jiang yu jin ri qi yu 
tie lu an quan guan li tiao li 
tong bu shi xing 
tie lu xing zheng xu ke he xing zheng chu fa gong zuo jiang geng jia gui fan hua 
you guo wu yuan zhi ding de 
cheng zhen pai shui yu wu shui chu li tiao li 
jin ri qi shi xing 
cong shi gong ye 
yi liao deng huo dong de qi ye shi ye dan wei he ge ti gong shang hu yao pai fang wu shui 
bi xu qu de xu ke zheng 
bing dui wu shui jin xing yu chu li 
dui yu wei qu de xu ke zheng de pai wu zhe 
dui bao yu lai xi shi zai cheng shi 
zhe yi xin gui ye kai chu le 
yi fa sheng nei lao de cheng zhen yao gen ju cheng zhen ren kou yu gui mo 
bao yu nei lao feng xian deng yin su 
zhi ding nei lao fang zhi zhuan xiang gui hua 
yu ci tong shi 
hai ying bian zhi ying ji yu an 
jian li nei lao fang zhi yu jing 
lian dong ji zhi 
jia qiang yi lao dian zhi li 
dui xun jing shang ren wen ti 
ye ming que gui ding 
cheng zhen pai shui yu wu shui chu li she shi wei hu yun ying dan wei ying dang jia qiang ri chang xun cha 
wei xiu he yang hu 
jia qiang jing gai 
jian cha jing deng she shi de wei hu yu bao hu 
dui zai sheng shui de shi yong ye zuo chu le ming que gui ding 
ming que zhi chu 
guo jia gu li wu shui chu li zai sheng li yong 
gong ye sheng chan 
cheng shi lv hua 
dao lu qing sao 
che liang chong xi 
jian zhu shi gong yi ji sheng tai jing guan deng 
ying dang you xian shi yong zai sheng shui 
di fang zheng fu hai yao tong chou an pai zai sheng shui li yong deng she shi de jian she gai zao 
chu qin gui mo yang zhi wu ran fang zhi tiao li 
ye jiang zi jin ri qi shi xing 
jin zhi zai yin yong shui shui yuan bao hu qu 
feng jing ming sheng qu 
zi ran bao hu qu de he xin qu he huan chong qu 
cheng zhen ju min qu 
wen hua jiao yu ke xue yan jiu qu deng ren kou ji zhong qu yu ji fa lv 
fa gui gui ding de qi ta jin zhi yang zhi qu yu nei jian she chu qin yang zhi chang 
yang zhi xiao qu 
zai yin yong shui shui yuan bao hu qu jian she chu qin yang zhi chang 
yang zhi xiao qu de 
ran yi chu qin yi ji ran yi chu qin pai xie wu 
ran yi chu qin chan pin 
bing si huo zhe si yin bu ming de chu qin shi ti deng bing hai chu qin yang zhi fei qi wu 
ying dang jin xing shen mai 
fen shao deng wu hai hua chu li 
bu de sui yi chu zhi 
wei an zhao gui ding dui ran yi chu qin he bing hai chu qin yang zhi fei qi wu jin xing wu hai hua chu li de 
you dong wu wei sheng jian du ji gou ze ling wu hai hua chu li 
suo xu chu li fei yong you wei fa xing wei ren cheng dan 
fa yuan cai pan wen shu quan mian shang wang jie shou gong zhong jian du 
zai si fa ling yu 
zui gao ren min fa yuan guan yu ren min fa yuan zai hu lian wang gong bu cai pan wen shu de gui ding jiang yu jin ri qi shi shi 
fa yuan de sheng xiao cai pan wen shu ying dang zai hu lian wang gong bu 
dan you xia lie qing xing zhi yi de chu wai 
she ji guo jia mi mi 
ge ren yin si de 
she ji wei cheng nian ren wei fa fan zui de 
yi tiao jie fang shi jie an de 
qi ta bu yi zai hu lian wang gong bu de 
fa yuan zai hu lian wang gong bu cai pan wen shu shi 
ying dang bao liu dang shi ren de xing ming huo zhe ming cheng deng zhen shi xin xi 
ming que le jin xing ni ming chu li de san zhong qing kuang 
yi shi hun yin jia ting 
ji cheng jiu fen an jian zhong de dang shi ren ji qi fa ding dai li ren 
er shi xing shi an jian zhong bei hai ren ji qi fa ding dai li ren 
san shi bei pan chu san nian you qi tu xing yi xia xing fa yi ji mian yu xing shi chu fa 
qie bu shu yu lei fan huo zhe guan fan de bei gao ren 
dui zi ran ren de jia ting zhu zhi 
tong xun fang shi 
shen fen zheng hao ma 
yin hang zhang hao 
jian kang zhuang kuang deng ge ren xin xi 
wei cheng nian ren de xiang guan xin xi 
fa ren yi ji qi ta zu zhi de yin hang zhang hao 
shang ye mi mi yi ji qi ta bu yi gong kai de nei rong 
jin xing shan chu chu li 
chong fen bao hu xiang guan ge ren de he fa quan yi 
guo jia li yi he she hui gong gong li yi 
ge ren hai wai zi chan 
fu zhai zhuang kuang xu shen bao 
guo ji shou zhi tong ji shen bao ban fa 
jin xing xiu gai 
xiu gai hou de 
jin ri qi zheng shi shi shi 
xiu gai hou de 
guo ji shou zhi tong ji shen bao fan wei wei zhong guo ju min yu fei zhong guo ju min zhi jian fa sheng de yi qie jing ji jiao yi yi ji zhong guo ju min dui wai jin rong zi chan 
fu zhai zhuang kuang 
jiang zai zhong guo jing nei fa sheng jing ji jiao yi de fei zhong guo ju min ye na ru shen bao zhu ti fan wei 
ming que zhong guo ju min he zai zhong guo jing nei fa sheng jing ji jiao yi de fei zhong guo ju min jun you yi wu shen bao guo ji shou zhi xin xi 
guo jia wai hui guan li ju you guan fu ze ren hai biao shi 
wai hui ju jiang gen ju shi ji qing kuang 
ze ji zhi ding bing chu tai guan yu fei zhong guo ju min shen bao de ju ti yao qiu 
yong you dui wai jin rong zi chan 
fu zhai de zhong guo ju min ge ren 
ying dang an zhao guo jia wai hui guan li ju de gui ding shen bao qi dui wai jin rong zi chan 
fu zhai de you guan qing kuang 
xiang guan ji gou he ge ren ru wei an zhao gui ding jin xing guo ji shou zhi tong ji shen bao de 
you guo jia wai hui guan li ju huo qi fen zhi ju yi zhao 
zhong hua ren min gong he guo wai hui guan li tiao li 
di si shi ba tiao ji yu chu fa 
chu fa bao kuo 
you wai hui guan li ji guan ze ling gai zheng 
da xing you le she shi ling jian 
qu nian fa sheng de xi an qin ling huan le shi jie you le she shi shuai luo you ke shi jian 
bei jing xiang shan you ke cheng lan che zhui wang shi jian yin fa she hui guan zhu 
wei jia qiang da xing you le she shi an quan jian cha 
fang zhi he jian shao shi gu 
zhi jian zong ju ri qian chu tai le 
da xing you le she shi an quan jian cha gui ding 
jiang zi jin ri qi shi xing 
yun ying shi yong dan wei ying dang jia qiang ying jiu she bei 
ji jiu wu pin de cun fang he guan li 
dui jiu yuan ren yuan ding qi jin xing zhuan ye pei xun 
yun ying shi yong dan wei ying dang she zhi zhuan men de an quan guan li ji gou bing pei bei an quan guan li ren yuan 
huo zhe pei bei zhuan zhi de an quan guan li ren yuan 
bing bao zheng she bei yun ying qi jian 
da xing you le she shi fa sheng gu zhang 
yun ying shi yong dan wei ying dang li ji ting zhi shi yong 
bing an zhao you guan gui ding ji shi xiang xian ji yi shang di fang zhi liang ji shu jian du bu men bao gao 
dui yin she ji 
an zhuang yuan yin yin fa gu zhang 
cun zai zhi liang an quan wen ti yin huan de 
an zhuang dan wei ying dang dui tong lei xing she bei jin xing pai cha 
xiao chu yin huan 
da xing you le she shi yun ying shi yong dan wei she bei yun ying qi jian 
wu an quan guan li ren yuan zai gang de huo zhe wei ji shi geng huan chao guo she ji shi yong qi xian yao qiu de zhu yao shou li bu jian de 
yu yi jing gao 
mei guo ge zhou si wan duo xin fa gui xin nian sheng xiao 
gen ju quan mei zhou yi hui hui yi tong ji 
fa gui he jue yi 
zhe xie xin fa lv de nei rong wu hua ba men 
cong yun xu xiao shou da ma dao jin zhi wei cheng nian ren ri guang yu 
cong jin zhi xiao shou yu chi dao yun xu jin shi tai pan 
niu yue zhou de zhang fu zui da 
zhe liang ge zhou ye shi mu qian quan mei zui di gong zi zui gao de liang ge zhou 
teng xun xin wen zong he cheng shi wan bao bao dao 
jin zheng en fa biao xin nian jiang hua cheng chu jue zhang cheng ze you li dui wu tuan jie 
chao xian zui gao ling dao ren jin zheng en zai ping rang shi cha qian xian shao suo 
hu yu han chao ying ting zhi hu xiang fei bang he di hui 
ji ji ying zao you li yu gai shan han chao guan xi de huan jing 
hu yu han chao ying ting zhi hu xiang fei bang he di hui 
ji ji ying zao you li yu gai shan han chao guan xi de huan jing 
dui yu zhang cheng ze bei chu jue yi shi 
jin zheng en biao shi 
chao xian lao dong dang 
chu jue le fan dang zong pai fen zi 
zhe jin yi bu qiang hua le lao dong dang ge ming dui wu de yi xin tuan jie 
jin zheng en hai qiang diao 
chao xian jiang ji xu wei gai shan han chao guan xi er nu li 
bing dun cu han guo ye ying ji ji tui dong gai shan han chao guan xi 
jin zheng en jiu chao xian ban dao ju shi biao shi 
mei guo he han guo ju xing de 
dui chao qin lve zhan zheng yan xi 
dui ban dao ju shi gou cheng zhong da wei xie 
ru guo zai chao xian ban dao di qu zai ci bao fa zhan zheng 
zhe ke neng hui dai lai yi chang ke pa de he zai nan 
ling ju fa xin she bao dao 
jin zheng en zai jiang hua zhong shi yan yi qiang you li ju cuo di yu 
qin hai chao xian 
gen ju ping xuan jie guo 
tai feng zeng yu zhi zhe jiang yu yao 
yi pian wang yang 
quan qiu zui qiang tai feng 
zhong chuang fei lv bin 
lian xu bao yu zhi zhong ou jing li 
shi ji hong shui 
shang ban nian mei guo long juan feng 
zhi zai yin qi gong zhong dui qi xiang zai hai de guan zhu 
zeng qiang gong zhong de fang zai jian zai yi shi 
ti gao quan she hui fang yu qi xiang zai hai de neng li 
xin jing bao xun 
ji zhe deng qi 
jin zao zheng kai shuang yan 
yang guang da zai ni wo shen shang 
wen nuan liu zai da jia xin jian 
tai yang gong gong liang chu le yi ge wan mei de xiao rong 
shu ying ban bo 
bei feng fu mian 
fang fu you le chun tian qi xi 
yi jiu shi dong ri nuan yang 
yuan dan de zao chen 
yang guang can lan 
da qi tou ming du hen hao 
dan zhe bing fei li shi zhi zui 
bu zhi shi bei jing 
yang guang zai jin tian ye jiang zuo ke da bu fen di qu 
jin tian de kong qi zhi liang wei liang 
bi jiao shi he hu wai huo dong 
zhuan jia yu ji 
wei lai ji tian mei you ming xian de leng kong qi ying xiang bei jing 
bei jing shang kong shou dao pian bei qi liu kong zhi 
qi wen jiang huan man hui luo 
da qi tou ming du kai shi zhuan cha 
you da feng jiang wen tian qi 
ti xing da jia yao guan zhu lin jin de tian qi yu bao 
ji zhe cai wen qing 
tian gong zuo mei 
jin tian bei jing yang guang chong zu 
qi xiang zi liao xian shi 
ju chang nian de qi xiang zi liao tong ji 
ci qian you bao dao cheng bei jing jiang kai zhan ren gong xiao jian wu mai ke xue shi yan 
dui ci zhong guo qi xiang ju ying ji jian zai yu gong gong fu wu si fu si zhang wang zhi hua biao shi 
ren gong xiao chu wu mai de fang fa 
mu qian bu neng da mian ji tui guang he shi shi 
zhi neng dang zuo ke xue fang fa jin xing yan jiu 
pao dan xiao wu mai bing bu neng cong gen ben shang jie jue wen ti 
ji zhe mao lei 
di san jie hai nan dian nao 
xi yin le da liang de shi min qian wang can guan gou wu 
ji zhe cong zhu ban fang huo xi 
jin ri chuang xin dian nao cheng de ping jun xiao liang da dao ping ri de san dao si bei 
bi ji ben dian nao 
zhi neng shou ji deng da jiang 
ji zhe zai di san jie hai nan dian nao 
shou ji jiao yi hui xian chang kan dao 
ming zhu guang chang si wu lou ren qi bao peng 
zhong duo zhan xiao wei ren tou cuan dong 
chan pin cheng jiao liang ye bu duan shang sheng 
wei le rang xiao fei zhe geng jia shi hui de mai dao xin yi de shang pin 
ben ci jiao yi hui te tui chu le 
xian shi xian liang qiang gou 
ye jiu shi shuo 
zhe ji ge shi jian duan gou wu 
jiu neng xiang shou dao chao di de jia ge 
zhen de hen shi hui 
jiao yi hui xiang guan fu ze ren shuo 
zi ben jie jiao yi hui kai mu yi lai 
zheng ti xiao liang da dao ping ri de san dao si bei 
ling bu shao shang jia xi xiao yan kai 
er shang jia qie shi gei chu de shi hui 
ye rang zhong duo gou mai dao xin yi chan pin de xiao fei zhe gan dao gao xing 
ye shou dao le guang da shi min de re peng ma 
ben ci di san jie hai nan dian nao 
xi wang geng duo de shi min can yu qi zhong 
ying qu xin yi de jiang pin 
huo dong xiang qing 
zai yuan dan jie lai lin zhi ji 
ren min wang hai nan shi chuang wei da xie xin guan zhu wei xin de du zhe 
jiang wei wang you zeng fa chuang xin shu dian shu ka ruo gan 
huo dong di dian 
hai kou ming zhu guang chang chuang xin dian nao cheng 
huo dong shi jian 
huo dong gui ze 
ke dao chou jiang chu 
mian fei can yu chou jiang yi ci 
bi ji ben dian nao deng da jiang deng zhe nin 
xu yao zhu yi de shi 
mei ge wei xin hao zhi xian ling qu yi ci 
huo dong qi jian 
chuang xin shu dian quan chang tu shu 
wei xin lao gu ke zuo yi wu dian nao shou ji jian ce 
zhi jie sou suo 
ren min wang hai nan shi chuang 
yao qing hao you yi qi guan zhu ren min wang hai nan shi chuang wei xin ping tai 
jiang you ji hui huo de 
qi che deng jiang pin 
huan ying shi chang guan zhu wo men de zui xin xiao xi 
can yu wo men de hu dong hua ti tao lun ying qu hua fei 
liao jie geng duo 
qing jia ren min wang hai nan shi chuang wei xin 
ji zhe mao lei 
ren min wang hai nan shi chuang 
dian tai zheng shi zai hai kou guang bo dian shi tai 
biao zhi zhe ren min wang hai nan shi chuang quan mei ti zhan lve bu ju yi jing xing cheng 
ren min wang hai nan shi chuang shi guo jia zhong dian xin wen wang zhan ren min wang zhu qiong ji gou 
shi hai nan zui ju quan wei xing he ying xiang li de zhu liu xin wen wang luo mei ti zhi yi 
ye shi quan guo nai zhi quan qiu liao jie hai nan de zhong yao chuang kou 
jing guo duo nian fa zhan 
mu qian ren min wang hai nan shi chuang yi jing xing cheng yi wang luo 
wei xing zhi bo 
ren min dian shi 
hai nan shi chuang 
ren min wei xin 
ren min wei bo 
ren min yu qing deng wei zai ti de duo mei ti xin wen zhong xin 
fu gai dao nei wai zhong gao deng shou ru zhe 
hai kou guang bo dian shi tai shi hai nan zui ju jing zheng li de di shi ji zhu liu mei ti 
shi hai nan guo ji lv you dao zhong xin cheng shi zhu yao mei ti 
tai nei zong zhi bo jian 
jiao tong zhi bo jian 
gang kou zhi bo jian 
shang bang bai hui cheng hu wai tou ming zhi bo jian 
shi chang ying xiang li kuai su ti sheng 
yi cheng wei hai nan guang bo mei ti de jiao jiao zhe 
ren min wang hai nan shi chuang 
shi chuang tian xia 
gai jie mu bing cheng ren min wang hai nan shi chuang ping min shi jiao feng ge 
yong lao bai xing ting de dong de yu yan jiang shu lao bai xing zi ji de gu shi 
wei xuan chuan hai nan guo ji lv you dao zuo chu zi ji ying you de gong xian 
dian tai jing cai jie mu 
hai nan xin wen tui jian 
hai nan sheng ji wei gong bu wei fan zhong yang ba xiang gui ding wen ti ju bao fang shi 
san sha cheng li zhao biao cai gou zhong xin gui fan zheng fu cai gou xing wei 
hai kou cheng guan yin da can ji ren bei wei gong ? hui ying cheng you ren ce hua 
guo ji dang dai yi shu zhan hua yu qing nian jiang jie xiao hai nan yi shu jia huo jiang 
san ya hai yun ji tuan yu zhong guo yin hang hai nan sheng fen hang zai san ya hai yun du jia jiu dian qian shu zhan lve he zuo xie yi 
zhong guo yin hang jiang wei san ya hai yun ji tuan ti gong bao kuo cun dai kuan 
hai wai ye wu deng zai nei de zong he jin rong fu wu 
zhi chi san ya hai yun ji tuan de 
hai yun chan ye ban kuai sheng ji ban ling wen quan liao yang du jia xiang mu ling xian 
jing guo shi yu nian fa zhan 
san ya hai yun ji tuan yi xing cheng fang di chan ye 
lv you fu wu ye 
zi ben yun zuo he shang ye wu da chan ye ban kuai 
qi ye sheng ji 
chan ye sheng ji 
fa zhan sheng ji 
de quan xin fa zhan jie duan 
chan ye qu yu ye you san ya lv you cheng tuo zhan dao da san ya lv you quan 
zai zhan lve he zuo xie yi qian shu yi shi shang 
san ya hai yun ji tuan dong shi zhang chen xian qing tou lu 
gai ji tuan fang di chan ban kuai zhong de ban ling wen quan liao yang du jia xiang mu shi hai nan sheng ji san ya shi zhong dian xiang mu 
gai xiang mu wei yu san ya shi ban ling shui ku xia you 
shi san ya shi lv you chan ye bu ju cong hai an dai kai fa xiang bei bu shan qu kai fa de biao zhi xing xiang mu zhi yi 
hai nan di yi jia bai nian yin hang 
shi zhong guo yin hang zui zao de fen zhi ji gou zhi yi 
lei ji tou fang dai kuan qian yi yuan 
han gai le ji chu she shi 
xin xing gong ye 
guo min jing ji zhong dian ling yu 
xian hou bei hai nan sheng zheng fu ji xiang guan zhi neng bu men shou yu hai nan sheng qi ye she hui ze ren shi da kai mo 
shi hai nan sheng wei yi yi jia lian xu liu nian huo sheng zheng fu biao zhang de jin rong ji gou 
hai nan zhong hang hai bei hai nan sheng zheng fu zhi ding wei hai nan li an jin rong ye wu wei yi yi jia shi dian yin hang 
zhong guo yin hang hai nan sheng fen hang xing zhang wang yi lin tou lu 
gai fen hang jing li run zeng zhang he fei li xi shou ru zeng zhang zai zhong guo yin hang xi tong jun pai ming di yi 
zai hai nan si da xing zhong yong you ji qiang de shi chang jing zheng neng li 
wang yi lin cheng 
san ya hai yun ji tuan zai hai nan fang chan 
lv you fu wu deng ling yu de liang hao fa zhan tai shi you mu gong du 
pin kun zhu xue deng she hui gong yi shi ye 
chong fen zhan shi chu san ya hai yun ji tuan shi zhui qiu cheng zhang 
you she hui ze ren gan de min ying ji tuan qi ye 
jin tian shang wu 
shang wan ming shi min can jia 
xia men ma la song jiang ming qiang qi pao 
zai xin nian de qian liang tian 
he fei chang pao ai hao zhe zai liang di ang shou fei ben 
yong xing dong hu yu ma la song sai de dao lai 
sheng huo zhong zong you yi xie jian chi rang wo men gan dong 
nuan yang gao zhao 
du jiang zhan yi ji nian guan guang chang ren tou cuan dong 
yong dong zhe nong nong de jian shen ji qing 
yi cheng wei an hui wei yi 
quan guo shao jian de 
ban ge shi ji de da xing qun ti huo dong 
ben jie yuan dan yue ye sai ji ying xin nian jian shen zou huo dong qi dian he zhong dian jun she zai chao hu an bian de du jiang zhan yi ji nian guan bei guang chang 
qi zhong jian shen zou 
bu fen xing bie 
nian ling zu bie 
fen yue ye sai xiao xue sheng nan nv zu 
zhong xue sheng nan nv zu 
jin nian huo dong de zui da liang dian jiu shi shou ci yi shi bin hu ju xing 
cong zhi qian de 
dao jin tian de 
lao pin pai huo dong de ang yang fen jin jing shen yu he fei da hu ming cheng de xin jian she si lu jin mi jie he 
rang yuan dan yue ye sai huan fa xin mei li 
ye yu shi zhe he fei zai xian dai hua jian she zhong da bu fei ben 
mai jin xin shi dai 
xin qi dai re xin ren shi wei ma la song jian yan xian ce 
zai he fei shang wan jian shen ai hao zhe zai chao hu zhi bin ben pao de tong shi 
he fei pao you wei pu long tong guo dian hua gao su ji zhe 
ta men te bie xiang zai jia men kou pao ma la song 
wei pu long xiang ji zhe jie shao shuo 
cheng wei quan guo nai zhi ya zhou gui mo zui da de ma la song sai shi 
he fei pao you jiang fa hui zheng neng liang jue zhu gai xiang sai shi 
ba he fei shi min de jing shen mian mao zai zhe ci bi sai zhong zhan xian chu lai 
xi wang he fei zai xin de yi nian nei ju ban zi ji de ma la song sai shi 
zhe xie pao you de yuan wang dai biao le yi zhong xin sheng 
ji zhuo li da zao 
da hu ming cheng 
chuang xin gao di 
de he fei xu yao yi ge ju you guang fan ying xiang li de ti yu pin pai huo dong lai tui guang xing xiang 
er ma la song sai shi wu yi shi shang jia de xuan ze zhi yi 
sheng tian jing you yong yun dong guan li zhong xin zhu ren qiang wu ren wei 
he fei zao jiu ying gai ju ban ma la song sai shi le 
ta hai ren wei 
he fei ju ban ma la song de zui jia xian lu shi chang jiang lu 
ma la song de sai dao yi ban dou xuan ze cheng shi zhu gan dao 
dang he fei yuan dan yue ye sai bu ru 
zhong guo tian jing xie hui yi jing jiang he fei lie wei le ming nian xin zeng de guo ji ma la song ju ban de zhi yi 
er xian zai shi ti yu ju ye jiang xiang guan shen qing ti jiao zhi shi zheng fu 
pao you luo yun gao su ji zhe 
he fei you si wu shi ming ma la song ai hao zhe 
yi nian yao zai wai mian can jia liu qi chang ma la song sai 
ta men fei chang xiang zai he fei pao shang ma la song sai 
ji zhe li jing peng wen niu guo liang she 
ren min wang hua sheng dun 
ji zhe li bo ya 
dui an bei ci ju biao shi qiang lie zhi yi 
hua qiao hua ren ji xu dui an bei yu yi qiang lie kang yi he qian ze 
an bei can bai jing guo shen she jiang ji hua ri ben yu lin guo de jin zhang guan xi 
mei guo dui ci biao shi shi wang 
mei fang xi wang ri ben yu qi lin guo neng zhao dao jian she xing de fang fa lai chu li min gan wen ti 
gai shan guan xi bing jia qiang he zuo 
tui dong shi xian gai di qu de gong tong mu biao 
an bei de can bai shi bu bi yao de 
shi yi zhong duan shi de xing wei 
mei ge guo jia dou ying gai yi 
zhi you zai zheng shi li shi ji chu shang 
ge guo cai neng gong tong gou jian wei lai 
sai bei te shuo 
zhe shi de guo de xin nian 
zai wo kan lai 
zhe shi yong yu suo you guo jia 
zuo wei er zhan zhan bai guo 
de guo zhan hou jin xing le shen ke fan xing yu jian tao 
jian jue yu cuo wu li shi hua qing jie xian 
yin ci de dao guo ji she hui ken ding 
de guo ling dao ren ceng duo ci biao shi chan hui 
bing cheng nuo dui na cui zui xing cheng dan 
yong jiu ze ren 
xin jia po dui an bei can bai jing guo shen she gan dao 
zhe zhong can bai xing wei wu yi yu jie kai jiu shang ba 
wu yi yu jian li ben di qu de hu xin 
zai ben di qu ju shi jin lai qu yu jin zhang de bei jing xia 
an bei xuan ze can bai jing guo shen she 
wu yi hui jia ju ben di qu jin zhang ju shi 
mei guo zhong guo he ping tong yi cu jin hui lian meng ri qian zai luo shan ji ju xing zuo tan hui 
dui an bei can bai jing guo shen she yu yi qiang lie kang yi he qian ze 
gai zu zhi lun zhi zhu xi fan yun fu biao shi 
an bei can bai jing guo shen she shi dui ri ben jun guo zhu yi fa dong qin lve zhan zheng de gong ran mei hua 
wang tu dian fu guo ji she hui dui ri ben jun guo zhu yi de zheng yi shen pan 
zhe yi xing jing cu bao jian ta le bao kuo zhong guo zai nei de guang da ya zhou zhan zheng shou hai guo ren min de gan qing 
tiao zhan le li shi zheng yi he ren lei liang zhi 
fu zhu xi zhou de zhao biao shi 
an bei bai gui fan ying chu ri ben you yi jin nian lai fu huo jun guo zhu yi de qing xiang tai tou 
bi xu yin qi yi qie ai hao he ping ren min de gao du jing jue 
ji zhe ni guang hui 
can jia wei yun shu xu li ya hua xue wu qi chuan zhi hu hang ren wu de zhong guo hai jun jian ting yi qi hang fu di zhong hai ji jie 
zhong guo hai jun di shi liu pi hu hang bian dui dao dan hu wei jian yan cheng jian jie shu xiu zheng bu ji 
cong sha te ji da gang qi hang 
fu di zhong hai zhi xing wei yun shu xu li ya hua xue wu qi chuan zhi hu hang ren wu 
xu hua wu jiang you xu guo nei zhuan yun zhi mei guo hua xue wu qi xiao hui chuan jin xing xiao hui 
nuo wei deng guo jiang fen bie pai chu jun jian wei yun shu xu hua wu chuan zhi hu hang 
yan cheng jian di da sai pu lu si li ma suo er gang hou 
jiang yu qi ta guo jia jian ting hui he bing kai zhan zhen dui xing zhun bei gong zuo 
er hou jiang gen ju xiao hui xu hua wu gong zuo jin cheng zhan kai hu hang xing dong 
ge lei nuo bu er da xue zhong xin yi yuan zuo ri wei shu ma he jin xing le di er ci shou shu 
yuan fang di yi shi jian gong bu le 
de zui xin bing qing 
cheng er ci shou shu shi wei le yi chu nao bu xue kuai 
shou shu hou qing kuang you suo hao zhuan 
lu nei ya li de dao huan jie 
dan yuan fang biao shi 
mu qian reng wei tuo xian 
hai zai hun mi 
shu ma he de zhu zhi yi shi pei en jiao shou zai fa bu hui shang shuo 
wo men yi zhi mei you jian shao zhi liao 
dan ta reng ran hun mi 
xian zai yi jin ru geng guan jian de jie duan 
dan bu neng gao su ni jiang lai hui zen yang 
pei en qiang diao 
bu hui bei zhuan yi dao de guo zhi liao 
wo men ren wei shu ma he xian zai ying gai liu zai zhe li 
zai ta de jia ren zuo chu zui zhong jue ding zhi qian 
wo men hui gao su ta men yi qie de 
zhi de yi ti de shi 
shu ma he de jing ji ren ken mu zuo ri dui de guo 
fa sheng yi wai bing fei gao su hua xue suo zhi 
er shi wei le bang yi wei tong ban 
shu ma he de yi wai yu gao su hua xing wu guan 
er shi xiang yao bang zhu yi wei shuai dao de tong ban shi 
cong yi kuai yan shi shang hua guo 
shi qu le ping heng 
zhuang dao ling yi kuai yan shi shang 
dan zhi yi hui jian 
shi ba jie san zhong quan hui ming que guo qi gai ge fang xiang he zheng ce 
shang hai ri qian chu tai xin yi lun guo zi guo qi gai ge fang an 
fa zhan hun he suo you zhi deng duo xiang ju ti cuo shi bei shou guan zhu 
guo qi gai ge jiang zai shang xin zheng cheng 
shi ba jie san zhong quan hui li tui guo qi gai ge fa zhan hun he suo you zhi 
xin yi lun guo zi guo qi gai ge chui xiang hao jiao 
zhong gong shi ba jie san zhong quan hui gong bu de 
zhong gong zhong yang guan yu quan mian shen hua gai ge ruo gan zhong da wen ti de jue ding 
dui guo you zi ben he guo you qi ye gai ge zuo chu ming que gui ding 
ji ji fa zhan hun he suo you zhi jing ji 
guo you zi ben 
ji ti zi ben 
fei gong you zi ben deng jiao cha chi gu 
xiang hu rong he de hun he suo you zhi jing ji 
shi ji ben jing ji zhi du de zhong yao shi xian xing shi 
yun xu geng duo guo you jing ji he qi ta suo you zhi jing ji fa zhan cheng wei hun he suo you zhi jing ji deng deng 
guo qi gai ge de zhong dian zai fa zhan hun he suo you zhi jing ji 
wan shan xian dai qi ye zhi du 
tui dong guo you qi ye ke xue fa zhan 
ti gao fa zhan de zhi liang he xiao lv 
guo zi wei zhuan jia zu cheng yuan 
guo jia xing zheng xue yuan jiao shou zhang chun xiao ci qian zai jie shou ji zhe cai fang shi ye biao shi 
chu le guo jia zhan lve xian zhi de 
guan xi guo ji min sheng 
guo jia an quan 
zhong yao de ji chu she shi huo zhe zi ran zi yuan te shu hang ye zhi wai 
ren he guo you jing ji she zu de hang ye he ling yu 
fei gong jing ji dou ke yi jin ru 
san zhong quan hui zhi chu yao wan shan guo you zi chan guan li ti zhi 
yi guan zi ben wei zhu jia qiang guo you zi chan jian guan 
gai ge guo you zi ben shou quan jing ying ti zhi 
zu jian ruo gan guo you zi ben yun ying gong si 
zhi chi you tiao jian de guo you qi ye gai zu wei guo you zi ben tou zi gong si 
mu qian guo zi wei zheng zhua jin zhi ding yun ying he gai jian guo you zi ben tou zi yun ying gong si ju ti cuo shi 
xia yi bu jiang xian cong zhong yang qi ye ji tuan zhong xuan qu 
lai jin xing gai zu guo you zi ben yun ying gong si 
mei ti bao dao cheng 
fang an cheng shu hou jiang hui jin kuai gong bu 
ci wai gai ge ju cuo zhong 
hai ti dao ti gao guo you zi ben shou yi shang jiao gong gong cai zheng bi li 
geng duo yong yu bao zhang he gai shan min sheng 
zhuan jia men yu ji 
zhe yi bi li wei lai cun zai ti gao de ke neng 
xin yi lun gai ge shang hai shuai xian 
fen lei jian guan bi mian yi dao qie 
jiu zai san zhong quan hui jie shu bu jiu 
guo qi gai ge di yi qiang da xiang 
shang hai gong bu le 
guan yu jin yi bu shen hua shang hai guo zi gai ge cu jin qi ye fa zhan de yi jian 
shang hai cheng wei xin yi lun guo zi guo qi gai ge shou ge chi pang xie de sheng shi 
gong bu qian ji tian 
lan sheng gu fen kong gu gu dong shang hai lan sheng ji tuan yu shang hai dong hao ji tuan shi shi lian he chong zu 
ling pao shang hai guo zi zheng he 
shang hai xin yi lun guo zi guo qi gai ge 
shang hai shi wei shu ji han zheng zai shang hai shi shen hua guo zi gai ge cu jin qi ye fa zhan gong zuo hui yi shang biao shi 
guo zi guo qi shi shang hai fa zhan de zui da cun liang zi yuan 
xin yi lun guo zi guo qi gai ge 
he xin shi yi guo zi gai ge dai dong guo qi gai ge 
guan jian huan jie shi tong yi guan li 
fen lei jian guan 
bei jing shi fan da xue jing ji xue yuan fu yuan zhang gao ming hua biao shi 
shang hai guo qi gai ge ming que le guo qi gong neng ding wei he fen lei jian guan 
jiang guo qi fen wei jing zheng lei 
gong neng lei he gong yi lei 
zhe shi yi ge hen da de jin bu 
gong yi xing ling yu ying gai yao wan quan guo you 
bi mian qi sun hai bai xing fu li 
jing zheng xing ling yu yao quan bu fang kai 
ye you zhuan jia fen xi 
guo qi fen lei jian guan shi wei le zeng qiang guo zi jian guan de zhen dui xing 
zai gong si zhi li he ren cai guan li shang 
shang hai guo qi gai ge zhu jian qiang hua shi chang hua 
dang wei shu ji bu neng yi jian tiao 
er qie ming que 
guo qi gai ge xin zheng cheng shang 
shang hai bu shi 
yi ge ren zai zhan dou 
duo ge guo zi da sheng dou zai yun niang xin yi lun guo zi guo qi gai ge fang an 
mu qian guang dong sheng guo zi wei yi zai yan jiu chu tai xiang guan de guo zi gai ge zhi dao yi jian 
qi zhong yi ge zhi de guan zhu de zhong dian shi ji ji fa zhan hun he suo you zhi jing ji 
ling you xiao xi cheng 
shen zhen guo zi wei mu qian yi jing xiu ding wan cheng xin de guo zi jian guan zhi du 
zi shi ba jie san zhong quan hui ding diao guo zi gai ge zhi hou 
shan dong sheng ye yi kai shi cao ni xin yi lun guo zi gai ge fang an 
chong qing guo zi gai ge fang an yi shang bao shi zheng fu gao ceng 
wu xi ze ti chu gou jian yi ge tong chou jing ying de ti xi 
ni jiang chan ye xiang jin he ye wu lei si de zi yuan jin xing zheng he 
gan su sheng sheng zhang liu wei ping biao shi 
zai shen hua guo you qi ye gai ge 
da li fa zhan fei gong you zhi jing ji shang you suo tu po 
ji zhong jing li jie jue hao guo you qi ye tong guo gai ge zuo da zuo qiang 
yao zai fa zhan hun he suo you zhi 
wan shan fa ren zhi li jie gou he guo you zi chan guan li ti zhi deng fang mian da dan chuang xin 
huang shu he biao shi 
ge de dui guo zi guo qi gai ge jin xing shen ru yan jiu 
zhua jin ti chu luo shi cuo shi 
guo zi wei dou shi gu li he zhi chi de 
ge de chu tai ju ti luo shi cuo shi yao gen ju san zhong quan hui de jing shen he jin mi jie he dang di de shi ji 
fen xi ren shi ren wei 
shi ba jie san zhong quan hui hou 
di fang zheng fu jiang cong zhi qian de 
zeng zhang jing sai 
gai ge jing sai 
di fang guo zi guo qi jiang cheng wei gai ge jing sai zhong yao zu cheng bu fen 
jin guan cun zai zhu duo zheng yi he zhi yi 
zhong guo guo qi gai ge cong wei zhi bu 
bu guan shi guan yuan hai shi zhuan jia xue zhe 
dou zai wei guo qi gai ge jian yan xian ce 
guo zi wei yuan zhu ren li rong rong biao shi 
guo you qi ye gai ge fa zhan da ti jing li le san ge jie duan 
cong gai ge kai fang chu qi dao shi si jie san zhong quan hui de kuo da jing ying zi zhu quan jie duan 
cong shi si jie san zhong quan hui dao shi liu da qian de zhi du chuang xin he jie gou tiao zheng jie duan 
shi liu da wei kai duan yi guo you zi chan guan li ti zhi gai ge tui dong guo you qi ye gai ge fa zhan jie duan 
guo qi gai ge ban sui zhe hen duo zheng yi he zhi yi 
guo qi shi fou cun zai long duan de wen ti 
zhu ming jing ji xue jia wu jing lian ren wei guo qi cun zai long duan bing ying gai gai ge 
bei jing da xue guang hua guan li xue yuan ming yu yuan zhang li yi ning ye biao shi 
guo qi de hang ye long duan shi zu ai qi chuang xin de zhong yao yin su 
wu jing lian yu jing ji xue jia liu guo guang deng ren ye ceng jiu guo qi shi fou di xiao de wen ti jin xing ji lie bian lun 
er zhi yi guo qi gai ge de ze shi 
he guo you zi chan liu shi gu lv 
lang gu zhi zheng 
zheng yi bing mei you zu zhi guo qi gai ge de jiao bu 
mu qian zhong yang qi ye ji qi zi qi ye yin ru fei gong zi ben xing cheng hun he suo you zhi qi ye 
guo zi wei fu zhu ren huang shu he ceng biao shi 
wei lai guo you zi ben bu xu yao kong zhi ke yi you she hui zi ben kong gu de guo you qi ye 
guo you zi ben ke yi quan bu tui chu 
guo qi gai ge yao zai ji ji fa zhan hun he suo you zhi jing ji 
wan shan xian dai qi ye zhi du he wan shan guo you zi chan guan li ti zhi shang xia gong fu 
guo zi guo qi gai ge shi yi chang gong jian zhan 
bu yao pa de zui ren 
bu yao hui bi wen ti he kun nan 
shi ba jie san zhong quan hui zhi hou 
guo qi gai ge geng shi jin ru shen shui qu 
you yan jiu ji gou zhe yang xing rong xin shi qi de guo qi gai ge 
lai tai lv you shi fa bing 
mu qian reng zai jia hu bing fang zhi liao 
tai liu xing yi qing zhi hui zhong xin fu ze ren zhi chu 
bing ru zhu jia hu bing fang zhi jin 
liang ren jun wei chu xian zheng zhuang 
ji zhe cha wen ye he zi li 
dong wu yuan tian e kou liang bei ma que qiang shi zhi yin chi dong xi zi shi you ya 
shi min xu xian sheng zai nan jing hong shan dong wu yuan you wan shi 
kan jian mi mi ma ma de ma que 
yu tian e zheng shi you qu de yi mu 
ji zhe zai xian chang fa xian 
hong shan dong wu yuan tian e 
you shi ji ping fang mi de mian ji 
zhou wei zhang zhe lu wei he yi ke da shu 
hai you yi ge xiao wu 
ji zhi cheng nian tian e shai tai yang 
er san zhi you zai tian e chi zhe dao gu 
shu bai zhi ma que pan ju tian e di pan yu ta men 
ji ji zha zha jiao ge bu ting 
ting dao jiao bu sheng 
ma que hua ran fei li 
you de luo zai shu zhi shang 
xiao wu ding shang guan wang 
ju si yang yuan cheng 
zhi yin tian e chi dong xi zi shi tai you ya 
suo yi ma que cai feng yong er shang qiang shi de 
tong xun yuan xu fu geng 
yang zi wan bao ji zhe fan xiao lin she 
xin nian qian xi 
guo jia zhu xi xi jin ping tong guo zhong guo guo ji guang bo dian tai 
zhong yang ren min guang bo dian tai 
zhong yang dian shi tai fa biao er ling yi si nian xin nian he ci 
xin hua she ji zhe lan hong guang she 
xin nian qian xi 
guo jia zhu xi xi jin ping tong guo zhong guo guo ji guang bo dian tai 
zhong yang ren min guang bo dian tai 
zhong yang dian shi tai 
quan wen ru xia 
yi yuan fu shi 
wan xiang geng xin 
wo xiang quan guo ge zu ren min 
xiang xiang gang te bie xing zheng qu tong bao he ao men te bie xing zheng qu tong bao 
xiang tai wan tong bao he hai wai qiao bao 
xiang shi jie ge guo he ge di qu de peng you men 
zhi yi xin nian de zhu fu 
zhu fu lao ren men jian kang 
zhu fu hai zi men kuai le 
zhu fu mei ge jia ting xing fu an kang 
zai zhe ci jiu ying xin zhi ji 
wu shu gong ren 
zhi shi fen zi 
gan bu reng ran jian shou zai gong zuo gang wei 
bu shao tong bao yi ran ben bo zai shi jie ge de wei zu guo xin qin gong zuo 
xu duo ren min jie fang jun he wu jing guan bing 
gong an gan jing zheng zai lv xing guang rong shi ming 
ta men you de yuan li zu guo 
yuan li qin ren 
you de bu neng tong jia ren tuan ju 
wo dai biao zu guo he ren min 
xiang ta men zhi yi cheng zhi de wen hou 
zhu ta men ping an shun li 
dui wo men guo jia he ren min lai shuo shi hen bu ping fan de yi nian 
wo men gong tong zhan sheng le ge zhong kun nan he tiao zhan 
qu de le xin de xian zhu cheng jiu 
cheng ji lai zhi bu yi 
ning ju le da jia de xin xue he han shui 
wo xiang da jia biao shi zhong xin de gan xie 
wo men dui quan mian shen hua gai ge zuo chu zong ti bu shu 
gong tong miao hui le wei lai fa zhan de hong wei lan tu 
wo men jiang zai gai ge de dao lu shang mai chu xin de bu fa 
wo men tui jin gai ge de gen ben mu di 
shi yao rang guo jia bian de geng jia fu qiang 
rang she hui bian de geng jia gong ping zheng yi 
gai ge shi xu yao wo men gong tong wei zhi fen dou de wei da shi ye 
xu yao fu chu jian xin de nu li 
yi fen geng yun 
yi fen shou huo 
zai gai ge kai fang de wei da shi jian zhong 
wo men yi jing chuang zao liao wu shu hui huang 
zhong guo ren min bi jiang chuang zao chu xin de hui huang 
yu zhou hao han 
xing han can lan 
ying gai shou wang xiang zhu 
tong zhou gong ji 
gong tong fa zhan 
zhong guo ren min zhui xun shi xian zhong hua min zu wei da fu xing de zhong guo meng 
ye zhu yuan ge guo ren min neng gou shi xian zi ji de meng xiang 
wo zhen cheng xi wang 
shi jie ge guo ren min zai shi xian ge zi meng xiang de guo cheng zhong xiang hu li jie 
xiang hu bang zhu 
nu li ba wo men lai yi sheng cun de di qiu jian she cheng wei gong tong de mei hao jia yuan 
sheng huo zong shi chong man xi wang de 
cheng gong zong shi shu yu ji ji jin qu 
bu xie zhui qiu de ren men 
wo men zai qian jin de dao lu shang 
hai hui yu dao ge zhong feng xian he tiao zhan 
rang lao bai xing guo shang geng jia xing fu de sheng huo 
hai you da liang gong zuo yao zuo 
wo men yao qian xu jin shen 
jian ku fen dou 
gong tong pu xie wei da zu guo fa zhan de shi dai xin pian zhang 
xie xie da jia 
shan xi han zhong shi wei sheng ju yi gan bu zai jia li zi sha shen wang 
han zhong shi ji wei biao shi 
ceng diao cha guo ci ren 
zhe ming zi sha de gan bu xing zhang 
ci qian you xiao xi cheng 
zhang mou shi han zhong shi hong shi zi hui ban gong shi fu zhu ren 
zuo ri xia wu 
han zhong shi hong shi zi hui ban gong shi yi gong zuo ren yuan cheng 
yi zhi zhang mou zai jia li zi sha de shi qing 
dan zhang mou bing bu zai hong shi zi hui shang ban 
zhi shi ren shi guan xi 
bian zhi deng zai hong shi zi hui 
bing qie zui jin zheng zai gei qi ban li zhuan yi shou xu 
ji zhe cong han zhong shi wei sheng ju liao jie dao 
zhang mou sheng qian ren wei sheng ju yi zheng ke ke zhang 
yu jia zhong zi sha 
dui yu zi sha yuan yin 
gong zuo ren yuan biao shi bu qing chu 
ju han zhong shi gong an ju han tai fen ju han zhong lu pai chu suo jie shao 
dang tian jing fang jie jing hou 
di yi shi jian gan dao zhang mou jia zhong 
xian chang zhang mou tui bu you shang 
shi xue hen duo 
yi jing mei you sheng ming ti zheng 
chu bu pan ding xi zi sha 
qi jia shu dui ci pan ding wu yi yi 
han zhong shi ji wei fu shu ji li xiao yuan jie shao 
ji wei bu men ci qian dui zhang mou jin xing guo diao cha 
ji zhe ceng chun 
ji zhe cong gui zhou sheng bi jie shi wei ning xian you guan bu men huo xi 
wei ning xian fa sheng de yi si ye hua qi zhong du shi gu si wang ren yuan shen fen yi jing que ren 
mu qian gui zhou sheng 
bi jie shi he wei ning xian de you guan bu men zheng zai dui shi gu yuan yin zhan kai diao cha 
ji zhe hu xing 
jiao jing quan wei fa bu 
tian fu guang chang dong dan lu kou zhi xi dan lu kou yi nei qu yu shi xing jiao tong guan zhi 
jin zhi yi qie che liang tong xing he ting fang 
yi tian fu guang chang wei zhong xin 
bei qi ren min zhong lu yi duan bei kou 
nan zhi ren min nan lu san duan nan kou 
dong qi ren min dong lu dong kou he dong yu jie dong kou 
xi zhi ren min xi lu xi kou he xi yu jie xi kou de qu yu nei shi xing jiao tong guan zhi 
jin zhi yi qie che liang tong xing 
jin liang cheng gong jiao di tie qian wang 
ru you shi min que xu zi jia che qian wang 
qing jiang che liang ting fang zai qun guang 
yi teng deng di xia ting che chang 
shuang cheng er lu yan jin wei ting 
you yu di xia ting che chang zhi you yi qian yu ge che wei 
qing shi min jin liang xuan ze gong gong jiao tong fang shi qian wang 
hai ke jiang che liang ting ru huan le gu pang de chun shui an xiao qu 
yun xu che liang zai xiao qu nei dan ce ting fang 
an zhao guo wu yuan gui ding de you pin zhi liang sheng ji shi jian biao 
si chuan sheng zai qu nian nian di qian wan cheng guo qi you zhi liang zhi huan sheng ji 
ji zhe cong zhong shi you si chuan xiao shou gong si huo xi 
mu qian zhong shi you quan chuan ge jia you zhan yi ji ben wan cheng zhi huan sheng ji qian de zhun bei gong zuo 
jiang yu jin ri qi zheng shi xiao shou guo biao zhun qi you 
ting zhi xiao shou guo biao zhun qi you 
zhong shi you si chuan xiao shou gong si shi chang ying xiao chu de fu ze ren cheng 
mu qian wo sheng chu le a ba 
liang shan deng di qu de ji shao shu jia you zhan wai 
qi yu jia you zhan quan mian ting zhi xiao shou guo biao zhun qi you 
qi you ling shou jia ye jiang an zhao xin zhi liang deng ji de jia ge biao zhun zhi xing 
yu guo biao zhun xiang bi 
sheng fa gai wei te bie qiang diao cheng 
ge jia you zhan xiao shou guo qi you shi bi xu jin xing jia ge gong shi 
suo you jia you zhan dou ying zai jia ge gong shi pai ji xiao shou fa piao deng ge huan jie zhu ming xiang ying de qi you biao zhun ji pai hao 
re dian ju jiao 
cheng du xin xing shi yu cheng zhen ti xi 
yu zhong xin cheng xing cheng 
liang gao liang kuai liang gui 
de jiao tong lian xi 
she ji qu xian 
qu yu zhong xin cheng 
yu zhong xin cheng qu de jiao tong lian xi gui hua wei 
yi gao yi kuai yi gui 
she ji qu xian 
xian dai hua xiao cheng shi 
yu qu yu zhong xin cheng xing cheng 
yi gao yi kuai 
jiao tong lian xi 
she ji cheng zhen 
cheng du jiang gui hua jian she xin xing shi yu cheng zhen ti xi 
zhe yi xin wen zuo ri kan fa hou yin qi shi min de guan zhu 
qu yu zhong xin cheng 
xian dai hua xiao cheng shi jiu jing zen yang jian she 
cheng du shang bao ji zhe jiu ci zhuan fang le cheng du shi gui hua ju ju zhang zhang qiao 
wei xing cheng ru he jian 
liang gao liang kuai liang gui 
lian jie zhong xin cheng 
zhang qiao jie shao 
mu qian cheng du zhong xiao cheng shi pu bian ren kou gui mo pian xiao 
yong de gui mo da 
long quan yi he pi xian wai 
gen ju diao cha 
fa zhan ji yue du bu gao 
dao zhi yong de gui mo pian da 
zhong deng cheng shi pu bian que fa shi ji gong gong fu wu pei tao 
nan yi xi yin zhong xin cheng shi ren kou he chan ye 
er qie xing tai bu you 
qu yu gao mi du fa zhan 
que fa zi shen te se 
zhe ci zhuo zhong qiang diao an zhao dai cheng shi de biao zhun he gui mo 
dui wei xing cheng jin hang gui hua he jian she 
ba yi bu fen you chan ye tiao jian 
ji chu tiao jian de cheng shi xuan ze wei wei xing cheng 
zhe yang shi min ke yi jiu di shang ban 
er bu shi shang ban zai zhong xin cheng 
shui jiao zai wei xing cheng 
bi mian rang wei xing cheng cheng wei 
an zhao biao zhun 
yao jian she zu tuan shi cheng shi qun xing tai 
zhan xian di yu wen hua te se he chan ye te zheng 
yi tuo gong jiao shu niu xing cheng da xing cheng shi zong he ti 
xing cheng duo zhong xin kong jian xing tai 
zuo wei quan yu jiao tong yi ti hua ge ju de zhong yao bu fen 
qi jiao tong biao zhun yu zhong xin cheng xing cheng 
liang gao liang kuai liang gui 
de jiao tong lian xi 
gui hua cheng shi kuai su lu 
an zhao dai cheng shi pei tao biao zhun jian she gong gong pei tao 
yi shi ji gong gong fu wu she shi wei zhong dian 
tui jin shi ji yi liao 
ti yu deng zi yuan xiang wei xing cheng yan shen 
gou jian zhu bu shi xian wei xing cheng yu zhong xin cheng qu shi ji gong gong fu wu yi ti hua 
wei xing cheng ben shen hai yao jin yi bu gui hua zheng he 
bi ru long quan yi qu 
xian zhuang you jing kai qu 
long quan cheng qu 
luo dai zhen gou cheng 
xia yi bu tong guo gui hua zheng he wei zu he xing cheng shi qun xing tai de wei xing cheng 
ta jiang ying xiang nin de sheng huo 
zhong te da ji bing bao xiao bu feng ding 
cheng du shi kai zhan cheng xiang ju min da bing bao xian gong zuo de shi shi fang an 
can jia cheng du shi cheng xiang ju min ji ben yi liao bao xian de can bao ren yuan zai yi ge bao xian qi nei fa sheng de zhu yuan yi liao fei yong 
han men zhen te shu ji bing yi liao fei yong 
zai ji ben yi liao bao xian bao xiao hou 
ge ren fu dan chao guo shang nian du nong cun ju min nian ren jun chun shou ru de fu he ji ben yi liao bao xian zheng ce gui ding de fei yong 
you da bing bao xian an bi li bao xiao 
ru ji ben yi liao bao xian 
da bing bao xian he bing bao xiao hou 
ge ren fu dan de fu he ji ben yi liao bao xian zheng ce gui ding de fei yong chao guo le ji ben yi liao bao xian zui gao zhi fu xian e 
qie bao xiao zong e bu she feng ding xian 
dan du er hai 
zheng ce jiang qi dong 
shi er jie quan guo ren da chang wei hui di liu ci hui yi shen yi le guo wu yuan guan yu tiao zheng wan shan sheng yu zheng ce de yi an bing zuo chu jue yi 
tong yi qi dong shi shi yi fang shi du sheng zi nv de fu fu ke sheng yu liang ge hai zi de zheng ce 
ge sheng qu shi jiang xiu gai xiang guan di fang xing fa gui huo zhe zuo chu gui ding 
tie lu an quan guan li tiao li 
lv ke zai dong che zu lie che shang xi yan huo cong lie che shang pao reng za wu 
qiang xing deng cheng huo ju jue xia che de 
ge ti gong shang hu zan ting yan zhao 
guo jia gong shang zong ju zheng zai zhua jin zhi ding bao kuo 
ge ti gong shang hu nian du bao gao ban fa 
zai nei de xiang guan pei tao guan li ban fa 
dai ban fa chu tai hou 
ge ti gong shang hu zai jin xing nian bao 
gou mai jiang jia che ke yi shao jiao shui 
shui wu zong ju jiang gai bian xian xing de che liang gou zhi shui guan yu che jia xin xi ding qi cai ji yu he jia de fang shi 
gai wei yi tuo dian zi xin xi ping tai 
gen ju cai ji dao de mei tai ji dong che jia ge xin xi 
zhu tai he ding ying shui che liang zui di ji shui jia ge 
bing shi shi xia fa ge de zhi xing 
an zhao xin gui 
zai mu qian qi che xiao shou pu bian cun zai da fu zhe kou di qing kuang xia 
te bie shi dui yu dong zhe jiang jia ji wan shen zhi shi ji wan yuan de hao hua che lai shuo 
xiao fei zhe jiang shao jiao shui 
ji zai po jiu xia zhai de chu zu fang li 
he xin ti shi 
mei ci he yuan li lin ju tan qi hui jia guo nian de ji hua 
ta zong hui shuo 
hai zi wai gong wai po shen ti yue lai yue cha 
zai bu dai hai zi hui jia kan kan 
shi zai shuo bu guo qu 
dai zhe qi pan 
ta ti qian yi ge duo yue wei hai zi mai hao guo nian de xin yi 
zhi deng hai zi yi kao wan shi fang jia 
jiu dai zhe hai zi hui jia guo nian 
hang tian li jiao qiao xia fu dao 
zheng zhun bei guo jie de li guang fen bei yi liang hong se da huo che zhuang dao 
qiang jiu wu xiao hou si wang 
nian ta jia pin ren shan 
jie fang dou luo lei le 
jie fang si lin dou zhi dao bei zhuang de li guang fen jia ting pin kun 
jia zhi ta wei ren sui he 
cong wei he lin ju hong guo lian 
yi ting ta chu che huo zou le 
hao ji ge lin ju dou zhi bu zhu luo lei 
wu su rong ku zhe shuo 
ta lao gong mei tian dou kai che zai wai mian mai shui guo 
ping ri wu tou dou shi ta zai cao chi 
ta zhe yi zou 
jiong po de wu kou zhi jia 
zui da de xiao hai cai shang chu er 
li guang fen fu fu lia mei ri mai shui guo suo de 
gang gou yi jia ren de chi chuan yong du 
hui jia guo nian 
dui zhe yi jia lai shuo shi yi chang she chi de shi 
wei le mi bu guo nian hui jia de 
zhang fu yi guo hong chun jie bu hui jia 
ji xu liu zai cheng du mai shui guo 
neng zai xia xue qi kai xue qian 
duo wei hai zi zhuan dian xue fei 
li guang fen ze li yong hai zi fang jia qian zhe duan shi jian 
duo tiao dan chu qu mai ji tang shui guo 
chu tan tian hen leng dan yao zan qian guo nian 
zhu li guang fen ge bi de li nv shi zhun bei dai xiao hai qu xue xiao 
can jia xue xiao shang wu ju xing de qin zi huo dong 
ta kan jian li guang fen zheng zai lou dao li cuo yi fu 
you yu liang ren de hai zi zai tong yi ge xue xiao tong yi nian ji 
lin ju li nv shi jiu wen li guang fen 
shang wu xue xiao qin zi huo dong qu bu 
li guang fen da 
hai de chu tan mai shui guo 
li guang fen tiao zhe liang luo peng gan zou chu xiao qu 
yuan men kou kai xiao dian de wu su rong hao jiu mei jian li guang fen tiao luo mai shui guo 
yu shi da qu dao 
jin tian zhe me leng 
hai tiao luo kuang qu mai peng gan 
wa wa wai gong wai po shen ti bu hao 
zhe me zhang shi jian bu neng chu tan 
suo yi yao chen wa wa fang jia qian 
duo chu ji ci tan 
wan hui dian sun shi 
li guang fen jiu lai dao hang tian li jiao qiao xia 
lao huan wei gong ling shi cai kan jian li guang fen zai ban ma xian jin tou de lu yan shang fang xia luo kuang 
yi bian xiu xi 
yi bian deng hong deng guo jie 
sui hou ling shi cai mai tou da li sao zhou 
dang ta zai ci tai qi tou 
kan jian li guang fen yi jing tang zai fu dao zhong yang 
ju ban ma xian you si wu mi yuan 
liang zhi luo kuang qing fan zai lu shang 
ban shu dou bei nian huai 
bu yuan chu ting zhe yi liang hong se da huo che 
hou lai jiao jing 
jiu hu che xiang ji gan lai 
yi wu ren yuan dui li guang fen shi shi ji jiu 
ju yi sheng jie shao 
dang shi ta lei gu ji hu quan duan 
yi an ta xiong kou 
ta zui li jiu mao xue 
ju jiao jing jie shao 
mu qian shou gu yu cheng du cheng shi chu yun you xian ze ren gong si 
zi yang shi an yue xian lin feng zhen de xiang dao shang yi liang man zai cheng ke de ke che yu yi liang huo che xiang zhuang 
che shang er shi yu ren zao yu jing hun yi ke 
duo ren bei kun 
jie dao bao jing hou 
xiao fang zhong dui li ji tong zhi jiu jin de long tai zhuan zhi xiao fang dui xian xing gan wang jiu yuan 
xiao fang dui yuan dao da shi gu xian chang shi kan dao ke che de qian dang feng bo li wan quan po sui 
reng you shu ren zai che nei wei neng chu lai 
che nei da duo shi shang le nian ji de lao ren 
xiao fang guan bing li ji zhan kai jiu yuan 
che nei ren yuan bing wu da ai zhi shi shou dao le jing xia 
hai jing hun wei ding 
ke che de che men zai zhuang ji xia chu xian le bian xing 
wu fa da kai 
zhe jiu dao zhi le lao ren men wu fa xia che 
xiao fang guan bing jiang che men da kai jiang kao jin che men wei zhi de yi ming lao ren xiao xin yi yi de fu xia che 
bing chan fu shang le jiu hu che 
you yu xian chang jiu hu che liang bu gou 
fu jia shi wei zhi de yi ming tui bu shou dao zhuang ji de lao ren hai zai deng dai xia yi liang jiu hu che de dao lai 
xiao fang guan bing yu lao ren yi tong deng dao jiu hu che dao lai hou xiao xin yi yi de jiang lao ren tai shang jiu hu che 
ju ke che jia shi yuan yu che nei cheng ke shuo dang shi ke che yu huo che xiang xiang xing shi 
ke che sha che bu ji zhuang zai le huo che che xiang shang dao zhi le zhe chang shi gu de fa sheng 
dang shi wo men zai che shang kan dao huo che tu ran diao tou 
si ji sha che bu ji zhuang zai le shang qu 
ba wo men xia can le 
hai hao mei you ren yuan shang wang 
zhen shi wan xing 
ke che shang xia lai de yi ming cheng ke jing hun wei ding 
dang shi che shang na me duo ren wo ye bu gan cai ji sha 
hai hao che su bu shi tai kuai 
bu ran hou guo zhen shi bu kan she xiang a 
ke che si ji xin you yu ji de shuo 
jiao jing zheng zai dui shi gu yuan yin jin xing diao cha 
qi xiao wei ji zhe li chun yu 
tian hong   nan jun da men 
sui ning shi tian hong nan jun xiao qu ye zhu luo nv shi jie dao gai xiao qu kai fa shang dian hua 
bao kuo luo nv shi zai nei de duo wei xiao qu ye zhu fa xian gai xiao qu kai fa shang bing wei qu de gui hua yan shou pi zhun wen jian ji jian zhu gong cheng jun gong yan shou bei an biao 
na bu chu wen jian 
wo men ken ding bu hui jie fang 
dui yu ye zhu tai du 
tian hong shi ye fang di chan kai fa shang zuo chu hui ying 
hou guo zi fu 
zuo ri ji zhe jiu ci shi zhi dian lian xi le sui ning shi gui hua ju zheng ce fa gui ke 
gong zuo ren yuan gao su ji zhe 
xiao qu yi jing jun gong 
dan kai fa shang reng wei dao gui hua ju lai ban li zui hou yi bu de gui hua yan shou shou xu 
gai xiao qu yu zui chu shen bao de gui hua tu you xie bu tong 
guo liang tian wo men jiang duo bu men kai hui shang tao 
kai fa shang xu xian qi zheng gai 
er sui ning shi cheng guan ju dui yu tian hong nan jun xiao qu qing kuang bing wei zuo chu hui ying 
yi yuan bian liang qu zhong jian zai shu ruan ge li 
ye zhu ti gong de gui hua tu xian shi 
zuo ri ji zhe lai dao tian hong nan jun shi 
fa xian gai lou pan yu gui hua tu zhi cun zai bu tong 
ceng jing de tian hong nan jun yao shen yi bian cheng le liang ge qu yu 
da men ye bian cheng le liang ge 
ju xiang guan ye zhu tou lu 
you yu kai fa shang nei bu ren yuan fa sheng fen qi 
tian hong nan jun bei yi fen wei er 
yi ge lou pan bian cheng le liang ge yuan qu 
tian hong nan jun 
lian sheng lan qiao yue 
jiang liang ge lou pan jin xing le ruan ge li 
zhi qian shi yi du qiang ge li qi de 
hou lai xiao qu ye zhu fan dui 
ta men cai huan cheng le shu 
lian sheng lan qiao yue xiao qu ye zhu li xian sheng gao su ji zhe 
mu qian lian sheng lan qiao yue de zheng da men ben ying wei yuan tian hong nan jun de da men 
er mu qian tian hong nan jun de da men ze shi kai fa shang da diao le yuan ben gui hua de wei qiang xiu jian de 
sui zhou shang chang jia ju cheng qi huo 
xiao fang pen tou yi ye wei guan 
yi lou bei shui yan 
sui ning shi min mo xian sheng da jin hua xi cheng shi du ben re xian dian hua 
xiao fang pen tou mie le huo hou yi wan shang dou mei guan 
shui man dao le lou xia 
sui ning shi xiao fang bu men chu jing xiao fang guan bing jie shao 
chu bu diao cha pan duan 
huo zai ying gai shi dian lu duan lu yin qi 
sui ning cheng qu sui zhou shang chang er lou jia ju cheng qi huo 
xiao fang pen tou zi dong qi dong mie huo 
dan yi lou que cheng le shui lian dong 
zuo ri ji zhe cong sui ning shi xiao fang bu men liao jie dao 
tong guo xian chang chu bu diao cha 
gai shang pu qi huo shi dian xian duan lu yin qi 
xiao fang pen lin xi tong jiang huo qing kong zhi hou wei ting zhi gong zuo 
jia ju cheng ji shui yan zhong 
ji shui man yan zhi yi lou shang pu 
chu jing de zhen jiang si pai chu suo min jing jian yi shuang fang jin xing xie shang chu li 
yi lou cheng shui lian dong er lou sun shi can zhong 
sui ning shi min mo xian sheng da jin hua xi cheng shi du ben re xian dian hua 
xiao fang pen tou mie le huo hou yi wan shang dou mei guan 
shui man dao le lou xia 
ji zhe lai dao sui zhou shang chang 
yi lou shang hu mo xian sheng gao su ji zhe 
ta jie dao dian hua 
shuo dian pu bei shui yan le 
mo xian sheng gan dao xian chang hou 
fa xian zi ji can guan yi you ji li mi de ji shui 
xian zai dou hai zai di shui 
ji zhe kan dao lou dao nei bai man le da da xiao xiao de su liao pen 
bu fen shang pu de men dao qian reng you ji shui 
da bu fen shang pu mei you ying ye 
xian zai bu gan kai deng 
zheng ge lou ban dian lu dou duan lu le 
wo men mei tian zu jin 
nei ge hai guo lai chi fan ma 
mo xian sheng shuo 
wo zao shang lai de shi hou kan dao ye jing dian shi xia mian hai zai di shui 
ye bu zhi dao hai shi bu shi hao de 
bao jian li mian de qiang zhi ye dou qiao ke le 
gai jia ju cheng lou xia lao ban shuo 
mu qian li mian de sha fa 
yin kong dou jin shui le 
mei fa ying ye 
ji zhe lai dao le er lou jia ju cheng nei 
jian dao le gai jia ju cheng fu ze ren yang xian sheng 
yang xian sheng he yi ming gong ren zuo zai bo li zhuo pang 
mian dui ci ci fa sheng de shi gu 
yang xian sheng yi chou mo zhan 
nei xie jin guo shui de jia ju 
gen ben bu neng mai le 
dui yu ci ci shi gu yuan yin 
yang mou cheng bu zhi qing 
shi gu yi dian lu duan lu yin qi huo zai 
ji zhe lai dao le sui ning shi xiao fang bu men liao jie qing kuang 
dang shi dao da xian chang 
xiao fang pen lin xi tong yi zhi zai gong zuo 
tian hua ban you bei xun hei de hen ji 
chu bu diao cha pan duan 
ying gai shi dian xian duan lu yin qi de qi huo 
chu jing de xiao fang guan bing jie shao 
gan wang xian chang shi fa xian gai jia ju cheng you da liang ji shui 
xiao fang guan bing gao su ji zhe 
da xing shang chang ying mei tian jian cha zi ji de dian lu shi fou you an quan yin huan 
bing qie an pai xiang ying de xiao fang guan cha shi 
ci ci shi jian zhong xing hao xiao fang pen lin ji shi gong zuo 
bu ran ke neng hui zao cheng geng da de sun shi 
chu jing de zhen jiang si pai chu suo min jing gao su ji zhe 
ta men gan dao xian chang shi fa xian lou shang lou shui 
yi lou bei yan le 
wo men yi jing jian yi shuang fang zi xing xie shang jie jue 
ru guo xie shang bu neng jie jue 
ke yi zou si fa tu jing 
gai min jing shuo 
hua xi cheng shi du ben ji zhe hu xu yang 
gong zuo ren yuan jia jin fen fa dui ji de kuai jian 
peng you sheng dan jie kuai di chu lai de li wu 
yuan dan jie dou hai mei dao 
cheng du shi min xu xiao jie hen sheng qi 
nan dao shi kuai di bao cang le 
ji zhe tong guo zou fang diao cha 
fa xian cheng du yun da kuai di bian man di bing fei nian di 
er shi yin wei nei bu 
zao cheng da liang bao guo zhi liu zai cheng du zhong zhuan zhan 
chi chi song bu dao ke hu shou zhong 
shi min xu xiao jie ku deng peng you you ji chu lai de sheng dan li wu 
cong wu liu dan shang kan huo wu yi jing dao le cheng du 
dan jiu shi chi chi mei ren song huo 
yu ci tong shi 
ben gai pai song ta bao guo de kuai di yuan 
que xiu le jin shi tian jia 
kuai di gong si tan huan le 
yun da kuai di xia shu de gai wang dian yin wei tou su tai duo 
ping gu ye bu da biao 
zheng zai nei bu zheng gai 
dui bao guo zhi liu shi jian 
yun da kuai di shang hai zong bu xiang ji zhe hui fu cheng 
jing guo xie tiao 
gai wang dian nei bu tiao zheng yi jing dao wei 
suo you ye wu zuo ri hui fu zheng chang 
zuo ri zhong wu 
ji zhe kan dao 
gai wang dian de gong zuo ren yuan yi jing kai shi jia jin pei song bao guo 
dan you yu ji ya liang tai da 
zhi neng man man xiao hua 
lai de tai chi 
dao xian zai dou hai mei gei wo song guo lai 
xu xiao jie ting qi fen 
ta xiang ji zhe chu shi de wu liu dan xian shi 
zen me jie xia lai jiu 
zou bu dong le 
tong yang jiao ji de 
hai you jia zhu hong xing lu de zheng nv shi 
dang tian xia wu liu dian duo jiu cong zhe jiang ji chu le 
yong de jiu shi yun da kuai di 
zheng nv shi cha xun wu liu 
zai fen bo zhong xin chai bao sao miao 
dan zhi dao zuo tian 
mian fu hai shi mo shou dao 
xu xiao jie duo ci bo da gai wang dian dian hua que wu fa jie tong 
yun da kuai di guan fang ke fu jie shi 
yin wei cheng hua qu shi nei san gong si wang dian de cheng bao shang bu zuo le 
suo yi dao zhi gai qu yu de bao guo dui ji 
da gai you shi wan jian 
nei xie jie duan gai guan zhu na yi lei xing de zhao sheng kao shi 
nei xie jie duan hui fa bu shen me zhao kao zheng ce 
gao kao yue li dou yi yi luo lie 
bu guo sheng jiao yu kao shi yuan ti xing 
yue li zhi shi yi ge yu qi an pai 
zui zhong gao kao de ri cheng an pai hai jiang yi dang shi fa bu de xiao xi wei zhun 
zhong dian guan zhu gao xiao te shu lei xing zhao sheng 
an zhao wang nian guan li 
quan guo bu fen gao shui ping da xue de te shu lei bie zhao sheng kao shi xuan ba gong zuo jiang xiang ji zhan kai 
ru zi zhu zhao sheng 
yi ti te chang sheng 
gao shui ping yun dong yuan 
bao song sheng deng 
gao kao bao ming hou 
ge de jiang lu xu zu zhi kao sheng can jia gao kao ti jian 
sheng zhao kao wei zhi ding chu tai 
gong an yuan xiao zhao sheng 
ben yue zhong xun 
jing gao xiao ce shi he ge qie gong shi de qu de zi zhu zhao sheng zi ge de kao sheng jiang tian bao zi zhu zhao sheng zhi yuan biao 
pu tong gao kao jin xing kao shi 
kao sheng yao zhu yi lu qu kong zhi fen shu xian 
lu qu gong zuo ri cheng 
ben ke ge pi ci lu qu kong zhi fen shu xian 
gao kao cheng ji fen duan ren shu tong ji biao 
yi ti lei zhao sheng lu qu ban fa 
lu qu ri cheng an pai deng yi jiang tong shi gong bu 
ben yue zhong xun 
ti jian sheng huan yao can jia sheng jiao yu ting he sheng ti yu ju zu zhi de xiang guan ce shi huo ren ding 
wo sheng jin nian quan bu shi xing kan fen tian bao zhi yuan 
sui hou jin yi zhou shi jian ze shi kao sheng yun niang he tian bao zhi yuan shi jian 
bao kao gong an yuan xiao gong an lei zhuan ye de kao sheng can jia mian shi he ti neng ce shi 
hai you zheng shen 
sheng zhao kao wei jiang ji zhong zu zhi jin xing pu tong gao xiao zhao sheng lu qu gong zuo 
sui qian zi nv fu he tiao jian de ke can jia si chuan gao kao 
ji fan fu mu zai wo sheng you he fa wen ding zhi ye he zhu suo 
qie fu he pu tong gao kao qi ta bao ming tiao jian de kao sheng 
wu kuai shi dian zi shi chang fu jin 
yi sheng qiang xiang da po le wu ye de jing ji 
ji fen zhong qian 
qi che sha che sheng 
che liang peng zhuang sheng jie lian xiang qi 
cao za de xian chang chuan lai 
shuang shou bao tou 
cong duo tai qi che shang chong xia de nan zi yi qi chong xiang yi liang hei se ben tian jiao che 
dang qi zhong yi ren shi tu fan kang shi 
ren qun zhong chuan lai yi sheng da hou 
fang xia wu qi 
yan kan zhe dui fang hui wu zhuo shou zhong de tie qi ji xu bi jin 
min jing guo duan kai qiang 
jiang qi ji dao hou zhi fu 
cheng du jing fang cheng gong da diao yi wai di liu cuan dao che tuan huo 
jing li ji jie 
ling chen shou hou dao che tuan huo 
cheng du shi gong an ju ji dong jing wu zhi dui lian he te jing zhi dui 
qing yang fen ju 
jin niu fen ju 
wu hou fen ju yi ji shi ju xiang guan bu men dui yi wai di liu cuan dao che tuan huo kai zhan zhen cha 
jing guo qian qi duo zhong ji shu shou duan zhen cha 
jing fang de dao xian suo 
si ji xun zhao zuo an mu biao che liang 
zai wu hou qu cu jin yi jia you zhan fu jin 
chu xian zai le jing fang de shi xian zhong 
ji dong jing wu zhi dui li ke xie tiao ge fang mian jing li dui xian yi che liang kai zhan gen zong 
xian yi che liang cong cu jin de jia you zhan chu fa 
shang le wu hou da dao 
zhi wu hou ci 
ran hou you jin ru qing yang qu 
guang hua da dao 
zai cheng qu ge chu xun zhao zuo an mu biao che liang 
fu ze zhen ban ci an de cheng du shi gong an ju ji dong jing wu zhi dui yi da dui min jing li wei zuo ri zai jie shou cheng du shang bao ji zhe cai fang shi shuo 
wei le bu jing dong dao che tuan huo 
zai xian yi ren jia che yu cheng qu ge chu xun zhao zuo an mu biao shi 
bu duan bian huan che liang jiao ti dui xian yi che liang jin xing gen zong 
xian yi ren jia shi de zuo an che liang zai qing yang qu liang he gong yuan fu jin ting le xia lai 
fu ze gen sui de min jing yi jiang che yuan yuan ting xia 
an zhong jian shi zhe qian fang bu yuan chu fa sheng de yi qie 
zhi jian fan zui xian yi ren xia che hou 
qi zhong yi ming fan zui xian yi ren jiang te zhi gong ju sai ru men suo 
hen kuai bian jiang che men da kai 
fan zui xian yi ren zuan ru mu biao che liang nei 
qi che fa dong ji sheng xiang qi 
xian yi ren shi yong de shi jie ma qi ji shu qi dong che liang 
min jing li wei gao su cheng du shang bao ji zhe 
xian yi ren fen cheng bei dao che liang he zuo an che liang 
shi chu liang he gong yuan 
shi ru san huan 
dao che tuan huo hen jiao hua 
zai jia che tao li zuo an xian chang shi 
bu duan cai qu 
zai san huan lu zhu dao shang 
yi hui er you tu ran jia su 
fan zui xian yi ren suo jia shi de liang tai che liang ji hu wei zhe san huan lu rao le liang quan zhi hou 
shi ru cheng qu 
jin ru cheng qu hou 
ta men you chuan jie guo xiang 
yu dao lu kou hong deng liang qi shi 
geng shi zhi jie chuang guo qu 
wo men fu ze gen zong de min jing zhi neng bu duan tong guo dui jiang ji lian luo ce ying jing li 
fou ze yi bu xiao xin jiu hui bao lu 
qian hou jia ji 
nan zi ju bu bei qiang ji shang 
ting che dui bei dao che che nei wu pin jin xing qing li shi 
jing fang jue ding li ji dui qi shi shi du jie 
fan zui xian yi ren xuan ze wu kuai shi ying gai shi sui ji de 
yin wei di fang bi jiao pian pi 
fang bian ta men qing li che nei cai wu 
geng huan zao yi zhun bei hao de jia pai zhao 
zhi hou bian hui jia che tao li 
li wei biao shi 
zhua bu kai shi 
bian yi min jing jia shi de liang tai yue ye che ji su shi xiang ting zai lu bian de bei dao che liang 
yi qian yi hou jiang gai che si si ka zai zhong jian 
ling yi lu min jing jia shi yi tai jiao che cong ce mian jia ji 
xing cheng bao wei quan 
shi tu tao li xian chang 
jing gao wu xiao hou 
min jing guo duan kai qiang jiang qi ji shang 
cheng gong zhua huo 
er chen luan jia shi zuo an che liang zai tao de fan zui xian yi ren mu qian yi bei suo ding shen fen 
zheng zai quan li zhua bu 
shen cheng lin wei jian zhi shang se 
zai zi liu jing qu you xiu ren cai biao zhang hui shang 
su hua shuo yi zhao xian chi bian tian 
yi xie zuo pin hai 
piao yang guo hai 
rui dian deng guo jin xing zhan shi 
zai zi gong shi zi liu jing qu de you xiu ren cai biao zhang hui shang 
ta zhai dao le you xiu ji neng ren cai de cheng hao 
man gong xi huo jian chu hao zuo pin 
shen cheng lin jia zhu zi gong shi zi liu jing qu tang kan shang she qu 
dui man le shu ji he cheng pin 
zhong wu shui xing hou 
shen cheng lin you jie zhe gei yi fu 
jian zhi zhuo se 
zhuo se hen kuai 
yi ban jiu san si ge xiao shi 
shen cheng lin gao su hua xi cheng shi du ben ji zhe 
dan jian yi fu 
qian nian yan dou 
zhe fu zuo pin zhang kuan liang mi 
rong he le zi gong ge zhong yan de yuan su 
zhuo zi wan quan bai bu xia 
shen cheng lin jiu suo xing ba zhi fang zai wo shi de chuang shang jian 
ji zhe zuo ri cong shi an jian ju huo xi 
cheng du shi an jian 
jiao guan deng duo bu men jiang yan ge an zhao xiang guan gui ding 
xie tiao she li yan hua bao zhu lin shi xiao shou dian 
shi an jian ju xiang guan fu ze ren biao shi 
jin nian chun jie qi jian 
ling shou dian she li hou 
pei song gong zuo ye jiang sui ji zhan kai 
ji zhe liao jie dao 
ji zhe wang zhe 
ji zhe cong shi jiao yu ju huo xi 
shou fei xiang mu fen wei 
xing zheng shi ye xing shou fei 
fu wu xing shou fei he dai shou fei 
chu zi yuan ru huo fei he cheng zhen ju min ji ben yi liao bao xian wai 
yi lv shi xing yin hang dai shou 
xue xiao bu de zhi jie xiang xue sheng he jia zhang shou qu xian jin 
ju shi jiao yu ju xiang guan fu ze ren biao shi 
xian jiao yu xing zheng bu men he xue xiao ying yan ge zhi xing jiao yu shou fei zheng ce 
jian jue du jue jiao yu luan shou fei xing wei 
ren he xue xiao jun bu de she zhi 
shi jiao yu ju qiang diao 
xue xiao yao zai xian zhu wei zhi she zhi jiao yu shou fei gong shi pai 
que bao gong shi pai suo gong shi de shou fei xiang mu 
shou fei biao zhun 
shou qu fan wei 
wen jian yi ju deng nei rong yu xian xing zheng ce yi zhi 
bu yun xu jiang jiao yu shou fei gong shi gong zuo liu yu xing shi 
jiao fei shi jian 
jiao fei fang shi 
liu cheng qu fan wei nei de suo you wang dian gui mian 
zi zhu zhong duan jiao fei xi tong 
wang shang yin hang 
jiao fei biao zhun 
su she lei xing biao zhun 
cheng du shi zheng shi shi shi fu gai suo you can bao ren yuan de ji ben yi liao bao xian men zhen te shu ji bing guan li xin ban fa 
ji zhe cong shi yi bao ju huo xi 
ren ding ji gou bao kuo 
si chuan da xue hua xi yi yuan 
si chuan da xue hua xi di er yi yuan 
si chuan sheng ren min yi yuan 
cheng du shi di yi ren min yi yuan 
cheng du shi zhong xi yi jie he yi yuan 
cheng du shi di er ren min yi yuan 
cheng du shi di san ren min yi yuan 
zhong guo ren min jie fang jun cheng du jun qu zong yi yuan 
zhong guo ren min jie fang jun di si wu er yi yuan 
cheng du zhong yi yao da xue fu shu yi yuan 
san liu san yi yuan 
cheng du shi fu nv er tong zhong xin yi yuan 
cheng du shi gong gong wei sheng lin chuang yi liao zhong xin 
si chuan sheng zhong liu yi yuan 
cheng du shi di si ren min yi yuan deng 
cheng du wan bao ji zhe dong liang 
cheng du shan xi jie mou xi zhuang dian de ying ye yuan qi pan gu ke guang lin 
ji zhe zai shan xi jie yi xi zhuang dian cai fang shi 
jian yi wei lao ban 
ding huo dian hua yi zhi bu duan 
zi liao zhao pian 
chun jie qian de yi ge yue 
cheng du ge qi shi ye dan wei you kai shi mang huo 
dan wei chun wan 
jie mu de bian pai 
yan chu fu zu lin zui ji zhong de cheng du shan xi jie ye sui zhi chu xian huo bao chang mian 
li xing qin jian jie yue fan dui pu zhang lang fei 
cheng du shi bu shao qi shi ye dan wei zuo chu 
jie jian ban hui 
yi ji qu xiao ban 
dan wei chun wan 
dan wei nian zhong ju hui ye suo jian gui mo 
shou ci ying xiang 
huo bao le shi duo nian de 
xi zhuang yi tiao jie 
xi zhuang zu lin sheng yi xia hua liu cheng 
ge shi li fu 
hua xi du shi bao ji zhe zai shan xi jie kan dao 
ge jia dian pu de sheng yi jiu gen dong tian de qi wen yi yang 
yi xie ying ye yuan zhan zai dian pu men qian zhao lan sheng yi 
ci fan men ke luo que de jing xiang gen wang nian re nao qing jing xing cheng xian ming dui bi 
wang nian de zhe ge shi hou wo men jian zhi mang bu guo lai 
xi zhuang dian de lao ban wang nv shi shuo 
wang nian chun jie qian xi de yi ge duo yue 
shi ta men yi nian zhong sheng yi zui hong huo de shi hou 
chun li run qi ma yao zhuan wu liu wan yuan yi shang 
wang nv shi shuo 
sheng yi jiu kai shi xia hua 
wang nv shi shuo 
yang ge biao yan dui yi ji yi xie yi kao sheng de yan chu fu 
ji zhe you cai fang duo jia xi zhuang dian 
fa xian ji hu suo you yan chu fu de ding zuo 
zhao zhe yang xia qu jiu lian fang zu shui dian fei dou fu bu qi le 
wang nv shi suan le yi bi zhang 
mei nian jiu zhi wang zhe chun jie qian neng gou duo zheng dian qian 
wang nv shi yu ce 
ru guo sheng yi ji xu zhe yang qing dan xia qu 
ji zhe hai lai dao ling wai liang ge yan chu fu jiao wei ji zhong de si chuan yin yue xue yuan he xi nan min da zhou wei de jie dao liao jie dao 
ge ge xi zhuang dian ye tong yang sheng yi qing dan 
zuo ri xia wu 
zai an zhuang le kang xin shuai qi bo qi hou 
ta ye cheng wei quan shi jie you wen xian zi liao ji zai de nian ling zui da kang xin shuai qi bo qi an zhuang zhe 
shou shu hen cheng gong 
wo hen gao xing 
zuo ri shang wu 
tang zai bing chuang shang de chen zong yu lao ren shi fen xing fen 
zui ba yi zhi shuo ge bu ting 
ta kai shi chu xian xin nei qi jin zheng zhuang 
shen zhi bu xiang kai kou shuo hua 
chen zong yu bei jia ren song dao hua xi yi yuan jiu zhi 
xin nei ke jiao shou fang yuan cheng 
chen zong yu shi yin xin zang bing yin qi de xin li shuai jie 
you xin shi shou suo bu tong bu de zheng zhuang 
zhe shi wu fa tong guo yao wu gen zhi de 
ruo bu an zhuang kang xin shuai qi bo qi jin xing shuang xin shi qi bo 
chen zong yu de xin shuai jiang jin yi bu jia ju 
ji zhe suo qian cheng 
guo jia zhu xi xi jin ping fa biao xin nian he ci 
qi ban gong shi ye shou du bao guang 
tou guo yang shi jing tou ke yi kan dao 
xi jin ping ban gong shi bei jing shi yi fu chang cheng hua zuo 
ban gong zhuo shang you san bu dian hua 
er hong yi bai
