shen hou shu jia shang bai fang le si fu zhao pian 
ta yu jia ren tui zhe lun yi shang de fu qin 
ta qian mu qin de shou san bu 
ta yu fu ren he ying 
ta qi zhe zi xing che zai zhe nv er 
you ce shu jia shang ye you yi zhang ta ti zu qiu de zhao pian 
qia feng zao gao feng 
bu fen jin chu cheng che liang xing cheng ji ya 
jiao guan bu men cai qu jian duan fang xing 
bian dui hu song deng fang shi 
shu dao deng hou che liang 
cheng mian gao su ba jiao zhan zhi jin shan zhan shuai xian yin wu guan bi 
mian guang gao su 
cheng zi lu gao su 
cheng mian fu xian gao su 
cheng de nan gao su 
cheng ya gao su 
cheng yu gao su bu fen zhan dian 
cheng peng gao su quan xian 
cheng du cheng bei gao su 
cheng wen qiong gao su quan xian 
cheng le gao su quan xian 
rao cheng gao su quan xian 
qiong ming gao su quan xian 
cheng peng gao su quan xian bao kuo cheng du zhan 
cheng wen qiong gao su quan xian 
cheng wen qiong cheng du zhan 
cheng le gao su quan xian bao kuo qing long zhan 
guan yin tan zhan 
cheng du rao cheng gao su quan xian 
jie dai si zhan 
cheng wen qiong zhan 
zai rao cheng gao su deng bu fen wu qing yan zhong de gao su lu duan 
che liang zai zhan dian wai pai dui deng hou 
sui zhe neng jian du ti sheng 
bu fen gao su jiao jing cai qu jian duan fang xing cuo shi 
you jing che fen pi dai dui 
bian dui hu song che liang cong gao su lu tong xing 
zuo ri zhong wu 
sui zhe da wu zhu bu xiao san 
lu mian neng jian du ti gao 
ge tiao gao su zhu bu jie chu lin shi guan zhi 
che liang hui fu tong xing 
dong ji yu da wu tian qi ying jian su man xing 
si ji shi fu ying kai qi wu deng 
ying kai qi wu deng 
shi kuan deng he shuang tiao deng 
bing cong zui jin de chu kou jin kuai shi li gao su gong lu 
bi mian jiao tong shi gu de fa sheng 
cheng du chun xi lu 
shi min gong tong dao ji shi ying jie xin nian de zhong sheng 
si chuan ri bao ji zhe xiao yu yang she 
ban sui shang wan ren qi sheng dao ji shi 
chun xi lu wan ren shou sui dao ji shi he xin nian qiao zhong huo dong shi cheng du xin chun huan le gou de chuan tong huo dong 
liang wei zhi zhu ren jing xian ci ji de gao kong zou xiu jiang kua nian fen wei tui xiang gao chao 
sui zhe xin nian dao lai 
lei she deng guang ying chu de shu pi ma zai qiang ti shang huan teng pao dong 
yu dao ji shi huo dong yi yang huo bao de 
sui zhe xin nian zhong sheng de qiao xiang 
si chuan ri bao ji zhe chen bi hong 
jing ji shi yong fang shi fou jiang zhu bu tui chu 
si chuan dong ji ji zhong gong nuan shi fou ke xing 
si chuan sheng zhu fang he cheng xiang jian she ting ting zhang he jian zuo ke chuan bao ji tuan quan mei ti zhong xin 
min sheng zhi tong che 
shi pin fang tan lan mu 
jiu shi min ji guang da wang you zui wei guan qie de min sheng wen ti xian chang zuo da 
bai wan an ju gong cheng 
ju ti lai jiang 
han lian zu zhu fang 
er xian zai wo sheng de cheng pin zhu zhai 
you yu si chuan bu tong yu bei fang 
gong nuan shi jian hen duan 
er gong nuan hai yao jian re dian chang 
zhe bing bu jing ji 
yin ci si chuan bu shi yi an zhuang ji zhong gong nuan 
chang yuan lai kan 
fang chan shui shi shi shi ken ding de 
dan yao an zhao zhong yang de tong yi an pai lai shi shi 
guan jian ci cheng zhen hua 
wo sheng xin xing cheng zhen hua jian she liu bu zou 
wo sheng gang jie shu de sheng wei jing ji gong zuo ji cheng zhen hua gong zuo hui yi jiu jin hou yi ge shi qi de cheng zhen hua gong zuo zuo chu le bu shu an pai 
sheng zhu jian ting zuo wei wo sheng zhong yao de min sheng bu men 
zui zhong de xin xing cheng zhen hua jian she jiang ding yi wei 
xing tai shi yi 
chan cheng rong he 
cheng xiang yi ti 
ji yue gao xiao 
ru he li jie shen me shi xin xing cheng zhen hua 
sheng zhu jian ting ting zhang he jian dui ci yu yi jie du 
sheng zhu jian ting zuo wei wo sheng xin xing cheng zhen hua jian she de qian tou bu men 
di yi shi zhong dian jie jue yi jin cheng nong min gong de hu ji wen ti 
wei ta men ti gong ping deng de gong gong pei tao fu wu 
hai yao ti gong zhu fang bao zhang 
cheng shi fa zhan yao zhuan xing sheng ji 
bi ru chuan nan cheng shi qun 
chuan dong bei cheng shi qun deng 
cheng shi hua de fa zhan 
zui zhong yao de shi chan ye fa zhan 
na me she ji dao de nong min gong jiu ye wen ti ye shi xu yao zheng fu kao lv de 
di si shi xin nong cun jian she 
di wu shi cheng zhen hua jian she zhong 
yao ti sheng cheng shi hua guan li shui ping 
di liu jiu shi jin yi bu gai ge 
guan jian ci an ju 
zuo ri you wang you ti wen 
wo sheng qi dong le jiu cheng wei jiu fang he peng hu qu gai zao 
he jian ming que biao shi 
wo sheng ji jiang qi dong 
bai wan an ju gong cheng jian she xing dong 
yao jia da dui cheng shi peng hu qu yi ji wei jiu fang de gai zao 
bai wan an ju gong cheng 
ju ti lai jiang 
han lian zu zhu fang 
wo sheng zheng zai jia kuai shi shi 
bai zhen jian she shi dian xing dong 
jiu di jiu jin xi na zhuan yi nong ye ren kou 
jiu yi xie cheng shi chu xian de 
zao cheng hui zao cheng tu di de lang fei 
si chuan hai mei you chu xian zhe yang di qing kuang 
tong shi ta ye ti xing 
yao kong zhi zhong xin cheng qu gui mo 
bi mian guo duo zi yuan xiang sheng hui cheng shi ji zhong 
bu jin shi wo sheng de cheng du 
bao kuo bei jing zhe xie dai cheng shi 
ji shi wen hua zhong xin 
you shi jiao yu zhong xin 
cheng dan de jue se tai duo 
jin hou fa zhan zhu yao shi chao 
jian she fang mian fa zhan 
shang zhou wu xia wu 
zhi hou yi yuan jiang qi jie zou 
jian cha hou que ding shen ti zan wu wen ti 
dan da ye biao xian chu yi yu chang ren de 
yi sheng jiang qi liu yuan guan cha 
shei zhi di er tian zao shang 
da ye chen da jia bu zhu yi 
qiao qiao li kai yi yuan 
ben zhou yi zhong wu 
fa xian reng shi wang da ye 
jiu zhu zhan duo fang lian dong jin xing jiu zhu 
mu qian wang da ye reng zai yi yuan zhong 
da jia xi wang zai xin nian dao lai zhi ji 
wei da ye zhao dao jia ren 
ta de zhuang tai 
ou er qing xing shi chang 
mian bu wu biao qing ji fen zhong bu zha yan 
tian fu zao bao ji zhe zai cheng du shi di qi ren min yi yuan ji zhen ke jian dao wang zhi ming shi 
ta zuo zai zou lang yi shang 
shen ti wan qu cheng yi ge 
ni na li bu shu fu 
mian dui xun wen 
wang zhi ming yi ran chen mo 
ta ti xing pian shou 
bi yi liang ce you liang ge ming xian hei zhi 
sui ran kan qi lai qi se bu tai hao 
dan reng suan gan jing 
ta shang shen zhe da hao hei se mian ao 
yong yi gen hong sheng xi zhe 
xia chuan gan jing de niu zai ku 
kan shang qu bu xiang liu lang zhe 
lao ren gao su ji zhe ta de ming zi he zhu zhi 
dan mei ci shuo de zhu zhi que bu yi zhi 
ta shi er cheng xiang hui jia 
shi er you ju jue bang mang 
wo mei you qi zi he hai zi 
wang zhi ming shuo 
dan sui hou you cheng 
wo shen shang de mao ku shi jia ren zhi de 
xian de zi xiang mao dun 
wang zhi ming mei you ren he mian bu biao qing 
ji fen zhong bu zha yan 
dang mei ren he ta shuo hua shi 
ta ji ben chu yu 
shou ci song yi 
shang zhou wu xia wu hong ji zhong lu 
dang shi shi zai hong ji zhong lu 
ta tang zai di shang 
di yi ci jiang wang zhi ming jie dao yi yuan de chu zhen yi sheng zhou zhen ke jie shao 
shang zhou wu xia wu 
ta men jie dao dian hua gan dao xian chang 
min jing shuo you qun zhong fan ying yi ge da ye zai lu bian zou lai zou qu 
zou le yi ge duo xiao shi 
hou lai dao zai lu bian 
zhou zhen ke jie shao 
jian cha fa xian xue ya he xue tang wei jian yi chang 
jiang qi dai hui yi yuan jin yi bu jian cha 
ye wei fa xian ren he wen ti 
dan ta de dui da he chang ren ming xian bu yi yang 
zhu zhi yi shi yan shu jie shao 
sui hou yi yuan qing lai cheng du shi di si ren min yi yuan de you guan zhuan jia hui zhen 
chu bu pan duan ke neng wei lao nian chi dai zheng 
dan bu neng que ding shi fou you jing shen ji bing 
jian yi song wang dui kou de cheng du shi de kang yi yuan 
ran er de kang yi yuan xu yao jia shu tong yi qian zi deng cai neng jie shou 
dan ta shen shang shen me xin xi dou mei you 
yi sheng jiang qi you dai hui qi yi yuan 
zhu jin yi yuan hou 
wang zhi ming chang chang ba bing fang men fan suo 
ban nong bing fang yang qi guan 
yao na da huo ji dian wei jin deng 
shang zhou liu zao chen 
wang zhi ming jing qiao qiao yi ge ren cong yi yuan zou le 
zai ci song yi 
ben zhou yi zhong wu he jiang ting pai chu suo 
hao xin ren jiang qi song wang pai chu suo zai ci ru yuan 
ben zhou yi zhong wu 
qi yi yuan jie dao xiao xi cheng 
he jiang ting pai chu suo shou liu le yi wei 
qian yan bu da hou yu 
sui hou yi yuan chu zhen jiang lao ren jie hui 
zhi ban hu shi ren chu qi jiu shi tou tou cong yi yuan liu zou de 
san wu lao ren 
ji zhen ke hu shi zhang xie xian hong hui yi 
jian yu lao ren liang tian qian zuo guo jian cha 
yuan fang bian jiang qi an zhi zai du li guan cha shi xiu xi 
er he jiang ting pai chu suo gen ju lao ren ti gong de mo hu xin xi 
ye zan wei neng cha chu you xiao xin xi 
cheng du shi gong an ju jin jiang fen ju you guan fu ze ren jie shao 
shi yi wei hao xin ren jiang wang zhi ming cong jie shang song dao pai chu suo 
xian zai shi zhi ban hu shi bang mang zhao gu ta 
xie xian hong you dian wu nai 
shang liang zhi hou 
da jia jue ding tong zhi cheng du shi jiu zhu guan li zhan 
xi wang tong guo bie de fang shi bang zhu wang zhi ming zhao dao jia ren 
lao ren cheng du kou yin 
xu he shi shi fou shu jiu zhu fan wei 
cheng du shi jiu zhu guan li zhan yi wu an zhi ke gong zuo ren yuan ma jun li lai dao yi yuan 
dui wang zhi ming di qing kuang he shi 
wang zhi ming chu le neng gou da chu xing ming 
gao su zhu zhi wei jiu yan qiao fu jin 
bing wu ren he xin xin xi 
ke yi pai chu xi du de ke neng 
ma jun li jie shao 
lao ren shen ti jian kang 
zhuo zhuang zheng qi 
bu xiang yi ban liu lang han 
kou yin que shi shi cheng du de 
you yu lao ren shen fen wu fa he shi 
jiu zhu zhan xu yao xian cha zheng 
zhi you hui dan wei xi tong zhong cha xun 
an zhao jiu zhu cheng xu 
di yi bu xu yao pan ding lao ren shi fou shu yu jiu zhu dui xiang 
er dui yu zhe yang de 
san wu lao ren 
tong chang shi xian jin xing deng bao xun ren 
kan neng fou you ren ti gong xin xi 
huo pei he gong an ji guan cha xun lao ren shen fen 
ru reng wu fa que ding 
jiu hui jin ru xia yi bu an zhi cheng xu 
zui hou jiu shi song dao fu li yuan zhong 
ma jun li gao su ji zhe 
yin wei wang zhi ming de xin xi tai guo mo hu 
cha xun xu geng duo yi xie shi jian 
wang zhi ming de jia ren ni men zai na li 
ta de jia zai na li 
jia ren zai na li 
qin ai de du zhe peng you 
bu guan ni shi wang zhi ming di yi ci yun dao shi de mu ji zhe 
di er ci song ta dao pai chu suo de hao xin ren 
hai shi ta de lin ju peng you 
qing ni zai kan dao bao dao shi 
huo zhe liu yan tian fu zao bao guan fang wei bo 
ji shi gao su wo men 
gong tong gei liu xun lao ren yi ge wen nuan de xin nian 
an zhao guo wu yuan de tong yi bu shu 
cong shi tie lu yun shu he you zheng ye de dan wei he ge ren 
jiang na ru ying ye shui gai zheng zeng zhi shui shi dian 
kai shi zhi xing zeng zhi shui shui zhi 
shi shen hua cai shui ti zhi gai ge de chong tou xi 
si chuan sheng guo shui ju xiang guan ren yuan biao shi 
jiang tie lu yun shu he you zheng ye na ru 
bu jin hui jin yi bu jian qing jiao tong yun shu ye zong ti shui fu 
cu jin liu tong hang ye fa zhan 
hai jiang jin yi bu jiang di quan guo fan wei nei she ji de hang ye he qi ye 
te bie shi xiao wei qi ye de shui shou fu dan 
shi zhe yi zhong da gai ge de hong li chi xu xian xian 
sui zhe tie lu yun shu ye na ru 
jiao tong yun shu ye yi quan bu na ru 
zheng ce jin yi bu wan shan 
zong ti shui fu jiang jian qing 
shi dian fan wei 
you shi xin de yi nian 
you shi xin de yi tian 
dui yu peng bo xiang shang 
kuai su fa zhan de zhong guo lai shuo 
dan zai fei shi de guang yin zhong 
que liu xia le fen dou zhe shen shen de yin ji 
li shi jiang ji zhu shen me 
shi tai xing shen chu fang pin wen ku de xin xin xiang yin 
hai shi chang e ben yue yu tu ling kong de huan hu que yue 
shi diao jie gou zhuan fang shi de zha shi tui jin 
hai shi wen zeng zhang hui min sheng de wu shi zhi ju 
shi wei hu guo jia zhu quan he an quan de chen zhuo jian yi 
hai shi lv xing guo ji yi wu 
cu jin he ping fa zhan de you yi xin pian 
lao hu cang ying yi qi da 
de guo gan xing dong 
hai shi ba xiang gui ding zhua tie you hen de jian chi bu xie 
shi ken ying gu tou she xian tan 
zhong dian ling yu gai ge de zong shen tui jin 
hai shi qun zhong lu xian jiao yu shi jian huo dong suo huan fa chu de qiang da zheng neng liang 
po lang qian xing de zhong guo 
wan cheng le cheng shang qi xia de li shi jiao jie 
kai shi le ji wang kai lai de mou pian bu ju 
man huai dui min zu de ze ren 
dui ren min de ze ren 
dui dang de ze ren 
xin yi jie zhong yang ling dao ji ti 
jiang shi xian min zu fu xing de zhong guo meng hua wei yi wan ren min de zhi hui he li liang 
ji li zhe zhong hua er nv mai xiang xin de zheng cheng 
mian dui ji qi fu za de guo ji guo nei xing shi 
wo men zong lan quan ju 
shi zhong jian chi yi jing ji jian she wei zhong xin 
shi xian le jing ji she hui fa zhan wen zhong you jin 
wen zhong xiang hao de liang hao kai ju 
wo men rui yi chuang xin 
yong yi xi lie gai ge ju cuo bao chi fa zhan huo li 
ji chu nei sheng dong li 
wo men yi zhuan zuo feng tui dong dang de jian she mai chu xin bu fa 
ying de le ren min de xin ren he zhi chi 
dang de ning ju li he zhan dou li jin yi bu zeng qiang 
wo men jiang gong ping zheng yi de li nian guan chuan yu zhi guo li zheng de fang fang mian mian 
shi xian hao wei hu hao fa zhan hao ren min qun zhong de qie shen li yi 
wei geng duo ren chuang zao zhe ren sheng chu cai de ji hui 
qian qian wan wan pu tong zhong guo ren yong zi ji de han shui 
jiao zhu qi tong wang zhong guo meng de lu ji 
wo men de tian yu ku 
ning ju cheng zhe ge guo jia mai xiang ming tian de qiang jing dong li 
zai ru ci duan de shi jian hui ju ru ci duo de kai shi 
rang ru ci duo de bian ge zhan xian ru ci da de jue xin 
ji bian shi dui zhong guo guan wang he zhi yi de ren men 
mian dui zhe yang de cheng jiu 
zhe yang de fen dou 
ye bu neng bu bao yi qin pei he jing yi 
dui zhong guo de wei lai bao you re qie de qi dai 
li shi shi yi ge bu duan yan xu de guo cheng 
zai gong jian ke nan de zhong guo dao lu shang 
xun zhe shi ba jie san zhong quan hui de hao jiao 
zhong guo ren min zai xin de yi nian li 
kai shi le quan mian shen hua gai ge de wei da jin jun 
zhe shi yi ci jian yan jin qu yi shi de jin jun 
shi jie da shi 
hao hao dang dang 
bian ge shi da shi suo qu 
ren xin suo xiang 
mian dui bi ren de xing shi 
suo you de guo jia dou zai qiu xin qiu bian 
qiu bian qiu xin 
qian fan jing fa 
ji ji zhong liu 
zhong guo de xian dai hua jian she 
guan jian zai ba zhi du you shi zhuan hua wei shi shi zai zai de jing zheng you shi 
xin de yi nian 
jin yi bu jie fang si xiang 
jie fang he fa zhan she hui sheng chan li 
jie fang he zeng qiang she hui huo li 
wo men cai neng geng shang ceng lou 
zhe shi yi ci kao yan ji yu yi shi de jin jun 
wo men ceng cuo shi gan shang shi dai de da hao shi ji 
ji ruo ji pin 
bei shou qi ling 
jing guo ji dai ren yu xue fen zhan he jian ku da pin 
jin tian de zhong guo cai chong xin hui dao yi ge jiao wei you li de qi dian 
ying de le xiang dui you li de fa zhan huan jing 
wo men reng chu zai bing qie chang qi chu yu she hui zhu yi chu ji jie duan 
guo ji di wei hai bu suan gong gu 
fa zhan huan jing ye bing bu ping he 
jing zhu fen miao bi zheng 
ji yu shao zong ji shi 
xin de yi nian 
zhua zhu qian zai nan feng de li shi ji yu 
zhen xi lai zhi bu yi de da hao xing shi 
bu duan ji fa dang he guo jia de sheng ji huo li 
wo men cai neng cheng shi er shang 
zhe shi yi ci li lian ze ren yi shi de jin jun 
cong lai jiu mei you guo yi cu er jiu de bian ge 
yong yuan dou bu hui you yi lao yong yi de jin bu 
wan shan zhong guo te se she hui zhu yi zhi du 
tui jin guo jia zhi li ti xi he zhi li neng li xian dai hua 
zai quan xin shi dai bei jing xia wo men zheng zai zhan kai yi chang wei da de ge ming 
mian dui chen ke ji bi 
ji liu xian tan 
ying nan er shang 
bei shui yi zhan 
zhe shi wo men zhe yi dai ren duo bu kai ye bu ying duo de ze ren 
tui bu diao ye bu rong tui de shi ming 
xin de yi nian 
yi geng da de jue xin chong po si xiang guan nian de zhang ai 
tu po li yi gu hua de fan li 
wo men cai neng ying de ming tian 
shi quan mian shen hua gai ge di yi nian 
wan shi kai tou nan 
zhi nan jiu bu nan 
mei you yi wang wu qian de jin qu yi shi 
mei you cheng shi er shang de ji yu yi shi 
mei you gan yu dan dang de ze ren yi shi 
zuo tian de gai ge bu hui wei jin tian dian ji 
jin tian de gai ge ye nan yi wei ming tian pu lu 
shi ba jie san zhong quan hui kai qi yi ge xin de shi jian chuang kou 
jin mi tuan jie zai yi xi jin ping tong zhi wei zong shu ji de dang zhong yang zhou wei 
na chu zhong ren shi chai de xin jin er 
na chu feng shan kai lu de chuang jin er 
na chu shuai kai bang zi de gan jin er 
na chu zhua tie you hen de ren jin er 
na chu yong yi du xing de wen jin er 
po chu si xin 
cheng quan gong yi 
jian ding xin xin 
ning ju gong shi 
wo men jiu neng ba san zhong quan hui jing shen zhuan hua cheng gai zao xian shi shi jie de qiang da li liang 
yong wo men zhe yi dai ren de bu xie nu li 
jiang zhong guo te se she hui zhu yi wei da shi ye tui xiang zhan xin jing jie 
tiao wang xin nian de di yi lv shu guang 
ying jie wo men de 
ye xu reng you kun nan he tiao zhan 
dan dui yu shi xian min zu fu xing de zhong guo meng xiang 
wo men cong wei xiang jin tian zhe yang chong man xin xin 
dong fang yu xiao 
mo dao jun xing zao 
ta bian qing shan ren wei lao 
feng jing zhe bian du hao 
rang wo men xie shou fen dou 
zao jiu zhong guo de wei lai 
ni wo de ming tian 
ren min ri bao 
ji zhe wang di 
zhong fang wan quan you neng li 
you xin xin han wei zi ji de guo jia zhu quan 
ling tu wan zheng he min zu zun yan 
dui yu ren he tiao xin xing wei 
bi jiang yu yi jian jue ying dui 
zai dang tian de li xing ji zhe hui shang 
you ji zhe wen 
zhong fang ru he kan dai zhong ri guan xi de wei lai 
hua chun ying shuo 
qian shi bu wang 
hou shi zhi shi 
wo men wan quan you neng li 
you xin xin han wei zi ji de guo jia zhu quan 
ling tu wan zheng he min zu zun yan 
wo men yuan yu ri ben guo nei you liang zhi 
zhong you hao de ren shi yi dao 
yi shi wei jian 
mian xiang wei lai

qiang jia yu ya zhou ren min

an bei de kuang wang yu gu zhu yi zhi 
shi ri ben jun guo zhu yi li shi wan gu xing de biao xian 
ye yi cheng wei ya zhou he ping mian lin de xian shi wei xian 
jing guo shen she gong feng you er zhan jia ji zhan fan 
ri ben ling dao ren bu gu guo nei wai jiang lie fan dui 
yi yi gu xing can bai jing guo shen she de xing jing

yi hu ren yuan

wo guo ai zi bing 
zhi ye bao lu 
shi jian zhong jin qi cheng wei yi liao ji gou wei bing ren ti gong shou shu huo qi ta yi liao cao zuo suo zhi 
wei bi mian zhi liao tui wei 
yuan wei sheng bu jiu ceng jian yi ba ai zi bing zhi ye bao lu lie ru zhi ye bing 
yi hu ren yuan ji ren min jing cha zai yi liao huo dong huo zhi xing gong wu shi gan ran ai zi bing jiang bei na ru zhi ye xing chuan ran bing fan wei 
ke xiang shou gong shang bao xian deng dai yu 
ju guo jia wei sheng ji sheng wei deng si bu men ri qian yin fa de 
zhi ye bing fen lei he mu lu 
bao zhen long deng zhi ye xing ji bing jin ru tiao zheng hou de zhi ye bing fan chou zhi zhong 
zhi ye bing shi zhi qi ye 
shi ye dan wei he ge ti jing ji zu zhi deng yong ren dan wei de lao dong zhe zai zhi ye huo dong zhong 
yin jie chu fen chen 
fang she xing wu zhi he qi ta you du 
you hai yin su er yin qi de ji bing 
zhi ye bing fang zhi fa 
gong shang bao xian tiao li 
lao dong zhe bei zhen duan wei zhi ye bing ke xiang shou xiang ying dai yu 
suo zai dan wei can jia le gong shang bao xian de 
fen bie you gong shang bao xian ji jin he yong ren dan wei zhi fu xiang ying dai yu 
wei can jia gong shang bao xian de 
qi dai yu you yong ren dan wei zhi fu 
yong ren dan wei bu cun zai huo zhe wu fa que ren lao dong guan xi de zhi ye bing bing ren 
ke yi xiang di fang ren min zheng fu shen qing yi liao jiu zhu he sheng huo deng fang mian de jiu zhu 
yi hu ren yuan 
jing cha deng ke neng zai gong zuo zhong yin jie chu ai zi bing bing du xie dai zhe er mian lin 
zhi ye bao lu 
cun zai bei gan ran de feng xian 
wo guo ai zi bing zhi ye bao lu shi jian zhong jin qi cheng wei yi liao ji gou wei bing ren ti gong shou shu huo qi ta yi liao cao zuo suo zhi 
wei bi mian zhi liao tui wei 
jian qing yi wu ren yuan hou gu zhi you 
yuan wei sheng bu jiu ceng jian yi ba ai zi bing zhi ye bao lu lie ru zhi ye bing 
jing guo liang nian de ji zhong xiu ding ji gong kai zheng qiu yi jian 
ci ci yin fa de 
zhi ye bing fen lei he mu lu 
yi liao wei sheng ren yuan ji ren min jing cha zai zhi ye huo dong huo zhe zhi xing gong wu zhong 
bei ai zi bing bing du gan ran zhe huo bing ren de xue ye 
huo xie dai ai zi bing bing du de sheng wu yang ben 
huo fei qi wu wu ran le pi fu huo zhe nian mo 
huo zhe bei han you ai zi bing bing du de xue ye 
ti ye wu ran le de yi liao qi xie huo qi ta rui qi ci po pi fu gan ran de ai zi bing 
jun na ru zhi ye xing chuan ran bing fan chou 
zhi ye bing fen lei he mu lu 
tiao zheng zhu yao qing xiang yu mei tan 
you se jin shu 
ji xie jia gong hang ye deng sheng chan yi xian zuo ye ren yuan 
kuang gong gao dong bao lu suo zhi fei ai 
lie ru fang she xing zhong liu fan wei 
jiang shou gong gua yan zuo ye ren yuan you yu zhang shi jian ya po chu xian de gu jing mai xue shuan zong he zheng 
gu dong mai bi se zheng huo lin ba guan bi se zheng jia ru qi ta zhi ye bing fan wei deng 
ji guang suo zhi yan 
dong shang deng fen bie bei na ru zhi ye xing pi fu bing 
er bi hou kou qiang ji bing deng fen lei dang zhong 
xiu ding hou de 
zhi ye bing fen lei he mu lu 
tai wan jing ji yao xiang geng shang ceng lou 
bi xu da po liang an guan xi de jiang ju 
wo shen qie liao jie 
tai wan jing ji yao xiang geng shang ceng lou 
bi xu da po liang an guan xi de jiang ju 
ma ying jiu shuo 
wei you da po jiang ju 
jia qiang liang an jing mao he zuo 
tong shi ye yao shi shi yin ying da lu jing ji zhuan xing 
tiao zheng chan ye jie gou 
tui dong liang an chan ye he zuo 
cai neng you zhu yu tai wan tuo zhan da lu shi chang 
ye bi jiao rong yi can yu qu yu jing ji zheng he 
ma ying jiu biao shi 
tai wan hai xia bu zai shi jin zhang de huo yao ku 
er bian cheng he ping de da dao 
ma ying jiu jin tian ye shuo 
liang an fu mao xie yi de tuo yan 
yi yin qi mao yi huo ban yu chang shang de yi lv 
tai wan bi xu jia kuai zi you hua yu shi chang kai fang de jiao bu 
hai zai kai gong ting hui 
wo men xi wang zhe ge xie yi neng jin kuai shen cha 
zao ri wan cheng fa ding cheng xu 
wo zai ci zheng zhong hu yu chao ye zheng dang yi tong xie shou 
jin su tong guo you li yu tai wan jing ji fa zhan de yi an 
ba xiang gui ding 
she jian shang de lang fei 
dao jin yi bu gui fan gong wu jie dai xing wei 
sui zhe dang zhong yang he guo wu yuan yi xi lie ju cuo de chu tai 
ling qun zhong shen wu tong jue de gong wu jie dai lang fei xian xiang da wei gai guan 
qing lian zhi feng jing chui 
qi zhi li zhi gong 
chu bi zhi xiao 
ren suo gong jian 
zui nan zhi li de wai feng bei you xiao e zhi 
qi zhong ke zong jie de jing yan hen duo 
dan zui zhong yao de jing yan he qi shi shi 
jian zhang li zhi 
qiang hua zhi xing 
hui shou yi nian lai de zheng zhi gong zuo 
mi ji chu tai de ge xiang gui ding gei ren liu xia le shen ke yin xiang 
xi jin ping zong shu ji zhu chi zhao kai zhong gong zhong yang zheng zhi ju hui yi 
shen yi tong guo le zhong yang zheng zhi ju guan yu gai jin gong zuo zuo feng 
mi qie lian xi qun zhong de ba xiang gui ding 
la kai le xin yi lun zuo feng jian she de xu mu 
dang zhong yang he guo wu yuan xiang ji chu tai le yi xi lie zhi du gui ding 
zhong yang he guo jia ji guan hui yi fei guan li ban fa 
dang zheng ji guan li xing jie yue fan dui lang fei tiao li 
dang zheng ji guan guo nei gong wu jie dai guan li gui ding 
dui gong wu jie dai lang fei he 
wan ji kai chu yao fang 
zhe xie gui zhang tiao li you yi ge gong tong de te dian 
jiu shi cong wen ti chu fa 
yao qiu ju ti ming que 
cao zuo xing qiang 
bi ru jin qi gong bu de 
dang zheng ji guan guo nei gong wu jie dai guan li gui ding 
nei rong you da fan wei 
da fu du xiu gai he zeng jia 
wen bu zai duo 
zhe xie gui ding mei you yuan ze xuan gao he kong hua 
nei rong fei chang shi zai 
rang ren you ke yi zun cong de ju ti biao zhun 
zhi xing shi ye jiu geng hao ba wo 
fa bu zai yan 
gui zai zhi xing 
zai hao de gui zhang zhi du mei you zhi xing ye wu ji yu shi 
zai zhe yi dian shang 
zhong yang ling dao fa hui le zhi guan zhong yao de dai tou shi fan zuo yong 
zhua zuo feng jian she 
shou xian yao cong zhong yang zheng zhi ju zuo qi 
yao qiu bie ren zuo dao de zi ji xian yao zuo dao 
yao qiu bie ren bu zuo de zi ji jian jue bu zuo 
zhong yang ling dao tong zhi dai tou chui fan 
yi shen zuo ze 
zai gong wu huo dong zhong chi gong zuo can 
bu qing chang feng lu 
bu zu zhi ying song huo dong deng 
zhan xian le qin min wei min 
jie jian wu shi de you liang zuo feng 
wei ge ji ling dao gan bu he dang zheng ji guan gong zuo ren yuan zuo chu le biao shuai 
ru jin ge ji ling dao gan bu chu xing qing che jian cong 
jian shao pei tong 
jian hua jie dai yi jian cheng feng qi 
mei you wen ze 
bu she gao ya xian 
zai hao de zhi du he biao zhun ye nan zou xiao 
cong zhong yang dao di fang 
jia da le dui wei fan gui ding ren yuan de wen ze li du 
zhong ji wei jian cha bu fa bu de shu ju xian shi 
ge de cha chu wei fan zhong yang 
ba xiang gui ding 
yan ge de wen ze 
rang zhi du gang xing bing you li liang 
dui jing wei zhi du 
zun cong zhi du chan sheng le you xiao yin dao zuo yong 
xing bai li zhe ban jiu shi 
zai wei gong wu jie dai gai ge cheng ji xin xi de tong shi 
wo men ye ying kan dao 
gong wu jie dai bu zheng zhi feng shi chang qi ji lei de lou xi 
yi zhao kuo qing bing fei yi shi 
ding feng er wei zhe you zhi 
zhuan ru di xia zhe you zhi 
yi xie di fang he dan wei gao bian tong 
jiang nei bu shi tang zhuang xiu cheng hao hua jie dai chang suo 
zai pian pi zhi chu jian li yin bi de hui suo 
ji xu tao yong 
shang you zheng ce 
xia you dui ce 
de xing wei lu jing 
you de shen zhi reng bao zhe zhi li yi zhen feng 
feng tou yi guo juan tu chong lai de huan xiang 
you ci kan lai 
du jue gong wu jie dai bu zheng zhi feng 
wo men bi xu ji xu jia qiang zhi du jian she 
chang zhua bu xie 
che di chan chu gong wu jie dai bu zheng zhi feng 
xu jin yi bu gui fan bei jie dai dui xiang de 
yi xie di fang guan yuan xiang xin 
jie dai jiu shi ying dao li 
shi yin wei yi xie bei jie dai dui xiang zai fen pei zi yuan deng fang mian yong you tai duo de 
zhi you zhen zheng an zhao zhong yang yao qiu 
ba quan li guan jin zhi du de long zi li 
rang quan li zai fa zhi de gui dao shang yun xing 
dui gong wu jie dai bu zheng zhi feng cai neng fu di chou xin 
zhi biao geng zhi ben 
che di chan chu gong wu jie dai bu zheng zhi feng 
xu jin yi bu wan shan yu suan guan li zhi du he cai wu guan li zhi du 
guan zhu gong wu jie dai de zi jin lai yuan zhi guan zhong yao 
guo nei wai de shi jian gao su wo men 
yu suan guan li he cai wu guan li yue ju ti ming que 
yue yan ge jing xi 
gong kuan sui yi zhi pei de kong jian jiu yue xiao 
ju ti lai shuo yao zuo dao 
yan ge kong zhi zhi chu yu suan 
yan ge xian ding jie dai dui xiang 
yan ge she ding jie dai biao zhun 
yan ge luo shi shen pi zhi du 
shi xian he li jie dai 
che di chan chu gong wu jie dai bu zheng zhi feng 
xu jin yi bu tui xing xin xi gong kai zhi du 
shi xing yang guang jie dai shi zhi li jie dai fu bai de liang fang 
zai shi jie shang hen duo guo jia he di qu 
gong wu jie dai zhi chu dou bi xu xiang she hui gong kai 
jie shou gong zhong jian du 
xin chu tai de jie dai gui ding 
yao qiu xian ji yi shang dang zheng ji guan gong wu jie dai guan li bu men ying dang hui tong cai zheng bu men an nian du zu zhi gong kai ben ji guo nei gong wu jie dai zhi du gui ding 
jing fei zhi chu 
jie dai chang suo 
jie dai xiang mu deng you guan qing kuang 
jie shou she hui jian du 
zhe yi jing kai le yi ge hao tou 
xia yi bu ge de bi xu jiang qi zhen zheng luo dao shi chu 
che di chan chu gong wu jie dai bu zheng zhi feng 
jian du shi bu ke huo que de zhong yao bao zhang 
yao jian li zhang xiao jian du ji zhi 
rang wei gui zhe wu chu tao dun 
hai yao zhuo li shen hua gong wu jie dai guan li ti zhi gai ge 
jie dai fu wu she hui hua gai ge 
ji guan nei bu jie dai chang suo zhuan zhi gai ge 
ji guan suo shu jie dai zi yuan ji zhong tong yi guan li gai ge deng gai ge ju cuo 
quan mian chan chu zi sheng gong wu jie dai bu zheng zhi feng de tu rang 
zhi li gong wu jie dai bu zheng zhi feng bu ke neng bi qi gong yu yi yi 
wo men bi xu jian li geng jia yan ge de gui zhang zhi du 
bu duan chuang xin ti zhi ji zhi 
bing yu qi ta ling yu de gai ge cuo shi xiang hu pei he 
gong tong fa li 
li cu gong wu jie dai geng tou ming 
yi shi ji xing dong qu xin yu min 
zong he bao dao 
qi ta guo jia ye jiang lu xu bu ru xin nian 
quan qiu ge zhong ci jiu ying xin huo dong ye bu duan kai qi 
zai zhe xie chong man qi qu de xi su huo dong zhong 
ren men ci jiu qu hui qi 
ying xin nian qiu hao yun 
xi wang kai qi xin yi nian de mei hao zheng cheng 
ci jiu qu hui qi 
zai quan qiu ge de 
ren men dou hui yi bu tong fang shi lai hui qu jiu chen 
dan ge guo xing xing se se de xi su huo dong dou you yi ge gong tong zong zhi 
xiang guo qu yi nian gao bie 
qi dai xin yi nian geng jia mei hao 
ru guo you cang jiu cun dao xia yi nian hui bei ren wei bu ji li 
yin ci zai yi nian de zui hou yi ye 
mei ge jia ting dou yao he diao suo you de cang jiu 
yi bi mian lai nian you e yun 
zai yi da li 
pu tong jia ting dou hui shou shi jiu wu 
jiang wu zi li yi xie ke da sui de dong xi 
shuai ge fen sui 
hai yao ba jiu pen zi 
po pen lan guan tong tong reng dao men wai 
qu chu guo qu de e yun he fan nao 
nan fei yue han nei si bao de ren men sheng xing xiang chuang wai reng dong xi 
zai ying jie xin nian de wu ye 
dang di ju min hui cong chuang hu xiang wai reng ge zhong dong xi 
cong wei bo lu dao zheng zhang de chuang wu qi bu you 
you de shen zhi cong gao lou shang reng xia lai 
zai nan mei guo jia e gua duo er 
dang di min zhong tong chang hui fen shao ren xing bu ou lai qu chu guo qu yi nian de hui qi 
zhe xie dai biao mei yun de ren ou 
bing ba ta men cai zai jiao xia 
sui hou zai jiang qi fu zhi yi ju 
ying xin nian qiu hao yun 
wei yu tai ping yang nan bu de dao guo sa mo ya 
sa mo tong chang hui ju xing 
dang di nan nv lao shao hui ju ji qi lai zai ge zai wu 
niu yue shi bao guang chang kua nian shui jing qiu qi dong yi shi li lai dou shi quan qiu zhu mu di jiao dian 
ju ci qian bao dao 
er zai luo shan ji 
mei nian de mei gui hua che da you xing ye shi dang di ying jie xin nian de yi dao liang li feng jing xian 
ju zhu ban fang tou lu 
ta men hai jiang wei yi dui tong xing lian ju ban hun li 
mei guo pa sa di na xin nian mei gui hua che you xing yin zeng tian zhong guo yuan su 
guang fan shou dao zhu mu 
zai ying guo de su ge lan 
dang di ju xing huo ba jie huo dong qing zhu xin nian de xi su ju shi wen ming 
shou na dun pai yu huo ba 
yan zhe su ge lan shou fu ai ding bao de da jie jin xing you xing 
ying jie xin nian dao lai 
yi da li luo ma te you de ci jiu ying xin feng su shi tiao he ying xin nian 
zai han leng de dong tian 
luo ma ren guang zhe shen zi zai bing leng de shui zhong ying jie xin nian dao lai 
dang ran zui ling ren fei yi suo si de shi 
zhi li zhong bu ta er ka xiao zhen de min zhong hui yong xiang dang di mu di 
zai gu dian yin yue he zhu guang li tong shi qu de qin shu yi qi ying jie xin nian 
xu yuan song zhu fu 
xin yi nian de dao lai 
ye shi ge guo min zhong xu yuan song zhu fu de shi hou 
ri ben ge da bai huo gong si hui tui chu ge zhong fu dai 
dai nei wu pin de jia zhi wang wang shi dai wai biao jia qian de shu bei 
fu dai bu duo 
wei le neng tao ge tou cai 
ri ben ren chang chang xin nian yi da zao jiu qu pai dui 
zai shang dian kai men shi 
ren men dou ren wei zai xin nian zhong sheng qiao xiang hou di yi ge da dao jing shui de ren hui jiao hao yun 
da lai de shui shi ji xiang zhi shui 
zai xi ban ya 
shi kua nian chong tou xi 
dang guo nian ye de zhong sheng qiao xiang 
na me jiu dai biao ming nian shi xing yun de yi nian 
zai e luo si 
you ren hai hui zai xin nian ling shi da kai jia men bing xu yuan 
huo dian ran xie xia xin yuan de zhi tiao 
ran hou jiang hui jin fang jin jiu li he jin du li 
ju xiang gang da gong bao bao dao 
yang shi ma nian chun wan zhu chi zhen rong jiang lai ge da huan xue 
sui ran li nian chun wan zhu chi ren dou yao deng dao cai pai qian cai hui lu chu duan ni 
dan mei ti huo xi 
ma nian chun wan zhu chi ren xuan zao zai jian zu chu qi jiu bei ti shang le ri cheng 
er qie zhu chi zhen rong ye jiang you jiao da de bian hua 
mei ti huo xi 
ma nian chun wan zhu chi ren yi jing ji ben suo ding 
er qie chu le zhu chi ren wai 
hai you liang wei ying shi yan yuan jia meng 
zhu chi fang mian 
xie na de ke neng xing zui da 
er ling wai liang wei ying shi yan yuan zhong 
qi zhong yi wei ye hen you ke neng shi ci qian bao dao guo de zhang guo li 
chu dong shi jie 
ling nan mou di pao sheng long long 
xiao yan mi man 
zhan che zong heng chi cheng 
guang zhou jun qu mou lv zhan kai nian du jun shi xun lian kao he 
fa yuan cai pan wen shu quan mian shang wang jie shou gong zhong jian du 
ge ren hai wai zi chan xu shen bao 
cheng zhen pai shui yu wu shui chu li tiao li 
tie lu an quan guan li tiao li 
zui gao ren min fa yuan guan yu ren min fa yuan zai hu lian wang gong bu cai pan wen shu de gui ding 
xin xiu ding de 
guo ji shou zhi tong ji shen bao ban fa 
deng yi pi fa lv fa gui zheng shi shi shi 
you guo wu yuan zhi ding de 
tie lu an quan guan li tiao li 
jiang zi jin ri qi shi xing 
zai dong che zu lie che shang xi yan huo zhe zai qi ta lie che de jin yan qu yu xi yan 
jin zhi zai tie lu xian lu an quan bao hu qu nei shao huang 
fang yang sheng chu 
zhong zhi ying xiang tie lu xian lu an quan he xing che liao wang de shu mu deng zhi wu 
zai tie lu xian lu liang ce jian zao 
she li sheng chan 
chu cun huo zhe xiao shou yi ran 
yi bao huo zhe fang she xing wu pin deng wei xian wu pin de chang suo 
ying dang fu he guo jia biao zhun 
hang ye biao zhun gui ding de an quan fang hu ju li 
tie lu yun shu qi ye ying dang an zhao guo wu yuan tie lu hang ye jian du guan li bu men de gui ding shi shi huo che piao shi ming gou mai 
cha yan zhi du 
shi shi huo che piao shi ming gou mai 
cha yan zhi du de 
lv ke ying dang ping you xiao shen fen zheng jian gou piao cheng che 
dui che piao suo ji zai shen fen xin xi yu suo chi shen fen zheng jian huo zhe zhen shi shen fen bu fu de chi piao ren 
tie lu yun shu qi ye you quan ju jue qi jin zhan cheng che 
qiang diao jin zhi shi shi xia lie wei hai tie lu an quan de xing wei 
cong lie che shang pao reng za wu 
zai dong che zu lie che shang xi yan huo zhe zai qi ta lie che de jin yan qu yu xi yan 
zhan yong jin chu zhan tong dao huo zhe hou che qu 
wei fan gui ding de 
tie lu ji che che liang she ji zhi zao wei xiu jin kou xu ke ban fa 
tie lu yun shu ji chu she bei sheng chan qi ye shen pi ban fa 
tie lu ji che che liang jia shi ren yuan zi ge xu ke ban fa 
si jian pei tao gui zhang 
jiang yu jin ri qi yu 
tie lu an quan guan li tiao li 
tong bu shi xing 
tie lu xing zheng xu ke he xing zheng chu fa gong zuo jiang geng jia gui fan hua 
you guo wu yuan zhi ding de 
cheng zhen pai shui yu wu shui chu li tiao li 
jin ri qi shi xing 
cong shi gong ye 
yi liao deng huo dong de qi ye shi ye dan wei he ge ti gong shang hu yao pai fang wu shui 
bi xu qu de xu ke zheng 
bing dui wu shui jin xing yu chu li 
dui yu wei qu de xu ke zheng de pai wu zhe 
dui bao yu lai xi shi zai cheng shi 
zhe yi xin gui ye kai chu le 
yi fa sheng nei lao de cheng zhen yao gen ju cheng zhen ren kou yu gui mo 
bao yu nei lao feng xian deng yin su 
zhi ding nei lao fang zhi zhuan xiang gui hua 
yu ci tong shi 
hai ying bian zhi ying ji yu an 
jian li nei lao fang zhi yu jing 
lian dong ji zhi 
jia qiang yi lao dian zhi li 
dui xun jing shang ren wen ti 
ye ming que gui ding 
cheng zhen pai shui yu wu shui chu li she shi wei hu yun ying dan wei ying dang jia qiang ri chang xun cha 
wei xiu he yang hu 
jia qiang jing gai 
jian cha jing deng she shi de wei hu yu bao hu 
dui zai sheng shui de shi yong ye zuo chu le ming que gui ding 
ming que zhi chu 
guo jia gu li wu shui chu li zai sheng li yong 
gong ye sheng chan 
cheng shi lv hua 
dao lu qing sao 
che liang chong xi 
jian zhu shi gong yi ji sheng tai jing guan deng 
ying dang you xian shi yong zai sheng shui 
di fang zheng fu hai yao tong chou an pai zai sheng shui li yong deng she shi de jian she gai zao 
chu qin gui mo yang zhi wu ran fang zhi tiao li 
ye jiang zi jin ri qi shi xing 
jin zhi zai yin yong shui shui yuan bao hu qu 
feng jing ming sheng qu 
zi ran bao hu qu de he xin qu he huan chong qu 
cheng zhen ju min qu 
wen hua jiao yu ke xue yan jiu qu deng ren kou ji zhong qu yu ji fa lv 
fa gui gui ding de qi ta jin zhi yang zhi qu yu nei jian she chu qin yang zhi chang 
yang zhi xiao qu 
zai yin yong shui shui yuan bao hu qu jian she chu qin yang zhi chang 
yang zhi xiao qu de 
ran yi chu qin yi ji ran yi chu qin pai xie wu 
ran yi chu qin chan pin 
bing si huo zhe si yin bu ming de chu qin shi ti deng bing hai chu qin yang zhi fei qi wu 
ying dang jin xing shen mai 
fen shao deng wu hai hua chu li 
bu de sui yi chu zhi 
wei an zhao gui ding dui ran yi chu qin he bing hai chu qin yang zhi fei qi wu jin xing wu hai hua chu li de 
you dong wu wei sheng jian du ji gou ze ling wu hai hua chu li 
suo xu chu li fei yong you wei fa xing wei ren cheng dan 
bei shou guan zhu de kong qi zhong wu ran ying ji yu an you le xin xiao xi 
ning bo shi fu shi zhang chen yi jun zai ning bo shi hua jing ji ji shu kai fa qu you ji fei qi zheng zhi gong zuo hui yi shang tou lu 
ning bo shi zheng fu ming tian jiang zhao kai zhuan ti chang wu hui yi 
shen yi kong qi zhong wu ran ying ji yu an 
zhe yi wei zhe zhe fen yu an hen you ke neng huo de tong guo bing qie shi shi 
zhe fen yu an de ju ti nei rong ju xi gen hang zhou shi de da qi zhong wu ran ying ji yu an ji ben xiang shi 
zhi qian shi huan bao ju zai hui ying gong zhong wang luo ti wen shi 
ceng ti dao zheng zai qi cao zhi ding 
ning bo shi da qi zhong wu ran ying ji yu an 
ju ti nei rong you 
zai zhong du wu ran tian qi shi ni tong guo ting zhi hu wai huo dong 
bu fen qi ye lin shi ting 
gong wu che lin shi ting shi 
jin zhi shi zheng 
jian zhu chai qian deng shi wai jian zhu gong di shi gong yi ji zai qi xiang tiao jian yun xu qing kuang xia kai zhan ren gong jiang yu deng yi xi lie de cuo shi 
lai gai shan huan jing zhi liang 
fu shi zhang chen yi jun zai zuo tian hui yi shang shuo 
zhe duan shi jian 
ning bo shi min dui hui mai tian qi yuan sheng zai dao 
wo fen guan huan bao gong zuo yi lai 
mei tian zhong dian guan zhu de jiu shi huan bao fang mian de yu qing 
zhe duan shi jian shi min dui hui mai tian qi de bao yuan bi jiao ji zhong 
ning bo de kong qi zhi liang wu ran 
gong ye pai fang shi zhu yin 
xu chang cheng zai shi wei de yi ci hui yi shang shuo 
ning bo de hui mai tian qi he kong qi wu ran 
you wai lai wu ran yuan de zuo yong 
dan zhu yao hai shi ben di wu ran yuan 
wo wan quan tong yi ta de guan dian 
wo men bu neng zi qi qi ren 
geng bu neng qi pian lao bai xing shuo hui mai tian qi shi qi ta di fang chui guo lai de 
kong qi wu ran qu yu xing ying xiang shi you yi dian 
dan bu shi zhu yao ying xiang 
suo yi wo men dui hua gong you ji fei qi de zhi li 
shi dui lao bai xing fu ze 
ye shi dui zi ji fu ze 
ning bo kong qi zhi liang cha 
zhu yao lai zi ben di wu ran yuan bu shi wai mian chui lai de 
zhe shi ning bo you kong qi zhi liang zhi shu yi lai 
li shi zui zhang de kong qi wu ran tian qi 
ning bo shi huan bao ju ju zhang xu chang cheng tou lu 
dui zhe yang de hui mai tian qi he kong qi zhi liang 
bie shuo shi min you bao yuan 
na wo zi ji lai shuo dou bu man yi 
wo xiang xin zai zuo de ye yi yang 
chen yi jun shuo 
kong qi shi gong gong chan pin 
mei ge ren dou li bu kai 
jia li he dan wei ke yi zhuang kong qi jing hua qi 
dan ren bu ke neng shi shi dai zai mi bi de kong jian li 
duan zi jue sun de qian 
ni dou gan zhuan 
dian ming pi ping yi xie he zi qi ye bu huan bao de yao gan chu ning bo 
chen yi jun zai hui shang pi ping le yi xie qi ye jia zhi zhi dao zhuan qian 
bu zhi dao she hui ze ren de zuo fa 
zui jin you yi jia hua gong qi ye bei huan bao ju zhi fa zhi dui cha chu 
ju ran hai tuo ren shuo qing 
shuo neng bu neng bu ting gong 
neng bu neng bian sheng chan bian gai zao 
wo shuo ke yi a 
bu ting gong ni zuo lao a 
ni ren xian jin qu a 
chen yi jun ti gao yu qi shuo 
yi jing dui wo men de tu rang 
huan jing ying xiang le zhe me duo nian le 
zhe xie zhang suan de qing me 
bu ting gong hai zhuan lao bai xing de xue han qian 
zhe yang de qi ye yao ni gan ma 
zhe yang de qi ye jia wo men bu huan ying 
shuo yan zhong yi dian 
zhe shi duan zi jue sun de qian 
ni dou gan zhuan 
you yi xie hang ye 
hai shi zhong wai he zi qi ye 
zhan le wo men tu di hen da 
que mei shen me shui shou 
zhe yang de qi ye 
yao cai qu li du geng da de xian zhi cuo shi 
zhong xin cheng qu yi chuang da lou shi ji ge yi de shui shou 
duo de you shi ji ge yi 
ge bie zhong wai he zi qi ye 
zhan le wo men wu liu qian mu tu di 
chan chu jiu na me ji ge yi 
wu ran quan bu zai wo men dang di 
zhe yang de qi ye wo men bu yao 
chen yi jun shuo 
qi ye jia bao kuo lao wai yao jiang dian liang xin jiang dian dao de 
shi zheng fu jiang zhuo zhong zhua hao zhong wu ran hang ye de zheng zhi ti sheng gong zuo 
chu le ban qian de qi ye wai 
qi ta de qi ye yao quan bu wan cheng zheng zhi ti sheng he yan shou 
you qi shi hua gong 
zhu zao he jin shu rong lian san da hang ye 
dui gao pai fang 
gao neng hao di xiao yi de 
yao jian jue tao tai 
jing xin wei yao zhua luo shi 
ba ming dan lie chu lai 
mei you tao jia huan jia de yu di 
ming nian shi zheng fu hai yao jia da dui shi yi ge xian shi qu he you guan bu men dui huan jing bao hu gong zuo de kao he li du 
zai huan bao wen ti shang 
shi zheng fu zhuan men zai gong an ju zeng bian zeng ren 
cheng li zhuan men de gong an huan jing fan zui zhen cha zhi dui 
zai she hui shang xing cheng wei she li 
huan jing fan zui zhen cha zhi dui de zhi ze bao kuo 
xie tiao zhen ban she xian huan jing fan zui de xing shi an jian 
zhi jie cha chu he zhen ban she hui fan ying qiang lie 
xia ji gong an ji guan cha ban kun nan de huan jing fan zui an jian ji shi wei 
shi zheng fu he shang ji gong an ji guan jiao ban de ying xiang huan jing an quan de zhong da an jian deng 
hang zhou da qi zhong wu ran ying ji yu an 
hui qi dong hong se yu jing 
xian xing fan wei bu bian 
qi dong cheng se yu jing 
jian yi zhong xiao xue jian shao zan ting ge lei shi wai ti yu huo dong 
tuo you ji gou zan ting suo you you er shi wai huo dong 
du shi kuai bao ji zhe zhang ming ming tong xun yuan chen xiao zhong 
han guo wang luo jie tu 
ya zhou jing ji 
zai han guo mou zai xian lun tan shang 
shi jie shang zui gui de hou yuan xian shen 
yi ze ti wei 
de tie zi yin fa han guo wang you re yi de hua ti 
zai gong kai de zhao pian zhong 
zai lv se cao di shang 
yi ge xian dai gan he shi dai gan ji qiang de jian zhu wu ying ru yan lian 
nin ke neng mei you xiang dao 
ti yu guan you mei guo yi jian zhu gong si gong kai 
de ang gui jia ge 
han guo wang you fen fen cheng 
zhe ge wo ye mai bu qi a 
kan lai wo zhe yi bei zi jiu wo ju de le 
zhe ke bu neng rang wo de nv you kan jian le 
yao bu ran ke neng hui fen shou o 
mei ri you bao 
han guo ke xue jia ri qian fa xian nan xing chang shou de mi jue 
dan nan yi qi chi de shi zhe yi mi jue ju ran shi yan ge 
yan jiu jie guo xian shi yan ge hou de nan xing bi pu tong nan xing huo de geng jiu 
de chu le zhe yi que ding jie lun 
yi ge shi ji qian 
bei yan ge de nan xing que shi bi qi ta nan xing huo de geng jiu 
zhe ye jiu yi wei zhe nan xing xiong xing he er meng hen ke neng qi zhe suo duan nan xing shou ming de zuo yong 
zhe zai dang dai dou shi fei chang shao jian de chang shou nian ling 
yan jiu jie guo xian shi 
er qie huang di he huang shi nan xing cheng yuan de shou ming shi suo you ren zhong zui duan de 
han guo ren he da xue de - cheng 
zhe xiang fa xian ye wei jie shi nan nv shou ming cha ju ti gong le xian suo 
yin wei nv xing de ping jun shou ming chang yu nan xing 
zong he xin hua she zhu wai ji zhe bao dao 
zai ci jiu ying xin zhi ji 
ge guo zheng yao yi ji guo ji zu zhi ling dao ren fen fen fa biao xin nian he ci 
biao da zai xin de yi nian li ti zhen jing ji 
wen ding zheng ju 
gai shan min sheng de yuan wang he xin xin 
de guo zong li mo ke er 
de guo he ou zhou xi xi xiang guan 
zai dang tian fa biao de he ci zhong 
mo ke er qiang diao 
de guo qu de de cheng jiu tong zheng ge ou zhou de jin bu xi xi xiang guan 
zhi you ou zhou zheng ti shang jin bu 
zhu quan zhai wu wei ji de dao yong jiu xing jie jue 
de guo cai neng qu de jin bu 
jiu de guo zheng fu er yan 
mo ke er shuo 
wei lai reng you hen duo gong zuo yao zuo 
yi bao chi guo jia qiang sheng 
qi zhong zui zhong yao de bao kuo bao chi cai zheng wen ding 
cheng gong wan cheng neng yuan zhuan xing 
zai she hui ri yi lao ling hua he duo yang hua di qing kuang xia bao zheng jiu ye he he zuo deng 
ta hai hu yu de guo min zhong wei lai bao chi yong qi 
bing cheng dan geng duo de she hui ze ren 
han guo zong tong pu jin hui 
ning ju guo jia li liang wen bu qian xing 
pu jin hui zai dang tian fa biao de he ci zhong cheng nuo 
zai xin de yi nian li 
zheng fu jiang bao hu hao jing ji fu su shi tou 
huo yue jing ji 
wen ding min sheng 
ning ju guo jia li liang wen bu qian xing 
ye xi wang quan ti guo min qi xin xie li 
wei shi xian jing ji teng fei gong xian li liang 
wei hu guo jia an quan shi zhen xing guo jia jing ji de shou yao tiao jian 
yin er zheng fu jiang jia qiang wei ji guan li ti zhi 
ji ji wei hu chao xian ban dao he ping 
han guo she hui xu duo fang mian dou cun zai bu zheng chang de guan li 
jin hou zheng fu jiang chi xu tui jin gai ge 
chuang jian zheng chang she hui 
xi wang xin de yi nian li ke yi shou huo bian hua de guo shi 
rang guo min de sheng huo bian de yue lai yue fu zu 
yue lai yue xing fu 
tai guo kan shou zong li ying la 
zhao dao he ping de chu lu 
de ge ren zhu ye shang fa biao xin nian he ci 
xi wang tai guo neng zhong gui he xie he ping jing 
wo zhu fu suo you tai guo min zhong qi xin xie li 
zhong gui you ai yu he mu 
xi wang suo you cun zai zheng jian fen qi huo xin yang bu tong de ren neng gou hui guo tou mian dui mian 
wei wo men de guo jia zhao dao he ping de chu lu 
ying la cheng nuo 
zai dang qian ju shi xia ta jiang ji xu ren zhen gong zuo 
jue bu qi nei 
bao chi ren nai 
tong shi ye jiang wei guo jia hui fu he xie jin li 
nan fei zong tong zu ma 
xi wang ren ren dou you gong zuo 
zu ma zai dang tian fa biao de he ci zhong shuo 
xin de yi nian ji jiang dao lai 
wo men bi xu wei shi xian fan rong zhi meng er ji xu gong tong nu li 
na jiu shi ren ren you gong zuo 
mei ge ren dou neng wei zheng ge guo jia de fa zhan zuo chu you yi yi de gong xian 
ta hu yu min zhong ji cheng qian zong tong man de la de yi zhi 
ji xu zhi xing min zu he jie zheng ce 
jia qiang min zu tuan jie 
zai tan dao dui wai guan xi shi 
ta xi wang zai xin de yi nian li nan fei neng yu shi jie ge guo jian li geng wei lao gu de guan xi 
ao da li ya zong li a bo te 
geng duo xuan ze 
geng duo zi you 
a bo te zai he ci zhong shuo 
zai xin de yi nian li 
xi wang geng duo de ren neng gou qu nu li 
yin wei zhe shi gou jian fan rong qiang da guo jia de tu jing 
er ta he ta de zheng fu ze jiang lv xing zi ji de zhi ze 
ji xu zhi li yu fei chu bu he li shui shou 
jian shao xing zheng zhang ai he bu bi yao de huan bao fa gui 
zhong jie lang fei 
ji xu ji chu she shi jian she yi ji jia qiang zheng fu yu suan 
wo de ji hua shi gei ni men geng duo de xuan ze 
geng duo de zi you he geng shao de zheng fu xian zhi yao qiu 
ji ci lai rang ni men wei zi ji he ao da li ya gou jian yi ge geng hao de wei lai 
ru pan guo zui ming cheng li 
mu sha la fu huo mian lin si xing huo wu qi tu xing 
zhe jiang gei cui ruo de ba zheng ju dai lai xin de bu wen ding 
you yu mu sha la fu ru jin reng ju you yi ding ying xiang li 
ci ci shen li jie guo jiang gei ba zheng tan dai lai ying xiang 
shen li shi jian tui chi 
dan jing fang dang tian zai mu sha la fu qu wang fa ting de lu shang fa xian le zha yao 
chu yu an quan kao lv 
mu sha la fu yi lu jun can mou zhang shen fen shi shi jin ji zhuang tai 
ci ju she xian wei xian 
zhe cheng wei ta yan xia zao dao pan guo zui zhi kong de yuan yin 
ba ji si tan guan fang zheng shi qi dong dui mu sha la fu pan guo zui zhi kong de su song cheng xu 
san ming cheng yuan zu cheng le te bie fa ting 
zhe shi ba li shi shang shou ci dui jun fang qian ling dao ren yi pan guo zui ti qi su song 
ge fang fan xiang bu yi 
mu sha la fu de lv shi ceng duo ci biao shi 
zhen dui mu sha la fu de zhi kong dai you ming xian de zheng zhi se cai 
shi xian ren zong li xie li fu qi tu tong guo fa ting fan jiu zhang 
shi ren ba ji si tan zong li xie li fu xuan bu jie chu mu sha la fu de lu jun can mou zhang deng zhi wu 
mu sha la fu sui hou xuan bu jie san zheng fu 
ba ji si tan yi xie ren shi dui zhi kong mu sha la fu pan guo de shi ji ti chu zhi yi 
ren wei guo jia ru jin zheng mian lin lai zi ta li ban shi li de wei xie 
guo jia xu yao yi kao jun dui lai da ji ta li ban wu zhuang 
er zhen dui mu sha la fu de shen pan ke neng hui yin qi jun dui nei bu dong dang 
xu duo fan dui dang ling dao ren ren wei 
qi su mu sha la fu de yi tu zai yu xue ruo ba jun fang de li liang 
zhuan yi gong zhong dui ba guo nei wei ji de zhu yi li 
er ba ji si tan dang qian mian lin yi xi lie nei bu tiao zhan 
yi wu li cheng dan zhe yang yi chang shen pan 
zheng fu cheng dan ya li 
mu sha la fu zai jie shou yi jia wai guo mei ti cai fang shi shuo 
zhen dui qi ben ren de pan guo zui zhi kong shi yi zhong 
ba ji si tan zheng ge jun dui dui pan guo zui de zhi kong gan dao bu an 
zai pan guo zui de zhi kong wen ti shang 
jun fang de tai du shi he ta yi zhi de 
dan dao mu qian wei zhi 
ba ji si tan jun fang hai mei you jiu mu sha la fu yin pan guo zui shou shen zuo chu ren he gong kai xing de ping lun 
fen xi ren shi ren wei 
mu qian zai ba ji si tan 
jun fang reng ran fa hui zhe ju zu qing zhong de ying xiang li 
ba ji si tan zheng fu zai dui dai mu sha la fu pan guo zui an jian wen ti shang ying gai fei chang jin shen 
zhe shi ba ji si tan li shi shang shou ci dui qian jun shi ling dao ren yi pan guo zui ti qi su song 
ba ji si tan zheng fu yin ci mian lin hen da ya li 
chi huo lv xing qi shi shi 
zou dao na li 
chi dao na li 
dan bing cong kou ru 
you xie shi wu chi bu de 
xia mian yi qi kan lv you wang zhan 
wei guang da chi huo peng you jie mi shi wu zhong de 
he tun ri ben 
shi yong feng xian 
zu yi bi ming 
you cheng he tun yu huo huang ma lu 
yi dan zai wei jing qu chu gan yi ji sheng yu xi tong di qing kuang xia wu shi 
ji xiao shi nei zu yi zhi ren si wang 
yao jing zhang da san nian de zhuan ye xue xi cai neng xue hui ru he zheng que chu li he tun 
ri ben he tun de zui da pi fa shi chang shi xia guan gang shi 
ru jin zai chao shi ye ke yi mai dao 
qing xian ren zhun an quan biao zhi zai gou mai 
shen zhi you ren kai shi yang zhi wu du he tun 
dan you ren hui jue de zhe bo duo le chi he tun de le qu 
zhong du zheng zhuang 
he tun ti nei de he tun du su hui ma bi ren de ji rou zui zhong dao zhi zhi xi 
mei you jie yao 
dan ru guo neng gou ren gong hu xi dao du xing san qu wei zhi 
ze ke neng sheng huan 
tu pian lai yuan 
ying guo mei ti 
mei ri you bao 
de chao ji shan di che 
cong er zai shi jie ji lu zhong huo de yi xi zhi di 
da po shi jie ji lu 
dong zhi hou jin ru 
shu jiu han tian 
yi wei zhe yi nian zhong zui leng de jie duan yao dao lai le 
wei da dao yu han bao nuan de mu di 
zai yin shi shang ying zuo chu yi xia gai bian 
shi dang zeng jia gao dan bai zhi shi wu de she ru 
bi ru chu qin rou 
yu rou he ji dan deng 
hong rou zhong hai fu han yi bei xi shou de xue hong su tie 
yan jiu biao ming 
yin shi zhong zeng jia tie de she ru 
kang han neng li hui zeng qiang 
xu yao zhu yi de shi 
yao zeng jia de shi fu han dan bai zhi di shou rou 
er bu shi zhi fang duo de fei rou 
chi fan qian he wan re zhou huo re tang 
han leng de qi wen xia 
he shang yi wan re hu hu de zhou 
bu dan hui rang shen ti li ke gan dao wen nuan 
hai neng nuan chang wei 
huan xing xiao hua xi tong 
cu jin shi yu 
you qi shi za liang zhou hai neng bang zhu bu chong zu wei sheng su he jia deng duo zhong ying yang su 
dong ji qi hou gan zao 
geng ying bu chong shui fen 
er he zhou ye neng rang ni zai bu zhi bu jue zhong he xia le hen duo shui 
chu le re zhou 
fan qian he wan shao you shao yan de re tang ye shi bu cuo de xuan ze 
ling shi shou xuan jian guo 
jian guo duo ban zai qiu tian cheng shu 
yin ci ye suan shi qiu dong ji jie de ying ji shi pin 
jian guo zhong han you feng fu de wei sheng su 
zu wei sheng su 
gai deng kuang wu zhi 
hai you yi ding liang de dan bai zhi 
dou neng bang zhu ren men di kang han leng 
jian guo de ying yang su mi du jiao gao 
neng zai yi ding cheng du shang mi bu dong tian shi wu zhong lei xiang dui jiao shao de que xian 
tian leng de shi hou 
bu fang ba bing gan 
dian xin deng ling shi huan cheng jian guo 
xu yao ti xing de shi 
jian guo zui hao xuan yuan wei de 
qie mei tian chi de liang bie chao guo yi xiao ba 
duo chi hei se shi wu 
zhong yi ti chang dong tian bu shen 
er hei se ru shen 
cong xian dai ying yang xue de jiao du fen xi 
lan mei deng zi hei se shi wu zhong fu han de hua qing su shi yi zhong qiang kang yang hua ji 
ta neng gou yu fang ai zheng 
zeng qiang xue guan tan xing 
hai ke bao hu shi li 
duo chi hei se shi wu dui yu yu fang qiu dong ji jie duo fa de xin xue guan ji bing ye neng qi dao yi ding zuo yong 
li jie kuai nan kuai nv deng ming xing da wan 
dai lai zhong duo jing dian qu mu he chuang yi biao yan 
jiang qi fen shu du xian fan 
chang nei quan cheng jian jiao sheng 
zhang sheng bu duan 
da he chang chang mian geng shi shu ci chu xian 
zhong xin wang ji zhe zhang long yun she 
zheng chang yan chu zai xiao bang de 
jiang xiao diao ye qu 
li yun di xian zou le 
xiao bang jiang da diao ye qu 
shu man da diao huan xiang qu 
li si te ta lan tai la wu qu 
yun nan min ge wu shou 
li yun di tou lu 
xin zhuan ji ye zai chou bei zhong 
bei jing qin tong bei bei 
jia na da hua yi gang qin shen tong wang shuai wen deng tai yan zou 
jin qi yin re bo jie mu 
ba ba qu na er 
ren qi chao wang de wang shi ling he ma ma li xiang liang xiang 
li yun di xian shou ba shou jiao 
wang shi ling yan zou er ge 
you qin zi ban zou 
you wang shi ling yan chang gai ge qu 
quan chang yi pian wen xin 
wang shi ling hai qin wen le li yun di 
qing yuan shi qing cheng qu huan bao ju ju zhang chen bai he 
shi pin jie tu 
ri qian bei shi ming ju bao she xian le suo qi ye 
fen fen zhong ke yi gao kua yi jian chang 
de qing cheng qu huan bao ju ju zhang chen bai he yi bei mian qu qing cheng qu qu wei wei yuan 
qu huan bao ju dang zu shu ji 
ju zhang deng zhi wu bing li an diao cha 
ju bao chen bai he de lu yin 
nei rong shu shi 
you qing yuan shi min xiang gai shi qing cheng qu ji wei shi ming ju bao chen bai he wei ji 
bing ti gong yi duan dian hua lu yin 
cheng chen bai he xiang qi ta ren jiang shou ru he li yong shou zhong zhi quan lai qiao zha le suo xia qu qi ye 
ci shi jing mei ti bao dao hou shou dao wang luo he she hui guan zhu 
you qi shi lu yin zhong 
fen fen zhong ke yi gao kua yi jian chang 
de shuo fa yin fa re yi 
chen bai he jie shou guang dong bu fen mei ti cai fang shi cheng 
dui ci shi li an diao cha 
bing yao qing xiang guan bu men tong guo ji shu shou duan dui lu yin de zhen shi xing jin xing jian ding 
qing cheng qu zheng fu men hu wang zhan zuo tian fa bu 
guan yu qing cheng qu huan bao ju ju zhang chen bai he you guan wen ti de tong bao 
cheng jing guang dong sheng gong an si fa jian ding zhong xin zhuan jia jian ding he qing cheng qu ji wei deng xiang guan bu men de diao cha qu zheng 
guan yu qun zhong shi ming ju bao chen bai he de dian hua lu yin nei rong shu shi 
chen bai he que you tan lun le yu qi shen fen bu xiang fu de yan lun 
tong shi fa xian chen bai he hai she xian qi ta wei ji wen ti 
zhe fen tong bao hai shuo 
jing qing cheng qu wei jue ding 
mian qu chen bai he de qing cheng qu qu wei wei yuan 
qu huan bao ju dang zu shu ji 
ju zhang zhi wu 
bing dui qi jin xing li an diao cha 
zhi yao ding si nei xie chang zhang 
ta men jiu hui guai guai song qian 
ju ju bao ren jie shao 
ta yin gong zuo guan xi chang yu chen bai he lian xi 
ju bao qian xie tian chen bai he que bu jie ta de dian hua 
ta yong ling yi bu shou ji da tong le chen bai he de dian hua 
dan chen bai he yi zhi mei gen ta shuo hua 
ye mei gua duan dian hua 
ju bao ren shuo 
ta cong dian hua zhong ting dao 
chen bai he shuo 
yi ta jin tian de zhi wei 
fen fen zhong ke yi gao kua yi jian chang 
chen bai he shuo 
zuo liang ci jiu ke yi shou shou 
ni kan ta gan bu gan jie fa 
ni yao ming bai yi ge dao li 
jiu suan mei you wo chen bai he zuo 
yi yang hui you chen er 
qi shi wo shen me dou bu yong zuo 
zhi yao zhao yi liang jian chang 
dao le na li da ma jiang 
jiu ke yi ding si nei xie chang zhang 
ta men jiu hui guai guai song qian gei wo le 
shi qi pai chu suo de lu jing guan chu jing shi 
fa xian pai chu suo tai jie bian shang zhan zhe yi ge xiao gu niang 
tian qi hen leng 
xiao gu niang lian dong de fa zi 
dan ta di zhe tou zhan zai na li yi dong bu dong 
lu jing guan wen le hao ji bian 
xiao peng you ni you shen me shi 
xiao gu niang cai man man cong kou dai li na chu yi zhang zhi tiao di le guo lai 
lu jing guan yi kan 
you dian hu tu 
de zhi shi qing yuan wei hou 
ta you le le 
dao di zen me hui shi 
lu jing guan shuo chu liao shi qing de shi mo 
na zhe bao zheng shu zhan zai pai chu suo men kou 
xiao gu niang di guo lai de shi yi zhang huang se de zuo ye zhi 
yi kan jiu shi cong zuo ye ben shang si xia lai de 
shang mian wai wai niu niu xie zhe ji ge zi 
ru guo wo zai tou qian mai dong xi 
jiu qu pai chu suo yong yuan bu yao hui lai le 
luo kuan shi mou mou tong yi 
wang zhuo yan qian zhe zhang zhi tiao 
lu jing guan hu tu le 
lu jing guan bian jiang xiao gu niang dai dao jie jing da ting 
xun wen chu le ge da gai 
xiao gu niang xing lin 
zai shi qi yi suo xiao xue du san nian ji 
zi ji zhi suo yi hui chu xian zai zhe li 
shi yin wei tou le jia li de qian 
zhe zhang bao zheng shu shi xiao lin zhi qian gei ba ba xie de 
zhe ji tian ta you tou le jia li de qian 
ba ba jiu jiao ta qi chuang 
ba ta song dao shi qi pai chu suo rang ta zi ji he min jing shu shu shuo qing chu 
lin xian sheng hui jia le 
xiao lin you bu gan zou dao li mian qu 
xiao gu niang yi da zao jiu bei ba ba song dao pai chu suo 
you leng you e 
lu jing guan jiu xian dai ta qu shi tang chi zao can 
chi zao can guo cheng zhong 
xiao lin hen you li mao 
dui lu jing guan shuo xie xie 
zhe me guai qiao de xiao gu niang 
ba ba wei shen me yao zhe me yan li 
hai zi tou jia li qian wei le mai la ji shi pin 
chi wan zao fan 
lu jing guan jiang xiao lin song hui jia 
xiao lin shi tai zhou ren 
fu mu zai shi qi kai le jia wu jin pei jian dian 
jia li hai you yi ge liu qi sui de di di 
kan dao min jing dai zhe nv er hui lai shi 
lin xian sheng ye you dian bu hao yi si 
ni zen me hui shi a 
nv er you cuo yao hao hao jiao yu 
zen me neng da qing zao jiu jiang ta yi ge ren liu zai wo men na bian 
wan yi wo men mei kan dao 
huo zhe chu le shen me shi 
zen me ban a 
lu jing guan you dian sheng qi 
lin xian sheng gao su min jing 
ping shi nv er yao mai shen me wen ju dou gei ta mai de 
xiang chi shen me ye jin guan kai kou 
fu qi lia ping shi bu rang hai zi chi nei xie bu wei sheng de 
bu jian kang de la ji shi pin 
er hai zi dui zhe dong xi you mei di kang li 
fu mu bu gei zi ji mai 
jiu tou tou na jia li qian zi ji qu mai 
mei ci dou shi yi liang kuai qian 
wo ye shi xiang hao hao jiao yu a 
ke ta lao shi na jia li qian qu mai dong xi 
wo shi shuo ye shuo le 
ma ye ma le 
da ye da le 
bao zheng shu ye rang ta qin shou xie hao 
zhe ci ta you tou na jia li de qian le 
lin xian sheng shuo 
zhe ge xi guan bi xu yao rang ta gai 
min jing ding zhu xiao lin yi hou bu neng tou na jia li de qian 
xiang mai shen me dong xi jiu gen ba ba shuo 
xiao lin guai qiao di dian dian tou 
min jing ye ding zhu le xiao lin ba ba 
yi ding yao duo guan xin guan xin nv er 
duo he hai zi gou tong 
bi mian zhe zhong shi qing zai ci fa sheng 
tong xun yuan li ji ji zhe zhu lin hua 
min jing shuo fa 
hai zi jiao yu wen ti yi zhi yi lai shi jia zhang bi jiao tou tong de wen ti 
dan jia zhang zai jiao yu hai zi shi yi ding yao zhu yi fang shi fang fa 
xiao lin ba ba de chu fa dian shi hao de 
dan fang fa guo yu yan ke 
hen duo xiao hai zi ke neng pa jing cha shu shu 
jia zhang peng you men zai mei you ke xing you xiao de ban fa zhi xia 
ni ke yi shi xian gen wo men gou tong hao 
rang wo men jiao yu yi xia hai zi 
dan qian wan bu yao yi sheng bu keng jiang hai zi song dao pai chu suo 
zhe yang hen you ke neng hui dui hai zi shen xin zao cheng bu liang ying xiang 
shi qi pai chu suo 
shu ma he jie shou di er ci shou shu qing kuang shao wei hao zhuan hua xue shi gu yuan yin reng zai diao cha zhong 
sai che wang shu ma he ri qian zai fa guo hua xue shi yi wai shou shang zhu jin yi yuan 
ju zhu zhi yi sheng jie shao 
zai jin xing di er ci shou shu hou shu ma he de shen ti zhuang kuang chu xian hao zhuan 
dan reng mei you tuo li sheng ming wei xian 
gen ju yi yuan zui xin ji zhe hui shang de xiao xi 
yi yuan dui shu ma he jin xing le xin de nao bu sao miao 
fa xian nao bu di qing kuang shao wei hao zhuan 
jie ci ji hui 
yi yuan zai huo de shu ma he jia shu de tong yi xia 
dui shu ma he jin xing le di er ci wai ke shou shu 
yi zhi chi xu le jin liang ge xiao shi 
shou shu hen cheng gong 
yi chu le nao bu zuo ce de yi ge hen da de xue kuai 
shu ma he de shang qing yi jing shao you hao zhuan 
dan dui yu ta de bing qing shi fou hui ji xu hao zhuan 
yi sheng huan shi hen jin shen 
ren wei mu qian qing kuang hai hen cui ruo 
gei xin zhong de che wang jia you 
she jiao wang luo tui te shang ye wei shu ma he song qu le cheng qian shang wan de zhu fu 
qi zhong mei guo qian zong tong ke lin dun zai tui te zhong wei ta qi dao 
fa guo xian ren guo ji qi lian zhu xi 
jin ji di da shi gu fa sheng de deng deng 
ta men dou xi wang ji yu che wang zui you li de zhi chi he zhu fu 
xi wang ta jin kuai tuo li wei xian 
zao ri kang fu 
yi wai shi gu fa sheng dang tian 
dang di xian bing jiu yi jing dui shi gu yuan yin zhan kai diao cha 
gen ju de guo mei ti de bao dao 
shu ma he de fa yan ren ke mu tou lu le yi xie shi fa xian chang xi jie 
ren wei dang shi shu ma he zhi suo yi qian wang fei hua xue dao qu yu 
shi wei le jiu zhu zai na li shuai dao de peng you 
er qie ta dang shi bu shi yin wei su du tai kuai shuai dao 
er shi yin wei zai yi ge zhuan wan chu 
ce hua shi kong 
nao bu zhuang zai le yan shi shang 
ta de tou kui dang chang shuai sui 
dan shi dui yu zhe xie nei rong 
fa fang mu qian reng zai dui ju ti de shi gu yuan yin jin xing diao cha 
ji zhe zhu zeng lan 
ling ju mei ti bao dao 
fa guo ge lei nuo bu er 
yuan yi ji fang cheng shi fa la li che dui de zhi xing dong shi 
qian ren fa la li gong si 
guo ban ri qian yin fa 
guan yu ling dao gan bu dai tou zai gong gong chang suo jin yan you guan shi xiang de tong zhi 
ti chu ge ji ling dao gan bu bu de zai jin zhi xi yan de gong gong chang suo xi yan 
ge ji dang zheng ji guan gong wu huo dong zhong yan jin xi yan 
yao ba ge ji dang zheng ji guan jian cheng wu yan ji guan deng wu xiang yao qiu 
ji zhe ri qian zai hu nan 
zai xi yan cheng wei yi zhong 
pu bian li yi 
zheng fu ji guan jin yan shi xiao reng you dai guan cha 
chou bu chou yan zhu yao kan 
zui da de ling dao 
hu nan sheng wei jing ji gong zuo hui yi xian chang 
hu nan sheng wei shu ji xu shou sheng zhuan men ti dao le zhong yang xia fa de ling dao gan bu dai tou zai gong gong chang suo jin yan de gui ding 
yao qiu can hui de quan ti ren yuan yan ge zun shou 
zai hui yi jian xi 
ji zhe hai shi kan dao yi xie yu hui dai biao zai zou lang guo dao deng gong gong chang suo 
hai you dai biao si xia yi lun shuo 
wei shen me bu rang chou yan le 
yi wei jing chang can jia hu nan sheng zhong yao hui yi de guan yuan shuo 
guo qu zai hu nan you ge tong xing de 
ji hui chang chou bu chou yan zhu yao kan 
zui da de ling dao 
yi ba shou bu chou yan 
jiu dou qiang xing bie zhe 
yi ba shou chou yan 
xia mian de gan bu jiu gen zhe tun yun tu wu qi lai 
ji zhe zou jin hu nan mou sheng zhi ji guan de ban gong lou 
kan dao zhi you yi lou tie you 
qing wu xi yan 
zai si lou wen yin shi men kou 
di shang yi ge lan se yan di fei chang xian yan 
lou ti guai jiao chu de la ji tong shang 
yi wei gong zuo ren yuan jie shi shuo 
zhe xie yan tou ke neng shi guo lai ban shi de ren reng xia de 
ji guan gan bu guo qu hui zai zou lang 
wei sheng jian xi yan 
dan xian zai zhe zhong xian xiang bi jiao shao le 
ying gai man man lai jie 
xu yao yi ge guo cheng 
zai he nan sheng yi min ban 
yi wei gan bu biao shi 
ta fei chang yong hu guo jia chu tai ling dao gan bu gong wu huo dong zhong yan jin xi yan zheng ce 
bu guo zhe xu yao guo cheng 
bu neng zhao ji 
hen duo xi huan xi yan de ling dao yi jing yang cheng le xi guan 
hen nan yi xia jie yan 
zhe yang shen ti rong yi nei fen mi shi tiao 
yin ci ying gai man man lai jie 
xu yao yi ge guo cheng 
guo jia gong wu yuan ying gai you qi zhu zhong xing xiang 
ying gai dai tou zai hui yi shi deng gong gong chang suo jin zhi xi yan 
ru guo yan yin bi jiao da 
ke yi dao wei sheng jian 
xi yan shi deng si mi kong jian xi yan 
zai he nan sheng qi xiang ju 
ju dang ban liang zhu ren jie shao 
qi xiang ju ban gong lou wei wu yan ban gong lou 
ta men hen zao jiu zai lou ti jian 
gong gong qu yu xuan gua le jin zhi xi yan biao zhi 
kai hui shi jin zhi xi yan 
zai da ting yu lou dao nei 
ji zhe mei you fa xian yan tou 
ye mei you kan dao you ling dao gan bu xi yan di qing kuang 
shi zai ao bu zhu le 
wo qu ce suo chou ba 
ji zhe lai dao hang zhou mou si xing ji fan dian 
nian mo you duo ge sheng shi bu men hui yi zai zhe li zhao kai 
zai qi zhong yi ceng hui yi zhong xin 
ji zhe kan dao 
kai hui zhong jian bu shi you ren cong hui yi shi zou dao guo dao huo zhe da ting zhong chou yan 
you de du zi chou yan 
you de san san liang liang bian liao bian chou 
jian dao ji zhe cai fang 
qi zhong yi wei zheng zai chou yan de mou gan bu hen jing ya 
wo hai bu zhi dao zhe ge gui ding 
bu hao yi si 
yi hou bu chou le 
shuo zhe ta xi mie le xiang yan 
ji mang zou hui hui yi shi 
ling yi wei chou yan de gan bu ye xian de bu hao yi si 
shi zai ao bu zhu le 
wo qu ce suo chou ba 
ce suo ye ke neng suan gong gong chang suo 
mei zai zhi sheng 
zhe jiang yi wei xian ji xuan chuan bu fu bu zhang shuo 
ta shi bei dong xi yan zhe 
gan bu zhi jian dou jiang mian zi 
you qi shi ling dao xi yan 
ni bu xi jiu bu tai hao kan 
zhe ci zhong yang de jin yan ling you wang 
xiang ta zhe yang de ren 
xin nian di yi tian ling dian gang guo 
yu le quan sui ji pu chu xi shi 
wu jing fa bu xin nian wei bo gong bu hun xun 
yi bu xiao xin 
yu jian le ni ; yi bu xiao xin 
ai shang le ni ; yi bu xiao xin 
hun xun yi gong bu sui ji yin fa da pian wang you zhuan fa 
quan nei hao you geng shi fen fen song chu zhu fu 
qi zhong hai dian qu ji wei jian cha ju yuan fu ke ji jian cha yuan lu yan qing yin zai fa lang nei piao chang bei shuang kai 
ci wai hai you bei jing shi zhong da xiang mu ban gong shi ji jian zu yuan zu zhang deng ren de wei fa wei ji qing kuang 
tong bao zhong cheng 
hai dian qu ji wei jian cha ju yuan fu ke ji jian cha yuan lu yan qing fang hai she hui guan li zhi xu 
lu yan qing zai hai dian qu mou fa lang nei piao chang 
hai dian qu ji wei 
jian cha ju ji yu qi kai chu dang ji 
xing zheng kai chu chu fen 
tong zhou qu zhang jia wan zhen ji wei yuan fu shu ji 
ma zhan wu li yong dan ren tong zhou qu zhang jia wan zhen zheng fu min zheng ke ke zhang zhi bian 
ma zhan wu yin tan wu zui bei pan chu you qi tu xing shi nian liu ge yue 
tong zhou qu ji wei 
jian cha ju ji yu qi kai chu dang ji 
xing zheng kai chu chu fen 
bei jing shi zhong da xiang mu ban gong shi ji jian zu yuan zu zhang feng wei li wei fan lian jie zi lv gui ding 
feng wei li li yong zhi wu shang de bian li 
zhi shi you guan bu men wei qi qin shu jing ying huo dong ti gong bang zhu 
wei gui gou mai zhu fang 
shi ji wei ji yu qi dang nei yan zhong jing gao chu fen 
dui qi wei ji suo de yu yi shou jiao 
dong si chen li yong dan ren shi jing shan qu huan jing wei sheng fu wu zhong xin fu zhu ren 
ji wei shu ji zhi bian 
bing wei ta ren mou qu li yi 
dong si chen yin shou hui zui bei pan chu you qi tu xing qi nian 
shi jing shan qu ji wei 
jian cha ju ji yu qi kai chu dang ji 
xing zheng kai chu chu fen 
fang shan qu cheng guan jian cha da dui ji wei yuan shu ji qian rong ji fang hai she hui guan li zhi xu 
qian rong ji zai fang shan qu mou zu liao dian piao chang 
fang shan qu ji wei 
jian cha ju ji yu qi kai chu dang ji 
xing zheng jiang ji chu fen 
shi ji wei jian cha ju zheng chu ji ji jian jian cha yuan zhang zhi jie fang ai gong wu 
zhang zhi jie jiu hou yu ta ren fa sheng jiu fen 
qie fang ai min jing zhi xing gong wu 
shi ji wei ji yu qi dang nei jing gao chu fen 
ju bei jing ji jian jian cha wang 
nan zi chang mou jia cheng jia zhong you ji shi 
lan zhu yi si jia che che zhu yao qiu 
zhong tu ba dao xiang 
yao dian qian hua 
tong zhou jing fang tong bao 
xian yi ren chang mou yin she xian qiang jie bei xing ju 
qiang qian zhe ai qiu si ji 
zhao xian sheng zheng zhun bei jia che li kai shi 
cheng you ji shi zhao ji gan hui jia 
xiang zu che rang zhao xian sheng song yi xia 
zhao xian sheng da ying hou 
jiang gai nan zi song dao le mu di di 
dan gai nan zi que mei you xia che 
bing yi mei lian xi shang jia ren wei you 
rang zhao xian sheng zai jiang qi song hui chu fa de 
zai fan hui tu zhong 
zhao xian sheng tu ran jue de bo zi shang yi liang 
you da tui bei dao ci shang 
zuo zai fu jia shi wei zhi shang de na ming nan zi zheng shuang shou jin wo yi ba zhe die dao ding zhe ta 
ni zhe shi yao zuo shen me 
zhao xian sheng bian shuo bian ba che ting dao lu bian 
chen nan zi da hua de yi shun jian 
meng zhua dui fang de shuang shou 
jiang zhe die dao duo xia 
wo mei qian le 
ni gei wo dian qian hua 
gai nan zi bei duo xia dao hou 
bu duan xiang zhao xian sheng ai qiu fang guo ta 
zhao xian sheng rang dui fang zai che shang deng zhe 
yi tui bei zha shang xu mai yao bao za 
jin le lu bian de yi jia yao dian 
bing li ji bao jing 
xun luo che gan dao kong zhi xian yi ren 
jian you jing che shi lai 
che nei de qing nian nan zi shi tu tao pao 
jiu bei min jing en dao zai di shang 
bei kong zhi de nan zi wei chang mou 
yin jin qi shou tou jie ju chan sheng qiang jie nian tou 
jian zhao xian sheng du zi yi ren jia che 
jue ding ba zhao xian sheng zuo wei zuo an mu biao 
ke shi you yu xin xu 
qi shang che zhuan le yi ge duo xiao shi hou cai na chu dao zhun bei xia shou 
mei xiang dao dui fang li qi hen da 
bu dan mei you xia zhu che zhu 
zhe die dao hai bei dui fang duo qu 
xin jing bao xun 
ji zhe liu zhen ni 
shou dao xin feng nei zhan xin de yi yuan qian he yi feng gan xie xin 
lao ren de zhen cheng tai rang ren gan dong le 
de lao ren xie xin 
ta shi yan liang qu zhong hang xi fei de li xiu lao ren 
shang che hou zai shen shang zhi zhao dao yi yuan ling qian 
zheng dang ta bu zhi gai zen me ban shi 
nin ba yi yuan qian tou jin qu jiu xing le 
zai nan men zhan xia che shi 
yi nian ban guo qu le 
lao ren jia xin li yi zhi dian ji zhe suo qian de yi yuan qian 
sui ran qian bu duo 
dan zhe shi gong jia de qian 
gong si yao fen ming 
di yi shi jian shou dao kuai di de fu wu ke ke zhang liu jie shuo 
lao ren de zhen cheng da dong le wo men 
wo men yi ding bang ta wan cheng zhe ge xin yuan 
ju fu wu ke gong zuo ren yuan jie shao 
you wei lao ren bo tong le gong jiao liu gong si fu wu re xian 
xun wen le gong si de di zhi 
zuo ri xia wu 
fu wu ke gong zuo ren yuan shou peng zhe 
de yi yuan qian 
jiang ta song wang gong jiao liu gong si shou yin zhong xin 
bang da he lao ren wan cheng le zhe ge 
yin hang ban yan wu 
shou du ji chang gong an fen ju tong bao 
shi jian zhong shan dong qi ta cheng ke de liu mou yi jing bei jing fang xing zheng chu fa 
nan zi bu ting quan gao bei dai li 
shou du ji chang jing fang jie shao 
kun ming fei zhi shou du ji chang de hang ban jiang luo hou 
min jing zai xian chang liao jie dao 
dan you yu kun ming lian xu ji tian da wu 
fei ji di da bei jing hou 
zhe xie cheng ke you yu zai kun ming ji chang zhang shi jian yan wu dao zhi qing xu ji dong 
yao qiu hang kong gong si ji yu he li de jie jue fang an 
min jing yi mian an fu 
yi mian gao zhi cheng ke 
yi jing she xian wei fa 
bi xu li ji xia ji dao hang zhan lou yu hang kong gong si xie shang 
he fa wei quan 
cheng ke liu mou bu ting min jing quan gao 
zu nao min jing gong zuo bing ji xu shan dong qi ta cheng ke ju jue xia ji 
zai gao zhi wu xiao hou 
min jing yi fa qiang xing jiang liu mou dai li fei ji 
zai jing fang quan shuo xia 
qi ta cheng ke lu xu xia ji 
liu mou ze bei min jing yi fa jin xing le xing zheng chu fa 
ying tong guo tou su deng wei quan 
hui shi fei ji wu fa ru qi zhi xing xia yi fei xing ren wu 
jin er dao zhi hang ban yan chi huo qu xiao 
ying xiang ji chang diao du 
yan zhong de hui ying xiang ge ri hang ban diao du 
hai hui yan dang hang ji jian xiu shi jian 
dui fei xing an quan gou cheng fu mian ying xiang 
ji chang jing fang biao shi 
zai jin ji nian de hang ban yan wu zhong 
you ge bie cheng ke yin qing xu ji dong 
chong chuang an jian xian chang huo sun huai gong gong she shi deng wei fa xing wei shou dao chu fa 
jing fang ti xing 
yu hang ban yan wu deng qing kuang 
ying tong guo tou su 
gu ding zheng ju deng fang shi 
bian cheng wei fa zhe 
ji zhe liu zhen ni 
yu de guo ji nan you luo bo te hun ji shen zhen fu hao quan 
ci an zai shen zhen zhong yuan yi shen xuan pan 
zhu fan zheng li he tong zha pian zui ming he wei zao ju min shen fen zheng zui ming cheng li 
shu zui bing fa zhi xing wu qi tu xing 
cong fan luo bo te fan he tong zha pian zui 
bing qu zhu chu jing 
zha pian jin bai wan mei yuan zuan shi 
shen zhen zhong yuan shen li cha ming 
wei shi shi zha pian huo dong 
huo tong bei gao ren luo bo te 
huang cheng qi neng zai jing wai qu de zhu bao da e ding dan 
xian xiang bei hai ren lin mou cai gou shao liang jia zhi jiao di de zuan shi 
qu de lin mou de xin ren hou 
zai yao qi ti gong jia zhi jiao gao de zuan shi 
bei gao ren zheng li 
luo bo te yong qu de de gao jia zhi zuan shi xiang hong xing da gong si dian dang tao qu zi jin 
jiang tao qu de zi jin yi bu fen yong yu chao gu mou li 
yi bu fen yong yu gou mai di jia zhi de zuan shi jin xing jia gong xiao shou 
zhi zao qi jin xing zuan shi zhu bao mao yi de jia xiang 
hai jiang yi bu fen yong yu zhi fu dao qi de xiao e huo kuan 
pian qu lin mou xin ren ji xu ti gong zuan shi 
gong qi ji xu dian dang tao qu zi jin 
bei gao ren zheng li 
luo bo te tong guo shang shu shou fa 
pan jue shu hai xian shi zheng li wei xing shi zai tao ren yuan 
zheng li wei yan gai zhen shi shen fen 
shi yong fei fa qu de de xu jia hu ji shen fen 
huo tong bei gao ren luo bo te cai yong dui wai bian zao luo bo te wei guo wai da xing ji jin guan li ren 
de guo da jia zu ji cheng ren deng shen fen 
yi zhang kong ju e ji jin zai zhong guo kai zhan rong zi 
tou zi deng jin rong ye wu wei ming 
pian qu ta ren xin ren 
yi zai shen zhen shi kai she de liang jia tou zi gong si zuo wei zha pian zai ti 
xu gou xiang mu dui wai kai zhan he zuo tou zi 
dai wei li cai 
gou mai tu di deng ye wu 
xian hou pian qu bei hai ren zhang yong qian 
liu hai long deng ren de zi jin hou 
you tong guo chai dong qiang bu xi qiang de shou fa 
xiao bu fen yong yu zhi fu li xi 
da bu fen ze tong guo 
di xia qian zhuang 
ji qi zai jing nei wai kai she de gong si 
ge ren zhang hu jin xing duo ci zhuan yi 
jiang ta ren ju e zi jin fei fa zhan wei ji you 
fa yuan ren ding de shu e yu ci qian gong su ji guan qi su jin e you xie xu cha yi 
gai an shou hai ren duo shi shang jie ming ren 
bao kuo tai wan yi da tou zi you xian gong si dong shi zhang deng wen cong 
zong cai ji dang wei shu ji dong bing gen 
luo bo te shu cong fan huo qing pan 
zheng li chu sheng yu shang hai mou gang tie gong si zhong ceng jia ting 
da xue bi ye hou ceng zai mou yin hang wai hui bu gong zuo 
sui hou chuang ban le yi jia tou zi zi xun gong si 
duo ming zheng li fu qin de tong shi he qin qi zhao dao ta 
cheng zheng li bang ta men li cai 
na le ji bai wan shen zhi shang qian wan yuan jiu bu jian le 
shang hai jing fang kai shi wang shang zhui tao 
pan jue shu cheng 
zheng li xu jia ban li le ming wei 
bing fen bie wei zao le ju min shen fen zheng hao ma 
fa yuan jing shen li ren wei 
luo bo te yi fei fa zhan you wei mu di 
lv xing he tong guo cheng zhong pian qu dui fang dang shi ren de cai wu 
shu e te bie ju da 
xing wei jun yi gou cheng he tong zha pian zui 
zheng li wei zao ju min shen fen zheng 
qing jie yan zhong 
qi xing wei you yi gou cheng wei zao ju min shen fen zheng zui 
luo bo te cheng zi ji yu ci an wu guan 
qian tian fa yuan pan jue ren ding ta ye fan you he tong zha pian zui 
dan shou zheng li zhi shi can yu fan zui 
qi ci yao zuo yong 
shu yu cong fan 
fa yuan yu yi jian qing chu fa 
fa yuan ren ding zheng li zai gai an zhong shu yu zhu fan 
gen ju er bei gao ren can yu fan zui de ci shu 
she an jin e 
gui an hou de ren zui 
hui zui tai du deng ju ti qing jie 
gen ju xiang guan fa lv gui ding 
yi fa zuo chu le shang shu pan jue 
tu wei mei hua shan lu duan lu zheng ren yuan zai sa rong xue yan bao guang xiang she 
tu wei jiao jing bu men dui ning dong lu duan shi shi lin shi jiao tong guan zhi bao guang xiang she 
zui gao gong lu 
lian ri lai shou leng kong qi ying xiang 
gui zhou sheng duo tiao guo sheng gan dao chu xian lu mian jie bing qing kuang 
lu mian jie bing qing kuang yan zhong 
yan zhong ying xiang dao lu tong xing 
shou leng kong qi ying xiang 
jin duan shi jian yi lai 
gui zhou sheng liu pan shui shi 
di shi jiao gao chu yi chu xian dao lu jie bing xian xiang 
dui dao lu jiao tong zao cheng yi ding ying xiang 
shi tong wang yun nan xuan wei 
si chuan yi bin ji gui zhou bi jie di qu de jiao tong yao dao 
gai lu duan hai ba jiao gao 
shi gui zhou hai ba zui gao de dao lu qu yu 
ning dong ye cheng dong yu 
shi gui zhou zhu yao zai hai xing tian qi zhi yi 
qi chu xian ci shu zhi duo ju quan guo shou wei 
ning dong shi qiang leng kong qi zuo yong xia de bing xue 
yu xue hun xia 
zhi shi bing kuai 
bing hua lao gu fu gai di biao wu ti 
yan zhong shi ke po huai you xian tong xun 
ying xiang dian li shu song 
zhong duan jiao tong yun shu 
dong si sheng chu 
dong huai nong zuo wu deng 
dao lu zhou wei shan shang yi ji ben bei bing xue fu gai 
shan shu bei fu bing ya wan zai lu bian 
mei hua shan duan lu mian yi quan bu jie bing 
ji zhe chang shi yong shi tou qu za lu mian bing ceng 
nan yi za sui 
ning dong xian xiang yi tian bi yi tian hai yao yan zhong 
gui zhou sheng liu pan shui shi shui cheng xian mei hua shan lu duan lu zheng zhong dui zhong dui zhang huang gang gao su ji zhe 
mei tian zao shang qi dian ban lu zheng ren yuan jiang zai mei hua shan shang jin xing xun cha 
kai zhan fang dong fang hua gong zuo 
lu mian ning dong dao zhi dao lu jiao tong shou dao yan zhong ying xiang 
deng dai dao lu qing kuang hao zhuan hou zai xing tong guo 
jin duan shi jian yi lai 
dao zhong wu wen du hui sheng 
lu mian qing kuang hao zhuan di qing kuang xia cai yu yi fang xing 
liu pan shui jiao jing zhi dui mei hua shan da dui fu zhong dui zhang liu xiang yu gao su ji zhe 
mei hua shan gong lu bu men zai ren li 
ji xie she bei shang zuo le chong fen zhun bei 
mei tian zao shang yang hu ren yuan dui ning dong yan zhong lu duan cai qu sa rong xue yan deng cuo shi 
bao chi lu mian chang tong 
ju qi xiang bu men xin xi 
gui zhou quan sheng ge de duo yun dao yin 
xi bei bu di qu reng ran jiang you jiang yu 
ji zhe bao guang xiang 
chen guang biao zi pu you yi shou gou 
niu yue shi bao 
jin qi wo jiang fu mei qia tan shou gou 
niu yue shi bao
