jin ri zhu ming ci shan jia chen guang biao xian shen shen zhen can jia mou ban jiang li shi 
zi pu you yi shou gou mei guo 
niu yue shi bao 
zai ci yin fa re yi 
chen guang biao xiang bei jing chen bao ji zhe zheng shi 
chen guang biao qian ri zai shen zhen chu xi 
jie chu hua ren 
zai tai shang fa biao huo jiang gan yan shi zi pu 
jiang fu mei qia tan shou gou 
niu yue shi bao 
ci hua yi chu 
yin de tai xia yi pian hua ran 
bei jing chen bao ji zhe zuo ri jiu ci zhi dian chen guang biao 
ta yu qi zhong dai zhe pi bei 
niu yue shi bao 
hao duo zhong wai mei ti dou wei zhe shi lai cai fang wo 
wo dou jiang lei le 
sui hou ta tou lu 
yu niu yue shi bao ling dao ceng jin xing wei qi ban ge yue zuo you de qia tan 
mu qian you ji cheng ba wo shang bu que ding 
wo ti chu le san ge fang an 
wo men jiu wei rao zhe ge jin xing tao lun 
wei he pian pian zhong qing yu 
niu yue shi bao 
chen guang biao xiao da 
yin wei shou gou bie de bao zhi 
mei li bu gou da ma 
chen guang biao zhe ci mei guo xing ye mei wang ji ta zhong ai de ci shan shi ye 
chu le tan shou gou de shi 
hai hui qu kao cha yi xia zhong mei ci shan ji jin hui 
mei guo guo an ju zai san xing deng qi ye chan pin zhong zhi ru jian die ruan jian qie ting 
ming jing zhou kan 
mei guo guo jia an quan ju 
hua wei he dai er deng dian nao yu tong xin she bei qi ye de chan pin li ye zhi ru le jian die ruan jian 
ge ren qing bao qie qu cheng xu 
jiang qi yong lai qie ting yu jian ting 
ming jing zhou kan 
ying pan qu dong qi 
he tong xun zhuang bei lu you qi 
deng she bei shang she zhi le qie qu yong hu ge ren xin xi de jian die ruan jian 
ming jing zhou kan 
gong kai de nei bu zi liao xian shi 
han guo san xing 
shi jie zui da de tong xin zhuang bei qi ye mei guo ji qi jing zheng dui shou zhong guo hua wei 
mei guo dian nao zhi zao qi ye dai er he zhi zao qi ye xi jie gong si deng 
dou bian cheng le de mu biao 
ming jing zhou kan 
xia she you jian duan wang luo jie jin xiao zu 
zhuan men fu ze ru qin dian nao he tong xin zhuang bei 
gen ju de ming ling jin xing huo dong 
de huo dong fan wei bu jin bao kuo qin ru wang luo 
hai fu ze qie ting shou ji 
dian nao nai zhi chao zuo qing bao deng ge ge fang mian 
ming jing zhou kan 
qi ye wu lun zen me she zhi fang huo qiang 
dou neng tong guo 
xiang guan gong si dou sheng cheng bu zhi dao sui yi qin ru le zi ji gong si sheng chan de zhuang bei 
ming jing zhou kan 
hai qie ting le cong fa guo nan bu ma sai shi chu fa 
hai kai fa le li yong 
deng she jiao wang luo fu wu jie jin mu biao di ruan jian 
ming jing zhou kan 
jiang tong guo zhe zhong fang shi dong zhe fei fa qin ru quan qiu wang luo de feng ci wei 
shu ma guan zi gong 
ming jing zhou kan 
de bao liao nei rong zuo chu guan fang hui ying 
zhu yao fu ze li yong dian nao tong xin wang sou ji hai wai qing bao 
jun shi bao dao jin ri dian ji 
mei guo yao ba quan qiu dang cheng wu qi shi yan chang 
shi chu kou wu qi 
hai shi shu chu zhan zheng 
jun shi bao dao jin ri dian ji 
zhu chi ren ding li 
rui dian si de ge er mo he ping yan jiu suo gong bu le yi zu shu ju 
he ta men zai quan qiu jun shou shi chang shang zhan de bai fen bi 
wo men xian tong guo zhong yang dian shi tai zhu mei guo ji zhe wang hui liao jie yi xia 
zhong yang dian shi tai zhu mei guo ji zhe wang hui 
gen ju rui dian yan jiu ji gou si de ge er mo he ping yan jiu suo bao gao 
mei guo zai quan qiu de jun huo xiao shou shang de fen e da fu du ti sheng 
mei guo de wu qi jiao yi zong liang 
shi chang fen e ye cong si fen zhi yi shang sheng dao da yue san fen zhi yi 
cheng wei qi gui mo zui da 
zeng zhang zui kuai de mu biao shi chang 
er zui xin de yi bi mai mai shi 
fen xi ren shi ren wei 
zhe yi fang mian shi de yi yu mei guo zheng fu ji ji bang zhu jun gong qi ye la 
ling yi fang mian mei guo zheng fu hai fang song le dui bu fen wu qi ling bu jian chu kou de xian zhi 
jun shi bao dao jin ri dian ji 
zhu chi ren ding li 
cong shu ju zhong wo men ke yi kan dao 
zheng shi kou kou sheng sheng yao wei hu shi jie he ping de mei guo 
bu duan da zhe wei hu an quan de huang zi jie ru de qu shi wu 
da liang shu chu wu qi 
shen zhi you xie wu qi hai zai shi yan jie duan 
mei guo du ba wu qi mai gei le shei ne 
qing ting jun shi ping lun yuan ma jun de fen xi 
jun shi ping lun yuan ma jun 
na li you dong luan 
na li jiu you mei guo de wu qi ; fan guo lai 
na li you mei guo de wu qi 
na li jiu bu de an ning 
mei guo de wu qi shi yan chang ji hu wu chu bu zai 
ya tai shou dang qi chong zhong 
mei guo tong guo jiang ya tai yi xie guo jia he di qu de jun li fa zhan de xu qiu yu qi xian jin de wu qi zhuang bei 
lai wei mei guo de zhan lve mu biao fu wu 
mei guo ming zhi ri ben bu duan zai ya tai di qu tiao qi shi duan 
quan qiu ying deng xian jin wu qi 
mei guo hai ba bo duan lei da 
yu ying yun shu ji 
nan hai ju shi bu wen 
fei lv bin jiao xiao zui xiong 
dao dan jing sai bu duan 
mei guo reng yun niang dui han guo qing xiao yuan cheng dao dan 
mei guo de wu qi hai mai dao le nan ya de yin du 
mei guo zai ya tai yi bian zhi ze bie ren kuo chong jun bei 
yi bian you zai da mai jun huo 
ya tai shi mei guo de jun huo xiao shou zui ji zhong de di qu 
zhong dong jin sui qi hou 
zai mu qian zhong dong di qu ju shi chi xu dong dang 
zhan huo bu duan di qing kuang xia 
mei guo xiang hai wan guo jia da gui mo chu shou wu qi 
jiu jing shi mie huo hai shi huo shang jiao you 
zhi de shen si 
mei guo zai yu yi lang jin xing he tan de tong shi 
xiang yi lang de dui shou sha te 
yi se lie chu shou da liang wu qi 
an ling yu fen 
chu chuan tong de lu hai kong ling yu 
wang luo cheng wei mei guo xin shi wu qi yan fa de xin ling yu 
mei guo gong kai biao shi fa zhan wang luo jin gong wu qi 
ben wei ren lei wen ming zao fu de tai kong 
bao kuo yi xie xian jin de ji shu ling yu dou yi cheng wei mei guo wu qi xin de shi yan chang 
zai shi jie jing ji xia xing ya li bu jian de bei jing xia 
mei guo dui wai jun shou 
ni shi er shang 
xin shi wu qi ceng chu bu qiong 
zhi neng shi ren men dui shi jie he ping yu wen ding geng jia dan you 
jun shi bao dao jin ri dian ji 
zhu chi ren ding li 
kao zhan zheng fa cai li lai shi mei guo ren de chuan tong 
cong liang ci shi jie da zhan dao zhong dong zhan zheng 
dao hai wan zhan zheng 
dou rang mei guo zuan de pen man bo man 
mei guo yi jiu li yong wu qi chu kou lai da si lian cai 
mian dui ru ci da gui mo de jun shou 
ren men bu jin jing hu 
mei guo shi zai chu kou wu qi 
hai shi zai shu chu zhan zheng 
ju mei guo lie qi wang zhan 
luo ma ni ya zhong nan bu yi zuo jiao de cun zi li 
you yi zhong jiao zuo de shen qi shi tou 
mei feng xia yu 
zhe xie shi tou jiu hui ru yu hou chun sun yi yang 
zhuo zhuang sheng zhang 
zhe bu jin rang dang di ren zhen jing bu yi 
ye xi yin le lai zi shi jie ge de de you ke 
shi zai da di zhen hou chu xian de yi zhong cheng yuan xing de sha shi 
zhe xie shi tou da xiao bu yi 
you xie shi tou shen zhi hui zi ji cong yi ge di fang yi dong dao ling yi ge di fang 
bu xu yao ren he fu zhu gong ju 
mei feng xia yu 
zhe xie shi tou jiu hui 
you de shen zhi neng cong ji ke zhang dao ji dun zhong 
ke cheng de shang shi shi jian nan de de qi guan 
dui ci xian xiang 
wai jie you hen duo jie shi 
dan da duo mei you ke xue gen ju 
ke xue jia ye dui ci kun huo bu yi 
lai bao hu zhe xie hui 
you yu ta men de qi te xing 
lian he guo jiao ke wen zu zhi ye jiang qi lie wei bao hu dui xiang 
mei guo yin di an na bo li si shi de mai kao er 
fu fu zheng zai jia zhong kan dian shi 
bu liao yi liang xue fu lan qi che tu ran chong jin fang zi 
ta zheng jia su chuan guo mai kao er jia fu jin de huo che gui dao 
you yu su du tai kuai 
qi che shi kong 
si pi er si bian chong guo tie si wang wei lan 
jiang che zhi jie kai jin le mai kao er jia de can ting 
suo xing mai kao er fu fu dou mei you shou shang 
si pi er si ye zhi shou le qing wei wai shang 
yi bei song wang fu jin de yi liao zhong xin jiu zhi 
di mu mai kao er 
biao da le ta de ju sang he you lv 
nei xie ren bu jin zhuang dian xian gan 
hai zhuang fang zi 
ke pa de shi 
yi ci you yi ci 
di mu de yue mu pa te fu lei qi 
ta yi jing xiang zheng fu shen qing 
zai fang zi pang shu li yi ge ting che pai 
dan yi zhi mei you de dao hui ying 
ni neng yong ni de pi fu dang cai liao zuo cheng yi ge sha fa ma 
ni neng xiang xiang dao yong ren de rou ti zuo cheng de su xiang shi shen me yang de ma 
he fen dun you bao 
zhang shang su xiang 
zhe tao zuo pin kan shi you ren de rou ti zuo wei cai zhi jin xing chuang zuo 
shi ze wei yi shu jia de shou jing guo wan mei de wan qu he die jia 
tou she cheng ge zhong jia ju suo tu 
ran hou cheng xian zai jie qian ka de shou zhang shang 
jie qian ka biao shi 
zhe tao zuo pin shi dui ren ti pi fu ben zhi can yu xing de chu bu tan suo 
zhi zai xiao chu pi fu zhi shi ren ti wai bu he nei bu jie xian de guan nian 
bing biao da le yong chu mo de fang shi qu tan suo pi fu yu kong jian zhi jian ji ji guan xi de li nian 
wei da de yi shu jia men zong shi qing xie zhe nao dai 
ke wang yong ta men du te de shi jiao chuan yue mei li yu kong ju de jie xian 
jie qian ka de 
zhang shang su xiang 
zheng shi mei li yu kong ju de wan mei jie he 
bing qie ye shi yi ci ling ren zhen jing de ren ti yu kong jian guan xi de qi miao tan suo 
tu pian lai zi wang luo 
dan zhe ye ling bu shao ren qu xiao le lv you 
hui jia deng chu xing ji hua 
zhuan jia jian yi 
yi bian yu min zhong an pai jia ri sheng huo 
jin nian yuan dan hou bu zai xian chao chang gong zuo zhou 
jia qi hou bu zai chu xian chao chang gong zuo zhou 
nan mian hui da luan zheng chang de gong zuo yu sheng huo jie zou 
shi ji shi de bu chang shi de 
zhong guo she ke yuan lv you yan jiu zhong xin te yue yan jiu yuan liu si min zai jie shou zhong xin wang ji zhe cai fang shi biao shi 
xin de fang jia fang an bi mian le chao chang gong zuo zhou de chu xian 
zhi de ken ding 
bu shao ren chu you huo hui jia ji hua pao tang 
yuan dan zhi fang jia yi tian 
zhun bei ji hua hui jia kan ba ba ma ma 
suo yi jiu bu neng hui jia le 
zhi hao deng dao guo nian zai hui qu 
lao jia zai he bei bao ding 
dan zai shan dong gong zuo de nv bai ling xiao wang dui zhong xin wang ji zhe shuo 
zai shang hai cong shi kang fu zhi liao shi gong zuo de xiao zhang ben lai ji hua yuan dan qu huang shan xin shang xue jing 
zhe ge ji hua ye yin wei yuan dan zhi you yi tian jia er pao tang 
zai bei jing gong zuo de xiao he 
sui ran li lao jia shi jia zhuang bu yuan 
dan ye bu zhun bei yuan dan hui jia le 
wo fu mu ye jian yi bie hui le 
lai hui zhe teng 
hai bu ru zhou mo hui qu xia 
xiao he hai gao su ji zhe 
chu le shi jian bu gou chong yu wai 
hui yi tang jia de cheng ben ye tai gao 
you yu xian zai hui jia da duo zhi neng zuo gao tie 
hua ji bai yuan hui yi tang jia 
zai jia que zhi dai bu dao yi tian 
ji zhe li jin lei 
he jun xiang bu yong dang bing 
zhou jie lun you bing bu dang bing 
que neng da lan qiu 
chui gong jie li 
shou dao mian yi zheng ming 
you wang you yin er zheng li chu tai wan nan yi ren mian yi yuan yin 
xin zang er jian ban mo tuo chui 
xian tian xing xin lv bu zheng 
xin shi ban mo bi suo bu quan 
deng xin zang wen ti cheng wei mian dang bing li you di yi ming 
ming dan zhong di er duo de yuan yin shi 
bao kuo luo zhi xiang 
lan zheng long he chen han dian jie yi ci yuan yin mian yi 
ji zhui wen ti 
ye shi yi da kun rao 
yi ji li wei dou yin 
jiang zhi xing ji zhui yan 
bu yong dang bing 
jie san de ou xiang tuan ti 
you wang you chao 
yi ren neng chang neng tiao neng da lan qiu 
zen me yu dao dang bing jiu bing tong yi dui 
bu guo ye you ren xuan ze guai guai jin 
ming dao geng zi yuan jia ru 
san jun yi dui 
zai guo qing jie biao yan lian qiang 
xing xiang huan ran yi xin 
zheng yuan chang ye yu jin nian tui wu 
kuan guan jie gu mo po lie 
di diao zhu yuan kai dao ye bu xi wang 
hen xiang shou dang bing de gan jue 
kan dao ming dao yu zheng yuan chang tui wu hou xie xia zhong dan 
liang ren shuai diao 
tui wu chu lai jie shen zhi qing shuang 
dan yan yi quan hai you xu duo ren yi xue ji zai shen tuo yan 
huo yi shen ti bing tong yan tui 
ling qu die xin ku pei yang kai xing xiang dou bu duan bei wai jie zhi yi 
han xue zai bei jing xuan chuan mou xin pian 
jie guo zai xian chang tu ran zao dao yi ming luo nan qiang bao xi xiong 
hao wu fang fan de han xue dang chang bei xia de hua rong shi se 
shi sheng jing jiao 
han xue zai wei bo shang dui dang shi ji shi fan ying guo lai bing bao hu le ta de li jia hang biao shi le gan xie 
hai gan tan dao 
nan shen mei yu dao 
yu dao le nan shen jing bing 
zhe nian tou bian tai se lang shi zai duo 
ling nv xing men fang bu sheng fang 
a ba bo wei 
qi su qian nv you mei la ni 
a ba bo wei qi su qian nv you mei la ni 
ju ma lai xi ya 
guang ming ri bao 
ma lai xi ya bo si ni ya ji nan zi a ba bo wei qi su qian hua yi nv you mei la ni 
de shi wu qian li su song 
cheng shen fa guan di mo di zai nei ting pi zhun che xiao a ba bo wei su song de tong shi 
fa guan tong shi che xiao mei la ni dui a ba bo wei ti chu de 
dan mei la ni wu xu zhi fu a ba bo wei de tang fei 
dui fa ting de cai jue 
a ba bo wei tong guo lv shi na xi er biao da yu ti chu shang su de yi yuan 
bing sheng cheng jiang zai ci ru bing fa ting qi su mei la ni 
ben an wu she ji jing zi mai mai huo dong 
fa guan di mo di zhi ben an she ji liang da zhong yao ke ti 
ji a ba bo wei shi fou ke yi jiu 
yi ji fa ting shi fou yong you ba a ba bo wei de ming zi jia ru mei la ni er zi de bao sheng zhi nei de si fa quan 
fa guan zhi chu 
mei la ni bu ceng fou ren ceng yu a ba bo wei tong ju 
hai sheng xia yi ming er zi 
dan que bu ceng cheng nuo hui yu a ba bo wei jie hun 
gen ju an qing 
a ba bo wei 
zhi shi qi tu yi kao liang ren zhi jian chong man 
de xing sheng huo lai wei chi ?? guan xi 
ci ju si hu mei you wei ta dai lai ren he hao chu 
gen ju ta de shuo fa 
zhe geng qing xiang yu wei man zu da bian ren 
zai fen shou hou 
ta que sheng cheng ta de jing zi zao da bian ren suo lan yong lai sheng zi 
zhen dui qi su ren dai biao lv shi yin shu fa sheng zai jia na da de duo zong an li 
fa guan biao shi zhe xie an li yu ben an de an qing gen ben bu xiang gan 
fa sheng zai jia na da de an li dou yu jing zi mai mai you guan 
ke shi zai ben an 
que mei you she ji ren he jing zi mai mai huo dong 
zai shen ru yan jiu ben an de an qing hou 
wo fa xian qi su ren de zhi kong shi hao wu gen ju de 
liang ren zhi shi yi yi dui qing lv guan xi tong ju 
bing xiang shou liang xiang qing yuan de xing sheng huo 
mei you ren he xie yi xian zhi da bian ren bi xu zhi fu huo gou mai qi su ren de jing zi 
huo cheng nuo hui xiang qi su ren gou mai jing zi 
you guan da bian ren bei zhi 
qi tu lan yong qi su ren jing zi de zhi kong 
da bian ren dai biao lv shi yi biao shi liang ren dang chu shi yi qi duo ru ai he 
ruo shi liang qing xiang yue 
pian jing de zhi kong gen ben bu cheng li 
a ba bo wei de su song jing wei fan 
gong gong zheng ce 
ruo fa ting pi zhun a ba bo wei de su song 
wu yi jiang wei ma lai xi ya si fa jie kai xia xian li 
ji xing fa xie dui xiang gan dao bu man 
a ba bo wei fei bang 
zhe huo xu shi pai 
hai zhu ge ge 
shi hou de san ge ren de jing dian he zhao ba 
ru jin san wei ju xing de he zhao hen shao jian le 
zheng zai kun ming dong xun de sun yang xin hua she fa 
you yong ao yun guan jun sun yang zai sui mo de zui hou yi tian lian fa liang tiao wei bo 
gan xie yi zhi zhi chi he gu li zi ji de peng you 
you wang you liu yan xi cheng sun yang cai shi 
tu hao che wang 
lian ai feng bo 
yu en shi fan mu 
wu zheng jia shi bei ju liu 
zheng zai kun ming ji xun de sun yang zuo tian zai wei bo biao da gan ji 
ni zui xiang dui shei shuo sheng xie xie ne 
wo xiang xiang yi zhi guan xin 
gu li wo cheng zhang de shi zhang 
peng you he fen si men shuo sheng xie xie 
gan xie ni men zai guo qu dai gei wo de wen nuan huo gan dong 
dai shang wei xiao 
yu kuai le yi qi chu fa 
wei yu jian geng hao de zi ji jia you 
ji xu zhu fu shu ma he 
er zai zuo tian shang wu 
ta jiu ceng fa guo yi tiao wei yin hua xue yi wai nao sun shang de sai che shou shu ma he qi dao de wei bo 
bu lao de che wang 
ni shi wo men de chuan qi 
ni yi ding yao ting guo lai 
wei nin qi dao 
shu ma he jia you 
ju cheng pai she yu hang zhou mou xiao qu che ku 
sun yang wei che wang qi dao de wei bo zai ci chu dong wang you de min gan shen jing 
you wang you hui ying 
nin cai shi che wang a 
hai you wang you biao shi 
shi ni de ou xiang 
yin wei ta you jia zhao 
xiang ta xue xi ba 
sun yang zai ya zhou de zui da dui shou 
han guo ming jiang pu tai huan yi jing chong fan ao da li ya 
ji zhe su xing 
han liu ming xing yi zhi shi shi jie chao liu de feng xiang biao 
wu lun nan xing hai shi nv xing dou shi fen zhu zhong zi ji de shi shang xing xiang 
han guo nan xing shi zhong guo nv fen si xin mu zhong de nan shen 
ta men shen zhe zhi fu shi de yang zi geng rang ren zhao mi 
shei cai shi ni xin mu zhong de zhi fu wang zi ne 
zheng zhou shi wei shu ji wu tian jun zai zi zhu shou mai ji qian mai piao 
wu tian jun da cheng di tie jie shou cai fang 
zheng zhou dian shi tai 
zheng zhou xin wen 
yi ze xin wen cheng 
dang tian zao shang 
zheng zhou shi wei shu ji wu tian jun zai zheng dong xin qu kai wan hui hou 
lin shi jue ding cheng zuo di tie fan hui shi wei 
yu mi shu zai hui zhan zhong xin zhan zi zhu shou mai ji qian mai piao shi 
bei zheng zai cai fang de zheng zhou dian shi tai ji zhe ren chu 
wu tian jun zai di tie nei yu shi min jiao tan 
ting qu jian yi 
ta zai lv cheng guang chang zhan xia che 
ji zhe ou yu shi wei shu ji 
zai ci ri zao dao le wang luo yu lun zhi yi 
zhen de shi ou yu ma 
que ding bu shi an pai de 
ji zhe jiu ci shi cai fang she shi zheng zhou dian shi tai shi zheng pin dao ji zhe xu jin 
ta zai jie shou xin jing bao ji zhe cai fang shi cheng 
yu shi wei shu ji que shi shi ou yu 
dui yu wang you de zhi yi 
zhe ze xin wen jian li zai xin wen zhen shi xing ji chu zhi shang 
wan quan jing de qi jian yan de 
mei gei wo men da zhao hu 
zheng zhou gui dao jiao tong you xian gong si zong he bu yi ming han xing bu zhang cheng 
zhi qian bing bu zhi dao shi wei shu ji yao lai cheng zuo di tie 
zhi dao shi wei shu ji zai ti yan wan hou gei gai dan wei ling dao da dian hua 
cai zhi dao ci shi 
gen wo men ling dao da le dian hua 
shuo ta ti yan le yi xia di tie 
ju da he wang bao dao 
zheng zhou tu jiang bao yu 
shi ren zheng zhou shi dai shi zhang de wu tian jun chi jiao zhan zai yu shui zhong yong shou tao du zhu pai shui guan dao de shu ye 
dang shi zhe yi mu bei yi ming wang you pai dao 
shang chuan dao wang luo hou 
wu tian jun bei cheng zhi wei 
zui mei shen ying 
shu ji xi huan dao chu zou zou 
zheng zhou shi wei xuan chuan bu xin wen chu yi gong zuo ren yuan dui xin jing bao ji zhe biao shi 
shi wei shu ji xi huan dao chu zou zou 
ping shi ye hui qi zi xing che zai shi li guang guang 
dui yu wang you zhi yi de 
ta cheng ke neng you yu da jia bu liao jie 
zao cheng guo fen jie du 
you xun ju ren min wang dian ju zheng zhou shi wei gong zuo ren yuan jie shao 
xin nian cha hua hui zai wei yu zheng dong xin qu de zheng zhou guo ji hui zhan zhong xin ju xing 
ruo yao cheng che gan wang zheng zhou shi wei dang wai ren shi zuo tan hui hui chang 
wu tian jun dan xin lu shang dan wu shi jian tai jiu 
jue ding cheng zuo gang gang kai tong de zheng zhou shou tiao di tie 
shun bian ti yan yi xia yun xing qing kuang 
ting shi min yi jian 
gen fang hai bei shu ji xie jue 
ni dang tian de gong zuo an pai shi 
ti qian yi tian wo men xin wen bu jiu dui zhou yi dang tian de bao dao jin xing le ce hua 
dang tian wo men fen san lu ji zhe 
fen bie qu di tie 
san huan lu he shi qu zhu gan dao cai fang 
lai kan shou ri jiao tong he ke liu qing kuang 
wo bei fen qu di tie cai fang 
wo he she xiang ji zhe cong lv cheng guang chang zhan yan lu cai fang dao hui zhan zhong xin zhan 
zai hui zhan zhong xin zhan cai fang shi 
hu ran fa xian zai zi zhu shou mai ji qian mai piao de ren hen yan shu 
zi xi yi kan 
ju ran shi shi wei shu ji wu tian jun 
ou yu shu ji hou 
ni de fan ying shi shen me 
chu yu xin wen ren de zhi ye min gan 
wo ma shang gen zhe qu le 
dang shi hai wen le shu ji neng bu neng gen zhe cai fang 
dan shu ji xie jue le 
shuo ni men mang ba 
fan zheng wo men ye hai mei cai fang wan 
wo ye bu xiang cuo guo zhe ge xin wen 
jiu gen shang le che gen pai 
yi zhi dao ta xia che 
ran hou wo men ba gong zuo ji xu zuo wan hou 
hui qu xiang bu men zhu ren he zhi ban bian ji hui bao le 
ta men dou jue de hen bu cuo 
jiu fang dao le dang tian di tie de xi lie bao dao dang zhong 
wei shen me xuan ze le 
hen que qie de shi shi 
er qie wo shi cai jing ji zhe 
shi yi ge yue qian wei ying jie di tie bao dao er bei chou diao qu de 
ye bu shi zhuan men gen ling dao pao de shi zheng ji zhe 
dang tian shi wei shu ji jiu zai hui zhan zhong xin di tie zhan fu jin kai hui 
shi wei jiu zai lv cheng guang chang zhan 
gang hao di tie zhi da 
ta ye shi lin shi jue ding 
ben zu gao jian 
chu shu ming wai 
cai xie xin jing bao ji zhe yang feng 
ya zhou jing ji 
zhuan men wei ju xing 
ben ming zheng zhi xun 
da zao de zhen ren xiu 
ri qian zai jie mu zhong shou ci gong kai le de si zhai 
jing zhi de ting yuan he zheng jie de nei bu huan jing xian shi chu bu su de pin wei 
jie mu tong guo zai de jia zhong ge ge jiao luo an zhuang de she xiang tou 
zhen shi ji lu le si xia de sheng huo 
de si zhai shi yi chuang dai ting yuan de er ceng xi yang shi jian zhu 
ting yuan sui mian ji bu da 
dan pu zhe lv se cao ping 
shu mu he hua cao xiu jian zheng qi 
hai you yi zuo shi fen jing zhi de xiao xing pen quan 
fang jian nei bu cai yong jian dan de bai se zhuang xiu ji diao 
yi lou de luo di chuang cai guang xiao guo ji hao 
ke ting li bing mei you fang zhi chang jian de sha fa 
er shi yi dan ren zuo yi he pao bu ji dai ti 
xian shi bu tong yu pu tong ren de pin wei 
ping ri li re zhong yu yun dong de jia zhong hai you xiao xing jian shen fang 
ge zhong yun dong she shi he qi cai yi ying ju quan 
jie mu hai gong kai le su yan jian shen de guo cheng 
de si zhai gong kai hou 
yin qi fen si re yi 
wan quan shi guo ji ju xing fan er a 
hao xian mu ke yi zai zi ji jia zhong jian shen 
guang zhou shi wei chang wei 
fu shi zhang chen zhi ying zhao kai jiu ren fu shi zhang yi lai de shou chang xin wen fa bu hui 
jiu qi fen guan de gong ye 
zheng wu guan li 
nan sha xin qu 
zhong xin zhi shi cheng deng ling yu gong zuo hui da le ji zhe he wang you de ti wen 
zai hui da zui jin sheng chuan 
xiang gang xiang nan sha zu jie tu di 
shi fou shu shi zhe yi ti wen shi 
chen zhi ying ji yu fou ren 
tou lu xiang gang zhi shi xiang can yu kai fa nan sha 
jin ri you mei ti bao dao cheng 
xiang gang te shou liang zhen ying shang jing shu zhi 
gen ju zhuan jia fen xi 
ta hai you ling wai yi ge te bie ren wu 
jiu shi xiang zhong yang ti chu nan sha xin qu de fa zhan ji hua 
zou ao men zhu hai heng qin de mo shi 
wei fa zhan kong jian shi yi bao he de xiang gang ti gong bao gui de tu di zi yuan 
na me mei ti suo chuan xiang gang you yi 
nan sha xin qu 
jie jian heng qin mo shi 
shi fou que you qi shi 
guang zhou yi fang dui ci ru he kao lv 
mei ti jiu zhe yi wen ti dui chen zhi ying jin zhui bu she 
chen zhi ying dang ji fou ren le 
xiang gang xiang nan sha zu jie tu di 
zhe yi shuo fa 
ken ding mei you 
zhe zhong shuo fa 
heng qin ye bu shi 
nan sha kai fa yu heng qin kai fa bu shi yi yang de mo shi 
xu yao ju ti yan jiu tui jin 
chen zhi ying biao shi 
ken ding mei you 
zhe zhong shuo fa 
xiang gang zhi shi xiang can yu kai fa nan sha 
xiang gang can yu kai fa ye shi nan sha gui hua li ming que de 
yin wei nan sha shi yi ge yue gang ao gong tong kai fa 
gong tong fa zhan 
quan mian he zuo de guo jia ji xin qu 
dan zen yang kai fa 
fang shi you hen duo zhong 
ji zhe zhang lin 
tong xun yuan sui fu xin 
zhang liang fu zi gao de wu tai yi dui wu 
hu nan wei shi kua nian yan chang hui 
kuai le jia zu 
tian tian xiong di xie shou lin zhi ying 
zhong han liang he tian yu qun xing 
yi qi kua nian 
zhang liang fu zi 
jiang wu tai gao cheng yi dui wu 
lin zhi ying yu hao shao wen tong tai 
yin fa huai jiu 
kuai nv kuai nan bao xiao chang shen qu yang yu ying yao he jiong chang tian ge 
hai lai bu ji jie mi shang wen jie de yi fu shi zen me huan de 
xian chang fen si de jian jiao sheng you zai ci xiang qi 
quan chang xiao sheng lian lian 
er kuai nan kuai nv ban 
xian ran ye jiang zai kua nian hou cheng wei re men shou ji xia zai ling sheng 
piao dao le kua nian de wu tai shang 
de ta sui ran bu tong yu wang fei de kong ling 
dan yang yu ying dai biao qing chun bu lao de rong yan rang zhe shou ge huan fa le xin de sheng ming 
er di yi ci zai wan ren mian qian he chang 
de yang yu ying sui ran you dian jin zhang 
dan zhong shi de fen si men gao sheng he chang gei le yang yu ying geng da de xin xin 
chang wan hou hai bu wang yao qing tong yang bu lao de he jiong yi qi chang tian ge 
xiu hong le he lao shi de lian 
zhang liang fu zi 
shun jian xiao pen yi miao bian lan jing ling 
ru guo shuo jin nian de kua nian yan chang hui zui bei qi dai de 
suo yi dang ge zi kuan qin zi zhuang liang xiang de zhang liang fu zi liang xiang shi 
dian shi ji qian he xian chang de guan zhong tong shi duan kang fen 
bu guo di yi ci chang ge de zhang liang xian ran hai hen jin zhang 
ye xu wo hui zou diao 
ye xu hui wang ci 
dan shi wo jue dui bu hui niao ku zi 
bu guo bei zhang liang ti qian da le mian yi zhen de guan zhong men 
hai shi bei zhang zhen suo yi zhang kou de 
wo bu shi nan shen 
shun jian xiao pen 
ta he tian tian yong yuan bu zai diao shang de yan chang rang zhu chi qun dou ren bu zhu kai kou zhi yuan 
bu guo zhe shou ge qu rang zhang liang lai yan yi ke zhen shi zhao dui le ren 
guan zhong fen fen liu yan ne biao shi 
wo bu shi nan shen 
ba ba qu na er 
yi yang hong bian jie tou xiang wei 
geng gao de hai zai hou 
zhang liang fu zi chang wan ge hou wan quan tou ru dao kua nian kuang huan de fen wei zhong 
xian chang he fen si hu dong fang cai wu ba zi ji wan quan yan mo zai wu yan liu se zhong 
zhi ting qi yin bu jian qi ren 
dai cai yan san qu 
zhang liang de hong ge zi yi jing ran cheng le lan jing ling 
er tian tian geng shi bu wang zai chang wan hou jin gen zhe yi ju 
wo de ma a 
xian chang de guan zhong yi jing you ren xiao pa zai di shang 
zhang liang fu zi guo zhen dai lai le hu nan wei shi kua nian yan chang hui shang you shi yi lai zui ben se zui gao xiao de biao yan 
nan guai quan chang guan zhong ji ti liang qi le ying guang bang dian zan 
shi gu mian dui mian shou wan shou 
wang ye jie tu 
mei ri you bao 
zhong yi nan yi nv liang ju shi gu mian dui mian 
shou wan shou chang mian di xia 
si hu quan shi le 
si wang ye wu fa ba wo men fen kai 
de ai qing zhen di 
qi zhong you xu duo fen mu zhong mai zang zhe mian dui mian de yi nan yi nv liang ju shi gu 
shi gu de shou hai wo zai yi qi 
dang di mei ti bao dao cheng 
ke xue jia men zheng shi tu jie shi zhe zhong xian xiang 
bing ren wei ce shi ke ti gong da an 
yi zhong li lun ren wei 
mu zhong mai zang de shi shen ai bi ci de fu fu 
dan ling yi zhong li lun ren wei 
zhe ke neng shi nan xing si wang hou 
ta de qi zi bei sha si wei qi pei zang 
ye you ren ren wei 
zhe xie shi gu xiang yong de zi shi he fa sheng xing xing wei shi de zi shi lei si 
nv xing shi gu ke neng shi bei xian ji de nian qing nv hai 
wo men you xu duo tui ce 
bi ru zhang fu si hou qi zi bei sha he zang 
fu qi yi ren xian si 
hang xing zhong de zhong guo hang mu liao ning jian 
shi yan ren wu zhi hui bu yan mi zu zhi 
ke xue zhi hui 
quan ti can shi guan bing gong jian ke nan 
lian xu zuo zhan 
xiang guan shi yan xun lian nei rong jun an ji hua shun li tui jin 
xian hou wan cheng le mu jian zai gao hai kuang tiao jian xia de jian ting yun dong can shu 
jian ti jie gou ying li 
jian zai ji xi liu zai he ce liang deng zong ti shi hang xing shi yan 
shen shui tiao jian xia hang su ce liang 
yi ji jin si shi zhan tiao jian xia hang mu zuo zhan xi tong gan zhi neng li 
zhi hui neng li 
mu biao zhi shi neng li 
zong he tong xin 
qi xiang bao zhang neng li 
zuo zhan xi tong 
dong li xi tong ji jian ting shi hang xing neng deng ge xiang zhan ji shu zhi biao de dao jin yi bu yan zheng 
shou ci zu zhi le zuo zhan xi tong zong he yan shi 
shou ci zu zhi le yi liao ning jian wei he xin de bian dui hang xing xun lian 
da dao le yu qi mu di 
hai jun xiang guan bu dui chu dong le duo ge xing hao de fei ji 
shui mian jian ting he qian ting 
you xiao pei he le shi yan 
tong shi dai dong le bu dui shi zhan hua xun lian 
liao ning jian hou xu ke yan shi yan he xun lian gong zuo jiang gen ju jin zhan qing kuang que ding 
li tang hu kai bing 
dong ji pao jiao sheng chi bu yao 
chu dong shi jie 
yong bu tong de zhong yao cai pao jiao 
bu jin ke yi qu bing qiang shen 
hai neng mei rong yang yan 
yi qi shi shi ba 
xue xu zu yu pei fang 
mei ri yi ci 
zhi gan mao huo gan mao tou tong pei fang 
xian ba jiao fang zai re qi shang xun 
dai shui wen xia jiang hou zai jiang shuang jiao jin pao zai shui zhong hu xiang cuo ca 
ke pao zhi quan shen wei wei han chu 
shuang da qie zi 
shi hao yao zhong yao xu duo fang ji ji min jian yan fang zhong 
shi chang shi yong 
qiu hou lao qie zi 
shuang da qie zi 
yue lai yue duo zheng ju biao ming 
qie zi ju you kang ai gong neng 
ceng you shi yan cong qie zi zhong ti qu de yi zhong wu du wu zhi 
yong yu zhi liao wei ai 
zi gong jing ai deng shou dao liang xiao 
qie zi zhong han you long kui jian 
jia se dai deng duo zhong sheng wu jian wu zhi 
qi zhong long kui jian 
hu lu su bei zheng shi ju you kang ai neng li 
jia zhi jie wei liang yao 
gu dai jiu you qiu jia gen zhi liao zhong liu de ji zai 
qie zi hai han you feng fu de ying yang cheng fen 
chu wei sheng su 
qi ta wei sheng su he kuang wu zhi ji hu gen xi hong shi cha bu duo 
qi zhong bu fa yi xie you qu he nao can de leng fan zui 
he fen dun you bao 
wu bu rang ren ti xiao jie fei 
mei guo nan zi de jia men pang lv zao tong yi nv zi pai xie da bian 
nei di you bu shao xi huan he nv ming xing chuan fei wen de fu er dai 
qi zhong ji ge nian qing shuai qi de bei xi cheng wei 
jing cheng si shao 
ji wang xiao fei 
ta men shi biao zhun kuo shao 
cong shi zhe zu shang liu xia lai de shi ye 
wan zhe ci ji de you xi 
shen bian ban zhe bu tong de nv ming xing 
fu qin shi jing cheng you ming de fang di chan da heng wang zhi cai 
yong you jing cheng duo jia fang di chan gong si 
zi zhu can ting ye shi ta de jia ye zhi yi 
jia zhu bei jing wang shi qi xia jia zhi guo yi hao zhai 
wang fu shi ji 
yuan tiao zi jin cheng 
ri chang yi lao si lai si dai bu 
dang chuan lai guo jia zhu xi xi jin ping fa biao xin nian he ci de hua mian de shi hou 
ta ban gong shi ye bei shou du xiang wai jie bao guang 
tou guo de jing tou 
xi jin ping ban gong shi shou xian ying ru yan lian de bei jing shi yi fu chang cheng hua zuo 
ban gong zhuo shang you san bu dian hua 
er hong yi bai 
shen hou shu jia shang bai fang le liu fu zhao pian 
ta yu jia ren tui zhe lun yi shang de fu qin 
ta qian mu qin de shou san bu 
ta yu fu ren he ying 
ta qi zhe zi xing che zai zhe nv er 
you ce shu jia shang ye ke yi pan ming yi zhang ta ti zu qiu de zhao pian 
zuo wei yi ge da guo ling xiu 
xi jin ping ban gong shi de bu ju he zhuang shi 
zai yi ding cheng du ye neng fan ying chu ta de hong yuan 
pin ge he feng fu di qing gan shi jie 
da jia zhi dao 
wan li chang cheng shi gu dai zhong guo zai bu tong shi qi wei di yu sai bei you mu bu luo lian meng qin xi er xiu zhu de gui mo hao da de jun shi gong cheng 
gu jin zhong wai 
fan dao guo chang cheng de ren wu bu jing tan ta de pang bo qi shi 
hong wei gui mo 
jian ju gong cheng yu fang huan yi yi 
ru guo fang zai jin tian de bei jing xia shen shi zhe fu chang cheng hua zuo 
yi xi jin ping wei zong shu ji de dang zhong yang fa qi de xin yi lun gai ge 
bu jiu shi zai dai ling yi wan zhong guo ren min xiu zhu xin de 
wan li chang cheng 
wo xiang xi jin ping zhi suo yi xuan ze zhe fu hua zuo wei bei jing 
jiu shi zai shi shi ke ke ti xing zi ji gai ge bu ke neng yi fan feng shun 
yi cu er jiu 
bi xu jie jian he xue xi gu ren xiu zhu chang cheng de zhi hui 
yi li yi ji cheng shou li 
zheng ru xi jin ping zai he ci zhong suo shuo 
gai ge shi xu yao wo men gong tong wei zhi fen dou de wei da shi ye 
xu yao fu chu jian xin de nu li 
bang yang de li liang shi wu qiong de 
zhao pian zhong xi jin ping yu jia ren tui zhe lun yi shang de lao ren 
bu jin shi ta de fu qin 
zheng shi zhe wei lao ren zai gai ge kai fang zhi chu feng deng xiao ping zhi ming nan xia guang dong 
sha chu le yi tiao xue lu 
shi de guang dong cheng wei zhong guo gai ge kai fang de chuang kou 
zong he gai ge de shi yan qu he pai tou bing 
wei zhong guo shi xing quan mian dui wai kai fang ti gong le ji wei bao gui de jing yan 
xi jin ping dang xuan zong shu ji hou shou ci li jing kao cha jiu yan zhe deng xiao ping dang nian 
xian lu lai dao shen zhen guang dong 
wo xiang zhe bu jin shi zai xiang wai jie xuan shi ji xu jian chi gai ge kai fang de jian qiang jue xin 
da gai ye you xiang cong ta fu qin da dao kuo fu gai ge xin lu li cheng zhong xi yin ying yang de ji ben kao liang 
ru jin ta ba zhe zhang zhao pian zhi fang zai zi ji de ban gong shi 
bu jin shi huai nian guo qu ta fu qin zai shi shi yi jia qi le rong rong de xing fu shi guang 
geng you yi zhong dui ta fu qin jing yang he gan en de xin li 
kan zhe xi jin ping tui zhe fu qin 
wan zhe mu qin 
zai zhe nv er 
yi ji ta yu qi fu ren peng li yuan qin mi he ying de yi zhang zhang wen xin de zhao pian 
wo jiu zai xiang 
ru guo yi ge ren bu xiao shun fu mu 
bu re ai jia ren 
bu shan dai zi nv 
hen nan xiang xiang zhe yang yi ge bu ai jia de ren hui zhen xin ai guo 
er zai zhe fang mian xi jin ping wei wo men zuo chu le bang yang 
ji de you yi pian bao dao shi zhe yang ping lun ta de 
zuo wei er zi 
fan hou ta hui la zhe mu qin de shou san bu 
pei ta liao tian 
zuo wei zhang fu 
ta dui qi zi ti tie ru wei 
wu lun duo wan 
mei tian dou yao gen qi zi zhi shao tong yi ci dian hua 
hu zhi ping an hou cai fang xin xiu xi 
ji shi nian lai yi zhi ru ci 
zuo wei fu qin 
ta jiao nv you fang 
fu fu lia zhi suo yi wei nv er qu ming ming ze 
jiu shi yao qiu nv er zhang da hou 
qing qing bai bai zuo ren 
zuo ge dui she hui you yong de ren 
zhe bu dan shi ta men dui nv er de yin qie xi wang 
ye shi ta men zhi piao jia feng de zhen shi xie zhao 
ji shan yu zhi guo 
ye shan yu zhi jia 
xi jin ping ban gong shi suo zhan xian de yi qie 
cong yi ge ce mian jian zheng le ta kuan guang de xiong huai 
jian qiang de yi zhi 
ren ge de mei li 
feng fu di qing gan 
shi de wo men zai jin yi bu liao jie de ji chu shang dui ta geng jia jing pei 
geng jia qin jin 
geng jia xin ren 
sheng huo zong shi chong man xi wang de 
cheng gong zong shi shu yu ji ji jin qu 
bu xie zhui qiu de ren men 
rang wo men jin mi tuan jie zai yi xi jin ping wei zong shu ji de dang zhong yang zhou wei 
zha shi gong zuo 
jian ku fen dou 
gong tong pu xie wei da zu guo fa zhan de shi dai xin pian zhang 
xi jin ping ru he ping jia zi ji wei geng biao zuo mi shu de na san nian 
xi jin ping gei guan yuan nian dui lian 
mo yi bai xing ke qi 
xi jin ping yan qing zu tan yuan lao xi huan zu qiu you tu wei zheng 
xi jin ping kong fu tan ru jia jing dian : zhe liang ben shu wo yao zi xi kan kan 
xi jin ping dang xian wei shu ji shi fan da tie men 
na bu shi bu ding 
guo jia ling dao ren chu fang zhuo zhuang ao mi 
chao xian zui gao ling dao jia zu de xi fu men 
tu jie ri jun mie jue ren xing bao xing 
ya zhou shi da chao ji hao zhai 
jin nian yi lai 
ji zhe cong wo shi duo jia jin xing liao jie dao 
ji zhe zai duo jia jin xing kan dao 
sui zhe jin jia xia xing 
nian di gou mai huang jin shi pin de xiao fei zhe yue lai yue duo 
gang gei sun zi mai le ge jin suo 
shi min zhang da ma gao su ji zhe 
gan jue hen hua suan 
yi hou jin jia zai shang zhang zhe ye suan shi yi bi tou zi 
zhou da fu jin dian xiao shou ren yuan gao su ji zhe 
nian di ben jiu shi huang jin xiao shou wang ji 
te bie shi jin shi pin xiao liang you qi hao 
sui ran mu qian jin jia bu duan xia die 
dan wu lun chu zhi jin tiao hai shi huang jin shou shi 
qi bao zhi gong neng yi ran cun zai 
zhe ye shi xiao fei zhe zai di wei gou mai de zhu yao yuan yin 
yin chuan wan bao ji zhe huang chao 
da pi bei jing shi min yong jin 
gou mai huang jin 
zao shang kai men di yi ge xiao shi xiao shou e tu po yi qian wan ren min bi 
chuang xia ji lu 
ji zhe chen bai pu feng 
yin hang ban yan wu 
shou du ji chang gong an fen ju tong bao 
shi jian zhong shan dong qi ta cheng ke de liu mou yi jing bei jing fang xing zheng chu fa 
nan zi bu ting quan gao bei dai li 
shou du ji chang jing fang jie shao 
kun ming fei zhi shou du ji chang de hang ban jiang luo hou 
min jing zai xian chang liao jie dao 
dan you yu kun ming lian xu ji tian da wu 
fei ji di da bei jing hou 
zhe xie cheng ke you yu zai kun ming ji chang zhang shi jian yan wu dao zhi qing xu ji dong 
yao qiu hang kong gong si ji yu he li de jie jue fang an 
min jing yi mian an fu 
yi mian gao zhi cheng ke 
yi jing she xian wei fa 
bi xu li ji xia ji dao hang zhan lou yu hang kong gong si xie shang 
he fa wei quan 
cheng ke liu mou bu ting min jing quan gao 
zu nao min jing gong zuo bing ji xu shan dong qi ta cheng ke ju jue xia ji 
zai gao zhi wu xiao hou 
min jing yi fa qiang xing jiang liu mou dai li fei ji 
zai jing fang quan shuo xia 
qi ta cheng ke lu xu xia ji 
liu mou ze bei min jing yi fa jin xing le xing zheng chu fa 
ying tong guo tou su deng wei quan 
hui shi fei ji wu fa ru qi zhi xing xia yi fei xing ren wu 
jin er dao zhi hang ban yan chi huo qu xiao 
ying xiang ji chang diao du 
yan zhong de hui ying xiang ge ri hang ban diao du 
hai hui yan dang hang ji jian xiu shi jian 
dui fei xing an quan gou cheng fu mian ying xiang 
ji chang jing fang biao shi 
zai jin ji nian de hang ban yan wu zhong 
you ge bie cheng ke yin qing xu ji dong 
chong chuang an jian xian chang huo sun huai gong gong she shi deng wei fa xing wei shou dao chu fa 
jing fang ti xing 
yu hang ban yan wu deng qing kuang 
ying tong guo tou su 
gu ding zheng ju deng fang shi 
bian cheng wei fa zhe 
ji zhe liu zhen ni 
zai jiang su nan jing 
lian chao shi de gou wu ka ye you ren ke long 
mei dao guo nian 
gou mai chao shi gou wu ka de ren jiu hui te bie duo 
jia zhu nan jing pu kou de gao xian sheng jiu shi ge zhuan ye de shou ka ren 
ta ping shi zai wang zhan shang fa bu shou gou xin xi 
di jia shou gou ge lei chao shi de gou wu ka 
gao xian sheng dai zhe mai jia qu wo er ma chao shi gui tai jin xing le yan ka 
sui ran mai jia jie shi bu qing chu zhe zhong qing kuang 
dan shi kao lv dao zhe ka shou gou de jia ge que shi fei chang di 
gao xian sheng ye jiu mei you ji jiao 
mai dao ka hou 
gao xian sheng li ma jiu zhuan mai gei le ta ren 
dui fang jiu da lai dian hua shuo ka li de qian bu jian le 
gao xian sheng li ji bao le jing 
tian long ba bu 
zheng zai hu nan wei shi jin ying du bo ju chang re bo 
yi tian yi ji ye di dang bu liao guan zhong zhui ju de re qing 
qiao feng cong ci xing xiao 
cheng wei wang you de re ping hua ti 
bing qie cong kai shi de tu cao jian jian zhuan cheng zhen ai fen 
da zan gai ju suo cheng xian de nong nong wu xia wei 
zuo wan qiao feng yi xue shu ming zhong guo hao bang zhu gan dong guan zhong 
zuo wan hu nan wei shi bo chu di shi si ji zhong 
gai bang si da zhang lao zai kang min de shan dong xia xu yi mou fan 
qiao bang zhu bu dan bu zhui jiu ze ren 
hai ti ta men yi xue shu ming 
zi cha si ba fa dao 
ping ding nei luan yi de fu ren 
er chu jian qiao feng de a zhu zai zhen jing zhong 
ye chan sheng le qin pei yang mu zhi qing 
wang you da zan qiao feng wei 
zhong guo hao bang zhu 
qiao bang zhu xing zi lin yi xue shu ming 
zhong gan yi dan 
ying xiong hao qing 
kan de wo re xue fei teng 
di yi ci kan wu xia pian bei gan dong luo lei 
er shi yan qiao feng de zhong han liang ye bei guan zhong jie shou ren ke 
zhen xin jue de jin tian de ju qing zhong 
zhong han liang yan chu le qiao feng de jing sui 
sui ran wai biao bu gou cu guang 
dan que you dui jiao se xi ni de ba wo 
kan de chu ta dui qiao feng zhe ge jue se hen xi huan 
fen si geng shi da hu 
bang zhu cha dao hao xin teng 
cha zai bang zhu de xiong ji shang 
teng zai lang min de xin jian shang 
la ma wu wen xuan jing chang zai wei bo shai chu yu er zi he ying 
ni sheng zhang de ta wu lun rong mao shen cai dou reng shi shao nv 
rang wang you fen fen gan tan mu zi shi jie di 
la ma wu wen xuan jing chang zai wei bo shai chu yu er zi he ying 
ni sheng zhang de ta wu lun rong mao shen cai dou reng shi shao nv

ju bei jing gu gong bo wu yuan jie shao 
chu fa ding jie jia ri he shu qi

xin hua wang tu pian zhao bing she 
cong jin ri kai qi

guo fang he jun dui deng ling yu gai ge ye huo you xin jin zhan 
ge jie qi dai 
shou ru fen pei gai ge xi ze jiang chu tai yang lao jin bing gui ke qi 
guan yu shen hua shou ru fen pei zhi du gai ge de ruo gan yi jian 
guo jia fa gai wei zhu ren xu shao shi zai jin qi zhao kai de quan guo fa zhan he gai ge gong zuo hui yi shang biao shi 
nu li zeng jia cheng xiang ju min te bie shi di shou ru qun ti shou ru

yi suo xiao pin fu cha ju 
bei gong ren wei shi zhong guo shou ru fen pei gai ge de ji ben si lu 
zhuan jia zhi chu

kong zhi gao shou ru

de shou ru fen pei ge ju

zhuo li jie jue 
dan du er hai 
xin zheng jiang quan mian qi dong luo di xiao guo dai guan 
shi ba jie san zhong quan hui jue ding qi dong shi shi 
dan du er hai 
guan yu tiao zheng wan shan sheng yu zheng ce de jue yi you shi er jie quan guo ren da chang wei hui di liu ci hui yi biao jue tong guo 
dan du liang hai 
zheng ce zheng shi huo pi 
guo jia wei ji wei xiang guan fu ze ren biao shi 
jin nian di yi ji du 
qu jiang qi dong 
dan du er hai 
dan du er hai 
zheng ce de fu fu ke dai hu kou ben 
jie hun zheng he du sheng zi nv fu mu guang rong zheng deng cai liao dao jie dao xiang zhen ji sheng ban shen qing zai sheng yu 
shuang fang zhi xu yi fang hu kou suo zai sheng shi shi gai zheng ce bian ke shen qing 
jing guo yue yu yun niang 
dan du er hai 
zheng ce yi shuai xian jin ru li fa cheng xu 
ruo shun li tong guo 
shan xi deng sheng fen ye cheng jiang li zheng di yi ji du qi dong 
dan du er hai 
you guan zhuan jia biao shi 
zuo wei guo jia zhan lve ceng mian de bian dong 
dan du er hai 
wei ying dui xin zheng luo shi hou duan qi chu xian de sheng yu dui ji 
jin qi yin fa de 
guan yu tiao zheng wan shan sheng yu zheng ce de yi jian 
chang dao he li de sheng yu jian ge 
bing ming que tiao zheng wan shan sheng yu zheng ce de ji ben yuan ze zhi yi 
shi que bao sheng yu shui ping bu chu xian da de bo dong 
duo sheng guan fang diao yan yu ce 
ji sheng xin zheng de luo shi dui zong ti ren kou gui mo 
gong gong zi yuan deng de ying xiang jiang zai ke kong fan wei nei 
bu guo ju ti xiao guo ru he 
yin wu xian li ke xun 
reng you dai guan cha 
jiang shang wei you shi tuo zhan zhi fa hui yi shu ling yu 
ta yong feng man de xiong bu zuo wei hua bi 
chuang zuo chu le yi fu fu xiang yan de you hua 
zhe xie zuo pin geng shi shou dao le ming ren de zhui peng 
ju zhong guo zhi sheng 
xin wen wan gao feng 
fei fei yang yang dan que wu li kan hua de zhang yi mou chao sheng shi jian 
ban sui zhe zhang yi mou ji qi qi zi chen ting gong kai zhi qian ming lang qi lai 
jiang su wu xi shi ren kou ji sheng wei zhu ren xu wei ying jie shou cai fang shi biao shi 
zai zhang yi mou de zhu dong pei he xia 
chao sheng diao cha 
jin zhan shun li 
yu ji yuan dan hou gong bu chu li jie guo 
zhu ming dao yan zhang yi mou she xian 
yi shi bei mei ti re chao 
dang shi ceng zuo chu zheng mian hui ying de wu xi shi ji sheng wei ye yin shu du 
zheng zai diao cha zhong 
bao shou gong zhong zhi yi 
zai zuo tian de cai fang zhong 
wu xi shi ren kou ji sheng wei zhu ren xu wei ying shou xian dui ci zuo le yi ge cheng qing 
ta jie shi wu xi shi ji sheng wei zhi suo yi chi chi mei you jie ru diao cha 
shi yin wei gen ju fa lv gui ding diao cha zhu ti nan yi que ding 
jiu chen ting de chao sheng shi jian lai shuo ta de chu li bi jiao fu za 
jin guan you wang min ti chu hen zao yi qian jiu fa xian le zhe ge qing kuang 
yin wei an zhao guo jia ren kou guan li ji hua sheng yu tiao li lai kan 
ta de ji hua sheng yu de guan li ying gai zai ta de xian ju zhu di guan li wei zhu 
yin wei chen ting bao kuo ta de hai zi he ling yi ge nan fang dang shi ren zhang yi mou ta men dou chang qi bu zai wu xi sheng huo gong zuo ju zhu 
an zhao tiao li ta ying gai zai xian ju zhu di guan li wei zhu 
wo men wu xi zhi neng pei he ta zuo 
zhe shi fa lv shang gui ding de 
suo yi jiu yi zhi you zheng yi mei you ding xia lai 
zhe ge jiu shi an zhao ji hua sheng yu de xiang guan fa gui 
bao kuo she hui fu yang fei zeng shou guo wu yuan ban bu de tiao li gui ding 
dang you zhe zhong you zheng yi di qing kuang zhi xia 
mei fa jie jue 
yao you wo men gong tong de shang ji ren kou ji sheng bu men qu zhi ding 
hu kou shang zai wu xi le jiu you wu xi lai jie jue 
zhang yi mou he qi zi chen ting shou ci tong shi gong kai lou mian 
dui chao sheng wen ti 
zai mei ti shang gong kai xiang gong zhong zhi qian 
chao sheng wei fan le guo jia ji sheng zheng ce 
shi wo he wo tai tai zuo cuo le de yi jian shi qing 
dui yu zhang yi mou de zhe zhong zuo fa xu wei ying biao shi le zan xu 
tong shi ta ye gao su ji zhe jin yi ge yue yi lai 
zai zhang yi mou ben ren de zhu dong pei he xia 
an jian you le jiao kuai jin zhan 
na me mu qian zhang yi mou ye hui ying le gong zhong dui zhe ge wen ti de guan zhu 
ta zi ji yi jing xiang gong zhong dao le ge qian 
wo men jue de hen hao 
dui shi qing de shun li jie jue hen you bang zhu 
xu wei ying shuo 
mu qian min gan wen ti reng ran zai yu zhang yi mou de shou ru he shi 
chu zhang yi mou ben ren gong kai shen bao de yi wai 
hai xu zheng xun ge fang mian de yi jian 
bing fei ji sheng bu men yi jia zhi yan 
yu ji dao yuan dan hou 
hui gei gong zhong yi ge man yi de chu li jie guo 
na me mu qian zhe li mian she ji dao de min gan wen ti hai shi dui yu ta shou ru de he ding 
na me xian zai dui yu shou ru de he ding wen ti 
chu le zhang yi mou ben ren shen bao de yi wai hai yao zheng ji dao she hui ge fang de yi jian 
jiu shi hai you ren ti chu lai shou ru shang hai you yi xie qing kuang 
na me wo men da suan yuan dan yi guo jiu ke yi lai jie jue le 
zhe ge shi qing hai que que shi shi you bu de wo men dan fang mian lai ding 
zhe ge hui sui shi sui di chu xian yi xie bian hua 
wo men xiang xin you zhang yi mou ben ren ren zhen de zhen cheng de pei he 
zui zhong zhe ge shi qing yi ding hui de dao yi ge yuan man de jie jue 
ling ju wu xi bin hu qu ji sheng ju gong zuo ren yuan biao shi 
you yu mu qian an jian reng zai zhi xing guo cheng zhong 
cheng xu hai mei zou wan 
zan bu fang bian xiang gong zhong gong kai she an xi jie 
ji zhe yao dong ming jiang su tai ji zhe hua xiao qing 
ju zhong guo zhi sheng 
xin wen wan gao feng 
cong zuo tian dao jin tian 
zai ci jiu ying xin zhi ji 
shi jie ge guo ling dao ren fen fen fa biao le xin nian he ci 
jiu zai jin tian 
ri ben ling dao ren dou zuo chu le xin nian biao tai 
ta men dou shuo le shen me 
shi fang chu zen yang de xin hao 
wo men xian lai kan chao xian 
ju han lian she bao dao 
chao xian zui gao ling dao ren jin zheng en jin tian tong guo chao xian zhong yang dian shi tai deng mei ti fa biao xin nian jiang hua 
ju han guo mei ti zhuan bo chao xian zhong yang dian shi tai de tu xiang bao dao shuo 
chao xian zui gao ling dao ren jin zheng en hu yu chao han ying ting zhi hu xiang fei bang he di hui 
ji ji ying zao you li yu gai shan chao han guan xi de huan jing 
jin zheng en hai qiang diao 
chao xian jiang ji xu wei gai shan chao han guan xi er nu li 
bing dun cu han guo ye ying ji ji tui dong gai shan chao han guan xi 
jin zheng en jiu chao xian ban dao ju shi biao shi 
mei guo he han guo ju xing de 
dui chao qin lve zhan zheng yan xi 
dui ban dao ju shi gou cheng zhong da wei xie 
ru guo zai ban dao di qu zai ci bao fa zhan zheng 
zhe ke neng hui dai lai yi chang ke pa de he zai nan 
dui yu jin zheng en de xin nian jiang hua 
han guo tong yi bu sui hou hui ying biao shi 
sui ran jin zheng en zai yan jiang zhong hu yu ji ji ying zao you li yu gai shan han chao guan xi de huan jing 
dan chao xian reng ji xu dui han guo zheng fu jin xing fei bang 
han fang ying mi qie guan zhu chao xian de tai du shi fou hui fa sheng bian hua 
er han guo lian he can mou yi zhang cui run xi jin tian fa biao de xin nian he ci geng jia qiang ying 
ge ji bu dui ying bu duan wan shan ying dui xi tong 
yi fang ju bu tiao xin he quan mian zhan zheng 
zhang wo han chao guan xi de zhu dao quan 
zhong guo guo ji wen ti yan jiu suo yan jiu yuan yang xi yu 
jin nian de xin nian jiang hua zong ji diao shi xiang xun qiu huan he 
dan shi nan bei shuang fang xiang hu de bu xin ren you lai yi jiu er qie fei chang shen 
nan fang ye shi bao chi zhe yi zhong jie bei de xin tai 
yan li de guan cha te bie shi dui yu jiang hua ren de yin han zhe you ke neng fa sheng he da zhan de qian zai de wei xie hui bao chi geng gao de jing ti 
tong yang shi zai jin tian 
dang di shi jian ling chen ling dian 
han guo wai jiao bu wang zhan shang fa bu du dao 
ri ben cheng zhu dao 
zuo wei dui ri ben shou xiang an bei jin san can bai jing guo shen she de yi zhong hui ying 
xuan chuan pian yi 
san guo shi   xin luo ben ji 
dong guo wen xian bei kao 
shi zong dai wang shi lu 
deng li shi cai liao 
shuo ming du dao zi gu yi lai jiu shi han guo de yi bu fen 
ri ben zhi shi zai er zhan shi qi jiang dao yu qin zhan wei zhi min di 
dan sui zhe ri jun zhan bai tou xiang 
du dao ye gen ju guo ji xie yi chong xin fan hui han guo de huai bao 
yin ci ri fang mian sheng cheng dui du dao yong you zhu quan shi hao wu gen ju 
han guo wai jiao bu fa yan ren zhao tai yong zhi chu 
fa bu zhe duan xuan chuan pian mu di shi yao rang geng duo de ren zhi dao 
wu lun cong li shi 
hai shi guo ji fa de jiao du lai kan 
du dao dou shi han guo de gu you ling tu 
qi shi zhe yi jing bu shi han guo di yi ci fa bu du dao xuan chuan pian 
dan yin wei jing xu ke shi yong le yi xie ri ben dian shi jie mu zhong de jing tou er bei qi zhi bu yong 
yang xi yu ren wei 
han guo zai zhe me duan de shi jian nei zai ci fa bu du dao xuan chuan pian 
jiu shi wei le biao da qiang ying li chang 
zhe ge xuan chuan pian shi ji shang li yong xin nian zai fang xiang ri ben xiang guo ji she hui fa chu yi ge geng ming que de xin hao 
jiu shi han guo zai du dao tu di shang bu jin bu hui tui rang 
er qie zai xin de yi nian hui cai qu geng you li de cuo shi 
jin lai bu duan tiao shi er de ri ben shou xiang an bei jin san 
ta de xin nian he ci you shuo le xie shen me ne 
zuo wei wan jie pian 
ba da zhu yan xi shu hui gui 
li jia hang he rong rong qi ju 
wu han gao xiao jian mian hui 
dui yu da jia guan zhu de ju qing 
lou yi xiao hao xin tou lu 
you xiao you lei nei rong ye zui feng fu 
hai hui you bian fu xia 
chao ren shen me de 
hua mian te bie xuan 
chu le ju tou 
er zi ye shi 
li jia hang qiao miao ying da 
ai qing gong yu 
you zhe yang de shi chang fan ying 
shuo ming guan zhong hai shi ren ke wo men de chuang xin 
wang chuan jun ze bu chong dao 
mei tian yan yuan dou hui kan da liang de shi shi xin wen he xin xian duan zi 
biao yan shi hui bian yan bian xiu gai 
ru guo zhi shi chao xi xiao fang 
zai yi qi jiao tong shi gu zhong shou shang de can ji ren chen mou shou shu cheng gong shi shi 
ling yi ming shang zhe shi mou yi shang yu chu yuan 
zhe liang ren dou shi can ji ren 
cha dian yin jiao bu qi zhi liao fei dan wu le shang qing 
shi jiang xia yi shi gu chu li min jing ya shang zi ji de shen fen zheng bing zuo le dan bao 
cai de yi ji shi jiu zhi 
jia shi yuan tong mou jia shi yi liang shang wu che yue guo dao lu zhong xin huang xian shi ru ni xing che dao 
yu dui mian shi lai de yi liang zai zhe liang ren de mo tuo che fa sheng peng zhuang 
tong mou wu yang 
er chen mou jia shi de mo tuo che bei zhuang dao gou li 
ta dao zai lu bian zuo shou ji lei gu gu zhe 
jiang xia jiao xun jing da dui shi gu chu li min jing chen kang gan dao xian chang kan cha 
ji shi jiang shang zhe huo su song wang qu yi yuan jiu zhi 
bing jiang jia shi yuan tong mou dai zou diao cha 
chen mou he shi mou dou shi long ya ren 
shi fa dang shi 
chen mou da zai shi mou zhun bei hui an shan lao jia zhuang xiu fang wu 
shi mou bei zhuan song zhi zai wu han de yi yuan zhi liao 
yi jia ting kun nan wei you bu zai zhi fu hou xu fei yong 
shang zhe shi mou xu zhu yuan cha yan lu nei shi fou chu xue 
ye shi yi bi ju e fei yong 
gao e de yi liao fei rang liang ge can ji ren jia ting yi chou mo zhan 
ye shi ke qian gua zhe min jing chen kang de xin 
chen kang zhi yao an zhao cheng xu zou 
ze cheng zhao shi si ji jiang shang zhe song yi yuan jiu zhi 
tiao jie zhao shi fang pei qian 
dui shi gu zuo chu ren ding 
ta de cheng xu jiu suan zou wan le 
liang ge can ji ren tang zai yi yuan li 
ru de bu dao ji shi jiu zhi 
jiang hui chan sheng bu liang hou guo 
chen kang ren wei jue bu neng zai zhe ge jie gu yan shang pie xia ta men bu guan 
zai liao jie dao gai jiao tong shi gu zhong zhao shi fang fu quan ze 
che liang bao xian qi quan 
ta jue xin zai nu li yi ba 
sui ran chen kang de jia ting bing bu fu yu 
dan ta ji ji yu yi yuan lian xi gou tong 
yi ge ren ming yi dan bao 
bing jiang shen fen zheng ya zai yi yuan 
yuan fang xun su zuo chu le zan huan shou qu zhi liao fei yong 
dai bao xian pei chang xia lai zhi hou zai xing jiao na de jue ding 
ji zhe wan qin shi xi sheng sun si tong xun yuan li peng cheng 
guo jia zhu xi xi jin ping zai ban gong shi fa biao er ling yi si nian xin nian he ci 
xin hua she ji zhe lan hong guang she 
ban gong shi shou du bao guang shu jia shang bai fang liu zhang zhao pian 
guo jia zhu xi xi jin ping fa biao xin nian he ci 
qi ban gong shi ye shou du bao guang 
tou guo yang shi jing tou ke yi kan dao 
xi jin ping ban gong shi bei jing shi yi fu chang cheng hua zuo 
ban gong zhuo shang you san bu dian hua 
er hong yi bai 
shen hou shu jia shang bai fang le si fu zhao pian 
ta yu jia ren tui zhe lun yi shang de fu qin 
ta qian mu qin de shou san bu 
ta yu fu ren he ying 
ta qi zhe zi xing che zai zhe nv er 
you ce shu jia shang you liang zhang tu pian 
ke yi pan ming yi zhang ta ti zu qiu de zhao pian 
ju yang guang wang 
xi jin ping ru he ping jia zi ji wei geng biao zuo mi shu de na san nian 
xi jin ping gei guan yuan nian dui lian 
mo yi bai xing ke qi 
xi jin ping yan qing zu tan yuan lao xi huan zu qiu you tu wei zheng

na bu shi bu ding 
jing sou ji you guan zheng ju ji diao cha hou 
xiang gang jing fang biao shi 
ta men de xing wei chu fan 
gong an tiao li 
zai wu xu ke zheng qing kuang xia jin ru xiang gang zhu jun jin qu 
liang ming bei bu nan zi xian zheng bei kou liu diao cha 
shu ming xiang gang shi min wei jing jie fang jun zhu gang bu dui pi zhun 
bing bu gu jun ying ying men shao bing de jing gao

ling xia si she shi du

bu ken hui jia

zuo ye mei xie hao 
zao dao ba ma ou da 
fa sheng zai nan jing mai gao qiao yi xiao qu nei de xin suan yi mu 
ning yuan shou dong bu yuan hui jia 
xiao qu bao an zhang shi fu zai xun luo shi 
zai xiao qu li lai hui pai huai 
chi chi bu ken hui jia

ban nian duo lai

dao da ji chang hou

tong guo jian kong lu xiang 
wu cun pai chu suo min jing fa xian wang mou ceng zai zhe duan shi jian nei 
pin fan jin chu shi qie zhe chen xian sheng ting che de di xia che ku 
wang mou de hei se xi ku kou dai bian bian de 
chu lai hou kou dai que gu le qi lai 
min jing ren ding wang mou jiu shi xian yi ren 
wang mou xiang jing fang jiao dai 
ta gong si de cang ku jiu zai kai yue guang chang de di xia che ku li mian 
ta xia lou zhun bei dao cang ku na dong xi 
qi zhong yi liang bao ma che de che men bei la kai le 
wang mou zuan jin che li 
qu chu xian jin kuai su li kai 
dan mei duo jiu 
wang mou you huang mang pao hui bao ma che pang

bu chu ji fen zhong 
wang mou zai ci hui dao che ku

la che men pi

ta na me you qian

ta xi huan la bie ren che de che men

la che men pi 
yi chi xu ban nian duo le 
mei dao yi ge di fang

peng dao mei shang suo de che men 
ta jiu jin qu luan fan yi tong

shun shou qian yang 
wang mou la kai yi liang xiao che de men 
tou zou che nei de yi tai bi ji ben dian nao 
wang mou hai cong yi liang che nei tou zou le ni kang xiang ji he jing tou

sui shou bei diu diao le 
mu qian wei zhi 
dang wang mou bei song jin kan shou suo shi 
ta de qi zi ting zhe da du zi 
lei yan wang wang 
min jing ti xing 
wei fang zhi che liang bei tou 
che nei jin liang bu yao fang gui zhong wu pin 
ren li kai che zi hou 
wu bi yao suo hao che men 
hai xi chen bao ji zhe peng yi jun tong xun yuan qiu wu zan 
yi qian cong wei peng guo dian nao 
jian chi mei tian zi xue ying yu 
yi nian duo xia lai 
nv gong wei bao gong zuo zi xue ying yu 
chen fang ying lai zi an hui sheng tong cheng nong cun 
wen hua cheng du zhi you chu yi de shui ping 
er zi yi qi lai dong guan zhao gong zuo 
dan you yu nian ling guo da lv lv zao ju 
hou lai tong guo ren cai shi chang zhao dao zai ying yu jiao yu pei xun ji gou zuo qing jie de gong zuo 
zhe fen gong zuo yao qiu bing bu di 
ju gai ji gou de fu ze ren lang hui jie shao 
zhong xin you yi ge yao qiu 
wei le bao chi zhong xin liang hao de ying yu xue xi fen wei 
zhong xin yao qiu yuan gong zai gong gong qu yu jin liang jiang ying yu 
wei le bao zhu gong zuo 
chen fang ying bu de bu xue qi ying yu lai 
pei xun zhong xin gei le chen fang ying yi ge nei bu wang zhan de xue xi zhang hao 
yun xu ta zai zuo wan ben zhi gong zuo zhi hou shang wang zhan xue xi ying yu 
chen fang ying hen kai xin 
dan ta na shi gen ben bu hui shi yong dian nao 
dan ta man man mo suo 
xue hui le ling huo shi yong jian pan yu shang wang 
chen fang ying kai shi zheng shi xue xi ying yu de sheng ya 
ta cong yin biao yu zi mu de du yin 
jian jian dao xue xi ju zi 
sui ran re qing hen zu 
dan chen fang ying de xue xi shi jian fei chang duan 
wei jie sheng shi jian 
wo chi fan de su du hen kuai 
chen fang ying hai wei hui jia 
ta de zhang fu da dian hua gei ta 
cai zhi dao ta you zai zi xue ying yu 
yu shi jiu you xie ze guai ta 
ni dou zhe me da de nian ji le 
xue xi ying yu hai you shen me yong 
chen fang ying fan bo dao 
ni er zi yi hou qu xi fu 
ruo hui mian dui liang zhong po po 
yi zhong shi qin kuai nu li shang jin de po po 
yi zhong shi fan hou ba wan yi tui 
jiu qu da ma jiang de po po 
ni jue de ta hui xi huan na yi zhong 
er qie wo xue ying yu yi hou hai ke yi jiao sun zi 
ta de zhang fu dui ta xue ying yu ye bu zai fan dui le 
xiang xue dao ying yu de zui gao deng ji 
ji zhe zai chen fang ying de bi ji ben shang kan dao 
ta zuo de bi ji 
hai biao zhu ri qi yu ying yu shui ping deng ji 
ju lang hui jie shao 
ye jiu shi chu ji shui ping 
zhe xiang dang yu da xue ying yu si ji de shui ping 
zhong xin yi wei jiao de wai jiao yu chen fang ying yong ying yu dui hua hou ping jia shuo 
ta de fa yin bi jiao biao zhun 
ye bi jiao qin xue hao wen 
ceng you yi wei lao ban de zhi chen fang ying di qing kuang hou 
jue ding gao xin pin qing ta guo qu zuo bao mu 
gong zi bi xian zai yao gao 
dan wo ju jue le 
chen fang ying cheng 
tong guo zhe jian shi 
ta di yi ci ren shi dao yao ti sheng zi ji ge ren jia zhi 
chen fang ying biao shi 
yi kai shi zi ji xue ying yu ye shi wei le yi hou neng gou jiao sun zi 
dan ta xian zai you le geng zhang yuan de da suan 
wo xian zai de zui da mu biao shi xue dao ying yu de zui gao deng ji 
yi bian jiang lai you ji hui qu ying yu guo jia kan yi kan 
yuan biao ti : si nv xin qie 
lao ba cong shang hai gan dao nan jing hua shen sheng dan lao ren tu ran chu xian zai nv er mian qian 
nv er kan dao 
sheng dan lao ren 
nv er ren bu zhu ku le 
nv er dun zai di shang ku 
bu neng zi yi 
du hui ying he sheng dan lao ba he ying 
du hui ying he lao ba 
tu pian you ben ren ti gong 
dang ni zou chu jiao shi 
tu ran kan dao yi ge shen qi de sheng dan lao ren zhan zai ni mian qian 
yuan lai jing shi jiu wei xiang jian de ba ba 
yuan lai shi ba ba zhuang ban cheng sheng dan lao ren lai kan wang ni le 
na hui shi zen yang de jing xi 
gang gang guo qu de sheng dan jie 
nan jing gong ye da xue de da yi nv sheng du hui ying jiu jing li le zhe yang de gan dong 
sheng dan lao ba 
shun jian lei ben 
zhou wei de ren ye bei zhe zhong nong nong de fu ai gan dong 
wang you jiang zhao pian fa shang wei bo 
bu shao ren bei gan dong 
bing cheng zhe shi 
zhong guo hao ba ba 
yang zi wan bao ji zhe li chong 
sheng dan lao ba de zhao pian 
gan dong wan qian wang you 
zai gang gang guo qu de sheng dan jie 
xiang bi hen duo ren dou shi yong bu tong de xing shi guo le jie 
zui jin ji tian 
zai ren ren wang yi ji wei bo shang 
you yi ge guan yu sheng dan jie 
zhong guo hao ba ba 
de zu tu bei shou zhui peng 
yin qi le hen duo ren de guan zhu 
ren ren wang wang you 
shang chuan le ji zhang zhao pian 
nan jing gong ye da xue de lou fu jin 
yi wei fu qin zhuang ban cheng sheng dan lao ren lai kan wang zi ji de nv er 
nv er dun shi lei ben le 
cong shang chuan de tu pian zhong ke yi kan dao 
zhe wei fu qin tuo zhe xing li xiang zai yi zuo lou pang bian de hua tan qian deng dai nv er 
ta quan shen chuan zhe sheng dan lao ren de yi fu 
dai zhe sheng dan mao 
hai chuan zhe da da de hei xue zi 
yang zi wan bao ji zhe kan dao 
zhe wei ba ba dai zhuo yan jing he da da de nong mi de jia hu zi 
ji hu zhe zhu le zheng ge lian 
wang shang liu chuan de zhao pian you san zhang 
nv er kan dao shi ba ba 
ran hou jin jie zhe yan lei liu xia lai 
zhong guo hao ba ba 
zai wang shang re chuan 
hen duo wang you dou bei zhe ge lao ba de lang man suo da dong 
duo jia mei ti de guan fang wei bo ye fen fen jin xing zhuan zai 
yi wei wang you shuo 
man man de fu ai 
tian tian de nv er 
shen shen de zhi qing 
ren jian da ai shi zhen qing 
zhen ling ren gan dong a 
zhong duo wang you ye zai zhuan fa shi biao shi 
fu ai ye you rou ruan nuan ren de yi mian 
zhe man man de dou shi fu ai a 
zhe ge zhu ti de tu pian chu xian zai le hen duo wang zhan shang yi ji lun tan li 
xiang ying zhe zhong duo 
yang zi wan bao ji zhe kan dao 
dan shi zai ren ren wang shang 
zhe yi zhu ti jiu bei liu lan le jin shi wan ci 
sheng dan lao ba de dan sheng 
sheng dan lao ren de la gan xiang zen me shi wo jia de 
ji jing zhou zhe 
yang zi wan bao ji zhe zuo tian lian xi dao zhao pian zhong de dang shi ren 
nan jing gong ye da xue da yi nv sheng du hui ying 
jia zai shang hai 
du hui ying dui ji zhe shuo 
sheng dan jie de qian yi tian 
na tian wo xia ke zhi hou 
zou dao hou xue lou 
tu ran kan dao qian mian you yi ge sheng dan lao ren 
dang shi da jia dou bu zhi dao shi shen me qing kuang 
jue de hen yi wai 
wo tu ran fa xian 
na ge la gan xiang shi wo jia de 
sheng dan lao ren yuan lai shi ba ba 
you yu na ge la gan xiang shang you du te de lan se biao ji 
du hui ying tong guo xiang zi ren chu le shi lao ba 
dang shi shun jian jiu yi wai jia ge zhong gan dong 
bai gan jiao ji 
yi xia zi ku zhe dun zai di shang 
zai du hui ying de miao shu xia 
yang zi wan bao ji zhe liao jie dao dang shi di qing jing 
du hui ying jue de hen jing ya 
pao guo qu dui ba ba shuo 
zhen de shi ni a 
ni zen me hui zhen de shi sheng dan lao ren 
ba ba hui da 
jiu shi wo a 
wo bu jiu shi ni ba ba ma 
zhe xie kan shi wu li tou de dui hua 
jia shang dang shi di qing jing 
rang du hui ying yi xia zi jiu lei liu man mian le 
wo zhen shi tai ji dong le 
ku de dou mei you li qi le 
du hui ying dui ji zhe shuo 
ba ba shi yi ge hen 
yi qian gen ba ba yi qi zou zai lu shang ta dou jue de bu tai shi ying 
mei xiang dao jing ran wei le zi ji 
bian de zhe me lang man 
ji zhe wen dao na ge xiang zi shi 
du hui ying dui ji zhe shuo 
hen duo ren dou wen 
na ge xiang zi li zhuang de shi shen me 
qi shi zhi shi yi xie jian dan de ri yong pin 
hai you ba ma zhun bei de sheng dan li wu 
ba ba cong shang hai guo lai 
chu yuan men bu dou shi yao dai xiang zi de ma 
yao bu shi zhe ge xiang zi 
wo hai ren bu chu lai ta 
du hui ying shuo 
dang shi gan jue chao xing fu 
jue de zi ji shi tian di xia zui zui xing fu de hai zi 
du hui ying shuo 
zai yi qian de sui yue li 
wo cong lai mei you li kai guo ba ma 
shang da xue cong shang hai dao nan jing 
shi wo li jia zui yuan de shi hou 
ba ba ma ma tai si nian wo 
yu shi ba ba jiu yi zhe yang de fang shi lai kan wo le 
du hui ying shuo 
wen zhong di bu guo si nian a 
sheng dan wo hui qin zi ba li wu dai gei ni 
lv xing sheng dan qian dui nv er de cheng nuo 
man zhe qi zi he nv er zhun bei yi fu he li wu 
zhe wei ke ai de ba ba shi zen me xiang dao zhe yi zhao de ne 
yang zi wan bao ji zhe liao jie dao 
du xian sheng he qi zi jin nian yi jing wu shi duo sui le 
er ta you bi jiao xi huan nv hai 
lai de nv de ta he qi zi dui nv er yi zhi dou hen teng ai 
shuo dao zhe ci yi wai de jing xi 
du xian sheng dui ji zhe shuo 
zhe ye shi tu fa qi xiang 
nv er bi jiao gan xing 
nv hai zi ma 
xi huan ge zhong xiao jing xi 
zui jin nv er yao kao shi le 
xue xi hen jin zhang 
wo ye shi xiang rang ta fang song yi xia 
du xian sheng dui ji zhe shuo 
you yu jia zhu zai shang hai de nan jing lu fu jin 
suo yi yi qian yi jia san kou chang qu nan jing lu guang jie 
sheng dan jie de qian ji tian 
na li de sheng dan qi fen hen nong 
kan dao nian qing ren dai zhe sheng dan mao zai na li gao huo dong 
qi fen hen re lie 
hui jia hou gei nv er da dian hua shi shuo qi zhe shi 
nv er ye hen xi huan sheng dan lao ren 
yu shi wo ye xiang rang nv er gan shou yi xia 
jiu tou tou zhun bei le zhe yang yi tao xing tou 
du xian sheng shuo 
sheng dan qian ji tian 
nv er wen you shen me li wu 
zi ji da fu 
ni bu shi yao jing xi ma 
bu gao su ni 
sheng dan jie lin jin 
nv er mo shou dao li wu 
wo dui ta shuo 
dao shi hou wo qin zi ba li wu dai gei ni 
jiu shi xiao he ka zhi lei 
du xian sheng shuo 
dan bu zhi shi yi zhe yang de fang shi chu xian 
dang shi ta jian dao wo 
xian shi leng zhu le 
zhi hou han le sheng ba ba 
jiu kai shi liu yan lei 
wo kan le ye man gan dong 
jue de mu di da dao le 
zhong yu rang nv er jing xi le 
du xian sheng dui nv er shuo 
sheng dan kuai le 
bie ku bie ku 
du xian sheng gao su ji zhe 
zai chu fa qian jiu yu ji hui you tong xue wei guan 
zhun bei le chao duo xiao li wu 
song gei nian qing ren 
yi fu jia li wu ye bu gui 
du xian sheng gao su ji zhe 
wei le zhe ge jing xi 
du xian sheng zuo le hen duo bao mi gong zuo 
wo mai yi fu 
shou shi dong xi 
lao po dou bu zhi dao 
ta yao shi zhi dao le 
nv er ken ding ye jiu hui zhi dao le 
ta zhi dao xiao xi hai shi kan dao le nv er fa gei ta de zhao pian 
ce suo li huan sheng dan fu 
hai xia bie ren yi tiao 
sheng dan lao ba chu xian shi 
du xian sheng gao su ji zhe 
qi shi zi ji shi yi ge hen nei lian di diao de ren 
ye chang yan chuan shen jiao jiao yu nv er zuo ren yao di diao 
qi shi wo yi qian ye mei zhe me zuo guo 
wei le nv er 
huo chu qu le 
du xian sheng gao su ji zhe 
zi ji shi zai jiao xue lou de xi shou jian li huan de yi fu 
dang shi huan hao yi fu chu ce suo men shi 
gang hao you ge nan sheng lai shang xi shou jian 
ta kan dao wo 
zhen de xia le yi da tiao 
wang hou tui le ji bu 
du xian sheng dui ta jiang 
sheng dan kuai le 
wo xiang bu xiang a 
na ge nan sheng tui hai zai fa dou 
shuo xiang a xiang a 
zhe xie jing li 
du xian sheng ye fen xiang gei nv er 
yi qi kai xin le yi xia 
du xian sheng yi da zao jiu chu fa 
cong shang hai dao nan jing 
gan zai zhong wu nv er xia ke de shi hou chu xian le 
qi shi wo bu zhi dao wang shang nei xie zhao pian 
hou lai wo tong xue jiang zhao pian gei wo kan 
wo cai zhi dao 
dang shi zhi gu zhe ku le 
du hui ying shuo 
zai zhe xie zhao pian zhong 
kan dao zhou wei de tong xue ye yi yang hen gan dong 
hai you liang ge nv sheng ye bao zai yi qi ku le 
xian ran bi zi ji hai ji dong 
hou lai ba ba huan le yi fu 
wo men yi qi chi le fan 
xia wu yi qi da le bing pang qiu 
ba ba jiu hui shang hai le 
du hui ying dui ji zhe shuo 
zi ji jia yi zhi dou chong man sheng huo di qing diao 
ma ma bi jiao lang man 
xiao shi hou hen zai hu zhe xie yang jie ri 
dan shi zhang da hou wu suo wei le 
dan shi ba ba wei le rang wo kai xin 
hui xiang jin ban fa 
du hui ying dui ji zhe shuo 
yi qian ba ma hai zai chuang tou gua guo ban mi gao de wa zi 
lai gei zi ji zhuang li wu 
nv er ye ceng 
gei fu mu jing xi 
ji de ba ma mei ge ji nian ri 
te yi hui jia wei ta men qing sheng 
zai du xian sheng he du hui ying de miao shu zhong 
ji zhe gan shou dao le zhe ge jia ting nong nong de wen qing 
du xian sheng gao su ji zhe 
nv er yi zhi mei you li kai guo jia 
shang da xue hou 
zi ji he lao po dou dan xin ta xue xi tai lei 
hui jing chang ti xing ta 
fu qi liang ge zai yu er fang mian jing chang hui huan wei si kao 
cong nian qing ren de jiao du xiang wen ti 
bu bai jia zhang de mian kong 
gen nv er zuo peng you 
nv er ye hen dong shi 
cong shang chu zhong he gao zhong kai shi 
jiu yi zhi bang ma ma xi jiao 
jian shou zhi jia 
du xian sheng shuo 
nv er hui ji de ba ma de mei yi ge ji nian ri 
jie hun ji nian ri 
zi ji dou wang le 
nv er que hai ji de 
shang da xue hou 
ta hai wang shang ding le hua 
jia shang he ka 
yang zi wan bao ji zhe liao jie dao 
du hui ying ye chang gei ba ma dai qu jing xi 
wo li kai ba ma hou 
qi shi ta men man bu shi ying de 
wo yi qian mei liang san zhou hui jia yi ci 
xiang rang ta men bu na me gu dan 
du hui ying zai xue xiao de she tuan huo dong zhong ye biao xian hen ji ji 
ta dui ji zhe shuo 
you liang ci she tuan zai zhou mo ju xing da de huo dong 
dui zi ji hai man zhong yao de 
dan shi fen bie gan shang le ba ma de sheng ri 
quan heng le yi xia 
guo duan hui jia le 
zhe shi wo li kai jia hou ta men de di yi ge sheng ri 
wo bu xiang rang ta men you yi dian bu kai xin he nan guo 
du hui ying hui dao jia shi tian yi jing hei le 
ba ba dan xin shi huai ren jiu bu kai men 
du hui ying han le yi sheng 
ba ba kai men shi 
kan dao shi nv er 
ming xian hen ji dong 
yi zhi xiang ren zhu duo kuang er chu de lei shui 
dan zhong mei you ren zhu 
hen duo shi qing dou ke yi tui yi tui 
dan shi dui ba ma de pei ban que shi bu neng yi zhi deng de 
du hui ying shuo 
zuo wei du sheng nv 
qi shi li kai jia zhi hou 
neng gan jue dao ba ma dui zi ji de yi lai 
zhe zhong yi lai rang wo geng you ze ren gan 
qu hao hao zhao gu ta men 
zhen xi gen ba ma zai yi qi de mei ge shi ke 
du hui ying shuo 
mei ge jia ting de fu mu dui zi nv dou shi chong man le ai de 
sui ran xing shi bu yi yang 
dan shi qing yi dou shi yi yang de 
wu lun fa sheng shen me shi qing 
ta men dou shi bei hou yong yuan de yi kao 
you kong wo jiu hui hui jia pei ta men 
qi shi yao yao ya 
dou ke yi tui diao de 
li ti zhan xian 
qing ming shang he tu 
bei song zhu ming hua jia zhang ze duan de chang juan ming zuo 
qing ming shang he tu 
qing ming shang he tu 
qing ming shang he tu 
wei ti cai de qi shi zuo pin shang shu shou li 
qing ming shang he tu 
zhong guo shang shi jie tai dou 
zhu ming qi shi jian shang jia gei yu 
tan wei guan zhi 
zhao zhi qiang yi zheng shi xiang ying guo ji ni si shi jie ji lu zong bu di jiao le shen bao cai liao 
wei xun qi shi fang qi gong zuo 
zai qi shi shou cang jie 
zhi yao ti qi 
shi wu ren bu zhi wu ren bu xiao 
yin wei ta bu dan shi fa xian luo bu po yun shi shi jie di yi ren 
hai shi zhong guo shi qi wang 
zhong guo hu po wang 
zhong guo yun shi wang de chuang ban ren 
zhe wei chuan qi de 
ben ming zhao zhi qiang 
shi he bei sheng bao ding shi de yi wei qi shi shou cang ai hao zhe 
qing ming shang he tu 
zhong yu wan cheng le 
ji zhe lai dao zhao zhi qiang de gong zuo shi 
jin wu shi de ta shen cai kui wu 
mian se hei hong 
sang yin hong liang 
li ke rang ren xiang qi zai ge bi sha mo zhong tou ding feng sha mo pa gun da di 
ta de gong zuo shi 
ge ge jiao luo dou bei wu yan liu se 
qi xing guai zhuang shi tou zhan ju zhe 
zhi liu xia yi tiao zhai zhai de 
ling luan de ban gong zhuo shang you jiao shui 
shi tou deng ge zhong cai liao 
zhao zhi qiang shuo ta ye ji bu qing wu zi li you duo shao kuai shi tou le 
zhao zhi qiang gao su ji zhe 
zou zai lu shang 
kan dao yi ge mai shi tou de di tan 
chu yu hao qi mai le yi kuai yun shi he ju shi hua shi 
zhi dao chi mi de di bu 
wei le xun zhao he shou cang qi shi 
zhao zhi qiang ji hu mei nian dou yao dao nei meng gu 
xin jiang deng ge bi tan shang zou liang tang 
you qi shi yi ren wu xiang xing shi zui duo 
ta meng fa le yi ge da dan de xiang fa 
na jiu shi da zao yi ge 
qing ming shang he tu 
rang shou li de mei ge yi kuai qi shi dou neng gou 
shuo gan jiu gan 
ta ji hu tian tian dou zai gong zuo shi zhong du guo 
zai lin jin wan cheng de yi ge yue li 
kun ji le jiu zai sha fa shang mi yi jiao 
ran hou jin xing duo ci jia gong he xiu gai 
zhong yu su zao chu le 
qing ming shang he tu 
de quan jing mo xing 
ji zhe kan dao 
ren wu xiang xing shi de zao xing zai xian le 
qing ming shang he tu 
ge ge ren wu de dong zuo xing xiang zai xian le tu zhong de chang jing 
wei miao wei xiao 
bu tong de qi shi dai biao bu tong de ren wu 
zhan tai shang ren wu zai gan ji 
luo tuo deng dong wu xing xiang ye yong qi shi su zao 
bing zeng jia le yi xie jia qin he fei niao de zao xing 
zhao zhi qiang gao su ji zhe 
guan shang shi da zhi fen wei zao xing shi 
qing ming shang he tu 
zhong ji ben nang kuo 
yuan dao shang yi nian de gu sheng wu hua shi 
jin dao shi xia liu xing de ma nao hu po 
cong luo bu po de ge bi yu 
dao jia xiang bao ding de tang he cai yu 
ji hu ying you jin you 
ke yi shuo shi qi shi pin lei de yi ci zong he zhan shi 
zuo pin zhong ying yong le bao kuo he tian yu 
ta men quan bu shi du li 
tian ran de ren wu ge ti zao xing 
ren wu sheng dong chuan shen 
dong wu xing tai zhi miao 
yun han le shen hou de wen hua nei han 
dian pu lin li 
ren yan chou mi de fan hua jing xiang he feng fu de shi su sheng huo yu shang ye huo dong 
kai chuang le qi shi jie xiao pin zu he da xing zhan xian li shi feng su de xian he 
zai wo guo yi 
qing ming shang he tu 
wei ti cai de qi shi zuo pin shang shu shou li 
shu shi kuai qi shi zi shen jia zhi yi da shu shi wan 
yi shu jia zhi geng shi wu fa gu liang 
shen qing ji ni si shi jie ji lu 
zhong guo shang shi jie tai dou 
kan dao zhao zhi qiang de zuo pin hou 
ji yu le gao du ping jia 
te yi wei zhao zhi qiang ti xie le 
qi shi shang he tu 
hou lao yi sheng du shi wu shu 
zhe ci ta yi 
tan wei guan zhi 
qing ming shang he tu 
zhe jian zuo pin 
bu dan rang ren qin jin le zi ran 
geng rang ren huai gu 
li mian biao xian de min su li shi yi yi shen yuan 
man zai le zhong hua min zu wen hua yuan su he ke su xing qiang de wen hua nei han 
miao bu ke yan 
ju you hen gao de jing ji jia zhi he guan shang jia zhi 
zhao zhi qiang ke yi cheng de shang zhong guo xiao pin qi shi di yi ren la 
zhao zhi qiang zheng shi xiang ying guo ji ni si shi jie ji lu zong bu di jiao le shen bao cai liao 
ta gao su ji zhe 
tong shi ye shi ying yong qi shi zhong lei zui duo de shi jie ji lu 
zhao zhi qiang shuo 
ru guo shen ban cheng gong 
ta jiang zi fei kai shi zai quan guo ge de de bo wu guan 
ke ji guan zhan chu 
yong lai xiang ren men pu ji li shi wen hua zhi shi he min zu yi shu ji min jian shou cang zhi shi 
ji zhe zhao lei 
ju zhong guo zhi sheng 
xin wen wan gao feng 
fei fei yang yang dan que wu li kan hua de zhang yi mou chao sheng shi jian 
ban sui zhe zhang yi mou ji qi qi zi chen ting gong kai zhi qian ming lang qi lai 
jiang su wu xi shi ren kou ji sheng wei zhu ren xu wei ying jie shou cai fang shi biao shi 
zai zhang yi mou de zhu dong pei he xia 
chao sheng diao cha 
jin zhan shun li 
yu ji yuan dan hou gong bu chu li jie guo 
zhu ming dao yan zhang yi mou she xian 
yi shi bei mei ti re chao 
dang shi ceng zuo chu zheng mian hui ying de wu xi shi ji sheng wei ye yin shu du 
zheng zai diao cha zhong 
bao shou gong zhong zhi yi 
zai zuo tian de cai fang zhong 
wu xi shi ren kou ji sheng wei zhu ren xu wei ying shou xian dui ci zuo le yi ge cheng qing 
ta jie shi wu xi shi ji sheng wei zhi suo yi chi chi mei you jie ru diao cha 
shi yin wei gen ju fa lv gui ding diao cha zhu ti nan yi que ding 
jiu chen ting de chao sheng shi jian lai shuo ta de chu li bi jiao fu za 
jin guan you wang min ti chu hen zao yi qian jiu fa xian le zhe ge qing kuang 
yin wei an zhao guo jia ren kou guan li ji hua sheng yu tiao li lai kan 
ta de ji hua sheng yu de guan li ying gai zai ta de xian ju zhu di guan li wei zhu 
yin wei chen ting bao kuo ta de hai zi he ling yi ge nan fang dang shi ren zhang yi mou ta men dou chang qi bu zai wu xi sheng huo gong zuo ju zhu 
an zhao tiao li ta ying gai zai xian ju zhu di guan li wei zhu 
wo men wu xi zhi neng pei he ta zuo 
zhe shi fa lv shang gui ding de 
suo yi jiu yi zhi you zheng yi mei you ding xia lai 
zhe ge jiu shi an zhao ji hua sheng yu de xiang guan fa gui 
bao kuo she hui fu yang fei zeng shou guo wu yuan ban bu de tiao li gui ding 
dang you zhe zhong you zheng yi di qing kuang zhi xia 
mei fa jie jue 
yao you wo men gong tong de shang ji ren kou ji sheng bu men qu zhi ding 
hu kou shang zai wu xi le jiu you wu xi lai jie jue 
zhang yi mou he qi zi chen ting shou ci tong shi gong kai lou mian 
dui chao sheng wen ti 
zai mei ti shang gong kai xiang gong zhong zhi qian 
chao sheng wei fan le guo jia ji sheng zheng ce 
shi wo he wo tai tai zuo cuo le de yi jian shi qing 
dui yu zhang yi mou de zhe zhong zuo fa xu wei ying biao shi le zan xu 
tong shi ta ye gao su ji zhe jin yi ge yue yi lai 
zai zhang yi mou ben ren de zhu dong pei he xia 
an jian you le jiao kuai jin zhan 
na me mu qian zhang yi mou ye hui ying le gong zhong dui zhe ge wen ti de guan zhu 
ta zi ji yi jing xiang gong zhong dao le ge qian 
wo men jue de hen hao 
dui shi qing de shun li jie jue hen you bang zhu 
xu wei ying shuo 
mu qian min gan wen ti reng ran zai yu zhang yi mou de shou ru he shi 
chu zhang yi mou ben ren gong kai shen bao de yi wai 
hai xu zheng xun ge fang mian de yi jian 
bing fei ji sheng bu men yi jia zhi yan 
yu ji dao yuan dan hou 
hui gei gong zhong yi ge man yi de chu li jie guo 
na me mu qian zhe li mian she ji dao de min gan wen ti hai shi dui yu ta shou ru de he ding 
na me xian zai dui yu shou ru de he ding wen ti 
chu le zhang yi mou ben ren shen bao de yi wai hai yao zheng ji dao she hui ge fang de yi jian 
jiu shi hai you ren ti chu lai shou ru shang hai you yi xie qing kuang 
na me wo men da suan yuan dan yi guo jiu ke yi lai jie jue le 
zhe ge shi qing hai que que shi shi you bu de wo men dan fang mian lai ding 
zhe ge hui sui shi sui di chu xian yi xie bian hua 
wo men xiang xin you zhang yi mou ben ren ren zhen de zhen cheng de pei he 
zui zhong zhe ge shi qing yi ding hui de dao yi ge yuan man de jie jue 
ling ju wu xi bin hu qu ji sheng ju gong zuo ren yuan biao shi 
you yu mu qian an jian reng zai zhi xing guo cheng zhong 
cheng xu hai mei zou wan 
zan bu fang bian xiang gong zhong gong kai she an xi jie 
ji zhe yao dong ming ji zhe hua xiao qing 
bu tong cheng shi zhang die fen hua ri yi ming xian 
biao ming fang jia zheng ti zou shi geng qu ping wen 
ju zhong guo fang di chan zhi shu xi tong tong ji 
yu shang yue xiang bi 
huan bi zhang fu ju qian shi wei de cheng shi yi ci shi 
wu lu mu qi 
huan bi die fu ju qian shi wei de cheng shi fen bie wei 
tong bi lai kan 
an zhong wei shu ji suan 
shi chang qing kuang xian shi 
zai yi xian cheng shi he bu fen re dian er xian cheng shi mi ji shou jin fang chan tiao kong zheng ce hou 
ben yue nan chang 
xia men xiang ji chu tai zheng ce 
tong guo shi xing cha bie hua zhu fang xin dai zheng ce 
gui fan shang pin fang yu shou guan li deng fang shi jia ma tiao kong 
bing ti chu zhu bu qu xiao 
gou fang ru hu 
shi chang yu qi jian qu ping wen 
gong qiu fang mian 
shi zhi nian mo 
da bu fen kai fa qi ye zai chao e wan cheng quan nian xiao shou mu biao hou 
tui pan liang jin ru ji jie xing di gu 
xiao fei zhe duo xuan ze ji xu guan wang 
deng dai ming nian ru shi de xin pan 
ji zhe yu jun 
shen zhen fen lei chu li xiao chan quan fang 
shen zhen shi gui hua he guo tu zi yuan wei yuan hui zuo tian tou lu 
shen zhen shi zheng fu qian tian chu tai 
shen zhen shi ren min dai biao da hui chang wu wei yuan hui guan yu nong cun cheng shi hua li shi yi liu wei fa jian zhu de chu li jue ding shi dian shi shi ban fa 
dui nong cun cheng shi hua li shi yi liu wei fa jian zhu cai qu fen lei chu li 
dui fei yuan cun min suo jian zhu zhai lei wei jian
