yi fang di chan kai fa wei mu di suo jian zhu zhai lei wei jian bu yu chu li que ren 
dui yuan cun min 
yuan nong cun ji ti jing ji zu zhi 
zheng ti cong kuan 
jian mian fa kuan huo zhe di jia 
shen zhen shi gui hua he guo tu zi yuan wei yuan hui xiang guan fu ze ren biao shi 
dui li shi yi liu wei jian de chu li que ren shu yu you xian que ren 
reng xian zhi liu zhuan huo li 
xian zhi zheng de ban qian bu chang biao zhun 
yi shi wei fa zhe nan yi cong wei fa xing wei huo qu li yi 
zhong fang qi jian cheng bu cun zai qian shui huo yin xian you gui ze cun lou dong 
zhen dui yang shi 
dong fang shi kong 
zai bao guang wan ke si ge xiang mu qian jiao tu di zeng zhi shui yi shi 
wan ke yu di yi shi jian fa bu gong gao fou ren ci shi 
zhong guo jing ji wang ji zhe lian xi qi yu duo jia 
shang ci yi jing cheng qing ci shi 
bu cun zai ying jiao wei jiao di qing kuang 
di yi ci zhe jian shi chu lai de shi hou wo men yi jing fa le gong gao le 
zhao shang di chan dong mi xiang zhong guo jing ji wang ji zhe tou lu 
wo men ye te bie zhu yi zui jin mei ti de xiao xi 
yang shi you na chu lai shuo zhe shi er 
wo men gen yuan lai de hui ying mei you qu bie 
bu cun zai ying jiao wei jiao di qing kuang 
yang shi bao dao kan bu chu wan ke qian shui 
dong fang shi kong 
ji lin wan ke cheng xiang mu 
guang zhou wan ke jin yu lan wan deng duo ge xiang mu yi jing da dao qing jiao tu di zeng zhi shui de tiao jian 
dan qi ye bing wei zhu dong shen bao 
er dang di shui wu zhu guan bu men bing wei yao qiu qi ye qing jiao 
jin wan ke yi jia qi ye 
wan ke gong gao cheng 
bao dao zhong she ji de si ge xiang mu jun bu shu yu 
ying jin xing tu di zeng zhi shui qing suan 
guang zhou jin yu hua ting xiang mu 
yuan wei da dao tu di zeng zhi shui qing suan tiao jian 
ji lin wan ke cheng xiang mu 
gen ju jing shen ji de shi ji cheng ben ji shou ru ce suan 
yu ji qing suan hou shi ji ying jiao na de tu di zeng zhi shui shao yu yu jiao jin e 
shu yu ying tui shui xiang mu 
guang zhou jin yu lan wan xiang mu 
bai yue wan xiang mu 
jun wei quan bu wan cheng xiao shou 
sui ran jun wei da dao ying qing suan tiao jian 
dan xiang mu gong si yi jing zai zheng li xiang guan cai liao 
wei qing suan gong zuo zuo zhun bei 
gong gao zhong hai sheng ming 
ci wei gong si an zhao hui ji zhun ze yao qiu 
dui wei lai ke neng chan sheng de tu di zeng zhi shui jin xing de ji ti 
gong si bu cun zai ying jiao wei jiao de tu di zeng zhi shui 
er hua yuan di chan dong shi zhang ren zhi qiang ye zai wei bo zhong li ting wan ke 
tong shi bu wang ji xu peng ji yang shi 
ren zhi qiang cheng 
yang shi jiang wan ke dang cheng qian shui de lao hu tong da 
wo bu zhi dao wan ke shi fou qian shui 
dan wo cong yang shi bao dao zhong kan bu chu wan ke shi fou qian shui 
yang shi mei zheng ming yi ju bei na shui tiao jian de lou pan wei jie suan zeng zhi shui 
ye wei zheng ming wei jiao zeng zhi shui de yu e yu zhe xie ying jie suan xiang mu di guan xi 
fang qi cheng bu cun zai qian shui 
zhao shang di chan 
hua yuan di chan deng da xing zhi ming fang qi ye dou he ran zai lie 
bu shao gong si ye yu dang shi gei chu hui ying 
zai ci ci yang shi zai bao guang wan ke qian shui yi shi hou 
zhong guo jing ji wang ji zhe cong shang shu fang qi zhong huo xi 
qi ye dui ci shi bu hui duo zuo hui ying 
duo shu tai du he shang ci de yi fa bu de gong gao nei rong xiang tong 
gong si bing wu qian jiao tu di zeng zhi shui di qing kuang 
bing an zhao hui ji zhun ze de gui ding yi fan ying zai li run biao zhong 
gai ji ti bu fen wei da dao shui fa gui ding de tu di zeng zhi shui qing suan tiao jian 
shang wei shi ji chan sheng na shui yi wu 
bu hui jiu tong yi shi jian fa biao liang ci gong gao 
zhao shang di chan ci qian gong gao cheng 
gong si yi an shui fa yao qiu yu jiao le tu di zeng zhi shui 
bu cun zai ying jiao wei jiao di qing kuang 
qie dui fu he qing suan tiao jian de xiang mu jin xing le qing suan 
zhao shang di chan dong mi gao su zhong guo jing ji wang ji zhe 
mu qian gong si tai du reng wei gong gao zhong suo shuo 
bu hui zai du hui ying ci shi 
fang qi huo ju pa gai bian you xi gui ze 
wei he yang shi bao dao he zhong fang qi shuo fa jie ran xiang fan 
dao di shi fou cun zai ying jiao qian jiao de tu di zeng zhi shui 
zhong yuan di chan shi chang yan jiu bu zong jian zhang da wei xiang zhong guo jing ji wang ji zhe biao shi 
yang shi bao dao you yi xie wen ti 
ken ding shi hai mei you da dao yao jiao de tiao jian 
fang qi bu cun zai qian shui yi shuo 
yin wei mei you dao yao jiao na de tiao jian 
guo shui bu men ye bing mei you shuo fang qi qian shui 
zeng zhi shui she zhi ben shen shi yu zheng de 
dui fang qi lai shuo zhi you da dao qing suan tiao jian shi cai kai shi qing suan 
dui fang qi lai shuo ken ding bu cun zai wen ti 
zhang da wei tou lu 
bu neng shuo qian shui 
zhi neng shuo li yong le zhe ge gui ze 
yi xie ye nei ren shi ren wei 
bao dao zui ran you bu yan jin de di fang 
dan ye ye ying she le qi bei hou de wen ti 
yi xie zhi ming fang qi hui cheng li yi dui ma jia xiang mu gong si 
lou pan mai wan bu jie suan 
you yu xiang mu shang wei qing pan 
tu di zeng zhi shui jiu ke yi he li tuo qian 
na jiu ke yi xian ba zhe xie qian yong zuo qi ta jing ying 
zhang da wei xiang zhong guo jing ji wang ji zhe tou lu 
di que bu pai chu you zhe zhong xian xiang cun zai 
fang qi ye hai pa you xi gui ze gai bian 
xian zai ben shen zheng ge shi chang shui zhi zai gai ge 
cong duan xiao de jiao yi huan jie de shui xiang zhang xiao de cun liang huan jie shui zhuan bian 
zhe jiu yao kan di shui fang mian de zuo fa le 
ji zhe li fang 
shi nei quan jing 
zuo wei guo nei zui zi shen de dian shi jie mu zhu chi ren 
zhao zhong xiang zhu chi guo chun wan 
zheng da zong yi 
dong wu shi jie 
zhao zhong xiang yan xing yi xiang di diao nei han 
ta yin tui yang shi 
yi tui xiu zhi ming tui chu 
tai dou zhao zhong xiang dian shi shi dai hua cai luo mu 
zhao zhong xiang de si ren sheng huo 
zai jing cheng nao shi de si ren hui suo ye yi zhi shi yi ge mi 
dan nei bu de zhuang shi 
gu dong shou cang 
zhao lao shi de si ren zhao 
sheng huo qi ju 
hai shi zhi you yi shu jie 
wen yi jie de tai dou men 
yi ji ni ping 
liu xiao qing zhe lei da ming xing jian guo 
zhao shi hui suo wei le fang zhi yi shu pin 
shu fa bei tou qie 
wu nei ge ge jiao luo dou you shu bu qing de yin cang she xiang tou 
cun min zi jian chou ti lou wang you zan 
tai you guo ji fan er le 
cun min zi jian chou ti lou 
wang you zhi hu 
guo ji fan er 
wei yu guang dong sheng shan tou shi hao jiang qu de xi dun cun 
chu xian yi dong ji ju xian dai hua she ji gai nian de fang wu 
wai guan cai yong bu gui ze she ji 
chu le you quan tou ming guan guang lou ti 
bu tong lou ceng geng xiang yi ge ge ban kai de chou ti 
chuang yi xing shi zu 
fang wu wei cun min zi jian fang 
hua fei bu fei 
zhan zai fang wu ding ceng 
ke fu kan zheng ge cun luo jing se 
dui yu zhe dong yi wang zai chao shan di qu nan de yi jian de 
you wang you zhi hu 
tai you guo ji fan er le 
ye you wang you ren wei ta dian fu le ren men dui chuan tong nong cun fang de yin xiang 
chang sha li jun xin yu xi chun yuan xiao qu 
mang ren xiao wu 
he tong ban na zhe zhi ye zi ge zheng shu zuo zai zi ji dian li 
tu gun dong xin wen ji zhe jiang li mei 
ta he tong ban zai chang sha kai le yi jia mang yi an mo dian 
liang ren shang liang kai fen dian 
jiu zhun bei mai yi ge men mian 
deng ta dao yin hang zuo an jie chi le bi men geng 
xin dai ren yuan cheng 
xiao wu shi quan mang 
mei fa xie zi 
kao lv dao ta de zhi ye deng wen ti 
wu fa fang dai 
wo mei ge yue dou you wu liu qian de shou ru 
ta he tong ban zai yu hua qu li jun xin yu kai le yi jia ai xin mang yi an mo dian 
ping chang dou you wen ding de ke yuan 
wang ji dou yao pai dui 
yi tian you san si shi ren 
ta he tong ban liang ren he huo mai shang pu 
ji shi zi ji wu fa huan dai kuan 
jia li de fu mu ye ke yi bang mang 
tui yi bu shuo 
ji shi wo hai bu shang 
hai you shang pu zuo di ya 
zhi ye gu wen xiao shen ti gong le xiao wu jin ban nian de yin hang liu shui 
ta mei yue de shou ru zhi shao you wu qian duo 
huan an jie zu gou le 
ji zhe cong gai yin hang liao jie dao 
ta men bing bu cun zai qi shi can ji ren de wen ti 
ren he ren zhi yao fu he yin hang de fang dai tiao jian shi ke yi fang kuan de 
zhu yao kao lv ta mei you wen ding de shou ru lai yuan 
gai yin hang gong zuo ren yuan shuo 
xiao wu kai de an mo dian zan shi hai mei you ying ye zhi zhao 
ru guo ta you wen ding lai yuan 
wo men ye hui xiang shang ji zhu guan bu men fan kui de 
ji zhe zhang shu bo 
fa gai wei jiang tui jin fang chan shui li fa 
zai ri qian zhao kai de 
di san jie shou du jin rong cai shui fa lun tan 
guo jia fa gai wei fa gui si xing zheng fu yi chu wei da le chu zhang jie shao 
quan mian luo shi shi ba jie san zhong quan hui ti chu de cai shui ti zhi gai ge fang zhen 
fang chan shui fa 
huan jing bao hu shui fa 
li fa gong zuo 
ji zhe cong xi an shi wei di shi er jie si ci quan hui shang huo xi 
xi an shi jiang ji ji hui ying ren min qun zhong dui mei hao sheng huo de xin qi dai 
ba cai li yong dao qun zhong zui xu yao de di fang 
xi an jin nian jiang zuo hao gong ye 
bu cheng jie gao wu ran gao hao neng xiang mu 
jin nian wei bei gong ye qu jiang zhong dian miao zhun shi li qiang 
jing ying hao de qi ye 
bu cheng jie gao wu ran gao hao neng xiang mu 
zhong dian da zao qian yi yuan zhi neng shou ji chan ye ji qun 
jia su xing cheng wan zheng de dian zi xin xi chan ye ti xi 
de guo ya ke bu si duo fu 
si ge ren yong yan huo xie chu 
ying jie xin nian 
yi dui qing lv 
zai zhi li ta er ka de yi chu gong mu qin wen 
qing zhu xin nian dao lai 
mu di ying xin 
ping xuan jie guo xian shi 
ming lie bang shou de shi zhi li zhong bu xiao cheng de xi su 
dang di ren ju zai gong mu mu yuan 
yu si qu de qin ren gong tong ying jie xin nian shu guang 
zhe yi xi su bu zhi qi yuan yu he shi 
dang di yi hu ren jia zai chu xi ye chuang ru mu di 
pei ban gu qu de fu qin yi qi ying jie xin nian 
shu qian shi min lu xu zou jin mu yuan 
zai zhu guang zhao yao xia 
ban zhe chuan tong yin yue ying jie xin nian 
dui la ding mei zhou ren er yan 
zhe yi xi su qi shi bing bu guai yi 
mo xi ge deng la ding mei zhou guo jia you yi ge wang ling jie 
jia ren tuan ju 
gong tong mian huai shi zhe 
mei ri you bao 
dui sheng ming de re qing 
zhe bu shi yi ge bei shang shi ke 
er shi yi zhong mei hao de 
kuai le de fang shi 
jia ren de yi tuan ju 
yi qi mian huai shi qu de suo ai zhi ren 
ying guo ai ding bao ren ju zhao huo ba zou shang jie tou you xing 
luo ma ni ya nong fu qing ting dong wu shuo hua 
ai er lan ren yong mian bao za qiang 
ying guo she jiao wang zhan zu zhi yi xiang quan qiu fan wei de tou piao 
ping xuan chu zui qi te de ci jiu ying xin xi su 
qian qi bai guai 
zhe zhong xi su zhu yao liu xing yu nong cun di qu 
fei chang zi xi 
ru guo ting ming bai 
na jiu yi wei zhe lai nian zou mei yun 
ru guo mei ting dong 
ze yu shi zhe hao zhao tou 
di san ming shu yu ai er lan ren 
ta men yong jiu mian bao qiao da qiang bi 
xiang zheng gan zou e mo 
lai nian ying lai hao yun 
ru guo ni zai nan fei yue han nei si bao de xi er si bo lei guo nian 
zui hao bie shang jie 
dang di ju min xi guan ba jiu jia ju reng chu chuang hu ying jie xin nian 
xiao dao wei bo lu 
da dao shui chuang 
zhi jie cong chuang hu reng chu qu 
na pa zhu zai gao ceng 
ling dang di jing cha tou teng bu yi 
zhe yi xi su ming lie bang dan di si ming 
xi bo li ya ren de ying xin xi su ling ren da leng zhan 
ming lie di wu 
dang di ren zai bei jia er hu de bing mian shang zao yi ge dong 
xie dai yi ke 
qian ru hu di 
zhong zai fang song 
ying guo ai ding bao ren de ying xin huo dong ze wen nuan xu duo 
ta men ban cheng hai dao 
shou ju huo ba zou shang jie tou you xing 
zai yi pian hong hong huo huo zhong ying jie xin de yi nian 
zhe yi xi su lie bang dan di liu ming 
zui shou hui yuan xi ai de xi su dang shu yi da li wei ni si de jie wen chuan tong 
dang ling dian xin nian zhong sheng qiao xiang shi 
ju ji zai wei ni si sheng ma ke guang chang de ren men xiang hu yong bao jie wen 
ci jiu ying xin de qi te xi su hai you dan mai ren de tiao yi zi 
fen lan ren de rong qian deng 
jin guan ying xin fang shi cun zai di qu he wen hua cha yi 
dui da duo shu ren er yan 
xin nian de qing zhu huo dong jiu shi yi ge rang da jia ke yi fa xie qing xu 
huan jie ya li 
chong jing wei lai de ji hui 
wen zhou shang bao 
quan qiu ying xin nian zui qi te xi su pai ming 
di yi ming zhi li ta er ka ren zai mu di ying xin 
di er ming luo ma ni ya ren qing ting dong wu shuo hua 
di san ming ai er lan ren yong jiu mian bao qiao da qiang bi 
di si ming nan fei yue han nei si bao ren ba jiu jia ju reng chu chuang hu 
di wu ming xi bo li ya ren xie dai 
qian ru hu di 
di liu ming ying guo ai ding bao ren ban hai dao ju huo ba shang jie you xing 
di qi ming yi da li wei ni si ren ju ji guang chang yong bao jie wen 
di ba ming dan mai ren tiao yi zi 
di shi ming fen lan ren rong qian 
ju wai mei bao dao 
feng ru fei tun shi bu shao nv shi zhui qiu de shen cai 
hai you yi ci ta ya sui le ju yuan de ma tong 
 yan zhi pai she de niu yue di wu da dao de ban li tan 
zou zai yi guo ta xiang 
tu ran jian dao shu xi de lao jia mei shi 
zhe jue dui shi yi zhong xing fu he jiao ao 
zhuo er dong shi zhang yan zhi jiu zai niu yue jie tou kan dao wai guo ren mai lao jia de luo tian ban li 
ta nan yan xin zhong de ji dong li ji zai wei bo li shai chu zhe yi mu 
yin lai le wang you yi pian zan xu sheng 
yan zhi fa wei bo cheng 
zai niu yue di wu da dao kan dao you luo tian ban li zai mai 
yi ran shi tang chao de 
yi ran shi jia xiang de wei dao 
wen na wei kai xiao dian de wai guo xiao huo 
zhi dao zhe dong xi lai zi na li ma 
dui fang ju ran shuo chu 
zuo wei luo tian ren 
wo jiao ao a 
gai wei bo yi fa li ji yin lai le bu xiao de hong dong 
zhuan fa he dian zan de wang you xun su guo bai 
wang you men dou zai re yi zhe niu yue de luo tian ban li 
zuo wei hu bei te chan 
da jia dou jue de hen zi hao 
wang you zi gu niang 
luo tian ban li mai dao niu yue jue dui shi yi ge hao de kai shi 
luo tian jiang hui yue lai yue hao 
wai guo xiao huo mai luo tian ban li 
bu shao wang you hai fen fen cai ce qi zhong de yuan you 
xin er tian tang niao 
zhe wai guo xiao huo shi luo tian de shang men nv xu ma 
hai you wang you biao shi 
niu yue you ren zai mai 
shuo ming ban li zai na li you shi chang 
zhong guo nan fang ban li zhu chan qu de zhong xin 
li lai luo tian jiu you 
de tian du hou de qi hou tiao jian he shi sheng huan jing 
fu yu luo tian ban li du te de feng wei pin zhi 
gai xian ren min tong guo bu xie de nu li 
quan guo ban li sheng chan di yi xian 
ji zhe yu li shi xi sheng fei quan 
jia cheng you tai wan chan gao fang ren min bi 
neng pian guo yin hang yan chao 
qing shan jing fang tong bao 
liu nv shi jing ou ran jie shi de wai di shang ren yin jian ren shi yi ge suo wei 
shen mi xi xi shuo 
you yi zhong gao fang ren min bi 
da lu yin hang yan bu chu zhen jia 
guo ran huan chu ling chao 
jian ta reng you you yu 
you di guo yi zhi bao xian xiang cheng 
ruo bu fang xin 
liu nv shi yan jian 
sui hou li qu 
liu deng xu jiu dui fang bu hui 
kai xiang zai kan li mian zhi sheng yi da ming bi 
yuan lai ta bei dui fang shi zhang yan fa pian le 
jing fang zhua huo 
ji zhe wang liang liang shi xi sheng lu ya jun tong xun yuan huang juan 
tu pian lai zi tai wan 
jin ri xin wen wang 
zhe zu zhao pian zhi neng kan jian yi wei zong chang fa mei nv de xing gan mei bei bu jian ta de zheng mian 
qie zhe wei mei nv zong shi la zhe yi wei nan shi de shou 
yuan lai zhe shi yi ming e luo si she ying shi yu nv you huan you shi jie shi tu lai de ling gan 
er zhe zu you qu de zhao pian ye rang ta yin ci bao hong 
ju wai mei bao dao 
lai zi e luo si de she ying shi ou si man 
jin nian dai zhe nv you zha ha nuo wa 
yi qi huan you shi jie 
lv tu zhong ou si man yong xiang ji ji lu ge de wei mei de feng jing 
dan you qu de shi zhe xie feng jing zhao yi ding you ge mei li de bei ying 
zhe ge bei ying shi ta de nv you zha ha nuo wa 
zhao pian zhong zha ha nuo wa zhi lu chu ta xing gan de mei bei 
bing la zhe ou si man de shou zhan lu chu xiang gan kuai wang qian zai duo kan yi xie mei miao feng jing de ji po xin qing 
mei nv yu feng jing de jie he rang zhe zu zhao pian zai wang luo fa shao 
shun jian cheng wei hua ti 
ou si man biao shi 
qi shi shi yin wei nv you bu duan bao yuan zi ji zhi gu zhe pai zhao 
yin ci lao shi la zhe zi ji kuai dian zou 
ji fa le pai she zhe yi xi lie zhao pian de xiang fa 
yin ci bao hong de ou si man shen zhi xi yin e luo si gu ge 
qing ta pai she nian du xuan chuan ying pian 
er da jia hao qi de xing gan mei bei zha ha nuo wa de lu shan zhen mian mu ye zhong yu bao guang 
lin zhi ying liang xiang hu nan wei shi kua nian wan hui de cai pai xian chang 
dang tian lin zhi ying de da ban 
tou fa ran shang le xie xu bai se 
jie shou cai fang shi lin zhi ying xuan bu ming nian hui quan mian fu chu 
cong dian ying dian shi 
yin yue dao chu shu 
ta dou hui you suo zuo wei 
er jin nian jin jin shi nuan shen 
ci ci lin zhi ying xuan ze zai wan hui shang wan piao yi shi fou xiang ji sui ci qian de sai che cheng ji zao jia de chuan wen 
dui ci lin zhi ying gao da shang hui ying cheng 
bu guan cheng ji duo hong duo hei dou bu fang zai yan li 
zi wo tiao kan shi hong dao fa zi 
er dui yu shi fou can jia 
lin zhi ying ze cheng zhi yao jie mu zu you yi yuan 
ta yuan yi qu di er ji 
bu can jia kua nian jin nian zhi shi re shen ming nian quan mian fu chu 
jin nian de kua nian wan hui 
lin zhi ying mei you dai can jia 
zhi suo yi bu dai 
shi yin wei jie mu yao yan dao hen wan 
er jin nian lin zhi ying ze hui zai wu tai shang zhan xian zi ji de piao yi ji shu 
bing yu hao shao wen he chang 
bu shi mei ge lian qu dou you mei hao hui yi 
sui ran mei you lai wan hui 
dan ta you gei lin zhi ying jin xing wu dao she ji 
yin wei lin zhi ying ci ci da ban hen xiang ao te man 
suo yi gei ba ba jiu zheng ao te man de zi shi 
dang tian lin zhi ying ye zhu dong ti ji qi ming nian quan mian fu chu de ji hua 
sui ran jin nian lin zhi ying can jia le 
chao ji yan shuo jia 
ba ba qu na er 
liang dang zhi ming du gao de zong yi jie mu 
ling ta zhong hui gong zhong de shi xian 
dan shi lin zhi ying tou lu jin nian zhi shi re shen 
ming nian ta jiang quan mian fu chu 
kua nian wan hui de wu tai shang 
lin zhi ying jiu hui chang ta de xin ge 
ta ye xuan bu yong zhe shou ge lai dai biao ta zheng shi fu chu 
lin zhi ying bu jin you xin ge 
hai you shu hai you xi ju hai you yan chang hui de ji hua 
ta xing fen de biao shi 
jin nian shi gang kai shi 
sai che cheng ji bei zhi yi 
you hong you hei ke neng shi hong dao fa zi 
jin nian dui yu lin zhi ying er yan shi te shu de yi nian 
cong da hong dao da hei 
jiao yuan dan bai shi jian 
sai che cheng ji yi si zao jia shi jian yi ji wei bo shai jia zhao pian deng shi jian jie zhong er zhi 
dang tian zai bei wen dao sai che cheng ji yi si zao jia yi shi 
lin zhi ying hui ying cheng 
sui ran you liu yan dan shi wo bu dan xin 
da jia dou shi pei ban wo cheng zhang de 
bu guan jin nian de cheng ji you duo hong duo hei 
dou bu kan zai yan li 
wo zi ji dou zi chao hong de fa zi shi bu shi jiu shi zhe zhong gan jue ma 
dui yu shi fou can jia 
ba ba qu na er 
lin zhi ying biao shi 
ru guo jie mu zu yuan yi yao qing wo da jia dou yuan yi kan dao wo de hua 
wo hai shi yuan yi lai de 
hen duo nv xing ke neng wai xing xian liang 
dan cai hua yi ban 
zhe zhong ming xing ye bei guang fan cheng zhi wei 
yi se lie ban lin zhi ling 
zhi cheng de yi se lie mei yan ming mo ya ai er bei zuo ha jin qi nu li zhuan xing 
xi wang tong guo ge wu ti cai xi ju dian ying 
xiang shi ren zheng ming ta chu le shen cai hao yi wai 
ye you yan ji he tou nao 
qi zhong zui mei li xing gan de cheng yuan jiu shi you 
qian yi se lie xiao jie 
ya ai er bei zuo ha 
dao yan shi ji shang ye shi wei ta 
liang shen ding zhi 
zhe yi jue se 
ya ai er bei zuo ha yi zhi yi lai dou shi yi xing gan mei yan zhu cheng de ming mo 
guo qu mei ti zhi jiang shan guang deng da zai ta ke guan de xiong bu 
dan ta ji ji zhuan xing 
ru jin zai biao yan shi ye shang cheng ji fei ran 
ta zai dian ying zhong shen zhi da han zi ji zai ye bu zhi shi ge 
chuan nei ku rang ren pin tou lun zu de nv ren 
ceng huo xuan yi se lie xiao jie de ya ai er bei zuo ha 
zai dian ying zhong li zhi kao jin lv shi shi wu suo 
zhi shi ta chu chu peng bi 
you hai pa da jia yi wei ta shi ge wu nao de jin fa you wu 
chi chi bu gan gu qi yong qi gai bian 
zhi dao yu peng you de zi pai ying pian huo xuan can jia ou zhou ge chang da sai 
cai zhong yu qi fa ta jue ding gai bian ren sheng 
er ya ai er bei zuo ha zai xian shi sheng huo zhong ye shi yi se lie zui hong de xing gan ming mo 
you qi shi feng man shang wei cheng le ta de biao zhi 
xun su zou hong 
shen zhi hai you yi se lie yin yue ren ceng xie ge te bie zan song ta de mei xiong 
shi ge duo nian 
ta xian yan chu dian shi ju 
jin nian lai ye jiang chu jiao shen xiang wu tai ju 
yin yue ju yu dian ying 
ceng tiao da liang yan chu 
mei nv yu ye shou 
nv zhu jue bei er er guang shou hao ping 
zai zhe bu ying pian ye tong yang zheng ming ta mei miao de ge hou bing fei ou ran 
dao yan yi teng fu ke si 
ta shi gu yi rang ya ai er bei zuo ha ben se chu yan 
bu dan biao yan hui geng bi zhen 
dui guan zhong lai shuo ye geng you xi li xi wai 
hu xiang zhi she de le qu 
yao shuo jin nian kua nian yan chang hui shang zui bei qi dai de biao yan jia bin 
fei zhang liang he lin zhi ying zhe liang wei bao hong de hao ba ba mo shu 
zhang liang fu zi bu jin he guan zhong de qin mi hu dong 
mo te chu shen de zhang liang shou du zai hu nan wei shi kua nian yan chang hui de wu tai shang liang sang 
dai lai yi shou 
tong shi tian tian ye xian chang wei ba ba ban wu he chang 
ba ba qu na er 
hao ba ba lin zhi ying zhe ci sui ran mei you dai yi qi kua nian 
dan shi zai de zhi dao xia wan cheng de wu dao 
lin zhi ying biao shi hui 
wei le pei he 
ge qu chao ku de wu dao 
lin zhi ying hai jiang zi ji che dui de sai che kai dao le chang sha kua nian de wu tai shang 
wan cheng yi duan chao nan de sai che piao yi hou 
lin zhi ying dai lai le 
shi qi sui de yu ji 
deng si shou guan zhong shu xi de jing dian qu mu 
guo jia zhu xi xi jin ping zai ban gong shi fa biao er ling yi si nian xin nian he ci 
xin hua she ji zhe lan hong guang she 
xin nian qian xi 
guo jia zhu xi xi jin ping tong guo zhong guo guo ji guang bo dian tai 
zhong yang ren min guang bo dian tai 
zhong yang dian shi tai 
fa biao le er ling yi si nian xin nian he ci 
quan wen ru xia 
yi yuan fu shi 
wan xiang geng xin 
wo xiang quan guo ge zu ren min 
xiang xiang gang te bie xing zheng qu tong bao he ao men te bie xing zheng qu tong bao 
xiang tai wan tong bao he hai wai qiao bao 
xiang shi jie ge guo he ge di qu de peng you men 
zhi yi xin nian de zhu fu 
zhu fu lao ren men jian kang 
zhu fu hai zi men kuai le 
zhu fu mei ge jia ting xing fu an kang 
zhang zi lin quan jia fu shou pu yu 
ren da nan shen 
lao gong he zhao 
zhang zi lin quan jia fu 
zhang zi lin tong guo ai quan wei bo shai chu yu 
ren da nan shen 
lao gong he zhao 
dang zuo hui kui fen si de xin nian li wu 
zhao pian zhong huai bao gou gou de zhang zi lin yu lao gong yan ran yi jia san kou 
xiao rong shi fen xing fu 
wang xin ling bei zhi yi yi jing zheng rong 
ni ma hai ren shi ni ma 
wang xin ling bei yi zheng rong hou de zhao pian 
wang xin ling jiu zhao 
you wang you cheng wang xin ling yi jing zheng rong 
rang ren ren bu chu le 
yi qian hai kan le ta bu shao ju 
zhi jue de ting xiang cai yi lin de 
er qie mao si lian shang hen duo keng 
jin tian kan dao ta le 
ni men gan shou xia 
zheng cheng zhe yang ni ma hai ren shi ni ma 
hai you wang you biao shi 
ta de bi zi ying gai shi da le zhen de 
bu guo ta de pi fu hao dao shi tian sheng de 
zui ba zai na zuo de shou shu 
yang ying tong kuan a 
ling dian shi fen gang guo 
meng wa wang shi ling sui ji zai wei bo shang chuan liang zhang mei tu 
bing fu shang xin nian zhu fu 
wang shi ling hai zai fan zhuo shang chi mian 
jian dao jia ren pai zhao 
sui ji mian dui jing tou 
ce zhe nao dai zhuan xin bai 
meng meng de yang zi sui ji mi dao yi da pian wang you 
xin nian di yi tian ling dian gang dao 
meng wa wang shi ling sui ji fa bu xin nian wei bo song zhu fu 
bing fu shang liang zhang meng zhao 
wang shi ling ce zhe nao dai kan jing tou 
zuo shou na zhe kuai zi 
xian ran gang gang hai zai chi mian 
wang shi ling meng zhao yi pu guang sui ji mi dao da pian wang you 
wang jing zi pu chang zao mei nv 
zao wang you qi tu cao 
yu le quan de dao yan yu nv yan yuan de ge zhong qian gui ze chuan wen yi zhi bu jian duan 
er hen duo nv yan yuan wei le xi fen er jing chang zao dao yan he tou zi ren qian gui ze de shi 
ye dou zhong suo zhou zhi 
bu guo zuo wei xiang gang 
zi shen dao yan 
wang jing ri qian que zai an hui wei shi 
chao ji xiao xing 
bei yang yi bi wen shi fou you li yong dao yan zhi quan zhi bian qian gui ze shi 
wang jing que fan ji zi pu 
ni men wu hui le 
wo shi jing chang bei mei nv qian gui ze 
shi ta men qian le wo 
wang jing zhe yi ju 
zai wei bo shang bao guang 
li ji zao dao shu bai wang you liu yan pao hong 
ni hai yao lian ma 
ju zhi qing ren guan zhong zai wei bo ju tou 
chao ji xiao xing 
jie mu xian chang 
wang jing he yang yi shou ci zu he shou ci da dang shuo xiang sheng 
wang jing geng shi xian chu le quan yu zhou 
xiang sheng shou xiu 
yu yang yi xie shou xian chang zi bian zi dao zi yan xiang sheng 
xi dian jin ju po duo dou le quan chang guan zhong bu fu 
xi ju jiao fu 
de cheng hao . yang yi geng shi fa hui xi ju te chang 
yi chang yi he pei he de shi fen mo qi 
xiang sheng yi yang yi yu wang jing wen da de fang shi kai chang 
yang yi dang chang zhi wen wang jing shi fou yin ci jiao ao 
wang jing ze qian xu kai wan xiao shuo dao 
bu ceng jiao ao 
zhi shi hun kou fan chi 
bu liao yang yi sui hou pao xia zha dan 
ni zhe me you cheng jiu de nan ren zen me zhang cheng zhe yang 
wang jing ji zhi qiao miao yi 
ke shi wo nv peng you cong lai mei bi bie ren shao a 
jiao ao zhi qing yi yu yan biao 
wang jing shen bian cong lai bu que mei nv 
yu jiang qi zai xin xi zhong an pai jue se 
yang yi sui hou wen ji wang jing shi fou li yong zhi quan zhi bian chen ji qian gui ze nv yan yuan 
wang jing xian chang zhi hu wei qu 
ni men wu hui le 
wo shi jing chang bei mei nv qian gui ze 
shi ta men qian le wo 
dan shi ling da jia mei you xiang dao shi 
wang jing zhe yi ju 
dang chang li ji zao lai yang yi de tu cao 
ni yao lian ma 
sui hou wei bo ye yin lai shu bai wang you gen feng liu yan tu cao 
ni hai yao lian ma 
hu nan wei shi kua nian yan chang hui ju xing 
li yu chun ya zhou xian chang 
ta dang wan de zao xing hen te bie 
xiao xiu le yi ba mei tui 
zheng shi zhe ge zao xing 
rang hen duo wang you fa feng 
cheng she ying shi ying gai gei da tui geng duo jing tou 
shi nu bi zhe ge man hua xing xiang ke wei jia yu hu xiao 
ta de zu ji bian bu quan qiu 
tong guo bao zhi 
wu tai biao yan 
dong hua ji dian shi te bie jie mu deng fang shi shou dao shi jie ge de ren men de zhui peng 
ri ben yi zuo ku si shi nu bi de dao yu gei ri ben de shi nu bi mi men dai lai le fu yin 
ri ben yi zuo you huo shan bao fa xing cheng de dao yu yu lin jin dao yu xi zhi dao ting lian jie xing cheng le ku si dong man xing xiang shi nu bi de xing zhuang 
shi ri ben de shi nu bi mi men ji jin feng kuang 
zai ri ben yin fa hong dong 
gai huo shan bao fa hou 
yu xian you de xi zhi dao ting lian jie 
xing cheng shi shi nu bi yi yang de ka tong zao xing 
dang you guan hang kong zhao pian fa bu chu lai yi hou 
shen zhi you ren shuo zhe dao yu de xing zhuang yu shi nu bi wan quan wen he 
yin ci ta bei cheng wei shi nu bi dao 
gai zhao pian de fa bu ling shi nu bi mi wei zhi feng kuang 
you ren shen zhi shuo dao 
zhe shi shi nu bi dao ! wo yao bu gu yi qie ben fu na li 
ran er ri ben guan fang que jing gao ren men shuo 
gai huo shan reng chu yu huo yue zhuang tai 
fei chang wei xian 
suo yi gai dao de xing zhuang ye shi zan shi de 
ta hui sui zhao huo shan bao fa kuo zhang zhu jian shi qu zhe ke ai de shi nu bi zao xing 
zhe zhi ju mang jiu zai ma lu shang 
an ba er shi tu zhua zhu ta 
yin wei ta jing chang zai zhe yi dai chu mo 
dan shi dang ta zhua zhu mang she bing jiang qi ju dao jian bang chu shi 
mang she si si di chan zhu le ta de bo zi he shen ti 
ling wai san ming bao an jian zhuang 
nu li xiang ba mang she la kai 
wu fa la kai 
zui zhong an ba er bu xing bei zhe zhi mang she huo huo lei si 
mu ji zhe fen fen biao shi 
shi qing fa sheng de tai tu ran 
wan quan chu hu yi liao 
mang she jiu shi kao ta men de shen ti si si chan zhu lie wu 
cong er jiang lie wu sha si de 
dan shi ta men bing bu qing yi gong ji ren lei 
zhi you zai mi shi de shi hou 
ta men cai hui fa dong gong ji 
ba li dao jing ju yi kai zhan sou cha xing dong 
xi wang zhua zhu zhe ge 
sha ren xiong shou 
ju zhong guo zhi sheng 
quan qiu hua yu guang bo wang 
zui jin you guan nian zhong jiang de hua ti ting huo 
ge zhong xiao xi ye ting duo 
xian shi you shen yang tu hao lao ban zhi bai wan yuan gou bai gen jin tiao fa nian zhong jiang 
xian zai you you yan jiu ji gou dui nian zhong jiang zuo le yi xiang wen juan diao cha 
jie guo fa xian 
ni tuo hou tui le ma 
ji shi yuan gong de qiang xin ji 
ye shi hang ye de qing yu biao 
you mei ti hai diao cha le jin nian ge hang ge ye de nian zhong jiang qing kuang 
jie guo xian shi 
you zai mou da xing yin hang bei jing fen hang zuo xing zheng gong zuo de yuan gong tou lu 
zhong guo ren yao guo nian 
wai guo ren ye yao guo nian 
wo men lai kan kan guo wai de nian zhong jiang zen me fa 
xian lai kan ri ben 
quan qiu hua yu guang bo wang ri ben guan cha yuan huang xue qing jie shao 
ri ben yi ban shi mei nian fa liang ci jiang jin 
gen ju ri ben gong bu de shu ju xian shi 
dan shi bu tong de hang ye cha bie bu xiao 
qi zhong qi che hang ye de zeng fu zui ming xian 
er qi ta hang ye ji hu mei you tai da de bian hua 
zhe he ri yuan de bian zhi zhi jie dai dong le ye ji de shang sheng you hen da de guan xi 
yuan cai liao yi lai jin kou de hang ye fan er chu xian le jiang jin jian shao de xian xiang 
qi zhong yi xie zhong xiao qi ye shen zhi fa bu chu jiang jin 
jin ri dian shi bao dao cheng 
yi wei xiao qi ye de lao ban jian shao zi ji gong zi gei ji ge yuan gong fa le san wan ri yuan de nian zhong jiang 
zai jiang jin de yong tu shang 
qi ci yao tian bu sheng huo 
huan dai deng deng 
jin nian yuan dan ri ben shi jiu lian xiu 
yong jiang jin qu lv xing kao lao yi xia zi ji de ren ye bi qu nian zeng jia le 
zai lai kan ou zhou 
lv ju fa guo de wan ling hong nv shi gao su wo men 
fa guo qi ye de nian zhong jiang da duo shi duo fa yi ge yue de gong zi 
zui da fang de hang ye shi jin rong ye 
shou xian wo xiang shuo de shi jiu shi fa guo de nian zhong jiang shi ji shang shi bing bu shi hen duo de 
yin wei zhe qian she dao yi ge jiu shi shuo zai qi ye yao gei yuan gong fa na ge qian de guo cheng zhong 
shi yao gei dao zheng fu jiao shui de 
suo yi shuo ta zhe ge nian zhong jiang bu shi hen duo 
di er bu hui zhi jie ti xian zai he tong shang mian 
dao nian zhong de shi hou 
dui yu pu tong yuan gong gei yi liang ge yue de gong zi 
yi ban qing kuang xia 
yin hang de yuan gong hui bi qi ta de yuan gong nian zhong jiang na de duo yi xie 
you yu ping shi de dai yu jiao hao 
fa guo ren dui yu nian zhong jiang bing mei you tai duo de qi dai 
wo men lai kan ao da li ya 
quan qiu hua yu guang bo wang ao da li ya guan cha yuan hu fang shuo 
dang di nian zhong jiang fa fang de da tou shi bao xian gong si he yin hang 
jin e shen zhi hui he nian xin xiang dang 
dui yu hen duo ren ao da li ya ren lai shuo 
fa zhang jin e yi liang bai de gou wu ka yi jing hen man zu le 
xiang shi yi xie bao xian gong si 
yin hang huo zhe shi jiu dian deng deng hang ye wang wang shi nian zhong jiang fa fang de da tou 
you yi xie qi ye shen zhi ba nian zhong de hong li zuo wei yuan gong quan nian shou ru de hen da yi bu fen 
chao guo yi ban shu liang yi shang 
dan shi chu diao di xin yi wai 
ni de hong li ye jiu shi zai nian zhong fa fang de zhe yi bu fen 
zai ao da li ya 
bing bu shi suo you de hang ye dou hui you nian zhong jiang 
xiang shi yi xie gong yi ji gou huo zhe shi xiang shi yi xie xue xiao deng dan wei ta ben shen jiu mei you nian zhong jiang 
dui yu da bu fen ao da li ya ren lai shuo 
neng gou huo de ge yi liang qian kuai qian de nian zhong jiang li huo zhe shi neng gou you ji zhang shang dian de gou wu ka 
yi jing shi yi ge hen bu cuo de sheng dan li wu 
ke yi huan du sheng dan jie he xin nian le 
zai ao da li ya 
hai you yi zhong fei yi suo si de nian zhong jiang 
na zhe ge jiang de qian ti shi 
ni bi xu xiu guo nian jia 
yin wei dui yu ao da li ya de gong si lai shuo 
ru guo yuan gong xuan ze le nian jia zhe jiu yi wei zhe ta zai nian jia qi jian mei you ban fa qu jia ban huo de e wai de xin chou 
suo yi gong si hui gei chu zhe me yi ge de jiang jin 
dan shi dui yu ao da li ya ren lai shuo 
ta men dao shi fei chang tan ran jie shou 
jue de zhe yang yi ge e wai de jiang jin shi li suo dang ran de 
zuo ri sheng wu jia ju xia fa tong zhi 
wo sheng qi you sheng ji zhi guo biao zhun 
zhi liang sheng ji hou you jia jia jia 
gen ju guo jia fa zhan gai ge wei 
guan yu you pin zhi liang sheng ji jia ge zheng ce you guan yi jian de tong zhi 
jing shen he sheng zheng fu 
guan yu yin fa sheng 
sheng wu jia ju zuo ri xia fa guan yu wo sheng che yong qi you zhi liang sheng ji jia jia zheng ce de tong zhi 
dui wo sheng che yong qi you zhi liang biao zhun sheng ji zhi di si jie duan 
shi xing you zhi you jia 
sheng ji hou di si jie duan che yong qi you biao zhun 
bing que ding le ge jia qu guo biao zhun qi you zui gao ling shou jia ge 
cheng pin you ling shou qi ye ke zai bu chao guo zui gao ling shou jia ge de qian ti xia 
zi zhu zhi ding ju ti ling shou jia ge 
sheng wu jia ju que ding le guo biao zhun qi you zui gao ling shou jia ge 
qi zhong zhong bei bu jia qu 
ji zhe lv hua 
wu mai xia de xi an 
cheng qiang shang jian zhu ruo yin ruo xian ben bao ji zhe wang jing she 
deng lu bao ji 
tong chuan he yan an shi huan bao ju de wang zhan 
er yang hua liu 
er yang hua dan 
yi yang hua tan 
an kong qi zhi liang xin biao zhun yao qiu jin xing kong qi zhi liang ping jia 
ti qian wan cheng guo jia an pai ren wu 
sheng huan bao ting jian ce chu xiang guan fu ze ren biao shi 
jiu ci qian ge de jian ce zhan shi jian ce shu ju zong ti kan lai 
xi an you yu ren kou duo 
pai fang liang da 
kuo san neng li cha 
xian yang he xi an di qing kuang cha bu duo 
dan you shi lve hao yi xie 
bao ji ze bi xian yang de kong qi zhi liang qiang yi xie 
tong chuan ze shi guan zhong wu shi zhong kong qi zhi liang zui hao de 
jin nian lai dui shui ni fen chen wu ran de zhi li 
he cheng qu shui ni qi ye de guan bi 
shi tong chuan shi de kong qi zhi liang you ming xian gai shan 
jia zhi jian she zai yuan shang de tong chuan xin qu di shi gao 
gong ye qi ye shao 
di chu gao yuan de yan an wu ran wu zong liang jiao guan zhong xiao 
kuo san tiao jian geng wei you li 
yin ci kong qi zhi liang xiang bi shi zui hao de 
ju xin hua she xiao xi 
dao zuo ri wei zhi 
wo guo fa bu kong qi zhi liang shi shi xin xi 
shi xian le zhi xia shi 
sheng hui cheng shi 
ji hua dan lie shi 
huan bao zhong dian cheng shi he huan bao mo fan cheng shi quan fu gai 
er wo sheng shi xi bei di qu na ru kao he ming dan de cheng shi zui duo de sheng fen 
wo sheng da bu fen xian cheng dou jiang jian cheng jian ce zhan 
ju bei he mu qian xi an shi yi yang de kong qi zhi liang jian ce neng li 
suo you xian cheng jiang ju bei kong qi zhi liang jian ce neng li 
zhong ke yuan guan fang wei bo 
zhong ke yuan zhi sheng 
xi an ge lei wu ran yuan zhan bi shi duo shao 
zhong ke yuan diao cha jie guo xian shi 
fen bie shi tu rang chen 
sheng wu zhi ran shao 
qi che wei qi yu la ji fen shao 
gong ye wu ran he er ci wu ji qi rong jiao 
yan jiu hai xian shi 
sha chen tian qi chang dui chun ji qi rong jiao you zhong yao ying xiang 
er zai qiu dong ji jie 
lai zi jian she gong di de fu chen he jie dao de zai xuan fu chen shi tu rang chen de zhu yao lai yuan 
ran mei yuan zai dong ji gong xian zui da 
sheng wu zhi ran shao yuan gong xian chun 
qiu ji jiao gao 
xia ji jiao di 
gong ye wu ran yuan gong xian zai xia qiu ji jie jiao gao 
ji zhe cong xi an huan bao bu men liao jie dao 
ran mei wu ran he qi che wei qi 
bu tong de ji jie he qi xiang tiao jian xia zhan bi hui you cha bie 
bi ru dong ji ran mei wu ran zhan bi hui shang fu 
ge cheng shi de chan ye jie gou 
gong ye bu ju 
you pin zhi liang deng fang mian dou you cha yi 
yin ci cheng shi he cheng shi zhi jian wu ran wu lai yuan zhan bi cun zai cha bie shi yi zhong zheng chang xian xiang 
ji zhe hao lei 
xi an shi cheng guan zhi fa ju dui quan shi fan wei nei jin shao la ji za wu qing kuang jin xing le jian cha 
qi zhong lian hu qu zui duo 
qi ci shi ba qiao qu 
feng dong xin cheng 
chan ba sheng tai qu 
shi cheng guan zhi fa ju dui ci yu yi bao guang 
zai chu fa de tong shi kou chu xiang guan qu xian zhi wu jian mai kao he kao ping fen zhi 
dan fen shao la ji 
za wu de wu ran xing wei reng cun zai 
xi an shi cheng guan zhi fa ju jia da xun cha li du 
dui fen shao la ji 
can zhao xi an shi jin shao jie gan xiang guan gui ding 
dui fa xian de fen shao la ji za wu xing wei 
mei yi ge zhao huo dian chu fa suo zai qu xian zheng fu 
ji zhe guo xiao rong 
bei ji shao suo 
bei lou jun yi 
yang xiao xu zai shen shan cai yao zhan hu she 
hei long jiang sheng jun qu mou bian fang tuan 
jun yi xin yu 
wo jiu shi xiang xue hao shou yi gei bian fang zhan shi zhi bing liao shang 
zan zhe er shi zu guo de 
dong shang shi chang jian bing 
hei long jiang sheng jun qu mou bian fang tuan jun yi yang xiao xu jiu gao su ji zhe 
wei le jin kuai zhang wo fang bing zhi bing de ben ling 
wo sha zhao dou shi shang le 
yang xiao xu cong jia mu si yi ke da xue bi ye ru wu lai dao lian dui dang wei sheng yuan 
song bi feng shi mo he xian you ming de lao zhong yi 
zhen cang zhe hao ji fu zu chuan mi fang 
na nian dong tian 
zhan shi zhang xin de le feng shi bing 
yi zhao liang jiu teng tong nan ren 
yang xiao xu dai zhe zhang xin dao lao zhong yi na li zhi liao qing jiao 
lao zhong yi zhi kan bing bu yuan chuan shou pian fang 
wo jiu shi xiang xue hao shou yi gei bian fang zhan shi zhi bing liao shang 
lao zhong yi bei gan dong le 
ba zu chuan mi fang qing nang xiang shou 
jiao yang xiao xu zen me pei yao 
ru he ao yao 
jing guo shi ji nian de xue xi zheng li 
yang xiao xu de bi ji ben shang ji xia le bu shao yao fang 
qi zhong zhi liao bian fang guan bing chang jian bing de zhong yao fang huo 
li shu jie pao shui he 
you zhu yu wei chang yan hui fu 
pu gong ying qing re jie du 
xiao zhong san jie 
hai neng li niao huan xie 
jin you pian fang bu xing 
hai bi xu you zu gou de zhong cao yao 
zhu di lin hai shen chu yao cai zi yuan feng fu 
yang xiao xu li yong ye yu shi jian bei shang bei lou shang shan wa yao 
ta de ai ren yu hong dui ji zhe shuo 
xiao xu bu shi qu ji ceng xun zhen 
jiu shi bei shang bei lou shang shan cai yao 
yi nian dao tou zai jia dai bu liao duo shao tian 
mei ci hui lai 
ta dou yao dai zhe yao cai hui jia liang shai 
xian zai jiu lian hai zi dou ren shi le wu wei zi 
ci wu jia deng zhong cao yao 
yang xiao xu you ge xi guan 
yao cai xing neng mei wan quan nong ming bai jue bu shi yong 
ta jing chang gei mu xiao lao shi da dian hua zi xun 
hai qin zi pin chang yao cai 
bing ba yao xiao ren zhen ji lu xia lai 
shang deng bing zhang lei huan le feng shi bing 
yang xiao xu li yong xun zhen ji hui 
mei tian yong jiu jing gei ta rou cuo tui bu 
hai yong hei ma yi pao jiu 
yong liang mian zhen fen 
hu jiao gen fen he jiu tiao yun wai fu 
rang zhang lei hen kuai chong fan xun lian chang 
xian hou bei da xing an ling jun fen qu ping wei you xiu gong chan dang yuan 
wei sheng xun lian biao bing he xue lei feng xue su ning xue xi cheng cai biao bing 
chao ji jing guo hao 
zhan ji xing neng ti sheng jia gua yuan ju yao gong dao dan 
ju tai wan mei ti bao dao 
tai wan kong jun di yi ge zai 
ji hua xia wan cheng xing neng ti sheng de 
zhan dou ji lian dui 
you ma ying jiu zhu chi 
gai liang hou de 
chao ji jing guo hao 
yuan ju yao gong dao dan 
ji hua fen wei liang bu fen 
xiang zhan yi hao 
xiang zhan er hao 
gai liang hou de 
ren wu ji suan ji 
fei kong ruan jian dou sheng ji 
bu fen yin zhi zao shang xie ye er chan sheng shang yuan xiao shi wen ti de ling fu jian 
ye dou geng huan 
tai wan kong jun gu ji 
xiang zhan ji hua 
de xing neng ti sheng 
zhi neng xie dai chuan tong wu dao yin zha dan 
xin pei shu de 
kong dui de dao dan 
lian he yao gong wu qi xi tong 
wan jian dan de zhu ti shi yi mei ji shu zha dan 
jia shang huo jian fa dong ji 
ji yi yu dao hang xi tong 
ke zai yuan ju zhi wai tou she 
zi xing zuan ru di ren fang kong wang 
fei dao mu biao shang kong 
dui di mian jin xing 
ye zai yan fa 
jiang tian jian er xing dao dan gai zao wei zhui zong dian bo fa she yuan de 
fan fu she dao dan 
yong yu gong ji lei da zhan 
guan yuan biao shi 
kong jun xian yi san zhong er dai zhu li zhan ji zhong 
lao yi bu jun 
xiang zhan ji hua quan mian wan cheng hou 
po bing nian xue yan bing ke er qin 
tie jia chi cheng ba bai li han hai 
po bing nian xue li lian jing bing 
mao zhe yan han jin xing shi zhan hua yan lian 
ci ci yan lian shi shen yang jun qu zhuo yan dong ji yan han qi hou he sheng shu di xing tiao jian 
an zhao shi zhan jin cheng zu zhi de yi ci zong he yan lian 
zai yan lian guo cheng zhong 
gai lv wei rao yan han tiao jian xia de zuo zhan te dian 
chuang xin zhan fa 
yan lian gong ke nan ti 
ta men jiang zhan chang re shi bao zhang you ji zhong shi bian wei dan bing zi wo bao zhang 
zhuan yong de jia re bao yong yu zhi zuo ban cheng pin shi wu 
zai ji dong de zhan che shang ji ke jiu can 
ye jian bu da she zhang peng 
guan bing li yong han qu shui dai sui zhuang su ying 
ji da suo duan le bu dui ying ji ji dong 
zhan chang zhuan yi 
zuo zhan zhun bei de shi jian 
gen ju zhan dou jin cheng 
sui ji dao diao zi xing huo pao 
tan ke deng duo zhong qing zhong xing zhuang bei jin xing shi dan she ji yan lian 
dan yao bu chong 
you liao bu ji 
zhan shang jiu hu 
zhuang bei qiang xiu deng yao su ban sui bao zhang 
you xiao ti gao le zong he bao zhang neng li 
gai lv yan ge an zhao shi zhan hua yao qiu 
tong bu shi shi de fang shi 
dui ping zhuan ying ji 
ji dong dai ji 
fang yu zuo zhan 
jin gong zhan dou yi ji che li zhan chang deng xun lian nei rong jin xing yan lian 
jian yan bu dui yan han tiao jian xia de zhi hui kong zhi 
zhan shu ji dong 
huo li yun yong 
zhan dou xie tong 
zheng ti fang hu he zong he bao zhang deng zuo zhan neng li 
ci ci yan lian 
gai lv hai cai ji le han qu xin xi hua xin zhuang bei zuo zhan shu ju bai yu zu 
tan suo chu shu shi zhong yan han tiao jian xia xun lian he zuo zhan de xin lu zi 
wei bu dui dong ji zuo zhan ji lei le bao gui jing yan 
bu dui li yong ye an ji jie 
zhi hui yuan yun yong yi ti hua zhi hui ping tai zhi hui 
zhuang jia bu bing fen dui xiang 
qian yan tu ji 
ye zhan tiao jian xia jin xing zhong zhuang bei qun che you liao bu ji 
tan ke qun dui 
shi shi huo li da ji 
bu dui duo lu kuai su ji dong 
lai yuan : jie fang jun bao 
he fei kai shi shi shi 
he fei shi dao lu jiao tong an quan tiao li 
yi xia jian cheng 
chu le zai huo qi che bu de jin ru shi qu yi huan lu yi nei 
han yi huan lu 
hai you yi xie bei shou guan zhu de xiu gai dian 
jia shi ren xu yao jin kuai shu xi le 
yi mian bei fa o 
che liang tong guo you fang xiang zhi shi xin hao deng 
bing she zhi zhuan wan dai xing qu de jiao cha lu kou 
tong fang xiang zhi xing che liang fang xing shi 
zhuan wan che liang wei yi ci jin ru dai xing qu deng hou de 
you gong an ji guan jiao tong guan li bu men ze ling gai zheng 
ke yi chu yi yi bai yuan fa kuan 
zai huo qi che ming nian qi jin ru yi huan nei 
zai huo qi che jin xing fan wei tiao zheng wei 
zai huo qi che bu de jin ru shi qu yi huan lu yi nei 
han yi huan lu 
jin zhi shang gao jia dao lu he li jiao qiao de che liang ye zuo le tiao zheng 
xiao xing huo che 
da xing ke che ye bei na ru jin zhi tong xing de che liang 
zeng jia le fei ji dong che bu de zai wei she zhi fei ji dong che dao de xia chuan dao lu tong xing de gui ding 
che liang xu tie huan bao biao zhi chao biao che jiang xian xing 
you yu he fei jiang dui wu ran pai fang chao biao di che liang xian xing 
wei le bian yu guan li 
ji dong che huan bao jian yan he ge biao zhi 
ying dang zhan tie zai qian fang dang feng bo li nei ce you shang jiao 
jia zhuang zhe yang san geng gai che xiang yong tu jiang bei fa 
zhen dui bu fen jia shi ren jia shi zai che liang shang jia zhuang she deng 
zhe yang san deng ying xiang jiao tong an quan de xing wei 
zeng jia yi xiang 
zai che liang shang jia zhuang she deng 
zhe yang san deng ying xiang jiao tong an quan de she bei 
bing zai hou mian zeng jia le chu fa gui ding 
qing wei wei fa ke mian fa 
qing wei wei fa ji dong che jia shi ren 
wei fan dao lu jiao tong an quan fa lv fa gui de xing ren 
dang shi ren zhu dong yao qiu 
huo yuan yi jin hang dao lu jiao tong an quan zhi yuan fu wu 
xie zhu jiao jing wei hu dao lu jiao tong zhi xu 
xuan chuan dao lu jiao tong an quan fa lv fa gui de 
ke mian yu fa kuan chu fa 
ji zhe liu tian tian 
xin nian yi shi 
ren min wang an hui pin dao ji zhe cong an hui sheng ying gai zeng shi dian ban gong shi huo de hao xiao xi 
he fei shi you zheng ju kai chu an hui sheng tie lu yun shu ye he you zheng ye ying gai zeng di yi zhang zeng zhi shui zhuan yong fa piao 
biao zhi zhe an hui sheng tie lu yun shu he you zheng ye ying gai zeng shi dian cheng gong shang xian yun xing 
yuan man shi xian le shui zhi zhuan huan 
jing guo wu yuan pi zhun 
zai quan guo fan wei yuan lai 
shi dian hang ye 
ji jiao tong yun shu ye 
wei yan fa he ji shu 
xin xi ji shu 
wen hua chuang yi 
wu liu fu zhu 
you xing dong chan zu lin 
jian zheng zi xun 
guang bo ying shi fu wu 
kai zhan tie lu yun shu he you zheng ye ying gai zeng shi dian 
tie lu yun shu fu wu shi zhi tong guo tie lu yun song huo wu huo zhe lv ke de yun shu ye wu huo dong 
you zheng ye shi zhi zhong guo you zheng ji tuan gong si ji qi suo shu you zheng qi ye ti gong you jian ji di 
you zheng hui dui 
ji yao tong xin he you zheng dai li deng you zheng ji ben fu wu de ye wu huo dong 
bao kuo you zheng pu bian fu wu 
you zheng te shu fu wu he qi ta you zheng fu wu 
zai shui lv she zhi shang 
qu fen wei yi ban na shui ren he xiao gui mo na shui ren 
dui yu xiao gui mo na shui ren 
de zeng zhi shui shui lv shi xing di kou na shui 
ci ci tie lu yun shu ye na ru ying gai zeng 
biao zhi zhe zheng ge jiao tong yun shu ye quan mian shi xian le ying gai zeng 
shi xian le yun shu ye shui zhi shang de tong yi 
zhe bu jin shi jiao tong yun shu ye qi ye nei bu zeng zhi shui lian tiao da tong 
er qie yin wei guo min jing ji de ge ge hang ye jun she ji dao yun shu 
tong guo jiao tong yun shu ye ying gai zeng da tong le zheng ge guo min jing ji ge hang ge ye de zeng zhi shui di kou lian tiao 
wei que bao an hui sheng tie lu yun shu he you zheng ye shi dian na shui ren shun li shi shi xin jiu shui zhi zhuan huan 
sheng ying gai zeng shi dian ban gong shi xiang guan cheng yuan dan wei 
mi qie pei he 
xie tong zuo zhan 
an hui sheng cai zheng ting ji ji qian tou dui an hui sheng tie lu yun shu he you zheng ye na ru ying gai zeng shi dian qing kuang de diao yan 
ce suan xiang guan shu ju 
zu zhi xiang guan ye wu xuan chuan he pei xun 
an hui sheng di shui ju zai ren zhen yan jiu shi dian hang ye fan wei 
dui shi dian hang ye she ji de xiang guan qi ye qing kuang jin xing quan mian diao cha mo di de ji chu shang 
guo shui bu men zai jie shou di shui bu men yi jiao shu ju hou dui shi dian na shui ren jin xing jie ding he que ren 
bing wan cheng le dui zheng guan xi tong de tiao zheng he wan shan yi ji fa piao fa shou zhun bei gong zuo 
guo shui bu men dui xin shi dian hang ye yi ban na shui ren ji xu shi xing 
bao bao ze ren zhi 
bang zhu qi ye zuo hao fang wei shui kong kai piao xi tong de pei xun 
tiao shi gong zuo 
an hui sheng zhu fang he cheng xiang jian she ting ting zhang li ming 
can yu dao jian shen zou huo dong 
ci ci huo dong zhi zai chang dao he tui guang di tan lv se chu xing de jian kang huan bao li nian 
tong shi ye rang guang da shi min qin shen gan shou lv dao jian she de feng shuo cheng guo 
xing jin zai jian shen zou tu zhong de an hui sheng zhu jian xi tong zhi gong 
shu ju xian shi 
chao e wan cheng nian chu que ding de mu biao ren wu 
gen ju ji hua 
ji xu chuang zao yi ju yi ye yi you de ren ju huan jing 
shi zhi yu ren wei kai fa de jing guan xiang jiao cha de yi zhong zi ran zou lang 
bao kuo jiao ye lv dao 
cheng shi lv dao 
she qu lv dao deng yi lv hua wei te zheng de ge zhong man xing jiao tong xi tong 
an hui sheng shi shi lv dao jian she 
shi jian chi fa zhan lv se cheng shi 
mei hao xiang cun yi ji mei hao an hui de zhong yao ju cuo 
wang rui hua wu xiao 
huan chao hu lv dao shi fan duan yan tu feng guang 
ji zhe yue xiao long tong xun yuan hong shu guang yao min 
ji zhe jin tian cong an hui sheng guo tu zi yuan ting huo xi 
wei le fa hui dian xing an jian de jiao yu he jing shi zuo yong 
ren zhen kai zhan wei pian zhi fa jian cha he wu ren ji hang kong she ying jian ce 
du cu zheng gai 
dui fei dong jing ji kai fa qu deng si jian zhong da wei fa yong de an jin xing le yi di cha chu 
shou dao jiao hao xiao guo 
ju an hui sheng guo tu zi yuan ting xiang guan fu ze ren jie shao 
he fei shi yong he lu yu xi you lu jiao kou 
yi liang ce fan de zha tu che za zhong yi liang si jia che 
zhi si jia che zhong de fu qi er ren yi si yi shang 
zhang fu yi bu xing shen wang 
qi zi reng zai jiu zhi 
si zhe yin jia ban zai dan wei dai dao shen ye 
qi zi kai che qu jie zhang fu 
bu xing zai shi fa lu kou zao yu can huo 
wei yu he fei shi yong he lu yu xi you lu jiao kou fa sheng yi qi che huo 
yi liang ce fan de zha tu che za zhong yi liang si jia che 
zhi si jia che zhong de yi dui fu qi bu xing yin yang xiang ge 
jin ri shang wu 
ji zhe cong yi yuan liao jie dao 
zhang fu yi bu xing shen wang 
qi zi reng zai yi yuan jiu zhi 
si zhe yin jia ban zai dan wei dai dao shen ye 
qi zi kai che qu jie zhang fu 
bu xing zai shi fa lu kou zao yu can huo 
he yi liang zha tu che xiang zhuang 
xia qu jiao jing bu men yi dui zhe qi shi gu jie ru diao cha chu li 
ji zhe xu jia 
zheng zhou ji zhe ou yu shu ji cheng di tie xu 
shu ji dan xin chi dao tai jiu cai cheng di tie 
ji zhe qu chang rong wang han chao 
zheng zhou ji zhe cai fang ou yu shu ji cheng di tie 
de shi pin zai wang luo shang chuan bo 
shi pin shi zheng zhou dian shi tai de yi ze xin wen 
jiang de shi zheng zhou di tie ying lai de shou ge gong zuo ri 
zheng zhou dian shi tai ji zhe shang wu zai di tie cai fang shi 
ou ran yu dao le zi ji lai cheng zuo di tie de he nan sheng wei chang wei 
zheng zhou shi wei shu ji wu tian jun 
wu tian jun zai di tie zhong yu shi min jiao tan 
qing ting da jia dui di tie de yi jian 
tong shi gan xie qun zhong 
she xiao jia gu da jia 
dui zheng zhou cheng shi jian she de zhi chi 
gai ze shi pin chuan bo hou 
wang you fen fen gen tie ping lun 
you de wei ling dao gan bu 
ting min yi de ju dong jiao hao 
you de ren wei shi wei shu ji cheng zuo di tie hen zheng chang 
bu suan xin wen 
you de ze fa chu yi wen 
zen me na me qiao 
ji zhe jiu neng 
shang shu ji ne 
ren min wang ji zhe jin tian cai fang jian zheng ren 
zheng zhou shi wei gong zuo ren yuan he zheng zhou dian shi tai ji zhe jiang shu liao shi qing jing guo 
ju zheng zhou shi wei gong zuo ren yuan jie shao 
xin nian cha hua hui zai wei yu zheng dong xin qu de zheng zhou guo ji hui zhan zhong xin ju xing 
ru guo yao cheng che gan wang wei yu zheng zhou xi bu de dang wai ren shi zuo tan hui 
yin wei yao qing ting dang wai ren shi yi jian jian yi 
wu tian jun dan xin lu shang dan wu shi jian tai jiu 
jue ding cheng zuo gang gang kai tong de zheng zhou shou tiao di tie 
shun bian ti yan yi xia yun xing qing kuang 
ting yi xia shi min de yi jian 
cong hui zhan zhong xin zhan zuo shang di tie hou 
ta yu duo wei shi min jiao tan 
shou huo le bu shao yi jian he jian yi 
ju zheng zhou dian shi tai ji zhe xu jin jie shao 
zheng zhou di tie yi hao xian jian cheng shi yun ying 
shi zheng zhou cheng shi jiao tong shi shang de yi jian da shi 
zuo wei xin wen bu de cai jing zhan xian ji zhe 
ta zhe duan shi jian de bao dao zhong dian quan bu zai di tie shang 
di tie yi hao xian kai tong 
zheng zhou dian shi tai lian he zhong yang dian shi tai he nan ji zhe zhan 
he nan dian shi tai min sheng pin dao 
shi zheng zhou di tie kai tong hou ying lai de shou ge gong zuo ri 
di tie de ke liu qing kuang zen yang 
shang ban zu cheng che gan shou zen yang 
di tie dui di mian jiao tong de fen liu xiao guo zen yang 
xin wen bu dui di er tian de di tie bao dao jin xing le ren zhen ce hua 
jue ding pai san lu ji zhe fen tou dao di tie 
shi qu zhu gan dao cai fang 
xu jin he da dang lu xiang yong shi qi zhong de yi lu ji zhe 
cai fang bao dao di tie jiao tong qing kuang 
ta men liang ren jiu gan dao le di tie lv cheng guang chang zhan 
cong zhe li shang che 
yan lu cai fang dao hui zhan zhong xin zhan xia che 
liang wei ji zhe zai di tie yi hao xian hui zhan zhong xin zhan cai fang shi 
hu ran fa xian zai zi zhu shou piao ji qian mai piao de yi wei nan shi fei chang shu xi 
zi xi yi kan 
zheng shi shi wei shu ji wu tian jun 
liao jie hou zhi dao 
yuan lai jin tian shang wu wu tian jun shu ji zai zheng dong xin qu kai wan hui hou 
lin shi jue ding cheng zuo di tie fan hui shi wei 
wu tian jun he mi shu zai zi zhu shou piao ji qian fen bie mai le piao 
wu tian jun shuo 
ta jin tian cheng zuo di tie 
yi fang mian shi xiang ti yan yi xia di tie de fang bian kuai jie 
ling yi fang mian ta ye xiang ting yi ting shi min men dui zheng zhou di tie de jian she hai you nei xie jian yi 
chu yu zhi ye min gan 
liang wei ji zhe ren wei zhe shi yi tiao hao de xin wen su cai 
yin ci jiu xiang wu tian jun shu ji ti chu neng fou gen sui cai fang 
dang shi shu ji wan yan xie jue 
sui hou ta xia zhan tai deng shang lie che 
you yu ji zhe hai yao cai fang cheng ke 
jiu deng shang le tong yi liang che 
shang che yi hou 
kan dao you shi min ren chu le shu ji 
bing xiang shu ji ti chu le yi xie yi jian he jian yi 
shu ji hai gen cheng ke jin xing le hen hao de jiao liu 
ji zhe sui ji kai ji jin xing pai she 
dao lv cheng guang chang zhan wu tian jun xia che 
ji zhe ba sheng yu de cai fang zuo wan 
hui dao zheng zhou dian shi tai 
hui dao dan wei yi hou 
ji zhe xiang bu men fu ze ren he dang tian zhi ban bian ji hui bao le pai she dao de su cai 
da jia dou ren wei zhe shi yi tiao hen bu cuo de xin wen 
jiu rang qi bian fa le yi tiao xiao xi 
fang zai dang tian you guan di tie de xi lie bao dao gao jian zhong bo chu 
ji zhe hai liao jie dao 
zhe yi jing bu shi shi min di yi ci ou yu wu tian jun 
xiao qiao liu shui ren jia 
zai tie zi zhong shuo 
zuo tian zai zheng dong xin qu shang wu wai huan lu he ji cheng lu you da liang ji shui 
wo cou re nao pai le zhang zhao pian 
kan dao you liang ge ren zai pai shui kou chu yong shou lao shu ye za wu 
ke neng shi wei le rang xia shui dao geng jia chang tong 
da jia zi xi kan yi xia 
zhe ge chi jiao dai yan jing de zhong nian ren qi shi jiu shi zan men de zheng zhou dai shi zhang wu tian jun 
dai shi zhang shui zhong chi jiao pai lao de zhao pian yin qi le wang min guan zhu 
hai you shi min jian dao 
ou er hui zai zhou mo jian dao wu tian jun qi zi xing che zai da jie xiao xiang diao yan qun zhong gong zuo 
zheng zhou kai shi tui xing yi yi wang ge hua guan li wei zai ti de 
jian chi yi kao qun zhong tui jin gong zuo luo shi 
zhang xiao ji zhi jian she 
tu bu hui jia ying xin nian ji han jiao po xing huo jiu 
chu jiu ying xin 
yu shi jue ding tu bu cong an hui lai an zou dao nan jing de liu he 
ta mei le li qi 
ji han jiao po zai lu bian se se fa dou 
xun luo min jing kan dao le zhe yi mu 
zui zhong jiang ta an quan song dao le fu mu shen bian 
liu he fen ju cheng qiao pai chu suo min jing xun luo zhi cheng qiao jie dao gui hua cun lu kou shi 
fa xian yi ming xiao huo zuo zai lu bian se se fa dou 
xiao huo zi xing xu 
liu he xiong zhou jie dao ling yan ren 
wo zhe ye shi xiang liu ge te bie de ji nian 
mei xiang dao gao gu le zi ji 
xiao xu xiang min jing jie shao shuo 
zi ji zai an hui lai an shang ban 
yin wei yuan dan ti qian fang jia 
shi jian bi jiao chong yu 
ta jiu bu xiang zuo che hui jia le 
er shi jue ding tu bu 
suan shi yi zhong tiao zhan ba 
lai ying jie xin nian 
dan wei xia ban hou 
ta jian dan chi le dian dong xi jiu kai shi chu fa 
yin wei tian hei mi le lu 
jia zhi shou ji mei you dian le 
xiao xu zai han feng zhong se se fa dou 
yu shi dun zai lu bian yi la ji xiang pang bi han 
min jing jiang xiao xu dai hui pai chu suo 
ti gong le shui he shi wu 
he shi qing kuang hou 
you lian ye jiang ta an quan song zhi fu mu shen bian 
zhong fang wan quan you neng li 
you xin xin han wei zi ji de guo jia zhu quan 
ling tu wan zheng he min zu zun yan 
dui yu ren he tiao xin xing wei 
bi jiang yu yi jian jue ying dui 
zai dang tian de li xing ji zhe hui shang 
you ji zhe wen 
zhong fang ru he kan dai zhong ri guan xi de wei lai 
hua chun ying shuo 
qian shi bu wang 
hou shi zhi shi 
wo men wan quan you neng li 
you xin xin han wei zi ji de guo jia zhu quan 
ling tu wan zheng he min zu zun yan 
wo men yuan yu ri ben guo nei you liang zhi 
zhong you hao de ren shi yi dao 
yi shi wei jian 
mian xiang wei lai 
zai zhong ri si ge zheng zhi wen jian ji chu shang gong tong wei hu li shi zheng yi he zhong ri guan xi da ju 
tong shi dui yu ren he tiao xin xing wei 
wo men bi jiang yu yi jian jue ying dui 
guo ban ri qian yin fa 
guan yu ling dao gan bu dai tou zai gong gong chang suo jin yan you guan shi xiang de tong zhi 
ti chu ge ji ling dao gan bu bu de zai jin zhi xi yan de gong gong chang suo xi yan 
ge ji dang zheng ji guan gong wu huo dong zhong yan jin xi yan 
yao ba ge ji dang zheng ji guan jian cheng wu yan ji guan deng wu xiang yao qiu 
ji zhe ri qian zai hu nan 
zai xi yan cheng wei yi zhong 
pu bian li yi 
zheng fu ji guan jin yan shi xiao reng you dai guan cha 
chou bu chou yan zhu yao kan 
zui da de ling dao 
hu nan sheng wei jing ji gong zuo hui yi xian chang 
hu nan sheng wei shu ji xu shou sheng zhuan men ti dao le zhong yang xia fa de ling dao gan bu dai tou zai gong gong chang suo jin yan de gui ding 
yao qiu can hui de quan ti ren yuan yan ge zun shou 
zai hui yi jian xi 
ji zhe hai shi kan dao yi xie yu hui dai biao zai zou lang guo dao deng gong gong chang suo 
hai you dai biao si xia yi lun shuo 
wei shen me bu rang chou yan le 
yi wei jing chang can jia hu nan sheng zhong yao hui yi de guan yuan shuo 
guo qu zai hu nan you ge tong xing de 
ji hui chang chou bu chou yan zhu yao kan 
zui da de ling dao 
yi ba shou bu chou yan 
jiu dou qiang xing bie zhe 
yi ba shou chou yan 
xia mian de gan bu jiu gen zhe tun yun tu wu qi lai 
ji zhe zou jin hu nan mou sheng zhi ji guan de ban gong lou 
kan dao zhi you yi lou tie you 
qing wu xi yan 
zai si lou wen yin shi men kou 
di shang yi ge lan se yan di fei chang xian yan 
lou ti guai jiao chu de la ji tong shang 
yi wei gong zuo ren yuan jie shi shuo 
zhe xie yan tou ke neng shi guo lai ban shi de ren reng xia de 
ji guan gan bu guo qu hui zai zou lang 
wei sheng jian xi yan 
dan xian zai zhe zhong xian xiang bi jiao shao le 
ying gai man man lai jie 
xu yao yi ge guo cheng 
zai he nan sheng yi min ban 
yi wei gan bu biao shi 
ta fei chang yong hu guo jia chu tai ling dao gan bu gong wu huo dong zhong yan jin xi yan zheng ce 
bu guo zhe xu yao guo cheng 
bu neng zhao ji 
hen duo xi huan xi yan de ling dao yi jing yang cheng le xi guan 
hen nan yi xia jie yan 
zhe yang shen ti rong yi nei fen mi shi tiao 
yin ci ying gai man man lai jie 
xu yao yi ge guo cheng 
guo jia gong wu yuan ying gai you qi zhu zhong xing xiang 
ying gai dai tou zai hui yi shi deng gong gong chang suo jin zhi xi yan 
ru guo yan yin bi jiao da 
ke yi dao wei sheng jian 
xi yan shi deng si mi kong jian xi yan 
zai he nan sheng qi xiang ju 
ju dang ban liang zhu ren jie shao 
qi xiang ju ban gong lou wei wu yan ban gong lou 
ta men hen zao jiu zai lou ti jian 
gong gong qu yu xuan gua le jin zhi xi yan biao zhi 
kai hui shi jin zhi xi yan 
zai da ting yu lou dao nei 
ji zhe mei you fa xian yan tou 
ye mei you kan dao you ling dao gan bu xi yan di qing kuang 
shi zai ao bu zhu le 
wo qu ce suo chou ba 
ji zhe lai dao hang zhou mou si xing ji fan dian 
nian mo you duo ge sheng shi bu men hui yi zai zhe li zhao kai 
zai qi zhong yi ceng hui yi zhong xin 
ji zhe kan dao 
kai hui zhong jian bu shi you ren cong hui yi shi zou dao guo dao huo zhe da ting zhong chou yan 
you de du zi chou yan 
you de san san liang liang bian liao bian chou 
jian dao ji zhe cai fang 
qi zhong yi wei zheng zai chou yan de mou gan bu hen jing ya 
wo hai bu zhi dao zhe ge gui ding 
bu hao yi si 
yi hou bu chou le 
shuo zhe ta xi mie le xiang yan 
ji mang zou hui hui yi shi 
ling yi wei chou yan de gan bu ye xian de bu hao yi si 
shi zai ao bu zhu le 
wo qu ce suo chou ba 
ce suo ye ke neng suan gong gong chang suo 
mei zai zhi sheng 
zhe jiang yi wei xian ji xuan chuan bu fu bu zhang shuo 
ta shi bei dong xi yan zhe 
gan bu zhi jian dou jiang mian zi 
you qi shi ling dao xi yan 
ni bu xi jiu bu tai hao kan 
zhe ci zhong yang de jin yan ling you wang 
xiang ta zhe yang de ren 
qing yuan shi qing cheng qu huan bao ju ju zhang chen bai he 
shi pin jie tu 
ri qian bei shi ming ju bao she xian le suo qi ye 
fen fen zhong ke yi gao kua yi jian chang 
de qing cheng qu huan bao ju ju zhang chen bai he yi bei mian qu qing cheng qu qu wei wei yuan 
qu huan bao ju dang zu shu ji 
ju zhang deng zhi wu bing li an diao cha 
ju bao chen bai he de lu yin 
nei rong shu shi 
you qing yuan shi min xiang gai shi qing cheng qu ji wei shi ming ju bao chen bai he wei ji 
bing ti gong yi duan dian hua lu yin 
cheng chen bai he xiang qi ta ren jiang shou ru he li yong shou zhong zhi quan lai qiao zha le suo xia qu qi ye 
ci shi jing mei ti bao dao hou shou dao wang luo he she hui guan zhu 
you qi shi lu yin zhong 
fen fen zhong ke yi gao kua yi jian chang 
de shuo fa yin fa re yi 
chen bai he jie shou guang dong bu fen mei ti cai fang shi cheng 
dui ci shi li an diao cha 
bing yao qing xiang guan bu men tong guo ji shu shou duan dui lu yin de zhen shi xing jin xing jian ding 
qing cheng qu zheng fu men hu wang zhan zuo tian fa bu 
guan yu qing cheng qu huan bao ju ju zhang chen bai he you guan wen ti de tong bao 
cheng jing guang dong sheng gong an si fa jian ding zhong xin zhuan jia jian ding he qing cheng qu ji wei deng xiang guan bu men de diao cha qu zheng 
guan yu qun zhong shi ming ju bao chen bai he de dian hua lu yin nei rong shu shi 
chen bai he que you tan lun le yu qi shen fen bu xiang fu de yan lun 
tong shi fa xian chen bai he hai she xian qi ta wei ji wen ti 
zhe fen tong bao hai shuo 
jing qing cheng qu wei jue ding 
mian qu chen bai he de qing cheng qu qu wei wei yuan 
qu huan bao ju dang zu shu ji 
ju zhang zhi wu 
bing dui qi jin xing li an diao cha 
zhi yao ding si nei xie chang zhang 
ta men jiu hui guai guai song qian 
ju ju bao ren jie shao 
ta yin gong zuo guan xi chang yu chen bai he lian xi 
ju bao qian xie tian chen bai he que bu jie ta de dian hua 
ta yong ling yi bu shou ji da tong le chen bai he de dian hua 
dan chen bai he yi zhi mei gen ta shuo hua 
ye mei gua duan dian hua 
ju bao ren shuo 
ta cong dian hua zhong ting dao 
chen bai he shuo 
yi ta jin tian de zhi wei 
fen fen zhong ke yi gao kua yi jian chang 
chen bai he shuo 
zuo liang ci jiu ke yi shou shou 
ni kan ta gan bu gan jie fa 
ni yao ming bai yi ge dao li 
jiu suan mei you wo chen bai he zuo 
yi yang hui you chen er 
qi shi wo shen me dou bu yong zuo 
zhi yao zhao yi liang jian chang 
dao le na li da ma jiang 
jiu ke yi ding si nei xie chang zhang 
ta men jiu hui guai guai song qian gei wo le 
wei yu shun yi li sui kai fa qu de qing feng bao zi pu pei song zhong xin sheng chan che jian 
gong ren men zheng zai zhan ban hu luo bo xian liao 
xin jing bao ji zhe yin ya fei she 
xi jin ping zong shu ji zou jin qing feng bao zi pu yue tan dian yong can shi 
dian zhang he yuan li yong shou ji xiang ta zhan shi le yi zu qing feng bao zi pu pei song zhong xin sheng chan de zhao pian 
rang ren men dui zhe ge 
bao zi da hou chu 
ye chan sheng le xing qu 
qing feng bao zi jiu jing shi zen me sheng chan chu lai de ne 
wei yu shun yi li sui kai fa qu de qing feng bao zi pu pei song zhong xin er qi gong cheng xiang mei ti kai fang 
jie mi lao zi hao bao zi mu hou de 
gao xin ji shu 
can guan ren yuan yao xiang jin sheng chan che jian 
shao bu liao yi xie 
xian yao dai shang mao zi 
chuan shang gong zuo fu tao shang xie tao 
ran hou xi shou 
jiu jing pen sa 
shuang jiao ta ru xiao du chi 
fang neng tong xing 
cai gou lai de xiang gu 
da cong deng yuan cai liao 
zai gong zuo ren yuan cha yan jian yi zheng ming 
che liang xiao du zheng ming 
song huo che xiang wen du hou 
zai jin xing xian rou shui fen 
shu cai nong can 
you zhi shi fou wei di gou you deng yi xi lie jian ce 
dao yuan cai liao xuan liao qu 
mu er deng gan cai yao guo yi bian zhen dong shai 
ba li mian ke neng jia za de yi wu 
ru xiao shi zi 
xi ma sheng guo lv diao 
pei song zhong xin ren yuan shuo 
ling yi fang jian li 
liang wei gong ren ze dai zhuo shou tao dui yi dui xian rou 
tiao rou mo gu 
ti chu rou li mian xi xiao de gu tou 
xiang gu zhi xian qian 
shai xuan hao de yuan cai liao sui ji bei song dao tao xi qu 
liang tiao bei gong ren men cheng wei 
hang kong mu jian 
de tao xi xian zhuan men yong lai qing xi gan cai 
ji bai jin de xiang gu yi zai 
hang kong mu jian 
de da chi zi li jin pao le liu qi ge xiao shi 
zhi hou jin ru qing shui chi 
jin xing ban ge xiao shi che di 
ran hou you gong ren shou gong qu gen 
ji qi tuo shui 
jiao ban zhi xian 
bie kan shi chuan tong de bao zi 
li mian you bu shao xin ji shu han liang 
gong zuo ren yuan gao su ji zhe 
gu sheng chan xian 
cai xin sheng chan xian 
su leng ji zu 
quan zi dong chao guo 
dou shi chang jia gen ju qing feng bao zi pu zi xing hui zhi de tu zhi yan zhi de 
ju you zi zhu zhi shi chan quan 
er zheng ge sheng chan liu cheng yi kao yi tao zhuan men de dian zi shang wu xin xi ping tai jin xing guan kong 
dian li xia duo shao liang de ding dan 
xi tong jiu hui zhi jie zhuan hua bing xia fa sheng chan ren wu dan 
yuan cai liao dan 
qing feng chang wu fu zong xu lin shuo 
you yu yong you duo xiang zhuan li ji shu 
qing feng zhe yang yi jia lao zi hao hai zai jin nian tou yi ci bei bei jing shi ke wei ren ding wei 
gao xin ji shu qi ye 
pei song qian yao jin xing guang jian ce 
zhe er hai you guang ji 
bai fang zai guan zhuang jian ce qu de yi tai 
guang yi wu jian ce yi 
yin qi le da jia zhu yi 
zhe shi xian liao chu chang qian de zui hou yi dao jian ce gong xu 
jing guo le chu qi shai xuan 
ren gong shai cha hou 
jia gong hao de bao zi xian liao zai zhuang dai hou 
hai yao xiang guo di tie an jian yi yang 
guang yi wu jian ce 
gong zuo ren yuan shuo 
zhe tai jian ce yi ke yi 
bi huang mi li hai yao xiao de ke li wu 
bi ru bo li 
xiao shi zi deng 
yi dan fa xian yi wu 
yi qi jiu hui 
an zhao gui ding 
qing feng bao zi pu jia gong de xian liao yao qiu dang ri sheng chan dang ri song da 
leng lian pei song 
quan cheng jian kong 
suo you xian rou dang ri jin huo 
zuo dao ling ku cun 
jiu lian song huo che ye quan bu pei bei wen du jian kong xi tong 
wei xing ding wei 
zhong xin ke ji shi liao jie mei yi liang che de zhuang tai ji di li wei zhi 
fang zhi tu fa zhuang kuang 
qing feng bao zi bing wei tui 
zhu xi tao can 
er liang cong rou xian bao zi 
yi fen chao gan 
yi fen jie cai 
xi jin ping zong shu ji zai qing feng bao zi pu yue tan dian dian le zhe xie shi wu 
zhu xi tao can 
wo men cong lai mei you pai guo hao 
xian zai shi tou yi ci 
yue tan dian gong zuo ren yuan shuo 
you qi shi zhong wu shi hou 
er qie da duo shu xiao fei zhe dian ming jiu yao 
zhu rou da cong bao zi 
dian li fu ze ren ming que biao shi 
zhu xi tao can 
dou shi gu ke men zi ji zhe me cheng hu de 
qing feng bao zi pu mei you ji hua yao zhuan men tui chu 
zhu xi tao can 
yue tan dian xian zai mei tian cong rou xian xiao liang bi yi wang fan fan 
dan dian ying ye e chuang xia li shi zui gao 
qing feng zhong xin chang wu fu zong jing li xu lin gao su ji zhe 
wei bao zheng gong ying 
zhe ji tian lian pei song zhong xin de gong ren ye dou ti qian shang ban bei zhan 
fu tai lv you shi fa bing 
ji bing guan zhi shu fu shu zhang 
zhou zhi hao jin tian biao shi 
lao weng yan zhong fei yan dan bing qing wen ding 
zai jia hu bing fang zhi liao 
liu xing yi qing zhi hui zhong xin 
dou shi zai da lu gan ran 
zhou zhi hao shuo 
lao weng yin bing fa fei yan yi zai xiang guan yi yuan de jia hu yuan fang cha guan zhi liao 
jin tian mei you jie huo xiang guan yi yuan tong zhi bing qing bian hua de xun xi 
yin ci lao weng bing qing sui ran yan zhong 
dan hai suan wen ding 
zhe ming lao weng lai tai huan dao 
zhi you huan zhe de liang ming nv er liu zai tai wan zhao liao bing huan 
tai wan ling dui 
si ji yi ji yi hu ren yuan 
mu qian jun wu zheng zhuang 
chu zu che jia shi yuan qin xian sheng hou hui wu nai 
min jing xian chang xie tiao 
qian ri ling chen 
di ge qin shi fu wei le zheng wai kuai 
da ying ti he le jiu de cheng ke zhou xian sheng dai jia bao ma 
bao ma kai chu shi ji mi xi huo da bu ran le 
shuang fang zheng chao bu xiu 
zhao lai min jing tiao jie 
chong qing wan bao ji zhe liao jie dao 
dao zhi bao ma fa dong ji bao si 
zhe bi qian gai shei chu 
cheng ke qing di ge dai jia 
di ge qin shi fu kai zhe che zai sha ping ba qu lan ye wu 
jin sha gang wan xiao qu 
yi ming nan zi lan xia che 
da che hui jiu long po qu 
qin shi fu wen dao cheng ke shen shang you jiu wei 
liang ren bian zou bian liao 
cheng ke zi cheng xing zhou 
shuo shi kai bao ma dao jin sha gang wan xiao qu fu jin chi fan 
che ting zai xiao qu che ku 
zhun bei di er tian zai dao sha ping ba qu qu che 
tan zhe tan zhe 
zhou xian sheng ti yi 
wen qin shi fu shi fou yuan yi dai jia 
jiang bao ma kai hui jia 
qin shi fu yi ting neng duo zheng dian qian 
kao lv yi xia jiu tong yi le 
shuang fang tan tuo 
qin shi fu kai che zai zhe zhou xian sheng fan hui jin sha gang wan xiao qu 
liang ren jin ru xiao qu che ku 
ta na chu che yao shi 
jiang che men da kai hou 
zai jiao gei qin shi fu 
zhou xian sheng zuo shang fu jia shi wei 
qin shi fu zuo shang jia shi wei 
ta hen shao kai zi dong dang che 
kai zi dong dang bao ma geng shi tou yi hui 
bao ma zai da bu ran le 
an zhao zhou xian sheng de zhi dian 
qin shi fu da ran fa dong ji 
huan huan shi chu ting che wei shi ji mi yuan 
you yu qin shi fu mei xi an quan dai 
bao jing sheng xiang qi 
qin shi fu lian mang shen shou zhao an quan dai 
shi hou qin shi fu shuo 
ke neng shi you dian jin zhang 
ta zai xi an quan dai shi jiao ke neng cai dao na li 
ling wai yi zhi shou ye bu zhi dao peng le nei ge an jian 
bao ma dou dong liang xia 
qin shi fu ji hao an quan dai 
zai ci fa dong que da bu ran le 
zhou xian sheng jian zhuang 
ye lai shi le shi 
yi zhen zi zi sheng yin guo hou 
fa dong ji zai ye bu gong zuo le 
qin shi fu huang le shen 
di yi ci kai gao dang che jiu chu cuo 
bu zhi ru he shi hao 
zhou xian sheng ye hen sheng qi 
che zen me nong le liang xia jiu da bu ran le 
shuang fang zai che ku li zheng chao 
che ting zai dao shang 
hen kuai yin lai bao an 
bao an ye mei ban fa 
yu bei lu pai chu suo min jing xu wei he tong shi yi qi lai dao xian chang 
dui ting zai che dao shang de bao ma ye wu neng wei li 
wei le bu rang che ku du che 
min jing zhao lai tuo che 
ji xu dao pai chu suo xie shang 
yuan lai fa dong ji bao si 
jing guo min jing xie tiao 
qin shi fu jiang jia shi zheng he xing shi zheng di ya dao zhou xian sheng shou li 
deng bao ma xiu hao 
qin shi fu fu wan xiu che fei 
zhou xian sheng zai jiang zheng jian hai ta 
qian ri shang wu 
wei xiu ren yuan cheng 
jing jian cha ke neng shi cao zuo bu dang zao cheng fa dong ji bao si 
xu yao jie suo 
zhe jiu chan sheng yi xie fu cai fei yong 
che zhu yao xian dian fu 
xiu li dian cai da kai suo 
zhou xian sheng shuo 
ru guo jian cha chu fa dong ji huai le 
hai yao geng duo qian 
qin shi fu bei xia zhu le 
biao shi hai yao xie tiao 
liang ren mei da cheng xie yi 
qin shi fu lai dao yu bei lu pai chu suo zhao dao xu wei 
xi wang min jing chu mian jiang zi ji de xing shi zheng he jia shi zheng yao hui lai 
xian shang ban zai tan xiu li fei 
min jing biao shi 
ci shi shu yu min shi jiu fen 
jing fang zhi neng xie tiao 
ru guo reng ran bu neng da cheng xie yi 
zhi neng dao fa yuan jie jue le 
zhou xian sheng cheng 
bao ma yi zhi fang zai wei xiu dian 
deng dai qin xian sheng jiao qian 
wo ye bu e ta 
xiu hao duo jiu gei hao duo 
qin xian sheng jue de bie qu 
jiu kai le ji bu 
mei xiang dao che huai le 
dao di gai bu gai wo fu ze 
dai jia xu fu da bu fen ze ren 
chong qing wan bao ji zhe jiu ci zi xun le luo shu lv shi shi wu suo lv shi duan qin 
duan qin biao shi 
shuang fang shi qian da cheng kou tou xie yi 
bu guan dui fang shi fou he jiu 
chu le bing li xing zui jiu wai 
jing shen bing fan wei 
dou ju you min shi xing wei neng li he min shi quan li de neng li 
yi dan xing cheng dai jia he tong 
dai jia zhe jiu cheng dan cong kai che dao ting che zhe qi jian bao zheng che nei ren 
cai wu he di san fang an quan de ze ren 
ji shi chu le jiao tong shi gu 
ye you dai jia zhe cheng dan 
che zhu ying dang jiang che liang qing kuang jiao dai qing chu 
bi mian bu bi yao qing kuang fa sheng 
ru guo bu shi bao ma zi shen you mao bing 
qin shi fu xu cheng dan da bu fen ze ren 
che zhu cheng dan xiao bu fen ze ren 
zui hao zhao zheng gui dai jia si ji 
chong qing wan bao ji zhe cai fang le chong qing dai jia lian meng fa yan ren wang li 
dai jia si ji bu fen shi zhuan zhi jia shi yuan 
bu fen shi ye yu shi jian jian zhi 
wei bao zheng gu ke an quan 
dai jia si ji jun wu fan zui qian ke 
dui zi dong dang he shou dong dang de che dou yao shu lian jia shi 
dui ge zhong che ju you yi ding liao jie 
dui yu dai jia ji gou zhao pin de jia shi yuan 
shi min zui hao zhao you zi zhi di dai jia gong si 
yi shi zi shen you bao zhang 
er shi chu liao shi qing you zhang ke xun 
ming ci jie shi 
chong qing wan bao ji zhe cong zhu cheng yi xie shou che chu he qi che xiu li dian liao jie dao 
bi jiao gao dang de che ju you fang dao deng gong neng 
ruo you bu dang cao zuo 
fang xiang pan huo zhe lun tai hui zi dong bao si 
you de xu yao mi ma suo da kai 
you de xu yao tuo dao xiu li chang jie kai 
geng you de shen zhi yao fan hui yuan chang chong xin jie mi he she zhi mi ma 
ye you che liang yin zi shen wen ti yin qi bao si qing kuang 
ji zhe yang fan zhu juan 
wei qiang hua jing shi zhen she he jiao yu zuo yong 
zhong yang ji wei jia da dui wei fan zhong yang ba xiang gui ding jing shen dian xing wen ti de tong bao bao guang li du 
zai zhong yang ji wei jian cha bu wang zhan zhuan men kai she 
jie zhi mu qian 
shi ming tong bao yi cheng qu shi 
zhong yang ji wei jian cha bu wang zhan you dui 
lan mu jin xing le ye mian gai ban 
jiang zhong yang ji wei 
yi ji xin jiang sheng chan jian she bing tuan 
zhong yang he guo jia ji guan ge bu wei ji jian zu 
bao kuo guo you qi shi ye dan wei 
guo you jin rong ji gou 
de tong bao fen lei xian shi 
wang min zhi yao dian ji xiang guan fen lei mu lu 
jiu ke yi cha kan gai fen lei tiao mu xia de tong bao qing kuang 
shi fen bian jie 
lan mu hai zai xian zhu wei zhi she zhi le 
huan ying ju bao 
huan ying guang da wang min ji xu ju bao ge lei wei fan zhong yang ba xiang gui ding jing shen yi ji 
fang mian de wen ti 
guo wu yuan di san ci quan guo jing ji pu cha ling dao xiao zu fu zu zhang 
guo jia tong ji ju ju zhang ma jian tang shuo 
zhe ci jing ji pu cha shi he ping shi qi zui da de she hui dong yuan huo dong zhi yi 
tong shi you shi xin xi hua cheng du zui gao de yi ci jing ji pu cha 
zhe ci pu cha cai yong quan guo tong yi de dian zi di tu hua fen pu cha xiao qu 
yong shou chi dian zi zhong duan she bei 
dui qi ye jin xing kong jian ding wei 
dui gong shang deng ji 
shui wu deng ji 
zu zhi ji gou dai ma deng xiang guan zheng zhao jin xing pai she liu di 
tong shi lu ru xiang guan pu cha shu ju 
tong guo zhe ci pu cha 
bu jin ke yi mo qing quan guo di er 
san chan ye de jia di 
er qie ke yi you ci xing cheng quan guo tong yi de kong jian di li xin xi xi tong 
jing ji pu cha li guo li min li da jia 
pu cha cheng gong hai yao kao da jia 
xi wang guang da pu cha dui xiang neng gou yi zhao tong ji fa he jing ji pu cha tiao li de yao qiu 
ru shi tian bao pu cha shu ju 
suo you pu cha ji gou he pu cha ren yuan dou you yi wu wei pu cha dui xiang bao mi 
pu cha shu ju bu zuo wei ren he chu fa de yi ju 
ma jian tang hu yu bei diao cha dui xiang li jie 
zhi chi pu cha yuan de gong zuo 
ta hai qiang diao yao que bao jing ji pu cha shu ju zhi liang 
yan su cha chu nong xu zuo jia xing wei bing gong kai bao guang 
ji zhe cong guo jia tong ji ju liao jie dao 
di san ci quan guo jing ji pu cha gong zuo ren yuan ru hu deng ji shi 
hui pei dai tong yi de pu cha yuan zheng huo pu cha zhi dao yuan zheng 
shang mian you gong zuo ren yuan xing ming he pu cha ji gou gong zhang 
pu cha zhu yao nei rong bao kuo dan wei ji ben shu xing 
cong ye ren yuan 
cai wu zhuang kuang 
sheng chan jing ying qing kuang 
sheng chan neng li 
yuan cai liao he neng yuan ji zhu yao zi yuan xiao hao 
ke ji huo dong qing kuang deng 
ji zhe liu zheng 
huan bao bu zuo tian shang wu tong bao 
kong qi zhi liang xin biao zhun di er jie duan jian ce shi shi ren wu yuan man wan cheng 
kong qi zhi liang zhi shu deng xin xi 
fu gai quan guo zhi xia shi 
sheng hui cheng shi 
ji hua dan lie shi 
huan bao zhong dian cheng shi he huan bao mo fan cheng shi 
gen ju bu shu 
bing shi shi fa bu jian ce jie guo 
huan bao bu jian ce si si zhang luo yi jie shao 
huan jing kong qi zhi liang biao zhun 
huan bao bu wan cheng bao kuo bei jing 
zhe xie jian ce dian wei ying dui guo nei bu fen cheng shi chu xian de hui mai 
fa hui le zhong yao zuo yong 
ye jiu shi yao lie ru kao he le 
luo yi jie shao 
wei zuo hao di er kong qi zhi liang xin biao zhun jian ce shi shi gong zuo 
ti gao le kong qi jian ce shu ju zhi liang 
xin quan guo kong qi zhi liang ping tai shou ji ke hu duan jin tian shang xian 
xin de quan guo kong qi zhi liang ping tai jin tian zheng shi shang xian 
gong gong zhong cha xun 
xin de shou ji ke hu duan ye jiang tong shi shang xian 
zhong guo huan jing jian ce zong zhan gong zuo ren yuan jie shao 
gong zhong ke tong guo huan bao bu huo zhe zhong guo huan jing jian ce zong zhan de guan wang deng lu gai ping tai 
ji zhe zhu yi dao 
hai neng kan dao guo qu jian ce zhan dian liang zhou de wu ran wu bian hua qing kuang 
jin tian shang xian de shou ji ke hu duan 
quan guo kong qi zhi liang 
shou ye xian shi zheng ge cheng shi kong qi zhi liang xiang xi xin xi 
hai neng cha kan quan guo kong qi zhi liang de cheng shi pai ming 
gai ruan jian yi neng zai zhong guo huan jing jian ce zong zhan 
bai du shou ji zhu shou deng wang zhan xia zai 
luo yi biao shi 
ping tai shang xian shi de shu ju xin xi you fen bu zai quan guo ge de de jian ce zhan dian shi shi cai ji 
ran hou zhi jie chuan shu dao ping tai de shu ju ku 
xin ping tai gai jin le ke li wu kong qi zhi liang zhi shu de ji suan fang shi 
geng jie jin min zhong de shi ji gan shou 
bei jing wan bao 
guo jia zhu xi xi jin ping zai ban gong shi fa biao er ling yi si nian xin nian he ci 
xin hua she ji zhe lan hong guang she 
guo jia zhu xi xi jin ping fa biao xin nian he ci 
qi ban gong shi ye shou du bao guang 
tou guo yang shi jing tou ke yi kan dao 
xi jin ping ban gong shi bei jing shi yi fu chang cheng hua zuo 
ban gong zhuo shang you san bu dian hua 
er hong yi bai 
shen hou shu jia shang bai fang le si fu zhao pian 
ta yu jia ren tui zhe lun yi shang de fu qin 
ta qian mu qin de shou san bu 
ta yu fu ren he ying 
ta qi zhe zi xing che zai zhe nv er 
you ce shu jia shang you liang zhang tu pian 
ke yi pan ming yi zhang ta ti zu qiu de zhao pian 
xi jin ping zong shu ji ban gong shi shou du bao guang
