rang wo men cong zhong kan dao le shen me 
xi jin ping zong shu ji ceng yong jiu yi pin cheng ru zi bu liao 
nan jing shi wei shi fu da yuan jin xiang gong zhong kai fang shi wei shu ji qin ying shi min 
bei jing tian an men guang chang ju xing yuan dan sheng qi yi shi liang wan yu ming qun zhong guan kan 
bei jing qing feng bao zi fou ren tui 
zhu xi tao can 
: shi gu ke zi ji cheng hu de 
li du huo jiang sheng ji 
guang dong qing yuan yi huan bao ju zhang bei mian ceng sheng cheng fen fen zhong gao kua yi jian chang 
ben wang nian zhong pan dian 
jin ri guan zhu   ling dao gan bu dai tou jin yan 
ling dao gan bu yao li e xi yan lou xi he 
yan cao fu bai 
zhong gong zhong yang ban gong ting 
guo wu yuan ban gong ting jin ri yin fa le 
guan yu ling dao gan bu dai tou zai gong gong chang suo jin yan you guan shi xiang de tong zhi 
yi qian suo wei you de li du 
dui ling dao gan bu bu neng zai gong gong chang suo xi yan 
ying quan zu ta ren xi yan deng ti chu yao qiu he gui fan 
zai zhong yang fan fu chang lian 
kuang zheng feng qi ju cuo mi ji chu tai di dang xia 
ling dao gan bu dai tou jin yan 
bu jin shi wo guo gong gong chang suo kong yan jin cheng zhong de you li xin hao 
geng shi gai jin gan bu gong zuo zuo feng 
fa yang min zhu zuo feng 
fang fan tan fu lang fei de ju ti xi jie 
zai cai fang zhong 
ye nei zhuan jia he guang da gan bu qun zhong fen fen biao shi 
qi dai jiang ling dao gan bu gong gong chang suo jin yan de yao qiu zuo shi zai 
che di e zhi lou xi 
bao zhang gong gong jian kang 
ti sheng she hui wen ming he dang zheng gan bu xing xiang 
ling dao gan bu yao zuo 
jin yan mo fan 
wo guo shi shi jie shang zui da de yan cao sheng chan guo 
xiao fei guo he shou hai guo 
wo guo qian shu le 
yan cao kong zhi kuang jia gong yue 
duo ge sheng shi kai zhan gong gong chang suo kong yan di fang li fa 
bing zai zhi fa ji zhi shang zuo chu tan suo 
yan cao liu xing shui ping reng ran ju gao bu xia 
yan zhong sun hai gong zhong jian kang 
guan yu ling dao gan bu dai tou zai gong gong chang suo jin yan you guan shi xiang de tong zhi 
zheng shi fa bu 
yao qiu ge ji ling dao gan bu mo fan zun shou gong gong chang suo jin yan gui ding 
ji shi quan zu he zhi zhi ta ren wei gui zai gong gong chang suo xi yan 
yao ba ge ji dang zheng ji guan jian cheng wu yan ji guan 
zuo wei duo nian cong shi kong yan gong zuo de wei sheng gong zuo zhe 
wo fei chang zhen fen 
zhong guo ji kong zhong xin yan jiu yuan wu yi qun biao shi 
tong zhi gui ding de jin yan chang he fu gai le yi ban gong gong chang suo 
gong gong ban gong chang suo 
gong wu huo dong deng 
yi wei zhe ling dao gan bu zai gong zuo 
sheng huo shang dou yao zuo biao shuai 
bing zhu dong jie shou jian du 
wu tiao gui ding tiao tiao ju ti you li 
ti xian le zhong yang kong yan de jue xin 
ye nei ren shi tan yan 
wo guo gong gong chang suo jin yan nan 
mou zhong cheng du shang jiang 
yi xie ling dao gan bu fu you ze ren 
xi yan bei shi zuo bu ju xiao jie de ge ren xi guan 
ling dao feng fan 
de yi zhong ti xian 
jian mian han xuan xiang yan 
da hui xiao hui yan wu liao rao 
ji guan kong yan cheng nan dian 
bing que shao jian du 
han jian chu fa 
zai shang hai nai zhi quan guo kong yan de jin cheng zhong 
ling dao gan bu dou shi guan jian 
shang hai shi ai wei ban zhu ren li zhong yang shuo 
zhi yao ling dao gan bu dai tou 
jiu neng dai dong zhou bian de ren 
zhi yao ling dao gan bu zhong shi 
wu yan ji guan jian she nai zhi quan she hui de kong yan gong zuo jiu neng shun li tui jin 
fan zhi yi ran 
zhong guo de kong yan gong zuo 
yi zhi zao yu guan nian 
li yi deng fang mian de chong chong zu li 
zhong yang de tong zhi 
jiang shi wo guo kong yan lv yue jin cheng zhong de zhong yao tui dong 
cong xi wei chu zhua zuo feng wen ti 
ling dao gan bu yi shen zuo ze zai gong gong chang suo jin yan 
jiang you li chang dao wen ming sheng huo fang shi 
cu jin gong zhong jian kang 
tong zhi hai yao qiu ge ji dang zheng ji guan gong wu huo dong zhong yan jin xi yan 
yi xie di fang he bu men gong kuan xiao fei yan cao 
shen zhi fa hong tou wen jian 
tui xiao tan pai juan yan 
xiao fei gao jia juan yan 
quan li xiao fei 
bai huai dang feng zheng feng 
zhu zhang she mi zhi feng 
zeng da xing zheng cheng ben 
yan zhong ying xiang le dang he zheng fu zai ren min qun zhong zhong de xing xiang 
zhong guo kong yan xie hui chang wu fu hui zhang xu gui hua biao shi 
tong zhi yao qiu gong wu huo dong can jia ren yuan bu de xi yan 
yan jin shi yong huo bian xiang shi yong gong kuan zhi fu yan cao xiao fei kai zhi 
jiang hui ji da e zhi gong kuan xiao fei yan cao zhi pin deng fu bai xian xiang 
hua dong shi fan da xue she hui xue yan jiu suo suo zhang wen jun ren wei 
gong wu huo dong zhong de yan jiu bu shao shi gong kuan xiao fei 
er qie hai yao li qiu gao dang 
fou ze si hu jiu you 
bu jing zhi xian 
ling dao gan bu 
hao zhe yi kou 
yi xie zuan ying de ren wang wang hui tou qi suo hao 
jiu hui da kai tan fu de zha men 
zi wo peng zhang 
shen zhi luan shen shou 
dui ling dao gan bu lai shuo 
xing deng zuo feng zhi shi yang yang bu ke qing shi 
rang qun zhong shen wu tong jue 
shi fang zhi xiao bing yang cheng da huan de bi yao zhi ju 
cong xi jie shang guan zhu ling dao gan bu de zuo feng ji bi 
zhuan jia men biao shi 
cong xi wei chu zhua ling dao gan bu zuo feng wen ti 
ti xian chu le yi zhong 
zhong yang lian xu chu tai 
dang zheng ji guan li xing jie yue fan dui lang fei tiao li 
dang zheng ji guan guo nei gong wu jie dai guan li gui ding 
guan yu jin yi bu zuo hao ling dao gan bu bao gao ge ren you guan shi xiang gong zuo de tong zhi 
guan yu dang yuan gan bu dai tou tui dong bin zang gai ge de yi jian 
deng duo xiang gui ding 
zhua shi le gai jin zuo feng de 
shang hai shi zheng zhi xue hui fu hui zhang 
fu dan da xue jiao shou pu xing zu ren wei 
zhong qiu jie bu fa yue bing 
bu yong gong kuan yin ji he nian ka 
jin zhi zai gong gong chang suo xi yan deng xi jie 
zheng yi zhi zhe chang qi yi lai bei qun zhong 
kan dao yan li 
ma zai zui shang 
zhua hao zhe xie xi jie 
ju sha cheng ta 
qian yi mo hua 
neng qi dao rang dang feng 
zheng feng feng qing qi zheng de zuo yong 
ying jin yi bu ming que jian du zhu ti he cheng fa cuo shi 
gen zhi gong gong chang suo xi yan de she hui gu ji xu yao po chu zu li 
er ling dao gan bu gai jin zuo feng gui zai luo shi he zhang xiao 
bu shao dang yuan qun zhong dui ling dao gan bu neng fou jian chi dai tou jin yan 
zuo feng jian she neng fou qu de shi xiao 
reng xin you yi lv 
an hui sheng yi ming da xue sheng cun guan biao shi 
ru guo ling dao zai gong gong chang he xi yan le 
wo men kan dao yi hou gai zen me ban 
zhi jie ba yan qia le ma 
shei lai jian guan shi yao kao lv de yi ge wen ti 
he fei shi zheng fu gong wu ren yuan xiao yang ye ren wei 
ling dao gan bu dai tou kong yan shi hao shi 
dan guang you jin ling mei you ming que jian du zhu ti he cheng fa cuo shi 
kong pa nan yi sha zhu bu zheng zhi feng 
yan li jian guan bi yi luo gang ling geng you shuo fu li 
kan de jian de cheng guo ye bi xin shi dan dan de cheng nuo geng you xiao 
wen jun jian yi 
xu you yi tao ju ti ke xing de zhi du xi ze lai luo shi yan ge de cheng fa cuo shi 
rang da ma hu yan de guan yuan neng zhen zheng gan dao 
gong zhong he yu lun jian du de qu dao ye yao li bao chang tong you xiao 
ge xiang zhi du 
dian xing an li ying ding qi gong zhi yu zhong 
rang qun zhong kan dao cheng guo 
qun zhong jian du qi shi jiu shi zui hao de jin yan yao 
yi ming ji ceng gong shang suo gong wu yuan gao su ji zhe 
diao zhi fu wu da ting gong zuo yi hou 
mei tian jian de lao bai xing duo le 
bu shao ren dang mian zhi chu xi yan xing wei you sun gong zhi ren yuan xing xiang 
ling dao zhu dong jie yan 
zhu jian yi ge bu men dou mei ren xi yan le 
qian lai ban shi de qun zhong 
ye jiu mei le di yan huo xi er shou yan de dan you 
ru he fang da jin yan xing dong zhong de 
ling dao xiao ying 
wu yi qun jian yi 
deng chang he ying zao bai fen zhi bai de wu yan hui chang he wu yan dai biao wei yuan zhu di 
ding qi tong bao kong yan xian jin he wei gui shi li deng 
pu xing zu biao shi 
jia qiang zuo feng jian she 
mei you jie jing ke zou 
bi xu fa hui 
yi ge wen ti yi ge wen ti jie jue 
fa xian yi qi 
jiu bao guang yi qi 
cha chu yi qi 
quan mian shen hua gai ge shi yi chang gong jian zhan 
xu yao you liang de dang feng zheng feng lai zhi cheng 
zhi you zhua xi jie 
zheng feng bu xian shi xiao 
qiang hua di xian si wei 
qiang diao gong gong lun li 
cai neng cong gen ben shang ge chu zuo feng zhi bi 
ji zhe chou yi 
dang chuan lai guo jia zhu xi xi jin ping fa biao xin nian he ci de hua mian de shi hou 
ta ban gong shi ye bei shou du xiang wai jie bao guang 
tou guo de jing tou 
xi jin ping ban gong shi shou xian ying ru yan lian de bei jing shi yi fu chang cheng hua zuo 
ban gong zhuo shang you san bu dian hua 
er hong yi bai 
shen hou shu jia shang bai fang le liu fu zhao pian 
ta yu jia ren tui zhe lun yi shang de fu qin 
ta qian mu qin de shou san bu 
ta yu fu ren he ying 
ta qi zhe zi xing che zai zhe nv er 
you ce shu jia shang ye ke yi pan ming yi zhang ta ti zu qiu de zhao pian 
zuo wei yi ge da guo ling xiu 
xi jin ping ban gong shi de bu ju he zhuang shi 
zai yi ding cheng du ye neng fan ying chu ta de hong yuan 
pin ge he feng fu di qing gan shi jie 
da jia zhi dao 
wan li chang cheng shi gu dai zhong guo zai bu tong shi qi wei di yu sai bei you mu bu luo lian meng qin xi er xiu zhu de gui mo hao da de jun shi gong cheng 
gu jin zhong wai 
fan dao guo chang cheng de ren wu bu jing tan ta de pang bo qi shi 
hong wei gui mo 
jian ju gong cheng yu fang huan yi yi 
ru guo fang zai jin tian de bei jing xia shen shi zhe fu chang cheng hua zuo 
yi xi jin ping wei zong shu ji de dang zhong yang fa qi de xin yi lun gai ge 
bu jiu shi zai dai ling yi wan zhong guo ren min xiu zhu xin de 
wan li chang cheng 
wo xiang xi jin ping zhi suo yi xuan ze zhe fu hua zuo wei bei jing 
jiu shi zai shi shi ke ke ti xing zi ji gai ge bu ke neng yi fan feng shun 
yi cu er jiu 
bi xu jie jian he xue xi gu ren xiu zhu chang cheng de zhi hui 
yi li yi ji cheng shou li 
zheng ru xi jin ping zai he ci zhong suo shuo 
gai ge shi xu yao wo men gong tong wei zhi fen dou de wei da shi ye 
xu yao fu chu jian xin de nu li 
bang yang de li liang shi wu qiong de 
zhao pian zhong xi jin ping yu jia ren tui zhe lun yi shang de lao ren 
bu jin shi ta de fu qin 
zheng shi zhe wei lao ren zai gai ge kai fang zhi chu feng deng xiao ping zhi ming nan xia guang dong 
sha chu le yi tiao xue lu 
shi de guang dong cheng wei zhong guo gai ge kai fang de chuang kou 
zong he gai ge de shi yan qu he pai tou bing 
wei zhong guo shi xing quan mian dui wai kai fang ti gong le ji wei bao gui de jing yan 
xi jin ping dang xuan zong shu ji hou shou ci li jing kao cha jiu yan zhe deng xiao ping dang nian 
xian lu lai dao shen zhen guang dong 
wo xiang zhe bu jin shi zai xiang wai jie xuan shi ji xu jian chi gai ge kai fang de jian qiang jue xin 
da gai ye you xiang cong ta fu qin da dao kuo fu gai ge xin lu li cheng zhong xi yin ying yang de ji ben kao liang 
ru jin ta ba zhe zhang zhao pian zhi fang zai zi ji de ban gong shi 
bu jin shi huai nian guo qu ta fu qin zai shi shi yi jia qi le rong rong de xing fu shi guang 
geng you yi zhong dui ta fu qin jing yang he gan en de xin li 
kan zhe xi jin ping tui zhe fu qin 
wan zhe mu qin 
zai zhe nv er 
yi ji ta yu qi fu ren peng li yuan qin mi he ying de yi zhang zhang wen xin de zhao pian 
wo jiu zai xiang 
ru guo yi ge ren bu xiao shun fu mu 
bu re ai jia ren 
bu shan dai zi nv 
hen nan xiang xiang zhe yang yi ge bu ai jia de ren hui zhen xin ai guo 
er zai zhe fang mian xi jin ping wei wo men zuo chu le bang yang 
ji de you yi pian bao dao shi zhe yang ping lun ta de 
zuo wei er zi 
fan hou ta hui la zhe mu qin de shou san bu 
pei ta liao tian 
zuo wei zhang fu 
ta dui qi zi ti tie ru wei 
wu lun duo wan 
mei tian dou yao gen qi zi zhi shao tong yi ci dian hua 
hu zhi ping an hou cai fang xin xiu xi 
ji shi nian lai yi zhi ru ci 
zuo wei fu qin 
ta jiao nv you fang 
fu fu lia zhi suo yi wei nv er qu ming ming ze 
jiu shi yao qiu nv er zhang da hou 
qing qing bai bai zuo ren 
zuo ge dui she hui you yong de ren 
zhe bu dan shi ta men dui nv er de yin qie xi wang 
ye shi ta men zhi piao jia feng de zhen shi xie zhao 
ji shan yu zhi guo 
ye shan yu zhi jia 
xi jin ping ban gong shi suo zhan xian de yi qie 
cong yi ge ce mian jian zheng le ta kuan guang de xiong huai 
jian qiang de yi zhi 
ren ge de mei li 
feng fu di qing gan 
shi de wo men zai jin yi bu liao jie de ji chu shang dui ta geng jia jing pei 
geng jia qin jin 
geng jia xin ren 
sheng huo zong shi chong man xi wang de 
cheng gong zong shi shu yu ji ji jin qu 
bu xie zhui qiu de ren men 
rang wo men jin mi tuan jie zai yi xi jin ping wei zong shu ji de dang zhong yang zhou wei 
zha shi gong zuo 
jian ku fen dou 
gong tong pu xie wei da zu guo fa zhan de shi dai xin pian zhang 
xi jin ping ban gong shi shou du bao guang jie mi shu jia shang bai fang de liu zhang zhao pian 
xi jin ping zong shu ji ceng yong jiu yi pin cheng ru zi bu liao 
nan jing shi wei shi fu da yuan jin xiang gong zhong kai fang shi wei shu ji qin ying shi min 
bei jing tian an men guang chang ju xing yuan dan sheng qi yi shi liang wan yu ming qun zhong guan kan 
bei jing qing feng bao zi fou ren tui 
zhu xi tao can 
: shi gu ke zi ji cheng hu de 
li du huo jiang sheng ji 
guang dong qing yuan yi huan bao ju zhang bei mian ceng sheng cheng fen fen zhong gao kua yi jian chang 
ben wang nian zhong pan dian 
shan dong tan cheng he juan cheng de liang li yi si yi gan yi miao zhi si an li 
jun she bei jing tian tan sheng wu zhi pin gu fen you xian gong si 
dan tian tan sheng wu bing wei dui ci biao tai 
gong si da men kai zhe 
bao an gao su qi lu wan bao ji zhe 
xian zai dan wei gei ta men xia le tong zhi 
zhi yao lai le ji zhe 
bu rang jin chang qu 
dan wei li de ren yi lv bu de jian 
dang ri wan jian 
tian tan sheng wu fa bu gong gao cheng 
gong si dong shi 
dong shi hui shen ji wei yuan hui wei yuan zhang li dong 
fu zong jing li fu bai nian 
cai wu zong jian chen yong ci qu xiang guan zhi wu 
dan ju ti yuan yin wei xiang xi pi lu 
yi wei bu yuan ju ming de fen xi shi zhi chu 
ci ci gao guan li zhi huo yu ci qian tian tan sheng wu pu chu yi si yi gan yi miao zhi si shi jian you guan 
zi kang tai yi miao she ru zhi si shi jian hou 
jie zhe jiu you mei ti bao dao 
hu bei e zhou 
si chuan mei shan he pi xian xian hou chu xian ying er da yi gan yi miao si wang an li 
qie yi miao lai zi tian tan sheng wu 
tian tan sheng wu de gu jia ying sheng xia die 
tian tan sheng wu zhen dui mei shan de yi miao zhi si an li fa bu gong gao cheng 
gong si dui xiang ying pi hao yi gan yi miao de sheng chan he yun shu guo cheng deng fang mian zuo le hui gu xing diao cha 
gai pi yi miao chan pin zai sheng chan 
yun shu deng huan jie jun fu he guo jia gui ding 
er ju ji zhe liao jie 
guo nei yi gan yi miao de san da ju tou 
shen zhen kang tai 
da lian han xin he tian tan sheng wu 
jun wei tong guo xin ban 
yao pin sheng chan zhi liang guan li gui fan 
zhe yi wei zhe 
bu de zai ji xu sheng chan yao pin 
tian tan sheng wu shi yang qi zhong guo sheng wu ji shu ji tuan gong si qi xia wei yi shang shi ping tai 
er zhong sheng ji tuan shi yang qi zhong wei yi zhuan zhu yu bao kuo yi miao zai nei de sheng wu zhi pin sheng chan 
xiao shou de qi ye 
ye shi guo nei zui da de yi miao sheng chan gong ying shang 
ji zhe zheng lei fa zi bei jing 
cong jin ri kai qi 
shi zhong guo xin yi jie ling dao ceng lv zhi ci nian 
ye bei shi wei quan mian shen hua gai ge yuan nian 
gai ge yi cheng zhong guo ge jie gong shi 
zai xin de yi nian li 
zhu ru shou ru fen pei gai ge xi ze deng duo xiang guan hu guo ji min sheng de zhong da gai ge fang an jiang mian shi 
yang lao jin bing gui deng 
you wang huo de ji ji jin zhan 
jiang wei shi jie dai lai shen me 
ge jie qi dai 
zhong guo ying quan mian shen hua gai ge yuan nian 
zai ji de li yi qun ti yi ran cun zai 
li yi fan li ri qu gu hua di dang xia 
zai cheng ge jie gong shi 
gang gang guo qu de yi nian 
bei shi wei zhong guo gai ge de xin qi dian 
zhe yi nian li 
zhi zheng de zhong guo gong chan dang ying lai shi ba jie san zhong quan hui 
guan jian xing hui yi 
quan mian shen hua gai ge 
de quan xin zhu zhang 
quan hui shen yi tong guo de 
zhong gong zhong yang guan yu quan mian shen hua gai ge ruo gan zhong da wen ti de jue ding 
de yi gong bu 
zhong gong gai ge de jue xin 
hai ti xian zai zhuan she ji gou fang mian 
shi ba jie san zhong quan hui shou ci ti chu cheng li zhong yang quan mian shen hua gai ge ling dao xiao zu 
zhong gong zhong yang zheng zhi ju zhao kai hui yi 
ji jue ding cheng li shang shu ji gou 
you xi jin ping ren zu zhang 
zhe bei jie du wei 
you li yu tu po li yi gu hua dui shen hua gai ge de zhang ai 
lan tu hui jiu 
zhong guo gai ge da mu xuan ji xian kai 
bei shi wei zhong guo quan mian shen hua gai ge yuan nian 
ye bei shi zuo shang shu gai ge ju cuo neng fou qie shi luo shi de 
zhe yi nian li 
dan du er hai 
xin zheng jiang quan mian qi dong 
shou ru fen pei gai ge xi ze 
xin xing cheng zhen hua gui hua 
bu dong chan tong yi deng ji zhi du 
zhao kao gai ge zong ti fang an jiang mian shi 
guo qi gai ge zong ti fang an zhen rong you wang jie kai 
yang lao jin bing gui you wang po ti 
guo fang he jun dui deng ling yu gai ge ye huo you xin jin zhan 
ge jie qi dai 
shou ru fen pei gai ge xi ze jiang chu tai yang lao jin bing gui ke qi 
guan yu shen hua shou ru fen pei zhi du gai ge de ruo gan yi jian 
guo jia fa gai wei zhu ren xu shao shi zai jin qi zhao kai de quan guo fa zhan he gai ge gong zuo hui yi shang biao shi 
nu li zeng jia cheng xiang ju min te bie shi di shou ru qun ti shou ru 
shou ru fen pei cha ju chao chu guo ji gong ren de 
min zhong pu bian qi wang 
shou ru fen pei gai ge neng jin kuai tui jin 
yi suo xiao pin fu cha ju 
bei gong ren wei shi zhong guo shou ru fen pei gai ge de ji ben si lu 
zhuan jia zhi chu 
yao tong guo gai ge 
xiao chu chu ci fen pei ling yu de bu gong 
dui zhong di shou ru zhe jian shui 
kong zhi gao shou ru 
bing xiao chu she hui bao zhang shang de dai yu cha yi 
zui zhong xing cheng 
de shou ru fen pei ge ju 
zhi de zhu yi de shi 
zai shou ru fen pei gai ge zhong 
bao shou zheng yi de yang lao jin shuang gui zhi you wang zai jin nian po ti 
zhuo li jie jue 
dan du er hai 
xin zheng jiang quan mian qi dong luo di xiao guo dai guan 
shi ba jie san zhong quan hui jue ding qi dong shi shi 
dan du er hai 
guan yu tiao zheng wan shan sheng yu zheng ce de jue yi you shi er jie quan guo ren da chang wei hui di liu ci hui yi biao jue tong guo 
dan du liang hai 
zheng ce zheng shi huo pi 
guo jia wei ji wei xiang guan fu ze ren biao shi 
jin nian di yi ji du 
qu jiang qi dong 
dan du er hai 
dan du er hai 
zheng ce de fu fu ke dai hu kou ben 
jie hun zheng he du sheng zi nv fu mu guang rong zheng deng cai liao dao jie dao xiang zhen ji sheng ban shen qing zai sheng yu 
shuang fang zhi xu yi fang hu kou suo zai sheng shi shi gai zheng ce bian ke shen qing 
jing guo yue yu yun niang 
dan du er hai 
zheng ce yi shuai xian jin ru li fa cheng xu 
ruo shun li tong guo 
shan xi deng sheng fen ye cheng jiang li zheng di yi ji du qi dong 
dan du er hai 
you guan zhuan jia biao shi 
zuo wei guo jia zhan lve ceng mian de bian dong 
dan du er hai 
wei ying dui xin zheng luo shi hou duan qi chu xian de sheng yu dui ji 
jin qi yin fa de 
guan yu tiao zheng wan shan sheng yu zheng ce de yi jian 
chang dao he li de sheng yu jian ge 
bing ming que tiao zheng wan shan sheng yu zheng ce de ji ben yuan ze zhi yi 
shi que bao sheng yu shui ping bu chu xian da de bo dong 
duo sheng guan fang diao yan yu ce 
ji sheng xin zheng de luo shi dui zong ti ren kou gui mo 
gong gong zi yuan deng de ying xiang jiang zai ke kong fan wei nei 
bu guo ju ti xiao guo ru he 
yin wu xian li ke xun 
reng you dai guan cha 
bu dong chan tong yi deng ji zhi du 
xin xing cheng zhen hua gui hua jiang mian shi 
guo wu yuan fa bu de 
ming que yao qiu 
chu tai bing shi shi bu dong chan tong yi deng ji zhi du 
guo wu yuan chang wu hui yi jue ding 
zheng he bu dong chan deng ji zhi ze 
jian li bu dong chan tong yi deng ji zhi du 
an zhao ji ding shi jian biao 
zhong guo zai jin nian shang ban nian jiu jiang ying lai bu dong chan deng ji tiao li he bu dong chan tong yi deng ji zhi du de chu tai 
yu lun zhi chu 
bu dong chan tong yi deng ji zhi du jiang wei fang chan shui de kai zheng dian ding ji chu 
tong shi ye ke neng wei fan fu bai tian shang yi bing li qi 
yun niang yi jiu de 
guo jia xin xing cheng zhen hua gui hua 
zai jin nian chu tai ye ji cheng ding ju 
yao zhi ding shi shi hao guo jia xin xing cheng zhen hua gui hua 
guo jia fa gai wei hui hou ye ming que biao shi 
jiang zhua jin xiu ding wan shan guo jia xin xing cheng zhen hua gui hua 
zheng qu jin kuai fa bu shi shi 
gang gang bi mu de zhong yang nong cun gong zuo hui yi ze jin yi bu xi hua le cheng zhen hua de shi jian biao 
ti chu san ge 
tui jin yi ren wei he xin de cheng zhen hua 
kan de jian shui 
ji de zhu xiang chou 
min zhong qi dai zhong yang cheng zhen hua gong zuo hui yi miao hui de zhe yi mei hao tu jing zao ri shi xian 
guo jia xin xing cheng zhen hua gui hua 
zhe yi ding ceng she ji de mian shi 
guo qi gai ge zong ti fang an you wang jie zhen rong shi chang hua cheng qi he xin 
guo zi wei fu zhu ren huang shu he ri qian zai shen hua guo you qi ye gai ge deng you guan qing kuang fa bu hui shang biao shi 
guo zi wei zheng zai an zhao san zhong quan hui de yao qiu 
zhua jin xiu gai he wan shan shen hua guo you qi ye gai ge de yi jian 
xia yi bu jiang an zhao zhong yang de tong yi bu shu shi shi fa bu 
shen hua guo you qi ye gai ge yao jian chi yi xia san xiang ji ben yuan ze 
jian chi ji ben jing ji zhi du 
jian chi shi chang hua gai ge fang xiang 
jian chi zheng qi fen kai 
zheng zi fen kai 
suo you quan yu jing ying quan fen kai 
jin qi ju xing de zhong yang qi ye 
di fang guo zi wei fu ze ren hui yi dui guo zi guo qi gai ge jin xing le xi zhi an pai 
gen ju hui yi de bu shu 
fa zhan hun he suo you zhi 
qi ye nei bu gai ge 
wan shan jian guan ti zhi he jie jue li shi yi liu wen ti wu ge fang mian qu de shi zhi xing jin zhan 
zai zhe fen guan fang miao hui de xin jie duan guo you qi ye gai ge de 
jia kuai ti sheng guo you qi ye de shi chang hua shui ping cheng wei qi he xin 
zai wai jie kan lai 
sui zhe guo qi gai ge fang an de chu tai 
chang jiu yi lai guo you qi ye pu bian cun zai de xin chou he zhi wu xiao fei guo gao 
shi chang hua cheng du bu gou deng gu ji you wang de dao gai guan 
jing sou ji you guan zheng ju ji diao cha hou 
xiang gang jing fang biao shi 
ta men de xing wei chu fan 
gong an tiao li 
zai wu xu ke zheng qing kuang xia jin ru xiang gang zhu jun jin qu 
liang ming bei bu nan zi xian zheng bei kou liu diao cha 
shu ming xiang gang shi min wei jing jie fang jun zhu gang bu dui pi zhun 
bing bu gu jun ying ying men shao bing de jing gao 
qiang xing chuang ru zhong huan jun ying jin xing zi rao 
hang zhou xiao fang bu men jie dao shi min bao jing 
cheng bin jiang qu chang jiang zhong lu tie lu han dong kou fu jin yi xi che dian nei yi you zha dan 
xiao fang he gong an bu men yi jing gan dao xian chang chu zhi 
ju xiao fang ren yuan cheng 
yi si zha dan de wu pin wei yu xi che dian yi liang jiao che di bu 
you pu tong shou ji da xiao 
ji zhe liao jie dao 
gai xi che dian wei yu yi ge nong mao shi chang nei 
ren liu bi jiao ji zhong 
xiao fang guan bing yi jiang fu jin ju min shu san 
chai dan zhuan jia gan dao xian chang 
dui yi si zha dan de wu pin jin xing le jian ce 
pan duan wei zhui zong qi de ke neng xing hen da 
jing fang zheng zai pai bao zhong 
jian xi ji zhe liu yong ta tong xun yuan liu li hu 
ju zhong guo zhi sheng 
quan guo xin wen lian bo 
zai dui di san fang qiang piao cha jian jin xing ping bi hou 
jiang jing tai de yan zheng ma bian cheng le bu duan yao dong de cai se dong tai yan zheng ma 
hen duo wang you zhi hu 
zhe yi sheng ji ye ying xiang dao le qiang piao ruan jian 
duo jia qiang piao ruan jian jie jin 
zai ci zhi qian 
zi fu qing xi 
qie bu fen da xiao xie 
er xin ban yan zheng ma bu dan jing chang chu xian zi fu die ya di qing kuang 
yan zheng ma hai zai bu duan dou dong 
bu shao yong hu biao shi 
xiang kan qing chu you dian fei jin 
he bei wang xiao jie 
ta shi hui dong de 
zuo huang you huang hai shi cai se de 
bu neng shuo kan bu qing chu 
dan jiu shi hen fei jin 
dui ci tie lu zong gong si ke fu re xian de hui ying shi 
qi ta de ruan jian he wang zhan yi jing ying xiang dao lv ke zheng chang de de gou piao shun xu le 
zhe ge dong tai yan zheng ma jiu shi yao bao zhang lv ke zheng chang gou piao 
sheng ji zhi hou 
yi xie dai you zi dong tian xie yan zheng ma de gong neng di san fang qiang piao ruan jian zhi jie tan huan 
er lie bao liu lan qi yin wei bing mei you tui chu ci xiang gong neng 
yin ci bing wei shou dao chong ji 
sui ran ci qian duo ci zhen feng xiang dui 
dan dui yu sheng ji yan zheng ma 
jin shan wang luo shi chang bu gong guan jing li li ping 
shi xi wang bi mian ji qi shua piao 
xi wang dui mei yi ge mai piao ren dou shi gong ping de 
suo yi wo men ye yi zhi mei you qu xiao 
que chi you bu tong de guan dian 
shuai xian qi guan fang wei bo shang ge kong han hua 
qing bu yao ba 
yan zheng ma di que you bi yao cun zai 
dan mei you bi yao gao de zhe me fu za 
yong hu mei fa jie shou 
wo men jue de jiu bie wang hui tou lu zou le ba 
ji zhe liu yi chen 
ju zhong guo zhi sheng 
xin wen wan gao feng

dan bu guan na yi ge 
zai si chuan sheng de yang shi zhong jiang xian 
xian li gei xiang li

ying xing zhi biao 
wei wan cheng ren wu 
cun gan bu bu de bu zi tao yao bao 
ti cun min mai nong bao 
guo qu de liang ge yue 
cang shan zhen de yi wei cun zhi shu gao su ji zhe 
you qi shi xin nong bao 
ju li ren wu kao he jie zhi ri qi hai you ban ge yue de shi hou 
nian di zhe ge ren wu neng wan cheng ma 
zhu yao shi wai chu wu gong de ren nong bu dao 
de shen fen zheng 
zai jiu shi you xie ren hai nian qing cai er san shi sui 
ta men da fu deng ji nian zai mai 
deng chun jie nian qing ren hui lai wo men zai dong yuan yi xia 
zhong jiang xian xing long zhen de yi wei cun zhi shu shuo 
yi xin nong he wei li 
zhen lao bao suo de ren bu duan tong guo fei xin gao zhi da jia ge cun wan cheng ren wu di qing kuang 
yi fang mian shi tong bao 
yi fang mian shi cui cu 
zhe wei cun zhi shu shuo 
ta yao shi hui lai bu yuan yi mai zhe ge bao xian 
zhe qian bu jiu ni zi ji chu la 
zi ji jiu kui le ma 
ru guo ta yao bao xiao zhen de yao yong zhe bi qian de shi hou zen me ban 
ta ru guo yao mai wo jiu ba piao gei ta 
ta ru guo bu mai 
wo jiu bu guan ta le 
wo ning yuan tie ji shi kuai qian 
jiu shi wei le wan ren wu ma 
dao chu ye shi cun li tie qian wan ren wu 
zhou bian de cun dou shi zhe yang ma 
an zhao zheng ce 
jiu neng jiao na xin nong bao 
cun zhi shu men gao su ji zhe 
xin nong bao de ya li geng da

cun li you ren yi wai si wang 
mei you xiao hu 
qian jiu you cun zhi shu chu 
shang mian xia ren wu jiu xia dao cun li le 
si wang de ren jiu bu zai mai le 
you yi ding cha ju 
zhe ye shi mei you ban fa de 
ta si wang hou 
dang shi mei you qu xiao hu kou 
gong an nian bao ren kou shi hai you na me duo shu ju 
an gong an tong ji 
ru guo mei xiao hu 
ren wu hai shi yao xia xia lai 
wan bu cheng ren wu 
ye shi yao kou qian 
fan zheng dou shi yao kou qian 
cun zhi shu ye dian le qian 
you xie cun ren si le mei xiao le hu 
ta ye gei mai 
wei le zheng ge di yi ming 
cun zhi shu men gao su ji zhe 
ta men de ren wu hen duo 
zong he zhi li 
an quan shi gu deng deng 
ren wu neng bu neng wan cheng du he nian zhong kao he gua gou 
ji zhe xiang si chuan sheng ren she ting nong cun she hui bao xian chu zi xun 
xin nong bao ying shi cun min zi yuan jiao na 
bu guan ren wu shi duo shao 
cun gan bu wei sha jue de nan yi wan cheng ren wu 
zhong jiang xian you ru he jie shi 
xing long zhen yi wei cun zhu ren shuo 
gei cun min xuan chuan xin nong bao 
shou jiao qian kuan shi yi you cun zhi shu 
cun zhu ren he hui ji san ge ren fu ze 
xin nong bao gong zuo zuo qi lai you nan du 
nong min yi pa zheng ce bian 
er pa bu dui xian 
ta jue de bu hua suan 
xing long zhen fu zhen zhang wu ya jie shi 
chu qu shi di nong min 
wai chu da gong ren yuan 
yi jing can bao ren yuan deng 
ren wu zhi biao da gai zhan dao ying mai ren shu de yi ban zuo you 
zai ta kan lai 
fen ren wu zhu yao hai shi wei le du cu ji ceng gong zuo ren yuan 
yao gen ni qian yi ge ze ren shu 
rang zhe ge hui min zheng ce 
wo li jie jiu shi rang wo men ji ceng du cu xia yi ji gan bu 
bu liu si jiao 
bu yao yin wei zi ji de dai man 
mei you tong zhi dao gai xiang shou zhe yi zheng ce de ren qun 
zhong jiang xian ren she ju fen guan ci xiang gong zuo de fu ju zhang jie shao 
ta men zi jia ya li 
wei de jiu shi jin zao shi xian guang fu gai 
wo men xian wei zheng fu xia le ge ren wu 
wo men xia qu du cha de shi hou 
xiang zhen ye gei wo men ti chu 
mu biao ren wu bu he li 
ken ding mei nian de ren shu dou shi dong tai de 
ren shu shi ji shang mei nian dou zai fa sheng bian hua 
zhe ge que shi dai yu you dian di 
qi dian tai di le 
zhe ge zheng ce zai gou jia shang dui lao bai xing de xi yin li bu da 
ji zhe liu li liu tao 
shen qing yi tao gong zu fang you duo nan 
ji zhe zai guang dong fo shan 
fan suo hao shi de xing zheng shen pi liu cheng 
ling da liang gong zu fang de xu qiu zhe zhi neng wang yang xing tan 
ju guang zhou she qing min yi yan jiu zhong xin zui xin de min diao xian shi 
min zhong dui zheng fu zhu fang bao zhang gong zuo ping jia bu gao 
dui bao zhang fang gong ying shu liang he gong ping fen pei 
ping jia yi bu man ju duo 
xu yao di zheng jian yi dui man chang de deng dai zhi shao san ge yue 
wo zhi xiang zu yi tao fang 
dan shen qing shou xu tai ma fan le 
wang xian dong lai zi hu bei jing men 
zai fo shan shi nan hai qu da li zhen mou wu ye gong si zuo bao an 
ye dong le xin 
xiang shen qing yi tao gong zu fang 
dan zi xun guo hou 
fan suo de shou xu ba ta xia zhu le 
xu yao ge zhong zheng jian yi dui 
chu le shen fen zheng 
shou ru zheng ming 
lao dong he tong 
cai chan zheng ming deng 
zui ma fan de shi ji sheng zheng 
wang xian dong shuo 
wo de yi ge lao xiang guang wei ban ji sheng zheng jiu hui le liang ci lao jia 
di yi ci shuo shi cun wei hui di zheng ming mei yong 
yao qu xian li gai zhang 
jiu suan ge zhong zheng jian qi quan le 
wang xian dong bai zhe zhi tou shuo 
shen pi cheng xu yao jing guo 
san shen san gong shi 
ren li zi yuan she hui bao zhang 
man chang de shen pi shou xu xia tui le wang xian dong 
ta zui zhong xuan ze zu lin nong min zi jian fang 
sui ran gong zu fang de sheng huo pei tao he zhi an xiang dui hao xie 
dan nong min fang xiang dui hai pian yi xie 
zui zhong yao de shi shou xu geng fang bian 
sui shi ke ru zhu 
ji zhe liao jie dao 
xiang wang xian dong zhe yang de wai lai wu gong ren yuan you qi shi lin shi gong 
xu yao ma shang jie jue zhu fang wen ti 
gen ben wu fa deng dai man chang de shen pi shi jian 
ge zhong fan duo di zheng jian ye rang zhe lei ren qun wang er sheng wei 
wai lai gong qing lai nong min zi jian fang gong zu fang lun wei 
ji zhe fa xian 
hai bei guang chang fu jin de nong min zi jian fang zu lin shi chang shi fen hong huo 
zai zu jin xiang cha bu da di qing kuang xia 
geng duo de wai lai gong xuan ze shou xu geng jian dan de nong min zi jian fang 
gong zu fang lun wei 
shen qing de ren que shi bu duo 
fo shan shi nan hai qu da li zhen guo tu cheng jian he shui wu ju fu ju zhang huang sheng wei jie shao 
shen he shi jian que shi guo chang 
dan wo men zhi neng an zhao shang ji wen jian yao qiu lai zuo 
huang sheng wei ren wei 
san shen san gong shi 
de liu cheng you ju da de ya suo kong jian 
bi ru she qu ju wei hui yu zhen 
liang ji qi shi ke yi he er wei yi 
zuo dao xin xi gong xiang 
que you jian hua liu cheng de bi yao 
wo men zheng ji hua diao di zu jin 
jia qiang wu ye guan li 
yi ti gao gong zu fang de shi chang jing zheng li 
shen he guo yan 
zhu yao shi zheng fu bu men pa chu wen ti 
dan shou xu guo duo 
you po shi wai lai wu gong ren yuan gan cui qu shi chang zu fang zi 
fo shan shi zhu jian ju zhu fang bao zhang ke ke zhang chen xiao yong tan yan 
yao gao hao gong zu fang guan li 
shou xian bi xu you yi pi zhuan zhi ren yuan 
dan mu qian gong zu fang de shen he ren wu zhu yao luo zai le she qu ju wei hui yi ji 
er ju wei hui you cheng dan le fan zhong de ri chang gong zuo 
yi ban you liang san ren jian zhi 
que fa zhuan men ji gou he zhuan zhi ren yuan 
zao cheng le shen he gong zuo de tuo ta he bu zhuan ye 
bao zhang fang zheng ce ying xiang fei hu ji ren kou qing xie 
ji zhe cong fo shan shi zhu jian ju liao jie dao 
er dong guan shi zui da de bao zhang fang xiao qu ya yuan xin cun 
kong zhi lv geng shi jing ren 
ji zhe ri qian lai dao gai xiao qu 
yi ming wu ye guan li yuan gao su ji zhe 
dong guan shi de gong zu fang guan li ban fa zhi jin hai wei chu tai 
rang ku deng duo nian de shi min bu duan shi wang 
ci qian guang dong sheng shen ji ting de bao gao xian shi 
dui yu bao zhang fang kong zhi xian xiang yao jin xing wen ze 
zhong guo fang di chan xue hui fu hui zhang chen guo qiang ren wei 
dang qian bao zhang fang kong zhi yi cheng wei yi zhong pu bian she hui xian xiang 
hen zhi de fan si 
yi wei zhui qiu wan cheng biao mian zhi biao ren wu 
er bu qu zhen zheng guan xin lao bai xing de xu qiu 
jie guo ji zao cheng zi yuan lang fei 
you mei you jie jue shi ji wen ti 
guang dong shi wai lai ren kou da sheng 
guang dong sheng zhu jian ting zhu fang bao zhang chu chu zhang liu geng hui shuo 
dui yu bao zhang fang kong zhi xian xiang 
shen ji bu men zheng jin xing xiang guan tong ji 
sheng zhu jian ting jiang dui cun zai de wen ti 
dui fa xian de wen ti zuo chu xiang ying zheng gai 
ji zhe liu hong yu 
ji qu nian shang ban nian tui chu 
ke qian shua ka + yan zhi wen 
shi shang zui yan 
gao xiao ke tang kao qin zhi du hou 
hu bei da xue zhi xing xue yuan zai ci chu ji 
xue sheng xu dao suo zhu lou ceng zhi wen ji shang an zhi wen 
 ji zhe tan fang 
shi xing qin shi lou mei ceng dou you zhi wen ji 
zuo ri xia wu 
zhi wen ji an zhuang zai lou ceng zuo ce 
you ce an zhi wen chu fan zhe lv guang 
xue sheng shou zhi an guo zhi wen ji zhi hou 
ru guo neng xian shi chu zi ji de ming zi 
jiu biao shi zhi wen lu ru cheng gong 
gai xiao xue gong chu chu zhang liu zhang hu jie shao 
tong guo zai dian nao shang jian cha zhi wen lu ru qing kuang 
jiu neng zhi dao nei xie xue sheng bu zai su she 
jia zhu wu han 
zhou mo xu yao hui jia de xue sheng xie qing jia tiao huo pi hou 
ke bu yong shua zhi wen 
yi qun chuan zhe shui yi de ren zai su she wai pai qi le chang dui 
hao zhuang guan a 
gai xiao xin sheng deng tong xue hui yi dao 
 tong xue re yi 
you ren bao yuan wan shang shua zhi wen tai leng 
mou gao xiao lao shi tong guo zhuang you ruan jian de shou ji qian dao jin xing cha qin 
tong shi hai yao kai fang shou ji ding wei 
ceng yin fa le zhong ren guan zhu 
zhi xing xue yuan shi xing de 
cha qin zhi du ye yin lai le xue sheng de re yi 
chuan zhe shui yi lai shua zhi wen 
gai xiao ren wen xi xin sheng liu tong xue man yuan shuo 
shi xing shou ri wan shang 
zai ta qian mian pai dui shua zhi wen de zu you ji shi ge ren 
yao shi you ren sheng bing bu shu fu 
ye yao cong chuang shang pa qi lai qu shua zhi wen ma 
tai si ban le ba 
liu tong xue ren wei 
ci ju neng fou da dao xiao guo hai bu yi ding 
dan shi que gei xue sheng sheng huo dai lai bu bian 
xian zai wang ba 
yu le chang suo na me duo 
chu qu wan tong xiao 
chu liao shi zen me ban 
li tong xue shi fen zan cheng ci xiang ju cuo 
zai ta kan lai 
xue sheng de zi zhi li bi jing bu ru cheng nian ren 
hen duo ren yi dao da xue jiu guo du fang song 
xue xiao yan ge jian du guan li hai shi hen bi yao de 
ren shen an quan cai shi zui zhong yao de 
xue sheng jia zhang you you he kan fa ne 
li nv shi de nv er zai zhi xing xue yuan du da yi 
shua zhi wen cha qin bao zheng le hai zi de ren shen an quan 
wo men jia zhang fang xin duo le 
 xiao fang jie shi 
xue xiao pian yuan yao bao zheng xue sheng an quan 
dui yu bu fen xue sheng de bao yuan 
liu zhang hu ye hen wu nai 
gai xiao di chu pian pi de tian xing zhou da qiao bei duan 
zhou bian you wu qi ta xue xiao 
xue sheng an bao gong zuo shi xue xiao gong zuo de zhong xin 
wo men xue xiao su she cai qu chuan tong de ren fang guan li fang shi 
su she guan li yuan jian guan 
zhi qian qu qi ta gao xiao kao cha guo men jin shua ka xi tong 
dan kao lv dao you wei sui qing kuang 
yu shi bian cai qu le geng yan ge de shua zhi wen ban fa 
ta hai jie shao 
chu le shua zhi wen wai 
mei tian yi ran hui ji xu an pai fu dao yuan cha qin 
bing yao qiu ta men yi shu mian xing shi hui bao cha qin qing kuang 
shi shi zhi wen cha qin hou 
tong guo dui zhao wang luo shu ju 
ye neng zhi dao fu dao yuan shi fou jiang gong zuo zuo dao wei le 
wang shang ceng you ren zhi yi shua zhi wen kong zao cheng xin xi wai xie 
qin fan xue sheng yin si 
dui yu hu da zhi xing xue yuan de shua zhi wen cha qin 
hu bei jin tian lv shi shi wu suo lv shi dan jia qiang ren wei 
xue xiao de chu fa dian shi hao de 
xiao fang ru guo que bao bu hui xie lou xue sheng yin si 
suo shou ji de shu ju zhi shi wei le que bao xue sheng zai bu zai qin shi 
na me jiu bu she ji qin quan wen ti 
jian xi ji zhe wang feng 
ju zhong guo zhi sheng 
yang guang xin wen 
an zhao guo wu yuan you pin zhi liang sheng ji shi jian biao 
jin tian qi guo nei zhu ying dan wei qi you quan bu sheng ji wei guo si qi you 
guo si dao lai 
dui ri yi yi lai cheng pin you de jing ji sheng huo chan sheng nei xie ying xiang 
qi you zhi xing guo si biao zhun 
mu qian shi chang jing guo liang ge yue de qian qi zhun bei 
cong jin tian qi 
shi chang yi jing ji ben wan cheng le guo si biao zhun qi you de zhi huan sheng ji 
guo san biao zhun qi you che di tui shi 
jin tian shang wu 
zai qing dao shi shi nan qu de yi chu zhong shi hua jia you zhan 
kan dao zhan nei de ping shang da chu le 
gong ying guo si biao zhun qi you 
jia you qi shang ye tie shang le guo si de biao zhi he jia ge shang diao gong gao 
dao ru jin yi jing shi ge liang ge yue 
jia you zhan gao jing li gao su 
ling wai gao jing li jie shao shuo 
zhe yi ci zheng fu dui yu wei gui xing wei de chu fa li du ye shi kong qian de 
yuan dan yi hou 
sheng gong shang ju sui ji chou cha 
an zhao jin you e lai jin xing chu fa 
yi ban shi yi bei yi shang 
zhe ci jia jia zheng ce shou dao hen duo si jia che zhu guan zhu 
gen ju ce suan 
xiang dang yu man man yi xiang you de jia ge 
er guo san he guo si qi you zui da qu bie zai yu han liu liang 
sheng ji guo si hou 
qi che wei qi wu ran jiang you xiao jiang di 
guo si biao zhun de zheng shi shi shi ye zai che zhu qun ti zhong fan xiang bu cuo 
si jia che zhu 
ge ren jue de zhang jia liang mao duo zhen bu suan bu duo 
zhu yao shi pai fang de wu ran jian shao le 
neng rang huan jing hao yi dian 
kong qi hao yi dian 
zhe dui wo men mei yi ge ren dou you hao chu 
ying gai shuo shi xin nian xin qi xiang ba 
dui yu wu liu qi ye lai jiang 
ying xiang ke wei bu xiao 
zhuo chuang zi xun cheng pin you fen xi shi zhang bin biao shi 
zhe suan hou ru guo ni yun shu che liang yue pao yi wan gong li lai suan de hua 
nian du de zhi chu fei yong zeng jia shi bi jiao da de 
er gen ju zi xun ji gou fen xi 
zhan wang cheng pin you shi chang jia ge 
lin jin nian mo guo nei you jia zou shi ying xiang yin su hui gui zhi ji ben gong xu mian 
guo nei ge di shi chang you jia duo wei chi wen shi 
you yu gong xu mian zhu dao shi chang 
guo nei you jia jiang wen du sui mo 
wan ke gong gao zhu yi hui ying qian shui zhi ze 
kai fa shang qian shui men shi jian jing guo yi duan shi jian chen ji hou zui jin you hui nuan 
dong fang shi kong 
er wan ke ye bu gan shi ruo 
sui ji fan ji 
fa biao gong gao cheng zi ji bu cun zai qian shui 
yang shi he kai fa shang de fen zheng zai du yin lai wei guan 
yang shi dian ming wan ke da lao hu 
dong fang shi kong 
ji lin wan ke cheng xiang mu 
guang zhou wan ke jin yu lan wan deng duo ge xiang mu yi jing da dao qing jiao tu di zeng zhi shui de tiao jian 
dan qi ye bing wei zhu dong shen bao 
er dang di shui wu zhu guan bu men bing wei yao qiu qi ye qing jiao 
zhe shi ji yang shi 
mei zhou zhi liang bao gao 
yang shi zai ci xiang kai fa shang kai pao 
gen ju ci qian bao dao 
zhe yi bao dao sui hou yin fa kai fa shang qiang lie fan dan 
duo jia shang shi gong si fa gong gao 
cheng zi ji wei qian shui 
wan ke zhu yi hui ji xiang mu qian shui 
dui yu yang shi de tu ran dian ming 
wan ke ye you bei er lai 
wan ke yi da zao bian fa bu you zhen dui xing de gong gao 
dui yang shi ti ji de xiang mu zhu yi jin xing le hui fu 
gen ju guo shui zong ju de xiang guan gui ding 
ying jin xing tu di zeng zhi shui qing suan de 
wei yi xia san zhong qing kuang 
fang di chan kai fa xiang mu quan bu jun gong 
wan cheng xiao shou de 
zheng ti zhuan rang wei jun gong jue suan fang di chan kai fa xiang mu di 
zhi jie zhuan rang tu di shi yong quan de 
jing guo wan ke nei bu he shi 
suo bao dao de si ge xiang mu dou bu fu he zhe san zhong qing suan tiao jian 
guang zhou jin yu hua ting xiang mu 
yuan wei da dao tu di zeng zhi shui qing suan tiao jian 
ji lin wan ke cheng xiang mu 
gen ju jing shen ji de shi ji cheng ben ji shou ru ce suan 
yu ji qing suan hou shi ji ying jiao na de tu di zeng zhi shui shao yu yu jiao jin e 
shu yu ying tui shui xiang mu 
guang zhou jin yu lan wan xiang mu 
bai yue wan xiang mu 
jun wei quan bu wan cheng xiao shou 
sui ran jun wei da dao ying qing suan tiao jian 
dan xiang mu gong si yi jing zai zheng li xiang guan cai liao 
wei qing suan gong zuo zuo zhun bei 
wan ke zi cheng yi fa na shui 
chu le zhu yi hui ying 
wan ke hai cheng zi ji shi yi fa na shui 
ci wei gong si an zhao hui ji zhun ze yao qiu 
dui wei lai ke neng chan sheng de tu di zeng zhi shui jin xing de ji ti 
gong si bu cun zai ying jiao wei jiao de tu di zeng zhi shui 
ji zhe zhui fang 
shuang fang fen qi yuan yu tong ji kou jing bu yi 
wu lun shi yang shi hai shi kai fa shang 
hao xiang dou hen you li 
wei shen me shuang fang wu cha zhe me da 
qi zhong zui guan jian de shi tong ji kou jing shuang fang you cha ju 
yang shi de tong ji kou jing shi yu shou 
zhe yi dian wan ke jin xing le hui ji 
ming que biao shi le fang di chan gong si shi yi quan bu jun gong 
wan cheng xiao shou wei jiao shui shi dian 
wan ke ban chu le guo shui zong ju de gui ding 
geng you shuo fu li 
zhi yu wan ke suo shuo de xiao shou bu jia 
ge bie xiang mu bu jin bu yong zai jiao shui 
fan er hai yao tui shui 
zai bei jing dan ren kai fa shang cai wu fu ze ren de zhang wei gao su ji zhe 
zhe zhu yao shi yin wei tu di zeng zhi shui da duo dou shi yu jiao 
ge de dou bu tong 
zai mai lou shi 
yin wei shi dian bu tong 
mai de jia ge bu tong 
zhe jiu you ke neng ti duo le 
jiu xu yao zai zui hou jie suan de shi hou tui 
zhe li mian hai qian che dao suo de shui zhi lei de 
ji wei fu za 
bu shi jian dan de yi kou jia jiao shui 
ye jie fan ying 
ren zhi qiang pang guan li ting wan ke 
sui ran zhe yi ci yang shi pao kou dui zhun le wan ke 
dan shi zuo wei fang di chan hang ye de zhi ming 
hua yuan dong shi zhang ren zhi qiang yi ran ren bu zhu fa biao ping lun 
cheng yang shi dian ming wan ke shu yu da lao hu 
dan yang shi bao dao que you kan bu chu wan ke qian shui 
yang shi jiang wan ke dang cheng qian shui de lao hu tong da 
wo bu zhi dao wan ke shi fou qian shui 
dan wo cong yang shi bao dao zhong kan bu chu wan ke shi fou qian shui 
yang shi mei zheng ming yi ju bei na shui tiao jian de lou pan wei jie suan zeng zhi shui 
ye wei zheng ming wei jiao zeng zhi shui de yu e yu zhe xie ying jie suan xiang mu di guan xi 
wei sha bu cai fang kuai ji shi 
wei sha bu cai fang zheng jian hui he jiao yi suo 
xiang dui yu ci qian 
mei zhou zhi liang bao gao 
dian ming hua yuan di chan shi de fen nu 
zhe ci ren zhi qiang geng duo de shi zhi yi 
cong di chan hang ye de jiao du dui wan ke jin xing le zhi chi 
er zai bu jiu qian zu zhi de hang ye xie hui yan tao zhong 
ren zhi qiang zhi yan fang di chan xie hui hui zhang zhu zhong yi de pi ping tai guo 
wo de yi si 
huo zhe gen wan ke shuo wo wu du le 
ren zhi qiang zai fa yan zhong biao shi 
ji zhe fan hui 
zhe zu shu ju lai zi yu zhong guo she hui ke xue yuan zhong guo lian zheng yan jiu zhong xin he she ke wen xian chu ban she lian he fa bu de 
tui jin fan fu chang lian jian she 
min yi ke yi 
zai fan fu gong zuo de dao min zhong ju da ren ke de tong shi 
zhong guo lian zheng yan jiu zhong xin ke ti zu zai diao yan zhong liao jie dao 
jin yi duan shi jian gong zhong dui fu bai man yan de gao jiao lv gan he dui fan fu chang lian jian she de gao qi wang zhi tong zai 
zhu yao biao xian wei yi xia si ge fang mian 
shou xian shi wei fu bai reng duo fa gan dao jiao lv 
ke ti zu de diao yan ren yuan fen xi ren wei 
pin xian yu shi zhi ben zhi lu hai jiao man chang 
dui wei ji wei fa ling dao gan bu de cong yan cha ban ying de le guang fan she hui ren tong 
ye bao lu chu quan li jian kong he gan bu jian guan bo ruo de shen ceng wen ti 
bu zheng zhi feng reng hen wan gu 
xiao ji fu bai wen ti reng you zi sheng man yan de tu rang 
min zhong ye dui zhi du fan fu ji yu ji da de qi wang 
xi wang ti sheng zhi du fan fu zhi liang 
de diao yan ren yuan fa xian 
gong zhong dui zhong yang 
ba xiang gui ding 
dai lai de zuo feng jian she cheng xiao man yi du zui gao 
ge de ge bu men de fan fu chang lian zhi du jian she re qing ri qu gao zhang 
dan diao cha ye xian shi chu 
reng you hen duo zhi du zhi xing li bu gou 
cao zuo xing bu qiang 
shi xiao xing bu zu 
gong zhong ren wei 
yao ba quan li guan jin zhi du de 
guan jian yao jian quan ke xing ke xin de guan yong zhi du 
zai mu qian de she hui bei jing zhi xia 
min zhong reng xi wang jin yi bu xiu fu dang qun gan qun guan xi 
diao yan xian shi 
dang yuan gan bu gong zuo 
wei ren min fu wu de xian xiang shi fen chang jian 
que you jing chang zao yu 
zhi jie mian dui qun zhong de ji ceng gong zhi ren yuan geng yi bei 
dang qun gan qun que fa hu xin qing kuang reng jiao tu chu 
gong zi dai yu cha dao zhi bu shao gan bu gan tan 
bu li yu lian jie yong quan 
han zhong shi wei sheng ju gan bu zhang mou zai jia zhong zi sha shen wang 
ji jiang kai ting shen li 
han zhong shi zheng fu ti gong di qing kuang tong bao cheng 
sheng qian ceng ren han zhong shi hong shi zi hui ban gong shi fu zhu ren 
shi wei sheng ju yi zheng ke fu ze ren 
han zhong shi ji wei diao cha fa xian han zhong shi hong shi zi hui ban gong shi yuan fu zhu ren zhang mou cun zai li yong zhi wu zhi bian 
shi ji wei zheng shi dui zhang mou wei ji wen ti li an diao cha 
zhang mou tian xie le shi hong shi zi hui zhuan zhang zhi piao bing jia gai yin zhang 
hou gai zi jin zhuan hui shi hong shi zi hui zhang hu 
jian yu zhang mou wei ji wen ti yi jing she xian fan zui 
han zhong shi ji wei yan jiu jiang you guan zi liao he an jian xian suo yi song han zhong shi ren min jian cha yuan 
fa yuan ji jiang jin xing kai ting shen li 
zhang mou zai jia zhong zi sha shen wang 
jing han zhong shi han tai gong an fen ju shi jian 
zhang mou xi ben ren yong rui qi ci shang liang ce fu gu gou 
zao cheng fu gu gou dong mai xue guan po lie zhi ji xing shi xue xing xiu ke si wang 
shan hou chu li gong zuo zheng zai jin xing zhong 
ji zhe lie wei ji hao fan 
chao xian zui gao ling dao ren jin zheng en zai ping rang shi cha qian xian shao suo 
hu yu han chao ying ting zhi hu xiang fei bang he di hui 
ji ji ying zao you li yu gai shan han chao guan xi de huan jing 
jin zheng en fa biao xin nian jiang hua cheng chu jue zhang cheng ze you li dui wu tuan jie 
ju han lian she bao dao 
hu yu han chao ying ting zhi hu xiang fei bang he di hui 
ji ji ying zao you li yu gai shan han chao guan xi de huan jing 
dui yu zhang cheng ze bei chu jue yi shi 
jin zheng en biao shi 
chao xian lao dong dang 
chu jue le fan dang zong pai fen zi 
zhe jin yi bu qiang hua le lao dong dang ge ming dui wu de yi xin tuan jie 
jin zheng en hai qiang diao 
chao xian jiang ji xu wei gai shan han chao guan xi er nu li 
bing dun cu han guo ye ying ji ji tui dong gai shan han chao guan xi 
jin zheng en jiu chao xian ban dao ju shi biao shi 
mei guo he han guo ju xing de 
dui chao qin lve zhan zheng yan xi 
dui ban dao ju shi gou cheng zhong da wei xie 
ru guo zai chao xian ban dao di qu zai ci bao fa zhan zheng 
zhe ke neng hui dai lai yi chang ke pa de he zai nan 
ling ju fa xin she bao dao 
jin zheng en zai jiang hua zhong shi yan yi qiang you li ju cuo di yu 
qin hai chao xian 
cheng chu jue gu zhang zhang cheng ze shi 
guo duan xing dong 
zhi zhang qi tu zai zhi zheng dang nei jian li shu yu ta de shi li 
xing rong zhang shi zha zi 
zheng su zhang cheng ze you zhu ling guo jia tuan jie yi bai bei 
xin teng yi xiao 
ju ri ben gong tong she bao dao 
ju ci qian bao dao 
xin teng yi xiao duo ci can bai jing guo shen she 
ta can bai zhi hou 
ta you yi ci can bai jing guo shen she 
xin teng yi xiao ji du biao shi 
ta shi gen ju 
zi ji de pan duan 
si ren shen fen 
jue ding can bai jing guo shen she de 
jing guo shen she shi ri ben jin dai shi shang jun guo zhu yi dui wai qin lve kuo zhang de jing shen zhi zhu 
gong feng duo ming er zhan jia ji zhan fan 
bao kuo zhong guo ren min zai nei de ya zhou ge guo ren min shi zhong jian jue fan dui ri ben ling dao ren shen bai jing guo shen she 
ren wei ri ben ling dao ren de zhe yi ju dong yan zhong shang hai le shou hai guo ren min di qing gan 
zhong guo zheng fu yi guan ren wei 
zhi you zheng que ren shi he dui dai li shi 
yi shi wei jian 
mian xiang wei lai 
cai you li yu zhong ri mu lin you hao guan xi de jian kang wen ding fa zhan 
you li yu ri ben qu xin yu ya zhou lin guo he guo ji she hui 
fu he ri ben ren min de chang yuan li yi 
zi an bei jin san shang tai yi lai 
ri ben zheng ke can bai jing guo shen she de huo dong bu jian fan zeng 
zhe yi can bai ren shu shi qu nian de liang bei 
ri ben shou xiang an bei han ran can bai gong feng you er zhan jia ji zhan fan de jing guo shen she 
zhao zhi guo ji she hui pu bian de qiang lie pi ping 
chao ri xin wen 
yuan yin ri ben wai jiao zhuan jia de hua cheng 
an bei jin san can bai jing guo shen she de xing wei 
gei zi ji zhi xia le yi zhang mei zhong han e zai li shi ren shi wen ti shang de dui ri 
an bei ba tao lun xiu xian 
chong shi an bao zheng ce he zhen xing jiao yu ding wei wei zhong yao ke ti 
qiang da ri ben 
de zhan dou cai gang kai shi 
zhe shi ying gai chao zhe ri ben 
jian she xin guo jia 
mai chu yi da bu de shi ke 
an bei jiu xiu xian ju cuo hu yu cheng 
ying gai chao zhe ba wo shi dai bian hua de xiu gai fang xiang 
jin yi bu shen hua guo min tao lun 
guo jia an quan bao zhang hui yi 
ri ben jiang dui shi jie he ping yu wen ding fa hui chao chu yi wang de ji ji zuo yong 
shang bai wan lai zi mei guo he shi jie ge de de ren men hui ju zai niu yue shi dai guang chang 
shi jie de shi zi lu kou 
cong dang ri xia wu kai shi 
niu yue shi dai guang chang fu jin de zhu yao tong dao yi bei feng bi 
tu wei yi dui qi jing dang wan zai niu yue shi dai guang chang fu jin zhi qin 
zhong xin she fa ruan yu lin she 
shang bai wan lai zi mei guo he shi jie ge de de ren men hui ju zai niu yue shi dai guang chang 
shi jie de shi zi lu kou 
niu yue shi dai guang chang ju xing sheng da de qing zhu huo dong 
lai zi shi jie ge de de re qing you ke hui ju zai shi dai guang chang 
jiang shi dai guang chang de jie dao ji de shui xie bu tong 
zhong xin she fa ruan yu lin she 
lai zi mei guo he shi jie ge de de shang bai wan min zhong ju ji zai 
shi jie de shi zi lu kou 
niu yue shi bao guang chang 
jiu you lai zi shi jie ge de de da pi min zhong lu xu lai dao shi bao guang chang 
deng dai yi you bai nian li shi de sheng da kua nian ye qing zhu huo dong 
guang chang fu jin jie dao feng bi 
wei bao zhang min zhong an quan 
niu yue an quan bao zhang cuo shi quan mian sheng ji 
bei bao ke jin zhi jin ru guang chang 
da liang he qiang shi dan de jing cha zai guang chang zhi qin 
quan fu wu zhuang de qi jing he jing cha mo tuo che dui zai man ha dun zhong cheng jie dao chuan suo 
zhi sheng ji zai man ha dun shang kong pan xuan 
shi bao guang chang kua nian ye qing zhu huo dong yi cheng wei niu yue li shi de yi bu fen 
you zeng jia le shui jing qiu jiang luo dao shu ji shi huo dong 
mei nian dou xi yin chao guo bai wan de min zhong xian chang guan kan 
lai zi luo shan ji de da san xue sheng qiao di gao su ji zhe 
qi dai kan dao xin nian ye shui jing qiu de jiang luo 
zi ji de xin nian yuan wang shi xi wang xin de yi nian li shun shun li li 
jia ren ping an jian kang 
jin nian shui jing qiu de zhu ti wei 
xiang xiang de kui zeng 
niu yue shi gu ji 
jin nian shi bao guang chang gao chu de shui jing qiu jiang luo 
er shi yu jia ren he peng you yi qi du guo xin nian 
dao shu ji shi de shui jing qiu huan huan cong kong zhong jiang xia 
xuan mu di yan hua zai niu yue de ye kong zhong zhan fang 
da liang cai se zhi xie cong kong zhong sa luo zai fei teng de ren qun zhong 
zai shi bao guang chang bai wan min zhong re lie qi pan he huan hu zhong jiang lin 
ji zhe ruan yu lin 
zhong guo cheng ji dong che zu zui da yi bi chu kou ding dan shou lie che liang zai zhong guo nan che si fang gu fen gong si xia xian 
bing cong qing dao gang zhuang chuan qi yun 
qian wang a gen ting 
che nei hai she you can ji ren zhuan yong qu yu 
zi xing che cun fang qu yu 
gai pi cheng ji dong che zu jiang fu wu yu a gen ting shou du bu yi nuo si ai li si de sa mian tuo xian he mai te xian 
cheng wei qi jin wei zhi wo guo cheng ji dong che zu chu kou liang zui da de ding dan 
xu chong de she 
ri ben dong jing 
can bai jing guo shen she 
tu wei an bei jin san jie shou cai fang 
ri ben dong jing 
can bai jing guo shen she 
tu wei an bei jin san di da jing guo shen she 
ju fa xin she bao dao 
ta yu ce ri ben zhan hou he ping xian fa huo jiang bei 
ju xin an bei cheng 
quan mian hui fu 
dui di qu he shi jie he ping wen ding zuo chu hen da gong xian 
jin li chuang zao ke neng xing 
bang zhu ya zhou cheng wei ping heng he wen ding de di qu 
ling ju gong tong she bao dao 
an bei ba tao lun xiu xian 
chong shi an bao zheng ce he zhen xing jiao yu ding wei wei zhong yao ke ti 
qiang da ri ben 
de zhan dou cai gang kai shi 
zhe shi ying gai chao zhe ri ben 
jian she xin guo jia 
mai chu yi da bu de shi ke 
an bei jiu xiu xian ju cuo hu yu cheng 
ying gai chao zhe ba wo shi dai bian hua de xiu gai fang xiang 
jin yi bu shen hua guo min tao lun 
shi zhi xiu gai xian xing ri ben xian fa di jiu tiao 
you yu gai xian fa ming que biao shi ri ben fang qi zhan zheng 
bu bao chi lu hai kong jun ji qi ta zhan zheng li liang 
bu cheng ren guo jia jiao zhan quan 
er zhan hou de ri ben xian fa bei cheng wei 
he ping xian fa 
ri ben zheng fu yu ban shi ji yi lai yi zhi ren wei xian fa jin zhi 
ji ti zi wei quan 
zi wei dui xing dong xu shou yan ge xian zhi 
chang qi yi lai 
yin suo xu fa lv cheng xu yan ge 
xiu xian zai ri ben bei ren wei shi bu ke neng de 
shi xiu xian wei 
li shi shi ming 
de an bei bu gu zu li 
yi zai tui cu xiu gai xian fa 
er yi dan ri ben jie jin 
ji ti zi wei quan 
tuo li zhan hou ti zhi 
mai xiang jun shi da guo 
hou guo nan yi she xiang 
guo jia an quan bao zhang hui yi 
ri ben jiang dui shi jie he ping yu wen ding fa hui chao chu yi wang de ji ji zuo yong 
zao guo ji she hui qiang lie pi ping 
zhong guo wai jiao bu fa yan ren hua chun ying biao shi 
zhong han liang guo dui ri ben shou xiang an bei jin san can bai jing guo shen she de dao xing ni shi dou shi fen fen kai 
zhong han dou zhu zhang ri fang bi xu zheng shi li shi 
shen ke fan xing li shi 
zhi you jian chi zheng que de li shi guan 
cai neng tong lin guo fa zhan mian xiang wei lai de guan xi 
han guo guo hui ze yu qu nian di zai quan ti hui yi shang yi zhi tong guo jue yi 
ren wei an bei can bai jing guo shen she 
shi gei gou zhu mian xiang wei lai de ri han guan xi yi ji dong bei ya de he ping yu wen ding 
dai lai yan zhong fu mian ying xiang de wai jiao tiao xin xing wei 
yu yi qiang lie qian ze 
mei guo ye dui an bei can bai zhi ju han jian biao shi 
e wai jiao bu ze fa biao sheng ming cheng dui ci 
gan dao yi han 
zi an bei shang tai zhi zheng yi lai 
bao dao zhi chu 
qu nian di ri ben shou xiang an bei jin san can bai yi yin fa zhong han deng lin guo qiang lie fan ying 
xin teng ci ju huo jiang yin fa geng ji lie de fan ying 
yin du ni xi ya kua nian ye bu ping jing 
yin du ni xi ya jing fang fan kong te zhong bu dui 
zuo wan xian shi zai tang ge lang 
nan bu xi pu ta 
bao wei yi chu kong bu fen zi xian fan cang shen de zhu suo 
yi ming jiao zuo xi da ya te 
de xian fan shou chi gang bi qiang ju bu 
zao te zhong ren yuan ji bi 
ji bi xi da ya te hou 
ji xu bao wei kong xian cang shen de wu she 
yin du ni xi ya jing fang zhi chu 
jing fang zai fan zui xian chang zhao dao le dai tu yong lai xing xiong de ji che 
bu zhi ru ci 
fen hang zao qiang an 
dang shi jing fang zai yin hang fu jin de xiao chi tan fa xian yi ge zhuang you shou liu dan de bei bao 
jing fang cha huo 
bao dao zhi chu 
jin nian lai zai fan kong xing dong shang 
lv jian qi gong 
zhe zhi jing bing shi mei guo guo wu yuan wai jiao an quan ju zi zhu jian li de 
wu qi zhuang bei quan bu lai zi mei guo 
jiao guan dou shi qian mei jun ge te zhong bu dui cheng yuan ji lian bang diao cha ju 
te qin ju de fan kong zhuan jia 
can yu ya tai jing ji he zuo hui yi 
feng hui de wei an gong zuo 
e luo si zong tong pu jing di da fu er jia ge lei kan wang zai liang ci bao zha an zhong shou shang de ren yuan 
bing zai bao zha an xian chang xiang shi zhe xian hua ai dao 
e luo si zong tong pu jing di da fu er jia ge lei kan wang zai liang ci bao zha an zhong shou shang de ren yuan 
bing zai bao zha an xian chang xiang shi zhe xian hua ai dao 
ju ying guo guang bo gong si bao dao 
e luo si fu er jia ge lei shi zhong yang huo che zhan he yi liang wu gui dian che shang fa sheng liang qi zha dan gong ji 
e zong tong pu jing zai gai shi tan wang zha dan gong ji de shang zhe shi shuo 
wu lun zhe xie zui fan ru he wei zi ji de xing wei bian jie 
fan xia zhen dui ping min de zui xing shi jue bu ke yuan liang de 
fu er jia ge lei you yi bai wan ren kou 
zai er zhan qi jian 
zhe li ceng ming wei si da lin ge lei 
gai shi cai qu le geng jia yan ge de an bao cuo shi 
dang ju bu shu le shu qian ming jing cha 
xian zai hai mei you yi ge zu zhi sheng cheng zhi zao le zhe liang qi gong ji 
dan fen xi ren shi shuo 
zhe xie zha dan gong ji shi wei le po huai xia ge yue zai suo qi ju xing de dong ji ao yun hui 
bao dao ren wei 
zhe xie gong ji yu bei gao jia suo di qu de yi si lan ji jin fen zi yi wang fa dong de lan sha wu gu de gong ji shi fen xiang si 
diao cha ren yuan xiang xin 
yi ming nan xing zi sha shi zha dan gong zhe xi ji le na liang wu gui dian che 
ta men zheng zai jian yan ta de shi ti 
yi bian que ren ta de shen fen 
jing fang xiao xi lai yuan shuo 
dui huo che zhan fa dong de gong ji ke neng ye shi yi ming nan xing 
liang ci zha dan gong ji zhong de dan pian dou shi yi yang de 
fen xi ren shi shuo 
ta yi qian ceng duo ci zhi hui zhen dui e ping min mu biao di zha dan gong ji 
ta ceng fa shi ta de zhan shi jiang jin yi qie ke neng 
zu zhi suo qi dong ji ao yun hui de ju ban 
xiang han guo shen chu gan lan zhi 
hu yu min zu zhi jian ting zhi xiang hu fei bang he fan mu 
ji ji ying zao you li yu gai shan bei nan guan xi de fen wei 
lian xi dao jin zheng en zai jiang hua zhong shi yan ti gao ren min sheng huo shui ping 
fen xi shi ren wei 
zhe yi wei zhe chao xian ke neng jiu gai shan chao han guan xi ti chu yi xie shi zhi xing jian yi 
han guo zheng fu ze hui ying 
you dai guan cha 
jin zheng en jian jie ti ji chao xian chu jue yuan 
er hao ren wu 
hu yu dang zheng jun min tuan jie yi zhi 
ta tong shi chong fu dui han guo he mei guo de jing gao 
ru guo chao xian ban dao zai ci bao fa zhan zheng 
ke neng dao zhi 
qiang diao tuan jie 
chao xian zhong yang dian shi tai deng guang bo dian shi mei ti dang tian qing chen bo fang jin zheng en xin nian jiang hua 
zhe shi jin zheng en cheng wei chao xian zui gao ling dao ren yi lai di er ci fa biao xin nian jiang hua 
jin zheng en shen qian shi yi pai mai ke feng 
bei hou shi lao dong dang dang hui 
shen bian shi lao dong dang dang qi 
han guo lian he tong xun she shuo 
zai zhe pian wai jie tong chang yong yu guan cha chao xian xin yi nian shi zheng mu biao di jiang hua zhong 
jin zheng en shou xian hui gu guo qu yi nian chao xian ge ling yu qu de de cheng ji 
you qi shi lao dong dang cai qu 
jian jue xing dong qing chu le dang nei zong pai wu dian 
jin zheng en de gu fu zhang cheng ze 
jin zheng en mei you ti ji zhang cheng ze de xing ming 
wo men de dang ji shi zuo chu le zheng que de jue ding 
jie fa bing su qing fan dang fan ge ming fen zi 
bai bei zeng qiang wo men de tuan jie 
jin zheng en qiang diao 
yao che di jian li 
wei yi ling dao ti xi 
dui fang hai dang he ge ming dui wu tong yi tuan jie de xi wei xian xiang he yin su dou yao bao chi jing ti bing che di jia yi ke fu 
xin yi nian zhu yao ren wu shi jing ji jian she he ti gao ren min sheng huo shui ping 
chao xian jin nian ba jiang nong ye zuo wei 
zhu gong fang xiang 
dui han shi yi 
tan ji bei nan guan xi 
chu chong shen shuang fang ying jian chi he luo shi xian qian fa biao de gong tong xuan yan 
jin zheng en shuo 
wo men jiang zuo chu ji ji de nu li yi gai shan bei nan guan xi 
nan fang tong yang ying dang xiang qian tui dong bei nan guan xi gai shan 
jin zheng en qiang diao 
bi xu ying zao you li yu gai shan chao han guan xi de fen wei 
xian zai shi shi hou jie shu dui shuang fang dou mei you hao chu de fei bang he zhong shang 
ying dang ting zhi zuo ren he you hai yu min zu tuan jie yu he jie de shi qing 
zhi yao zhong shi min zu 
xi wang tong yi 
bu guan shi shei 
chao xian dou jiang yu qi xie shou he zuo 
ji xu wei gai shan chao han guan xi er nu li 
mei lian she shuo 
zhe xie guan yu tong yi de cuo ci 
jin guan yu qu nian xin nian jiang hua xiang si 
dan xiang bi guo qu yi nian ji du yi he zhan zheng xiang wei xie 
xian ran you le gai jin 
an zhao han lian she de shuo fa 
chao xian chu jue zhang cheng ze hou 
han guo fang mian dan xin chao xian ke neng fa qi jun shi tiao xin 
jin zheng en ze shi zai zhe yi bei jing xia xiang han guo shen chu le gan lan zhi 
zi chen guang biao tou lu you yi shou gou mei guo 
niu yue shi bao 
chen guang biao di yan lun pin fan zao dao zhi yi 
chen guang biao biao shi 
chen guang biao zai shen zhen 
jie chu hua ren 
fa biao huo jiang gan yan shi cheng yao shou gou 
niu yue shi bao 
dui yu shou gou yi xiang 
chen guang biao shuo 
niu yue shi bao 
shi jin liang nian lai yi zhi dou you de xiang fa 
zai zhong guo ye zhao le yi xie da qi ye 
xi wang neng gen wo yi qi qu shou gou 
jie guo hen duo ren dou bu yuan yi 
hou lai wo zhao le xiang gang de yi ge fu shang 
gen wo he zuo 
niu yue shi bao 
de xin wen fa yan ren hui ying shuo 
gong si bu dui chuan yan fa biao hui ying 
niu yue shi bao 
de ban ye guang gao 
gai dao shi zhong guo gu you ling tu 
ci shi zhi hou 
chen guang biao bei ta de ying xiang li suo 
niu yue shi bao 
zai bao zhi fang mian de ying xiang li shi bi jiao da 
suo yi xiang tong guo 
niu yue shi bao 
chuan bo yi xie zheng neng liang 
ba zhong guo zhen zheng de sheng yin chuan chu qu 
chen guang biao hai tan yan 
yin wei mei ti de jie ru 
zeng jia le shou gou de nan du 
wo wei tuo de zai niu yue de na ge ji gou you dian ze guai wo 
bu gai ba zhe ge shi qing tou lu chu qu 
xian zai jiu dai lai le nan du le 
wo ming tian fei niu yue 
chen guang biao yu shou gou 
niu yue shi bao 
de xiao xi xun su yin fa le re yi 
you kai shi biao yan le 
you zhe me duo qian zi ji ban ge geng niu de bao zhi bu jiu xing le 
huan gei zhong guo chuang zao jiu ye 
wei sha fei mai guo wai de 
mian dui zhi yi sheng 
chen guang biao shuo 
xi wang da jia xiang xin biao ge de jian ding xin xin 
wo ye bu shi shuo da hua 
wo ming tian jiu hui qu mei guo 
niu yue shi bao 
de shi qing zhi wai 
hai hui kao cha yi xia zhong mei wen hua ci shan ji jin hui yun zuo deng shi yi 
quan min tuan jie pin jing ji 
wei ti de yuan dan zhu ci 
ju jiao pin jing ji 
bing jiang tui dong tu di huo hua he du shi geng xin 
shu huan dou hui qu gao fang jia wen ti 
ma ying jiu ni zuo chu zhong da xuan shi 
zui zhong yao de gong zuo 
bing hu yu tai wan chao ye zheng dang yi tong xie shou 
jin su tong guo you li yu tai wan jing ji fa zhan de yi an 
ma ying jiu shang ren yi lai 
zhu yao shi hui gu ge xiang shi zheng cheng guo 
bing shuo ming dang ju wei lai yao nu li de zhong dian gong zuo 
xi wang zai xin de yi nian neng rang min zhong you gan 
yu min jian xie shou 
ma ying jiu shuo ming 
wei jin yi bu zhen xing jing qi 
dang ju jiang cai qu san bo cai jing zheng ce 
yi geng duo ji ji de zuo wei lai ti sheng min jian tou zi yi yuan 
chu da li tui dong tu di huo hua he du shi geng xin 
quan mian qing dian xian zhi tu di huo lao jiu fang she 
yi shu huan dou hui qu gao fang jia wen ti wai 
dang ju ye hui zai gong gong tou zi yu chuang ye tou zi fang mian na chu ji ji de dui ce 
bao kuo yi zi you jing ji shi fan qu zhong de tao yuan ji chang zi you mao yi gang qu wei zhong xin 
tou guo ji chang ke huo yun shu yu wu liu fu wu de bian jie xing yu guo ji xing 
xi yin xiang guan chan ye zai gang qu fu jin qun ju fa zhan 
ma ying jiu biao shi 
dang ju ye hui tou guo jin rong 
zheng fu ji jin 
deng bu tong guan dao cu jin min jian tou zi 
ta ye jiang qiang diao 
tai wan ji ji can yu qu yu jing ji zheng he de bi yao xing 
ma ying jiu zai zhu ci zhong ye jiang hu yu 
tai wan zheng chu zai guan jian shi ke 
xi wang ge jie yi geng duo zheng mian si wei 
gong tong wei zhen xing jing ji gong xian li liang 
chao ye geng ying juan qi cheng jian 
xiang hu he zuo 
gong tong cu jin jing mao de zi you hua 
ti sheng tai wan jing zheng li 
ju tai wan mei ti bao dao 
yi ming zai qi che lv guan gong zuo de nan zi 
xian qian you yi ming nv tong shi xiang ta jie qian shang wei gui huan 
ta jing chen dui fang shou zhong na wu pin shang lou de shi hou 
cong hou fang huan bao qi yao bu 
hai yong yan yu xing sao rao 
yao dui fang dao qi che lv guan 
shen zhi hai shuo 
wei lai hai hui gei ni qian 
nv fang bu man shi hou jian chi ti gao 
jian fang diao cha fa xian 
zai tao yuan xian ren zhi mou qi che lv guan de you xing nan zi 
jing zai shang ban shi chen dui fang na wu pin shang lou zhi ji 
chen ji cong hou fang huan bao yao bu 
bing hai yao dui fang dao qi ta jian de qi che lv guan 
bu jin ru ci 
you nan hai dui nv tong shi shuo 
ru guo ni tong yi de hua 
yi hou hai ke yi gei ni qian 
nv zi gan jin zheng tuo bing yan ci ju jue 
ping guo ri bao 
nv zi shi hou xiang lao ban tou su 
bei you nan zhi dao hou 
dui fang jing ran hai da dian hua gei ta 
jie guo zheng hao bei nv zi zhang fu de zhi 
qi de qiang guo dian hua zai ling yi tou nu ma ta 
qu kan pian da shou qiang 
sui ji jiu gua duan dian hua 
nv zi shi hou ti gao 
shuang fang tiao jie bu cheng 
xing sao rao fang zhi fa 
bei jing shi jian zuo ri 
dui yu de guo che wang neng fou tuo li wei xian 
jue ding xing de 
ta de tou zhuang zai le yi kuai yan shi shang 
sui ji bei song wang fa guo ge lei nuo bu er de yi yuan jin xing zhi liao 
zui chu you mei ti bao liao cheng ta yin wei dai zhe hua xue tou kui 
shang shi bu shi hen yan zhong 
dan zhi hou you chuan chu shang shi bi yu xiang yan zhong bing xun su e hua de xiao xi 
chu bu ren ding shu ma he ben ren xuan ze fei zheng gui hua xue dao yi ji cao zuo bu dang shi dao zhi shi gu de zhu yao yuan yin 
ta suo dai de tou kui zai shi fa hou yi jing wan quan po sui 
song yuan shi shi shou shu hou 
fa guo ge lei nuo bu er yi yuan zhao kai xin wen fa bu hui 
tong bao shu ma he reng you sheng ming wei xian 
zhu yao wen ti shi 
dao zhi lu nei chu xue 
shu hou jian cha xian shi qi nao bu shuang ce dou you da fan wei de sun shang 
mu qian shu ma he yi bei ren gong hun mi 
yi bang zhu ta nao bu xiao zhong ji ting zhi bu bi yao de nao bu huo dong 
er shen jing wai ke zhuan jia cha ba de si biao shi 
wo men mi qie liu yi shang qing fa zhan 
ji zhe liang jing song 
chong xin qi cheng de yi nian 
zhong guo qiu dui neng gei qiu mi dai lai zen yang de jing xi 
yin shou dao tian qi deng yin su ying xiang 
you yuan guo zu dai li zhu shuai fu bo zhi jiao de zhong guo dui yu yi la ke 
wu zi bie ke si tan he sha te fen zai yi zu 
yi la ke he wu zi bie ke fen bie shi jin nian tu er qi shi qing sai de si qiang he ba qiang 
zhong guo dui chu xian xing shi bu rong le guan 
dong xi ya qiu dui jiang zai jue sai zhong hui shi 
zai zhong chao kai da zhi qian 
er chao ji bei de liang zhi qiu dui hai jiang can jia ya guan xiao zu sai 
ya zhou bei yu xuan sai 
zhong chao sai ji kai shi zhi qian 
zhi yao yi chang ping ju 
guo zu reng you ke neng ping jie xiao zu cheng ji zui hao de di san ming jin ji 
a er jia fu bei 
bi sai zai pu tao ya a er jia fu ju xing 
zhong guo nv zu yu de guo 
bing dao tong zai zu 
you yu you shi jie bei sai shi 
zhong guo dui suo zai de zu hai you mo xi ge 
ge lun bi ya he ni ri li ya 
jue sai ri qi wei ding 
zhong chao qiu dui jiang cong di san lun bi sai kai shi can sai 
jue sai ri qi jiang zai ya guan jue sai zhi hou 
nv zu ya zhou bei 
jue sai jie duan bi sai jiang zai yue nan jin xing 
zhong guo dui yu han guo 
mian dian tong zai zu 
zhong guo dui zhi yao jin ru xiao zu qian liang ming jiu jiang zhi jie huo de shi jie bei can sai zi ge 
liang ge xiao zu de di san ming hai jiang zheng duo yi zhang shi jie bei ru chang quan 
cong er yi yi ge jing sheng qiu de you shi li ya ri ben jin ji 
ji zhe lin ben jian 
mei you ao yun hui 
zhe guo qu de yi nian 
ti tan xian de you xie xiao xiao shi se 
dan ta you you bu yi yang de jing cai 
zhong guo ti tan de nei xie ren 
nei xie jing cai zai zhe an dan de xiao nian li pian you neng ru xing xing zhi huo yi ban 
zhi de he cai 
hui wei yu ju jue 
nei xie zhi de bei zan tan de 
zu qiu shen wei shi jie di yi yun dong 
fang dao guo nei lai kan 
guang zhou heng da ze bu de bu bei ti qi 
chong chu ya zhou 
zou xiang shi jie 
de kou hao zai heng da shen shang de dao le zu gou de ti xian 
cong wei mian zhong chao 
dao ya guan duo kui 
zai dao shi ju bei de xin li shi 
heng da shi zai shi rang zhong guo qiu mi 
da zhang le lian mian 
wang qiu jie tong yang jing cai 
li na da fu hui yong 
shu xi de na jie you hui lai le 
shou ci sha jin le shi jie nian zhong pai ming qian san jia 
chuang zao le xin de li cheng bei 
peng shuai yu xie shu wei de hai xia zu he shou huo le wen wang nv shuang guan jun 
deng shang dian feng 
cheng wei wang tan zui jia nv shuang zu he zhi yi 
zai ba mu guang fang dao quan yun hui shang 
zhong suo zhou zhi 
quan yun hui dui zhong guo yun dong yuan yi yi fei fan 
guo qu you xie yi han de shi zai jing cai bi sai zhi yu 
bu shi hui you xie chou wen chu xian 
ling ren da dao wei kou 
ran er zhi de xin wei de shi ben jie quan yun hui que duo le hao xie zhi de yi xu de jing cai gu shi 
li xiao xia deng qiang shou yi ran xiao yong shan zhan 
li jin zhe deng xin ren bu duan yong xian 
ju jue she hua 
jie yue ban sai cheng wei ben ci quan yun hui de liang dian 
yun dong yuan qi sai jiu ren geng shi yin ren re lei 
ben jie quan yun hui kan cheng du te 
jia hua bu duan 
nei xie zhi de ren shen si de 
mao tou xiao zi sun yang ze rang ren you ai you hen 
sai chang shang de ta da hong da zi 
feng tou wu er 
sai chang xia de ta ze rang ren yi han 
tan lian ai huang fei xun lian 
shi tu mao dun ji hua 
zui rang ren tong qi bu zheng de shi wu zheng jia shi shi jian 
zhe ye rang ta cheng wei shou wei bei ju liu de ao yun guan jun 
chuang xia ling lei li shi 
zhe wu yi shi yi ci jing zhong 
cheng ji shi yun dong yuan suo zhui qiu de 
dan cheng ji bing fei quan bu 
ru he zhu zhong yun dong yuan de zhi ye su zhi yu dao de su zhi di tong bu ti gao 
shi wo men ying gai shen si de wen ti 
heng da you duo guang cai 
guo zu jiu you duo can dan 
mei you zui cha 
zhi you geng cha 
dong ya bei shang yan de duan zan jing cai 
si hao nan yan ka ma qiao xia ke nao ju he ya zhou bei yu xuan sai 
qiu yuan hai shi zhi neng fan xing 
qiu mi yi ran zhi you gan tan 
bu zhi shi zu qiu 
san da qiu de ji ti di mi dou duo shao ling ren wu nai 
zhong guo nan lan zai ya jin sai zhong wu yuan si qiang 
chuang zao zhong guo lan qiu li shi zui cha ji lu 
kan cheng qi zhi de zhong guo nv pai sui ran qing hui le lang ping 
que zai ya jin sai bei tai guo dui dang zai si qiang zhi wai 
xin ao yun zhou qi 
ling ren tan xi 
bei jing shi jian zuo tian bang wan 
shu ma he de zhu zhi yi yuan zai du zhao kai le xin wen fa bu hui 
fa yan ren biao shi 
zai dang di shi jian zuo tian shu ma he jin xing le di er ci shou shu 
bu guo reng ran chu yu wei xian qi 
wai ke yi sheng jing gao shuo 
shu ma he reng ran you da liang chu xue de ke neng xing 
mu qian ta reng ran chu yu ren gong hun mi de zhuang tai 
zhe ge zhuang tai hui chi xu dao yi yuan fang mian ren wei bu zai bi yao de shi ke 
fa yan ren tong shi biao shi 
mu qian shu ma he jiang bu hui bei zhuan yi dao de guo 
zai fa bu hui de zui hou 
fa yan ren hui ying shuo 
bing mei you kan dao shi gu fa sheng shi shu ma he suo pei dai de tou kui shi fou bei sun huai 
di er ci shou shu hua liang xiao shi xiao chu xue zhong 
ju wai mei bao liao 
ben chang fa bu hui you da liang ji zhe he qi ta mei ti ren yuan dao chang can jia 
xian chang fa bu ting ji hu zuo wu xu xi 
zhe jiang shi zi zuo tian de fa bu hui hou 
wo men di yi ci de zhi you guan shu ma he bing qing de zui xin jin zhan 
yi yuan zong fu ze ren biao shi 
wo men gei shu ma he jin xing le yi ge quan xin de nao bu jian cha 
you le yi xie qing wei de jin zhan 
jin tian zao shang wo men jin xing le quan xin de nao bu jian cha 
xian zai yi jing ke yi bu dan fu ren he bu bi yao de feng xian di qing kuang xia jin xing sao miao le 
shi shi zheng ming 
cong yi xie ji xiang shang lai kan 
ta de bing qing shi xiang dui wen ding de 
shu ma he zai ye jian jin xing le 
wai ke shou shu 
fa yan ren biao shi 
cong yi xie ji xiang dang zhong wo men ke yi gan jue dao 
yu zuo tian xiang bi xing shi de dao le hen hao de kong zhi 
jue ding jin xing shou shu shi yi ge kun nan de jue ding 
dan wo men zui zhong hai shi jue ding xiao chu xue ye zhong kuai 
shu ma he de lu nei ya li shui ping you suo gai shan 
dan shi sao miao xian shi di que hai you qi ta de xue ye zhong kuai cun zai 
fa yan ren bu chong biao shi 
gai shou shu zhi liao hua fei le liang ge xiao shi shi jian 
ta men zheng zai dui shu ma he jin xing ding qi jian ce 
bing qing wen ding 
dan reng ke neng da chu xue 
na me shu ma he shi fou yi jing tuo li le sheng ming wei xian ne 
mu qian lai kan qing kuang di que bi zuo tian geng de dao kong zhi 
wo men sui ran wu fa shuo ta yi jing tuo li le sheng ming wei xian 
dan wo men yi jing huo de le geng duo de shi jian he ge ge jiao du de fa zhan he jin bu 
dan shi cong zhan lve he zhuan ye jiao du lai kan 
jie xia lai de shu ge xiao shi li reng ran shi zhi guan zhong yao de shi ke 
shou shu de gan yu shi wo men zai jin tian shang wu bi qi zuo tian lai shuo 
ju mian di que geng jia de dao kong zhi 
mu qian shu ma he zai zhong zheng jian hu bing fang li 
shi qing ke neng bian de hen shun li 
dan ye you xun su e hua de feng xian 
bu guo wo men yi jing ying de le yi dian shi jian 
fa yan ren biao shi 
mu qian shu ma he de qi zi zai bing chuang bian yi zhi pei ban zhe che shen 
ta de jia ren reng ran zai zhe li 
bao kuo ta de qi zi he liang ge hai zi 
wo men ye yi zhi zai dan xin ta de an wei 
xian zai wo men hai bu neng gao su zi ji shuo wo men yi jing ying le 
dan shi wo men bi xu mian dui xian shi 
wo men mu qian hai mei you jian shao zhi liao de li du 
shu ma he mu qian reng ran chu yu hun mi zhuang tai dang zhong 
wo men reng ran you bi xu bao chi yi xie qi ta de zhi liao fang fa 
wai ke yi sheng jie shi shuo 
xian zai shu ma he di qing kuang yu zuo tian yi jing bu tong le 
wo men kan dao le shi jian de jin zhan 
bu guo xian zai di qing kuang reng ran shi zhi guan zhong yao de 
dan shi ta he zuo tian bing bu wan quan xiang tong 
pa ye en jiao shou biao shi 
wo men zai zhe li shi wei le gao su da jia 
dan shi wo men wu fa gao su ni men 
wei lai hui fa sheng shen me 
shu ma he yi zhi chu yu ren gong hun mi zhuang tai 
zhe ge zhuang tai hui yi zhi chi xu dao wo men ren wei bu zai bi yao de shi hou 
jiu mu qian di qing kuang lai kan 
wo mei you shen me yu ce 
sui hou wai ke yi sheng jing gao shuo 
mu qian shu ma he hai shi you da liang chu xue de ji xiang 
shu ma he zan shi bu hui zhuan yi zhi de guo 
pa ye en jiao shou biao shi 
mu qian shu ma he jiang bu hui bei zhuan yi dao de guo 
xian zai wo men you yi ge lai zi yu yi xue jie de ju da zhi chi 
wo men jian xin ta ying gai ji xu bei liu zai zhe li 
wo men xian zai di que you yi ge zhi liao fang an 
bing qie gen ju shu ma he de zhuang kuang bian hua er zai jin xing zhe bu duan de tiao zheng 
wo men xi wang gei zi ji yi dian shi jian 
kan kan qing kuang shi bu shi yu zuo tian bu tong 
dui yu shu ma he jin xing de di er ci shou shu 
pa ye en jiao shou biao shi 
shu ma he de jia ren zai shi xian you guo zi xun he jiao liu 
wo men gao su le ta de jia ren 
shou shu hui you nei xie feng xian 
yi ji nei xie qian zai de feng xian 
zhe xie dou fa sheng zai ta men zui zhong zuo chu shi fou jin xing shou shu de jue ding zhi qian 
ling wai yi wei yi xue zhuan jia biao shi 
dang shu ma he shang zhou ri lai dao zhe li de shi hou 
you yi ge ba hen cun zai 
shi ji shang ta de lu gu shou dao le ying xiang 
wo men kan bu dao ta de tou kui shi fou yi jing bei sun huai le 
zhe ge wen ti ye shi hui ying le wai jie suo guan xin de shi gu fa sheng shi shu ma he suo pei dai de tou kui shi fou bei zhuang sui de wen ti 
fa yan ren biao shi 
xiang bi yu zuo tian 
wo men lve wei bu zai na me dan xin le 
ni men bi xu yun xu wo men de yi xue ren yuan he zuo gong zuo 
ru guo you qi ta xiao xi xu yao dui wai gong bu 
wo men hui zai du zhao kai xin wen fa bu hui 
er ju fa xin she bao dao 
shu ma he zai hua xue shi gu fa sheng shi shi yu yi kuai yan shi fa sheng zhuang ji de 
er wei le xiao chu shu ma he nao bu xue ye zhong kuai de ying xiang 
ta bei jin xing ren gong hun mi de cao zuo 
sheng bu chu bao bao 
shi nan nv shuang fang gong tong de ze ren 
bu neng yi wei ze guai nv fang 
yin wei nan fang ye ke neng you wen ti 
jing zi he luan zi 
que yi bu ke 
nan xing bu yun de yuan yin hen duo 
yin wei shen ti ben shen de yi chang xian xiang 
zao cheng yi wan gong neng bu zheng chang 
wu fa shun li zhi zao jing zi 
yi mei du deng xing bing gan ran hou zao cheng de hou yi zheng ju duo 
ruo xiao shi hou de dao sai xian yan 
qi zhong de bing du ye ke neng ying xiang yi wan gong neng 
shi nan xing wu fa zhi zao jing zi 
nan xing bu yu de yuan yin hen da yuan yin qu jue yu hou tian de gong zuo he sheng huo huan jing 
ta men de zhi ye ke neng jiu shi zao cheng bu yun de zui da xiong shou 
jiu zuo rang nei ku cheng 
jing chang zai hu bei 
he nan liang di chuan suo 
yi wo fang xiang pan jiu shi liu qi ge xiao shi 
wei le jie sheng you fei 
lao xu hen shao kai kong tiao 
bao chi yi ge zi shi jiu zuo shi si ji men de gong xing 
gao wan xue ye hui liu bu chang 
bian hui chu xian gao wen 
zai jia shang si ji bu shi yao huan dang 
shuang tui mo ca ye hui chan sheng re liang 
zong he yin su zao cheng le si ji de nei ku cheng le 
gao wan zai gao yu qi zheng chang gong zuo wen du de 
zi ran bu hui lao lao shi shi 
ying chou duo jing zi bei jiu jing shang 
gong wu yuan shen fen 
song zi guan yin que chi chi bu gei mian zi 
wu nai zhi xia 
fu qi tong shi zou jin yi yuan 
fang xian sheng bei cha chu jing ye mi du yi chang 
fang xian sheng ping shi ying chou yao he jiu 
bu ying chou zi ji ye yao he 
yong ta de hua shuo 
mi niao wai ke you ge fei chang zhu ming de xiao shu shi yan 
ji gei shi yan shu mei tian guan bai jiu 
xiao shu de gao wan yi jing chu xian le bu ke ni de sun shang 
jiu jing ke yi chuan guo gao wan zhi jie shang hai jing zi 
shi jing zi shu liang jian shao 
huo li jiang di 
ji xing jing zi 
si jing de bi lv sheng gao 
jiu zhan jia zhong jing suo jing mai qu zhang ying xiang jing zi fa yu 
yi wei dai zhuo yan jing 
mian xiang si wen de nan zi zuo zai zheng da yi fu yuan mi niao wai ke de zhen shi li 
huan zhe xing huang
