shi yi ming chu zhong yu wen jiao shi 
yin bu yu qian lai jiu zhen 
gai ke zhu ren yi shi 
he nan sheng nan ke xue hui zhu ren wei yuan zhang wei xing jiao shou tong guo shou zhen he chao jian cha que ding huang xian sheng huan you jing suo jing mai qu zhang 
er hou you liao jie dao 
jing ye chang gui hua yan jie guo chu lai le 
jing ye mi du ming xian jiao di 
yin wei jing suo jing mai qu zhang dao zhi bu yu de 
qun ti fei chang pang da 
gao wan chu de xue ye xu yao tong guo jing suo jing mai hui liu zhi shen zang 
xue ye hui liu shi jing mai ban hui zu zhi qi xiang xia liu 
dan ru guo jing mai ban chu le wen ti 
bian hui you shao xu xu yao shen zang jing hua de xue ye hui liu zhi gao wan fu jin 
ru guo huan you jing suo jing mai qu zhang de jiao shi zhang qi zhan li 
xue ye zhong de dai xie fei wu bian hui ying xiang jing zi sheng cheng he fa yu 
wen du guo gao 
xiang dui jing zi huo dong li jiu jiao ruo 
chu shi de gong zuo huan jing zhong you hen duo huo lu 
shi nei wen du xiang dui zeng gao xu duo 
dang jing zi chang qi chu yu gao wen huan jing zhong 
hui jian ruo qi huo dong li 
ye jiu rong yi zao cheng bu yun 
gong zuo zhi yu jin liang yuan li huo yuan 
gong zuo shi ye bu yao kao lu zi tai jin 
zui hao neng jiang lu zi tiao zheng dao shi dang de wen du 
bu yao ba wen du she ding guo gao 
mian dui yi shang zhi ye suo yin fa de bu yun zheng 
wo men zui zhong yao de jiu shi fang 
neng yu fang nan xing bu yu ma 
zen me yu fang 
yao an shi jie zhong yi miao 
liang hao de ge ren wei sheng xi guan 
yi yu fang ge zhong wei hai nan xing sheng yu neng li de chuan ran bing 
ru liu xing xing sai xian yan 
xing chuan bo ji bing deng 
yao zhang wo yi ding de xing zhi shi 
liao jie nan xing sheng li te zheng he bao jian zhi shi 
ru guo fa xian gao wan you bu tong yu ping shi de bian hua ru 
ao tu bu ping 
yi ding yao ji shi zhen zhi 
ru guo nin jing chang jie chu fang she xing wu zhi 
gao wen ji du wu 
yi ding yao yao yan ge an zhao cao zuo gui ding he fang hu zhang cheng zuo ye 
qian wan bu yao shu hu da yi 
ru guo jin qi xiang yao hai zi 
zui hao neng gou tuo li ci lei gong zuo ban nian hou zai sheng yu 
gao wan shi yi ge hen jiao nen de qi guan 
ru guo wen du gao 
jiu hui ying xiang jing zi de chan sheng 
suo yi ren he neng gou shi gao wan wen du sheng gao de yin su dou yao bi mian ru 
zhang shi jian qi zi xing che 
pao re shui zao 
chuan niu zai ku deng 
gai bian bu liang de xi guan 
jie yan jie jiu 
bu yao chi guo yu you ni de dong xi 
fou ze hui ying xiang ni de xing yu 
ling wai hai yao zhu yi bi mian jie chu sheng huo dang zhong de you du wu pin 
cong gan xi dian na hui lai de yi fu yao fang zhi ji tian zai chuan 
yin wei gan xi ji hui ying xiang nan xing de xing gong neng 
yao zhong shi hun qian de ti jian 
zao qi fa xian yi chang 
ke yi bi mian hun hou de tong ku 
jie hun yi hou yao jing chang he ni de qi zi jiao liu xing sheng huo zhong suo yu dao de wen ti 
hu xiang pei he 
hu xiang liang jie 
zhe yang hen duo jing shen xing yang wei huo zao xie jiu ke yi bi mian 
jing ye xu shi xin ling de chuang kou 
ya chi he she tou neng gou fan ying tang niao bing 
mian yi xi tong wen luan 
he er meng fen mi shi tiao 
yao wu lan yong deng wen ti de mou xie zui zao qi zheng zhuang 
er qie you shi zhe zhong fan ying yuan zao yu huan zhe zi ji de yi shi 
ya chi yu ai zheng 
duo xiang yan jiu biao ming 
ya yi ke qi dao yu jing zuo yong 
hua er jie ri bao 
ta ceng gen ju huan zhe shang qian chi nei biao mian fa lang zhi shou fu shi di qing kuang 
zhen duan chu qi li ai zheng bing li 
ru guo ya yin chuang kou yi liang ge xing qi dou bu neng yu he 
huo zhe mou yi qu yu de nian mo zhang shi jian cheng bai se huo zhe hong se 
er bu shi zheng chang de fen hong se de shi hou 
xu yao jiu yi yi pai chu kou qiang ai de ke neng 
qiao zhi yi sheng huan fa xian guo jia ji ben bing an cheng yin zheng zhuang 
jia ji ben bing an cheng yin zheng 
you cheng zhi wei 
ke yao cheng yin de ren 
ya chi wai ceng hui chu xian yi zhong te you de fu shi zheng zhuang 
ya chi yu tang niao bing 
hen duo tang niao bing huan zhe de ya yin yu ya chi jiao jie de di fang kan qi lai bai liang bai liang de 
chi gen song dong 
er qie man kou dou shi ru ci 
zhuan jia biao shi 
ya yin wen ti he gao xue tang bu jin yuan zi xiang tong de sheng huo xi guan 
liang zhe zhi jian hai hui xiang hu jia zhong bing qing 
ya yin gan ran fa yan hou 
tang niao bing huan zhe hui geng nan kong zhi zi shen de xue tang shui ping 
er gao xue tang hui jia zhong zhu ya he ya yin wen ti 
yin fa geng duo yan zheng 
ya chi bu qi yi you fa she ai 
she ai duo fa sheng yu she yuan 
qi ci wei she jian 
she bei ji she gen deng chu 
chang wei kui yang xing huo jin run xing 
yi ban e xing cheng du jiao gao 
jin run xing jiao qiang 
chang bo ji she ji 
zhi shi she yun dong shou xian 
jin shi ji tun yan jun fa sheng kun nan 
she ai xiang hou ke yi qin fan she e gong ji bian tao ti 
wan qi she ai ke man yan zhi kou di ji he gu 
shi quan she gu ding 
yu huan zhe de ya chi ji xing you guan 
qi she bing huan chu you jing chang yu nei ce qing xie de ya chi jie chu shi 
ji cun zai zhe ya chi yu she bing huan chu yi chang jie chu xian xiang 
xing cheng she bu man xing sun shang bing bian 
qi zhong you de hai jiu zhi bu yu 
zhuan jia men ren wei 
ya chi dui she bu de chang qi jie chu mo sun 
ke shi she tou ju bu xing cheng man xing bing zao 
qing zhuang nian nan xing xi yan 
yin jiu jiao duo 
zhe xie fu za de you hai yin su zhang shi jian ci ji sun hai she bing zao 
ke shi she bing huan chu de zu zhi xi bao zhu jian fa sheng ji bian 
zui hou bian ke neng dao zhi ai bian de fa sheng 
yi xue zhuan jia gao cheng ren men 
yi dan fa xian kou qiang nei you ya chi de tu xie 
ya chi ji xing 
xiang she duan sheng zhang xun su de zhi chi ji yi chang pai lie xian xiang 
you qi shi chang qi de ya chi yu she de di chu 
mo ca huo peng yao xian xiang 
yao yin qi gao du zhong shi 
ji zao dao yi yuan kou qiang ke jian cha 
jin xing bi yao de jiao xing chu li 
yi fang huan yu wei ran 
ya zhou bing zhi xin zang bing 
yue lai yue duo di zheng ju biao ming 
ya zhou bing yu xin xue guan ji bing zhi jian ye cun zai zhe bi ran de lian xi 
ya yin fa yan hui dao zhi - fan ying dan bai zeng duo 
er - fan ying dan bai pian gao bei ren wei shi xin zang bing de yi ge zhi bing yin su 
yan jiu ren yuan yi jing fa xian 
ya ban zhong de xi jun hui zu se dong mai 
yuan xian yi wei ta zhi shi yi ge ou ran yin su 
ru jin fa xian ta qi shi shi zhi bing de feng xian yin su 
kou qiang zhong de xi jun ke neng tong guo xue ye xun huan qu dao ren ti ge chu 
yin fa ji bing 
zhe zheng shi wei he yi sheng hui jian yi kao lv jie shou fei ji xing wai ke shou shu de huan zhe xian ba xu yao chu li de kou qiang wen ti jie jue diao 
mei guo xin zang xie hui yi jing bu zai jian yi li huan er jian ban tuo chui 
xin zang ban mo zai xin shi shou suo qi wu fa zheng chang bi he 
de bing ren zai kou qiang ji bing wei zhi yu qian ding qi fu yong kang sheng su 
yin wei xian zai de kan fa shi 
zai ding qi xi ya 
ri chang shua ya shen zhi ju jue shi wu de guo cheng zhong 
kou qiang xi jun sui shi ke neng jin ru ren ti de xue ye xun huan xi tong 
ya yi neng jian cha ai zi 
mei guo xin zang xie hui 
mei guo yi xue hui he mei guo jiao xing wai ke xie hui jun hu yu jie shou guo quan guan jie zhi huan shu de huan zhe zai wang hou mei ci kan ya yi shi 
ying ti qian yi ge xiao shi fu yong yi li kang sheng su 
yi jiang di shu hou gan ran feng xian 
yi xie ya yi biao shi 
ta men hai xu yao sui shi liao jie huan zhe fu yao de zui xin qing kuang 
kang ning ji ke dao zhi kou qiang da chu xue 
chang yong yu zhi liao gu zhi shu song zheng de shuang lin suan yan yao wu ke zhi he gu huai si 
zai jin xing kou qiang shou shu qian 
zhe liang lei yao wu dou bi xu zan ting fu yong 
gai tong dao zu zhi ji he yi xie xiao yan yao ke dao zhi ya yin yan zhong kui yang 
kang yi yu zheng 
hua xue liao fa deng zhi liao yong yao ke dao zhi kou gan 
dao zhi ping shi ke yi bao hu ya chi de tuo ye fen mi jian shao 
cong er ke neng fa sheng da mian ji zhu ya 
zai zhe zhong qing kuang xia 
ke yi tong guo tian jia fu hua wu jiang di yin kou gan er yin fa zhu ya de feng xian 
mei guo ji bing kong zhi yu yu fang zhong xin jian yi ya yi ti gong ai zi bing du 
yin wei gan ran ai zi bing du de mou xie chu qi zheng zhao jiu chu xian zai kou qiang nei 
bao kuo zhen jun gan ran he kou qiang bing sun 
ya yi zhi xu yong mian qian dui kou qiang jin xing shi mo qu yang 
dan huang se ya chi cai zui jian kang 
zhuan jia jian yi 
chu le yang cheng liang hao de sheng huo xi guan he ding qi dao yi yuan jin xing kou qiang jian cha zhi wai 
ri chang de kou qiang hu li he bao jian geng wei zhong yao 
ye shi zui you xiao de yu fang fang shi 
shi chang shang you hen duo de ya gao guang gao 
you zhu da mei bai xiao guo de 
ye you zhen dui kang guo min he qing re qu huo deng gong xiao de 
zhuan jia ren wei 
zhe shi yi ge yan zhong de wu qu 
yi xue shang ren wei dan huang se de ya chi cai shi jian kang de 
guo fen zhui qiu mei bai shi xin li zuo yong 
fan er hui xi sheng ya chi jian kang 
ya zhou bing shi 
yin xing sha shou 
ju zhuan jia jie shao 
da liang de shi zheng yan jiu yi jing zheng shi 
ya zhou yan ke yi ying xiang xin zang 
shen zang deng zhong yao zang qi de gong neng 
dui yun fu er yan 
ya zhou bing bu jin wei hai zi shen jian kang 
hai ke neng dao zhi di ti zhong ying er chu sheng deng wei xian 
wan quan ke yi yong 
yin xing sha shou 
lai xing rong ya zhou bing de wei hai 
bu liang de sheng huo xi guan shi dao zhi cheng nian ren ran shang ya zhou ji huan de zui kui huo shou 
zhuan jia zhi chu 
jing shen jin zhang 
wu gui lv zuo xi 
yi ji bu zheng que de kou qiang hu li xi guan dou ke neng re 
dan hen duo ren dui ci bu wei yi 
zhi dao bing bian qin ru ya zhou xian wei 
dao zhi fa yan 
ya chi song dong shen zhi tuo luo shi cai zhong shi 
zhuan jia ti xing bi xu dui ya zhou bing de wei hai zu gou de zhong shi 
zhuan jia jie shao 
yin qi ya zhou bing de zhu yao yin su shi ya jun ban he ya shi 
jin kao shu kou he cao shuai de shua ya shi bu neng che di qing chu de 
bi xu tong guo xi ya qu chu 
yi ban yi nian dao yi nian ban xi yi ci ya 
shua ya xi guan bu tai hao 
rong yi zhang ya shi de ren qun ze ban nian xi yi ci 
hen duo peng you xi huan he ge zhong ge yang de yin liao 
qi zhong tan suan yin liao dui ya chi de shang hai shi hen da de 
chang qi da liang de yin yong tan suan lei de yin liao ke neng hui dao zhi ya chi da mian ji de fu shi 
you qi shi xiao hai zi yao te bie te bie de zhu yi 
shao he huo zhe bu he tan suan lei yin liao 
he wan li ji shu kou dou shi fang zhi tan suan lei yin liao qin hai ya chi de bi yao cuo shi 
da bu fen de ren dou shi dan du zi wei de 
yi ban ye dou ren wei bi ci dou shi shi yong tong yi ge fang fa lai zi wei 
dan shi ji shang que you xu duo bu tong de zi wei fang shi 
ru jiang suo you de zi wei fang shi jia yi zheng li 
zai nan xing fang mian da lve ke gui na wei xia lie shu zhong 
yi wu gen shou zhi wo zhu yin jing 
chong fu zuo huo sai yun dong 
zai suo you zi wei fang shi zhong 
huo sai shi zui wei pu bian 
yin jing zui min gan de bu wei shi gui tou ji qi xia fang de gou zhuang bu fen 
yi shou zhi jian an ya rou ca zhe xie bu wei 
zhe jiu shi an ya xing 
shen ti fu wo chuang shang 
ba yin jing ya zai chuang shang huo zhen tou shang 
ci shi yao bu ke yi shang xia qi fu zuo chu xing jiao zhi zi shi 
jiu shi hun he qian shu ji zhong fang fa lai jin xing zi wei 
huo zhe yi xu lai zuo 
zhe shi dui ying dan chun fa de yi zhong fang fa 
jiu bi xu dui zi ji de lian fu ze 
ren lian chu le ji lu xi nu ai le 
ye hui shen shen yin ke yi ge ren de xing ge he ren sheng 
cong mian xiang kui tan ren de ge xing xin li xing wei 
bing bu shi kong xue lai feng 
ai er lan xue zhe ke lin si ti chu 
yi ge ren lian bu de fa yu shi cong yi ding cheng du shang dai biao zhe ta de de cheng zhang shi 
lian pang bian kuan 
shuo ming xin zhi zhu jian cheng shu ; xia ba zeng da 
gan qing ye bian de feng fu ; er lian jia he mei mao tu chu 
ze biao shi ci ren ge xing fen ming 
pan ni xing jia zhong 
bu tong lian xing de ren zhi xing neng li ye cun zai cha bie 
zhe shen zhi ke yi zuo wei tiao xuan yun dong yuan de biao zhun zhi yi 
ju ti lai shuo 
de ren shi tian sheng de le tian pai 
da duo xing qing shuang lang 
dai ren you shan ; dan shi ta men xin chang ruan 
rong yi shou dao tian yan mi yu de you huo 
fang lian de ren lian bu xian tiao qing xi 
gei ren gan jing li luo de gan jue 
tong chang yong you min rui de guan cha li ; dan shi 
fang lian de nan xing gong ji xing qiang 
xi huan du lai du wang 
er nv xing hui xian de yan li 
gei ren nan yi jie jin de gan jue 
gua zi lian shi dong fang nv xing zui chong shang de 
biao zhun lian xing 
ye shi han guo zui shou huan ying de zheng rong mu biao 
ta men duo shi wan mei zhu yi zhe 
yan yi lv yi 
kuan yi dai ren ; dan ta men wang wang zi zun xin hen qiang 
ru guo shou dao shang hai 
hou guo ke neng hen yan zhong 
zhang lian de ren xian de chen wen 
kan jiu le fei chang you wei dao 
ta men tian sheng zi xin man man 
xi huan dang ling dao 
dan bu tai hui ti liang ta ren 
shen zhi jing chang sun hai ren ji guan xi 
dao san jiao xing lian de ren shu yu huan xiang pai 
que que fa shi ji xing dong li 
ta men xi huan fu xiang lian pian 
dan que nan yu shi xian meng xiang 
ren de lian xing yuan yuan bu zhi shang mian ji zhong 
lian xing chu tan xing ge jin neng dang can kao 
qie bu ke yi gai er lun 
jiang qing zai fa ting shang 
ben wen zhai zi 
deng xiao ping gai bian zhong guo 
ye yong lie zhu 
jiang xi ren min chu ban she 
zi cong hua guo feng na chu mao ze dong de shou shu 
bao kan shang pu tian gai de xuan chuan zhe yi 
zui gao zhi shi 
mao ze dong na zhang zhi tiao shang liu ge liao cao de zi 
fang fu cheng le mao ze dong 
cheng le hua guo feng ling xiu di wei de zhong yao zhi zhu 
zui ke xi de shi 
mao ze dong gei hua guo feng xie na liu ge zi de shi hou 
mei you she ying ji zhe zai chang 
yin ci ye jiu mei you liu xia dang shi de zhao pian 
mei you zhao pian 
fan er cheng le hua jia men fa hui chuang zuo xiang xiang li de zui hao kong jian 
zhu ming hua jia liu wen xi he qin tian jian 
huang nai yuan he zuo 
chuang zuo le you hua 
tian bu le zhe yi kong bai 
zhu ming guo hua jia li yan sheng jing xin chuang zuo le zhong guo hua 
ji hu jia jia hu hu dou tie zhe zhe fu hua 
shang hai wen hui chu ban she chu ban zhang han zhi de 
kua guo hou hou de da hong men 
ti chu le yi yi 
shi qiao guan hua de fu ren 
qiao guan hua shi zhong guo zhu ming wai jiao jia 
ta ceng can jia le zhong mei jian li wai jiao guan xi de hui tan 
bing can yu ni ke song fang hua 
shang hai gong bao de tan pan deng yi xi lie zhong da huo dong 
qiao guan hua shi mao ze dong gei hua guo feng xie 
shi de zhi qing zhe 
zhang han zhi zai ta de hui yi lu 
kua guo hou hou de da hong men 
jiang shu le ta suo zhi dao de 
de lai li : 
quan dang dan xin zhang chun qiao hui jie ren zong li 
dang zhong yang xuan bu you hua guo feng ren dai zong li shi 
wo reng ji de guan hua yu huang zhen can jia xuan bu ren ming hui yi qi hui dao wo men jia shi xing fen bu yi 
yi ding yao wo na jiu lai zhu he 
dang shi duo shao ren ba xi wang ji tuo zai hua guo feng shen shang 
jie xia lai de shi qing 
wo zhi jin ye nong bu ming bai 
wo zhi zhi dao yi zhang wu xing de da wang qiao qiao bu kai 
guan hua he wo yi bu bu luo ru le yi ge ju da de xian jing 
jiang qing tu ran yi chang ji ji 
bu duan ba guan hua 
pei tong kan xi 
song hua song cai 
zai zhe qi jian 
jiang qing shuo mao zhu xi na bian gao su ta 
shuo shi zhu xi de yi jian 
mi shu bu zai jie shou wo men de cai liao 
bu fen lao gan bu zai wo men jia shang yi 
dou gan dao wu ke nai he 
zhi neng ru ci 
mei you ren chu lai shuo zhe shi mao zhu xi de zhi shi 
mei you ren chu lai cheng ren zhe dou shi hen duo lao tong zhi shang liang guo de jue ding 
ye mei you ren chu lai shuo dang shi qiao guan hua de gu zhu yi zhi bao quan le wai jiao bu de lao gan bu zai 
yun dong zhong wei shou chong ji 
jiang qing zhuan er da si zhi ze qiao guan hua 
bing yang yan yao che ta de zhi 
na shi hou mao zhu xi hai zai shi 
wo men mo mo de cheng shou zhe zhong zhong de qu ru he bu gong 
guan hua zhong yu kua le 
ta xian shi xin ji geng se 
jie zhe huan fei ai 
ye xu you yi jian shi ye shi qiao guan hua bi xu bei qing chu de yin su 
mao zhu xi hui jian xin xi lan zong li ma er deng 
hua guo feng pei jian 
guan hua hui jia 
gao su wo shuo hui jian qian 
hua guo feng yao ta zai ren da hui tang deng hou 
mao zhu xi de jian kang qing kuang yi hen bu hao 
shuo hua yi hen bu qing chu 
you shi xu yao xie xia lai 
zai ci zhi qian 
zhe zhong qing kuang yi cun zai yi xie shi hou 
mao zhu xi shen bian de ren jiu jian nei xie tiao zi shou cang 
wo ceng dui guan hua shuo 
na tian wo ye na ji zhang liu zuo ji nian 
guan hua shuo : 
ni qian wan bu yao qu na zhe xie tiao zi 
zhe xie tiao zi dou mei you shang xia wen 
jia ruo zhu xi bai nian zhi hou 
you ren duan zhang qu yi li yong mou zhang tiao zi 
er ta qia qia zai ni shou li 
ni ru he shi hao 
guan hua shuo : 
zhu xi jin tian you xie le san zhang tiao zi 
shi zai wai bin zou hou dan du yu hua zong li tan guo nei wen ti shi xie de 
bei hua zong li shou qi lai le 
ta shuo jian wan wai bin 
hua guo feng zong li lai dao fu jian ting shi 
zhao guo qu fang zhen ban 
ye xu shi ming yun zhu ding de jie shu 
guan hua pian pian wen hua guo feng zhe 
shi jiang shen me shi 
dang shi hua shuo ta hui bao le si chuan 
yun dong gao de bu shen ru 
re zhong da nei zhan 
ni jiang liang pai jiao dao bei jing 
yao ta men ji zhong 
zhu xi lei le 
jiu xie le zhe ge tiao 
jiao wo qu ban le 
dang tian wan shang 
zheng zhi ju kai hui chuan da mao zhu xi hui jian wai bin tan hua ji qi ta zhi shi 
guan hua hui dao jia shi dui wo shuo : 
you jian shi hen qi guai 
hua zong li xia wu ming ming gei wo kan san zhang tiao zi 
dao le zheng zhi ju hui shang 
ta zhi rang da jia chuan yue le liang zhang 
mei you na chu lai 
wo sui kou shuo : 
ni bu shi shuo guo zhe lei mei you shang xia wen de tiao zi ri hou hen rong yi zuo ren he jie shi ma 
guo feng tong zhi wei ren zhong hou 
wo cai ta shi chu yu qian xu 
bu na chu lai 
ci shi wo men ye jiu dan wang le 
guan hua zheng can jia wan lian da hui yi hou shun fang yi 
zai ba li shi ting dao xiao xi 
ta yu ceng tao da shi ju bei chang yin 
ta na li hui xiang dao ci shi de hua guo feng yi dui wai jiao bu ling dao shuo 
qiao guan hua da gai yao tao pao 
wo men ke yi pai jia fei ji ba ta lao po song qu 
ta ba na san zhang tiao zi fa dao quan guo 
bei shuo cheng shi mao zhu xi zhi ding ta dang jie ban ren de yi ju 
min gan de xi fang ji zhe xiu dao le yi dian qi fen 
zai ba li wen guan hua 
ting shuo ni hui guo hou you ma fan 
guan hua yang tian da xiao 
shuo ta he quan guo ren min yi yang 
xin qing shu chang 
zhe shi wu ji zhi tan 
ta you na li zhi dao 
ci shi hua guo feng yi xiang wai jiao bu dang zu shuo 
qiao guan hua shi zui xian kan dao 
zhe zhang tiao zi de 
ta ming zhi zhu xi de yi jian 
que di zhi mao zhu xi zhi shi 
bing xiang wai jiao bu dang zu feng suo xiao xi 
he xin ti shi 
yuan ming chen wei ying 
hu nan jiang hua ren 
zhong yang wen ku 
de guan li gong zuo 
ta qu shi hou bei zhui ren wei ge ming lie shi 
ben wen lai yuan 
zhong guo xin wen wang 
yi hao ji mi 
dang an bao wei zhe 
yuan ming chen wei ying 
hu nan jiang hua ren 
zhong yang wen ku 
de guan li gong zuo 
ta qu shi hou bei zhui ren wei ge ming lie shi 
yi pi mei you zhi bian de wen jian 
jin tian jing jing de tang zai zhong yang dang an guan 
ta men ceng shi zhong guo gong chan dang de 
yi hao ji mi 
nang kuo zhong gong zao qi de ji hu suo you zhong yao wen jian 
zai zhong gong nei bu 
ta men bei cheng wei 
zhong yang wen ku 
hen nan xiang xiang zhe xie fan huang de zhi pian 
neng zai guo nei wai fan dong shi li xue xing wei jiao xia de shang hai wan hao bao cun xia lai 
zhong yang wen ku 
zhong yang ling dao ji gou you shang hai qian wang rui jin 
zhong yang mi shu chu zhi shu de dang an que yin an quan yuan yin wu fa sui xing 
bei xun bu fang zhua bu de chen wei ren huo shi chu yu 
yin shou xing guo zhong 
you ran shang yan zhong fei bing 
zu zhi shang an pai ta jing xin xiu yang 
ta que zai san ken qiu chong fan gong zuo gang wei 
zhu dong dang shang 
zhong yang wen ku 
ta he ai ren han hui ying kai shi du men du hu 
li qun suo ju 
wei yan ren er mu 
ta men zai dang de zi zhu xia 
kai le yi jia xiang xiu dian 
ta men bai tian jing shang 
dao le wan shang 
ze fan suo men chuang 
zhe yan guang liang 
zheng li zhe xie dang de zui gao ji mi 
ceng jing huo yue de ta men bu zai can jia dang de hui yi 
ye bu zai gong zhong chang he pao tou lu mian 
wei le bao zheng ji mi wen jian wan wu yi shi 
chen wei ren fu fu shen zhi zai jia li ge shang le yi ge chang nian liu you huo zhong de lu zi 
ta men xiang hu ding zhu 
yi dan zao yu bu ce 
ning yuan fen lou shao fang 
ye bu neng rang yi ge zhi pian luo dao di ren shou li 
you yu pan tu gao mi 
han hui ying luo ru di shou 
chen wei ren ma shang zhuan yi 
zhong yang wen ku 
ta yu zu zhi shi qu le lian xi 
jing ji lai yuan ye bei qie duan 
ta ji hu dian dang guang le jia zhong suo you zhi qian de dong xi 
dai zhe hai zi yi tian kao liang dun hong shu chong ji 
wei le bian yu mi cang 
ta jiang wen jian quan bu yong bao zhi 
xiao zi zhong chao yi bian 
jian diao si bian de kong bai 
fen lei gui dang 
zhe nian dong tian 
han hui ying hu ran hui lai le 
ta zai yu zhong shou jin ku xing 
dan jian zhen bu qu 
zhong yu meng guo di ren 
huo shi hui jia 
chen wei ren ye he zu zhi chong xin jie shang le guan xi 
bing jiang bao cun wan hao de 
zhong yang wen ku 
yi jiao zu zhi 
chen wei ren shen ti yi xu ruo bu kan 
da kou tu xie 
xin zhong guo cheng li hou 
chen wei ren bei zhui ren wei ge ming lie shi 
zhong yang wen ku 
li jing zhuan yi 
bao guan zhe ye shu yi qi ren 
zui zhong zai yi ge ge gong chan dang yuan de shou zhong an ran zou jin xin zhong guo 
mao ze dong du shu 
ben wen lai yuan 
zhong guo xin wen wang 
ou yang chun yan 
zhuan jia tan mao ze dong de yue du shi 
san lian shu dian jin ri chu ban 
mao ze dong yue du shi 
zuo zhe chen jin shi zhong gong zhong yang wen xian yan jiu shi fu zhu ren 
ta duo nian lai cong shi mao ze dong he zhong gong dang shi wen xian yan jiu yi ji dian ying 
dian shi wen xian pian zhuan gao 
zhu shu he ying shi zuo pin duo ci huo jiang 
chen jin ren wei 
mao ze dong de yue du shi 
cong yi ge fang mian fan ying le ta de jing shen cheng zhang shi 
ren shi fa zhan shi 
si xiang sheng hua shi 
zhi shi yu yue he qing gan biao da shi 
mao ze dong yi sheng jiu jing du le duo shao shu 
du guo nei xie shu 
wu fa zuo wan bei tong ji 
dan you ju ke cha de shi 
mao ze dong qu shi hou 
zai zhong nan hai zhu chu liu cun de cang shu 
yi xie shu zhong liu xia le ta de pi zhu he quan hua 
ta du er wei cang 
yi ji du guo cang guo dan hou lai diu shi de shu ji 
geng bu zhi ji he 
mao ze dong de yue du si hu yi ke ye bu neng ting xia lai 
mao ze dong nian shi yi gao 
ta bu duan rang ren ba yi xie jing dian shu ji yin cheng da zi ben lai du 
hui jian ri ben shou xiang tian zhong jiao rong shi 
mao ze dong zhi zhe dui ji zai shu fang li de shu shuo 
wo you du bu wan de shu 
mei tian bu du shu jiu wu fa sheng huo 
ta yan jing bu hao 
hai zhuan men qing yi wei da xue lao shi gei ta nian shu 
mao ze dong yi jing shuo bu chu hua lai 
dan nao zi qing xing 
reng ran jian chi kan shu 
ta dang shi kan de shi 
rong zhai sui bi 
he gang gang bian yi chu ban de ri ben 
san mu wu fu ji qi zheng jian 
rong zhai sui bi 
shi mao ze dong yi sheng ai bu shi shou de yi ben shu 
san mu wu fu dang shi zheng zai jing xuan ri ben zi min dang zong cai 
kan lai mao ze dong lin zhong qian hen guan zhu ci shi 
gen ju bing li ji lu 
ta quan shen dou cha le guan zi 
shi er hun mi 
shi er qing xing 
qing xing guo lai jiu kan shu 
du guo duo guo ban ben de 
na po lun chuan 
hen duo ren dou zhi dao mao ze dong xi huan du zhong guo li shi 
ta dui xi fang li shi ye xiang dang guan zhu 
ta zui xi huan du de shi fa guo jin dai shi 
zui gan xing qu de li shi ren wu shi na po lun 
gen ju shen bian gong zuo ren yuan hui yi 
mao ze dong ceng yue du guo fa guo 
e guo deng duo guo chu ban de 
na po lun chuan 
xiao qian fu ren wen jie ruo ye tan dao 
wei le jin yi bu yan jiu na po lun 
mao ze dong xiang kan fa guo fu er xie de 
na po lun lun 
ci shu wu zhong yi ben 
you guan bu men bian zhao dao le xiao qian 
gan xiao diao hui bei jing 
da zhi yi zhou de shi jian jiu chu le da zi ben 
song gei mao ze dong yue du 
mao ze dong dang shi hai zhu yin guo yi zhong liang han shi qi ce de xian zhuang da zi ben 
na po lun chuan 
gong ling dao gan bu can yue 
ji zhe fa xian 
wu mei deng guang ye mei you le wang nian de hao hua 
dou shi yi da ping mu wei zhu yao bei jing 
yan hua ye bu zai cheng wei zhu jue 
cheng du shang bao ji zhe qiu jun feng 
zhe bian you han hong yu huang xiao ming 
na bian you hua chen yu 
zhe bian you wang feng 
na bian you yu quan 
zai xian yu ling he jie jian ban wan hui de qian ti xia 
zuo tian jin guan zhi you dong fang wei shi 
hu nan wei shi he guang dong wei shi san jia ju ban kua nian wan hui 
zuo wan dian shi ping mu ye shi xiang dang re nao 
hu nan wei shi you shi nian de chao nv kuai nan qi ju 
dong fang wei shi ze you huang xiao ming he han hong de dai dui 
guang dong wei shi ze you hua ti ren wu wang feng 
rang guan zhong de yao kong qi mang lu qi lai 
ji zhe liao jie dao 
he wang nian shao qian qing ming xing bu tong de shi 
zhe ci de kua nian wan hui dou yi jie jian wei zhu 
hu nan wei shi he dong fang wei shi zhu da 
biao yan jia bin da duo shi wei shi zi ji jie mu tui chu de yi ren 
er wei yi da ming xing pai de guang dong wei shi ze gao su cheng du shang bao ji zhe 
ci ci yao qing de ming xing he wei shi fang mian you he zuo 
chu chang fei ye bi shi chang jia jiang di le bu shao 
you xie ming xing shen zhi mei you shou chu chang fei 
ji zhe ye fa xian 
wu mei deng guang ye mei you le wang nian de hao hua 
dou shi yi da ping mu wei zhu yao bei jing 
yan hua ye bu zai cheng wei zhu jue 
zhu li qian wai chu gou wu zhu li qian wai chu gou wu 
hai zhuan men yu bao biao diao huan wei zhi qi tu duo bi ji zhe ju xiang gang mei ti bao dao 
ben lai shen ju jian chu 
zhi zhi jin yue chuan chu ta zai wei liu jia huai you 
zhu li qian wai chu gou wu 
zhu li qian wai chu gou wu 
hai zhuan men yu bao biao diao huan wei zhi qi tu duo bi ji zhe 
liu de hua ai qi wei nv er gou tian jia tong zhuang bao biao tie shen bao hu 
ju xiang gang mei ti bao dao 
ben lai shen ju jian chu 
zhi zhi jin yue chuan chu ta zai wei liu jia huai you 
yue yu zhong nan ding de yi si 
que hu ran jing chang xian shen 
xian hou bei pai dao kan zhong yi he yi si chan jian wai 
geng gao diao xian shen pei lao gong liu de hua chu xi hong xian nv guang zhou sang li 
ri qian ben bao du jia pai dao zhu li qian zai du chu dong 
wei le ying he xiang lai ai chuan tang zhuang de lao gong liu hua 
shen chuan ping di xie song shen qun 
du tu tu yun wei shen nong de ta 
zai mei mei he bao biao hu song xia 
zai jian sha ju mei li hua shang chang xuan gou tang zhuang ying jie xin nian 
dang ta fa xian ji zhe zong ying 
ji ru da tao wang yi yang ji bu li kai 
quan cheng dui ti wen bu fa yi yan de ta 
wei bi pai dao tu du xiang 
geng zou cuo lu jian chai dian shang cuo bao mu che 
ji xu qi di diao zuo feng 
wei zeng shi guo gen lao gong chu xi gong kai chang he 
pei tong liu de hua dao guang zhou chu xi ta men xiang dang jing zhong de qian bei nv jie de sang li 
cheng wei liang ren shou du zheng shi gong kai liang xiang 
dang ri zai guang zhou 
shen chuan rong chang shan hen nan kan dao shen xing 
dan dan kan liu hua quan cheng you lan yao you tuo shou hu zhe 
jia shang tong hang you ji ming bao biao 
hai you zhu li qian de bao mei zhu li hua he mei fu pei tong chu xi 
cong jing jie ji bie da shi ji kan lai 
ta que shi huai you liu jia 
bu guo liu tai wei you yin zai huai bao bao er jian shao wai chu 
fan er chen lao gong jin qi mang si zhou fei xuan chuan you fen tou zi 
jian zhi jian zhu yan de dian ying 
yi ji xun hui yan chang hui 
ji la zhe bao mei ji xu chu dong ban nian huo 
bi jing tou zou cuo lu 
ri qian xia wu wu shi xu 
fa xian zhu li qian he bao mei zhu li hua zai xuan gou fu zhuang 
dang shi zhu li hua zheng zai shi yi fu 
er zhu li qian yi zhan dao shou yin chu 
yi ming bao biao ze zai dian wai deng hou 
bao biao hen kuai fa xian ji zhe 
ji tong zhi lao ban niang li kai 
liang ren pie xia zai dian nei de zhu li hua 
xian cheng fu shen dian ti xia dao di ceng 
huang luan xia cha dian zou cuo le mi dun dao chu kou 
zou dao fu zhuang dian 
ji zhe xiang zhu li qian ti wen shi fou mai yi guo nian 
yi ji you xi deng wen ti 
ta dou yi gai bu li 
qi jian hai tu ran gen bao biao zuo you jiao huan wei zhi 
si hu you xin bi kai jing tou 
yi fang bei pai dao tu du xiang 
ta zou dao shang chang jin ba li dao chu kou 
mei you kan qing jiao tong qing kuang 
bian yi ge jian bu zou dao mei li hua jiu dian men kou zhun bei shang che 
geng cha dian shang cuo le hou mian tong yang shi bai se de bao mu che 
yao bao biao ti xing cai zhi xi 
zou hui zi ji de bao mu che li kai 
liu hua xiang lai chuan tong 
geng xi zuo zhong shi da ban 
ju zhi zhu li qian wei ying he lao gong 
chu le jian sha ju dian wai 
yi hui dao zhong huan dian sao huo 
jin ci zhuan deng dai bao mei tong hang 
jiu shi zhun bei wei yi jia zhi zhuang guo xin nian 
zhang yi mou xin hua she fa 
chen ting xin hua she fa 
da dao yan zhang yi mou 
dao di gai jiao duo shao she hui fu yang fei 
zai you guan fang mian gong bu le zhang yi mou zhe san nian shi ji shou ru qing kuang 
you qi shi zhang yi mou zi cheng qi jian pai she 
shi mian mai fu 
you gong zhong zhi yi 
zhe zhong bu fa shou ru dao di gai suan na yi nian de shou ru 
shou ru shi fou hui cheng wei gao lao wu bao chou qun ti bi shui de jie kou 
you shui wu zhuan jia xiang yang cheng wan bao ji zhe biao shi 
bu fa gei ge ren de lao wu bao chou gai ji ru nei ge nian fen 
ying yi ge ren he shi shou dao bao chou wei zhun 
zhe qi zhong que shi cun zai shui shou chou hua de kong jian 
wu xi shi ren kou ji sheng wei zhu ren xu wei ying zuo ri dui ji zhe biao shi 
mu qian diao cha jin zhan shun li 
dan chu zhang yi mou ben ren shen bao wai 
reng yao dui qi shou ru qing kuang jin xing he shi 
yu ji jin qi hui gei gong zhong yi ge man yi de chu li jie guo 
ci qian mei ti bao dao cheng 
wu xi shi bin hu qu ren kou ji sheng ju fu ze ren yi fu jing yu zhang yi mou fu fu jie qia 
cha qing le zhang yi mou zhe san nian de shi ji shou ru 
bin hu qu ren kou ji sheng ju wei tuo de dai li lv shi tou lu 
zhang yi mou de shi ji shou ru shi zuo wei guang xi dian ying zhi pian chang ming yu chang zhang de gong zi

dui ci zhang yi mou jie shi 
you liang jia gong si tou zi de

piao fang hen cha

wo mo shou dao chou jin 
shi mian mai fu 
qian li zou dan qi 
man cheng jin dai huang jin jia 
wo di que qian ding le dao yan he yue 
dan dang nian bing mei na dao chou jin 
li ji yin qi gong zhong zhu yi 
zhe zhong shou ru gai suan na yi nian de shou ru 
you shui wu zhuan jia zhi chu 
wo guo ge ren suo de shui shi shi xing ge ren shou fu shi xian zhi 
ji cong zheng shou ge ren suo de shui de jiao du lai shuo 
shi yi shi ji na dao qian de na ge yue fen lai ji zheng ge ren suo de shui 
ji zhe yan li mei 
sheng zheng xie li tang nuan yi rong rong 
xi qi yang yang 
sheng wei shu ji zhang bao shun 
sheng zhang wang xue jun 
sheng zheng xie zhu xi wang ming fang 
sheng wei fu shu ji li jin bin 
sheng zheng xie yuan zhu xi fang zhao xiang 
sheng zheng xie he sheng gao yuan 
sheng jian cha yuan ji jun dui you guan fu ze tong zhi 
bu fen sheng zheng xie lao ling dao chu xi cha hua hui 
zhang bao shun zai cha hua hui shang fa biao re qing yang yi de jiang hua 
ta dai biao zhong gong an hui sheng wei 
xiang ge min zhu dang pai 
wu dang pai ren shi 
ge ren min tuan ti he ge zu ge jie ren shi 
zhi yi jie ri de zhu fu he qin qie de wen hou 
ye shi an hui fa zhan jin cheng zhong ji bu ping fan de yi nian 
quan sheng shang xia jian chi wen zhong qiu jin gong zuo zong ji diao 
wei rao ti gao fa zhan zhi liang he xiao yi zhe ge zhong xin 
tong chou wen zeng zhang 
jing ji she hui fa zhan cheng xian chu wen zhong you jin 
wen zhong xiang hao de liang hao shi tou 
zhang bao shun zhi chu 
quan sheng ge ji zheng xie zu zhi gao ju ai guo zhu yi 
she hui zhu yi qi zhi 
wei rao zhong xin 
fu wu da ju 
ren zhen lv xing zheng zhi xie shang 
min zhu jian du 
can zheng yi zheng zhi neng 
ning ju ge fang li liang 
ji ji jian yan xian ce 
wei tui jin xing wan fu min da ye zuo chu le xin de gong xian 
zhang bao shun qiang diao 
xi wang quan sheng ge ji zheng xie zu zhi jian chi he wan shan zhong guo gong chan dang ling dao de duo dang he zuo he zheng zhi xie shang zhi du 
jin yi bu fa hui xie shang min zhu zhong yao qu dao zuo yong 
zhuo li tui jin xie shang min zhu guang fan duo ceng zhi du hua fa zhan

zhi li mi ji

duo xian wu shi zhi ce 
duo ju fa zhan he li 
yao jin yi bu jie fang si xiang 
kai tuo chuang xin

wang ming fang zhu chi cha hua hui 
xin de yi nian li 
wo men yao zai zhong gong an hui sheng wei jian qiang ling dao xia 
shen ru xue xi guan che zhong gong shi ba da he shi ba jie san zhong quan hui jing shen 
lao lao ba wo tuan jie he min zhu zhu ti 
jin jin wei rao wo sheng quan mian shen hua gai ge de zhong da wen ti he she ji qun zhong qie shen li yi de shi ji wen ti 
ren zhen lv xing zheng zhi xie shang 
min zhu jian du 
can zheng yi zheng zhi neng 
chong fen fa hui ren min zheng xie zuo wei xie shang min zhu zhong yao qu dao zuo yong 
tui jin wo sheng ren min zheng xie shi ye chuang xin fa zhan 
wei jian she mei hao an hui zuo chu xin gong xian 
sheng zheng xie fu zhu xi 
min jian sheng wei zhu wei li xiu song dai biao sheng ge min zhu dang pai 
gong shang lian he wu dang pai ren shi zai cha hua hui shang jiang hua 
yu hui ling dao he ge jie ren shi guan kan le jing cai de wen yi yan chu 
an zhao zhong yang he sheng wei guan yu dang de qun zhong lu xian jiao yu shi jian huo dong de tong yi bu shu 
sheng ren da chang wei hui

han zheng gai ren wu fen jie biao 
cong duo ge fang mian ti chu zheng gai cuo shi 
bing zai an hui qun zhong wang 
yi shi jian chi zheng que zheng zhi fang xiang 
jin yi bu jia qiang dang zu ban zi si xiang zheng zhi jian she

jian ding zheng zhi li chang 
jian jue wei hu zhong yang quan wei 
jian chi dang de ling dao 
ren min dang jia zuo zhu 
yi fa zhi guo you ji tong yi

shi dang de zhu zhang he sheng wei jue ce tong guo fa ding cheng xu zhuan hua wei guo jia yi zhi he quan sheng ren min de gong tong shi jian

zhi dao shi jian

zi wo wan shan 
zi wo ge xin

ti gao lv zhi shi xiao

ke xue li fa 
jia qiang dui zheng fu quan kou jing yu suan jue suan de shen cha he jian du 
jia da dui min sheng gong cheng shi shi de jian du li du 
ji shi zong jie gong zuo zhong de chuang xin chuang zao 
wan shan ren mian gong zuo ji zhi 
tuo zhan dui ni ren ming ren yuan zhi qing qu dao 
tan suo jian li ni ren gan bu de ren qian shen cha zhi du 
zhi ding shi shi sheng ren da chang wei hui ren ming de gan bu gong zuo shu zhi zhi du

fa hui ren da you shi

wan shan jie dai 
gong wu kao cha deng fang mian zhi du

jing fei yu suan guan li 
yan ge zhi xing ling dao gan bu gong zuo he sheng huo dai yu you guan gui ding 
jian quan lian zheng feng xian fang kong ji zhi he kao he ping jia jian du deng zhi du 
zhu dong jie shou jian du 
liu shi jia qiang zhi du jian she 
jian quan zhang xiao ji zhi 
gong gu zuo feng jian she cheng guo 
jian li jian quan zhi jie lian xi qun zhong he chang tong qun zhong su qiu fan ying qu dao de zhi du 
jian quan ti xian qun zhong yi yuan de ke xue jue ce ji zhi 
wan shan li fa 
zhong da shi xiang jue ding 
ren shi ren mian deng fang mian fa gui he zhi du 
qie shi wei hu fa gui he zhi du de quan wei xing yan su xing 
you sheng ren da chang wei hui dang zu ban zi cheng yuan an zhao gong zuo fen gong qian tou fu ze 
bing luo shi dao xiang guan zhuan men wei yuan hui he gong zuo ji gou 
zong he ban shi ji gou 
que bao zai zheng gai shi xian nei wan cheng ren wu 
nu li qu de man yi de xiao guo 
yi shi jian chi zheng que fang xiang 
qie shi jia qiang si xiang zheng zhi jian she 
jian jue guan che zhi xing dang de lu xian fang zhen zheng ce 
jian jue wei hu zhong yang quan wei 
jian chi li lun lian xi shi ji 
ti gao jue ce ke xue hua shui ping 
zeng qiang gong gong zheng ce zhi ding tou ming du he gong zhong can yu du 
yan ge luo shi dang nei zu zhi sheng huo zhi du 
quan mian tui jin yi fa xing zheng 
er shi jian chi qiu zhen wu shi 
jian jue fan dui xing shi zhu yi 
zhuo li cu jin jing ji chi xu jian kang jiao kuai fa zhan 
kuo da you xiao xu qiu 
chong fen fa hui xiao fei de ji chu zuo yong 
tou zi de guan jian zuo yong 
chu kou de zhi cheng zuo yong 
jian chi jing ji gong zuo xiang mu hua 
xiang mu gong zuo ze ren hua 
shen ru tui jin xiang mu ti zhi ti xiao 
shen ru shi shi chuang xin qu dong zhan lve 
tui dong zhan lve xing xin xing chan ye he chuan tong chan ye rong he fa zhan 
jia kuai fa zhan xian dai fu wu ye 
bu duan ti gao nong ye zong he sheng chan neng li 
wan shan kao he ping jia ti xi 
bi mian dan chun yi guo nei sheng chan zong zhi zeng zhang lv lun ying xiong 
jia kuai jian she zi yuan jie yue xing 
huan jing you hao xing she hui 
ji ji wen tuo tui jin xin xing cheng zhen hua jian she 
bu duan ti gao zheng fu zhi xing li luo shi li 
qie shi gai jin wen feng hui feng 
jin yi bu jing jian hui yi huo dong 
yan ge biao zhang jiang li huo dong guan li 
san shi jian xing wei min zong zhi 
jian jue fan dui guan liao zhu yi 
jia qiang yu ren min qun zhong de zhi jie lian xi 
wan shan shen ru ji ceng lian xi qun zhong zhi du 
gai jin fu ji ceng diao yan gong zuo 
qie shi zhua hao jia qiang he gai shan min sheng de ge xiang gong zuo 
jin jin wei rao qun zhong fan ying qiang lie de tu chu wen ti 
ji shi yan jiu cai qu geng jia you li de cuo shi 
jian li jian quan wei hu qun zhong li yi de jue ce ji zhi he bao zhang ji zhi 
jia kuai zhuan bian zheng fu zhi neng 
jin yi bu shen hua zheng fu ji gou gai ge 
jia kuai shi ye dan wei fen lei gai ge 
ji xu jian shao he xia fang xing zheng shen pi shi xiang 
chuang xin zheng fu guan li mo shi 
si shi hong yang gai ge chuang xin jing shen 
jian jue fan dui xiang le zhu yi 
quan mian shen hua zhong dian ling yu he guan jian huan jie gai ge 
you hua shi chang huan jing 
ji fa nei sheng dong li 
zeng qiang chuang zao huo li 
fa yang jian ku fen dou jing shen 
geng jia zhu zhong mou hua tui jin da ji chu 
li gen ben de gong zuo 
jian li jian quan zhang xiao bang fu ji zhi 
geng jia guan zhu tiao jian jian ku di qu de jing ji fa zhan 
she hui jian she he min sheng bao zhang gong zuo 
wu shi jian chi qin jian ban yi qie shi ye 
jian jue fan dui she mi zhi feng 
yan ge kong zhi 
jing fei zhi chu 
jing fei yu suan guan li 
que bao gong fei jie dai 
gong fei chu guo 
gong fei gou che zhi jian bu zeng 
yan ge kong zhi ju ban ge lei jie ri qing dian 
wu shi ju ban jing mao huo dong 
yan ge kong zhi lou tang guan suo jian she 
quan mian qing li dang zheng ji guan he ling dao gan bu ban gong yong fang 
zhuo li jia qiang cheng zhi he yu fang fu bai ti xi jian she 
qie shi jie jue fa sheng zai qun zhong shen bian de bu zheng zhi feng 
shen hua zheng wu gong kai 
bu duan ti gao zheng fu gong zuo tou ming du 
liu shi hen zhua jian zhang li zhi 
qie shi jia qiang zhi du zhi xing jian du 
ren zhen qing li xian you gui zhang zhi du he gui fan xing wen jian 
wei rao wan shan wei min fu wu quan cheng dai li zhi 
wan shan zheng fu mu biao guan li kao he ze ren zhi 
jing ji ze ren shen ji deng guan jian huan jie yan jiu chu tai xing zhi you xiao de zhi du he ban fa 
jian quan zhi xing he luo shi zhi du de zhang xiao ji zhi 
jia qiang ji xiao guan li he xing zheng wen ze 
yan su cha chu wei ji wei gui xing wei 
jian jue wei hu zhi du gui ding de quan wei xing 
bing an zhao sheng zheng fu gong zuo fen gong 
luo shi dao ze ren ren he ze ren bu men 
que bao jiao yu shi jian huo dong qu de shi shi zai zai de xiao guo 
yi shi jian ding zheng zhi fang xiang 
bu duan jia qiang si xiang zheng zhi jian she 
ji ben lu xian 
ji ben gang ling 
ji ben jing yan he ji ben yao qiu 
jian chi yong zhong guo te se she hui zhu yi li lun ti xi wu zhuang tou nao 
bu duan hang shi gong tong tuan jie fen dou de si xiang zheng zhi ji chu 
da li hong yang li lun lian xi shi ji de xue feng 
jia qiang min zhu ji zhong zhi jian she 
yan ge zun shou dang zu yi shi gui ze he gong zuo zhi du 
er shi jian chi qiu zhen wu shi 
jian jue fan dui xing shi zhu yi 
zhuo li fa yang qiu zhen wu shi de zuo feng 
jin yi bu jian quan zhua luo shi gong zuo ji zhi 
wan shan kao he ping jia jian du wen ze ji zhi 
zhuo li zhuan bian diao yan zhi feng 
qie shi ti gao fa xian wen ti 
fen xi wen ti 
jie jue wen ti de neng li 
duo dao kun nan he wen ti ji zhong de di fang qu 
fan ying wen ti li qiu quan mian 
ti chu jian yi li qiu shi shi qiu shi 
qie shi ke xing 
dui zhong da diao yan cheng guo ji shi gen zong fan kui 
zhu zhong ping gu zong jie 
cu jin lv zhi cheng guo de zhuan hua 
zhuo li gai bian hui feng wen feng 
cong yan kong zhi wen jian he jian bao shu liang 
gai jin ling dao huo dong he hui yi bao dao 
san shi jian chi qun zhong lu xian 
jian jue fan dui guan liao zhu yi 
geng jia zhu zhong fa hui wei yuan zhu ti zuo yong 
ji ji tan suo wei yuan lv zhi xin xing shi 
bu duan feng fu he tuo zhan ge min zhu dang pai 
gong shang lian he wu dang pai ren shi zai ren min zheng xie lv xing zhi ze de nei rong yu xing shi 
guang du yu shen du 
bu duan gong gu he fa zhan zhong guo gong chan dang ling dao de duo dang he zuo he zheng zhi xie shang zhi du 
geng jia zhu zhong fa hui zhuan men wei yuan hui de ji chu xing zuo yong 
geng jia zhu zhong tu chu zheng xie gong zuo de jie bie te se 
geng jia zhu zhong jia qiang zheng xie ji guan jian she 
geng jia zhu zhong mi qie lian xi qun zhong 
geng jia zhu zhong jia qiang dui ji ceng zheng xie gong zuo de zhi dao 
si shi jian chi lv zhi you wei 
jian jue fan dui xiang le zhu yi 
jin yi bu zhen fen jing shen 
zeng qiang zheng zhi yi shi he ze ren yi shi 
jin yi bu ti gao wei rao zhong xin 
fu wu da ju de lv zhi shui ping 
nu li xing cheng ju you qian zhan xing 
zhen dui xing he ke cao zuo xing de yi jian jian yi 
jin yi bu jia qiang xie shang min zhu jian she 
ji ji tuo kuan xie shang min zhu qu dao 
ti gao xie shang shui ping 
jin yi bu tui jin gai ge chuang xin 
nu li shi ying xing shi de fa zhan bian hua 
tui jin zheng xie li lun chuang xin 
gong zuo chuang xin 
zhi du chuang xin 
ba wo gui lv xing 
fu you chuang zao xing 
wu shi jia qiang dang xing xiu yang 
jian jue fan dui she mi zhi feng 
zha shi zhua hao jie yue xing ji guan jian she 
jing fei yu suan guan li 
yan ge kong zhi 
jing fei zhi chu 
zha shi zhua hao lian zheng jian she 
shen ru tui jin cheng zhi he yu fang fu bai ti xi jian she 
dai tou zhi xing zhong yang ba xiang gui ding he sheng li you guan gui ding 
yan ge zhi xing lian zheng zhun ze 
zi jue zun shou lian jie cong zheng ge xiang gui ding 
liu shi jian chi wan shan zhi du 
qie shi jia da zhi xing li du 
ji xu tan suo 
wan shan he gui fan lv zhi jin ze de ge zhong ji zhi ti zhi 
jian quan he wan shan ge zhong gui zhang zhi du he guan li gui ze 
tui jin zheng xie lv zhi de zhi du hua 
qie shi qiang hua zhi du de guan che luo shi 
ti gao zhi du zhi xing xiao guo 
an zhao sheng zheng xie dang zu cheng yuan gong zuo fen gong 
luo shi dao ze ren ren he ze ren dan wei 
ming que zheng gai shi xian 
bu duan gong gu he fa zhan jiao yu shi jian huo dong cheng guo 
jue ding ren ming 
huang wen tao wei shi ren min zheng fu fu shi zhang 
li hai ying wei shi jing ji he xin xi hua wei yuan hui zhu ren 
xu jing ping wei shi jiao yu ju ju zhang 
li hong wei shi jian cha ju ju zhang 
jue ding mian qu 
wang wen song de shi jing ji he xin xi hua wei yuan hui zhu ren zhi wu 
fang dong ling de shi jiao yu ju ju zhang zhi wu 
yu xiao ping de shi jian cha ju ju zhang zhi wu 
zhu song xian wei shi ren da chang wei hui fu mi shu zhang 
huang min xia wei shi zhong ji ren min fa yuan shen pan wei yuan hui wei yuan 
cui jian zhong wei shi zhong ji ren min fa yuan shen pan wei yuan hui wei yuan 
zhang shang ping wei he fei tie lu yun shu fa yuan shen pan wei yuan hui wei yuan 
cui jian zhong de he fei tie lu yun shu fa yuan fu yuan zhang 
shen pan wei yuan hui wei yuan zhi wu 
zhang shang ping de shi zhong ji ren min fa yuan zhi xing ting fu ting zhang zhi wu 
zhao xu dong de he fei tie lu yun shu fa yuan min shi shen pan ting ting zhang zhi wu 
zhao xin jiao de shi zhong ji ren min fa yuan shen pan yuan zhi wu 
zhang wei ping de he fei tie lu yun shu fa yuan shen pan yuan zhi wu 
cao zheng hong de shi ren min jian cha yuan fu jian cha zhang 
jian cha wei yuan hui wei yuan zhi wu 
liu ren hua de he fei cheng jiao di qu ren min jian cha yuan jian cha zhang zhi wu 
wang jing de shi ren min jian cha yuan jian cha wei yuan hui wei yuan 
jian cha yuan zhi wu 
yao xiao le de shi ren min jian cha yuan jian cha yuan zhi wu 
wang hua qian de shi ren min jian cha yuan jian cha yuan 
he fei gao xin ji shu chan ye kai fa qu ren min jian cha yuan jian cha wei yuan hui wei yuan zhi wu 
zuo huo che ke qing song you bian huang shan 
quan sheng fa zhan he gai ge gong zuo hui yi 
hui shang tou lu 
xin de yi nian 
wo sheng jiang jia kuai tui jin jiao tong 
neng yuan zhong da xiang mu jian she 
yi pi zhong da xiang mu shai chu le zui xin jin zhan 
si ji chang huo jiang wan cheng xuan zhi 
cheng shi ji chang qun 
bu dian zheng zai zhu bu tui jin zhong 
ji xin qiao ji chang shun li qi yong hou 
wo sheng bo zhou 
an qing dou you wang jian she min yong ji chang 
ji zhe liao jie dao 
bo zhou min yong ji chang huo zai qiao cheng qu 
mu qian zheng zai bian zhi xuan zhi bao gao 
su zhou min yong ji chang xuan zhi chu bu ding zai su zhou shi yong qiao qu 
mu qian yi yu beng bu shi qian ding he zuo gong jian xie yi 
wu hu shi wu xuan ji chang jian she di dian chu bu ji hua zai wu hu xian 
ni jian min hang zhi xian ji chang 
tong shi yu liu fa zhan kong jian 
mu qian xuan zhi fang an yi jing wan cheng bing bao shen cha 
an qing min yong ji chang jian she di dian ze chu ding zai huai ning xian 
chu le jian she fei ji zu zhuang ji wei hu bao yang zhong xin 
tong yong fei ji zhan xiao zhong xin 
hai jiang da zao tong yong fei xing yuan pei xun ji de he hang kong ju le bu 
he fei gao tie nan zhan jiang wan gong 
bei shou guan zhu de he fei tie lu shu niu nan huan xian gong cheng mu qian quan xian zhan chang 
qu jian lu ji tu shi fang ji ben wan cheng 
zheng zai jin xing nan zhan fang zhu ti shi gong 
an zhao ji hua 
lu jiang - tong ling tie lu 
fu jia xian kuo neng ji xin jian ke che lian luo xian 
huang shan - hang zhou tie lu ke yun zhuan xian jian cheng hou 
zuo huo che yi tian shi jian jiu neng qing song wan zhuan huang shan 
wei lai sheng cheng shi min zhou mo qu hang zhou wan 
shi jian ye kuan yu le 
shang qiu - he fei - hang zhou tie lu an hui duan xiang mu jian yi shu yi huo guo jia fa gai wei pi fu 
mu qian zheng zai tui jin ke yan bao gao bian zhi deng hou xu gong zuo 
zhe tiao tie lu tong che hou 
huai nan mou hua jian she cheng gui 
chu le sheng cheng he fei 
ma an shan ye zai mou hua jian she cheng shi gui dao jiao tong 
ji zhe liao jie dao 
zi xing huan xian 
quan bu wei gao jia zhan 
mu qian zheng zai kai zhan gui hua bian zhi 
xiang mu jian she gui hua yi jing wan cheng 
zheng dai shen pi 
an zhao ji hua 
er qi tu jian gong cheng zhu ti jie gou jin nian jiang ji ben wan cheng 
wu hu jiang zai jian chang jiang da qiao 
shang he hang tie lu hai jiang wei wo sheng zai dai lai yi zuo chang jiang da qiao 
you yu shang he hang tie lu zai wu hu guo jiang 
xian you de wu hu chang jiang da qiao bu neng man zu gao tie guo jing de xu qiu 
wo sheng ji hua jian she yi zuo shang he hang tie lu wu hu chang jiang da qiao 
zhe ye jiang shi wu hu de di san zuo chang jiang da qiao 
wei si xian tie lu 
ba xian gong lu 
mu qian yi jing wan cheng gui hua shen pi 
cheng kan jiang da zao gao duan hui wen hua ti yan zhong xin 
da zao wen hua qiang sheng ye shi wo sheng de zhong yao mu biao zhi yi 
jin nian de zhong da xiang mu zhong 
wen hua chan ye liang dian pin chu 
ji zhe kan dao 
wo sheng jiang zai cheng kan da zao gao duan hui wen hua ti yan zhong xin 
zong jian zhu mian ji chao guo yi wan ping fang mi 
jiang hui fu si dong hui zhou gu zhai 
tong shi jian you hui yuan su duo gong neng fu wu qu 
hui pai du jia qu he shan shui xiu xian qu 
da zao hong lou meng 
yi yuan liang fu 
mu qian yi jing wan cheng le bu fen qian qi zhun bei gong zuo 
quan sheng gui mo yi shang gong ye zeng jia zhi zeng su quan guo di yi 
wo sheng jing ji yun xing cheng xian chu 
wen zhong you jin 
jin zhong xiang hao 
qu nian qian san ji du 
zeng fu jun ju zhong bu di yi 
jin nian quan sheng 
xin de yi nian 
wo sheng jiang zhua zhu guo jia zhi chi zhong xi bu ji chu she shi de ji yu 
jia kuai tui jin zhong da xiang mu jian she 
she ji wo sheng jian she de fang fang mian mian 
jiao tong fang mian 
jin nian wo sheng jiang jian cheng he fei tie lu shu niu nan huan xian ji nan ke zhan 
yang ji gao su ning guo zhi ji xi duan 
xu zhou zhi ming guang gao su an hui duan 
ma an shan zheng pu gang xin qu yi qi deng xiang mu 
li zheng kai gong jian she hang zhou zhi huang shan tie lu 
shang he hang tie lu wu hu chang jiang gong tie da qiao deng xiang mu 
tong shi zhi chi zhong xiao cheng shi he xiao cheng zhen yu jiao tong gan xian lian jie tong dao jian she 
shui li fang mian 
quan li tui jin yin jiang ji huai gong cheng qian qi gong zuo 
zheng qu guo jia pi fu jian yi shu he ke yan bao gao 
quan mian kai gong jian she huai shui bei diao gong cheng 
nan shui bei diao 
gong cheng you wang huo pi 
hang huang tie lu 
wu hu chang jiang gong tie da qiao ji hua kai jian 
ji zhe cong quan sheng fa zhan he gai ge gong zuo hui yi shang liao jie dao zhe yang de hao xiao xi 
yin jiang ji huai gong cheng you wang huo pi 
yin jiang ji huai gong cheng 
bei cheng wei an hui de 
nan shui bei diao 
shi yi xiang yi gong ye he cheng shi gong shui wei zhu 
jian you nong ye guan gai bu shui 
sheng tai huan jing gai shan he fa zhan jiang huai hang yun deng zong he xiao yi de da xing kua liu yu diao shui gong cheng 
xing dong ji hua jiang 
quan li tui jin yin jiang ji huai gong cheng qian qi gong zuo 
zheng qu guo jia pi fu jian yi shu he ke yan bao gao 
lie ru dao jin nian de gui hua 
deng ji biao zhun wei qian dun chuan bo san ji hang dao 
gui hua mu qian yi shang bao shui li bu 
bing tong guo shui li bu shui gui zong yuan shen cha 
wo sheng yi cheng li yin jiang ji huai gong cheng chou bei zu 
gai xiang mu jian yi shu de shen pi you wang yu jin nian wan cheng 
hang huang tie lu li zheng jin nian kai jian 
wo sheng jiang li zheng kai gong jian she hang zhou zhi huang shan tie lu 
shang he hang tie lu wu hu chang jiang gong tie da qiao deng xiang mu 
qi zhong huang shan zhi hang zhou tie lu qi yu huang shan shi 
jing ji xi xian 
zhe jiang chun an xian 
hang zhou xiao shan qu 
zhi hang zhou shi 
wei ke yun zhuan xian 
quan xian gong she huang shan 
shang he hang tie lu wu hu chang jiang gong tie da qiao xuan zhi wu hu yi ji shan 
ni cai yong si xian tie lu 
han liang xian shi yu gui dao xian 
ba che dao gong lu he jian fang an 
yu xian you de wu hu chang jiang da qiao 
gui hua zhong de wu hu chang jiang er qiao bu tong 
shang he hang tie lu kua chang jiang qiao liang de gong neng ding wei shi guo jiang tong dao 
shi xian yu dui chang jiang chao hu chan ye ji zhong qu de nan bei lian dong 
kua jiang fa zhan 
jian gu zhang san jiao cheng ji tie lu wang de gui hua bu ju 
chuang kou gong zuo ren yuan shou jia xiang yan hui da wen ti 
guo ban yin fa 
guan yu ling dao gan bu dai tou zai gong gong chang suo jin yan you guan shi xiang de tong zhi 
ling dao gan bu bu de zai jin yan de gong gong chang suo xi yan 
zai qi ta you jin yan biao zhi de gong gong chang suo yao dai tou bu xi yan 
ge ji dang zheng ji guan gong wu huo dong zhong yan jin xi yan 
gong wu huo dong cheng ban dan wei bu de ti gong yan cao zhi pin 
can jia ren yuan bu de xi yan 
yan jin shi yong huo bian xiang shi yong gong kuan zhi fu yan cao xiao fei kai zhi 
yao ba dang zheng ji guan jian cheng wu yan ji guan 
gong gong ban gong chang suo jin zhi xi yan 
dui wei fan gui ding de ling dao gan bu 
zao cheng e lie ying xiang de 
yao yi ji yi fa yan su chu li 
jiu dang zheng ji guan ban gong chang suo jin yan wen ti 
ji zhe zuo ri zai sheng cheng jin xing le zou fang 
liu ren ban gong shi nei nan zi you ran chou yan 
zai he fei shi lin ye he yuan lin ju yi jian ban gong shi nei 
san ming nan zi he liang ming nv zi zheng zai ban gong 
zuo zai zhong jian de yi ming nan zi bian chou yan bian gen ling wai yi ming tong shi tan lun shi qing 
dang ji zhe shuo ming lai yi 
wen ji shi fou liao jie gang gang yin fa de 
xi yan nan zi he yi ming nan tong shi dou biao shi ting jiang le 
da jia jin zao hai zai tao lun zhe ge tong zhi ne 
zhe ge ju cuo de chu fa dian shi ti chang yan ge zi lv he jian shao gong kuan lang fei 
dan jin yan xu yao you yi ge guo cheng 
xi yan nan zi bing mei ji zhe ba yan qia diao 
chou zhe yan zai zuo wei shang gen ji zhe liao le yi hui er 
yi fen duo zhong hou 
ta qi shen zou chu ban gong shi wu men 
ba yan qia mie 
yan min men hui pao dao wei sheng jian li xi yan 
yu gai ju jin ge shi ji mi de he fei shi ji guan shi wu guan li ju gong hui ban gong shi nei 
you san ming nan zi zheng zai ban gong 
mei you yi ren xi yan 
wo he tong shi dou zhi dao gang yin fa de jin yan ling 
qi zhong yi ming nan zi jie shao 
ta he liang ge tong shi sui ran chou yan 
dan dou bu hui zai ban gong shi li chou 
yin wei mei zhuan men de xi yan shi 
wo men dan wei li de yan min ping shi hui pao dao wei sheng jian xi yan 
zhong wu xiu xi shi 
zhen xiang chou le 
da bu liao cou dao ce suo li 
yi qi liao liao tian 
jie jie yan yin 
ji guan tie jin yan biao zhi you zhu ban gong shi jin yan 
ji zhe zou jin he fei shi fa gai wei zhong dian xiang mu ji cha ban gong shi 
yi ming nan xing gong zuo ren yuan biao shi 
ban gong shi jin yan xu yao you yi ge guo cheng 
ling dao yao dai hao tou 
ling yi fang mian 
dan wei nei bu ying gai zhi ding tiao li 
cong zhi du shang du jue zai ban gong shi li tun yun tu wu 
wo men ban gong shi qiang shang tie you 
jin zhi xi yan 
jiu neng jing chang ti xing zhe wo men 
ji zhe li kai qian 
gai nan zi gao su ji zhe 
jin yan zhe ge shi 
hai shi yao xuan chuan 
bi ru ba wen jian zhang tie chu lai 
yin qi da jia zhong shi 
yao you zhe ge jin yan huan jing 
tong shi zhi jian hu xiang ti xing ti xing 
chou yan zhe jiu you ya li 
chuang kou ren yuan da yi wen shou li yi zhi jia zhe yan 
yi ming zhong nian nan zi bian chou yan bian zai chuang kou chu gong zuo 
yi ming nv zi zai zi xun shi qing 
nan zi yi zhi jia zhe yan he dui fang shuo hua 
bu shi jiang yan hui dan dao chuang kou xia fang yi ge yan hui gang li 
zhong yang xia fa wen jian 
shuo yao ba ge ji dang zheng ji guan jian cheng wu yan ji guan 
ling dao gan bu dai tou zai gong gong chang suo jin yan 
dang ji zhe wen ji gai nan zi shi fou liao jie dao 
ni men ti xing de dui 
zhi shi you shi bie bu zhu 
ji zhe zuo ri lian xi shang an hui xing zheng xue yuan 
pei xun guan li chu de gong zuo ren yuan li xian sheng gao su ji zhe 
mei ci zhong yang you zheng ce wen jian jing shen xia da 
xue yuan dou hui dui gan bu pei xun jiao xue ji hua 
ke cheng an pai jin xing tiao zheng chong shi 
zhe ci zhe ge 
sui ran chou yan shi ge ren xi guan wen ti 
dan bu neng fang ai bie ren 
you qi shi ling dao gan bu 
zai kong yan fang mian yao qi dao mo fan dai tou zuo yong 
li xian sheng gao su ji zhe 
mu qian an hui xing zheng xue yuan yi gen ju 
zhu bu luo shi gong zuo 
he shi ban ci xin xi 
tiao zheng jiao xue ji hua 
jiang kong yan nei rong jia ru da gang zhong 
zhong gong an hui sheng wei dang xiao li lun yan jiu suo suo zhang 
li lun jian she 
zhu bian song zhou yao jie shou cai fang shi biao shi 
you zhong yao de yi yi 
ling dao gan bu zai gong zhong chang he dai tou bu xi yan 
yi shen zuo ze 
ti sheng le gong wu yuan qun ti de xing xiang 
ling dao dai tou kong yan 
jing hua kong qi bu shuo 
dui gai shan she hui feng qi ye you hen hao de zuo yong 
zhe ge ying xiang bu guang shi dui kong qi zhi liang fang mian de 
er shi yi zhong zong he xing de 
kong yan dui jian kang ye you hao chu 
song suo zhang cheng 
ta zi ji yi qian ye shi gan lao yan qiang 
hou lai jie le 
jie na hui hen bu shi ying 
dan ting guo lai hou jiu hao le 
xian zai mei tian shen qing qi shuang 
pa lou dou bu jue de xiong men 
xin qing ye gen zhe hao qi lai 
song suo zhang cheng 
ta xian zai zheng zai yong zi ji zuo li zi 
gu li shen bian peng you 
tong shi jie yan 
ni rang wo si shi ba 
wo zhe jiu si gei ni kan 
he fei shi zhang jiang dong lu shang de tong ling lu gao jia qiao qiao mian shang 
he fei di ge yuan yu zhong hang shi zhi ci shi 
zuo zai fu jia shi zuo wei shang de xiao juan 
tu ran tao chu yi ba dan huang dao 
zhun bei ge wan 
yuan yu zhong yi shou wo wen fang xiang pan 
ba che kao lu bian ting kao 
yi shou duo xia le xiao juan de dao 
shi he fei shi da zhong chu zu che you xian gong si de di ge 
yuan yu zhong kai che jing guo ning guo lu jiu ba yi tiao jie shi 
yi ming nv zi zuo shang le fu jia shi zuo 
ling wai yi ming nv zi zuo zai le che hou pai 
fu jia shi shang de nv zi sui mei he jiu 
dan yi bo tong dian hua jiu kai shi ma 
mei shuo ji ju jiu ku le 
yuan yu zhong qi chu mei zen me quan 
da dian hua de nv zi qing xu que yue shuo yue ji dong 
ting de chu lai 
ta shi zai gen nan you chao jia 
che zi jing guo chang jiang dong da jie shi 
yuan yu zhong wen da dian hua nv zi 
xu yao shang tong ling lu gao jia qiao 
qu bei er huan lu de jia tian xia xiao qu ma 
yuan yu zhong shuo 
che zi xing shi dao tong ling lu gao jia qiao he chang jiang dong lu jiao kou shi 
ni rang wo si shi ba 
wo zhe jiu si gei ni kan 
shuo wan jiu gua duan le dian hua 
jie zhe cong kua bao li tao chu le yi ge dan huang dao 
zhun bei ge wan qing sheng 
you shen me shi qing xiang bu kai de 
bu neng zhe yang 
yan jian dao zi yao hua shang nv zi de mai bo 
yuan yu zhong yi shou wo wen fang xiang pan 
ba che ting kao lu bian 
yi shou duo xia le xiao juan de dan huang dao 
duan duan shi ji miao nei 
cheng gong hua jie xian qing 
yuan yu zhong bao jing 
chu jing min jing gan dao hou de zhi 
gai nv zi ming jiao xiao juan 
dang wan gen nan you xiao ning 
zai ning guo lu fa sheng mao dun 
xiao ning yi qi zhi xia zhang guai le nv you 
liang ren ge zi li kai 
zai chu zu che shang 
xiao juan da tong xiao ning dian hua 
gen nan you zai ci chao qi lai 
sui hou fa sheng le ge wan yi mu 
xiao ning de zhi nv you qing sheng bei jiu hou 
ye gan dao le gao jia qiao shang 
yuan yu zhong kan liang ren qing xu zhu jian wen ding 
bian xie jue le min jing de bang zhu 
wo ba ta men lia jiao jin le chu zu che nei 
hao yan xiang quan 
mei yi hui er 
ta men jiu he hao le 
yuan yu zhong hai ba zhe dui qing lv mian fei song hui le jia 
he fei shi min jin xing er shou fang jiao yi shi 
hui jiang da liang zi jin cun ru fang chan ju she zai yin hang de tuo guan zhang hu 
dan zhe bi qian chan sheng de li xi cong bu xiang shi min zhi fu 
xin an wan bao 
an hui wang yi 
shi min tuo guan de mai fang qian 
fang chan ju chi qi li xi 
wei ti bao dao le ci shi 
bao dao kan fa hou 
zai he fei shi fu shi zhang zhou shan wu xie tiao xia 
gai shi fang chan ju fu ju zhang chen xin sheng zuo tian jie shou xin an wan bao 
an hui wang ji zhe cai fang shi hui ying 
zi jin tuo guan shi ge li min hao zheng ce 
dan bu ji li xi que shi shi ge xiao xia ci 
fang chan ju zuo zheng mian hui ying 
ben bao bao dao kan fa dang tian 
ji zhe dai zhe bao zhi qian qu he fei shi fang chan ju zai ci lian xi cai fang 
xi wang gai ju dui shi min de yi wen jin xing hui ying 
gai ju ban gong shi huang zhu ren biao shi 
an zhao gui ding cai fang xu yao ling dao shen pi 
ju zhang he fen guan ju zhang dou chu chai le 
dang tian xia wu 
ji zhe jiang xiang guan qing kuang fan ying gei he fei shi zheng fu fen guan fu shi zhang zhou shan wu 
zhou fu shi zhang biao shi 
ta bing bu liao jie er shou fang tuo guan ju ti shi wu 
dan cheng nuo hui an pai fang chan ju ling dao chu mian jie shi shuo ming 
zai zhou shan wu fu shi zhang de xie tiao xia 
ji zhe lian xi shang he fei shi fang chan ju fu ju zhang chen xin sheng 
chen fu ju zhang cheng zi ji zai wai mian kai hui 
bu liao jie qing kuang 
yao dao di er tian cai neng jie shou cai fang 
zhi dao zuo tian shang wu 
ji zhe zai ci gan dao he fei shi fang chan ju 
zhong yu jian dao le chen xin sheng fu ju zhang 
chen fu ju zhang gao su ji zhe 
ta ben ren bing bu fen guan zhe yi kuai ye wu 
fen guan fu ju zhang you bu zai he fei 
zi ji zai jie dao zhou shan wu fu shi zhang de an pai 
bing kan le xiang guan bao dao hou 
zhao le ji wei shu xi qing kuang de ren yuan qian lai jie shao qing kuang 
he xin wen ti reng wu da an 
tuo guan zhang hu gong she ji duo shao hu 
tuo guan zi jin zong e duo shao 
chan sheng duo shao li xi 
zhe xie wen ti shi shi min zui wei guan xin de 
chen xin sheng biao shi 
zhe xie wen ti hen nan hui da 
yin wei mei bi zi jin shu e bu deng 
cun zai zhang hu li de shi jian ye bu tong 
li xi nan yi ji suan 
tuo guan zhang hu you shi cai zheng jian guan 
fang chan ju bu neng sui bian dong yong 
chen fu ju zhang ye biao shi 
tuo guan zi jin ken ding shi chan sheng li xi le 
dang nian zhi ding zheng ce shi de xiang fa shi 
li xi hen shao hen shao 
ban li tuo guan ye wu hui chan sheng wen shu 
piao ju deng fei yong 
yu shi bu shou fei ye bu gei shi min zhi fu li xi le 
he fei shi fang chan ju fa lv gu wen chu lv shi jie shi cheng 
er shou fang jiao yi zi jin tuo guan bing bu shu yu fa lv shou quan de qiang zhi xing xing zheng guan li huo dong 
shi fang chan ju wei lao bai xing ti gong de e wai fu wu 
shi xing zi yuan xuan ze 
mian fei fu wu 
bu ji li xi ye you zhe yi fang mian de kao lv 
ji zhe liao jie dao 
he fei shi shen ji ju ceng gong bu dui he fei shi fang chan ju cun liang fang er shou fang jiao yi zi jin tuo guan qing kuang de shen ji jie guo 
zhe bi ju kuan chan sheng de li xi dao di qu le na er 
guan yu tui xing cun liang fang zi jin tuo guan gong zuo de tong zhi 
cun liang fang jiao yi zi jin tuo guan sheng cheng de li xi 
jiang zhu yao yong yu fang chan ju zi shen xuan chuan 
ban gong she bei de ying jian pei bei 
ruan jian kai fa yi ji fu wu ren yuan de pei xun fei 
chen xin sheng hui ying cheng kai zhi zhu yao yong yu wen shu he piao ju 
jue mei you yong yu qi ta fang mian 
tuo guan zheng ce you dai wan shan 
he fei shi fang chan ju xing zheng shen pi chu chu zhang zhou fu dong dang nian quan cheng can yu le er shou fang tuo guan zheng ce de zhi ding 
dang nian xiang guan wen jian shi gai ju qi zao jing he fei shi zheng fu pi zhun de 
ye bao le gai shi fa zhi ban shen cha 
you guan li xi tiao kuan ye bao kuo zai wen jian zhong de 
he fei mo shi 
dang nian shi quan guo shou li 
hou lai wai di hen duo cheng shi dou can zhao gai mo shi cao zuo 
chen xin sheng ren wei 
zai dang shi de huan jing xia 
tuo guan zheng ce shi bi jiao wan shan de 
chu fa dian ye shi hao de bang zhu lao bai xing jiang di jiao yi feng xian que bao zi jin an quan 
xian zai hui guo tou lai kan 
bu ji li xi que shi shi ge xiao xia ci 
dang shi mei kao lv zhe me xi 
hou lai ye mei you jie dao guo you guan tou su 
suo yi mei yin qi zhong shi 
ni men de bao dao dui wo men chu dong hen da 
rang wo men fan si 
qun zhong li yi wu xiao shi 
na pa yi fen qian li xi ye yao nong ming bai gao qing chu 
chen xin sheng xiang ben bao biao shi gan xie 
cheng nuo xia yi bu hui jiang bao dao fan ying de wen ti xiang ju zhang hui bao 
yan jiu li xi jie suan ban fa 
xiu gai wan shan tuo guan zheng ce 
jue bu hui qin zhan qun zhong de wei xiao li yi 
han mou ceng zai fei dong xian huan bao ju zhang de wei zi shang gan le san nian duo 
ta li yong huan bao xiang mu shen pi deng zhi wu bian li 
zuo ri ji zhe huo xi 
han mou fan shou hui zui bei pan xing 
han mou dan ren fei dong xian huan bao ju ju zhang 
dang zu fu shu ji 
wei biao da xie yi 
lei si de shou hui jing li 
han mou li yong fu ze huan bao xiang mu shen pi ji huan bao zhuan xiang zi jin shen he 
bo fu deng zhi wu zhi bian 
zuo wei hui bao 
gai an you lu yang qu jian cha yuan ti qi gong su 
lu yang qu fa yuan shen li ren wei 
bei gao ren han mou de xing wei yi gou cheng shou hui zui 
yin qi ji ji tui zang 
ju you zi shou qing jie 
fa yuan pan chu han mou you qi tu xing san nian 
huan xing san nian 
ju zhong guo zhi sheng 
xin wen zong heng 
zhong guo zhi sheng jin ri chi xu guan zhu le an hui sheng he fei shi shu shan qu fa yuan pan jue shu zhang guan li dai 
wu gu zhe bei jian kong shi nian de shi jian 
shu shan qu fa yuan hui ying cheng 
shi yin wei cai xin le gong an ji guan chu ju de hu ji zheng ming 
cai dao zhi pan jue zui chu song da shi chu xian cuo wu 
zhu yao ze ren zai gong an ji guan 
zuo tian xia wu 
he fei shi gong an ju shu shan fen ju jiu ci shi zuo chu hui ying 
cheng ren dang chu zai diao qu fan zui xian yi ren hu ji dang an shi 
ban an min jing shu hu da yi 
mei you zi xi diao cha he shi 
he fei shi gong an ju shu shan fen ju yi jing cheng li le diao cha zu 
yi ge hua ming jiao xia nian de an hui he fei ji da xue sheng 
huo tong liang ming tong xue qiang jie 
bei jing cha zhua le xian xing 
fa yuan yi qiang jie zui pan chu xia nian you qi tu xing san nian 
huan xing si nian 
sui hou de shi nian li 
zhe ge xia nian ji xu qiu xue 
zui zhong cong shi fa lv zhi ye 
er tong cheng tong ming tong nian chu sheng de ling yi ge xia nian 
que bei wu dang zuo qiang jie fan 
yi zhi chu zai jing fang zhong dian jian kong fan wei nei 
shu shan qu fa yuan fu yuan zhang zhu jia qiang ren wei 
chu xian zhe ge wen ti 
shi yin wei fa ting cai xin le gong an ji guan chu ju de 
xia nian de hu ji zheng ming 
yin wei gong an ji guan shi fa ding de hu ji guan li ji guan 
zhi you ta chu ju de hu ji zheng ming cai shi he fa you xiao 
wo men fa yuan cai xin le zhe fen zheng ju 
suo yi zuo chu le pan jue shu dang zhong ren ding de zhe ge xin xi 
er zai he fei shi gong an ju shu shan fen ju fu ju zhang wang de jun kan lai 
fa sheng zhe yang de shi qing 
ban an min jing gen ju fan zui xian yi ren xia jia de jiao dai 
ran hou wo men de ban an min jing jiu dao zhe ge pai chu suo diao qu 
dang shi zhe ge pai chu suo de zi liao xian shi shang mian 
gai pai chu suo jiu you yi ge jiao xia jia de ren 
qi shi zhe ge ren shi xia yi 
yin wei zhe ge shang da xue hu ji yi jing diao zou le 
yi jing diao dao xue xiao qu le 
dang shi hu ji shang ye mei you zhe ge ren de zhao pian 
suo yi wo men min jing jiu diao qu le pai chu suo ti gong de zhe ge shi ji shang shi xia yi de hu ji zheng ming 
jiu jiang zhe ge hu ji zheng ming fu dao wo men de xing shi juan li mian 
yi fa qi su le 
shi guan ta ren qing bai 
zai an jian zhen cha jie duan 
mian dui chu sheng ri qi 
shen fen zheng hao deng zhu duo xin xi bu yi zhi de liang ge xia nian 
gong an ji guan you mei you he cha jiu jing na yi ge cai shi xian yi ren de hu ji xin xi 
wang de jun shuo 
you yu ban an min jing de shu hu 
que shi mei you zuo zhe ge gong zuo 
wo men gong an ji guan zui chu de ban an min jing 
zai diao qu hu ji de guo cheng zhong 
ken ding you shu hu da yi 
gong zuo ze ren xin bu qiang 
ken ding you ze ren 
wo men bu hui bi 
wang de jun biao shi 
gong an ji guan fa xian zhe ge wen ti hou 
ji shi geng gai xiang guan xin xi 
dan hou lai you yu xin xi xi tong sheng ji de yuan yin 
you wu jiang yuan you cuo wu xin xi dao ru 
yin ci zao cheng you guan xin xi shi nian lai yi zhi cun zai 
bu guo mu qian 
xiang guan xin xi zai dang di gong an ke kong fan wei nei 
yi jing zuo le geng zheng 
xian zai de zhe liang ge ren 
xi tong li yi jing gai guo lai le 
jiu shi xia jia shi you de 
xi tong li shi you fan zui qian ke de

ju wang de jun shuo 
gong an ju yi jing duo ci xiang xia nian ji qi jia ren dao qian 
ye qu de dang shi zhe de liang jie

bing jiang dui xiang guan ren yuan yu yi zhui ze 
tong guo wo men ji wei 
zheng zai diao cha 
dui dang shi diao qu hu ji zheng ming de 
jiu shi ban an de min jing 
wo men ba qing kuang diao cha qing chu yi hou 
ye hui gei ta men xiang ying de chu li de 
yin ban an ren yuan de yi ge 
gei wu gu zhe xia nian ji qi jia ren dai lai le zhang da shi nian de kun rao 
ke yi she xiang 
ru guo dang nian de ban an min jing fa xian xian yi ren gong shu de chu sheng ri qi yu hu ji zheng ming zhong you chu ru 
ru guo neng shao wei diao cha zou fang yi xia 
zhe yang de wu long shi jian 
huo xu jiu neng bi mian 
wu gu zhe shen shang de fan zui ji lu xiao chu le 
dan ci shi dai gei wu gu zhe ji qi jia ting zao cheng de shang hai 
kong pa hen nan hen nan zai duan shi jian nei mo qu 
nan jing shi wei shi fu da yuan jin xiang gong zhong kai fang

jiang su sheng wei chang wei

gai shi wei chang wei 
xuan chuan bu zhang xu ning jiang ke chuan 
dai zhe di yi pi shi min guang da yuan 
she li dang zheng ji guan gong zhong kai fang ri

tui jin dang wu zheng wu gong kai de zhong yao ju cuo

shi gong an ju 
yi hou jiang zhu bu quan mian tui kai

bao gao gong zuo
