nei rong fen wei zhu ti zhan shi 
bian min fu wu he guan guang lv you san lei 
cheng wei zhong gong nan jing shi wei 
nan jing shi ren da chang wei hui 
nan jing shi ren min zheng fu 
bu guo ci ci bing fei wan quan dui wai kai fang 
dang tian bu jie dai san ke 
mei you bao ming yu yue de shi min bu an pai can guan 
shi wei shu ji 
shi zhang de ban gong shi zan bu dui shi min kai fang 
gen ju ji hua 
jin xing le xiang guan pei xun 
jie shi jiang zuo wei shi min can guan de 
zhi de yi ti de shi 
gen ju ji hua 
yang wei ze jie shi jiang zai shi wei ban gong ting men kou huan ying shou pi shi min 
bing wei di yi wei lai can guan shi wei ban gong ting de shi min 
yi ji di yi wei qian lai fu wu de zhi yuan zhe fen bie fa fang can guan zheng he zhi yuan zhe zheng 
gai shi wei chang wei 
xuan chuan bu zhang xu ning jie shi ye jiang ke chuan 
gong wu yuan dao you 
yi qi dai zhe shou pi shi min guang da yuan 
gong zhong kai fang ri 
gong zhong kai fang ri 
an hui sheng chu tai 
guan yu jia kuai peng hu qu gai zao gong zuo de tong zhi 
wo sheng hai jiang tan suo an zhi fang 
gong you chan quan 
yun xu fu he tiao jian de cheng shi di shou ru jia ting gou mai an zhi fang bu fen chan quan 
quan sheng ge de bi xu ba peng hu qu gai zao an zhi zhu fang yong de na ru dang di zhu fang yong de gong ying ji hua bing you xian an pai 
she ji de xin zeng jian she yong de zhi biao zai tu di li yong nian du ji hua zhong dan lie 
shi xing ying bao jin bao 
dui yu bu chang zheng ce 
ze cai qu shi wu an zhi he huo bi bu chang xiang jie he 
you peng hu qu ju min zi yuan xuan ze 
ru guo peng hu qu ju min jing ji kun nan 
wu li gou mai an zhi zhu fang 
ke yi zu lin bao zhang fang 
huo zhe na ru dang di zhu fang bao zhang ti xi zhong tong chou jie jue 
ru guo peng hu qu ju min yi jing gou mai an zhi zhu fang 
ze yao an zhao shang pin fang jin xing chan quan que ren 
wo sheng hai jiang tan suo peng hu qu gai zao an zhi zhu fang de 
gong you chan quan zhi du 
yun xu fu he tiao jian de cheng shi di shou ru jia ting gou mai bu fen chan quan 
mian dui da liang de peng hu qu gai zao ren wu 
wo sheng jiang tong guo gong gong cai zheng yu suan 
zheng fu zhai quan 
guo you zi ben jing ying yu suan deng duo ge qu dao jia da 
zhi chi li du 
jiang tui chu yi lan zi 
jian mian zheng ce 
mian zheng cheng shi ji chu she shi pei tao fei deng ge zhong xing zheng shi ye xing shou fei he zheng fu xing ji jin 
dui peng hu qu gai zao she ji de cheng zhen tu di shi yong shui 
tu di zeng zhi shui 
yan ge an gui ding luo shi jian mian you hui zheng ce 
shi zheng gong yong shi ye 
dan bao deng qi ye ye jiang dui peng hu qu gai zao ji yu zhi chi 
jiang shi dang jian mian ru wang 
guan wang zeng rong deng jing ying xing shou fei 
ji zhe liu shu 
jin tian shang wu 
xin an wan bao 
he fei shi zheng gong cheng guan li chu de ren yuan zheng zai dui zhi zhu ji qiao mian jie feng chu jin xing jian cha 
ju xian chang yi wei gong zuo ren yuan jie shao 
zai zuo tian de li xing jian cha dang zhong 
fa xian zhi zhu you lao hua bian xing xian xiang 
sui hou lian xi jiao jing bu men dui gai lu jin xing feng bi 
he fei nan yi huan you dong xiang xi shang wu li dun gao jia de dao lu yi jing feng bi 
xian chang she zhi le zha lan ji lu pai ti shi 
xian chang jiao jing ti xing guang da shi min ti qian rao xing 
guan yu su song xian hui de gao ji zhong xue xue sheng si wang shi jian di qing kuang tong bao 
su song xian an qing hui de gao ji zhong xue gao san xue sheng lu mou tu gan shen ti bu shi 
xue xiao li ji jiang qi song wang xian ren min yi yuan bing tong zhi qi jia shu 
hou gai sheng jing qiang jiu wu xiao si wang 
yi yuan chu bu zhen duan wei xin zang cu si 
hui de zhong xue sui ji xiang gong an ji guan bao jing 
xian jiao yu ju hui tong xue xiao di yi shi jian jie dai qin shu bing ji yu jie shi he shuo ming 
sui hou ying jia shu yao qiu 
dao bin yi guan hou 
qi qin shu qing xu ji dong 
yu bin yi guan gong zuo ren yuan fa sheng chong tu 
qiang xing jiang shi ti yun dao xue xiao da men guo dao nei tao yao shuo fa 
bing ran fang bian pao 
xuan nao bu zhi 
xian zheng fu gao du zhong shi 
xun su zhao ji jiao yu 
jian cha deng bu men he you guan xiang zhen 
cun fu ze ren shen jia de jin ji hui yi 
yao qiu xiang guan bu men 
xiang zhen nai xin xi zhi zuo hao qi qin shu si xiang gong zuo 
dong yuan qi qin shu zhu dong jiang shi ti yun hui bin yi guan 
dan jing duo fang fan fu quan shuo wu guo 
wei que bao xue xiao zheng chang jiao xue zhi xu he zhu xiao xue sheng an quan 
fang zhi shi tai jin yi bu kuo da 
bin yi guan gong zuo ren yuan zai gong an ji guan de pei he xia 
yi fa jiang shi ti yun hui bin yi guan 
si zhe jia shu yu xue xiao jiu shi qing chu li da cheng yi zhi yi jian 
si zhe qin shu bing jiu qi zai bin yi guan de guo ji xing wei xiang you guan ren yuan he she hui gong zhong cheng zhi dao qian 
shi qing yi de dao tuo shan chu li 
su song xian ren min zheng fu xin wen ban gong shi 
jia shu sheng ming 
jing hua shi bao xun 
ji zhe li qiu meng 
ji zhe cong chao yang qu zheng fu liao jie dao 
wei huan jie bai xing mai cai nan 
mai cai gui wen ti 
chao yang qu shang wu wei xiang guan fu ze ren jie shao 
chao yang qu ji hua zai xin jian 
chong fen fa hui shu cai liu tong zhu qu dao zuo yong 
zhuo li gou jian pin pai hua 
gui mo hua jing ying de shu cai ling shou ti xi 
xin zeng cai zhan de ju ti wei zhi jiang gen ju bai xing xu qiu er ding 
wei jin yi bu jiang di cai jia 
an zhao ju min fan ying yi jian 
she zhi shu cai shou mai che 
ji zhe sui ji zou fang le ji wei ju zhu zai wang jing xi yuan she qu de ju min 
ju min men dou biao shi mai cai di que fang bian hen duo 
te bie shi lao nian ren geng jia man yi 
yi pi jing ji ling yu li de xin gui ji jiang kai shi shi shi 
zhe shi de bai xing de quan yi de dao geng duo bao zhang 
sheng huo ye jiang geng jia bian li 
zhe xie xin shi shi de fa gui 
jiang hui gei ni de sheng huo dai lai nei xie gai bian ne 
ren min wang cai jing pin dao te jin xing le shu li 
wang dui wang you you suo zhu yi 
jing guo wu yuan guan shui shui ze wei yuan hui shen yi 
guo wu yuan pi zhun 
wo guo jiang dui jin chu kou guan shui jin xing bu fen tiao zheng 
cai zheng bu fa bu 
bu men jue suan guan li zhi du 
ju cai zheng bu xiao xi xian shi 
wei jia qiang bu men jue suan guan li gong zuo 
fa hui bu men jue suan zai cai zheng cai wu guan li zhong de zuo yong 
cai zheng bu dui 
xing zheng shi ye dan wei kuai ji jue suan bao gao zhi du 
jin xing xiu ding bing xing cheng le 
bu men jue suan guan li zhi du 
gen ju gui ding 
chu she ji guo jia mi mi de nei rong wai 
ge bu men ying dang an zhao you guan gui ding zhu dong xiang she hui gong kai ben bu men jue suan 
nian jin ge shui 
di yan na shui 
ming nian shi shi 
ren li zi yuan she hui bao zhang bu he guo jia shui wu zong ju fa bu 
guan yu qi ye nian jin zhi ye nian jin ge ren suo de shui you guan wen ti de tong zhi 
shi shi qi ye nian jin 
zhi ye nian jin ge ren suo de shui di yan na shui you hui zheng ce 
dui dan wei he ge ren bu chao guo gui ding biao zhun de qi ye nian jin huo zhi ye nian jin jiao fei 
zhun yu zai ge ren suo de shui qian kou chu 
dui ge ren cong qi ye nian jin huo zhi ye nian jin ji jin qu de de tou zi shou yi mian zheng ge ren suo de shui 
dui ge ren shi ji ling qu de qi ye nian jin huo zhi ye nian jin an gui ding zheng shou ge ren suo de shui 
guo jia xin wen chu ban guang dian zong ju 
ju guo jia xin wen chu ban guang dian zong ju xia fa 
jin yi bu jia qiang wei shi pin dao bo chu dian shi gou wu duan pian guang gao guan li gong zuo de tong zhi 
bu de bo chu dian shi gou wu duan pian guang gao 
guo wu yuan fa bu 
gai ban fa xin zeng yi tiao gui ding 
yong you dui wai jin rong zi chan 
fu zhai de zhong guo ju min ge ren 
ying dang an zhao guo jia wai hui guan li ju de gui ding shen bao qi dui wai jin rong zi chan 
fu zhai de you guan qing kuang 
ji shi zhong guo ju min chi you guo wai de gu piao 
mai fang he dai kuan 
ming nian qi gou jiang jia che bu yong duo jiao che gou shui 
ju guo jia shui wu zong ju fa bu che liang gou zhi shui zui di ji shui jia ge de gong gao xian shi 
shui wu zong ju kai shi gen ju cai ji dao de mei tai ji dong che jia ge xin xi 
zhu tai he ding ying shui che liang zui di ji shui jia ge 
bing shi shi xia fa ge de zhi xing 
zhe yi wei zheng shui jia ge tiao zheng geng ji shi 
xiao fei zhe gou mai da fu jiang jia de qi che 
huo neng shao jiao yi bi gou zhi shui 
tie lu an quan guan li tiao li 
zhen dui jin ji nian chan sheng de xin wen ti jin xing le bu chong he wan shan 
yu pu tong cheng ke mi qie xiang guan de 
jiu shi da fu zeng jia le dui xi yan zhe de chu fa e du 
zhong shou ci ming que gui ding 
jin zhi cheng ke zai dong che zu lie che shang xi yan huo zhe zai qi ta lie che de jin yan qu yu xi yan 
bei jing shi ren li she hui bao zhang ju fa bu 
guan yu can bao ren yuan yan chang jiao na she hui bao xian fei you guan wen ti de tong zhi 
wai bu can bao ren yuan ying zai da dao fa ding tui xiu nian ling dang yue ti chu yan chang jiao fei shu mian shen qing 
bing yu ci yue kai shi an gui ding jiao na she hui bao xian fei 
zhi zhi fu he an yue ling qu ji ben yang lao bao xian jin tiao jian 
you she hui bao zhang shi wu suo wei qi shen bao ban li tui xiu shou xu 
zi ren li she bao xing zheng bu men he zhun de ci yue xiang shou ji ben yang lao bao xian dai yu 
shi xing she hui hua guan li 
shi shi xi ze 
ge ren he dan wei de pu tong zhi biao 
shi fan ying yong xin neng yuan zhi biao zhou qi tong yi wei mei liang ge yue yi ci 
gu shi chang jiang cheng wei xin gu de wu tai 
zuo ri shi gu zui hou yi ge jiao yi ri 
cha yi ming xian 
zhe zhong ge ju ke neng sui zhuo zhong qi er gai bian 
zhou yi wan jian 
zhe wu jia qi ye fen bie shi ni zai shang jiao suo shang shi de niu wei gu fen 
ni zai shen shi zhong xiao ban shang shi de xin bao gu fen 
yi ji ni zai chuang ye ban shang shi de chu tian ke ji 
wo wu sheng wu 
quan tong jiao yu 
yi jia quan shang bao jian dai biao shuo 
zheng jian hui shi an zhao feng juan de shun xu lai fa fang pi wen de 
zhou er ye jiang you yi pi qi ye huo de pi wen 
shan xi mei ye huo de pi wen 
shi mu qian yi jing guo hui de qi ye zhong zui da de yi dan 
shi zhi shen he zhong suo you de shen qing wen jian yuan jian gui lei cun dang bei cha 
yi wei zhe zheng jian hui yu fa xing ren suo you de gou tong he he cha jun yi wan cheng 
an zhao zan ting shen he zhi qian de gui ze 
bu shao qi ye yi jing sui shi ke yi wan cheng 
dan you yu xin gu gai ge yi jian zhong zeng jia le gu jia wen ding 
jian chi deng duo xiang xin gui 
yi guo hui qi ye xu yao chong xin zuo chu cheng nuo 
bu chong cai liao deng 
ci qian zheng jian hui fa yan ren biao shi 
chu qu yi jing xuan bu tui chu de zhong you su di 
guang da bao de xin ji jin yi ming yan jiu yuan shuo 
an zhao xin de gui ze 
shang shi gong si de dao pi wen zhi hou 
ke yi yi nian nei ze ji fa xing 
dan tou zi zhe yu ji shou pi huo de pi wen de gong si dou hui jin kuai fa xing 
wen he huan jie you bao jian ji gou wan cheng 
yu yi wang de chong qi bu tong de shi 
ben ci chong qi xiang zhu ce zhi de fang xiang mai chu le yi bu 
xin gu fa xing de da bu fen ze ren cong shen he zhe zhuan yi dao fa xing ren he zhong jie ji gou shen shang 
zheng jian hui zhou yi fa bu tong zhi cheng 
qi ye shen he guo cheng zhong jiang bu zai she wen he huan jie 
zhe yi wei zhe ci qian de ying li xing pan duan deng zai zhe yi huan jie chu xian de wen ti ye zi ran xiao jie le 
dan zhe yi huan jie bing fei xiao shi le 
er shi zhuan wei you bao jian ji gou lai wan cheng 
zheng jian hui yao qiu bao jian ji gou du cu fa xing ren zuo hao xin xi pi lu 
bing dui fa xing ren de xin xi pi lu he shen qing wen jian zuo chu he cha yi jian 
dui fa xing ren shi fou ju bei chi xu ying li neng li he fa xing tiao jian gei chu pan duan 
hu shen jiao yi suo zai jin qi xiu ding de gu piao shang shi gong gao shu nei rong he ge shi zhi yin zhong ming que 
shang shi gong si yin xu jia ji zai 
wu dao xing chen shu 
zhong da yi lou 
dao zhi dui shang shi tiao jian gou cheng zhong da ying xiang shi 
ying gai yi fa hui gou shou ci gong kai fa xing de quan bu xin gu 
zhe yi wei zhe 
wei lai ru guo chu xian lei si sheng jing shan he 
wan fu sheng ke yi lei de zao jia shang shi an li shi 
fa xing ren jiang hui shou quan bu xin gu 
chong qi de tong yu bu tong 
shi chang deng dai xin lao hua duan zhi hou chu xian quan xin de gu shi chang 
mei yi ci dou ban sui zhe xin gu fa xing ti zhi de gai ge 
gu chong qi he yi wang you shen me bu tong 
bu tong bian shen he wei shi chang yue shu 
bao jian dai biao xian sheng shi yi jia zhong xing quan shang de zi shen bao dai 
zui jin yi duan shi jian 
ta de gan jue yuan mei you wai jie xiang xiang de na yang huan hu que yue 
ta zui da de gan shou shi lei 
zhe zhong bian hua yuan yu gui ze de yi xi lie bian hua 
qi zhong zui da de yi dian shi 
yi qian zheng jian hui fa shen hui fu ze de shi qing 
hen da cheng du shang zhuan yi dao le ta shen shang 
bi ru ci qian zheng jian hui dui yu shang shi gong si de ying li neng li 
ke chi xu xing deng wen ti de pan duan 
you fa shen hui zhuan yi dao le bao jian ji gou shen shang 
ben lai jiu ying gai zhe yang 
yi qian dao le zheng jian hui 
biao dan shang dou tian 
xian zai zheng jian hui de yi si shi 
bie hu nong wo le 
ni men zi ji kan zhe ban 
ze ren gui quan shang 
quan shang nei bu feng kong bu men jiu hui zhen zheng guan zhu qi zhong de feng xian 
yin wei chu le wen ti suan quan shang de 
gu zai wu xin gu shang shi 
zhe xie gong si zhu dong huo zhe bei dong tui chu 
ye you de zhuan dao xiang gang shang shi 
dui yu quan shang lai shuo 
quan shang ren shi 
xi xiao yan kai 
cong zan ting dao chong qi 
zhe zhong jian you liang ge hen da bian hua 
di yi ge shi you de xin xiang mu ni gan bu gan jie 
di er ze shi fan zhong de he cha ren wu shi de wan cheng yi dan de gong zuo liang yuan chao yi wang 
yu zhe yi zhuan bian xiang pei tao de shi 
zheng jian hui she ji le yi xi lie de pei tao gui ze lai shi xian zhe zhong zhuan bian 
bi ru zao jia shang shi xu 
tong zao fu liu shui xian zai ci kai gong 
cong shang shi gong si de jiao du kan 
pi liang zao fu 
ci qian you bao dao cheng 
zhou yi pi wen fa fang zhi ye 
zhong jie xiang guan ren shi sheng yin chan dou 
ji dong yu ku 
zai tou zi zhe she qu xue qiu shang 
tou zi zhe ping jia shuo 
kong pa dou zai xiang zi ji de yi wan fu weng meng xiang zhong yu ke yi shi xian le ba 
gu rong zi gong neng hui fu 
yi wei zhe pi liang zao fu de liu shui xian zai ci kai gong 
yi shou pi huo de pi wen zhao gu de qi ye wei li 
niu wei gu fen si ming zi ran ren wang bao qing 
chu shan mei gu fen deng ge bie ge gu wai 
min ying gong si ye zhan le jue da duo shu 
cong xin de gui ze kan 
shi ji kong zhi ren bian xian zi ji de cai fu jiang shou dao yi xie yue shu 
bi ru dang shang shi hou gu jia die po fa xing jia shi 
gu fen de suo ding qi hui yan chang 
wei lai gu jia di yu jing zi chan shi xu yao an pai hui gou 
dan gu kai zha 
gei le zhe xie qi ye jia dui xian cai fu de ji hui 
ben ban cai xie xin jing bao ji zhe wu min 
xiao ke che yao hao jiang zhi xing xiu gai hou de xin zheng ce 
ye jiu shi jie ti zhong qian gui ze 
yi ji zeng jia le chun dian dong che zhi biao deng 
bei jing chen bao ji zhe cong bei jing shi jiao tong wei huo xi 
xin ban xiao ke che zhi biao tiao kong guan li xin xi xi tong yi jin xing le sheng ji gai zao 
ling shi shang xian 
xin ban wang zhan shang 
yao hao zhe ke cha kan zi ji de lei ji yao hao ci shu 
li ci yao hao qing kuang he xia yi qi jie ti 
pu tong zhi biao zhong 
zhe yang suan lai 
feng shuang yue yao 
yong hu zhu ce gong neng zhong 
yi zhu ce yong hu zai xian ban li pei zhi zhi biao 
geng xin zhi biao 
zheng ce zi xun 
cha xun jie guo gong shi 
cha xun zhi biao zhen wei deng ye wu 
xi tong zhong zeng jia le shi fan ying yong xin neng yuan xiao ke che 
chun dian dong qi che 
zhi biao shen qing 
yao hao deng gong neng 
yu xiao ke che zhi biao 
yao hao tong shi jin xing 
ruo dang qi shen qing shu liang shao yu dang qi zhi biao pei e 
ze wu xu yao hao zhi jie pei zhi 
gou che yao hao bu tong 
xin jiu tong quan 
jiu yao bu zhong 
zeng jia le zhong qian ji lv 
xi tong zhong zeng jia le an zhao bian ma zi dong lei ji yao hao ci shu de gong neng 
shen qing ren deng lu xi tong jin ru yong hu zhong xin 
ji ke cha kan lei ji yao hao ci shu 
li ci yao hao qing kuang he xia yi qi jie ti 
xi tong zhong hai zeng jia le an zhao jie ti fen pei yao hao ji shu xu hao de gong neng 
shen qing ren deng lu xi tong jin ru yong hu zhong xin 
pu tong zhi biao yao hao chi bian ma gong bu 
ji ke cha xun ben ren bian ma dui ying de ge qi yao hao ji shu xu hao 
dan wei he ge ren yong hu deng lu xi tong 
jun ke gen ju dan wei huo ge ren xin xi xun su cha xun zhi biao di zhen wei 
bei dao qiang che fu he tiao jian ke zhi jie shen qing zhi biao 
qi che bei dao qiang bu yong zai yao hao 
man zu tiao jian hou ke zhi jie shen qing zhi biao 
bei jing shi xiao ke che zhi biao ban xiang xi jie shao le 
jing pai xiao ke che bei dao qiang zhi biao gong zuo ban shi zhi nan 
ming que le che liang bei dao qiang hou zai shen qing zhi biao di ju ti tiao jian he shen qing liu cheng 
an zhao gui ding 
dan wei huo ge ren ming xia chu yu zheng chang deng ji zhuang tai de xiao ke che ruo bei dao qiang 
bing yi zai gong an ji guan che liang guan li xi tong deng ji bei dao qiang zhuang tai de 
yu qi wei ti chu shen qing de 
shi wei zi dong fang qi zhi biao shen qing 
bing yi zai gong an ji guan che liang guan li xi tong deng ji bei dao qiang zhuang tai de 
ru guo che liang zai yao hao zheng ce qian che bei dao qiang 
shi fou ye ke yi shen qing zhi biao 
jiao tong bu men tou lu 
shen me shi hou neng gou shen qing zhi biao 
xiang guan fu ze ren biao shi 
bei dao qiang che shen qing zhi biao 
bi ru shuo zai zuo tian 
bing dang tian li an 
qian xie yi pin che jin qi he fa 
he cheng shi fou he fa zhong yu you le ding lun 
bei jing shi jiao tong wei guan yu bei jing shi xiao ke che he cheng chu xing de yi jian 
shi min he fa pin che jiang bu zai bei ren ding wei 
he cheng xu qian he tong 
bei jing shi jiao tong wei gei chu de ding yi 
xiao ke che he cheng shi zhi chu xing xian lu xiang tong de ren gong tong da cheng qi zhong yi ren xiao ke che de chu xing fang shi 
an zhao shi fou fen tan fei yong fen wei gong yi xing he cheng he hu zhu xing he cheng 
an zhao he cheng fang shi fen wei shang xia ban tong qin de chang qi he cheng he jie jia ri fan xiang 
lv you de chang tu he cheng 
bei jing shi ti chang he cheng ge fang tong guo qian ding he cheng xie yi de fang shi ming que chu xing xian lu 
cheng che di dian 
an quan ze ren 
fei yong fen tan deng ge zi quan li yi wu 
bing zai he cheng qian jin xing xin xi he shi 
que bao xing che gui fan he an quan 
jiao tong bu men ming que gui ding 
he cheng wang zhan ying dang tong guo ti gong he cheng chu xing xin xi 
he cheng xie yi wen ben 
he cheng yun zuo liu cheng 
wang shang qian yue fu wu 
ping ding he cheng xin yong deng xing shi 
wei shi min he cheng ti gong zhi dao he bang zhu 
he cheng shou fei jin han fen tan you fei 
an zhao yi jian 
xiao ke che he cheng ying dang zun xun gong yi he cheng you xian 
min jian hu zhu zi yuan 
wei hu he fa quan yi 
gui fan he cheng xing wei 
yan jin fei fa yun ying de ji ben yuan ze 
cu jin qi jian kang fa zhan 
zheng fu ge xiang guan bu men 
she hui tuan ti 
ju min wei yuan hui 
cun min wei yuan hui he she hui zhuan ye he cheng zu zhi ying dang tong guo ge zhong xing shi ji ji kai zhan xiao ke che he cheng chu xing xuan chuan huo dong 
xuan jiang he cheng zhi shi 
jiao yu he cheng dang shi ren bao hu zi shen quan yi 
gui fan he cheng xing wei 
di zhi fei fa yun ying 
sui ran ci ci jiang he cheng shou fei he fa hua 
dan ye ming que shang xia ban tong qin he cheng he jie jia ri fan xiang 
lv you he cheng ge fang dang shi ren 
jin ke yi he li fen tan he cheng li cheng xiao hao de you 
dian fei yong he gao su gong lu tong xing fei yong 
lin shi pin che reng shu 
ye nei ren shi jie shao 
lin shi qi yi de pin che 
you yu wei qian ding he fa xie yi 
yin ci reng ran jiang bei shi zuo 
jiao tong zhi fa bu men jie shao 
si ji yu cheng ke hu bu ren shi 
duo zai che zhan 
di tie zhan deng ren liu mi ji de di fang chu xian bing la huo er 
bei jing shi jin zhi he cheng dang shi ren fa bu xu jia xin xi 
jin zhi he cheng dang shi ren qian ding xu jia yin yang he tong 
dui cun zai shang shu xing wei 
yi he cheng ming yi kai zhan fei fa yun ying de 
you you guan bu men yi fa cha chu 
ma shang jiu fang 
he cheng fei yong ruan jian jiang shang xian 
gen ju shun feng che gong yi huo dong de yi xiang si jia che chu xing diao cha gu suan 
bi li ji suan 
wei le gei he cheng dang shi ren ti gong ji chu fei yong de yi ju 
jin qi ye zai kai fa yi kuan 
cheng che ren xia zai hou ke shu ru mu di di he he cheng ren shu 
ruan jian jiang zi dong ji suan chu mei ren ying gai fen tan de fei yong 
wang zhan zeng jia le xin neng yuan xiao ke che zhi biao shen qing 
jie ti zhong qian lv cha xun deng xin gong neng 
gen ju xin zheng 
xiao ke che yao hao mei liang yue yi ci 
jiu yao bu zhong 
zhe ke xiang zhong qian lv fan bei 
bei jing shi jiao tong wei biao shi 
an zhao gou che yao hao xin zheng de you guan gui ding 
gou che yao hao xi tong jin xing le sheng ji gai zao 
ci ci xi tong sheng ji gai zao zhu yao you wu ge fang mian de nei rong 
she ji xin tiao zheng de jie ti zhong qian lv 
xin neng yuan che zhi biao shen qing he dao qiang che zhi biao shen qing deng gong neng 
gen ju yao hao xin zheng 
ge ren can jia yao hao de lei ji ci shu she zhi jie ti zhong qian lv 
yi nei wei zhong qian de 
yi ci lei tui 
yao hao xin xi tong ke cha lei ji yao hao ci shu 
yi ji dang ci yao hao de ji zhun zhong qian lv deng xin xi 
shen qing ren deng lu xi tong jin ru yong hu zhong xin 
ji ke cha kan lei ji yao hao ci shu 
li ci yao hao qing kuang he zi ji zai xia yi qi yao hao suo chu de jie ti deng ji 
jiu yao bu zhong 
zhe de zhong qian ji lv shi tong guo zeng jia yao hao zhe zai yao hao chi zhong de quan zhong shi xian 
xi tong zhong jiu zeng jia yi zu dui ying gai shen qing zhe de ji shu xu hao
